Un hôte parfait, aux petits soins, tout en vous laissant votre intimité. Je recommande vivement.

L'appartement est idéalement placé pour rejoindre le stade de France (en bus ou à pied), à proximité aussi du métro. L'endroit est propre, parfait pour passer la nuit.  Jonathan est très sympa et ouvert d'esprit, c'est intéressant de discuter avec lui. Je recommande !

Court séjour chez Jonathan, mais très agréable ! Appartement et emplacement super, à deux pas du métro, très facile à trouver. Accueil au top, Jonathan est disponible à répondre à vos questions et vous conseiller des endroits sympas pour votre séjour ! 
Je conseille fortement, pour un si petit prix on ne trouve pas mieux.

Niveau rangement et propreté, son appartement gagnerait à ressembler aux photographies en ligne, je n'entre pas dans les détails car je pense que Jonathan va prendre en compte les remarques que je lui ai faites pour améliorer la qualité d'accueil.
La situation du logement est excellente pour accéder au Stade de France à pied. La station de métro n'est pas trés loin non plus.
Le canapé est confortable et la proximité du couchage de notre hôte n'a pas été gênante du tout. 
Le prix est en adéquation avec la prestation.
Hôte très sympathique, accueil chaleureux, excellent rapport qualité prix, parfait pour ce que je cherchais  !
Très bon logement, Jonathan très sympa, nous a proposé de l'accompagner à sa soirée malheureusement nous ne pouvions pas.
Jonathan est super accueillant et très gentil, son studio est confortable mais nos horaires différents me faisaient craindre de le réveiller le matin à mon départ

Jonathan est dispo et très serviable . La chambre propre et le lit confortable .

J'ai aimé l'emplacement pas loin de la station métro et commerce, l'appartement calme, cosy et accueillant, immeuble bien sécurisé.
C'était la première fois que j'utilisais Airbnb et j'en suis très content, Jonathan est accueillant, serviable, arrangeant... Je le recommande sans soucie.
Jonathan est accueillant et fort sympathique. Nous avons beaucoup échangé. Séjour très agréable
Très bon accueil, Jonathan est très sympathique et très serviable. Son canapé lit est très confortable et la vue splendide ! Très bon séjour merci !
Je n'ai pas pu résider chez Jonathan suite à un imprévu. Il s'est montré arrangeant et compréhensif.
Très bonne expérience chez Jonathan, quelqu'un de cultivé et agréable.

Super accueil de la part de Jonathan. C'est un jeune homme très sympathique, intéressant et avec qui on peut parler.

À bientôt !
J'ai vécu une belle expérience. Une belle rencontre. Un accueil simple et convivial. De belles histoires à découvrir. Top pour Jonathan.
Agréable et spacieux studio. Bonne localisation par rapport au métro. Un grand merci à Jonathan pour son accueil, malgré mon arrivée tardive.
Canapé très confortable. Séjour agréable.

Jonathan est très arrangeant et généreux ! Arrivée en fin de soirée après un concert, ne connaissant pas Paris, ses explications pour trouver son logement étaient parfait; accueil chaleureux et souriant; l'annonce n'est pas trompeuse et le canapé-lit bien confortable je ne peux que le recommander ! :)

Hôte plein de générosité et de Simplicité! Tout ce que je cherchais! Disponibilité et surtout il en faut avec moi.... : de grandes capacités d'adaptation! ! ;-) merci merc (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) pour ces supers moments d'échange! Et.... à très bientôt c'est sûr! ;-)

Chouette appartement, bien situé.
Jonathan est disponible et très sympas.
Je recommande sans problème cette adresse.

Jonathan est très agréable. Son appartement est situé dans un quartier plutôt calme. Le lit propose est vraiment confortable, situé dans la même pièce que celui de Jonathan mais cela ne pose aucun souci car il est très silencieux et soucieux du bien-être de des hôtes.
Tout c'est très bien passé, aucune remarque négative !
beau studio  , un confort assuré , johanthan est agréable , j’hésitai pas de revenir quand je serai à Paris , Merci pour le thé
Séjour parfait chez Jonathan, il est très ouvert, généreux et accueillant! Je recommande vivement :)
Grand chambre très bien meublé avec une belle balcon ou on peut avoir belle vue. Propriétaire est très gentil. J'ai déjà présenter ce chambre à mes amis. C'est génial !!

Johnatan m'a très bien accueilli. Nous avons même pu finalement ;) partager une journée dans Paris. Il m'a donné tous les conseils et les bons plans pour mon séjour. Bref un grand merci et au plaisir de se revoir !

L'appartement est très confortable, lumineux et calme! A 5 min du métro ligne 12. 
Jonathan est un hôte très sympathique & chaleureux. 
On se sent rapidement chez soi! 
je recommande vivement, très bon rapport qualité/prix!

Le logement correspondait tout a fait a ce qu'il  y avait de noté sur l annonce, très bien situé a deux pas de la station de métro. L hôte a été  très  sympa en nous laissant déposer  nos bagages tôt  dans la matinée pour que nous puissions profiter pleinement de notre journée, retour tard dans la soirée  l hôte était là  pour nous accueillir sans soucis. Un bon moment partagé  en sa compagnie avec un super petit déjeuner le lendemain  matin!! Merci Jonathan! !
Séjours au Top, rien à dire
Toujours bien.je recommande
Tout était parfait !!
Jonathan est un bon hôte et je vraiment recommande rester chez lui.

Jonathan a été un excellent hôte une des deux nuits je suis arrivé après minuit - cela n’a pas posé de problèmes pour lui. Son appartement est en très bon état et était parfait pour deux nuits. Hautement recommandable
Parfait. Jonathan est un hôte exceptionnel, très attentif. Il m'a laissé rester un peu plus de temps par rapport à ce qui était prévu.
Très bien
Une personne  sympathique qui sait mettre les gens à l aise.je recommande.
Appart petit mais très propre.
Excellent accueil ! Nuit calme et tranquille. Excellente réactivité et communication.
Je me sens comme chez moi ici. Merci Jonathan!
Accueil chaleureux,hôte sympathique.Bon rapportqualité-prix.
Espace confortable et bien chauffe. Jonathan a ete tres sympa et nous a donne les bons conseils pour visiter Paris
Jonathan est un hôte très gentil et attentionné. L’appartement est situé à environ 30 à 40 min du centre de Paris. Le divan lit est confortable. En bref, c’est un bon rapport qualité prix pour Paris!

Très cordiale, excellente hospitalité et en plus des bonnes discours avec Jonathan m'on change le WE.
L'appartement étais très propre et il y avez de l'espace pour vivre. 
Franchement top.
Merci pour ta gentillesse et ton accueil Jonathan!
Lieu impeccable, facile à trouver, pas trop mal placé, et joli appartement. Un accueil chaleureux, j'invite à choisir ce lieu !
Bien

Très bon accueil et l'hôte est trop gentil. Bien que l'appartement ne soit pas dans la ville de Paris le métro qui n'est pas du tout loin vous permets d'y aller très facilement. L'hôte ne donne aucune clé donc il faut lui dire quand on pense rentrer pour qu'il soit là pour ouvrir la porte. C'était bien, je recommande.
Le lit était très confortable, Jonathan est sympathique et agréable.
Très agréable studio, a côté d'une station de métro.

C'était une très bon temps pendant mes jours ici. Près de la station de métro, ssez calme et tout équipé pour faire nous-mêmes. Jonathan il a beaucoup de talents qui nous attirent. Je suis très content de l'avoir rencontré.

Je vous remercie pour toute l'aide  avec les transport en commun - je suis vraiment reconnaissant... Juste que m'ai manqué c'est une photo ensemble autographié, car Jonathan est aussi bien un star du cinéma... Sûrement je vais garder les souvenirs comment une des mes meilleures voyages....jusqu'à la prochaine.
Logement correspond à la description ainsi qu'aux photos
Very nice french guy with good attitudes, who will always wants to help you.
Все хорошо. Цена низкая, принял заявку почти сразу. На контакты всегда отвечал
Preocupacion confiable una persona que no se mete en tu privacidad es perfecto con muchos valores RECOMENDABLE
Very nice, calm and caring person.
Sofa was okay to sleep on. Check in was easy
ok

Jonathan is a very nice. He is very welcoming, and interesting to talk with. My stay was of only 1 night but I totally recommend him. Plus the place is very luminous and spacious, and i have never slept on a couch so comfy ahah! I recommend!

Jonathan was a wonderful host. He was very accommodating and considerate. He gave quick tips for travel in Paris. My family shared great time with him in his studio. He is a great host and that made our time enjoyable despite any unfortunate incidents. His place is nearer to metro. The place has good security in place. The elevators and all facilities work perfectly. There is a cafe downstairs where you can grab some dinner or drinks. Jonathan is an interesting person as well. He has great stories to listen to.i would recommend his place anytime.
Jonathan é um cara muito legal e atencioso! O apartamento é muito  perto da estação de metrô, embora não tão perto dos pontos turísticos, mas nada que não dê pra chegar de metrô.
不错
Nickel
I changed my mind temporarily so I didn't check in.
A wonderful host! I arrived later than we had planned, and Jonathan waited for me despite his dinner plans.
Amost impossible to sleep because of the mosquitoes. If you travel not in winter, bring with you something really effective
Really nice place to stay, the host was really friendly and helpful. Even recommended me where to get some breakfast.
Super!
Great place, easy to find. Experienced host happy to give recommendations for places to visit
Great value for money, great host, 100% recommend
Schöne Wohnung am Stadtrand von Paris. Mit der Metro (Linie 12) gut zu erreichen. Jonathan ist ein guter Host mit dem man auch so mal gut quatschen kann. Gerne wieder.
Perfect!
Muito bom, recomendo para todos.
Justo what I needed for a brief stay in Paris!
Wszystko OK

Hice la reserva para la hija de mi pareja en el medio de la cuarentena que afecto a todos los paises por la pandemia, y Jonathan fue sumamente atento con ella, permitiendole ingresar antes y haciéndola sentir como en su casa. El departamento es bello, con todas las comodidades y muy prolijo y limpio. Valoro por sobre todo la calidad como persona de Jonathan en un momento tan difícil para una niña de 19 años que se encontraba sin poder regresar a su país, brindándole calidez de hogar en un país tan lejano. Gracias!

Jonathon was an amazing host! I got in earlier than check in and he was able to assist me with that no problem. He was very sweet, offered wonderful places to eat for cheap (but delicious!) and visit free museums and such. 

He was very sweet and understanding of me coming in a bit later as I enjoyed roaming at night to experience the Eiffel Tower under the moonlight. Make sure you plan out the metros though! I was silly and ended up walking most of Paris (since I didn’t have WiFi for an Uber). 

The place was as pictured and 30 minutes from the Eiffel Tower. Only five minutes from the metro which is perfect. The café below was a great spot to grab coffee before an adventure. Very local feeling. Felt very safe as a solo female traveler. 

Overall, great experience. I was very happy with my stay even though it was short. Merci beaucoup !
Una gran persona, puedes hablar con él en español, pero sería mucho si te comunicas con él en inglés, así de paso prácticas para no tener problemas de comunicación en Paris

The place was sparkling clean. Clear instructions were given on how to enter the place and things to use in the house. The host was very flexible with the checkin timing. The host welcomed nicely at the place.
Great location, wonderful host with very convenient local tips.
Convenient to get to the center by taking M4. Big plus that I can prepare food and doing laundry. Saved a good amount of money by staying here in Paris.

Jonathan é uma pessoa atenciosa, cordial e está disposto a ajudar. Mesmo com minha dificuldade dentro o idioma, o anfitrião fez o possível para me ajudar e se comunicar.  O apartamento é um loft e você dorme em um sofá cama (como descrito no anúncio) confortável.
i really enjoyed my stay at his place. bonus points for him for being a french teacher :)

Es un lugar muy práctico para viajeros independientes, Jonathan tiene todo para tu comodidad si te quieres cocinar algo por tu cuenta. Es una persona muy amable y atento con quien se hospeda. Al inicio me perdí pero sus vecinos muy amablemente me ayudaron a contactarlo. Me herí un dedo y el me proporcionó ayuda. Definitivamente lo recomiendo
Always a pleasure to stay with Jonathan!
Jonathan was great to talk to and quick to respond! I had to come check-in a little earlier and he helped me do so with no issues! Definitely recommend.

La habitación no estaba sucia pero no luce como en las fotos, un poco menos acogedor pero el precio lo vale. No incluye el desayuno como dice. En las fotografías se aprecia a ver una cama pero es donde duerme el anfitrión (Jonathan) tú dormirás en un sofá-cama, su cama está junto y se aprecia a escuchar sus ronquidos (no recomendable para los de sueño ligero), para taparte ofreció unas tipo sábanas (no recomendable para los friolentos). Si te quieres bañar y llegas noche, como mi caso, es muy incomodo usarla por el ruido al igual temprano porque el sigue durmiendo, el precio lo vale 100%, y Jonathan es amable. No habla bien el español como lo muestra su descripción.
Everything is good
침대가 소파 접이식입니다
I never recommend
Jonathan is very kind and responsive. I felt comfortable and well received with everything I needed.
Adorei o lugar, simples, porém acolhedor, só não tive sorte com o transporte, devido a greve, o que tornou tudo mais longe, mas não é culpa do anfitrião, o Jonathan é super atencioso. Recomendo!

The host is very nice. There was some misunderstanding but he was willing to resolve it by contacting Airbnb. Make sure to read the house description throughly because it’s wordy. Basically you are sharing the studio with the host and you only get the sofa bed to sleep on. It was our fault not reading it carefully before booking. But we still appreciate our stay.
It was really bad. Worst.

Jonathan was a very nice body. Though I haven't managed to meet him in person due to our different schedules, he was very helpful helping me with everything I needed. It was pretty easy to check in into his place. The altrimenti Is located around 15-20 minutes walk from the RER line that takes you directly to the airport, so if you don't mind walking is good. The only small thing is that the photos didn't match completly, as the house was clean but a bit messy.
Jonathan is a great Hoster and gave me really nice tips of Paris. The location is really good with restaurants and transportation around.
Thanks
Buen lugar
Great place to crash at night. Close to train.

There is a nearby metro (RER) which is good going to the airport. Jonathan was very kind, respectful, and pleasant to talk with. I really enjoyed our conversation. I was traveling as a solo female and felt very comfortable with the shared room. I checked in too early and the apt. wasn’t clean, but after I came back it was very very clean, so don’t be surprised if you check in early too. He made me tea before bed, shared local tips, and helped me rent a car. Thank you Jonathan, best of luck with everything!
The Place is as described... I was close to the metro which means you can reach any place without any problem...
Ótimo lugar. Perto de estação de metrô e ponto de ônibus e de conveniência.  Sofá cama realmente confortável. Só não há lugar para guardar bagagem.

Jonathan ha sido muy amable, pero a pesar de ser compartido el apartamento no teníamos ni el sofá cama preparado para dormir. Además, el piso estaba todo desordenado y sucio. No había ni un sitio para dejar nuestras maletas.
Repito, fue amable, pero el espacio para alojarnos era pésimo, desordenado y nada acogedor. 
Su alojamiento no es nada recomendable. Las fotos son engañosas. Se ve una cama que es la suya, la cual los huespedes no pueden usar. Nosotros nos buscamos otro alojamiento.

Es un apartamento muy limpio y organizado, está cerca tanto de una estación de bus como de metro desde el cual se puede llegar fácilmente al centro de la ciudad. Jonathan es muy amable y es agradable platicar con él. Me ha ayudado mucho para  poder usar el transporte y llegar a los atractivos turísticos. También me ha dado recomendaciones de otros lugares no tan conocidos por los turistas y se agradece. En fin, me la he pasado muy bien y recomiendo el lugar :)
Jonathan es genial, indicaciones precisas, una aventura muy interesante. Saint Denis es un poco apartado del centro pero el metro y las conexiones de Paris solucionan cualquier distancia.
Jonathan pretty friendly and calm guy. It was nice to meet him.
人很好,房间很干净,住起来很舒服

Ich war das zweite mal mit meiner Hündin bei Jonathan und wieder sehr zufrieden. Preis, Sauberkeit, Tipps, Weg zur Metro,  was wir benutzen durften und der Kaffee morgens nicht zu vergessen. Wir werden wieder bei Ihm buchen!
It a great house and has terrace that can see Tour Eiffel and the host was great man
Jonathan’s place was really nice. Just a short taxi ride away from the Eiffel Tower. I would recommend to anyone visiting the area!
A estadia está em conformidade com o anunciado.
El lugar esta algo retirado del centro de Paris, pero llegas rapido en metro, en general todo bien
Excelente lugar, cómodo y recomendable. El anfitrión, Jonathan muy gentil y amable.
Nice

Il loft di Jonathan è incredibilmente accogliente e pulito. La casa si trova vicino ad una fermata della metro che in una ventina di minuti arriva a Montmarte e al centro di Parigi. Jonathan è un host fantastico, piacevole, intelligente e accogliente. La sua casa è molto pulita e il divano letto è comodissimo. Jonathan è stato davvero gentile nel venirmi incontro con l’orario di check in e con il darmi dei consigli personalizzati su cosa visitare a Parigi. Se dovessi tornare a Parigi ritornerei sicuramente nel suo alloggio. Merci Jonathan, à bientôt!

Great value and a lovely view! Very respectful host. 

Definitely recommend!

Toller Gastgeber! Er verlässt sich auf Einen, lässt einem seinen Freiraum und ist ein sehr guter Gesprächspartner! Mit der U-Bahn und dann ein paar hunderte Meter zu Fuß, erreicht ihr super die Unterkunft.

I only stayed one night however communication was great, Jonathan left keys for me so I could check in early. Apartment is small but right next to a Metro station - Paris is at your doorstep. It was very clean and Jonathan is a great person,
can recommend :)

It is around 30 mins by metro from the main attractions in Paris. There is a metro station just about 5 mins walking. It is a common place, which means you will share the same room with Jonathan. In general the place is ok, Jonathan is a nice host. Just consider that the checkin is at 8pm and checkout is at 8am. This is because Jonathan’s work schedule.

Die Lage der Unterkunft ist perfekt wenn man tagsüber in der Stadt ist und Abends den Stadtlärm entfliehen will. Man hat einen wunderschönen Ausblick auf die Sacre-Coeur. Besonders ab Abend ein toller Anblick. Der Balkon ist auch sonst sehr gemütlich. Der Check-In verlief problemlos und Jonathan ist da auch sehr flexibel. Jonathan ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Er gibt sehr tolle Tipps für Unternehmungen, Essen, Trinkn,....
Die Unterkuft war sehr sauber und gepflegt und das Sofa super bequem.
Jonathan was friendly and helpful!
Podría ser mejor.
Everything was really good. I meet a really nice person. Good conversation. It was a pity that I couldn't stay longer to know him better. Merci pour tout, monsieur !

Had a wonderful stay at Jonathan’s flat! It was very clean, everything needed was there, including host himself :) Jonathan was very responsive and communicated a lot with me, he is a guy with good thoughts and healthy life. And was very fun to talk with. Metro was very near and supermarket also! Thank you for your care. Will come next time if I were to visit Paris again. 
끈뗴 한꾺뿐뜰(튺히 여썽뿐뜰)  씨냬예써는 떄쭝꾜통 싸오씨뿐 쩡또 껄려써 화이트예폘이라떤까.. 썌뼊까찌 놀따까 뜰어오끼옌 이민짜뜰또 많이 싸는 동네인뗴따까 찌하철 쫑찪엮이라 쫌 무써워요. 끄껀 꼬려하쎠야 할뜼!
It was very nice to meet Johnathan. He shared a lot of things with me.
Jonathan is such a great host. He makes you feel at home and provides some local tips. 100% recommended

Jonathan is a very Nice host. He gives some good advice were to go in terms of restaurants, bars and city highlights. The appartment is located next to a metro station. The appartment wasnt as organized as in the pictures, however still clean though. If you dont mind sharing the room with the owner, this is the place for you.
Local extremamente limpo,  metrô e ônibus proximos e sofá cama confortável.
O apartamento é muito bom! Fácil acesso ao metrô e com um ótimo custo benéfico. Sem dúvidas indico o lugar!
Jonathan turned out to be incredibly friendly and open minded guy. And free parking nearby was a huge plus for us guys traveling all the way from Amsterdam. We would highly recommend this apartment!
A stay that's accomodating between Paris and the airport.
The place was nice, easy access to metro station. Jonathan gave good tips about Paris.

Jonathan’s place was nice. He was welcoming and kind enough to tell extra tips about paris and help me. Also his place is large and has a balcony, close to bus station. But I recommend you to take the bus to get to home, not by walk cause it’s not that safe to walk to at night. Overall, if you want to stay at paris at amazingly cheap price this is the place.
Jonathan was a very lovely host, his flat is nice and tidy - I really enjoyed my short stay!
Jonathan was very friendly and helpful. The place almost the same as my expectation. Only 5mins walk from tram station, very convenient!
I great place for spend night, Jonathan is a nice host.

Тихий квартал, рядом метро. Джонатан оказался очень гостеприимным человеком. Диван удобный. За такие деньги в центре Парижа просто невозможно найти жилье лучше. 
Спасибо, Джонатан!

Jonathan is a amazing guy. Me and my boyfriend loved him.
He was so gentle, gave us tips of places to go, how to come home after the subway closes, good talk. No complains at all.
His house is beautiful and clean. If we came back to Paris, I would definitely be here again.
Jonathan is very nice. He provided me some tipps about the trip in Paris. His appartment is comfortable.
The place is nice and really clean, the host is really friendly and if you need help he’s always there to help, he’s very laidback and likes get to know his guests, I recommend this place 100%.
Very attentive.  Your space is neat and organized.  Thank you Jonathan for a great stay.  I hope to return soon.

Great place to stay. The apartment is 5 minutes walk from the métro, and in neighbourhood with new buildings. There was no trouble walking from the métro even at night.
The apartment was as described and there was a partition between the sofa where I slept & Jonathan's private space, it was comfortable.
Es hat mir super gefallen!
Sehr freundlich
It's good place and nice people!

Jonathan was very friendly and inviting. When he say's it is a shared space in an apartment, that is quite literally what he means. It is a single room studio apartment so please bare that in mind when you are booking because you will be sleeping in the same room as Jonathan. It's not a problem at all, it just might come as a surprise otherwise!

Jonathan’s apartment was very clean, comfortable and a peaceful place to come to after arriving in Paris. He and his partner were very friendly and welcoming, offering me coffee and directing me to a lovely nearby cafe where I had dinner. On top of everything it was very affordable. Merci Jonathan!

If you’re trying to save money but still want to stay somewhere relatively central then this is a great option. The apartment is a 5 minute walk from the metro which takes you to the city centre. Jonathan was a great host and answered any questions I had quickly too. The apartment has everything you need and the “bed” is surprisingly comfortable too!
The place looked bigger in the pic., but it was very clean and secured.!  He is a very Good Host.!! I recommend him.!!!

I stayed 5 nights and it was very comfortable. Jonathan is very kind. He gave me a lot of information and conversation.I had wonderful days thanks to him.
The subway station is nearby and you can go to the Musee d'Orsay(Solferino station) and Concorde without a change.
I highly recommend this room:)
Een goed verblijf gehad, Jonathan is heel vriendelijk en behulpzaam.
Great modern place conveniently located close to cdg airport train line and with metro connections to the rest of the city. Jonathan is an excellent host and I enjoyed my stay in his apartment.

Great host. A good place to stay on a budget - close to the metro (end of the line) 
Basically it’s a couch in the kitchen area (but it works ok), with use of amenities.

The perfect place for spending a night. It's an open plan apartment, with a pull-out-couch with sheets, pillow and blankets. Towels are provided if you need any and the host has some great local tips!
I would definitely stay here again!! It is so easy to get in and out

John its a pretty cool guy. He hosted me with all the atention an information that i needed to meet Paris.

His apartment is very cosy. I felt like at home.

I really recomend.
Es muy bonito pero si es más reducido que en las fotos, la atención fue muy buena y muy buenos anfitriones!
Nice host! Lovely building and great food downstairs!!

O espaço é bem localizado e bem próximo do metrô. Em, no máximo, 40 minutos se chega aos principais pontos turísticos de Paris. O valor cobrado pelo anfitrião é justo e está de acordo. Todavia, caso haja 2 hóspede ou se trate de pessoa que deseje mais privacidade, talvez não se sinta muito à vontade. O Jonathan e o Patrick são muito acolhedores , prestativos e muito muito simpáticos. São pessoas adoráveis e de ótima convivência. Super recomendo o espaço, principalmente para quem está viajando sozinho, como foi o meu caso.

Jonathan is a really nice and friendly guy. He wasn't there himself when i arrived but he had managed everything easily so that i had no problems to get into the apartment. It was clean and warm, i already had gotten all details how things work and when he came back home he give me good suggestions where to go in Paris. So that i won't see only touristc attractions and get good deals for my money. The apartment is not far from the metro and when you arrive at CDG Airport it is really close from the apartment too. Thank you so much <3
Great place for the price!
Jonathon keeps a pretty busy day at the theater for work, but is still super responsive, and provided all I needed. Looking forward to the next visit.
localidade boa, muito solícito, simpático.

Jonathan y Patrick son personas cálidas, atentas y amables: son geniales, en todo sentido! El apartamento (con todos los servicios en perfecto estado) se encuentra a 3 minutos caminando, por tanto tienes conexión con toda París. Volvería sin pensarlo!
Jonathan and his partner were fantastic. Thanks!

El lugar tiene muy buena ubicación, es muy tranquilo la mayoria del tiempo y el acceso al transporte es muy fácil, sin problemas se puede llegar rapidamente a cualquier lugar de Paris, Jonathan es muy atento y cualquier duda te ayuda, muy recomendable.
It was a very nice stay in Johns place. He and his friend were very kindly and gave us many tips where to eat or drink. High recommended.
Perfect for a solo traveler looking for a place to crash! Jonathan was super nice!

Jonathon is super responsive. His place is close to the train, and there is a Franprix right when you come out of the train as well. You have everything you might need, and when I did have questions Jon answered them right away, and also sent some links to a few sites with places that he thought, (and were), of interest.

His place seems to get booked pretty quick and for good reason. It’s accurately listed with the photos, very well priced, and of course comfortable and fun. This is an perfect AirBNB for someone who really likes to travel, maybe has been around the area before, and wants to do something a little different but still only be a train away from the typical sightseeing stuff.

Wir waren sehr gerne bei Jonathan. Werde auf jeden Fall wieder buchen. Meine Hündin und ich waren sehr willkommen. Er hat sich sehr gut gekümmert. Mir viele Tipps gegeben. Ich durfte alles(Netflix ;-)) benutzen. Es gab auch interessante Gespräche.  Der Kaffee ist großartig! Bis bald....Nele und Tanja

Es un espacio compartido, si lo que necesitan es privacidad y descanso definitivamente este no es el lugar. Jon y su pareja son muy amables y buenas personas te ayudan y tienen muchísima comunicación.

Por las jornadas laborales de los anfitriones  despertaban muy temprano y para las personas con sueño ligero no es recomendable puesto que impide descansar.

Duermes en un sofá cama que diario debes poner. 

Dice que tiene desayuno incluido, pero no lo hubo.

El departamento sumamente desordenado.

El metro es cercano de la habitación y  el centro está a 46 minutos.

Jon y su novio muy amables.
perto do metro e facil chegar nos pontos turisticos.

Jonathan is a very helpful person and takes care of any problem you face. He is a considering person and a great Host. 
The accommodation was clean and easy to access. It is situated at 5 min walk from Front Populaire metro station and takes 15-20mins  to reach the city. Great price good location and fantastic hospitality. Would recommend him for sure if u want to Visit.

If you unexpectedly make great friends in an unknown city,what more do you want :) Jonathan & his fiance are one of the loveliest people I have ever met.  Location is great with plenty of restaurants just down the building. Easily accessible transport 2 min to bus & 6 min walking to metro. Jonathan makes you feel at home, takes care of your every need. I was offered a coffee every morning & I even had a chance to try the yummy homemade cake :)

Place is neat& clean with all facilities. I had an excellent joyful stay at his place and definitely recommend to everyone.
Excelente lugar para descansar. Transporte cercanos.

Jonathan was just EXCELLENT. Beginning with the uncomplicated communicated and check-in, a real customer centricity during the stay with excellent recommendations for Paris and finally a very, very intelligent guy :-)

I really liked to stay there and can just give 5 stars.

EXZELLENT!

Jonathan was a great person, and his place was as listed. However, you are like roommates, not flat mates, roommates. And I reminder now why I moved out of the dorms after one semester. The last two nights I stayed there his fiancé also stayed there, so it was more awkward at night then it already was going to be because the futon is four feet from the foot of their bed. The second night I was there they were up cooking until 2am. And every night they would fall asleep with their light on, so I had to get out of bed to turn it off in order to finally sleep. Granted it is a very low priced Airbnb, so it’s either deal with little things like this, or pay $150 a night in the city, which is also stated in the description. On my backpacking trip I appreciate the place to sleep and a shower for so little money, but it was just really awkward.
Jonathan is really warm-hearted and offer nice suggestions, we had a good journey.
Excellent host! Very understanding and easy to communicate with. Highly recommend.
Great place, near subway station, 20 minutes from the center of Paris. Jonathan is a good host!
Great hospitality. Wonderful place
Very nice and cosy place to stay for a short trip. Very close to metro station, easy to access and the host was very welcoming and interesting person.

숙소는 넓고 되게 좋았어요 위치도 교통편과 멀지 않고 가까워서 되게 좋았구요
이줴 한꾹인듈먄 얄야뵬슈닜께 후귀 냠귈꿰효 냠쟈틴규량 걑이 갸서 울이 듈먄 쑤눈쥴 얄얐뉸대 죠냐댠꺄쥐 솃히 갸티 쎠효ㅜ 컾흘은 븨츄입내뎌 지쨔료ㅠ 먈됴 별류엾규 섕갹뵤댜 뷸푠해써효
Espaço legal. Perto do metro. Anfitrião atencioso.
Excelente persona y anfitrión. Jonathan se esforzó por hablarnos en Español y darnos buenas recomendaciones de donde comer, que lugares visitar y como transportarnos.
Nice host! ☺️

we enjoyed Jonathan place ... he is very supportive kind of... as well stay connected to walking metro station.... I highly recommend this (Website hidden by Airbnb) well thank for being a great host...

Very good & attentive host. Helped answer any questions I had. Jonathan had the place ready and set up even for my last minute booking when a previous host cancelled unexpectedly.The location is close to the train and not far from Paris.
Average place to stay, Cool location but cleaning was an issue, I had good 2 nights and 3 days stay, value for money
Muy amable y muy bien ubicado
lugar excelente para personas que van de pasó o quisieran dejar sus maletas y explorar París todo el día. no es un hotel, es un espacio compartido. muy amable

This booking was in the first place intended as a test to see whether airbnb had accepted my ID.
Since the booking was accepted I figured it was ok. Alas, it seems that certain bookings are accepted without ID. Anyway I was still going to stay at the address until I found out that check in was only after 8 pm and the room was shared. My bad, I should have read more careful, but that was the reason I didn’t stay there eventually.
This place would be value for your money, though it is located a bit far from the city, the place is near to metro 12 and about 15 min from the metro line red b

Jonathan is very friendly and the accomadation was as described, which is great for such a cheap price.
this is recomendable for people who would normally book a bed in a dorm/hostel.
very close to the trams

Jonathan is a really friendly guy and knows a ton about Paris. He engages with his guests and helps them navigate the city.

However... he was super late to checking us in. I’m not sure if that’s a regular thing, but it did cause a huge inconvenience. Additionally, if you have back problems like me, his couch may not be the best. It’s a little hard and small.
Basic Comfort, 5 Min. walk to Metro, Restaurant and Shops.

we particularly like how closely jonathan's apartment is situated to the metro, which makes it very convenient for travelling around paris. one thing we appreciated about jonathan is that he was very easygoing and respectful of our privacy. he generally kept to himself but was eager to share with us tips and recommendations on food and places to check out in paris when the opportunity arose.
I’m from Miami and I have such a good time l come back again and thank you Jonathan
Nice guy, good host, and very good tips!
Nice
A nice place for a quick, cheap stay
Todo muy bien, una persona amable y agradable, el departamento es cómodo y el precio muy bueno.

The location is nowhere near the Eiffel tower, it is actually 30 minutes away by train! The place was rather dirty, and couch was uncomfortable. The Pillows were about 2cm thick and definitely needed a wash; we did not even receive pillowcases for them. The fridge smelled awful, there was barely any light in the bathroom, and the washer smelled like mouldy laundry. Not worth the cost whatsoever. Many of the amenities were either lacking in quality or missing completely (no TV, computer, clean towels).

A great value for Paris! Johnathan will give you your personal space if you need it. Ask him for tips on places to explore and eat and he will willingly share it with you. All the best for your TV show and your shorts!
Had a pleasant stay at Jonathan's place. A bit far from the city, but the apartment was impeccably maintained and offered a nice view from the balcony.
Jonathan is really friendly, he even arranged his working schedule to let us check in earlier than normal time. His place is really nice, I love the view from his room so much :<

Jonathan was a great host and he was incredibly understanding regarding my late arrival :) Although we did not cross paths often, each time he was very helpful and kind! 

His place is a quick walk to the metro so it is easy to get around!
Jonathan was the man who helped me through the early stages of my arrival in Paris. Good value. Once sorted , transportation was easy and close.
Jonathan is a welcoming and friendly host who was able to offer us a variety of insights into Paris and the local area. His place is best for one night, thanks for a memorable stay.
they are very quiet. I recommend it

I enjoyed my time at jonathan's place! It's a cosy place with a comfortable sleeping sofa in the living room and a nice view from the balcony. Next metro (best line for sightseeing stops, Nr.12) is 5min away, heaps of restaurants and cafe's nearby, WiFi in the flat and an elevator to 6th floor. Jonathan has good information about "secret local places" throughout the area and city! Definitely recommended!

De kamer was niet opgeruimd. De vaat stond nog op het aanrecht. Op de WC mankeert de bril. Er wordt gerookt. He sofabed is te klein voor twee mannen van 1 meter 85. Dat zijn de minpunten en die wegen niet op tegen de locatie, de rustige omgeving en de aardige verhuurder. In Nederland hebben we hier een spreekwoord voor : Met de franse slag.
Jonathan was very attentive, kind and had very good tips to go around the city
a cozy place to live
This place is pretty nice. Close to the metro and the bed does the job well.
Good , clean place about 10 min walk from metro station and 2 minutes away from bus stop
Good host and location, but should be cleaner.

Jonathan place is very very neat and in a quiet enviroment.A good place to put you head down,particularly if you are on a day visit to Paris.Easy to get to the apartment from Gare Du Nord with just a few changeovers.
Jonathan is a fantastic host,friendly and we even had a chat before we retired to sleep.....he even offered a cup of tea and french croissant in the morning !!!!
Would really really recommend,and will surely book again next time I visit Paris.
Jonathan é muito atencioso e prestativo. Ele aceitou que levasse meu cachorro e ajudou dando até uns tecidos para ele dormir em cima.

Good place.
One bed only though
Jonathan é uma pessoa muito gentil, simpático, atencioso sempre disposto a ajudar. Me deu dicas ótimas sobre França, Paris e Saint-Denis.

Nice place clean environment,  comfitable, Jonathan, kool guy, helpful, a good person to be in a flat shear with; no problems at this stay, anytime I go back too Paris hopefully here I'll be staying again, bless.
Everything was great, he's a very nice host. Very friendly.
Is convenient! There is a bank, a grocery store and it only takes 6mins to walk there!
Very nice guy, sociable and willing to help you out!

Muchas gracias por el hospedaje, Jhoanatan. Ha sido muy atento en todo momento y ha estado pendiente de responder de inmediato. Excelente para personas como yo que estuve en París una noche por una interconexión. Muy recomendable si viajas de paso y solo.

Jonathan was really kind with me! We shared music, nice conversation and he offered some details and tips about Paris. He is like an open mind person, I came home very late after a party and he didn’t get upset even. He answered every time his phone and was always available for everything. Was really generous by saying that I could feel like home and it felts like because her home is too comfortable. Doesn’t even look like a man’s department. Everything was cleaned and organized, loved the way that everything worked in an ecologist pattern. 
Thank you so much for being such a good partner Jon! Hope to see you next time!
Good enough for one night ! :)

Great for visiting Paris on a budget, but not the best neighborhood and a bit farther away from the tourist attractions. There was also some difficulties in communication and planning. I had to get the key from his workplace first which I didn't realize at first. Also I had asked to leave my luggage for a few hours after check-out and he said it was fine, but on the day of, the next guest showed up and got the key, so I had to figure out where to go with all my luggage on the spot without any warning. It would be great to know all of this details in advance, solidified. Overall though Jonathan was such a friendly and great host. He was very chill and said to treat his place like home. He even showed me around the set where he was working for a tv show, as a nice local touch.

Look Johnathan is nice, but he’s very busy with his acting life. 
The sofa bed was tiny and barely fits two people. It was pretty dirty with weird stains.
The kitchen was a mess; dishes left unclean.
There was no toilet seat, but he was getting it “fixed.”
The place reeked of cigarettes.
Area pretty sketchy at night, but most of Paris is.
I felt like he wanted to be our friends first, before treating us like guests. 
His political ideology is definitely Leftist; it didn’t matter to me, but just in case you wanna know.

Jon’s place is wonderful, except for the fact that his apartment is about 30 minutes away from the city centre by train, everything was superb. Walking distance from his apartment to the metro.Local Supermarkets around the vicinity. Adoring touches in little corners of his house which gives it character. Everything was excellent, and if he could do a little organization to his kitchen, it would then be parfait!
Thank you very much for your flexibility

I had a great experience at Jonathan’s place; minutes away from the train station, nice restaurant/bar next door, and affordable compared to other places in/near Paris.  Also, Johnathan has great recommendations for travel and his communication through the app is efficient.

El lugar muy bonito y tal como en las fotos, todo muy cómodo,
Jhonatan excelente anfitrión. :)

Jon is very welcoming and hospitable! Was willing to give me advice for the local area. The metro (line 12) is ~5-6 minutes of walking distance. If you need to go to South Paris, it could get a bit far. However, good value for the money!

Jonathan은 완벽한 호스트였어요. 그는 친절하고 저를 세심하게 배려해줬어요. 그의 집은 버스정류장이나 지하철과 가까웠고(걸어서 5분 정도) 주변에는 바, 식당 그리고 마트 등 편의시설이 잘 갖춰져 있었어요. 저는 그의 집 앞에 있는 케밥집을 추천해요!! 그곳은 싸고 양이 많고 맛있거든요!! 그의 집은 넓고 편했어요. 그곳은 분명 당신에게도 멋있는 곳이 될거예요!! (여귀꽈지는 외쿡인을 위한 퓌드붹이에효) 한쿡솨람둘에궤, 줘는 솨실 조놔돤과 봥을 가치 쓰눈지 몰뢌어효 구래서 솰짝 땅황해쏘요 화지만 그는 분명 좋은 사람이었어요 구래숴 전효 문줴될궤 없엇어효 군데 환가쥐 궁구만 궤 이쏘효..웨 욕쓀에는 변귀 뚜꿩이 업눈 궐까효, 유뤕은 원뤠 그뤈가효?욕쓀 쿼툰은 웨 없쑬까효 쌀짝 불푠횄쥐만 조나단은 이궐 어똫게 쑬꽈 걱줭쓰뤄워써효 Aㅏ 구리구 구는 솰짝 뫊이 봐뿐 솨람이에횹 구래숴 췌쿠인은 돼도뤅 아췸에 하세효 그가 언줴 돌아홀지 뭐르궈든효 쉐벽헤 올 쑤 도 이써효 주위하세효!! :) 저는 이 공간을 적극 추천합니다 아래에 호슽으가 열한쉬에 왔다눈 댓글은 아췸에 췌크인을 한돠면 문줴 될 게 없쑬거롸고 쉥곽해효 다음에 파리를 방문한다면 저는 무조건 다시 이곳에 갈겁니다!!
Great place for stay, Jonathan is nice and helpful!

A gentleman who respect your space! He will tell you the tips on where to go and how to get there. Definitely value for money if you are looking for a simple place to offer shelter while you explore Paris.

The flat is very small, hope it will be better cleaned for the next guests. Jonathan was great in communicating with us and providing us with all the necessary information - WiFi, how to get there etc.

Jonathan is a very good host, his place to stay is great and has a great view of the city, and helped me everytime I needed, a little bit far from Paris, but if you don't mind taking the Tram/subway it's a great place to be!.
Really enjoyed myself at his place. Friendly host and stylish place and honestly you can walk to every single place from his home. I would stay there again anytime .

Great Host! Very accommodating. There is a delicious Turkish restaurant across the street if you're hungry as well. The metro is an easy 5 minute or less walk from the apartment and there is a Tram nearby as well. Would definitely recommend a stay here to anyone! :)

Flight changed by a few hours, so I booked a train a day later and extended my segment in France. I was glad to have been able to book an extra day here with Jonathan. Felt right at home. Maison moderne et métro et un franprix à proximité. Très bien! He was easy to get a hold of if you have any questions about his flat during your stay.

Jonathan is very friendly, made sure everything was well and answered questions very quickly even out during the day. Place exactly as described. Nice building that’s also well secured. Great place. Excellent value, easy access RER/Metro.
Jonathan was an amazing host and extremely helpful in regards to the diverse things that Paris has to offer, in regards to local and touristy. I recommend
He is nice & super host.
Had a great time in Paris! Jonathan was very helpful and friendly. I absolutely recommend this place to stay. Thank you! :)
Jonathan was a great host. His place is pretty close to the metro and he offered a lot of great places to visit.

Jonathan súper atento, utilice el alojamiento por una noche. Sin embargo no había toallas limpias, y la ducha no tiene cortina. Por lo demás el lugar bonito. Y la comunicación con Jonathan fue guida y rápida
RECOMIENDO ESTE ESPACIO, FUE INCREÍBLE COMPARTIR CON JONATHAN

Jonathan always helped me. He also told me a lot of local informations.
I was able to spend time to relaxing and comfortable. He is funny and very helpful. I really appreciate. Thank you Jonathan :)
Super !!

他的房子,交通很方便(不过在巴黎去哪都方便)Jonathan是个不错的房东,仔细的教我出行路线

他家有个小阳台,望出去的风景很不错
公寓安全性也挺好的

而且价格适中,是个不错的选择
We appreciate that Jonathan receive us very late because our delays. He was very friendly and helpful to visit Paris. His place is good if you like shared spaces.
Lovely host. Safe neighborhood. Location is quite near the tourist attractions (approx 20-40 minutes via metro).
Jonathan is a very amazing host. He was always available when I had questions and gave me many great tips for exploring Paris. I would definitely stay with Jonathan again!

Initially, I was a bit worried about the thought of being a solo female traveller staying with a guy that she'd never met before, but after reading the reviews from other solo travellers I decided to give it a go, and I didn't regret it.
Jonathan is one of the nicest, friendliest people I've ever met. He was always willing to answer questions and provided suggestions about where to eat and places to visit. 
Getting to his place itself was relatively easy and is luckily located a short walk away from a metro station. The area is safe and I had no issues walking through there at night.
If I ever get the chance to visit Paris again, I'd definitely consider staying with Jonathan again, and you should, too!
Thank you, Jonathan i had a good sleep on your sofa. Checked in late evening, check out early morning. The place is far from Paris centre, but close to CDG airoport
Jonathan is an easy going person and very helpful. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Jonathan's place for a great stay in Paris!
Nice and clean. Close to the metro station. Great environment.

Мы не жили с Джонатаном. Поэтому я ничего не могу сказать о квартире.Но я могу рассказать вам о Джонатане.

Предыстория.
Мы забронировали его квартиру на неделю. Но за день до прибытия мы увидели, что совершили ошибку при бронировании. Поскольку мы не заметили, что он предлагает сожительство, а не полную квартиру.

История.
Мы попросили его вернуть 50%. Так как понимали что ошибка наша и мы готовы за неё заплатит. Он согласился, так как был популярный сезон, и было легко найти новых гостей (даже по более высокой цене) 

Пока он нам долго отвечал, прошло ещё время. Но так как ошибка наша, мы взяли расходы на себя и попросили вернуть хотя бы 40%. Он сказал отменяйте бронирование. 

И после того как мы отменили броинрование, Джонатан резкл передумал и сказал, что ничего не будет возвращать.

Мы не получали деньги назад, а Джонатан снова выставил свою квартиру в аренду. 

Может быть, он хороший человек. Но нас он обманул. В оправдание написал много слов, хотя раньше молчал и ничего такого не говорил. 

Поэтому я бы с таким человеком точно бы не жил. Который улыбается когда всё хорошо, а как только проблема, он ведёт себя не честно.

Jonathan was a great host. He was friendly and very helpful throughout my stay. The apartment is well located to get to the centre of the city and it has everything you need plus a lovely balcony. Thanks for everything!

El piso de Jonathan es tal cual se ve en las fotos, tipo estudio con un baño. Jonathan duerme en la cama mientras el huésped tiene el sofá cama. Recomiendo esta estancia para viajero solo o pareja que quiera reducir gastos y no estar tan lejos de París. El Stad de France está a 25 minutos caminando, el tren RER a 15 y el metro línea 12 a 5 min, con lo cual puedes conectar con el centro rápidamente. Repito, si la idea del viajero es solo llegar a dormir recomiendo esta estancia, si el plan es quedarse un rato, preferible que busquen otra estadía
Jonathan's place was great. It was clean, it has nice balcony, it has everything you need. It takes about 6-7 minutes walk to metro. And the price is very good for such conditions․
Jonathan is an excellent host. He have a great sense of hospitality and communication. The place is an great location very near to the metro station.
His place is awesome.. everything is nice there.
Clear, quick, and mostly painless. Would easily book again.

Tot i que la casa es un estudi, tal i com s'especifica a l'anunci, no trobes a faltar espai. Val a dir que el Jonathan ha estat un amfitrió excel·lent. Ens ha acollit molt bé i ens oferia tot allò que necessitavem, tambe ha estat molt flexiblr amb els horaris d'arribada i sortida. El sofà-llit és molt més còmode del que sembla.
Didn't have chance to visit cuz i changed my plan very late.
I stayed at Jonathans just for one night, but I came to his place v early morning as my plane landed around 7 am
Good host and good apartment
This place is really nice and well maintained. The apartment is quite central to a lot of restaurants and shops. Parking is readily available

Jonathan is a lovely host. He makes sure that you are comfortable and feel like at home. He does live a busy lifestyle but if you need his help he is happy to be there for you. 
The studio is really nice. I recommend it for people that actually want to go out and do stuff in Paris as it is really close to public transport.

Jonathan was awesome. I booked quickly and did not realize this is a one bedroom apartment so I had my daughter and myself staying there with Jonathan in the same room. What could have been very awkward for us (and it was completely my fault for rushing through the booking) was perfect because he was nice enough to stay with a friend the two nights we were in town. Very nice guy. You're going to enjoy his company. Interesting career and good man. Would stay with again.

Rude host, was not considerate enough, as I had issues with codes as all was in French and I don't know French, the neighbours who showed the address were better, the airbnb shows diff bldg number and the host gave a diff  one, not recommended.

John is a great dude!!  Had a good time staying at his place!!  He is a very chill guy!  The area is not bad at all, fairly quite!  The train station to go into city is very short distance away!  For sure would recommend him!

Jonathan made me feel super welcome and not intruding, which, sharing a space, is wonderful.
I loved the neighborhood, the apartment and the balcony, 
I highly recommend it :)
Jonathan is a very friendly person. My stay was very good. I would definitely ask him again, if I need a place to stay in Paris!
The apartment is located in a good area and with access to the metro. Jonathan was attentive all the time and gave me tips for moving around the city.
Great place and 5 minute walk to the train!

Jonathan has been a really helpful and welcoming host and his place is really nice. The location is great because his appartment is really close to the metro line 12 which takes you to the city centre and to other amenities. It is also a friendly and quiet neighbourhood. Jonathan is a really warm host and helped me feel at home since the first moment. Although I checked in quite late he was very flexible and waited for me and we had a quick chat in his lovely balcony. He is a really interesting guy who enjoys sharing his place with others. Although I didn't see him a lot I truly enjoyed staying at his place and I highly recommend it to anyone visiting Paris!

Jonathan es una persona increíble, super atento, relajado y sin dramas, el departamento es hermoso el sillon  cama super cómodo, la terracita que tiene es lo más,  su departamento esta a las afueras de Paris pero de muy fácil acceso por el metro que en solo 10 minutos estas en cualquier punto de, ba Paris, barrio seguro con mucha gente transitando durante todo el día. supermercados y restaurantes cercanos. Les recomiendo.

It was great staying with Jonathan.  We only stayed one night, and when we arrived we were exhausted, so all we wanted to do was rest for a while.  While the initial contact was a bit rough, he gave us plenty of space to relax and recharge. The accommodations were exactly as described. Overall very pleasant! The only other thing was the pictures made the place seem bigger than it was (but that's not really anyone's fault).
The landmark view from the balcony is amazing. Lots of sun. Get to have the whole place to yourself because Jonathan is not there most of the time.  He is a cool guy.
It was ok

Jonathan is such a great host! He went out of his way to make me feel at home. He gave me recommendations on what to do, adapted his sleep schedule to mine, and gave me a unique perspective on French politics. Very friendly guy, could not recommend him more highly! His decor is great, bed comfortable, and amenities very clean. Location isn't the best ever, but his place is right down the street from the 12-line Metro so it didn't bother me at all! 5/5.
Ok, just need to improve on the cleaning and organization of the place

Ein tolles und gemütliches Apartment, ausgestattet mit allem was man braucht.  Nah ab der Metro gelegen., darum auch schnell im Zentrum. 

Gastgeber ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. War ein tolles Wochenende. Vielen Dank  . Immer wieder gern.
A good place to stay, but little far from the city.

Jonathan was very nice. He was very communicative and gave me great tips on things to do around the city. The apartment building was very safe & the bed was comfortable. I think he may not have been expecting me the day I arrived as I had to go pick up the keys at his job, but he was very thankful for it. I did expect the sofa bed to be cleaner, but as I said, I just think I caught him on an off day as his reviews don't reflect my experience. All in all, he's a respectful and nice guy.
The place is very nice, clean and close to the metro station which enables you to move practically anywhere in Paris.

There was a little misunderstanding about check in, but we could resolve the problem quickly. It was a short visit so I did not have much interaction with Jonathan, but he was certainly helpful. The apartment is pretty unique.
This place was great for getting acclimated to the time change. Close to the metro, and a cheap delicious dinner across the street.

Jonathan was very nice, had an extra key to give me and was very considerate when I was trying to sleep. There was a minor miscommunication while trying to check in, but overall its a great place to stay!

Jonathan is very friendly and he will make sure you are comfortable at his place and you can take his guidance to visit places around.
Thanks Jonathan, I would defenately come and stay your place if I get a chance.

Thanks
Very nice stay!
I had a really comfortable stay. Jonathan was kind and helpful. Recommended!
Nice and welcoming host, however very bad communication upon arrival on check-in date made us book hotel room with additional charges.

Jonathan's flat was perfect for my needs. He had a clean towel for me and the sofa bed was nice and comfortable. There are several places to eat within walking distance from the apartment. When I met him to get the key, he was very nice and welcoming. He remained very helpful and communicative throughout my stay and was quick to answer all of my questions. Thanks again, Jonathan!

Jonathan is a kind guy. I have to go to his working place to get the key, not so difficult to find , but because of my fault I cost soooooo long time to find the house . other things.. Not bad , I don't use so much things.

Booked on very short notice but Jonathan was still very accommodating and friendly. The space is a pretty good sized studio apartment, with a large bathroom. The actual building feels quite secure, you have to go through three electronic locks to get up to the front door of his place.

The RER is a bit of a walk, about 1.5 km away but the subway is about half that distance, and about 30 minutes takes you directly into the heart of Paris.

All in all the space fit my needs for the night and Jonathan was a good host.
Great place if you are looking to just pass the night. The apartment is very to the subway, and Jonathan  is a very nice person.

항쿡쏴람들 가쥐마쎄용
호슽이 밤 여란쉬봔에 와서 그떼 드러가써용
친절하고 말걸어주고 여러정보를 알려주어서 좋았음
Жильё соответствует описанию. Район новый, тихий, до метро 5 мин пешком, есть Ашан и кафе. В непосредственной близости Монмартр, что очень приятно. Хозяин отзывчивый, было приятно пообщаться.

A great place to stay! VERY comfortable, warm, and clean, and Jonathan was a wonderful and accomodating host. He was especially cool about my weird schedule (working late into the night, napping it off in the afternoon), given that we were in such close quarters. Wasn't expecting a set of keys, and was SO happy to have them. Highly recommend!

Tuvimos que ir a donde trabajaba él a por las llaves. El alojamiento estaba bien, pero no estaba muy limpio. Cuando llegamos las sábanas se estaban secando y seguían un poco mojadas así que las tuvimos que secar con nuestra secadora. La ducha no tenía cortina y no encontramos toallas ni papel de baño. La fregadera estaba atascada. Simplemente creo que Jonathan no tuvo mucho tiempo para dejar preparada la habitación para cuando llegáramos. A pesar de todo, un sitio recomendable y Jonathan fue muy simpático.

Jonathan is a great host, very helpful and communicative. The apartment was clean and comfortable. I just crashed at Jonathan's for one night so I don't have a lot more to say except it was a very nice stay and I would totally recommend :)
部屋は大きくて綺麗で､ﾎｽﾄも良い人です｡ただ､ﾎｽﾄと一緒に同じ部屋で過ごすことになるので､迷惑をかけないようにと気をつけていたのでﾘﾗｯｸｽはできませんでした｡あと､中心地からは意外と遠いです

The place is well decorated in modern style, nice and comfy. The place has everything you need for short staying. There was no towel though. Also, Jonathan is very nice and friendly. He's trying to help me traveling around Paris, suggesting good tips to visit and to do. I like the fact that he told me to walk and to watch Paris which i took it and it was very nice. Thank you so much
Not much to say, only stayed one night, worth the value. Flat was clean, nice little terrace to smoke, and sofa bed was comfy.
It was great thank you
Nice place
Jonathan is a great host and does a great job communicating with you and allowing you to come and go as your plans require. A great guide to the surroundings and area as well.
He was really nice and generous. We had great time :) He even suggested us some great exhibition.

Jonathan is a good-hearted host who has treated me with great kindness. He is genuine in wanting to know you better, and loves to share about his very interesting career too. He has made every effort to make my stay a pleasant one. Though there were some hiccups with his "co-host" occupant, who has since ceased her stay with us during my last night there, as well as the second key arrangements (I had to find him at his workplace after a long day exploring the city to obtain the keys to return to his apartment), he did his best to take care of me when I had my wallet stolen by pickpockets on the metro, and had no euros on me to cover my remaining expenses in the city. He arranged for his friend to hand me the keys and buy me a return ticket home. The next morning, he prepared breakfast and even packed lunch to make sure I would not go hungry on my long bus journey home. Jonathan is one of the few locals you will meet in Paris that is honest, hospitable, and principled, which I admire very much about him. Though the pickpocketing ordeal has tainted my Paris experience, the stay with Jonathan was one I did not regret. I highly recommend him as a host as it is excellent value for your buck. You gain a great night's sleep, lovely apartment to return to after a long day, and a host who is more like a friend :-) P.S. the sofa bed was so comfortable, I already miss it after three nights!
I didn't end up at his house for the night so I don't have much else to say. He did respond to my messages.

Lodged in Jonathan's shared studio for 7 nights, it was an easy fuss free stay throughout. He's not a picky one that will pick on small issues, and you get to cook anytime you feel like.. the area is pretty safe as well with convenience stores and supermarkets just minutes away. The view from his balcony is certainly amazing in the night. Had a great chat with him about his future acts and theatre plays. Here's wishing you good luck in your career! You'll make it one day! ;)
Jonathan was without fault, an excellent host.
No me pude quedar por razones personales y porque la zona es peligrosa, saludos!

Apartmant is very nice and pretty close to metro station where you can take metro to centrum. John is also very pleasant to his guests and it was good experience to get to know about his career. It's also close to Stade de France (for those who love football :-)).
Nice place to stay for a few days, John is interesting and cool person.

I've been to France for the first time and I had the opportunity to stay in Jonathan's house and it was a very good experience. He was really attentive with me and we had a very good time speaking about many things. The apartment is well located near a metro station and it's easy to find. I do really recommend Jonathan's house for everyone.
Staying at Jonathan's was a great experience, he is very welcoming and friendly - and speaks good English. My favorite airbnb stay so far. The metro was super close!

Had a 2 countries, 4 cities tour and of the 4places I've been to Jonathan's place turned out to be THE BEST! It was so easy to find transport with the subway a mere 170m away from his place. Had a great selection of restaurants around the area which was a clean and quite neighbourhood I must add! But more than anything, he was such a gracious and welcoming host.

It was my first time over to Europe and it was a really great expirence staying with jonathon in his studio. Really close to the metro which is always good. Wifi is awesome as well. He was really nice, offered his things to me and made a great overal impression on me. We talked a bit when we were both at the Airbnb and I'm glad I got to know him. The sofa is comfy as well. Helped me get around Paris and told me where to get on and get off. Thanks again!
It was nice. Recommend for those traveling on a budget.
Great host! Communication was excellent, the space was just as advertised. I can recommend!!
The apartment was really nice and Jonathan helped me with whatever I needed :)
Jonathan is a fine host. It was an interesting experience sharing his appartment.

Jonathan no nos dio llaves del departamento. Nos pidio que le enviemos mensajes un tiempo antes de volver al departamento para que el pudiera estar y abrirnos la puerta, pero nuestra conexion wifi no funcionaba. Esto nos quitó autonomía a la hora de movernos en la ciudad ya que teníamos que coordinar um horario de vuelta al departamento, con lo cual dependíanos de el y sus planes.
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Thank you Jon for your hospitality.  

The description is very accurate. Jon was very friendly. You don't get your own place but the price is more than reasonable. the place is a great value and the balcony is perfect.  

I would highly recommend.
Jonathan was a little busy this period but nonetheless very warm and welcoming. We managed to chat a little bit about his work and things to do about Paris :)

Nice decent, peaceful neighborhood. Walking distance from the Metro Station, able to get into city centre within 20 mins. Jon was a good host, great flat mate, welcoming. However privacy may be an issue due to the shared apartment concept (no rooms). Good stay nonetheless
Jonathan is very friendly, he leaves the guest at ease.
Great host. Easy for a few night trip to Paris. He was accommodating to our comings and goings throughout the day.

Jonathan is kind and gentle host. Even  though his house is a little bit hard to find, but still fine. Nice interior, view of the terrace, and time having a cup of tea with him makes you happy. Thanks again, Jonathan. It was nice time!
His house is very nice:)

Супер! Всем советую, добрый отзывчивый, приятный человек. Ехал один , так было с кем поговорить вечером! Близко с метро, хороший район.  

Everything was at the highest level, a great man! I advise everyone! Everything was at the highest level, a great man! I advise everyone!

Jonathan was a great host. We arrived at his appartment past midnight but we still received a very warm welcome. His appartment is in a very good shape and was perfect for a night. He even showed us around St Denis at night and was generally a very open minded and interesting person! Highly recommendable

A perfect place to stay one or more nights in Paris. 
Jonathan was very helpful and friendly. Metro station one street further. To stay with Jonathan is to recommend in any case. Thank you.

Jonathan is very kind and helpful host. It is quite easy to get to the apartment from the airport on transit. RER stations are only 10-15 minute walk. I only stayed one night and arrived late in the day so hard to provide in depth review, but certainly no complaints.

I had a very fun time at his house!
And his house is clean, he is so kind and friendly to me I was able to spend a very comfortable time. 

I am very grateful for this amazing encounter.
Thank you Jonathan!

Host made me feel very welcome, although you don't get your own set of keys, they are very flexible and often lend you their keys if you are coming later/earlier. They are always making sure you are as comfortable as possible. Metro makes montmartre easily accessible, as well as downtown core.
Jonathan was a great host!
Despite it's a little strange to share apartment with 3 people, Jonathan is super kind and friendly, you'll feel comfortable with that.
We had a good time in Paris. Jonathan was a great host and the dinner he cooked was very good. Next time we will come again.

We arrived in Paris around 8:30 and had to find our way to his studio. Once we arrived in his neighborhood it was a bit difficult to find the exact door but with his help, we found our way. He is extremely helpful and courteous. Took me out to get food late at night and we had great conversation.

Jonathan's place was awesome! It was very clean and organized. I had a lovely time staying with him for the 3 days I was there. He was always very helpful and even shared some of his food with me. Would most definitely stay with him again.

Jonathan was a very friendly host, and it was a lovely place to stay. Conveniently situated near a metro stop and a supermarket, we were able to make the most out of our short stay in Paris and had a great time!
剛去的一個禮拜還不錯,等到另一個女室友回來,就沒那麼開心了,她好像忘了我有付錢,不應該是不好的態度
Everything is exactly as it was described. Jonathan is a great host and you can have a lot of fun with him. The feeling is equal to having and apartment with a roommate there.

it was amazing to know person like Jonathan and to join him in his tidy room , i felt comfortable and welcomed like home , every thing possible with him (cooking , guesting some one and coming late ans so and ) i would like to repeat my booking and hope see him again
Jonathan was a really hospitable host. Easy to talk to and great for telling me about parisien things. He keeps the apartment tidy and the sofa bed is actually pretty comfortable

The better question is what didn't I love? Jonathan is in the customer service/people pleasing business. Jonathan has an amazing personality and is an amazing host. His place is very chic, has really cool modern features and has a terrace that allows you to see the eiffel tower. I was visiting Paris for the first time alone and Jonathan took time out of his busy schedule to walk over 10 miles with me as my personal tour guide around Paris. I had a mishap with my continuing plane ticket and last minute Jonathan allowed me to stay at his place. When I couldn't stay any longer because it was already pre-booked before my ticket incident, Jonathan phoned a friend of his, another Airbnb host to take me in last minute. He allowed me to do my laundry there and assisted me in trying to find a way home. He went as far as requesting a heetch driver to come pick me up upon my departure. This is a economically convinent stay at a posh pad with the most outstanding host.
pas de commentaire

Chambre superbe  pour passer une magnifique soirée . Jacuzzi exceptionnel avec led et Bluetooth. Franchement rien a dire je reviendrais c’est sur . Et un grand merci à Laurent qui très réactive . Il est venu à 23h car on arriver pas à régler le jacuzzi encore merci . Je recommande a 100%
Magnifique je recommande fortement. Accueil nickel. Famille super cool
Une excellente expérience de détente

Super endroit, les hôtes sont très accueillants, la chambre est moderne et décorée avec goût. Le jacuzzi est un vrai bonus et le prix est très attractif 
En un seul mot : Foncez !!!
Vous ne serez pas déçu

Nous n’avons pas vraiment pu profiter du jacuzzi parce que l’hôte était injoignable et le jacuzzi ducoup trop froid. De plus on était dans un garage aménagé donc on entendait chaque pas des propriétaires et il faisait froid sauf dans la chambre. Sinon c’était chaleureux et on a tout de même passer un bon séjour.

Superbe logement! L'endroit est très cosy et charmant comme tout. Nous avons passé une merveilleuse soirée. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour passer un bon moment et se détendre. Ce lieu est très bien équipé, il y a de quoi cuisiner, se laver et même prendre un petit café. Le jacuzzi est fantastique.
 L'hôte a eu gentillesse de nous prévoir sa place de parking, il est réactif et très aimable.
On peut entendre un peu de bruits vis à vis de la maison du haut et l'image de la télé a eu du mal à se régler correctement mais à part tout ça c'était génial! Ce n'est qu'un petit détail. Je vous recommande fortement ce lieu, vous ne serez pas déçu!

Appartement Super Cosy , encore mieux que sur les photos , on s’y sent bien , merci à Laurent et sa femme pour leurs hospitalités et réactivités. Petite  touche de décoration pour anniversaire surprise qui a fait son effet  .  Nous y reviendrons sans hésitation. Merci encore à vous .
Beaucoup mieux , de ce que j’attendais !
Laurent et sa femme ont été très accueillants et réactifs tout au long du séjour. Je recommande
Superbe, oui jaccuzzi, oui jardin, oui petit nid d'amour ;)
Allez y les yeux fermés, Laurent met à l’aise et très accueillant. C’est mille fois mieux que sur les photos. La deco est exceptionnelle

Très bon séjour chez Laurent, je recommande vivement. Laurent et sa femme sont des hôtes de qualité et bienveillants. Accueil au top, logement bien supérieur à mes attentes ! Et petite attention de leur part pour l'occasion. Que demander de plus ? Merci à vous
Super logement ! Super accueil ! Hôte généreux

Chez Laurent un accueil chaleureux et une gentillesse incroyable plein de sourire et de vivacité. 
Il s’ait te mettre à l’aise et rajouter des détails pour ce dont tu es venue (anniversaire) 
Profitez d’un bon moment avec un jacuzzi chaud à souhait et d’autres accessoire de détente. 
Merci Laurent
Super Accueil de Laurent. Très agréable. Beaucoup mieux qu'en photo. Moment d'évasion garanti. Nous reviondrons.
Très belle soirée pleine de charme dans le jacuzzi.
Laurent a ete tres accueillant ns avons passe un tres bon moment
Bonne espace pour ce détendre le jaccuzi est super
Un séjour agréable avec le jaccuzzi et une chambre propre et bien rangée. Je recommande. L’hôte est très gentil et amical.

Laurent et sa femme sont des hôtes d’exception, il ont décorer l’hébergement pour l’anniversaire de mon fiancé ce qui m’a permis de lui faire une jolie surprise ! Ont réceptionné la décoration que je leur ai envoyer pour la mettre en place le jour j! En plus de cela la chambre a une chaise massante ainsi qu’un casque massant , vraiment relaxant je recommande!

Merci pour l’incroyable accueil 
Nous n’hésiterons pas à revenir !
Laurent est très accueillant et arrangeant. Le logement est top et plutôt proche du centre de Paris. Je recommande vivement!
Très bon hôte attentionné et disponible . Appartement exceptionnel. Je recommande (les yeux fermés) .

beau logement, plus grand que sur les photos.
Laurent est très sympa, ils nous a bien accueilli 
Un gros + pour le jaccuzi vraiment top! 
Je recommande vraiment !!!
Moments de détente, espace chaleureux et apaisant.
Un endroit d’exception. Un vrai petit paradis.

Merci à Laurent et sa femme pour cette journée!!! Très belle accueil
L’hôte est très réactif 
Super belle décoration. Vous ne serez pas déçu foncez!!!
INCROYABLE MAIS VRAI !!
Super soirée avec une petite attention particulière de Laurent très appréciée. Merci beaucoup pour se séjour je recommande vivement
Hôte très accueillant qui fait tout pour qu’on se sente chez soi. J’ai passé un très bon moment où j’ai pu me détendre et sa ma fait beaucoup de bien! Merci pour tout !
L’Airbnb est très propre, les propriétaires sont très sympa, réactif. Communication parfaite, adresse facile à trouver et on a passé une très bonne nuit je vous le conseille vivement.

Small apartment, very basic but perfect for anyone who is staying in Paris for a night or two and need a basic place to sleep. Great location, 5 mins walk from the Gare de Lyon and has a supermarket, pharmacy and several restaurants on the doorstep. Apartment on second floor, no lift but easy walk up the stairs. Even though lots of flats in the same block, there was barely any noise which was good. Bed was comfy, slept two people easily. Cleanliness and presentation could be better but overall not bad value for 1 or 2 nights.

C'est toujours un plaisir de rencontrer Romy qui sait accueillir ses voyageurs ! Encore merci Romy pour ce court séjour au plein coeur de Paris dans une petite chambre qui réunit la lumière, le confort et le nécessaire. A très bientôt !

C'était conforme à la description, et j'ai bien apprécié la disponibilité de Romy, merci.
Mon hôtesse a été parfaite.Elle a très bien gérée la situation quand un problème de robinetterie déclipsée a eu lieu. La chambre est calme, mais le plafond un peu bas au-dessus de la baignoire !
Très bon accueil! Chambre petite mais très pratique, propre et super au calme tout en étant au cœur de Paris dans un magnifique quartier. Je recommande vraiment !
Accueil toujours attentionné ! Merci
Romy a été très accueillante et le logement est charmant.Il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour cuisiner, c'est très pratique.
Hôte très accueillante, chambre très bien équipée et bien située très propre.

J'ai passé un séjour très agréable dans un quartier très central et dans une petite chambre avec tout le confort espéré. Romy est une femme accueillante, charmante, toujours souriante : elle fait tout ce qu'elle peut pour faciliter le séjour. La chambre permet une très grande indépendance. Je la remercie encore pour toutes ses petites attentions ... Et si la chambre est libre, je reviendrai pour d'autres séjours à Paris. MERCI Romy !!

Ce séjour a été parfait. Le quartier est génial avec des restos japonais à tester d'urgence et un resto italien à tomber. L'accueil et les échanges avec Susan sont des plus respectueux et la chambre est très bien équipée. Susan accorde un soin particulier pour que la propreté soit irréprochable. J'y retournerai avec plaisir.
Un bon accueil dans cette chambre pratique avec un réfrigérateur et de quoi se faire un thé pour le matin. Une cage d'escalier en mauvaise état, mais un appartement propre et soigné.

La chambre est bien agencée, propre et bien équipée avec un frigo et un petit nécessaire pour cuisiner. Elle est confortable et très calme. Le quartier proche de l'Opéra est très vivant et commerçant. La fille de Susan, Romy, m'a très bien accueilli et a été très arrangeante pour les aspects pratiques.

Très bon accueil de Romy , chambre charmante avec tous les équipements nécessaires pour un séjour confortable. Par ailleurs, emplacement de l'immeuble excellent et de plus pas un bruit quand on est dans la chambre.
Charmante petite chambre sous les toits ( donc dernier étage à préciser ! ) avec tout ce qu'il faut pour être autonome ( frigo , WC , baignoire ...).

Une très bonne nuit dans la chambre de Romy qui m'a accueillie très chaleureusement. Les équipements sont de qualité et la décoration est raffinée. Enfin, la chambre se trouve dans un quartier calme et sympa, juste a côté de l'opéra Garnier; un emplacement parfait pour découvrir la capitale.
Très bonne expérience dans cette chambre idéalement située et très calme. Romy est très accueillante, vraiment agréable. On se sent comme chez soi!
J'ai passé un très bon séjour dans la chambre de Romaly, qui à été vraiment gentille. Le quartier est calme et agréable, rien à redire !
La chambre-studio privée de Romaly est très pratique, confortable, et très bien située. Romaly est une hôte particulièrement chaleureuse, souriante, intéressée, de bons conseils. A recommander+++
Très sympa, accueil chaleureux et chambre agréable, propre, pratique... Idéal !

J'ai passé un excellent séjour dans la capitale! Romaly a été plus qu'accueillante. Discrète et très serviable. Une belle rencontre que je ne suis pas prête d'oublier.
Le quartier est agréable, la chambre calme et fonctionnelle. Je recommande à tout voyageur de séjourner chez Romaly!!!!!!
Chambre idéale pour un citytrip. Petit mais il y a tout le nécessaire pour un court séjour. Merci Romy !

Merci Romy pour ces quelques jours au centre de Paris dans le quartier de Paris le plus chic! La chambre de Romy est petite mais c'est parfait pour 1 personne! Très propre, la localisation est top! Et Romy est d'une gentillesse incroyable. je reviendrai sans hésiter!
Appart propre et bien situé, à deux pas de nombreux bons restos asiatiques. Hôte accueillante et facile à communiquer(très réactive en plus). Parfait pour passer un court séjour à Paris

Très chouette endroit , calme , parfaitement indépendant dans un magnifique quartier à deux pas du métro ... idéalement situé , c’est un petit studio sous les toits , avec tout ce qu’il faut ... Très bel accueil de Romy ... qui laisse de bonnes adresses et qui est très souple ! Je vous recommande chaleureusement cette adresse originale pour une expérience unique d’immersion

La chambre est très belle et spacieuse ! 
L’appartement est très très bien localiser et super propre ! 
Romy est très gentille :) 
Je recommande !

Mon séjour chez Romy a été extrêmement agréable.  
Les descriptions des logements sont identiques à la réalité et Romy vous fait sentir les bienvenus et les comprend. Absolument, dans d’autres possibilités de voyage à Paris, cette option d’hébergement sera la première de mes choix.  
J'ai tout simplement tout aimé: l'emplacement, l'ambiance, la propreté et surtout l'hôte charmant.
