Je suis vraiment satisfait de tout ce que Romy offre aux invités, donc, je recommande vivement de réserver cet endroit.  L'entrée est individuelle et a tous les équipements dans la chambre, y compris la salle de bain.  C'était juste parfait!  

Remarque: faites attention aux sacs trop lourds, car il y a des escaliers.

Merci Romy pour ce super séjour! L’emplacement est incroyable et un logement tout mignon pour quelques jours à Paris en amoureux! Le seul bémole était la construction le matin sur les toîts avoisinants, mais encore là rien à voit avec l’hôte. Romy est super charmante & très acceuillante, nous reviendrons pour sure!

J'ai mis une note inférieure à la moyenne. 
C'est à cause de la vétusté de l'immeuble de la peinture de la chambre qui tombe en lambeaux et des joins de la salle de bain qu'il faut revoir. 
sinon la chambre est très calme et propre.

excellent accueil, chambre extrêmement calme la nuit, pas un bruit, c'est divin. La baignoire dans la chambre, un frigo, four à micro-ondes, c'est parfait.
des chouettes adresses dans les alentours sont renseignées.
Romy est charmante. je garde cette adresse en mémoire pour un prochain séjour seule à Paris !

5 stars doesn’t really do this justice! Incredible location, a room which has everything a solo traveller with need and Robert & Romy are incredibly helpful and nice! La prochaine fois que je suis à Paris tout seule, je resterai chez eux encore une fois - sans doute! Top marks all round - thanks, guys

Chambre petite mais avec tout le nécessaire (la salle de bain est définitivement un plus!), très bien situé avec plusieurs possibilités pour les transports en commun. Communication impeccable avec Romy et bonne réactivité. Merci pour l'accueil!

Petit logement central pour de courts sejours.
Quartier dynamique et rempli de restaurants

Tout est parfait !  Des le départ l'accueil de Romy m'a fait sentir comment a la maison!  La chambre est très bien situé. Au quartier japonais à quelques pas de l'opéra et du palais royal. 
Je me réjouis du retourner! Merci pour tout Romy!
Besos! Geno! ;)

Chambre cosy et très bien située. 
L'accueil de Romy est plus que parfait. 
Je suis ravie d'y retourner à chacun de mes séjours parisiens.
A tout bientôt.

La situation de la chambre est parfaite. La chambre est très agréable. J'ai eu la chance de pouvoir discuter avec Romy en fin de journée. Une personne super agréable et serviable. Je suis ravie d'avoir fait ta connaissance et me réjouis de revenir. Les réservations sont déjà faites. Encore merci pour tout.

Logement calme, fonctionnel (frigo, baignoire, wc, evier dans la chambre), propre et bien situé. 
Bon accueil.

Pour moi c'était la première fois que j'ai voyagé avec Airbnb. Ce que j'ai rencontré à Paris m'a fait très plaisir. J'avais une petite chambre avec du charme, pleine de possibilités, frigo, coin pour se préparer une tasse de thé ou café etc. il y avait même un micro-onde. 
Je n'avais pas besoin de tout ça, car la chambre est tellement bien situé: en 5 minutes on trouve les meilleures restaurants. 
Romy est une femme très sympathique avec des yeux joyeux. Pour moi c'était un plaisir de pouvoir loger chez elle. Je me suis senti à l'aise et je savais que j'aurais pu contacter Romy en cas de questions ou recommandations. Merci beaucoup pour cet agréable accueil. C'est avec plaisir que je reviendrais.
Susan est une persone formidable! Pendant mon sejour, j´ai beaucoup aimé tout! La chambre etait très confortable, bien organizée, propre et charmante. Le cartier, mon Dieu! Le meiller de Paris!!
I had a great time. Susan est meme allee me chercher et m'avait aide avec mes bagages! J'espere revenir un jour.
Merci à Romy pour son très bon accueil, sa gentillesse et sa discrétion. Quartier très calme, très bien situé et logement fidèle au descriptif.
I had a very pleasant stay here. It is superbly well located and very quiet. Having a private bathroom in a single bedroom is also a huge plus.

Great communication and a warm welcome really get your stay off to a good start  here. The room is basic, and only has a single bed, but that is fine for a short stay in a quiet room, right in the heart of Paris.

Excellent stay, Robert and Romy's place suited my needs perfectly.  Comfortable during a cold snap, conveniently located, and Romy was a great host, always ready with suggestions and ways to make my stay easier.  Recommended!!
Romy was a great host and the room was perfect and very central to all the hotspots. I'd highly recommend it to anyone visiting for a few days!

로미의 집은 매우 좋았습니다. 근처에 많은 관광지들이 있어서 걸어서 다니기 매우 좋았습니다. 그리고 개인적인 공간이어서 편하게 지낼 수 있었어요. 로미는 매우 자상하고 제가 요청하는건 다 잘 들어주었습니다. 제가 파리에 있을 때 날씨가 안좋았어서 매일 밤에 욕조에서 반신욕을 했는데 여행하는데 많은 도움이 됐습니다. 다음에 파리에 다시 혼자 온다면 꼭 여기에 다시 묵고 싶어요~

Great place to stay if you feel like visiting Paris and being in a beautiful neighbourhood!! However, it may not be the best choice if you're coming to Paris for work, as the WiFi connexion in the room is far from fast and the phone connexion is unsteady (at least, it was with my provider Vodafone). Romy is absolutely charming which makes up for the basic equipment and unpleasant smell in the flat (probably from the sewage). So as long as you are aware of this, your stay should be ok :-)!
많은 후기들처럼 Romy는 정말 친절하고, 숙소는 위치 면에서 정말 최고예요! 파리의 가장 중심지에 위치하고 있기 때문에 대부분 도보로 이동 가능해요. 하지만 엘리베이터가 없고, 계단이 정말 좁기 때문에 큰 캐리어를 가지고 가신다면 조금 힘들 것 같아요. 그래도 정말 정말 좋았습니다! 다음에 파리를 다시 가게 된다면 또 묵을 거예요!
位置好
very welcome
The perfect place to stay in Paris! Romy was a very nice host and the studio is well located.
excellent

Fine neighborhood and tourist area, handy metro and bus connections, warm welcome and good organisation for guests with practical info and independant key and access : I felt very good at Romy's place! The bed was good, the room clean, benefiting from the light and fresh air of the skylight, and I managed without trouble to cary my heavy suitcase up to the 4th floor in the narrow stairwell (that's Paris ;) ). I recommand the place!
This is a rare gem in Paris. Romy is an excellent host and the location is unbeatable.

Romy is the most helpful AirBnB host I have met to date.  She was incredibly kind.  The location of the accommodation is brilliant.  I have no qualms about recommending this AirBnB for a fantastic stay in Paris!

I had a wonderful stay at Romy's place! It's a great, small space perfect for a visit in one of the nicest areas of Paris. When you walk out the door you are minutes away from some of the most beautiful buildings in the city! Felt like a true Parisian :) Romy was super welcoming when I first arrived and the room was sparkling clean with fresh, crisp linens. I greatly appreciated the cleanliness of the room! Perfect for a short stay in Paris. Enjoy!
Romy’s place is perfect for a solo traveler! She was very pleasant and accommodating to all my needs. Definitely will be staying again on any return to the wonderful city of Paris!

I felt like an artist living in the heart of Paris.
Everything is as described, though the room is bigger than it seems in the pictures.
It was a couple of very hot days in Paris and I was worried about how hot the room would get. But with the skylight open and the fan on, I slept very well.

Typical Parisian place, near the Opera Garnier (Garnier palace) a charming loft with a skylight on the roof! small with everything in a single environment evoking the spaces of French impressionism! I thought of Toulouse Lautrec and Van Gogh's room when I arrived. Super well located with everything within reach!
The best place to stay to explore Paris by foot! The room is great and I will definetly look for this place when I am back to Paris.
Little room in great part of Paris,
Romy is a really nice person and here room is on a great spot! It’s really close to everything and a great base to explore the city.
Great location, perfect little room! It’s quiet, it’s central, and has great little touches. I highly recommend this place if you are passing through town, or need something simple and cozy.
Un alojamiento excelente, la ubicación genial, la hospitalidad y la tranquilidad.

Das kleine Zimmer bei Romy ist gemütlich und schön eingerichtet. In wenigen Minuten sind schicke Geschäften, Restaurants und Sehenswürdigkeiten wie der Louvre oder die Seine fußläufig zu erreichen. Romy hat mich trotz meiner späten Ankunftszeit persönlich und sehr freundlich begrüßt.

My goal for staying in Paris (most places) was a clean, safe place in a great location. Romy’s place exceeded my expectations. Her place was a 5 minute walk from the train station. The Louvre and the Opera House are less than a 10 minute walk from her place. Clean, quiet ( the gentle sound of the rain pattering off the skylight lulled me to sleep). Romy, simply put, was the best host I have ever experienced in all my years of travel.
Thanks for the lovely stay in central Paris
good

It was only after I checked out when I realized this room was probably the best value in Paris. The room is well-equipped and the skylight is quite a nice addition. I was received warmly and I was able to have a peaceful stay. The location is the most ideal. It is literally a stone’s throw away from the Pyramides metro stop, which will take you to most places you want to go as a tourist and as a kind of local as I consider myself to be. Also, since the RoissyBus terminates at Palais Garnier, it is very convenient to head back to CDG, instead of doing the gauntlet from Pyramides to Chatelet  then RER B, that is, if there is an RER B because of the strikes. I couldn’t be happier with my stay, and I look forward to the next time in Paris, especially knowing that this space will be available. Merci!

It’s really a great location. I went around the central city on foot, went to Louvre Museum and Eiffel Tower. Romy is so kindly, she always reply my messages as soon as possible and recommended some tips for me, gave me some muffins chocolate. Thank you for helping me in Paris.
It's small, at the top of a beautiful windy staircase, very easy access to toilet and bath, excellent wi-fi; it's all rather eccentric, which I loved

This is the perfect location if you want to explore Paris, it is walking distance from so many things like restaurants and a metro station or shopping centres. I took public transportation only twice and enjoyed exploring on foot. It really is perfectly situated!

Very clean place to stay, with lots of space for your storage. Having an en suite was amazing. 

I would only say that if you are taller than 5’10 it may be hard for you to stay here, I bumped my head twice on the ceiling when in the bath so just be aware of that :)

Romy is an excellent host, really great communication!!!
Romy is a kind, welcoming, and bubbly host! The room was equipped with everything needed for a comfortable stay, and the location is absolutely unbeatable.

Nice spot in a great location. A bit short of a ceiling if you’re taller, I wasn’t able to stand up in the shower / wash my hair, but it’s a great place to stay for a couple nights. And Romy is lovely and hospitable.
It’s reasonable, super clean, nice location, quiet, and peacful! Excellent!

This was my 1st time in a room and it was better than I thought: the space is private enough, independent, and quite complete (I just missed a microwave). Very good location (near to the subway and to the airport bus, in the case of a strike). Very clean and cosy.
This is a wonderful place to stay, right in the centre of Paris close to the Louvre and other sights. Romy was an excellent host, very accommodating and helpful. Highly recommended.

Romy is a lovely lady. When I texted her about my late, she stayed home a bit for longer than we agreed, to be able to leave my suitcase in the room. 
She is also so helpful to give you recommendations about where to go out and what public transport to use.
The room itself is just I needed as a stop for a night, after long travel to get back home. To have a hot bath in my private room was amazing in the winter time. Also I had a very good night sleep in Romy's quiet and calm room. 
I would definitely stay there again when I visit Paris again.

Everything about the room was amazing. The bed was comfy, the water in the tub was very hot (perfect for the winter!), the temperature was great, and the amenities were more than enough. Plus, Romy is very nice and helpful. She responds immediately to any queries and provides recommendations for places to visit/eat at. Nothing to complain about!
파리가 파업중인데도 위치가 좋아서 걸어다니거나 라임타고 다니기에 좋았어요! 화장실이랑 욕조는 처음에는 어색했지만 몇일 지나니까 되게 재밌는 방에서 지내는 것 같아서 새롭고 좋았어요! 다른 유럽 숙소들의 라디에이터가 방 공기를 따뜻하게 안 해주는 곳에서 많이 묵었었는데, Romy의 숙소 안에 있는 이동용 라디에이터는 정말 최고입니다 ㅠㅠ

It is nice place to visit Paris as sightseeing. Especially, here is very close to Louvre Museum. It will take only few minutes to visit there by walk. 
The owner, Romy was very kind to me, and I could spend comfortably here. 
Thank you.
Exactly as advertised. Simple and cozy. Narrow stairs to get up to the apartment. The skylight is great! Romy is super nice and flexible

The room is small and cute, its enough for all you needs. Romy is very helpful host:) My travel to Paris was strike time because of that transportaion to airport most metro lines close. She help me a lot:)

Romy was so hospitable and really helped me through the week of Paris Strikes with advice. The location is so convenient to the Louvre,  and the hot water is very hot in the bath :)
Would definitely stay again
It was really cozy and relaxing place, I’d recommend it

Romy was lovely! She was very kind and also very clear with the instructions and all the communication. The room was great too, it's cozy and it has all the necessary to be very comfortable, also it's near to some of the most touristic places in Paris and the subway is also really close son you can move easily, it has a great location.

Outstanding location, good communication with host. Lots of steps (which is mentioned and what you'd expect for the price, the benefit is you're right at the top and hear no neighbours walking by), all in all its great quiet place to stay for low budget in a very central location (good dark blinds too above skylight, to sleep well), thank you x

La stanza era davvero piccola, in condizioni igieniche scadenti. Nella vasca da bagno vi erano dei peli e dei capelli. La scala a chiocciola ti portava al terzo piano, dove ti trovavi davanti una seconda porta che lasciava spazio ad un altro piano di scale. Sul pianerottolo “l’appartamento” si divideva in due stanze: una dell’host e una del/dei guest. Le mura non erano molto spesse, perciò si sentiva tutto da una stanza all’altra. La camera è un open space, e tutto sommato va bene se devi visitare Parigi e tornarci solo per dormire, ma non è confortevole. La cifra che paghi è ben spesa se viene tenuta in considerazione soltanto la posizione dell’abitazione, ma per il resto non vi sono molti altri aspetti positivi se non la disponibilità di Romy.
Muy buena predisposicion
樓梯間不大,還好我的行李不大,因為要爬到最高層,地點距離歌劇院､羅浮宮都不遠,走出去5分鐘就有公車站,附近也有超市,民宿主人有提供一本資料夾,裡面有一些實用資料,房間樣式簡單,但該有的都有,主人人也很好,好溝通｡

Romy is a lovely, friendly host. The apt. is very centrally located whilst remaining bright and quiet and is the quintessential Parisian attic studio. The space has everything the solo traveller will need and is really clean. The surrounding area has lots of charming places to eat, have coffee and explore. The bed is very comfy and I had a nice sleep with a view of the nightsky above me. This is my new favorite place to stay in the city of light..
The location is very good!  The room is clean.  Romy is a nice person.  I recommend it!
Siempre atenta a mis requerimientos, excelente anfitriona. El dpto está muy bien ubicado. Todo impecable. Es tal cual las fotos
Quiet and nice with a lot of privacy
Romy and Robert's place was great . Cozy and you have everything you need. Close to metro stations and Louvre :)

I only stayed here for one night but could very happily have stayed for more. The location is perfect both for its convenience for getting around Paris and the immediate areas character. The room is small but cosy rather than cramped. Romy is a fantastic host, very welcoming and had plenty of tips on where to go. Check-in and check-out were painless. Definitely recommend:)
What a wonderful and special place! A small, cosy room right under the roof and sky in the heart of Paris. I loved it!

Robert and Romy's is a light, bright, quiet room in Paris' busy central area. Close or easy public transport to all Paris. Hosts welcoming and friendly. Should I ever get back to  Paris  I would try to be here again.

Robert and Romy's place is very well located. Its a room in the top floor with a bed, desk, bathroom/tub in the room, quite convenient for a solo traveler. I just spent few hours at the place because it was the end of my trip but I would definitely recommend the place if you want a central location in Paris.

Romy is a lovely host,  very communicative and always around to help. 
The place is as described, low ceiling in an attic but it’s a nice spot if you’re out all day and just need a place to crash at night 

Place is clean

Where do I start? This place is magical and I have absolutely fallen in love! All the communication was absolutely fantastic from the beginning, romy was always so kind and considerate so it calmed me especially considering I was going to Paris as a solo female traveller, I was slightly worried! I expected the worst with the stairs when I arrived (due to previous reviews), but was pleasantly surprised to find it was really only three and a half floors - if you are decently fit (I’m no Olympian) it should be a breeze. I was greeted at the top by the effervescent Romy, a wonderful human who exudes kindness and has amazing energy. All of a sudden my worries flew away and I felt excited to be in Paris in such great and safe company! She gave amazing tips and provided Fantastic conversation and I am so happy to have met her!!! The room itself is like having your own little appartment, the roof is not the highest, but I am 6’2 and I wasn’t uncomfortable, I just had to watch myself in 2 minuscule areas. Having your own fridge, bathroom, and bath was just an added bonus and the skylight was perfect to let natural light and air (if desired) in. Basically the room was great! And then we get to the location! Wow what a location, close to fair few metro stops, shopping (including Galleries Lafayette), the lourve - but bassically most of the big ticket landmarks are within a walking distance!!  The first morning I was walking and I turned to my left, saw the lourve pyramids and then to my right to see the Eiffel Tower! That sort of sums up how amazing the location is!! All in all this stay- absolutely incredible, I highly recommend to anyone and everyone- if I return to Paris this place will be my first choice. Thank you so much for everything, and can’t wait to return to Paris for the Fete de la musique you told me about romy!!!!
A lovely attic room in the heart of Paris. Romy was very helpful with check in even though my train was delayed and I arrived late.

Lugar sencillo, un tanto pequeño, y con una escalera complicada de subir con maletas. Dejando eso de lado, la ubicación es perfecta, el departamento es tranquilo, y Romi fue muy antenta. Desde aqui la distancia es muy corta a pie a muchos lugares, por lo que no tendras que preocuparte por transporte motorizado. Recomendable para personas que visjen solas y que tengas muchas ganas de caminar por los alrededores.
Private and quiet

Romy is very helpful. The room is small but tidy, and it's equipped with everything you need for a short stay. 
The location is amazingly convenient, with walking distance to many great museums and metro stations. 
Definitely recommend this place for single traveler in Paris.

This cute little space is right amongst everything, cafes, restaurants, historic sites, busses, and the metro. 
Romy is a fantastic host, loaded with local tips and knowledge.
As the profile says, it’s on the third floor with a narrow staircase, so if you bring a big heavy bag...........

Потрясающая хозяйка! Romy замечательная, очень приятная женщина. Мне разрешили оставить багаж в комнате раньше заселения (прилетела рано), и в день отъезда. Порекомендовала полезные места (где покушать, где продукты купить). Нужен был утюг, сразу любезно предоставила. Улыбчивая, добродушная, отзывчивая. Хозяйка-мечта! Комнатка маленькая, но очень уютная и светлая. Потолок низкий, но мне было удобно (я невысокая). В комнате было все, что мне нужно. Место положения квартиры очень удобное! В двух шагах с одной стороны Опера, с другой Лувр и сад Тюильри. Также рядом много кафе, магазинчиков с продуктами. Вернулась бы туда однозначно. Мне очень понравилось!
Although small, this accommodation was very clean and well located in Paris. Romy was a great host - helpful and friendly. Would recommend for a short Paris stay.

Great location, very clean and the room is pretty!! Romy is really kind and polite :)
Thank you!
Romy was such a sweet host and the room is cute and cozy. I would absolutely stay there again if I could!

Thank you for hosting me and being extremely kind!  The room was clean and very quiet which I appreciated since I was so tired I slept a lot. I was coming for 1 night and was very well welcomed. The host is also thoughtful with the notes she gives. I recommend this place.

The location of Romy's apartment is the best! It was exactly what I needed - to bounce around the whole day and then get some good sleep during the night. Perfect room for one person. Romy was very accommodating and all around a very welcoming host. I would definitely stay again and recommend to others!

Romy was always so kind and patient to help me, she was so thoughtful! 
The room was really clean, and near the Louvre museum, you can reach both the "Pyramid" and "Opera" underground station in less than 10min walk. 
And there is a skylight in the room that you can see the stars when lying on the bed at night.

Robert and Romy’s place has a great location— and its in an interesting neighborhood. The room itself is at the top of the small building, an eyrie, self-contained with a comfortable bed, a nice bath area, a wonderful skylight. Romy was super helpful— her friendliness during my short stay (one night between flights) was welcoming, and I enjoyed talking with her. I’d love to return some day.
Romy was very helpful and made me feel very welcome in Paris! I had a great stay.
The location is great, close to two Metro stations and museums. The place is small with very low ceilings which may be a problem for anyone taller than 5'6"/170cm.

Small studio in the heart of Paris. Great location (centre of the city), so if you're into exploring the city and you can do this without big luxury, this property is just perfect. It was all I needed and Romy is a wonderful host. I would go back there without hesitation.

올라가는 계단이 좀 좁아요~
위치 좋았고 
편하게 쉬다가 갑니다!

日本人の私にも非常に優しく接して下さり､1人で旅行をしていましたがすごく安心しました｡
一通り専用の冷蔵庫やﾄﾞﾗｲﾔｰ､ﾄｲﾚやｼｬﾜｰは揃っており､快適に過ごすことができました｡
本当に感謝します｡
mercy!!

Отличная локация в центре Парижа. Небольшая комната с ванной. 
Нужно иметь в виду, что лестница очень узкая и неудобно затаскивать громоздкий чемодан на последний этаж. 
В целом отличный вариант

Romy was amazingly nice since I booked to stay at her place, she responded super fast to all my messages, she gave me great suggestions on what to do around Paris, check in/out was super easy, the place was clean and the location was good! Only minutes away from metro stations, grand palace, louvre museum and more.
The location is very convenient for tour. A nice trip in Paris. Thanks to Romy for everything.

Thank you Romy! So kind and thoughtful - and the space is cozy and super comfortable.

Loved that the room is a combined bedroom/bath with a skylight... Very private and quiet (and the neighborhood/location is, of course, great) 

Up on the third floor with another set of stairs to the top... A pretty easy climb. Would only hesitate to recommend it to someone very tall, but it was fine for me (6').

The location is great. It’s very close to the Opera House as well as within walking distance to many sites. If you’re flying in and out of CDG there is a bus right by the Opera House that goes to and from directly to CDG called the Roussy bus. This bus made going back to the airport less stressful and cheaper than Uber. Romy was friendly and helpful. She was able to give me many local tips which totally maximized my short stay. There is no elevator and a staircase, but it’s really 3 floors, (not six )and it wasn’t any trouble for me who isn’t at all super fit. Even though Paris was experiencing a heat wave opening the skylight made it comfortable for me in the evening. Overall, I had a good stay and would return.

Romy is really friendly. She speaks excellent English. The room is suitable for one person with all the equipment in one room. It is interesting to have a bathtub and toilet just beside your bed. So if you don’t care, it is convenient. The location is perfect because it is super easy to find restaurants, metro and tourist attractions etc.

Romy was very nice with me and she satisfied all my request, I appreciate a lot her availability. Her place is perfectly located in the center of the city but the room is quite small even if has all the things you might need during your stay. For me was a nice stay even if I spent just one night! :)
Nice, architecturally unique small studio space, with beautiful skylight in a great location. Romy was very nice! Will stay again :)

This room was perfect for what I needed. I was only in transit for a couple nights before heading back to Canada. It is a small room with low ceilings, but has everything needed for a short term stay. Although there was water damage in this room, it was very clean. They had people working on fixing everything. Romy offered to give me some money back as they were starting work quite early in the morning. She was very accommodating with my check out time and gave me good tips on how to get to the airport for much cheaper. I was able to walk to all the major attractions from this location. It was perfect!
前晚订房,第二天早上房东确认才告知17点入住早上8点就必须退房｡原本写的是9点｡而且没有商量的余地｡房间在施工中,收拾的还算干净,卫浴设备和床都在一间,只适合单身背包客只求夜宿一休｡其余都不推荐｡

The most important thing that gives value  to this room is its location. It is very close to the most important touristic areas. The room is in the attic of a 6 story building so expect steep stairs. Also, the room is perfect for one person, but small, the toilet does not have a door nor the shower a shower curtain.  In terms of my general stay, unfortunately after my departure there were important misunderstandings with Romy. In person she kindly agreed to help out with a few things, which I greatly appreciated and followed her requests the best I could. Yet, after I left she changed her mind and issued a formal complaint in Airbnb. The complaint did not went through since I had evidence from our message exchanges through the site. However, this was very troubling, especially because of her hostile messages afterwards. Part of her complains were due to slight communication issues, yet there was construction work in the roof of the room during my stay, of which I was not informed of before my arrival. The construction work was problematic especially on Monday morning that they started working very early (8:00). The room was dusty because of this and I could not open the window or if I tried more dust came in. So, the room was too hot sometimes.

The location is perfect for most of what Paris had to offer, I had recommendations from friends for things to the east and west of where this flat was located so it was convenient in that sense. Great value and the host is very friendly :)

The place is located at a really convenient place and the room is lovely. Romy is a really nice host, I really had a good time in Paris.
Highly recommend!
Romy is an incredibly gracious host, and the space was perfect for my quick stop in Paris.
The host canceled this reservation 58 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Romy’s Place was great! The place was clean and exactly as described. I especially enjoyed the toilet and tub that were in the room because they were private and the room had everything I needed. My one complaint is that it was a bit far from some attractions like the Eiffel Tower, but Paris is so big that it can’t be close to everything and the room was close to public transport that would take you to anywhere you needed. I would stay here again!

I don’t know where to begin! This was perfect! Romy is the sweetest lady ever! I felt so welcome ❤️ The room is great for a solo traveler, just everything you need for a few days in Paris. It’s close by to everything. I would love to stay here again. Thank you so much, I loved it!
Great place to stay right in the downtown - very close to the Louvre. Cozy and tidy.

This apartment is in a very nice location and for one young traveler makes a convenient stay. However the toilet and bathtub are not separated from the bed area and the bathtub does not have a curtain. Even so, I was just staying for one night and this place offered what I needed since it is in such a great area. Also check in was easy and they were very flexible and helpful.
Perfect for my needs for a one night stay. Nice room, central location and responsive host. Thank you.
El lugar está muy bien ubicado muy céntrico y puedes llegar a todos lados muy fácilmente, solo falta un poco más de limpieza.

This little room is perfect . It is cozy and extremely well located. I just met Romy who makes everything very easy.
I recommend it.

Very cute apartment situated centrally. Perfect communication. Very accommodating. Couldn’t ask for more. I had a great night sleeping under the stars through the skylight. Want to feel like you’re in a Parisian novel? Stay here.

This is an absolutely fantastic place! It’s so close to everything, a really cute and private room, and great value. Romy was a very nice host and made sure to give good local tips. Prefect place for a single traveler looking for a real, quintessential Paris experience!

Romy ist eine herzliche Gastgeberin, die mir schon vor Reisebeginn sehr gute Informationen gegeben hat. Die Unterkunft liegt fantastisch. Obwohl man mitten im Zentrum ist, die Metro in der Nähe, ist es total ruhig. Das Zimmer liegt unter dem Dach und ist einfach in der Ausstattung, aber mit allem, was man braucht: Kühlschrank, Ventilator, Wasserkocher, WLAN, eigenem WC, eigener Badwanne, Schreibtisch etc. Man erreicht sein Zimmer, ohne durch die Gastgeberwohnung zu gehen. Das  Bett war bequem. Der Preis ist wirklich fair! Das Treppenhaus ist ungewöhnlich eng, aber urig. Wenn ich wieder nach Paris komme, werde ich sehr gerne wieder bei Romy übernachten!

If you are traveling to Paris by yourself, this the perfect place to stay! Great location, great host, and fantastic value. Warning! The room is small, but I found it to be perfect for a solo person. Romy is so kind and willing to help out in whatever way she can! Cannot recommend this AirBnb enough!

가격대비 만족스러운 숙소였어요. 파리에서 이 위치에 이 가격대로 숙소를 구할 수는 없죠 ㅎㅎㅎ 위치는 좀 파리에서 아시아인들이 모여사는 동네인듯 했어요. 그래서 나름 안전함을 느낄 수 있었습니닼ㅋㅋㅋㅋ 파리 중심지에 있는 어트랙션들은 다 걸어다닐 수 있을 정도로 위치가 아주 좋아요. 그리고Romy가 정말 매우 친절했고, 메세지 답장이 진짜 빨라서 편하게 지내다 떠났네요! 후기에 계단에 관련된 이야기가 많던데 26인치 캐리어 20kg짜리 들고 올라갔는데 막 그렇게 못 올라갈 정도는 아니에요, 단지 좀 힘들뿐... 아침에 일어나면 천장에 있는 창문으로 햇살이 들어오는데 그게 그렇게 예쁠 수가 없어요 ㅠㅠㅠㅠ 화장실이 방이랑 합체(?) 되어있는걸 처음 봐서 조금 당황하긴 했는데 적응되니까 괜찮았어요. 근데 욕조에 들어가면 천장이 꽤나 낮아서 약간 불편할수도 있을 것 같습니다. 그래도 다시 파리에 온다면 이 방을 이용하고 싶네요! 

Thank you Romy!!!

Best, Hyungbin

Идеальное расположение для того, чтобы полюбить Париж с первого раза. Красивый чистый район, в пешей доступности все достопримечательности. Удобно добираться от аэропорта (из Орли трамвай Т7+прямая ветка метро до Опера или Piramides), от метро 5-7 мин. Рядом много хороших кафе, шоппинг, супермаркет (В комнате подробные адреса).  Огромное спасибо Ромми - она разрешила рано утром привезти и оставить вещи, не ждать времени заселения и прислала подробную инструкцию как попасть в квартиру.  Комната на 4 этаже, с узкой крутой лестницей, без лифта. Обязательно надо это учитывать, если Вы с чемоданом. Лестница реально узкая, чемодан надо впереди себя поднимать и спускать, это довольно трудно.  Комната с низким потолком, не больше 180 см, мансардное окно в потолке, без кондиционера, летом, наверное, очень жарко. Очень мало освещения в комнате. Ванная и туалет ничем не отгорожены от кровати. Ванная без шторки, это крайне неудобно, нельзя принять душ. Отличный вариант для 1 человека на одну ночь, но не больше.

I chose Romy's place primarily for the location. The main attractions that I wanted to cover were mostly nearby. Almost on all the nights I was there, I could go sit in front of louvre with a coffee.. The location also saved me a lot of travel. Also, plenty of food joints from all cuisines nearby. Be it French or Italian or Korean or the usual fast food chains.

To me,the only negative was the lackof a lift in the building. The Belgian stairs were too narrow. So if you have some big suitcases, you might face some challenges.  But to me, this was not at all a deal breaker. Romy had clearly mentioned it in the post itself.

Thanks to Romy for being a wonderful host
Great place to stay in the heart of Paris!!
Romy’s room is a very good option, it has all you need, has a perfect ubication near the metro and some of the atractions, and Romy is very kindfull

La habitación es justo lo que se especifica. Se llega al tercer piso por escaleras muy estrechas no apto para maletas espaciosas. La privacidad es genial y Rommy es encantadora siempre al pendiente de ti! Cerca de estaciones de metro que t conectan con toda la ciudad y se llega caminando a varias atracciones

The place is great! Everything is exactly as described (so pelase take a minute to read the special details about it). Romy is a great host, flexible, very welcoming and a good chat. Even though the place is right in the heart of the city, it's super quiet and I slept like a baby!  
Thank you again Romy!
A localização ê fantástica. Romy é muito atenciosa, foi precisa e rápida na comunicação. O lugar é absolutamente silencioso, simples  porém não me faltou nada.

Staying with Romy was probably the best option that  I could go while visiting Paris for short time. She was very kind and helpful with anything I needed or asked about. I would definitely recommend for any solo travellers to stay with her if you want the true Parisian experience.

For solo-young travelers, this place is perfect. The room is small and has the bath,sink, toilette in it but I don’t mind. The location is unbeatable to be honest. Next to Place Vendome, Louvre Museu, Tuileries Garden... Wherever you are, in 5-10 mins you are back. Romy is very kind, gentle and she satisfied all the requested I asked for. She cleaned the room perfectly. Although is at the centre of Paris, the location is very quite. I found also useful all the food markets all around ( Pret a manger, bio market etc ). For sure I’ll be back to her. Grazie Romy

솔짉히 말하면 처음 방에 듥어걌을때 좀 충격잉았어요. 싱글침대 바로 옆에 병ㅇ기와 욛조라니.... 바앙으음도 좋지 앍앙 새벽에 깼굵요ㅠㅠ
하지만 Romy는 정말 sweet하고 친절하고 nice한 호스트였습니다.!!!
저에대해 걱정해주고 늦은밤에 벨을 눌러도 바로 문을 열어주었고 도착하면 물 한병을 줍니다. 집에 도착할때마다 한잔씩 마실 수 있어서 좋았어요. 위치도 나쁘지않습니다. 주변에 가까운역이 몇개 있고 몇블럭만 나가면 큰길이라 무섭지 않고 버스정류장도 있어요. 그치만 다시 머묽꺼 깥쥐는 않네열ㄹㄹㄹ

For the solo traveler to Paris who doesn't need the luxuries of a hotel, this is the perfect spot for you. It has everything you could ask for in an AirBnB and its location is unbeatable. The hosts are gracious and easy to communicate with, making this place definitely worth every penny!

Romy's and Robert's room has everything it needs for spending some beautiful  days in Paris. It is so close to many interesting places and just a few steps from metro (Pyramides / Quatre Septembre) and bus stations. I felt very comfortable in the small room under the roof and I very much liked the skylight above the bed. Although the house is located in the city center it is very quiet, by day and night. There are some stairs to take and the staircase is pretty narrow, so better don't bring very huge suitcases :-)

Perfect if you need a place to stay traveling solo for a night or two. The stairway is super narrow and the space is very basic. I was out and about most of the day and Romy was an excellent communicator and helped me find my way when I first got to the city!
Incredible location & price, perfect for young person to travel along in Paris. Romy is a very nice hostess too.

The location of this apartment was perfect. The host was very kind and helpful.
In the room, there was every thing I need.

The room is at perfect location and the host is nice and replied fast. I'm a bit tall (6 feet) for the room but everything is just fine for a short stay, own bed, bathtub and toilet. Need to be careful when doing shower as there is no curtain.

Romy is a lovely host and was so kind and hospitable throughout my entire stay. The room was clean and tidy and I had everything I needed, also in a perfect location. Romy was super helpful and gave me some good recommendations. Would happily stay again! :)
Good place and nice host!
Lovely hosts : )
Romy is a friendly woman, who gives me a great deal of advice to have fun in Paris, and most of them are quite useful!
Perfect location, a bit little but cozy and lovely house. Friendly host helped me a lot. Hope to stay again when I visit Paris next time!

Robert & Romy’s apartment was the perfect place for my weekend in Paris. Conviently located within walking distance of interesting sights, restaurants & supermarkets and metro stations. 
Romy is super hospitable and gave me a really warm welcome. 
The room is perfect for a solo traveller, and is outfitted with a toilet, sink, bathtub, fridge and an electric kettle. 
Please note the room is on the top floor with a long, narrow staircase leading up to it, so this place really isn’t for travellers with a lot (or big pieces) of luggage.
A great place, highly recommended!

I would have stayed at Robert and Romy‘s place but I canceled last minute because of the protests in Paris. Romy was very understand and helped me a lot with the process. 
I’m so excited to come and stay at their place sometime next year! 
Thank you Romy!

Romy made me homemade wine and gave me a quick tour of the nearby interest sites.  

If you are taller than 5ft 8inches you will butt your head.
Excellent location that is the best thing for the place, it’s only a few minutes walking from the louvre Museum and the opera house
Quiet room with excellent location and a lovely host
The location was perfect for me and great value. This is ideal for a single traveller seeking a simple, convenient base to explore Paris from.

All the good in one place:) 
* lovely caring and helpfull Romy * pleasant place with everything u need * great location in Paris*

This place is perfect for one person! 
You get privacy and your own room. One thing to note,  your room and bathroom are in the same room.
Fantastic location with a friendly, helpful host. Ideal for a single traveller wanting reasonably priced accommodation in the heart of Paris. Comfortable and convenient.
Very nice room, very central. Though only for small people. Good for people that are sensible to noise because it way very quiet.

If your looking for a great location, check no other —Romys place is a hidden gem! 

Very close to the metro and roissy bus making everything convenient. 

Plus, a wonderful host!:)

Thanks again. I will absolutely book next time :)

Great clean, basic room for a single traveller. It was so nice to have your own bath in your room, made it feel like a little oasis. I really got to like the neighbourhood, unfortunately I was only there for 2 nights.  Cool cafes (I loved Telescope and Baguette’s Cafe nearby) and Romy’s recommendations were a real help. Staircase is as expected, I’m glad my bag wasn’t larger or heavier! Romy was very easier and quick to communicate with. I would stay again!
立地がいいです｡

Good Vibes! Cozy room and comfy bed are highly recommended. Romy is a great host giving a local's honest advice. Great location with many great things to see in all directions: the Louve, the Opera, or the Japanese quartier right at the next block. And gazing through a skylight is a nice way to end the day.
If your kind of dreamer or creative type this is a great place.
Romy was so nice and understanding. I had my sister stay with me and she was okay with it. Very nice lady and very close to the Louvre

Romy met me, to drop off the keys to the place, and was very warm and friendly. The room was a bit shorter than I expected, but worked for the one night I was there. The pictures of the room are accurate, just misperception on my part. Great location, and near the metro, and the louvre.  Very kind people :)
Romy was very welcoming and friendly. Perfect location for exploring Paris. I loved the skylight from which I could feel morning sun. I would stay here again if I come back to Paris.

房間位在巴黎歌劇院附近,是個地理位置相當好的地點,但是沒有電梯所以行李太多便不適合住在這裡.
附近超市､餐廳､地鐵歐､公車都屬於非常便利!
走路至羅浮宮､塞納河､拉法葉､春天百貨等景點都相當近,不過地鐵更方便!
房東小姐人非常好,房間也很乾淨,
下次如果來巴黎一定還會來到此處!
Enjoyed my stay, the location being my fav feature. Thanks for hosting me!

This is a perfect, safe space for a solo traveller; the room was very light and let in sun in the morning.  Romy gave me a very friendly welcome and was very accommodating about my check-in time.  The neighbourhood is packed full of lovely places and so central - perfect. 
Definitely 5 star rating from me!
Romy is very hospitable. Loved my stay at her place. The location is amazing and you have everything needed in the room. Hope to come back. Thanks Romy!

This is definitely a place for the single traveller or a couple who aren't afraid to share very close quarters. Though the building is old and there are some issues with the roof (owner is trying to get it fixed via strata) it was not at all a detriment to my experience. There is a fridge, fan, bath, toilette, desk, and microwave available in addition to the single bed. If you are desperate to clean some clothes, the sink is a deep enough to soak some things. For the price, it was great. The location is very close to all the major sights. It's just a 10minute walk (or less) from the Opera and the main hop-on-off bus stops, there are restaurants and bakeries and markets nearby as well as the Roissey bus stop (a good bus option from the airport). The owners were very good about sending me helpful tips about how to get theready and what was around.
Romy is very welcoming. She was very kind to let me check in earlier, much appreciated after a long flight. Great location to visit Paris and she gave me lots of good local tips. Thank you Romy!
Romy was a great host and very friendly. My only complaint was the many steps with a heavy staircase. Other than that, it was a comfortable stay.
Perfect location for exploring Paris and very welcoming hosts. Thanks very much for the hospitality.
An acceptable place for sleeping with a magnificent location.
This is a cute convenient little room in the middle of the city , easy to walk everywhere. I would recommend it .
great location, quite small but suitable for a single person. great place to spend the night and out mostly sight seeing during the day.
Location is perfect and they’re so nice .

*위치: 정말 최고 좋아요!! 
별 열개 주고싶어요
루브르와 튈르리정원과 센강을 집앞
산책하듯 들릴 수 있고
루아시버스타는 곳이 가까워서
비행기 타러 갈 때 편히 갔어요
오페라근처에 쇼핑할곳도 많아서
여행 마지막에 이 숙소 묵으니 진짜
편했어요
*청결: 로미가 청소를 열심히 해준 게 느껴져요 처음 들어가면 생각보다 천장이 낮고 방이 노후되어 약간 놀라지만 볼수록 구석구석 깨끗합니다 침구를 세탁 후 다림질도 하는지 반듯하고 향이 났어요
*시설: 작은데 있을 게 다 있어요
드라이기 냉장고 옷걸이 등등 
콘센트도 침대 옆 적절한 위치에 있고
여행에 필수로 필요한 게 잘 갖춰져 있어요
다만 침대랑 작고 천장 낮아서
키 크신 분들은 조금 불편할수도..전 편했어요(160기준)
책상도 있고 조명도 있고천장에 창도 있어서
옥탑에 사는 가난하지만 로맨틱한 파리지앵
느낌 낼 수 있어요 ㅋㅋ 굿
*가격:진짜 굿 가성비 최고예요 
한인민박가격 비슷하지만 한인민박보다 완전 편하게 지낼 수 있어요 
한인민박도 묵어봤지만 밤늦게 씻거나 머리
말릴 때 불편했는데 여긴 지인짜 편했어요
이 위치에 이 가격 진짜 최고
*치안:약간 골목이라 아주 밤 늦게는 조금 
무서울 수 있지만 제가 갔던 파리 골목들
중에 안전한 편에 속했어요 
*친절도:상냥하고 친절해요 답장도 바로바로 줘서 편했어요 뭐든 도와준다하고
자세히 설명해줍니다
*팁: 다른 분들 얘기처럼 계단이 힘들어요
팔운동 맘먹고 가셔야할듯
그리고 뜨거운 물이 아주 펑펑펑 잘나오니
조심하세요 넘 뜨거워서 데일 수 있음 
전 좋았어요 뜨거운물 샤워 좋아해서
그리고 샤워하다 물이 바닥에 너무 튀어서
안마를까 걱정했는데 프랑스가 하도 건조해
한여름인데도 바짝 마르더라구요
걱정 안 하셔도 됩니다
중심중 초중심가 인데도 조용해서 
잠도 잘 잤어요 가성비가 정말 좋아요 추천!

I wasn’t sure what to expect, but the space was wonderful.  Romy is a fantastic host and I felt very comfortable.  The space was simple but clean and the location was unparalleled.  If you want a simple but great place to stay in Paris, look no further than this sweet property!  The skylight was my favourite part!
Good place. Very convenient and comfortable. A lot of restaurants and several metro nearby. Also the skylight is supercool and the privacy is secured. You can sleep under the sky of Paris.

If you’re a solo traveler that just wants a safe bed to sleep at each night this is the perfect place. It was right in the center off all the places you’d want to see in Paris-walkable or short subway ride away. It is a small room that doesn’t have AC, however that wasn’t a concern for me. Even during the hottest heat wave Paris has seen in a while, the room wasn’t too hot. I was able to sleep at night with the fan.  You’ll be crazy not to book this place!!

Romy is a super nice person and always reminds me of my families, she really helped me a lot when I traveled in Paris. Her room is clean and uncluttered, with complete equipments, also, very safe. And the location is close to Louvre Museum , you can take just 5-10 minutes walk to get there.

Great location, close to the Louvre, Palais Royale, shopping and food.  Robert and Romy's description about their place is accurate.  Perfect for one person who needs minimal attention and a few amenities in a prime location.  I also really liked how their place was very close to the Roissybus.  Very easy access to CDG Airport.  Thank you!

Robert and Romy’s small space is perfect for the short light traveler in Paris. Only a 10 minute walk to the Louvre and a short walk to train stations that can take you to just about anywhere in Paris on a single train ride makes it the most ideal location for somebody who has a lost to see with little time to do it. 

Although Romy had pre warned me about the space being quite small in regards to height and the staircase being quite narrow with respect to having a lot of luggage, I underestimated the difficulty of carrying my large suitcase up and down the flights of stairs. 

I was unfortunate that I didn’t get to me Robert but Romy’s personality would definitely make up for two people. She welcomed me with open arms and made me feel right at home instantly. 

I would stay here again if I were packing a lot lighter!

I was quite comfortable in this room. Great location. Close to everything. 
I can definitely recommend it to others.
Lovely, quite place in the centre of the Paris. Perfect for a shorter or longer stay. With tremendous, friendly hosts.

Location is excellent for a solo traveler under 178cm. If you like Japanese food, walking versus being a car/train, and like a quaint & clean spot this might be it for you. A+++, 5 stars, would stay again.

I met Romy and she was very kind.  She clued me in about the city and  answered many questions.  She even provided me with a little sunblock when the days got a bit bright.  The location is great,  just make sure you choose the correct location as the are two places with the same address and different zip codes.  The room and entry is a bit short but i'm 6'2" and managed fine.  The room setup is great,  but don't expect a standup shower, there is a tub with sprayer head.  The location is great and i'd gladly stay again.
Romy's room is perfect! You have privacy with your own bathroom. It s very central. Bed is comfortable. I recommend it!

Second time staying at Robert and Romy’s place and still such a wonderful experience. Close to major attractions, good restaurants and metro stations. Definitely the place to stay if you are after a decent nights rest and amazing hospitality. Romy you are an amazing host.
Romy was very sweet and a great host. Communication was easy and quick. The place is perfectly located and clean. Wifi is fast. Great for a single traveller.

Como lo indica el anuncio, el techo es bajo, pero nunca me hice la idea que tan bajo. Mido 1.63 y en la ducha tenia que estar agachada para poder bañarme te das la cabeza contra el techo. Si vas con valijas, tene en cuenta que son 3 pisos en escaleras MUY angostas, fue realmente una odisea. Lo bueno es que es limpio, y queda cerca de todo caminando
Lovely place

Right in the heart of the city! It was an amazing location. Romy and Robert are amazing hosts and make you feel right at home. It was a safe neighborhood which to me was important being a solo female traveller. A bus from the airport that takes you to the Opera which is a 5 minute walk from the accommodation. I was very happy with my stay. Tall people be warned the ceiling won’t be kind to you. I thought I’d struggle with a roof window but when it gets dark and you can lay on the bed and watch the stars, there is nothing better! Highly recommend staying here. 
Also as a side note don’t take big bags as the hallways are narrow to go up the stairs and there is a lot of them!

As advertised -- it was just what I needed for an overnight in Paris. It was a cozy room with a real Parisian flair.  Romy was there to check me in and provided helpful recommendations.  Strongly recommend for the solo traveller!

Friendly and very helpful host.  The studio is so well-located in the 2nd arrondissement near the Opéra that I didn’t use my Navigo card much.  The neighborhood has a lot of Japanese restaurants.  Romy explained some of the useful bus routes, was a great help managing train travel during this strike, and also gave excellent fashion advice.  Big skylight made the room feel larger.  Completely quiet up there.  She is an excellent host, and I hope to see her again!

Step back in time and have a true Paris experience sleeping under your own skylight up to the Paris sky - right out of La Boheme and walking distance to the Palace Garnier and the Louvre. Remy is a friendly and considerate host. A great spot for a single traveller who wants to be in the centre of it all.
I had a great short stay at Robert and Romy's place. It's cosy but has everything for one traveler. Great hosts, I would recommend that place.

Prime location in central Paris in the 2eme arrondissement close to Opera, Louvre, Tuileries Garden, Japanese Quarter and much more. The room is functional for people who are not over 5'11" otherwise you may bump your head on the ceiling. The bed is for a single person (120cm wide) but comfortable. The bath and toilet are in the same room without any wall separating them. Total space of room is about 4m by 4m. No elevator so you must climb narrow stairs to the top floor with your baggage which is okay as long as you are strong (capable) or have packed lightly. WiFi works well. The only natural light comes from the skylight (windowless room except for small skylight). Host Romy was welcoming and willing to accommodate me on my arrival time. I would not recommend this for a long stay in Paris unless you just want (need) a bed and plan to be out and about mostly while you are there.

Romy's place is in the very heart of the city and in a close walking distance to all places you might possibly want to visit. Room and the bed is a bit smaller than I expected, but you'll have no issues if you are a solo traveller.

Robert and Romy's place was perfect for my needs as a light-packing, solo traveler.  It's a small room and you need to be comfortable with climbing stairs. It's just a 5-minute walk from the Pyramides Metro stop and about 7 minutes from the Opera stop.  A++ location with cafes, bars, restaurants and anything you could possibly want or need in Paris within a 10-minute walk in any direction.  I didn't get to meet Robert, but Romy was very friendly and helpful and did everything she could to ensure I had all I needed for my stay.  I would definitely stay here again!
屋子位置很好,在一区opera附近,并且房东很照顾我,我入住的非常晚,而且房东法语英语都很好,其他语言就不了解了｡总之,还是很赞的｡
Humble spot with everything you need included. The location is incredible! Easy access to the Louvre and a direct bus to/from the airport.
Romy is very nice person. The room is good. And the location is perfect

The Host is SUPER KIND. They let me store my luggage up to 6pm after check-out. A lifesaver! the room only listed for 1 guest per room, but they let me and my wife stay for no extra charge! 

Great location, value for budget, great local tips, clean and reasonable amenities.

Only downside is that it's on the top floor (4th) without any elevator. So carrying heavy luggage up and down should be expected

Pictures are a bit outdated and take serious note about the stairs. Other than that the hosts are friendly and accommodating my needs for a later check in.

Location is central and almost everything is walking distance. Skylight was a beautiful touch to this small cozy room. I recommend this place if you aren’t looking for something fancy.
非常棒的一次住宿体验!地点位于一区巴黎市中心,到卢浮宫和奥赛博物馆都只需要10分钟,购物的话也是10分钟左右就能到达老佛爷百货｡周围有很多的咖啡馆和餐厅,不费劲的就可以体验美食｡房间干净整洁,自带卫生间,很方便｡值得一提的是房东Romy真的很热情好客!全程对我的问题回复都很快,沟通也很顺畅!这次舒适的住宿让我的巴黎之行增色不少!!

Romy is so thoughtful and caring—I had a very bad headache one morning and she brought me some of her own headache medicine and checked in to see how I was feeling later on. The place is small but very cute and cozy and has a wonderful bathtub that is amazing for a long day of walking! About a 10 minute walk to the Louvre and less than that to Palais Royale. Very happy I booked this room!
非常感谢房东的热情~房间的地理位置很好,很满意~
숙소의 위치나 청결함, 그리고 조용함도 다 좋았어요! 한가지... 숙소가 4층인데 좁은 계단으로 이루어져 있어서 짐이 무거우신 분들, 혹은 무겁게 귀국하실 분들은 피하시는 게 좋으실 것 같아요. 꽤 아찔했던 적이 있었답니다. 나머지는 좋아요. 욕조에 매일 바스 풀어 목욕하고 조용히 잠 잘 들었습니다. 로미도 친절합니다.
Super saubere Unterkunft mit allem was man braucht

Very nice place in Paris. 

1. The subway is very close 
2. You don't have to worry about food.(many restaurant)
3. It's close anywhere. 
4. Room is very romantic and warm. 
5. I feel like “I'm Parisian.”

I took the trunk and climbed the stairs, but I thought it was a good memory too.
Romy ist ganz besonders freundlich und hilfsbereit. Das Zimmer ist in Ordnung.  Die Lage ist optimal. Das Haus, in dem sich die Wohnung befindet,  ist allerdings in einem eher schlechten Zustand!

Perfect location. Seriously it doesn't get better than this in paris. Easy walk to the louvre and musee d'orsay. Close to the scenic old part of the siennes (don't know if I spelled it right, but the river). I spent a lot of the time just walking around- it was so beautiful. And Romy was a saint. I highly recommend this air bnb if you're traveling alone. Will definitely stay here again if I find myself in paris again.

Thoroughly enjoyed this little getaway in central Paris. Romy and I spoke regularly during my stay and shared a few good laughs. 

The room is described accurately and was located in a great part of the city. I had no issues taking many day trips to another Arrondissement’s of Paris.

Communication was very good and I felt confident that arrival and departure would be a smooth process (it was!).

Romy, continue to laugh and smile. You light up Paris with your fun attitude. See you another time!
Very nice host. Recommendable.
Great location and room is accurately described. Romy is very responsive and offers helpful tips.

First of all The location is good. The price is overvalued for what it is. It did feel like a prison. There are no windows so I was suffocated.  There is one skylight but if you open it there is chance of rain in winter. There is some external noise that is faint but disturbing to me.   

The stairways are complete dark so you need to carry a flashlight or from the phone  always. 

The floors are damaged from water it seems. They are raised in certain areas so you need to watch your step. 

The tub has no curtain so you have to very careful if taking shower. Don’t stand up in the tub, you will hit your head if you are a tall person. 

There is no cooking whatsoever.  There is a shared microwave if you want to use it. 

The ceiling is slanting so if you are 6 feet and above watch your head. The door is small so you need to watch it too. 

I had some issues with the mattress. My back was hurting the next day. The pillows are super thin so you want to bring your own. 

Overall not something I would like to experience in Paris the first time.

As others have said, this location is top notch and wonderfully located in the heart of many wonderful Paris sites. Romy was accommodating and kind, very accessible, and generous! Just one note, if you’re taller than 5’10ish it might be a tight fit in places~
Very good location and price.Nice place.Recomended.

Perfect little place for a solo trip to Paris! Great central location near Place Vendôme but also quiet street. The skylight in the room is a nice addition and Romy was very friendly and accommodating to me early arrival! Will be looking to stay again on my next visit to Paris :)

Romy... like everyone else says, is great! She greeted me at the door and we chatted for a bit but not in the intrusive way. As a super organized person myself, I appreciated the "handbook" that had all kinds of instructions and recommendations. Although I didn't take advantage of it as much as I could, I appreciated knowing that I had it close by.

The location was great and close to a lot. This was one of my main criteria when looking for places. It's right above a little shopping area so if you were a little tired but still wanted to walk around, it's actually a neat little shopping area. Also, if you're coming or going to CGD, this is also a great location. There's a super easy bus/shuttle that is a short 10-ish minute walk away and is only 12 euros. I took it a 5:30am and it took about 50 minutes. It was cheaper and easier than other options.

I'm fairly young and health so the stairs were fine with me but if you have a lot of luggage, are not ok with stairs, or just don't like being high up, it might not be the best place for you. Romy lets you know that (and I think it's in the description) but take note.

Overall, Romy was amazing, the place was quiet, clean, and I would definitely stay again if/when I make it back to Paris.

Great host. Very responsive. And a very cozy room right under the Parisian sky. The heater kept me warm. The private toilet and bathtub were great. The WiFi is a bit slow for Europe. My favorite part was the folder with useful information that the host prepared - love that extra level of attention and care.

El lugar esta a unos minutos del Louvre, cerca hay lugares económicos para comer, la habitación es pequeña pero muy cómoda y limpia además de tener lo necesario para una estancia corta. quizá si eres muy alto tendrás que agachar la cabeza en algunas zonas. cuenta con un  frigobar un escritorio y un closet, el baño y la habitación son un mismo cuarto, Romy fue una persona muy amable y atenta, regresaría a hospedarme ahí.
The location is so great that you can walk to many tourist attractions within 15 minutes. It is great for a solo traveller. The communication is good.

Romy was hands-down one of my favorite hosts ever. She was kind, helpful, and accommodating. The location was absolutely amazing. It is in close proximity to just about everything. The room is super cozy and comfortable and the skylight only enhances its inherent charm. My highest recommendation for staying in Paris for any amount of time.
Place was perfect for solo traveler. No frills, but near everything. Can walk to almost everything. Romi was very pleasant and helpful. Would recommend staying with her.

Romy is as sweet as pie and provided me with everything I needed. I had a very lovely and comfortable stay as I found the place to be just perfect for my 5'4 solo self.  Yes, the stairs are plentiful and narrow but as a backpacking traveler it was not a problem at all. I actually loved having the shower/toilet right there in the same room as it made it cozy and convenient. Extra blanket and heater kept me warm with cooler temperatures. Location is perfect as I was able to break up the overwhelming Louvre to multiple visits in one day.
Romy is special host, kind and helpful! Position is near opera. I stayed two Times and i hope to go the third!
Quite room, great location

Romy's place is nice for a solo trip in Paris, the location is very central:with variety of food, good connection of transportation, and it's quite at nite. The room is small but offers full independency. Romy is very helpful host, she's fast to response to my questions. It was a pleasant stay.

Excellent spot. Calm yet also centrally located. Can’t get much better than that. Romy and Robert are excellent hosts and accommodated my travel schedule. I would stay with them again. Merci!! À bientôt.

This wonderfully located room is exactly as described in the listing: small, spare, and up three flights of stairs yet centrally located, quiet, and with a private bathroom and really strong wifi. You are a ten minute walk from the Louvre and Jardin des Tuileries, a twenty minute walk from the Musee d'Orsay/Left Bank, and a thirty minute walk from Notre Dame. There are amazing boulangeries and bakeries, countless cafes and restaurants, and several grocery stores with takeaway/inexpensive to-go options in the immediate neighborhood. Both affordable and high-end shopping are close by. Further, you are five minutes away from a metro stop that can take you anywhere in Paris and Romy is very responsive and kind. You will feel you are genuinely living in Paris, rather than just visiting as a tourist.
+ close to metro  + solitary attic  + clean room  + friendly host  + bath time :)     - no elevator
Just as described, great location and very private.

This was a wonderful spot to lay my head in Paris. Centrally located, walkable to all the sights, and a truly hospitable host who is organized and includes a personal guide book. You won’t find a better located Airbnb in this town.

Robert and Romy's place is conviently based in central Paris, where you can easily walk to all main things worth to see I booked the place so late however check in was really flexible and I manage to do it quickly. Thank you for being such a nice and flexible host!
This place is strictly for light backpackers only.

Romy was very friendly and negotiated a better time fir check-in since my flight arrived early. The room is small and simple but exactly what I needed for my short visit to Paris. Great location and the bathtub was amazing at the end of long days of walking! Plus the little fridge gave me a chance to keep food for breakfast and packed lunches.

일단, 그 계단!! 정말 좁고 가파르고 힘듭니다. 저는 캐리어가 좀 크고 짐이 많아서 정말 힘들었습니다ㅠㅠ 특히 내려올때... 아차하면 병원 실려가겠구나 싶어서 온 몸에 힘을 주고 긴장해서 내려왔더니 다음날 몸이 정말 뻐근했어요. 짐 적게 가지고 가시거나 백팩으로 짐 싸신 분들에게 추천드립니다. 그리고 방은 정말 다락방인데.. 사실 사진보다는 좀 실망했습니다. 그래도 하루 묵기에 적당했고 호스트는 친절했습니다.

The place is wonderfully located in the middle of the centre! It is small but enough for 1p. There is some noise from outside but really NOT much and you can shield the skylight with a screen if you don't like the light at night.
The biggest plus, however, is Romy. She is an amazing hostess, super kind, communicates a lot with you if you want, she provides tips, ... I had a great stay and would def. recommend for other single travellers!

The room was lovely and cosy, and had everything you would need. Such a great location only a 10min walk to the Louvre. Romy was a great host who provided many useful local tips on places to see and eat. Excellent communication made it very easy to find the place. I would definitely stay again.
Lovely studio room that is extremely well located and private. I would highly recommend this for any single traveller.

This room was cozy and close to the central city.
Romy is so friendly and kind.
I want to use here again in the next time I visit Paris :)

A lovely little space in a really convenient part of town near great cafes and restaurants. Romy was a good host, polite and friendly - she made me feel very welcome. I'd really recommend this place for a lone traveller in Paris!
房东Romy非常热情和周到,对住户的问题有问必答,住房也非常靠近中心地带,离卢浮宫很近,最近的地铁站是pyramids三五分钟即可｡唯一的遗憾是房间的楼梯确实非常狭小,由于我带着24寸行李箱,所以非常失策,搬行李花了很多时间和体力,当然,其他方面都很好,尤其适合单独的旅行者｡
房间超级适合单人旅行者居住,应有尽有｡房东人超好,英语十分流利｡最好的是地理位置很棒,在市中心,很近就有地铁站,周边也很安全,晚上一个人回来也不怕~希望下次来还可以住在这里~

This little room with a skylight was charming for my short stay in Paris. The central location -- an easy walk from the Louvre -- was perfect for my limited time. Romy was great to communicate with and very accommodating.
Robert and Romy were so wonderful and the airbnb was perfect for one. The location is ideal, very close to the metro and the Seine. Highly recommend staying here!
Cute little apartment three floors up in the house are very friendly and very cordial and located near the Paris Opera House is centrally located
Beautiful room. Very minimalist and the perfect place to crash after a long day outside.
This is a lovely room in a beatiful area. I was comfortable, the place was cute,  and Romy was very helpful and nice! A perfect little refuge for a Parisian adventure.
Great spot, close to a lot of great parts of Paris and walkable to public transit.   The room was super quiet and clean,  Ramy was very friendly and accommodating.
the location is really good

짐들고올라가는계단높이장난아니구요, 위치는 좋습니다. 근데 방안에 있는 수건 쓰지 마세요ㅋㅋ 다썼다가 추가요금 엄청 물었어요. 목욕할수있는건좋은데, 호스트는 딱히 친절하지도 불친절하지도 않습니다. 바로 옆방에 있는데 티비보는 소리 다 들리고 맛집추천해즌다거나 이론건 다 파일하나 주고 끝나요. 도움되셨길! 아 주변에 아시아 음식점이 많아요. 아시아인지구인것같아요
The place was in central paris, excellent location

This was my first ever Airbnb stay and it was excellent! 

First, I want to say that Robert & Romy were very helpful with the information needed to arrive at the unit. This was my very first time in Paris so trust me, this helped a lot. Also, Romy met me at the unit at the time of my check-in and was very helpful with suggestions on what to do and where to eat.

The neighborhood is absolutely stunning. I am from Chicago so I am used to public art and incredible architecture but my jaw dropped when I saw the Palais Garnier.

As for the unit, it was very clean, cozy, and unique. It is on the top floor but the stairs were easy to get up and down. The bath, sink, and toilet are all in unit which is very convenient. However, the skylight really sets this unit apart as it offered a great view and lots of fresh air.

I only stayed for one night as I was traveling to Spain the next day, so it was perfect for me. The price, convenience of location, and coziness all helped to make my first night in Paris a memorable one. Thanks again for being such great hosts!
Small but fine.
I enjoyed my short stay in Paris in this cute apartment. Would recommend for single traveler looking to spend time out and about in Paris

Romy was a great host! I really enjoyed exploring Paris with her suggestions. I am six foot tall so the tub/bath/shower head situation was definitely a difficult feat but it's worth it for the location!

Nice flat in the middle of Paris. As described in the room specifications;  the flat it is not made for too tall persons as the ceiling is low. The room is clean and have everything I needed. The host is super friendly and available if needed! 
Highly recommended

Thank you Romy for everything! The skylit window was beautiful. It was so nice to come back to take a relaxing bath with the skylight window open. She was close by so when I had questions she could help. Merci beaucoup!
Romy is a good host, helpful and very responsive!  The room is clean and has all the basic needs.  I appreciate also its location being so central and convenient!

Wonderful little nook in the perfect location in Paris. Everything was clean, and the host is lovely - very kind, helpful, and accommodating. It gets quite hot during the summer, which is normal for a Parisian apartment under the roof. An info for couples who are maybe considering this room: the shower (without shower curtain) and toilet are right in the room without a door (the toilet is somewhat hidden behind a wall, though). The room is bright with lots of natural light - I enjoyed staying here by myself and would stay again on short trips to Paris!
This is an excellent find! Such a perfect location for Paris! Great recommendations for local spots and the room has everything, a perfect little suite for one. The skylight provided nice air!
Romy is so friendly and kind.  Very helpful too! Her flat is in the middle of Paris yet at night it was like sleeping in the country -- so quiet!

Romy was lovely and her place is divine. So special to have your own bathroom! Great to have a soak after a long day sightseeing. It is centrally located close to public transport. Romy was a great help with advice and speaks English which was important for me. Her restaurant recommendations were also tops. Highly recommended for a single traveller. Thanks Romy!

Robert and Romy's place was fine. Romy was very welcoming. She also provides you with a binder full of information on where to eat, things to do, and etc.  

The bedroom comes with the basic necessities. It has a bed, bathtub (no shower), toilet, mini fridge, and a table. It was comfy. You do have to climb lots of stairs, so make sure you don't have a lot of luggage with you. 

The location is great and walking distance from everything.

Romy's apartment is absolutely perfect for the solo traveller looking to explore Paris ! Literally 5 mins from the louvre and walkable to many other top tourist spots ! Romy will also give you tons of suggestions on anything you could ask for in Paris ! (Restaurants, shops, etc) I highly recommend her Airbnb, I had a fantastic time.

This was my first Air BnB experience, and it went smoothly. I chose Robert and Romy's place because it had received favorable reviews from solo female travelers (like me), was conveniently located, and provided everything I needed for my 6-day stay in Paris at a reasonable price. Romy was there to greet me at check in and spoke English well (important for me because I don't know much French). I felt safe in the room and when walking around in the neighborhood, even late at night. There are a lot of public transport options nearby (bus, metro, Vélib' bike rentals) and so much to see within walking distance. I'd stay there again.
Excelente, buena ubicación cerca de todo. Lugar tranquilo y romy una persona súper educada. Lo recomiendo para personas solas!

The location of the Airbnb was amazing!!! It's centrally located and very easy to get to all the famous attractions. Romy was very friendly and helpful. When I got there she gave me a folder of tips and recommendations on where to eat! The room was clean and it feels like you have your own place because you don't share a shower or bathroom with anyone! I would definitely stay here again if I'm traveling to Paris again! I definitely recommend it!

Perfect, quiet space. Great little unit for 1 person who is traveling light. The stairwell is very small and steep (do not bring your luggage). Romy is the perfect host and made sure I was comfortable. She offered some great suggestions on places to eat and people watch. Location is very central to the Opera/shopping district and is super easy to get to from the CDG airport.

The flat is in the golden location of Paris, I could walk to the louvre museum whenever I want, it's like within 10 mins, the lots of other famous spot could be arrived by walking as well, plus lots of cafe restaurant around. The room may a bit small but enough for single traveler, and it'a clean. The most important thing is host Romy was very kind to me! So moved that when I was traveling alone to the strange country and got the key where Romy left, it says welcome to Paris and make yourself at home outside of the envelop, I did feel like home.
Great stay!
중심지에 위치하여 어디든 쉽게 접근할수 있어 편리합니다.

The room is clean, cozy and comfortable. Everything in good condition. Close to all the "must see" in Paris. Highly recommend for solo traveller. Host is kind, very helpful and generous. I will come back.
Romy는 정말 친절했고 방도 정말 좋았습니다. 천장에 있는 창문이 생각보다 새로웠고, 날씨가 좋아서 기분도 좋았습니다. 엘리베이터가 없기 때문에 무거운 짐이 있으시면 계단에서 조심해서 이동하세요!
Romy made me feel right at home and made sure I had everything I needed. 10/10 would stay here again :)
Small, clean space. Great location. Perfect for one person.
위치적으로는 관광지랑 가까워서 좋습니다. 근데 다만.. 진짜 계단이 많아서 제가 짐이 좀 무거운 편이기도 했는데 짐 싸실때 가볍게 싸셔야 할 것 같아요. 그리고 비앤비 상에 오픈된 주소와 실제 주소가 다르기 때문에 정확한 주소 받으셔야 찾아가실 수 있어요. 완벽하게 개인 룸이라서 편하게 지내다가 왔네요~ 저는 좋았습니다!

로미의 방은 정말 위치가 좋아요. 오페라 바로 근처에 위치해있어서 어디든 걸어갈 수 있었어요. 중심지에 위치해 있지만 밤이면 조용하게 지낼 수 있어요. 편안하게 휴식할 곳을 찾는다면 여기가 딱이네요! :-) 
한국 기준으로 4층에 위치한 다락방이라 엘리베이터가 없어서 무거운 캐리어를 들고 올라가려면 힘을 좀 써야하긴 하지만, 그래도 그걸 다 감수할 만큼 좋았습니다 저는. :-) 
아침마다 날씨가 좋아서 천장에 난 창으로 볕이 쏟아지는걸 보는게 참 행복했어요. 

그리고 로미는 정말 친절했어요. 뭐든 필요한거 있으면 다 말하라고 하고, 지금껏 만난 호스트들 중에서 최고의 호스트였어요! 

이미 인기 숙소가 되어서 제가 이런 후기 작성 안해도 많이들 방문하실 것 같지만 그래도 강력추천합니다! :-) 

Merci Romy!
Very nice! The area is perfect, closed Opera.

Everything went smoothly, from check in to check out. Room was clean and well set up. However the room was smaller than I thought it would be, mainly the ceiling was quite low, making it a mission to use the bath. Other than that it was a pleasant stay with no main issues. Would recommend for anyone looking for something minimal and if you don't plan on spending much time in the room. Oh and the host is great, responds quickly and was nice.

Room is exactly as pictured. It's perfect for one person. I didn't meet Robert, but Romy was so nice and very accommodating when I asked to drop my bags off early. She was so friendly and made me feel right at home. The location is great, very close to public transit, also within walking distance to many sights along the Seine. I would definitely recommend staying here to any solo traveler!

Romy is a really nice person and a good host. The room is very central. The access to the room is very narrow so you can't have big luggage, but with a backpack it will be fine. Basic cooking for breakfast is possible. Romy give good advice and recommendations what to do and where to find everything. I can recommend her as host.

Lovely isolated room up in the sky. Lovely hostess upon arrival. Took time to explain everything. Even allowed a late check out. ( There was no guest after my booking.) Be warned. The steps are very steep. No heavy suitcases!
Excelent location, easy to get there, marvelous communication, very clean, very comfortable, friendly people, makes you feel right at home. I already want to go back. Would recommend every time

위치가 우선 좋아요 호스트도 굉장히 친절하구요 
혼자 지내기 딱 좋은 정도의 크기 그런데 화장실과 방이 분리형이 아녜요 가릴 수 있는 커튼 하나 정도는 있을줄 알았는데 그것도 없었어요 그래서 간혹 화장실 냄새가 나더라구요 그거 빼곤 좋았어요

What a wonderful room! The skylight is amazing!! It was so peaceful to fall asleep beneath the stars. Easy check in, comfortable bed, private bathroom, great location, great price. Don't hesitate to book!

우선 위치가 너무 좋습니다! 루브르, 오페라, 라파예트, 노틀담 등 에펠탑 빼고는 웬만한 파리 스팟들은 갔다오실수 있어요! 또한 한국분들은 근처에 한식당이나 한인마트가 있기 때문에 한국음식 생각나시면 쉽게 구할수 있으실거 같아요! 아! 물론 단점도 존재합니다. 우선 4층?정도를 리프트없이 올라가야합니다. 또한 키큰 남자분들에게는 샤워할 때 다소 불편할 수 있습니다. 하지만 이 모든 것을 숙소의 위치가 상쇄시킬정도로 너무나도 좋았습니다. Romy 역시 너무 kind했구요! 강추합니다!!

This apartment is centrally located to much of what tourists go to Paris to see. You can easily walk to some of the most significant sights. The neighborhood, in the second arrondissement, is very nice with plenty of restaurants, grocery stores, and neighborhood retail. 

The apartment itself is cozy, at the top floor of an old historic building. If you are quite tall, you may be a bit uncomfortable as the slanted roof is quite short in some places. You should also note that the bath has no shower. Other than that, the room is well equipped and the wifi is strong.
Great, small Studio. About 45min walk to most sites. Romy is a great host with good english. Great value for the price!
캐리어를 가지고 계단을 오르고 내려오는건 두번째에도 매우 힘들었지만 조용하고 편했다! 오페라역 인근에 방을 잡은건 정말 잘한일 인것같다!
사진 그대로이고 조용해서 좋았어요. 다만 벽에 흰 페인트칠이 자꾸 묻어나서 어떻게 묻게 되는건진 모르겠는데 잠옷에도 묻고 외출하고 보니 바지에도 묻어있고.. 그런 점 빼고는 위치도 정말 좋고 혼자서 지내기에 더할나위없이 좋았습니다!

숙소는 아주 좋았습니다. 저렴하고, 위치도 좋아요.
오페라가 근처라 왠만한 상점도 근처에 다 있습니다.문제는 예약하고 airbnb에서 알려주는 위치는 실제와 다르다는 겁니다.
airbnb에서 표기하는 위치는 무시하고 호스트가 알려주는 주소로 찾아서 가시면 됩니다.
오페라 가 스타벅스 를 찾아서 오른쪽으로 끼고 들어가면 그 다음부터는 찾기 쉬워요. 아니면 지도에서 '아리아리' 찾아가면 됨. 바로 옆집임.
위치 좋아요.  날씨만 좋으면 루브르~노트르담까지 걸어갈 수 있을 것 같아요! 그런데 자신의 짐이 24인치 이상이다! 하면 다시한번 고려해보세요! 제가 21인치 가져왔는데도 힘들었어요. 3층(한국으론 4층)을 캐리어들고 올라가고 내려와야해요 !
The host canceled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

혼자하는 여행은 처음이라 찾아가는것 부터 걱정이었는데 정말 친절하게 위치도 알려주었어요! 위치는 두말할것 없이 최고입니다! 한번도 지하철이나 버스를 탄적이 없을정도에욯ㅎㅎ 공항에서 루아시버스타고 오페라에서 내리면 도보로 10분정도면 집앞이구용!
다만 맨 윗층인 방까지 올라갈때 계단이 성인한명이 서면 꽉 찰 공간이라 캐리어를 들고 올라가고 내려오기 힘들고 불편하긴했어요ㅠㅠ 샤워할때도 커튼이 없어서 물이 침대로 튈까 조심조심했구요
그래도 혼자 지내기에는 딱 좋은 방이었습니다. 2월에 또 다시 방문할 계획이에요!
Just as advertised, this place is in a great location! As a young, female student, I felt very safe staying at Romy's. She was incredibly accommodating and was readily available. Highly recommend!

Absolutely loved staying at Robert and Romy's apartment. Was nice and cosy on the cold nights and I enjoyed the skylight. The apartment is very central and was withing walking distance to many of the sights. Enjoyed chatting to Romy and found her suggestions and tips very helpful. Highly recommend staying here.

This listing is close to the metro station, restaurants, and its located central to the Opera house and the Louvre. The listing is exactly how the host describes it. The host was amazing, as she provides thorough instructions on items within the room and instructions on how to get around the city. This listing is a win- win!

Fantastic experience in Paris with Romy :D Love you Romy & Paris. Thanks. 
로미와 같이 밥도 먹고 좋았어요 ^^
일주일의 파리 여행은 완벽했음 !
무거운 캐리어를 들고 올라가긴 했지만 :-)

Robert and Romy's place is just perfect. I travelled alone and it was really comfortable, I only used the metro a few times, I walked everywhere, all you need and all beautiful places in Paris are near from R&R's place. Also, Romy is very kind, lovely and excellent host. I did't have any problem!!!! ❤️❤️
위치 정말 좋고 혼자 지내기 너무 편했어요 다만 엘리베이터가 없고 계단이 좁아서 큰 캐리어를 들고 올라가기엔 좀 힘듭니다. 그외엔  다 좋았어요 욕실도 깨끗하고 인터넷도 잘되네요.

Romy was already waiting for me and I arrived on time. The apartment looks like you can see on the picture, the skylight ❤️. Top with the bath, after being the whole day walking was amazing to find a hot bath. The stairs are like they describe. The location of the apartment was perfect, i could walk everywhere, I didn't take any bus, metro... if I can back to Paris I will try to book with them again.
Romy was really helpful and nice. The location was close to the metro stations. Walking distance to most of the sights. Recommend
small and smart
Great stay

This place was perfect for my weekend trip to Paris! The room had everything you could need for a comfortable stay plus more. As a female solo traveller I would highly recommend Romy's place as it a 30 second walk off a main street and even at night I felt safe coming home by myself. It is very well located if you either want to walk Paris or catch the metro. Overall, I would definitely recommend this place to any solo traveller in Paris!
Romy is a fantastic host! Very good position, a lot of comfort and super good price!
이렇게 작은 방에 있을건 다 있는게 신기했어요. 파리에 나만의 작은 아파트가 생긴것 같았어요. 드라이기가 있어서 이용 잘 했어요. 밤에 히터키면 따뜻해요. 바로 근처에 빵가게랑 한식집 일식집 있어 먹고 싶을때 바로 가서 먹었어요. 처음엔 살짝 누추해보였는데 지내다보니 정말 잘 골랐단 생각 들었어요.
