위치가 정말 좋습니다. 특히 버스정류장이 여럿 근처에 있어 왠만한 곳은 버스 한 번에 갈 수 있죠. 먼지 하나 없는 깨끗함은 아니지만 청결도는 합격 수준이고 욕실이 방안에 있어 걱정했지만 냄새나 습기로 곤란을 겪은 일은 없습니다. 들이 쓰기에눈 불편하겠지만 혼자 쓰기에는 꽤 괜찮았습니다.

It was great to get to know Romy a bit.  She is intelligent, sophisticated, fun, and knowledgable, and we formed a quick bond.  We went out to dinner together, and she chose a great neighborhood restaurant.  The skylight is the window in the room, and it is fun to see the sky change in the mornings and evening.  The location is perfect. I walked everywhere; I only too the subway to visit a friend in the 19th arrondissement and to go  to get a train to Chartres.  Romy is clear about the walk-up and the narrow staircase in her ad.  That is a definite consideration.  Pack light and be prepared for stairs, and you'll have a perfect  stay.  Romy jokingly told me that the staircase was a "stair master."  I'm 67, and in good enough shape; it really was no problem.
房子位置很好 离卢浮宫香榭丽舍都很近 走路10分钟左右｡地理位置也很安全,晚上8点多一个人回来,楼下还有很多行人｡可能因为位置太中心,价格这么便宜,条件不能奢望太多｡房间比较小,是个阁楼,只有天花板有一扇窗｡楼梯很窄｡卫生条件还算可以,床品应该不是一客一换,因为我发现枕头上有头发｡
Very convenient location. Walking distance to the Louvre, Opera. Love the Skylight!

I arrived very early in the morning and Romy was able to accomodate and have the room ready early. She was very responsive and made sure I had everything I needed as well as some great recommendations for where to get breakfast/lunch. 

The location was perfect. I was able to walk almost everywhere and felt very safe as a solo woman traveler.  I would for sure stay here again if/when I return to Paris!
Very close to the Louvre and Champs elysees, lovely skylight, fast wifi, a very interesting house.

Romy very friendly and helpful. 
The room was comfortable !
The most important is that room  had best location in Paris !
If u travel along this is a great room for u. Recommend !

엘리베이터가 없어서 캐리어를 들고 올라갈때 내려갈때는 힘들었다
위치가 좋았다 오페라역에서 조금 떨어져있는 피라미드역에서 도보 3분정도면 갈 수 있고 루브르나 오르세는 걸어서 이삼십분이면 갈수있다. 집 근처에 한인식당과 마트가 많아 자주갔었다
오페라역에서 샤를드골공항으로가는 버스도 있어서 위치는 정말 좋았다 덕분에 무거운캐리어를 들고 에스컬레이터없는 지하철을 거치지않고 지상으로 다닐 수 있는 거리였다
그래도 혼자 편히 휴식할 수 있어서 좋았고 에어비앤비가 처음이여서 조금 무서웠었는데 romy는 좋은 사람이였고 집도 괜찮았다

Romy was such a wonderful host, very kind and helpful! The apartment itself was great--it really was like having my own apartment in Paris! Within the room was my own bathroom, sink, and bathtub. I greatly appreciated the extra amenities, in particular the refrigerator so I could bring back all the fruits and cheese in Paris. The apartment was in a great central location, I ended up walking to a lot of places nearby including the Louvre, bakeries, restaurants, shops, etc. etc. and there were metro stations and bus stops within a few blocks.  I often came back at 2am and felt completely safe walking, which was very important! This apartment is well suited for a light traveler as Romy does live in the top floor, but it was perfect for me as I was traveling light. The only qualm I had was that there wasn't air conditioning in the room but once I put the skylight to use, everything felt much, much better.

Overall, I highly recommend staying with Romy: wonderful person, great location, private apartment, and the right price. Thanks so much Romy for your hospitality!

Romy was a good host. Her reply was quick and she let me know in advance when she was home so she could let me in when I arrive. The room is as described and great for a single occupant as the room has an open plan bath and toilet. The location was prefect - close to public transport with plenty of shops and is in a safe neighbourhood. All in all a great place for a short stay in Paris and will recommend for solo travellers.

I loved everything about the room, the open concept w/ the bath & the skylight, it was super charming! Romy was super friendly and made me feel right at home. The neighbourhood is great, v convenient access to two metro lines and walking distance from lots of great attractions including the Louvre/Jardin des Tuileries. And yet it's lovely and quiet and felt absolutely safe. Perfect for the solo traveler. The only thing I'd say is that the staircase up IS really narrow & winding so do not bring a large/heavy suitcase here! I would definitely stay here again if I return to Paris.

Host is very kindness. The room is very clean and convenience. I couldn't use my portable wifi in this room . There isn't room wifi. 
The good point is that I can use bathtub and toilet,I don't have to share them.

Robert and Romy's place was a perfect home base for touring the highlights of Paris. It's conveniently located near a metro stop and there are several cafes close by. You feel like a local in their neighborhood. Romy provided excellent suggestions of places to eat and check out. We chatted for a while when I showed up and made me feel right at home. I would definitely stay there on my next visit to Paris.

Romy is a fantastic host. Speaking perfect English, she is enthusiastically welcoming and helped me a lot with my travel to her apartment from CDG airport.  During my short stay, Romy's hospitability has made my stay comfortable and never bored by recommending many good places to go to in the area. 

Not only was Romy's apartment clean, cosy and located in the heart of Paris 1ere arrondissement, it has everything that you need from adaptors to a bathtub, basically it was more than how the photos look as it was just like home in another country for me! Romy's apartment is located 10 minute's walk away from Opéra, and Place Vendôme, so it is very convenient for travellers looking to visit the best of the city! The area is very safe and beautiful as well at night. If you'd like to experience typical Parisian nightlife, there are some very good local wine caves and restaurants with fantastic food that open till late just 10 minutes away on Place du Marché Saint-Honoré. If you are more into French patisseries, you could find some artisan bakeries in the area too. 

I would strongly recommend Romy's place for any lightly-packed sole traveller who is looking for a fully-equipped place to stay in the wonderful city. Thanks so much Romy for this amazing experience. Looking forward to seeing you again!
Great place for single travelers. A few blocks away from places such a louvre, and the metro is nearby too. The host in incredibly nice and supportive.

It was nice room. Own shower and toillet were in there, calm and safety place it was. Location was perfect, heart of paris took only 10 min to Luvre from there. 
긍데 샤워는 좀 그래요.. 커튼이 없어서 조심조심해야하고 키 165이상 여자분은 샤워힘들어요.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is my first time using Airbnb, although there was a delay in entering the apartment, still a nice experience. Thanks Robert and Romy their prompt reply, and the house keeper they are very kind person.  Everything in the apartment is well arranged, and the location is very convenient for visiting places. The only thing I am not happy with is the narrow staircase, cuz I have taken many luggage with me which makes me so exhausted to take them up-/downstairs. But this apartment is really a nice place to stay!
条件不错,房东也很好,地理位置也好,交通方便,在歌剧院和卢浮宫中间,出门2分钟就是地铁,不提供早餐,我五百多元定的一晚,个人认为价格高啦,比之前的民宿价格都高,条件却差不多!
Romy is a great host! She really knows Paris and I highly recommend staying with her!

Romy was a wonderful host. The studio is perfectly situated in the heart of Paris. Louvre, Opéra or Palais Royal are in walking distance. The studio itself is nice, cosy, clean and very quiet. I would recommend Romy’s apartment anytime.

추천. 꼭대기에 다락방같이된곳인데 욕조 변기 세면대 책상 침대 다 원룸처럼 되어있어서 편하게 생활하기에 적합하다. 천장에 큰창문으로 빛도 잘 들어오고 바람도 들어온다. 내가갔을땐 36도의 미친날씨라서 너무더웠지만 평균 파리기온이라면 선풍기가 없어도 충분히 생활할 수 있을 것이다.
호스트는 굉장히 친절하고 방도 깔끔하다. 혼자 조용히 쉬고싶은 여행객에게 강력추천.

The room was remarkably quiet, especially given the convenient location. It's only a simple bus trip from at least three train stations: Nord, Est, and Montparnasse. 

The room is clean and comfortable, though modest. However, a tall person (over 6' or 180 cm) might not enjoy it. 

I would gladly stay here again.
Great, cozy room in the heart of Paris just moments away from the Louvre and the Seine river. Romy was a such a beautiful host, so welcoming and offering to assist if needed. Can't wait to come back.

Romy was such an excellent host. I had a medical issue while staying with her, and she was very understanding and helpful. 

As for the lodging, the room was as described and the bed was very comfortable. The apartment is in an excellent location and is easily accessible via public transit. 

I highly recommend staying with Romy!
Just lovely to stay at Romy's, fantastic location and all in place, totally recommended...

Romy is very kind and thoughful. She assisted me the best way she can, from getting around paris to suggesting good restos and must-see spots. The room is incredibly nice and clean. I love that the room have skylight. The location was very good too its few minutes walk from louvre and other famous sites, its right in the heart of the city center so its easy to go around by just walking. My paris stay felt extra special bc of romy and her beautiful apartment.
Really fantastic location, only a few minutes away from the Louvre! Romy was extremely kind and helpful, and everything was very clean and well provided for.

This is my first time in France and in Paris.
Romy is really nice, and willing to share private attractions with me. As for the room, it's a fantastic place, since it convenient but DO quite! No need more words to say how impressive the skylight is. ((; Thank you so much!
I felt very welcome. Romy was so warm and gave me a run down of the neighborhood and great places to eat nearby. The room definitely is cozy and private and exactly what I needed during my stay.
The room was neat and cozy. Romy is really friendly host.
very friendly welcome, nice and special little one-room apartment, enjoyed my stay.
Great place. Amazing location! Romy was very lovely and welcoming. I had a nice stay.

Квартира Роми находится в самом центре Города, 5 минут пешком до Гранд Оперы (Автобус из аэропорта CDG Roissy Bus прибывает как раз к зданию Оперы - угол улиц rue Scribe и rue Auber, а это очень удобно) и 10 минут спокойным шагом до Лувра и набережной Сены. Сам дом немного удален от шумной улицы, поэтому в комнате очень тихо. Комната очень маленькая, но это было очень удобно, т.к. все вещи - под рукой. Вход в комнату - отдельный со своим собственным ключом. Удобная кровать. Окно в потолке (sky-window) добавляет колорита. Сама Роми очень доброжелательная и позитивная, ответит на все ваши вопросы. Квартира находится на верхнем этаже, и есть один нюанс - очень узкая лестница, что может быть сложностью, если у вас большой багаж. Определенно вернулась бы снова :))
Great location and the room is very comfortable. Also just a short walk from where the Roissybus picks up and drops off. Would definitely stay there again.
Romy was an amazing host-welcoming and generous. The room is perfect, as is the location.

It was the best experience I had so far with airbnb ! Romy was very kind, charming and accommodating host and I felt right at home. The apartment is centrally located with lots of great restaurants and shops around. The room is clean and gives you the privacy to come and go as you please. Many sights are within a walking distance and metro/ buses are just few steps away.  I will definitely be back  - thank you Romy !

Romy was extremely friendly and inviting. The room is small, but it was all the space I needed for two days in Paris. The bed was comfortable and the skylight was nice to have. There were items you could use to cook, make coffee or tea with. The location was perfect- Very close to the Louvre. I could also get around the city very easily and there were so many great restaurants and shops nearby. I would definitely stay again!

Robert and Romy's place was very clean and very central. Romy was there to meet me and explain about the place. Only issue was that it was in the 3rd floor and with my luggage it was bit of a struggle to climb 3 floors. Apart from that it was perfect for me. It is good for a single person. I would recommend the place and use it again.

The room is located nice place!

Since it has a bathtub and toilet in the room it was comfortable!

And she was so charming that I could relax !

Romy and Robert's place is the quintessential old tiny Paris apartment in a great area full of restaurants and beautiful shops. Easy to walk almost anywhere in central Paris. Updated  bathroom with lovely bathtub for a long hot bath after traveling.  Comfy (single) bed. Nice and clean. Thank you!
Great room, it literally has everything you need. Great location as well and the host is very friendly and charming. Def recommend
What a wonderful stay I had!! I was feeling a little overwhelmed in Paris but Romy easier my mind and made me feel right at home! Couldn't have asked for a better location or host

Romy's place was great, I enjoyed my stay very much! She kindly greeted me when I arrived and provided me with maps of Paris and gave me tips on where to go and eat. She was a great host, so kind and friendly. The place was in a great location, very centrally located to everything in Paris. The room was also perfect for one person. It was very clean and had plenty of space with a mini fridge, its own bathroom, and a very comfortable bed. Romy even let me keep my bags at her place after I checked out so I could travel around the city more, which I greatly appreciated. I definitely recommend staying at Romy's place. I couldn't have had a better stay in Paris!

Very quiet and clean room with all you need to sleep in Paris. Good situation need metro and around restaurants. I would really recommend the place. Romy was there when I arrived and was very friendly.

Nice little and cosy apartment near the Opera. All you need if you just need a place to sleep and walk around during day time.
Although I haven't met Robert and Romy everything was arranged as planned.
Pascal

Rome was very helpful when I arrived at the room, with lots of tips on where to get food and places to go. The room was great- as described in the listing. I'm tall and the ceiling is a little low (as its in the roof of the building) but I didn't find that a problem. had an amazing time in Paris and when I come back, I'd love to stay in this room again! Thanks so much.

I enjoyed staying !! She was very welcoming.
I can go to central city,for example,Musée du Louvre for about 15 minutes.This is a great experience for me. Thank you!!

This is the best Airbnb-experience I've had so far! The room is exactly as described - very neat and cozy, and everything one needs for a few days in Paris. Romy was so nice, I wish I could've stayed longer in Paris at her place! We had a few talks and laughs together during my stay, and it was just great! She always responded quickly to all my questions both before and during my stay.
I highly recommend to stay here! It was just great - thanks for now :)
Romy was very accommodating. The room was clean and cosy and the location is fantastic. If I return as a solo traveller I'd definitely stay again!

Booked last minute! Communication was efficient and made my last minute trip very easy. The room was very private and quiet. Love the neighborhood, as it was easy to get to many known places and in a lively area but still quiet once you're in the room. Rob and Romy are lovely hosts - helpful, friendly and flexible. Would stay again!
Private and cleaned room.   Very central but in a quiet area.  Only disadvantage is that it is a single bed.

perfect location , really quiet
Romy is a very nice  host

Communication went smooth. Description accurate (even though I failed to read most of it before booking, so just had another look). It's a small room, very central, but if that's what you look for, you'll get it. Thank you.

Nice compact one bed apartment in a great location in Paris. Romy and Robert made me feel very welcome. Ideal place to stay for a short trip. I would stay there again. To access the apartment, you need to climb 4 flights of stairs so not suitable for all travelers.

I enjoyed staying at Rommy and Rob. Their place is really well located and easy access. It's a typical Parisian apartment petit and welcoming hehehe

The place has everything you need and it's extremely private, just pointing out this for those who value it hehehe.

Rommy was very easy to communicate with and everything met my expectations.

THANKS!

A very accurate description. Rome welcomed me even with an early morning arrival. The location is great, being right in the theater district and by the Paris Opera.

It was also very convenient to take the Roissy bus from the airport and then walked over!

This is the perfect spot if your priorities are location and a bed for the night. The room is cozy but everything you need is there, and for a few nights that is really it. The place was spotless and the bed was a dream to sleep on. Romy was friendly and extremely helpful.  The only things to be aware of is that they are serious about the stairs, very narrow and there are a lot so you will get a workout dragging your stuff upstairs! And the walls are thin so occasionally soubd carries. I would definitely recommend and would be happy to stay here again.

Romy was the perfect host.  She greeted me and welcomed me into her home as if we had known each other for years.  Though I rarely saw Romy during my stay in Paris she checked in with me to make sure I was doing well.  The room was a great spot, and the location was perfect.

Romy was super accommodating allowing me to drop my bags off early, even though the room was currently occupied, which prevented me from lugging my 70+ pounds of luggage around Paris.  The room has good space and is nicely stocked with supplies for a stay.  

While the room does have a skylight, there is no window, so it is a limited view.  Also in I believe typical European fashion, there is only a tub and a handheld shower head, so you have to be careful when showering or you will spray the entire room with water, I found sitting in the tub worked best.

I had a wonderful stay in Robert and Romy's apartment. Unfortunately I was only there one night, but the space is perfect for a single traveller who wants to be out exploring the city and needs a central location to crash. The apartment is super clean and has everything you need. The area was really safe and there are places all around to grab breakfast. It was just a 5 minute walk to The Louvre. There are bus stations close by, but I walked down from Gare du Nord in 20 mins or so. I only had a small bag, so the long staircase wasn't an issue for me, but I can see someone with a big case struggling to make it up! Communication was super easy and all the instructions were easy to follow. I chatted with Romy when I grabbed the keys and she was really helpful in making suggestions for my visit. Overall a great AirBnB experience and would definitely recommend to anyone and would stay here again.

Amazing place! Super comfortable bed! Very friendly and helpful! I hope all the AirBnbs I stay in are like this one! Would definitely recommend! And if I'm ever in the area I would hope to stay again!

Romy was a great host, friendly, communicative, efficient, flexible, and made the stay super easy for me. The room is nice and clean, a perfect pied à terre for me as I was only staying one night. I had a really good night's sleep too! Thanks Romy

Romy was very accommodating and was flexible with my departure due to not having another guest on my check out date. I was very grateful for this, even just an extra few hours so I can explore Paris without a huge backpack. The location of the place is very central and  accessible. I would stay there again.
The room was perfect for my stay, centrally located and close to major sightseeing. Clean, cozy and simple. Romy was very heplful and easy to communicate with. Would definitely stay here again.

Excellent location within walking distance near the Louvre and  5 mins walk to Pyramides train station. The neighboring streets are well-lit and there are people walking around at 9pm. 

This is a safe and quiet attic room located up a flight of stairs and behind a hallway door. Host is friendly and well prepared. You will find written instructions placed on the room table for nearby supermarkets (long stays) or bakery locations (breakfast).

Romy was a kind and thoughtful host. I felt safe at her place. She made me feel comfortable, when Paris was locked down. The room was easy to get to, close to Opera Garnier, where the Phantom was said to live, where the Roissy bus from CDG lets off. The room was clean and had a charming skylight, and a refrigerator! If you can handle lots of stairs and no elevator, and if location is the most important consideration, this is the room for you.

Romy is an excellent host. She welcomed me when I arrived and showed me the room. She listed everything you need to know on a paper so it is easy to find all the information. She was able to accommodate my needs (leave my big suitcase one a few more hours after checkout) and even recommend me the best macaroon store in Paris. Love to stay with her.

Romy was a kind and welcoming host. I only saw her for key exchange, but she recommended a great local spot for lunch (Le Petit Colbert). The room is small but perfectly fine for a traveler who just needs a bed to rest in; accommodations were neat and clean. The bathtub and toilet are located within the room, which keeps everything compact. Wifi is a very nice perk, and it's great for travelers without international data on their phones. The room itself is located on the top floor with a tight staircase, so be advised if you are carrying heavy luggage. Location is great, especially being so close to the Louvre and with easy access to everywhere else via nearby Metro stops. Would stay here again!

Romy was extremely nice with me. The apartment is as showed in pictures. It is very good location, near the Opera and Louvre museum. She gave me all instructions about the apartment.
I really loved it. I would recommend it to all of my friends.

by the way, there are a lot of stairs to up.
If you are carrying a lot of luggages as I did, it will be a problem to you.

Romy welcomed me directly and helped me carry my suitcase to next floor. The room is small, fit for 1 traveler, but clean and tidy. The bath tub and toilet are located inside the room which is very convenient. The staircase as mentioned by other reviewers is small but it was not a surprise for me, and I traveled light. Location is good - Opera is one of the highlight of Paris because it is within walking distance to Palais Garnier and Louvre. Wifi is available and speedy! With such location and the feeling homy, Romy's room is really worth it. Thanks Romy!

Romy did a great job welcoming me in her flat! She was at the apartment when I arrived and was super friendly! She gave me lots of suggestions for things to do in the area and loaned me a map for my stay. The apartment is in a great location and there is so much to see and do nearby. Definitely a great deal for someone traveling alone. I would definitely recommend!

Just a tip for other travelers: as stated clearly in the description, the space is really only for one person. It is one room that contains a bed, desk, fridge, bathtub, sink, and toilet. You will need to be able to carry your suitcase up a seemingly endless staircase to get to the flat. It's perfect (as described) for a young person traveling alone, but would not be good for someone who does not have complete mobility.

I had such an amazing trip to Paris, thanks again Romy for an incredible visit!

Romy is very nice!
And the apartment is in good location,you just can walk to everywhere from10-20 minutes,there are many restaurants near the apartment!
The room is including the bathroom,and you need to go upstairs to the top floor,if you take a heavy luggage,you must strong enough!
I recommend the room because the location is really perfect and safe zone.
Wonderful stay and place. Robert and Romy are very nice and do their best to welcome me. A well-recommended place.
This was the second time for me. Clean, quiet, comfortable, and a centrally-located place to stay the night.

As advertised. Perfect for a solo traveler looking for basic accommodation in a great location that is safe and clean. Need to be able to walk up stairs. I came on an early flight while the room was still occupied but Romy was kind enough to take my luggage and arrange for me to pick up the key later at my convenience.

Staying with Romy was incredibly easy. I could pick up the keys whenever I wanted, the room had everything I needed, and it is walking distance to the metro and quite a lot of sites. I only stayed the night. It's perfect if all you want is a bed to crash in!

Only saw host Romy for key exchanges. Location is safe walking distance to many landmarks. Cafe two doors away so felt okay when returning from night tours etc. okay single bedsit, but no window with view to outside world, just covered skylight to open only in dry weather. Not a room for spending much time in. No TV to experience local language and news. Access by narrow spiral staircase three floors up, small luggage only

Romy was an excellent host! When I first arrived she poured a glass of wine for each of us and she shared a list of places to visit while I was there. Later, I bought a ticket to the opera and she offered to iron my dress for me! The apartment is located in an excellent spot--the 2nd district which is close to a lot of great sites and food! It was also very comfortable and clean. I highly recommend staying with Romy!

Good location, cozy room, and welcoming atmosphere.
This room was the best for me who always stay at single room of hostels in need of moderate price and privacy.  I want to stay here again if I have a chance to visit Paris alone in the future. 
The only concern I had was unlocking the door of Romy's house.  If you are not accustom to keys with which you need a bit of knack to open the door, you had better ask Romy about how to deal with the key.
Muito boa a estadia na casa de Romy. Ela foi muito atenciosa , o quarto e bom, com tudo necessario. A localizacao e perfeita.

This was the perfect spot for seeing Paris for the first time.  I would say the location is the best part of staying here.  You are very close to all the major sites, as well as transit to the airport and the subway.  It couldn't have been more convenient in the way.

The room is small but has everything you need.  You have your own bathroom (bathtub, sink, toilet in the room).  Skylight provides fresh air.  There are lots of winding stairs but it's fine to navigate, but I would not recommend if you have mobility issues. 

This is a great place if you are really looking for somewhere central to come and go from.  The host was lovely and very well organized, with maps, info on the city, and even an umbrella there for guests to use.

Nice calm room for one person in perfect location. Bed is a bit small but very comfortable. 
Romy is a super friendly host.

I loved this little attic retreat, it is the perfect place to rest and regroup ready to go out into the Paris buzz and bustle. I loved having a skylight to gaze at the clouds. Romy was lovely and very helpful. It was perfect for me.

Romy is a nice host. She gave me a lot of useful information about Paris, such as, Orange company, the map of Paris, and the popular (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a perfect location just a few mins walk to T station. The room is clean and quiet. I had a great time in her apartment.

Cosy place with all the basics in one room. The skylight was fun to have, it's a cute old building which sorta gives me this bohemian feel. Romy was super attentive and kind ! Also location is awesome, I walked everywhere.

Great little room in central Paris near the Louvre and many nice cafes.  Loved going back there to relax after a long day of wandering around Paris.  Romy was also very helpful and a great host.  Highly recommended!

The request was very quick. Romy ist very friendly and gives you the privacy you need :) I had one of the best sleeps in this room this summer!
Loved your "slow-bicycle" advice!

Romy is a wonderful host. Very friendly and helpful.

Communication was very easy and responses were very quick.  

Her apartment is neat and tidy.  It's very central and within walking distance to most sights. Pyramides Metro station is a mere few minutes walk away. 

Food outlets are in abundance and there is also a nearby place to do your laundry. 

I had a great time staying at Romy's and would definitely come back here for my next trip.
Sweet little room with good privacy in a central location - couldn't ask for more! Romy was very kind and hospitable, and the bakery she recommended was fabulous. Would definitely stay here again!
Romy is really kind person. And flat is very clean and cute! Location is best. Love this flat!

루브르 박물관, 세느강, 오르셰 박물관 등 파리 주요관광지에 대중교통을 이용하지않고 걸어서 다닐 수 있어서 숙소 위치가 매우 좋았고 감탄하며 다녔다. 개인실은 혼자 사용하기에 편안하고 필요한 것은 방안에 다 갖춰져 있으며 천장에 창문이 있어 신선한 공기를 느끼고 날씨를 눈으로 확인할 수 있다. 또한 아주 깨끗하고 안전했다.
와이파이가 되서 잘 이용했고  집 주변에 슈퍼,과일가게, 음식점이 많아 편하고 샤를드골공항까지 가는 르와시버스 정류장도 조금만 걸어가면되서 너무 좋았다.
호스트 로미는 매우 친절하고 따뜻하고 편안했으며 여행객인 내게 필요한 유용한 정보를 쉽게 제공해주어 여러가지로 감사했다. 로미와 함께한 점심은 좋은 추억이 될것같다~
올라가는 계단이 좁고 엘리베이터가 없어 캐리어가 무거우면 좀 힘들 수 있으나 몸무게40kg인 나도 25인치 18kg나가는 캐리어를 4층까지 올리고 내릴 수 있었다. 물론 힘들었지만 다른 장점이 많아 충분히 감내할만했다. 여기서 4박하는 동안 맘 편히 잘 지내다왔기에 진심 추천한다!

Great place very Paris roof apartment. I was only there for one night which was a shame. Great location to walk to all main tourist sites. Romy is fantastic I didn't meet Robert.  Do take note it's up 4 stories and it's narrow no lift.

숙소 위치는 정말 최고였어요. 밤에 늦게 들어올 때도 위험하지 않았고 관광지, 시내 모두 가까워서 정말 편했습니다. 엘리베이터가 없는 옥탑방이라 짐을 오르내릴 때 조금 힘들긴 했어요. 계단도 좁아서 짐이 많으신 분들은 좀 힘들 것 같아요. 하지만 방도 좋고 깨끗하고 위치가 정말정말 좋았어요. Romy는 아주 친절하게 절 맞이해주었고 설명도 잘 해주었습니다. 추천해요

찾기쉽고  오페라역이라서 좋아요 
천장열리는 다락방식인데 
룸이 너무 마음에 들었어여 :) 
높은층이라 짐들고 올라가긴 조금 힘들어도 
독특한 구조가 좋았어요 :)

I had an incredible time with Robert and Romy in Paris. This space is the perfect backdrop for a Parisian vacation. The location is perfect for walking around the city, the space itself is clean and beautiful, with everything you need. The room is just minutes from the Louvre, surrounded by lots of great cafes, and close to all sorts of shops- the central location is wonderful, I never had to take a taxi or a bus to get anywhere I wanted to go! Romy greeted me with great insider tips about where to eat, where to spend time along the Seine, and everything I needed to feel welcomed and at home right away. Romy was totally available to me for any questions I had and even took the time to help me book an early morning shuttle to the airport at the end of my trip. This is the perfect space to explore the city and I absolutely recommend checking it out for you next trip. I will definitely be booking with Robert and Romy again for my next stay in Paris!!

The host did a great job answering queries before and during the visit (even giving tips on buying train and museum tickets). The room is described VERY accurately, so make sure it is a good choice for you (e.g., don't pick this if you can't climb narrow stairs and don't pick it if you are tall -- I'm 5'9'' (175cm) and the door jam was level with my eyebrows). The bed was comfortable and the room was clean. The host was kind enough to provide coffee even though the posting clearly states that breakfast is not provided. That was nice!

I had a wonderful stay at Romy & Robert's place! The location is perfect, right near the Louvre and within walking distance of most tourist attractions. They were fantastic hosts, Romy was so warm & welcoming, the room was spotless and I was able to leave my bag there for a few hours after checking out so I didn't have to carry it around the city before catching the train. Even though it was around 40 degrees in Paris, the room didn't get too hot & there's a big skylight you can open for a breeze. The fridge definitely came in handy! I only wish I could've stayed longer! Will definitely be back :)

Romy has been such a wonderful host during my time in Paris. My flight got in early and she was kind enough to let me drop off my belonging even though the previous person hadn't check out. She had been incredibly informative about the area, where to go and what to do. She became one of those host who truly excited about meeting people and taking good care of them, which you don't usually get with the business style hotel experience. We left with a great friendship and I would come back here again.

Nice room! Perfectly located and Romy was very kind to me and told me lots of interesting things about Paris. The only thing – it was a bit hard to carry luggage on the top floor, cause there's no elevator, but it was worse it) Thank you <3

Mi estadía con Romy fue excelente, es una persona bastante amable, me dio bastantes sugerencias de como pasarla bien en Paris los 2 días que estuve, incluso me levanto para que no pierda el vuelo! RECOMENDADO!

I had the pleasure of staying at this couples delightful property for 1 night.  It is exactly as described, within a quiet and safe location.  Great communication from the owners and no issues with checking in.   Simple instructions, clean room with the benefit of a bath - a rarity, but welcome addition.  Skylight lets in plenty of light and air, although you may wish to push it shut if you go out to prevent any rain hitting you bed - as requested by Romy.  The staircase up is a little narrow and steep, so if you have difficulty managing stairs, beware.  Good security on room, apartment and main door so no worries on that.  Only a couple of limitations in my opinion, didn't seem to have WiFi (although I did not ask) and if you are cycling to or around Paris on an expensive bike (as I was) you may want to find somewhere else to store, as I did.  Although I did not ask owners as I had this organised before hand.  All in all a great room, clean, comfortable and great location.

Romy is a great host! Her apartment is placed in the heart of Paris. You could not ask for a better location. The room is small and the toilet is within the room.  If you are not sensitive having a toilet next to your bed, than you should choose Romy’s place.

The room was absolutely lovely -- a welcome respite after a hectic trip. The location clearly can't be beat. And as a host, Romy was welcoming and helpful. I would like to live in a room like this, someday.

Robert and Romy's place was very central and convenient with a interesting and cozy room. I stayed for my job interview. Romy's great hospitality made me all ready for it. Thanks Romy I got the Job nicely!
The room was lovely and clean. The location is very central. Romy was kind and helpful. I stayed for two nights.

I stayed for 2 nights (1 night break in between) with Romy - a beautiful studio in the heart of Paris.  As this is my 2nd review for the same accomodation I will add different bits of detail here!
Romy was great in highlighting everything from transportation to/from where i needed to be and suggesting where to eat - down to how to avoid falling victim to petty crime!
The studio, while extremely cosy (even for one) is charming to a fault, with a beautiful skylight perfect for long summer days.
Thanks Romy!

I stayed for 2 nights (1 night break in between) with Romy - a beautiful studio in the heart of Paris.
The walk up to the studio is not for the faint hearted - but this was fine as Romy made it super clear in her listing and so I had no problem with it at all.  
The studio itself is remarkably well equipped for such a small space - certainly no modern conveniences lacking.  As I was a solo traveller it was fine - and Romy was an extremely welcoming and accomodating host!

Romy ist eine tolle Gastgeberin und das Zimmer ist sehr schön und sauber. Das beste ist sicherlich die Lage, super zentral und dennoch sehr ruhig. Man ist in ein paar Minuten zu Fuß am Louvre oder in der Oper (sehr zu empfehlen!). Die Metro ist auch ganz in der Nähe. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt. Eines ist zu beachten: Das Treppenhaus ist sehr schmal, es ist empfehlenswert, mit einem Rucksack anzureisen.
Great host. Whole-hearted recommendation.
위치도 좋고 romy도 정말 친절했다. 근데 옥탑방~

Romy fue una excelente anfitriona. Desde que llegué se preocupo por mi, me aconsejó sobre qué hacer en París y me dejo distintos folletos, mapas y cosas en la habitación... Hasta té! La habitación supero mis expectativas, esta apartada de su departamento con entrada individual, la ubicacion no podria ser mejor! Super centrica, la zona es inigualable! Es la primera vez que hago Airbnb y no sabia como era, y ahora definitivamente va a ser mi nueva forma de viajar. 

Recomiendo al 100% hospedarse con Romy.

교통편이 완벽에 가깝게 좋았고. 동전세탁소, 식료품가게, 벨리브 다 가까웠다.
위치가 찾기 좀 어려워서 잘 알아보고 가야하며 무거운짐을 들었다면 4층까지 짐을 들고 올라갈 각오를 해야한다. 그리고 올라가는 계단 양옆에 페인트가 옷에 잘 묻는다.
마지막으로 호스트가 매우 친절하며 개인적인 공간을 쓰는기분이 아주 좋았다.
주변에 나리타게 라는 맛이괜찮은 일본라멘집이 있다.

This apartment is within breathing distance of the Louvre which was great for my stay.  It is small, as described, but a great and convenient stopping place for a quick stay in Paris.  Romy was very welcoming when I arrived and was happy to leave me to my own devices.
I had a lovely holidays in Paris, i couldn't had a better host and location is awesome with all the amenities around the flat and less than 3 min. walking from the tube station.

I love that Romy is very friendly and made me feel comfortable at her place. She gave some very nice suggestion about where to go and what to see. The place is very very strategic. It's a very short walking distance to everything I wanted to see in Paris, and in some days that I was just too lazy, I can hope on to three different metro stations nearby. It's a really nice little spot in the heart of Paris.

Me encantó el cuarto de Romy! Es pequeño pero acogedor, con todo lo que necesitas para pasar unos días en París. La ubicación también es excelente y ella super amable... Sin dudas volvería a hospedarme ahí... 100% recomendable!

Romy welcomed me very nicely in a very friendly manner. She gave me very clear explanations about the house rules, as well as some nice suggestions for eating out and shopping.  The room was impeccably clean and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay, including the possibility to warm up food and make coffee, and a closet with hangers.  The towels and the bed linens were immaculate. Everything worked - shower, hot water, heater, lights.  The location is very attractive, in a quiet street off Avenue de l'Opera. Lots of sightseeing, restaurants, cafes and shops nearby. 3 choices for Metro stations.

Perfect experience stay in Romys place. She is one of most friendly owner in all my airbnb experience. Easy communicate with, take good care of her guests. The place is lovely. Clean, light, comfortable and have everything you need. And location is most safe and paris Central. Walking distance to most of place. Definitely back !

This was the perfect place for me for my stay in Paris.  Romy was incredibly welcoming and helpful.  She accommodated my early check-in and greeted me ready with advice, tips, and great suggestions.  

It is in a fabulous location - in the center of the city just minutes from the Louvre and a couple of metro stops. The room matches the description.  It isn't huge but is perfect for a single traveler and was clean and had everything you would need.  It is truly a great deal, and I would definitely stay again.

The apartment was great, exactly as described on the airbnb site, and the neighbourhood couldn't be more convenient: very central and close to all main stations and attractions. Also, Romy made all arrangements so that I could pick up the key exactly when I needed it. I highly recommend this place and whenever I'm back in Paris, I will try to stay there again.

Very nice location 
center of paris
매우 좋은 위치 피라미드역까지 걸어서2분


Clean and Quiet
깨끗하고 조용함

주인 아주머니가 아주 친절함
기분 상해 있을때 말상대 해주셔서 기분을 풀어주셨다

멀티아답터가 준비되어 있어서 빌려간걸 쓸 필요가 없었다

방안에서 이동할때 슬리퍼를 쓰는게 편하다

Korean and Japanese restaurants near but it is a little expensive, 
한식집과 일식집이 근처에 많아서 여차할때 먹을 수 있다 좀 비싸긴 하다

Beware the stairs wall paint
4층인데 올라갈때 벽에 옷이 닫지 않게 해야한다 벽에 바른 페인트가 옷에 묻는다

Wait until the bulb is brighter
전구가 빠르게 밝아지지 않는다 화장실쪽 전구도 같이 켜야 밝다

Heater is good
히터 성능이 좋아서 밤새 따듯하게 잘 수 있었다 숫자 다이얼은 세기를 뜻한다 밑에 두개는 한쪽만 킬거냐 양쪽다 킬거냐 이다

Romy was very quick to respond and accommodating which was very helpful. The space is clean and tasteful and comfortable. The location is at the heart of Paris close to everything from museums to shops and all type of different kind of restaurants or fast food. I was very content and I will use the space in the future.
the best place to stay in Paris- beautiful neighborhood, clean and lovely place and the best host *

Susan is a woman of very sharp Friendly and care.
The rooms are a little small, but clean room.
Location is also near from Pyramid Station, is very convenient to go anywhere in the Paris city.
Also if there is a chance to stay in Paris, I want to use it by all means.
Thank you, Susan!

Thanks Susan for the cosy room in the center of Paris. I enjoyed staying there.

kind regards,
Lieve

Ideale per una vacanza economica al centro di Parigi: 5 minuti dalle maggiori attrazioni turistiche (Louvre, Opera, Madaleine, Place Vendome, Place de la Concorde). Luogo tranquillo, pulito e sicuro. Romy gentilissima e sempre a disposizione. Consigliato (IT).

Idéal pour un séjour pas cher,  à 5 min du centre-ville et des attractions touristiques (Louvre, l'Opéra, Madeleine, Place Vendôme, Place de la Concorde). Place tranquille (calme),  propre et sûr. Romy très gentil et toujours disponible. Recommandé (FR).

Ideal for a cheap holiday in the center of Paris: 5 minutes from major tourist attractions (Louvre, Opera, Madeleine, Place Vendome, Place de la Concorde). Quiet, clean and safe. Romy very kind and always available. Recommended (EN).

Romy was accommodating and very friendly upon arrival. The room was just as described in the listing: not too big and with a low ceiling, suitable for someone spending most of their time touring Paris! The location is great and the neighborhood seemed nice/safe enough, and it was very quiet at night. The value is certainly worth the price.

Communication upfront was good and a warm welcome. Room location was nice and I enjoyed the stay. If you don't like of stairs it's probably not your preferred room. For a short stay it is very central with public transport close by. Good room for a good price.

It was ok. 
El cuarto es perfecto para ir a descansar en la noche. Lo mejor es que esta muy bien ubicado, a 8 minutos caminando de la ópera y a 10 minutos del museo del louvre.
Everything was great-thank you!
Room was clean and cozy and private.  Location was excellent. Romy was friendly and interesting and provided restaurant recommendations. She allowed me to check out late which was a great help.

This is the perfect place to stay in Paris. The room is cozy and the location is great. It is walking distance from several major sites. Romy is awesome and a lot of fun. She is extremely welcoming. I highly recommend this place.

Thx for the warm welcome on such a short notice!
the room was small but very cosy on an ideal spot right in the middle of Paris. 
great location, great host!
I'll hopefully come back when I return to Paris!
Wonderful host. Perfect place for one and unbeatable location. Highly recommend.

Susan is very friendly and helpful. The room is very nice and light, and the bed is very comfortable. It is right in the center of Paris, but is still really calm and quiet, because you are on the top floor.
The ceiling is slanted, so if you are tall (say over 1.80 m), this may not be the best place for you (I am 1.70, and I had absolutely no problems). I would definately come back here!

I'm so glad I chose to stay with Romy! Most of you would be concerned with the location so the details: it is so centrally locaTed you could practically walk to most of the main attractions! Lourve, Tuileries, Opera Palais Garnier (must visit btw), Madeline shopping area etc all within 10-15 min walk! Lots of restaurants and shops near the area as well. 

Room: at first glance, the room seems rather small. It's not recommended for tall ppl! However, I found myself liking it increasingly because it was so cosy and it has everything you need to make your stay comfortable! It was clean and well- equipped!

Not to mention Romy was an excellent, hospitable host who was flexible about check in/out times so long as there aren't other guests. She really made me feel at home and was so incredibly nice and accommodating! 

Solo travelers look no further and book the room right now!
Romy, was great. Very accommodating with my check in and check out schedule, she was an excellent host. The room was exactly as described, overall an excellent stay.

I had a lovely trip in Paris this weekend and staying at Romy's place made it so simple. Romy is a genuinely lovely woman and made me feel welcomed into her home. The room is exactly as it is in the pictures; secure, warm and cosy. The apartment is well located to get anywhere in central Paris within 30mins (whether on the metro or on foot) which is handy if like me you are only staying for a couple of days. The area is (as far as I'm aware) safe, I was out until the early hours of the morning by myself and felt comfortable coming back.

I would definitely recommend staying here

The Best Host You Can Have!!! She is so kind and helpful.. I stayed here for around 6 days and my stay was perfect.. Room is very comfortable for a single person.. Location is very central to the city.. You can travel to any place from this location.. 
Susan was very friendly to me.. She helped me in suggesting various places to look.. Also she came with me to visit nearby places.. I really admire her friendliness and enthusiasm.. 
Thank you Susan.. If i get to travel to Paris in future, i will definitely stay at her place for sure...

Romy was a very welcoming host and I enjoyed my stay with her. She gave some good pointers what to do within the neighbourhood. The room was quiet and her place is accessible to major sights in Paris.

I loved my stay with Romy!  The room was perfect--clean, comfortable and centrally located.  Romy had guide books, maps and even an umbrella available in case I needed them.   I loved the bathtub and the wonderful skylight as well.  Sleeping was bliss because the building and street outside are very quiet.  

Romy was charming, helpful and so accommodating!  It was my first trip to Paris and she really made sure I had everything I needed including recommendations for a first time visitor.  I will definitely be back on my next visit!

It was quite easy to get around all over the paris.
very close to the bus stop and subway.
suprisingly quiet in center of paris.
Highly recommend if you travel alone.
혼자서 파리를 여행한다면 추전해주고 싶은 곳입니다.
보고 싶은 미술관, 박물관들을 지하철로 쉽게 갈 수 있는 곳이고
주변에 한국식당,일본 우동집들도 있어요.

I adored my stay here in Paris! Romy is a sweet, generous, fun and caring person and really made me feel welcome and safe. The room is perfect for a single person staying in Paris. It is in an excellent location - central and safe. The airport bus stops at Opera and the room is only a short walk from there, very straightforward. The room is cosy, clean, light, modern and has everything you need. I loved the big bath at the end of the day - a good soak for my tired walking muscles! I highly recommend this room and I'd definately book again. Thank you Romy xo

It was the best decision to choose the stay at this place. Not Susan, but Romy (Susans daughter) welcomed me really friendly. The place is so cute - I just felt like Amelie. It's such a good location near to the metro, supermarket and everything you need. Downstairs you find a supercute Brasserie.
The room is really cool, because you have everything you need and it's really cosy.

I loved to stay at Romys - she is such a nice person!
Next time in Paris, I ll stay there again :) Cant wait!

Romy is the sweetest hostess I had in all my airbnb experiencies!!! Even if it was a little hard to find the street of the house (not every map has the streets on it! I reccomend a gps or to ask her for a little map with a drawn itinerary from the bus stop) the house per se is WONDERFUL, lovely floor, lovely bath, great water pressure, amazing skylight, excellent wifi signal.. but most of all.. Immaculate clean!!! For me that's really important and I'm really annoying about cleanliness, and she was 5 stars!!
You can really relax there, because is very quiet, but you're literally five minutes walk from the Tuilleries garden.. Very near supermakets, laundry, bars and shopping, metro station, very well connected. 
Romy doesn't mind to try to ease your life in everything that's possible.

SURELY coming back if I'm in Paris, 100% reccomended to airbnb members!!!

I had a wonderful stay in Paris, and very much liked the room. It is located so centrally that I could almost walk everywhere. A lot of nice cafes, restaurants, and, most importantly the Opera Garnier, are directly around the corner. Despite it being so central, it is unbelievably quiet in the night so that I was always well rested when I started my Parisian explorations. Thanks very much for having me as a guest, Romy!

She is messy, disorganized and rude. I cannot say anything about the place and the neighborhood cause I have never seen it, I refused to go there after her behavior. zero hospitality and 100%rudeness, who want to spend a night there with these preconditions?  (I have been using Airbnb for years, never had sth like that before) 
I had to spend few days in PARIS for university commitments (mine is in the outskirts of Paris.. it takes 1h to 2h to reach the center); I wanted to spend my last day closer to the center and I booked Roomy or Susan or -whatever her name is- place. 
she said : I would be there SINCE 2.30pm 
I said: ok ill probably be there around 4 pm
she: perfect
I got into trouble with all my movements and I didn't have internet on my phone, I got stuck into transport because of some works their doing I don't know.. I was finally reaching Paris center around 5pm (but she said I would be there since xx right? I wouldn't have taken  the risk otherwise)
as soon as I can grab my phone and connect I see an Airbnb message (and she had my number, she texted me before) at 4.50 sounding angry/annoyed and saying that she's been waiting for me since 4 ( oh god you're waiting at your place ! I'm a visitor in Paris, these things happen!!)  and that she's leaving (Website hidden by Airbnb) and she'll be back for 7 pm. Seriously? i start texting her , no answer, than she's "in a meeting".. seriously, if you had a meeting you should have mentioned it before, everyone would get worried if he/she has to receive someone for 4pm and have to leave before 5 ! and she never said like, oh I am sorry for the inconvenience blabla.. nono she was saying NOT SO COOL, or I WAITED FOR YOU!! 
I planned some rendez-vous, I wanted just to leave my unwieldy baggage and what? I finally discover myself stuck near Opera for a least 2 hours. great. 
We pay a service, we're the visitors, without a place to stay, with our baggage, tired of our time spent in transport (dirty, smell, crowded,delayed..).. we expect a nice reception. 
You should be able to manage the airbnb commitment, it's not a prank. You're dealing with REAL PEOPLE  who have PAID. example: I arrived in US on friday night instead of noon because my plane got delayed and couldn't reache the landlord, he left a LOCKBOX outside the door with keys inside and a folder on my bed with all information. CAN you imagine if ever He did leave me locked outside on a friday night around (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) km away from home?
I really couldn't be waiting for 2 hours outside your house, I really couldn't. I am lucky I have friends, but imagine I was a lonely tourist coming from Asia.. or US... pffff . INCONCEIVABLE.

eine wunderschöne unterkunft, sehr schön und zentral gelegen.
romy ist eine sehr herzliche gastgeberin. ich habe mich sehr wohlgefühlt.
vielen dank.

Romy's place was great. Very clean and tidy and the private washing area was excellent too. Best thing was the sky light :) Romy herself was welcoming and I was made to feel at home. Would recommend to anyone going to Paris.

Staying with Romy was a quick and easy booking especially at last minute's notice!  Her cute little historic Parisian place was the perfect alternative to a 15 hour layover at the Charles de Gaule airport.  With easy to understand directions to take the Roissy Bus from the airport to the Opera, and a bit of asking directions from the locals I was able to locate Romy's place with a dead phone, no GPS, and by asking extremely friendly locals in the area for directions that only took me about 5-10 minutes walk once I got oriented! For my first time being in Paris arriving on a delayed flight so late at night probably wasn't the safest scenario but nonetheless I ran into no problems and was surprised by how friendly of help I did receive to locate Romy's place. Romy was so dear to stay up late and wait for my arrival, I couldn't thank her enough. The ventilation in the top level of the building was surprisingly cool and the skylight window lets fresh air in at night. The bath in the room made it a quick and easy way to clean up quickly the night before and morning after taking a touristy jaunt around the area for sight seeing and photos. Her place is centrally located but it is a good 45 minute walk in one direction if you want to get close to the Eiffel Tower. All in all Romy is a delight and interesting person. I would definitely consider staying again. The croissant au chocolate at a nearby patisserie was a nice departure gift compliments of Romy! I will definitely stay with her again in the future and hope to be back soon! :)
A very nice, cozy place, with all you need, with a wonderful, friendly host.

Another great stay - I only have good things to say about my experience here - Romy was once again very helpful and friendly. A great location, shops are very close and even the Louvre is only 10 minutes away!

Romy is great. Genuinely sympathetic, she gave lots of incredible tips and my trip to Paris was amazing, in part, because of her!
The room is very nice and comfortable!

Romy was wonderful! I can't imagine Paris without her now. She was what made half the trip so great. The room is the perfect stay for a short stay, and is located in an amazing part of Paris. The building itself has such a great history. The days I spent in Paris were some of the best out of my Europe trip. Largely in part of the location, and Romy.

A great experience in all respects - Romy was very nice and helpful - she gave advice on good sights to check out and even affordable but yummy food choices! The room itself was just what I needed - clean and comfortable; Recommended for sure!

A warm host, and great location that is safe and closed to everything. Romy is very friendly. She took me to the closet Metro, showed me the surrounding neighborhood. This is a great experience for me.
Cosy room with everyting you need in a very good area of Paris. Romy is a warm host. I felt at home immediately.
Romy was extremely welcoming and friendly. She was helpful and the skylight room was provided with varius essentials like tea and its own fridge. I loved the room and the location!

Romy communicated well throughout the process and gave me a warm welcome to Paris.  The room was exactly as she described and situated well in the heart of the city.  The bed was comfy and I really enjoyed the breeze through the skylight.

Romy was such a great host.  She was in constant contact for check in and even carried my bags up the stairs (which are pretty steep).  The room had everything I needed, including utensils, wine opener, umbrella, and hair dryer!  The bed was extremely comfortable and I spent a few extra hours just staring out the skylight in that comfy bed.  Romy gave great recommendations on restaurants and places to go out at night.  Overall an  excellent experience!

Nein, Romy hat sich überhaupt nicht um mich gekümmert. Sie hat mir den Schlüssel übergeben und das war's. Sehr enttäuschend. Weiters hat das Zimmer nach Sushi gestunken, ich würde es keinem meiner Freunde weiterempfehlen. Sorry.

Romy was a very kind host.  The room is comfortable for one person.  The best part was the location, location, location!!!  It's right between the Opera and the Louvre.  In order to see the city, I like to walk, and I walked everywhere--- the Pomidou Centre, Notre Dame, the Latin Quarter, and the Eiffel Tower.  There are also many restaurants, grocery stores, and shops very close by.

I enjoyed staying at Romy's. She was very welcoming, helpful and kind. 

The room was very nice and clean. It had a very authentic french wibe to it. 

The room was on the topfloor and the building did not have an elevator. But Romy was very helpful and helped me with my bag both up and down the stairs so it was no problem.

The location was great and in walking distance from many tourist attractions and close to several metro station. However, I found it a bit difficult to find because I did not have a very good map. So I would reccommend that you bring a map that includes even small streets so that it is easier for you to find. 

I would deffinitly reccomend staying at Romy's

Romy è stata eccezionale. E' venuta a rintracciarmi lei nei vicoli dove mi ero perso. Gentilissima. La stanza è davvero minuscola con i bagno a vista in camera. Tutto nuovo molto ordinato e pulitissimo. Un buon posto economico al centro di Parigi dove dormire.

Beautiful appartament in a beautiful neighborhood
Romy is a very hospitable host, friendly and the room is confortable and near all importants monuments and shops.
Thanks Romy. See you next time. Orietta

The host is very nice and friendly. The apartment is in amazing area with many Paris attractions within the waling distance, such as Louvre, Notre Dame de Paris, etc. The description of the apartment is accurate.

This great little room was the perfect place to stay for my last night in Paris.  It's located near the Palais Royal and the Garnier Opera House and close the to Pyramides and Quatre-Septembre metro stops.  The room is located on the top floor of an apartment building and there's no elevator, so keep that in mind if you have a lot of luggage, but if you're traveling light, you'll be fine.  Don't forget to bring your own soap and/or shampoo.  The basics: the bed is comfortable, the Wi-Fi is fast and the room is quiet.  Romy is also a great host and can tell you about the area.  She gave me a great tip about taking the RoissyBus to the airport, saving me from taking the RER B.

Romy was an amazing host! It was my first airbnb experience. Location is great just a few minutes walking to the louvre and next to pyramid station. Place was clean and fresh as advertised, it was everything I could have asked for..Hopefully will be back to visit soon.

I had a great stay with Romaly :) She was warm and welcoming and her place has a super location close to major sites and shopping (10 min walk to the Louvre!) The room was very very clean and comfortable. It was very nice of Romaly to allow me to just stay for one night, she even prepared a big bottle of water for me and gave me lots of tips for where to go and what to eat. I had a wonderful time in Paris and highly recommend Romaly's place (except for maybe a tall person, it is a small Paris style apartment after all).

Romaly was the perfect landlord, giving me kind instructions to find lovely and cheap places to eat in the neighbourhood. The room was charming and equipped with all the necessary to be hosted. The skylight gives a lot of natural light to the room.

Romaly is so nice. She is very sweet and willing to help you with anything you need.  I recommend her. Her apartment is well equipped and extremely clean. I will stay with her some time in the future.

I had the most amazing stay at Romaly's place! The room is lovely, very cosy and quiet, and in the best neighborhoods of all, right in the heart of Paris. Romaly is an incredibly kind and accommodating host, and a fascinating person to get to know. A true gem of a listing!

The room in Paris was gorgeous, I loved everything about it and the furnishings and gadgets were all very handy. Romaly is a wonderful host and will make sure you enjoy your stay. 

Thanks again for making my first air bnb experience so wonderful, I look forward to seeing you again Romaly xx

Romallys place is an ideal nest in the heart of beautiful Paris * 
just a walk from almost everything you want to enjoy- Louvre, Opera, St.Honore shopping, walking next to the Seine, savoring in pl.Vendome.
And the place itself is white and peaceful with all inside the room- bed, kitchen, bathtub. all clean and enjoyable !
and, finally Romally is helpful and discreet.
could not think of a better place in Paris ***
pas de commentaire
La literie est super confortable. La chambre est propre et bien chauffée. Salle de bain moderne (indication de la température de l’eau). Le spa est très bien entretenu et propre.
Super accueille, personnel très agréable et conviviale.

Personnel chaleureux , à l’écoute et très réactif .

L’hôtel est facile d’accès ´ la chambre remarquable et le spa rien a dire

Excellente accueille, à l’écoute, juste la chambre nous a fait bizarre parce que la salle de bain était ouvert

Superbe hôtel, avec l’accès au spa est juste génial ! 
Je vous recommande cette hôtel pour le rapport qualité prix 
En revanche petit bémol pour le petit déjeuner qu’on as pas trouvé exceptionnel pour le prix 

Mais si non tout était super !
Hôtel agréable ... service en chambre , tv connectée , ... au top !

Notre séjour a été parfait ! Nous avons adoré l’accueil, l’emplacement près du métro et les précieux conseilles de la réceptionniste ! 
L’espace SPA est un vrai plus !
Très bon moment passé, chambre impeccable et décoration / design très moderne. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés !
Bon accueil et chambres agréables
Parfait
Super séjour
Chambre très correcte et spacieuse. Déco super sympa et patio très agréable.
Top, je recommande
Hôtel conforme à la description, très bon accueil.

Super agréable

We had a very nice stay at the Atypik hotel. It's a modern and cosy hotel with all the facilities that you need. The location is perfect , a little outside the city but not too far (there is a subwaystation next to the hotel). We certainly recommend this hotel ! :)
The room is very clean but smaller than expected. Check in was smooth.

We had a really nice stay at Camilles! The place is easily reachable from the city centre and the room was nice, clean and really comfortable. Would definitely recommend to stay here if you think about visiting Paris!

We had a wonderful stay here!! Our favourite thing about the location is that it is a little bit away from the “tourist” part of Paris, where prices were a little better, and local people far outnumbered tourists. This is excellent for those who want to see and experience the authentic Paris and modern Parisian lifestyle. Of course, if one wants to go to the city centre it is easily accessible by a nearby subway stop, literally a lot 2 minutes walk from the hotel. 

Staff are incredibly outgoing and responsive. They helped us with local restaurant suggestions, tips regarding public transportation, and helping us plan our sightseeing. This was a fantastic experience overall! Thanks ATYPIK staff for the hospitality!
I LOVED my stay there! I even booked another night after. The staff is extremely welcoming and the it’s extremely clean! Best place I stayed in in Paris. The location is reaally good!
Mostly what we expected

If you really want a great value and you want an amazing staff of people that are more than helpful please stay here. 

They are really close to the metro and they have a supermarket on the same block and next to them is a dry cleaners. 

Anyone who is traveling will love this place they have a wonderful tiny cafe at the bottom and a nice place out back to sit and relax outside should you want to.

The bedding and pillows were extremely comfortable and the room itself was sized perfectly for a single traveler. 

There is a school that plays out back during weekdays but is not too loud and is decent ambient noise in my opinion. 

Lastly just in case you are traveling with more than one person keep in mind the bath tub is in open view to the bedroom so if your not comfortable with who ever you are traveling with consider a second room for them.

I can without a doubt say that the wooden floors, elevator, morning buffet, and the people here are what make this place much more special than a lot of other places.

Note: this is my first time in Paris and staying here made it extremely easy to move around the city.
This super clean and modern space is great for one night stays. Great staff and amenities. Highly recommend!

Appartement parfaitement propre, confortable, bien décoré. Immeuble récent, calme, aucun vis-à-vis, parking. Commerces de proximité et bords de Marne au pied de l'immeuble. Extra !

Nous avons séjourné 15 jours dans l'appartement. Il est conforme à la description. Il est joliment décoré, bien équipé et fonctionnel.  Les commerces sont situés au pied de l'immeuble, ce qui est très appréciable. Un grand merci aux hotes qui nous avaient mis à disposition un lit bébé.
Je recommande vivement le logement.
Impeccable
Super

Super clean, modern and calm apartment  just next to Paris. The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom very spacious, and we appreciated  having a dryer and a parking spot-all of which are not common ammenities. Having the Franprix just across the street was a big plus, too. Communicating with JP was very easy and pleasant. We had a great stay all in all, and would definitely return!
Lovely apartment with underground parking good location clean and has a shop directly across the road
Place is absolutely gorgeous.

We ended up at JP’s after an Airbnb nightmare, which only made us appreciate the beauty, cleanliness and location of this place even more. It’s decorated so beautifully and stylishly, has a wonderful, well-stocked kitchen, and the location is so lovely right near the Marne. JP answers questions almost immediately, and was so kind & hospitable. Our only regret is that we couldn’t stay longer. Thanks so much, JP!
Beautiful and clean apartment. Safe parking in underground garage. JP was quick to respond in all communication and checking in and out was easy!

We had a lovely stay at this apartment, very clean, beautifully furnished, the hosts were quick in replying to us and went above and beyond to ensure our stay was enjoyable. Easily accessible to  Paris by bus and train and not too expensive. The apartment is located in  a beautiful  area which was nice to explore around. Thank you Jp &'s!

We enjoyed our 4 days in this pretty, quite, clean place a lot. Roxy and JP are really friendly. There wasn't any problems with communication between us. Roxy and JP help you in every situation to any time.  The location is a little bit outside from the main city but you can take the bus, which is right in front of the house. A grocery shop and a really good bakery are also  pretty close. We really recommend this accommodation.

Location is good, but far from nearest station to Paris.  Be prepare to walk 25-30 min.  Good value.  Roxy let us in early which was very helpful for us.  Washing machine works great.  Apartment is very comfortable and well-equipped.  Highly recommended.
Nice room. Good for couple and not far from Paris

The apartment was presented very clean and tastefully decorated. JP and Roxanne respond quickly to most messages, and the check-in process was quite simple.

I don't have a lot to add to the description of the listing, except to say it's accurate. The building has double security doors and is on a quiet street, and you're a very short walk to the water (the Marne, I believe). We walked several miles in each direction on the Marne, and it was a beautiful walk. It's also fairly close to a few restaurants and small shoppes.

One note: we were about 20-30 minutes outside of East Paris by car. As noted in the description, the bus stop is right out front, and the metro is not that far away. However, because of the language barriers (being English speakers) we opted to mostly Uber - the average Uber was 20-30  euros into the east side of Paris, and perhaps 40 euro to the southwestern side of Paris.

Apartamento amplo, com boa luminosidade e uma vista muito agradável para um lindo jardim.
Há todas as comodidades para cozinhar e descansar.
Há uma máquina de lavar e secar roupas que nos foi muito útil. A cama é grande e bem confortável. O chuveiro é delicioso. O banheiro é bem grande. A Wi-Fi excelente! Há também um sala de estar para assistir televisão e uma bela varanda para desfrutar. Adoramos nossas férias. JP e Roxy são super simpáticos e prestativos. Recomendo muito!

Excellent little apartment that’s in a great location outside the busy centre of Paris. Superbly clean, tidy and modern with secure underground parking. JP is easily reachable by text message and check in and check out were both quick and easy!

A well laid out apartment with everything to hand- cooker, oven, utensils, cleaning materials. Nice kitchen diner with space for meals and chilling! The bedroom was ensuite and lots of hanging space, linen and matching large towels - indeed lots of cupboard space in kitchendiner too. A lovely space i think any person booking JP's apartment will be v. happy.
The apartment is very stylish and has underground parking which was really helpful. Jp and Roxy were very quick to reply to our messages as well.

Stephanie’s home is quaint, clean and the perfect place to stay for a night in Paris. She is not far from the train, and there’s a bakery nearby that always smells great! The room is very small, so good for one or two guests at most.

Lovely place in a great area, apartment was very clean with lovely touches.

Communication with host was very quick.

Check in was very easy

What an amazing experience! Stephanie's apartment was sweet and cosy in a great location. The Metro and a Carrefore were around the corner, with beautiful restaurants and  bakeries wherever you looked.


She thought of everything - ample towels to use, bedding, detergent for the washing machine and even coffee pods to make your morning easier. The kitchen was simple and functional and allowed for some lovely home cooked dinners.


The Eiffel Tower, Arc de Triomphe and the Louvre were all within an easy Metro trip, or a scenic walk for those looking to stretch their legs. A lovely surprise was the woodlands nearby - we spent an enjoyable day exploring and ended up in the beautiful Shakespeare gardens. 


We would definitely book this in the future - hopefully another trip to Paris isn't far away!

Abbiamo pernottato per 5 notti agli inizi di agosto. La casa  era piccola ma organizzata perfettamente, con tutto ciò che serve per due persone.
 La distanza dai luoghi più turistici non è stato un grosso problema perché la metro si trova a 10 minuti a piedi, come diverse linee di autobus.
Quaint space near Metro. Stephanie was quick to respond to us when called with concerns.

Stephanie’s place was clean and the space was just right for the two of us. Washing machine and microwave oven was also provided which was great! However, please note that the place is a quite a walk from the nearest metro station.
A good place to stay for a few days, just a bit smaller than expected and far from actual touristy Paris.

Overall, a nice apartment. There is no air conditioning or fan, and we arrived in Paris when it was 42 degrees which was very uncomfortable. Apartment was nice and clean and fairly good location, however it was hard to cook in because there was a real lack of utensils.

Highly recommend staying here. I stayed because I wanted to be close to the stadium and it was the perfect location. The apartment was clean, had everything you would need, it's a good size and Stephanie was quick with her response.  I would stay again.

Excelente acomodação! Exatamente como na foto. Ambiente limpo, organizado, e Stephanie deixou tudo a nossa disposição. Fica perto de restaurantes e a vizinhança é bem simpática. Voltaria a me hospedar, com certeza!

Stephanie's apartment is a great option for a tourist trip!
It has almost everything for a comfortable stay including Wi-Fi, a washing machine, a coffee machine, clean bed linen and towels. The location of the flat is perfect too! Believe me, Boulogne-Billancourt is a beautiful place and has lots to see (such as the Bois de Boulogne and greenhouses). Near the apartment are located supermarkets, bars and bakeries. The nearest metro station is Boulogne Jean Jaures (about 7-10 min. on foot); so it is not a problem to get to the city center (Trocadéro metro station, for example).
If you're Russian, remember that in Europe numbering of floors begins from the zero and not with the first :) It helps you to find the flat quicker.
Stephanie was always in touch and ready to help! She is the nice person :)
I really enjoyed my stay at Stephanie's flat and recommend it to you!

Отличная квартира в хорошем тихом районе. Имеется все необходимое для комфортного проживания, кухня полностью укомплектована. Очень чисто. Стефани очень вежлива и всегда на связи чтобы помочь прояснить какие-либо моменты. Остались абсолютно довольны проживанием.

We really enjoyed the stay. Stephanie is very nice and replied very fast when we had any questions

Small apartment, very basic but perfect for anyone who is staying in Paris for a night or two and need a basic place to sleep. Great location, 5 mins walk from the Gare de Lyon and has a supermarket, pharmacy and several restaurants on the doorstep. Apartment on second floor, no lift but easy walk up the stairs. Even though lots of flats in the same block, there was barely any noise which was good. Bed was comfy, slept two people easily. Cleanliness and presentation could be better but overall not bad value for 1 or 2 nights.
