chambre tres correcte. hotel avec beaucoup de potentiel pour plaire. option jacuzzi pas mal. Un seul reproche a faire : tout le monde a l'accueil (3 personnes differentes) un peu pas tres chaleureux, franchement, mais c'est peut-etre parce que la vie a Paris, ce n'est pas un don du ciel.
Je recommande !
Une super nuit dans ce très bel hôtel ! Nous reviendrons sans hésiter ! Tout était niquel !
Super séjour merci
L'hôtel correspond en tous points aux photos et porte bien son nom. Nous avons passé une bonne nuit, la literie étant excellente.

Merci Camille. 
À bientôt
Très correcte

Magnifique weekend!! Proche de commerce et du métro! Camille à été très sympathique je recommande!!
Merci encore
Belle chambre, la personne à l'accueil était très sympathique. De plus l'accès à l'espace détente est très appréciable.

Venus sur Paris pour le week-end, nous avons séjourné pendant 2 nuits dans la chambre AMSTERDAM.

La chambre est petite mais très propre, fonctionnelle et comme sur les photos, aucune surprise. 
Le jaccuzzi de l'hôtel est très agréable et le petit déjeuner propose de nombreux choix.

Je recommande vivement cet hôtel et reviendrais sans aucun doute lors de mes futurs séjours à Paris.
Tres bon accueil, chambre très sympas et lieu à proximité des transports donc pratique !
Très bon hôtel, tout correspond, j'y retournerais.
Très bon hôtel. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour, sa proximité des transports permet de se déplacer facilement. Seul problème, l'isolation des chambres.
En compagnie de mon copain, nous avons passé un agréable week end dans cet hôtel. Chambre "amsterdam" identique aux photos, le personnel est très accueillant, nous recommandons fortement cet hôtel.
J'ai passé mes séjours à Paris confortablement dans cet établissement. Tout était comme la description.
Très bon hôtel, je recommande !

Un merveilleux séjour au calme, dans une jolie chambre avec baignoire... Le personnel de l'hôtel a été extrêmement bienveillant et aidant... L'emplacement de hôtel à quelques mètres du métro est aussi un bienfait en soi... Sans parler du jaccuzzi et du hammam qui permettent d'oublier rapidement la frénésie de la vie parisienne....
Je reviendrai...!!
Super hotel tres agreable.... le staff tres sympatique a refaire
Bonjour le principe de AirBnB est d' aider les voyageur à trouver des logements non? J'ai été déçu de me retrouver dans un hôtel qui n'a pas été à la hauteur des l'annonce. Déception.

Endroit assez bruyant, la chambre n'était  pas vraiment insonorisée donc assez gênant pour un sommeil profond! Acceuil sympa mais c'est un hotel et pour moi ce n'est pas vraiment le concept Airbnb! Je ne recommande pas.

Endroit vraiment bien propre, confort. 
Chambre vraiment bien, très confortable...
Personne à l'accueille gentille et souriante notre séjours c'est vraiment bien passer. 
Je recommande fortement cette hôtel.

La chambre est conforme à l'annonce. L'accueil est chaleureux.
C'est très propre et calme. Et tous ça à 50 mètre du métro !
Personnels chaleureux, hôtel très bien placé à proximité du métro. Chambre très propre. Je recommande !!
Bon rapport qualité prix . Chambre un peu décevante, trop vétuste.

Accueil et chambre totalement conforme à la description. La literie est très bonne et et il n'y a rien à dire sur la propreté. J'ai passé une nuit au calme. Le petit déjeuner est très bon et le service global est également très bon. J'ai pu passer un moment agréable au Jacuzzi. Je recommande cette adresse, et j'espère qu'elle restera encore sur Airbnb, car j'y reviendrais avec plaisir.
Bien
tout était parfais, à refaire!!

Nous sommes allés avec mon conjoint dans cet hôtel dans le but de se retrouver seul dans un endroit paisible: chose faite. Hôtesse d'accueil très souriante ainsi que l'hôte accueil de la soirée également... Chambre bien isolé nous avons passer une nuit paisible dans un lit confortable. Ensemble hôtel propre (serviette mis à votre disposition dans la chambre et au spa). Le spa (hammam jacuzzi quelques machines de sport)... Endroit propre. À refaire

Accueil très chaleureux de tout le personnel de l'hôtel. Chambre confortable. Quartier calme et métro à deux pas.
Je recommande cet hébergement, d'un très bon rapport qualité / prix.

Accueil agréable réservée par Camille. 
A noter le calme pour cet hotel de ville 
Jean Pierre et Ghislaine
Personnes très accueillantes ! Impossibilité de rentrer dans le  parking à Pied

Malgré une déception en arrivant dans la chambre (ne correspond pas aux photos, odeur désagréable, deux lits simples au lieu d'un lit double), nous avons passé un bon séjour. Le coin détente est très appréciable et l'équipe de l'hôtel très sympathique.
Camille ainsi que l'ensemble de l'équipe de l'hotel sont super ! Très sympa et à notre écoute, merci à eux...
La chambre était très bien et le personnel sympathique. On a bien apprécié le jacuzzi, très agréable ! Nous avions demandé une baignoire et notre souhait a été exhaussé ;)

Je viens de passer un très agréable séjour dans cette chambre de Clichy.
La chambre est très accueillante, propre , dispose de tout ce qui est nécessaire. Elle est de plus, parfaitement bien située, à deux pas du métro et de la plupart des commerces.
Je la recommande vivement et ne manquerai pas de contacter Camille dès mon prochain voyage dans la région parisienne.
Agreable sejour, chambre tres sympa, propre, le petit plus, le passage au jacuzzi!!! Juste super, a recommander. ..
Accueil et hôtel sympa. L'espace bien être est un plus indéniable !
Super expérience, l'hôte est très disponible, hôtel très confortable avec jacuzzi et hammam en plus !! Je recommande.

Super propre et situé à côté des transports en commun!

Merci pour ce séjour
Unique, sympa , moderne et propre.
Super hôtel avec du personnel très sympathique
Un séjour, parfait. Belle ambiance. Le personnel était accueillant et accommodant. Les chambres était très belle et confortable.
Très bien
Excellent rapport qualité prix y compris pour le parking et petit-déjeuner. Chambre petite mais fréquent à Paris et pas de séparation salle de bain chambre ce que montrait la photo

Bon accueil.
Chambre correcte. Pas du luxe, loin de là mais propre sauf la moquette usagée.
Par contre petit déjeuner nul ! et cher ! (10 €)
Café fait avec une machine qui fait tout (chocolat, thé, café) et infecte. Confiture en sachet ! 
Ambiance au Petit déjeuner lourde et pesante (silence, on se sent espionné, etc...) Ne pas prendre.

Chambre très bien, rien n'a dire sur la propreté juste parfait, très bon rapport qualité prix 
Merci pour cette nuit !!
Top
Wonderful place! Stylish interiors, cozy garden and lovely little spa. Everything was really clean and the hosts were very friendly. I highly recommend this place.
Super
Ok
Very nice place
d
This is my second time staying at Atypik, like its location, very close to metro and get easy access to the city and with a very good value! The decoration is chic too!
Top
Nice

My stay at the Hotel Savoy was amazing ! The service was really nice, the room quite cool with a private bathroom :), there is a little garden in the hotel for summer it is perfect, and a jacuzzi !!! Really good price and perfect for a romantic stay :)

Camille the receptionist is super nice and helpful.
I really enjoyed my stay. I would definitely come back again. The neighborhood is close to the city, and the room itself was sparkling clean. Breakfast was delicious!
Good value for money. Clean. Friendly and helpful staff!
Enjoyed my stay here!  Definitely will come back the next time I’m in Paris!
Was erg mooi en dichtbij t centrum

Wer ein strukturierten Urlaub planen möchte ist hier falsch .. Wenn man einen Parkplatz reservieren möchte muss damit rechnen das der Parkplatz besetzt wird und sich keiner drum kümmert.. nach 12 muss man Glück haben das Hotel betreten zu können . Trotz der Klingel die wir Minuten lang betätigten und bei minus graden draußen standen warteten wir mindestens 10 min bis uns durch Glück aufgemacht wurde...
Das Zimmer an sich sieht auf den Fotos wesentlich viel größer aus als es tatsächlich ist.. wer auf Sauberkeit ein Wert setzt der ist hier falsch...
Wer den Pool benutzen möchte muss damit rechnen ihn mit fremden zu teilen.
Amazing value for money!!!
Nice and clean rooms.

Very modern stylish hotel. Staff were very friendly and helpful and the place was clean. The rooms are small but the space in them is definitely made the most of. It is a bit out of the way when visiting Paris. I paid €40 for an Uber to the catacombs and the walk would be over two hours so bear that in mind. Overall great hotel
Spectacular place, near to metro station, 20 minutes to all main attractions, everything was beautiful!
friendly, clean, great breakfast

The hotel is in close proximity to a metro station, which made transit convenient. Front desk staff was friendly. The room itself was cozy and clean, the small space very efficiently utilized. The only downside was the lack of ventilation in the room- it felt stuffed at times, and since there was no window screens, opening the windows for an extended period time was not an option because of mosquitoes/small bugs. Overall, it was a good stay for us, we would be back again if we visit Paris again in the future.
Good, I can recommend.

Super hotel! Goede aansluiting met de metro, super gastvrij! 
Kortom een topper!
Great hotel for the price, breakfast minimal for €12 but hot tub great!
War ein kleines aber sehr liebevoll eingerichtetes Zimmer. Mitarbeiter waren sehr nett.
Great place, environment and staff.
Stylish downstairs and room with a spacious bathroom. The hosts are welcoming, accommodating, and sweet!
The hotel is close to the metro and a supermarket. It is also very clean and the people are helpful and friendly.

Hotel was clean, check in was easy and they even got us in early. Location is nice as it’s quiet and just outside city center but only a couple metro stops to tourist attractions like moulin Rouge and Montmartre

Wonderful location, conveniently located right next to Paris...the metro is right around the corner. The neighborhood is safe and friendly...and the staff are amazing! Another plus, were the USB ports available to charge your devices!
Sin duda un lugar con encanto, perfecto para alojarse en París.

Fijn verblijf gehad in Atypik hotel. Kleine kamers maar alles wat je nodig hebt is aanwezig, dus dit stoorde niet. Het ontbijt viel wel tegen, weinig variatie en vooral een gemis aan vers brood, zeker zijn € 12 niet waard. Verder wel een prima hotel om Parijs te bezoeken. Metro om de hoek waarmee je snel overal geraakt.

We loved everything about this place. Very convenient place to stay if you come by car. There is a underground parking garage where you can park your car for only 12€ a day. The metro is right next to the hotel and goes straight into the city center. But most of all, Catherine was super friendly and made us feel so welcome! The room has everything you need and I definitely recommend having breakfast at the hotel cause it was very good. Thank you for the wonderful hospitality.

Great value for being relatively close to the city center. Convenient to the subway station or about a 90 minute walk to all the sites. The Amsterdam suite should only be booked for couples as there is no door for the bathroom and it is a very tight space. Hotel was extremely accommodating with early check in since the room was cleaned when we arrived at 9 am. Overall would stay here again!
Good for the price

Hele mooie en schone kamer. Helaas wel wat kleiner dan het op de foto doet overkomen, maar omdat je er niet veel bent is dat niet echt een probleem. Badkamer heeft geen deur dus dat is iets om rekening mee te houden. Super vriendelijk personeel dat goed Engels spreekt. Wij hebben genoten van ons verblijf en komen zeker nog een keer terug.

really pleasant stay here! room might be small but it’s really cosy and nice! although it’s super close to the metro, that specific line is a bit of annoying one! other than that, it’s a great place to stay and the people working there are really nice and amicable :)

The room is tiny to the point you have to walk side ways. The toilet is so small you cannot move so if you are over 5 feet tall good luck. There is no privacy so whatever you are doing in the toilet can be heard and also seen through the gap linking it to the shower room. There is no door to the shower room so you are in full view of anyone sharing with you. No cupboards or draws to put clothes so you will be living out your case.
Convenient location,  great place to stay

Do not stay here!!!!

‘Private bath’?? No privacy whatsoever from bath to bed!!! No wall, screen any shape of form that a normal ‘bathroom’ would have????

Room located right over looking school! (Kids screaming on playground from 7.30 am onwards)

Located beneath what I expect is the family room, but with no insulation between walls/ floor boards as can hear every word spoken, step taken, water run.

Absolute disgrace, extremely grateful only booked one night. Cannot understand that there is many other reviews not stating any of these after staying here.

A hotel room on needing to sell rooms on here should have screamed alarm bells
I had a great stay at Atypik Hotel. The staff were very hospitable.
Clean and cosy. The fitness/spa is however not always open, but rather at fixed limited hours which a makes it difficult to enjoy without limiting your day plans.
Atypik was amazing!!! Best stay I have had in a while. Everyone was nice. The amenities were perfect and relaxing.
I really recommend this place. it's awesome. it was much much better than I expected and compared to the value that I paid

What an amazing experience! The rooms are so clean and the staff and the amenities are fantastic! you are 20 minutes outside of downtown Paris, but you're right next to a metro station staff will help you find where you need to go and then when you come back you can check out the brasseries the bakeries in the neighbourhood and it's so fantastic! getting out of the rat race in the middle of Paris is quite nice, when you want a relaxing wonderful French dinner mingle with the locals.. who are so pleasant! A fantastic trip! I will never forget!
Perfect place to stay for multiple nights! Clean space, roomy, 2 minute walk from the metro station which takes you anywhere in France. We loved our stay there

De "Amsterdam" kamer is een stijlvolle kamer. Hij lijkt iets groter op de foto's, maar dit is geen probleem. Er is een waterkoker voorzien voor koffie en thee. De kamer was proper, ook het bad was zeer schoon. Het was een aangenaam verblijf voor een kleine prijs!
100% recomendado
Sehr gutes Hotel, mit super Anschluss an die Metro. Liegt in einer tollen Gegend mit vielen Restaurants.
Es war ein guter aufenthalt das zimmer war jedoch etwas kleiner als erwartet
Great place with great staff.
Great location

Reception was extremely helpful with local transportation tips- going above and beyond to show me the right bus stop, time to leave to avoid traffic etc.  They were also very responsive immediately when I complained of room smelling of cigarette smoke (probably from prior guest).  Room was very clean and and bed comfortable with a view of courtyard. As other reviewers had noted,  little privacy between shower and bed ( unless you wait at desk out of sight while partner showers) so if you travel as an ‘uncouple’ twosome, make sure it’s someone you don’t mind seeing your uh... bestself ;)     There’s coffee and tea in room.  Hotel’s location is a little out of central Paris where the most visited churches and museums are.... but if you want to be away from where most tourists congregate, this is a good spot to see local, working class Parisian life. For the price of one night in Paris, this can’t be beat!
Very close to the metro. Very clean. Staff was extremely helpful and polite.
muy bien
Clean, cute modern hotel. Rooms are very small but the design makes it aesthetically pleasing. Cute location outside of paris. 20 min uber ride to central paris area   Would stay here again
Really nice stay! Front desk was very helpful!
a neat and comfortable hotel.
It’s really a great place. Very comfy and unique fixtures. I loved it !

Thank you so much for making my short stay in Paris so memorable. From local tips to last minute documents needed to be printed you guys helped every step of the way. The room was exactly as it is shown in the pictures and the front desk staff was super helpful. The location of the hotel made it super easy to get in and out of the main attractions in Paris. Highly recommend and surely will book this place for my next stay in Paris!
smaller than expected, easy to access
Excelente
Great place and staff

Prima plek wanneer je met de auto een weekend naar Parijs gaat. Naruto dichtbij en nette, schone kamer die wel wat kleiner is dan op de foto lijkt. 
De wc op onze kamer had een ruime kier naar de badkamer die open was, daarom misschien niet zo geschikt vit stellen die net samen zijn ;)
Stylish little hotel, great value and well located beside the metro. The receptionist was also very helpful. I would definitely stay here again.
It was a pleasant stay. The room was smaller than you can tell on the photos, but otherwise it was just fine. Thanks again.
Amazing place the staff were very nice and hospital. Food was available 24 hours, room was stylish modern and cozy would definitely stay here again! And close to everything!

A spotless, comfortable, private space that any traveller would dream of after a long day of touring. The stylish touches are an added flare, and the garden perfect for a relaxing drink! Access to the metro is a 2 min walk (if that). Highly recommended.
perfect for the 1-2 day stay. cool rooms,great staff and great location. would stay again.

If you are a solo traveler, or traveling with someone I would definitely recommend Atypic hotel. It is really beautiful, and for the most part really quite and peaceful. It is very close to the Metro, and the bus. There are also grocery stores and food shops around. This is definitely an incredible place, if you have the option stay here, for an authentic experience, with genuine staff.
Definitely recommend!
Die Fotos lassen eine größere Unterkunft vermuten. Aber es hat uns an nichts gefehlt. Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder! Veronika

Had a wonderful stay. Great room, great view, not expensive and had everything I needed. It is very close to public transport, making it even more easy to visit all the places in Paris that you would like to see.

Very close to metro stop ‘Mairie de clichy’. About 6 stops away from champs-elysee. 

There is a great bakery just beside the hotel, laundry shop beside too for reasonable pricing.

There is also a grocery shop close by where the metro is and another great bakery on the other side of the metro.

Camille and her team were very friendly and helpful with advices and how to get around Paris. 

Bear in mind that on Sundays, there are almost no restaurants opened around that area. But the Lebanese cafe opposite is good enough for getting some food.

There is support from the team 24/7. The hotel is clean, aircon is cold enough and beds were comfortable. Love the blackout curtains too!!!

Thanks for making my stay memorable everyone!!
We had a great stay in Paris. While the location of this hotel is slightly outside of the city of Paris, it wasn’t far at all and was completely worth it! Highly recommend.
Very cozy but nice and hip hotel.
Great place! Very clean and high hospitality.
Buena experiencia
Very clean, good service,  comfortable and good communications!
Tokos!!!
This is a great little place in Paris just around the corner from a metro stop, so extremely accessible. It was clean and exactly how it was pictured, well worth a look and a stay.
Great residential area and very close to the train station. The bed was very comfortable and a great stay for my one night remaining in Paris.
Clean, modern hotel room, about 45 mins from city center. Well-connected to public transportation

Very close to public transportation, staff was very kind and friendly. Rooms were compact but big enough to be comfortable for two people. Loved it and would definitely recommend to any travelers on a tight budget that want to be close to the tourist spots of Paris.
Fantastic spot to stay in Clichy. Cosy and clean, and modern finish. Very easy and highly recommended! Great spot.
Ein paar tolle Tage in Paris☺️
Nice place

We loved the stay at Camilles place, the amsterdam room was stylish, clean everything was top quality. Especially outstanding was the service -even for finding chicken well after midnight, for taking care of our luggage and working out the logistics to explore paris a bit more and getting to the airport on time on our last day there.

I really recommend those who are looking for well-decorated and stylish boutqiue hotel in Paris.The price is reasonable and the room is vey nice and I am lucky enough to get early check-in.

Since,my first time in Paris.I asked her a lot about trip,food and she is really nice help me to arrange things.
Boutique room, bright, clean and easy access to all of Paris as you're just 2 minutes from the M9 line. All staff were friendly and we had a lovely time in Paris! Thanks to Camille and all the staff!
Beautiful hotel. Staff was friendly and the room was definitely cozy.
It was great, I arrived a bit earlier than expected..but they still got me chrvkrd in and got me in my room. Awesome
It was just perfect, such a stylish room! Thank you so much for your hospitality, we enjoyed our stay a lot!
Camille is great at communicating and if there is a problem or you need assistance, she replies quickly. It is a great space for the price and the employees were very friendly.
I had the Amsterdam room, a cosy and clean room. The hotel is easy to reach by Metro and Bus from gare du nord. I'll be back soon!
Place was very stylish and was very welcoming. Room was as described and for the price, it was totally worth it. It's just a stone's throw away from the Metro. Had very fast WiFi too
The room was awesome. Highly recommended it.
Elke dag na een lange dag door parijs te hebben gelopen, was de kamer helemaal schoon en opgeruimd als we terugkwamen, super!! Ook waren alle werknemers erg vriendelijk tegenover de gasten.
Super comfortable room, clean, great little spa and very firendly staff ☺
Wonderful stay - Camille is a fantastic host, definitely recommend

The room was clean and comfortable. But smaller than it looks on the photos. I couldn't use the wellness place because it was from 16:00 to 20:00.. It would be better if these hours were extended. It's not in central Paris but metro is in 5 min walk..
Very close to Paris without the cost! Very nice and the Wi-Fi works well. Cozy, but for people who are visiting the sights this is all you need.
Everything worked really well. Place is nice, clean and comfortable. Just about the breakfast we would expect something more,  also considering the extra cost of 10€

Amazing location, amazing staff and superb service. :)
Rooms are good, perfect sized. :)
Enjoyed the stay

The location was very close to public transportation and though I arrived early the hostess was very agreeable and my room was ready. The room was exactly as promoted with an ensuite restroom, full shower, and euro size tub, queen bed with plenty of pillows and fresh linen. The room included a small writing desk, multiple plug locations and small kettle with complimentary teas & coffees.
I originally selected the location based on the access to the jacuzzi (hot tub) and gym, but after 15 hrs traveling I fell asleep only to wake after the amenties were closed. The proper rest was much more needed.  The hours of the amenities were explained during check-in. As well of being invited to a community style full breakfast for an unbeatable price.
The staff at Hotel Savoy were very helpful in meeting our various needs. The accommodations were excellent.

I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. The lady that checked me in was very pleasant and helpful. She told me how to get into the city for dinner and I would have been so lost without her. The room was small but very clean. The bathroom was nice and clean as well. I have no complaints and I loved that it was so close to the train station. I would stay here again!
Clean but small and it's a hotel... breakfast is a little expensive.

We arrived in Paris at our destination airbnb  Savoy. We were greeted by Anna the front desk  clerk with exceptional customer service. She was both friendly and efficient in meeting our needs. The room was clean and comfortable for our stay . Anna mapped out  places we wanted explore on our maps for us. This extra help was both kind and useful. We would stay at the Savoy again .

When I first booked this place, I didn't realize it will be in Hotel Savoy. Camille and the staff were nice. The room is very cheap on the outskirts of Paris. We learned how to use the metro lines fairly quickly, although it can be confusing. The elevators were pretty slow. There is no AC so it can be fairly hot in the summer but we were able to open the windows at night. All in all, it was a very nice place to stay.
The staff was very friendly and the price was very good. They were very helpful. They called us a taxi and had conversations with us although our French was not so good.

A cheap place to stay on the outskirts of Paris! It's good for avoiding the hustle of city living. Be warned, you will need to develop your knowledge of the Parisian metro line however this adds to the experience! Staff were friendly. Don't commit if it's only for the free benefits of the gym area, as it's far too hot in the room to exercise!

My room  was comfortable and the hotel has a pretty good location (very close there is a direct metro line to the centre). There is also a simple breakfast. Overall I recommend this place especially when a special price is offered as was in my case.

Hi this was a great experience! This is a nice hotel and we were lucky to get a discounted price through Airbnb. The metro is on the same block as the hotel and there is a lot of street parking or a reserved parking (10 euro a day).
Very friendly staff!
Recommended to all!
pas de commentaire
Rapport qualité prix imbattable ! Anthony est très sympa !
Séjour très agréable chez Anthony, qui est très sympa ! Appartement propre et très bien situé, je recommande !

Anthony est un hôte très accueillant et très sympathique. L'appartement est superbe, rénové, et moderne. La résidence est très agréable et idéalement située pour prendre l'air dans le centre de Paris, dans le respect d'un km de distance.
Hôte accueillant avec conversation très agréable !
Très bon séjour chez Anthony, un hôte très agréable à la discussion facile. De plus l'appartement et la chambre sont très confortables :)
Hôte très sympa et réactif, appartement confortable et très très bien situé.
Tout était parfait, emplacement idéal.

Anthony est un garçon charmant, dynamique, accueillant et d’une conversation intéressante et facile, avec qui on se sent toute suite à l’aise.
L’appartement est grand et conforme à la description !
On y reviendra sûrement, si l’occasion se présente !

Je recommande vivement le logement d'Anthony. Nous n'avons y passé qu'une seule nuit malheureusement mais nous aurions aimer y rester plus ! L'appartement est hyper bien situé en plein centre de Paris est accessible facilement par métro. L'immeuble et l'appartement ont été rénové, tout est propre et très bien équipé. Anthony est très sympa et nous a donné des conseils pour profiter au mieux de son quartier pendant notre séjour très court. Merci Anthony !

Tout s'est très bien passé , Anthony est un hôte réactif , arrangeant et fort sympathique
Tout était parfait je recommande sans hésiter
Hôte super sympa et arrangeant. Je recommande vivement!

Rien à redire, tout a été parfait. Logement idéalement situé, parfaitement propre, calme et confortable 
Je recommande sans soucis
Anthony est un hôte tres dynamique et tres arrangeant. Son apt est idéalement situé en plein centre de Paris. Tout est a porté de pied ou de metro. Vraiment top je recommande

Anthony est quelqu'un de très agréable avec qui l'on peut discuter très facilement. 
Réactivité au top. 
Appartement très bien situé.
Je recommande !!
Nous avons beaucoup échangé, Anthony est quelqu'un de bien et l'appartement est relativement grand, j'ai passé un très bon séjour. N'hésitez pas à passer chez lui si vous passez dans le coin !
Super hospitalité, hôte bienveillant disponible et réactif. On est pas resté très longtemps mais on recommande :)
Super place, thanks Anthony!
Everything was perfect and clean and house keeper so nice!! He was really helpful to keep our stuff the last day. 10/10
Everythimg was great!
Petite chambre très agréable avec un bon accueil !
Logement conforme à la description !
Logement certes très petit mais tellement bien situé pour se promener facilement dans paris. Proche de toutes les commodites

Logement très simple d'accès grâce aux indications précises et au système de clé mis en place par Julien.

Le logement est au rdc, peu lumineux, mais intérieurement très astucieusement aménagé et agréable à l'oeil (qu'il fait voyager).

Cependant, deux hics : l'humidité de la salle de bain et le peu d'espace pour utiliser le sanibrouilleur rend cet espace des sanitaires désagréable ; le bruit, la nuit, du chauffe-eau, installé à 1,5m de lit, qui se relance et se déclenche régulièrement et qui m'a fait (j'ai le sommeil léger) passer une nuit infernale.

Ce lieu reste une bonne alternative aux hôtels, pour qui veut un lieu privatif à moindre coût. A noter la présence d'un seul micro-ondes pour cuisiner - que j'ai vu pour ma part trop tard.
Conforme à la description. C'est un logement minimaliste, mais il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour être bien.
Juste à coté de gare de Lyon, propre, avec tout ce qu'il faut pour une seule personne et avec une arrivée hyper facile. Bref, je recommande.
Logement très agréable dans lequel on se sent comme chez soi. Proche du métro et de toutes commodités. Je recommande
trés Bon séjour

Conforme à ce que je souhaitais, parfaitement situé, très bien pour une personne une nuit

Beaucoup de points positifs. La localisation à deux pas de la gare, le quartier, la déco et la taille fonctionne bien si on cherche un coin sûr et indépendant pour dormir. Les bémols sont liés à l'ancienneté du logement, avec une certaine humidité dans les sanitaires et une isolation phonique toute relative. Mais compensé par une résidence très calme durant mon séjour.

Si vous devez prendre un train tôt le matin, c’est un hébergement idéal. La chambre est très pratique. Je trouve néanmoins que les tarifs ramenés aux mètres carrés sont un peu chers. C’est évidemment une remarque de provincial.

petit logement mais bien agencé

Points positifs :
- Le quartier ! Très safe, calme, j'ai pu m'y ballader à n'importe quelle heure sans soucis et sans stress. Il est par ailleurs très agréable, avec de bonnes adresses aux alentours (par exemple le resto "Table Métis" rue des Boulets; la Coulée Verte Dumont pour se ballader; etc), et des commerçants et voisins souriants et sympas. Le logement est aussi très bien situé, on peut se rendre facilement partout en bus ou métro.
- Julien est vraiment d'une efficacité au top ! Très réactif et très arrangeant, tout était simple ! Super communication !

Points négatifs :
- On y capte très mal la 3G/4G!! Puisqu'il n'y a pas de wifi (c'est précisé dans l'annonce), c'est assez contraignant...
- La propreté n'est clairement pas au top. Quelques exemples : un problème d'humidité qui provoque des moisissures, vaisselle empoussiérée, bouilloire complètement entartrée, les coins poussiéreux, etc. Personnellement ça ne m'a pas empêchée de passer un super séjour, mais tout dépend de la sensibilité de chacun ! Cependant les frais de ménage me semblent donc tout de même excessifs.

Bref, un logement très bien pour de courts séjours pratiques et sans prises de tête!
Logement pratique pour une nuit.

Julien est très réactif et agréable. 
La chambre est conforme par rapport à sa taille et la localisation. 
Toutefois on frise l'insalubrité avec des moisissures dans tout l'appartement notamment sur tout le mur à côté du lit. Moisissures cachées derrière un panneau de bois. Matelas à changer. Frais de ménage excessif par rapport à la surface et à la propreté de la chambre. A fuir
C'est la première fois que je laisse un commentaire aussi négatif et je ne comprends pas les commentaires des autres personnes qui m'ont fait réserver la chambre.

I had a nice 3 nights stay at Julien's appartment. It was exactly as described, he even wrote me when I requested the booking, to emphasis on the fact the appartment is very small, and that I still cancel if I want. Communication went perfectly with him. The appartment is very well situated ( metro station, Gare de Lyon rail way station, bus stations, not far from place de La Nation and Republique) quiet a.number of restaurants and bistro all arround) I recommend the place but only for short stays (not more than 2 or 3 nights) and not during hot seasons, cause except a small fan there is no air conditioning and I think that it should be hell in that room when it's more than 28°. The appartment got a small kitchenette with minimum equipments. Not really done for cooking, but ok for preparing a breakfast or a salad/sandwiche (that what I did) All in all, good value for the cost.

The flat is small, but you know it, and Julien has also written to me to advise me. So this is ok
The problem is that he told that there is a Kitchen... ok there are a silk and ONE electric cooker (that can barely warm up the water)... I don't think it's a kitchen properly. He also written to me "I DON'T WANT YOU TO COOK THERE, IS NOT REALLY SAFE..."
last but not least, take care to one electrical socket that is not fixed to the wall

Julien's place is Paris size, but has everything needed. Communication and check-in went super smooth. I was a bit surprised that there is no WiFi, but I guess I should have better read the description. Happy to visit again some time in the future.

Alexandre mérite largement sa  réputation de superhost. Sens marqué de l'hospitalité, bel intérêt pour la conversation, y compris avec de jeunes enfants, respect, grande ouverture d'esprit et une charmante attention pour faciliter la vie de ses hôtes. Que demander de plus? Certes, l'endroit est un petit peu excentré par rapport à Paris intramuros, mais d'une part il est à deux pas d'Orly, ce qui est un atout en cas de départ de l'aéroport un jour d'embouteillage, et d'autre part le rapport qualité-prix est excellent. Pour nous, c'est bien simple : on reviendra à la première occasion!

Vous aurez le droit à un superbe acceuil et Alexandre vous mettra, des votre entrée, dans une très bonne ambiance. L'appartement est super propre, fonctionnel et  la chambre est spacieuse  avec tout le confort nécessaire. Endroit calme dans belle residence récente. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés sans regret.
Alexandre est l'hôte parfait, je recommande à tous !
Bienveillant et intéressant..mise en confiance ...un échange très enrichissant. Je n’ai manqué. Service exceptionnel.
Alexandre est hôte impeccable, serviable, avec qui on peut facilement discuter. Toujours disponible pour nous et très réactif.

Tu as été un hôte exceptionnel d’attention, d’échanges. Une grande qualité d’écoute nous permettant d’aborder des sujets très profonds comme si on était des potes qui se retrouvent.
Le reste est secondaire ça ne m’a pas dérangé plus que ça. Le plus important est cet humanisme qui le caractérise et qui fait de lui une personne pleine de bonté, ouvert aux autres à 1000%.

Si tu passes sur region nantaise, prends contact avec moi, ma maison t’es ouverte. Garde mon compte en mémoire car peut être que dans quelques années on pourrait se recroiser et voir comment la vie nous aura fait évoluer.

Allez-y en confiance. Même si vous êtes une femme seule et que vous avez une crainte d’être hébergée chez un homme. Alexandre fera le max pour vous.

Si vous aimez l’échange et le partage, l’ouverture d’esprit... réservez chez lui il rayonne de bonté. Sinon vous passerez à côté et ça serait dommage.

Alexandre’s place is a bit outside The sites of Paris, but is easily accessible via metro and Uber. The communication before check-in and the check in-process were smooth and without issue. I was able to check-in before the official check-in time and rest after traveling all day. The space is modern and in a brand new building. The space is clean and as described. It was a perfect location to use as a place to sleep after a long day of seeing Paris. Alexandre as a host is welcoming and interested in getting to know his guests. Thank you, Alexandre for a great place to stay!

Nuestra estadía en el apartamento de Alexandre fue muy buena, todo tal cual lo muestra en el anuncio. Se encuentra en un barrio muy bonito y tranquilo de Créteil, el transporte al centro de paris no es complicado debido al buen sistema de transporte de la ciudad y Alexandre siempre está dispuesto a ayudar con cualquier duda sobre la ciudad es una persona muy amigable y definitivamente volveríamos a hospedarnos con el !

Alexandre is an excellent host. The house is in a new building, I found it very clean, comfortable and secure. I highly recommend his place, and will be returning here very soon!!

This is a great place to stay in Paris.  For some reason I could not get a place in Paris and kept getting messed around by the hosts but Alexandre didn't let me down.  The flat is 10 - 15 minutes on the train from Gare de Lyon and only a few minutes walk from the station.  The flat is a very modern building and you will not be disappointed when staying here.  Alexandre is a very enthusiastic host and makes you feel like an old friend as soon as you walk through his door.  He has interests in a lot of things and is very easy to talk to.  He is a true internationalist - a citizen of the world!  Solidarity to Alexandre!  I hope to see you again soon!

Unfortunately not a good experience for the following reasons:
The flat is very dirty and dusty specially kitchen, toilet and bathroom.
The toilet is very small. Very uncomfortable, the bathroom is also small and access through the kitchen, when using the bathroom is not possible to use the kitchen as it needs to be the door close while using the bathroom. The sink in shower is blocked and it converts in a pool in just seconds.
In the kitchen is a lot of small flies. 
The address is very difficult to find about 10 minutes walking distance from the nearest metro station however the first time took me about 40 minutes to find it.
The host "Tania" doesn't speak English only french. Making the communication extremely difficult.

Tania is a great host, try to make the place the best it can be with snacks and a sweet voice to explain it all and try to explain in English, she is a very kind person. 

It is a really simples place, do not expect any luxurious, but it is safe, near the bus and metro however a bit difficult to find. It is okay for someone trying to explore the city, but not to work or something like this.

It is a nice place if you have a motorcycle and you want to park it in a secure place. Disadvantage Tania could only allow me in at 9 o'clock at night and I had to leave at quarter to eight in the morning. The kitchen was not really useable due to being full of dirty crockery. I might of been spoilt in the past with previous host who have been very very good.

En faite, un simple rideau sépare le  lit  du passage ou vous dormez ( dans ces conditions, vous n'avez  absolument pas d'intimité...) 
D'autre part, il y avait une odeur de tabac froid et d'urine de chat dans toutes les pièces qui  mettez accessible, ce qui est particulièrement désagréable...
Il est également très difficile de  ce garé dans ce quartier ci vous devez vous déplacer en voiture..
Pour ce qui est du côté positif de la location que j'ai pris ce jour là : 
La propriétaire est accueillante, sympathique et reste disponible ( ce qu'elle ma tout de suite annoncer quand je suis arrivé) 
Le cartier est calme, la salle de bain et propre et fonctionnel.
Dans la cuisine, il y a à votre disposition tout  le nécessaire pour pouvoir ce restaurer.
 Pour ma part, je ne retournerais pas dans ce Airbnb malgré un prix très attractif dans cette zone de la région parisienne..

Reside in Louisiana is to be really in the heart of the Saint-Germain des Prés district, just a few seconds from its cafes, bistros restaurants, shops and galleries most enjoyable. And a few minutes from the Louvre, the Luxembourg Gardens, the Paris River Seine, Flore cafes, Deux Magots, Procope, and so many other wonderful places to discover.
The hotel has an architecture that is unlike any other, its corridors, its interior courtyard, its rooms all different will make you love the quirky places in an increasingly standardized universe where all accommodations are similar.
The team, in place for a long time and reliable, is very kind to the guests, looking for solutions to all the problems encountered by the traveler. And the receptionists, present 24 hours a day, really know the neighborhood, giving valuable advice for visits and outings.
Wifi works perfectly and at full speed. The breakfast is hearty, the bread and all the pastries come out of the oven of a real baker.
What else to say? Oh yes, at night, the ghosts of the many artists who have lived here come to make you dream!
//
Résider à La Louisiane, c'est d'abord être vraiment au coeur du quartier Saint-Germain des Prés, à juste quelques secondes de ses cafés, bistrots restaurants, boutiques et galeries les plus agréables. Et à quelques minutes du Louvre, du Jardin du Luxembourg, du fleuve de Paris La Seine, des cafés du Flore, des Deux Magots, du Procope, et de tant d'autres endroits merveilleux à découvrir.
L'hôtel a une architecture qui ne ressemble à nulle autre, ses couloirs, sa cour intérieure, ses chambres toutes différentes vous feront aimer les lieux décalés dans un univers de plus en plus normé où tous les logements sont pareils.
L'équipe, en place depuis longtemps et fiable, est très gentille avec les guests, cherchant des solutions à tous les problèmes rencontrés par le voyageur. Et les réceptionnistes, présents 24h/24,connaissant vraiment le quartier, donnant de précieux conseils pour les visites et les sorties.
Le Wifi marche parfaitement et à toute vitesse. Le petit-déjeuner est copieux, le pain et toutes les viennoiseries sortent du four d'un vrai boulanger.
Que dire d'autre ? Ah oui, la nuit, les fantômes des nombreux artistes qui ont vécu ici viennent vous faire rêver !

Rien à redire sur mon séjour à l'hôtel Louisiane ! Le personnel était sympathique et l'hôtel  idéalement situé, en plein cœur de St-Germain, à deux pas de plusieurs stations de métro, RER et bus. Ma chambre était très propre, avec lit double, salle de bain privée, petit bureau et placard-penderie (et même un mini frigo). Étant en déplacement professionnel, cela convenait parfaitement à mes besoins. Le petit-déjeuner était très bien aussi, de type buffet donc copieux, avec différentes options sucrée et salée. Une bonne adresse que je recommande et à laquelle je reviendrai sûrement lors de futurs déplacements !

Hotel La Louisiane is such a lovely little gem in an amazing area of Paris! They are hospitable and kind, and the front desk even helped me out with subway directions while the strike was delaying certain lines. They are understanding, kind, and the included breakfast is such a wonderful touch! Merci beaucoup and I will be staying here again if I return to Paris!

I can’t say enough about this adorable hotel. It’s obviously undergoing some work, which will only make it better. In the meantime, the location was PERFECT and it included cute touches like tea, coffee, and cookies in the room. Tasty breakfast, very comfortable sitting and tv area downstairs. Would stay there again and recommend to friends. A steal for the price!

I will be back!  I was a little worried about booking this, but I shouldn’t have been.  I think they want to make sure no one has the wrong idea.  This was perfect for me. This hotel is, in a word, sublime. The location is outstanding - super close to three different metro stations, opposite a supermarket, near several famous Paris sights, and slap bang in the middle of loads of places to eat and drink. The check-in staff were great (upgrading me for free!) and the free breakfast was just what I needed each morning. There was no problem with noise from the street below. Next time I'm in Paris I will definitely want to stay here.

8월초에 3박했습니다. 방에 들어가보니 확실히 오래된 티가 확 났고 그래서 좀 청결하지못하다는 느낌이 있었는데 하루 지나보니 위치가 정말 너무 좋아서 오래된건 전혀 문제되지않을만큼이였습니다. 한국에서 깨끗한곳을 매우 선호하는 분이라면 맘에 들지않을수도 있습니다. 저는 위치와 친절때문에 다음에도 이곳에 숙박할겁니다.

It is also conveniently located 2-3 blocks away from a metro stop. The staff here was incredibly friendly and sweet! Will be back!
I really want to recommend this place!!! Perfect location, clean room, friendly employees who were ready to quickly provide any help. This place helped me to enjoy my vacation :)

El alojamiento superó mis expectativas, había leído comentarios no tan buenos acerca de las instalaciones pero debo decir que la habitación estaba impecable, las zonas comunes estaban bien, quizás un poco gastada la alfombra de los pasillos pero nada grave, el tamaño de la habitación perfecto, tenía vista interior y entraba buena iluminación, se puede escuchar un poco de ruido de lo que pasa arriba o en los pasillos, pero creo que los huéspedes debemos ser respetuosos y no hay problema con eso. En cuanto a la ubicación, perfecta, muchas facilidades de transporte, comidas y comercio cerca, y los chicos de la recepción muy amables, aunque no todos hablaban español nos pudimos comunicar y me ayudaron con mis dudas. Sin duda el precio es bajo en comparación con otros alojamientos del sector, vale la pena y me volvería a alojar allí, lo recomiendo.

첫 1박 하자마자 너무 좋아서 2박 연장 했습니다. 숙소 때문에 파리에서 더 머물렀을 만큼 만족스러운 곳이었어요. 노후화 됐다는 평을 보았는데.. 오래된 건물이지만 제게는 정말 멋진 곳이었습니다. 사람에 따라 평이 갈릴 수 있을 것 같아요) 정말 청결했고 친절한 스텝들, 훌륭한 조식, 완벽한 위치 등등 모든 것이 완벽했습니다. 다음에 파리에 간다면 반드시 이 곳에서 숙박할거예요 :-)

great hotel... close to Notre Dame other attractions.

Xavier's hotel, while small, is in the perfect location by the Latin quarter. Upon my arrival, I asked for a room with a big window so that I could see the Parisian streets. The woman at the desk warned me that it might be a bit noisy, but I told her I didn't mind... it turns out by "noise" she meant live jazz played in the streets on the weekends! I left my window wide open so I could hear it, but when the window was shut it was barely audible. Don't expect an American experience here... no big continental breakfast, but lovely croissants and coffee instead! While not luxurious and high-end, this hotel had authentic Parisian charm for a great price.

This  budget hotel is well situated on the Left Bank within walking distance of many tourist attractions,  and central to many cafes and bars.  However the rooms are quite cheap and shabby, with worn, torn carpet and very old furniture. The room looks nothing like the picture on Air BnB. There is no sound proofing between rooms, you can hear EVERYTHING from your neighbour.  Having said that, the cleaning is a high standard, and the staff, especially the breakfast lady, were pleasant and helpful.
I had a great time in St. Germain, was warmly greeted and got nice advice to get around the city. Wonderful get together at night in the hotel lobby - thank you!
This hotel is in a wonderful location! The room is very clean and comfortable. I have no complaints!
It was very nice stay because there is nearly city from the hotel . But there’s not a dryer.

La Louisiane is a hotel rather than a regular Airbnb place but it was clean and comfortable with quite good sized room, recently renovated bathroom that was super clean and friendly, helpful staff on reception. Great value and great location. Would definitely stay here again.
Very good!

A very simple older place in the heart of Paris!  The breakfast is quite good.  It is quite noisy but you're in St. Germain which is NEVER quiet. Very close to Metro, the nightlife, grocery store across the street.  If needing a kettle for tea €20 deposit.  Also very warm on the upper floors though rooms have fans, no AC.  The hotel does have a small single lift but it's very slow.  Large Americans, stay away! LOVE the bathtub/shower combo; brilliant after a day of running around Paris!  I wrote to ask for a room with bathtub and were happy to accommodate!  They reply super quick!  With this level of service, despite the noise, I'd stay again!
Great location for the price!

Thanks Xavier for taking me at short notice yes its an older property with a good bathroom and it was good value and great location in St germain. There are many cafes and the common spaces are nice. And the staff are helpful. Altho there were some issues on the day the nice staff overcame then and its a really great location to experience paris and I like a lot of character in a place and this property had that proper French character. Its right on metro and great food and wine at door!

Easy check in, got to the room and it was quite nice and even had a bath tub which I really was grateful for. Amazing location.
Very nice staff and very comfy bed. Theres a good amount of restaurants just outside and the metro is very close!

Great little budget hotel in a brilliant location. Reception guys were super helpful with travel and transport, food and drink etc. 
This is a busy district night and day so if you’re happy in the mix of it all, this is really handy. 5min walk to Odeon Metro, 15mins travel on one easy line to Gare du Nord. 
Some rooms above a busy street so if you’re a light sleeper ask for a higher floor. Likewise if you’re a non-smoker, let the hotel know. 
Great guys, really helpful before and during visit.

As you can see from the description, this a family hotel and not a private apartment. But the location is incredible, the place was tidy and clean, breakfast good and check in/out easy. Would only note that there can be quite a bit of noise (trash collectors in the night and construction noise from early morning on a Saturday) especially if you leave the window open. 
Personally I will definitely come back.

With Paris as my flight destination from California and back, I stayed in this reasonably priced hotel twice on my multi-city trip to Europe in August.  The two different rooms I stayed in varied in size, but each time the room was clean and comfortable.  (It might be warm in the room during the middle of an August day, but  I was usually in only for the night and there was a small fan quietly giving forth a gentle breeze.)  For my purposes and style of traveling, the location of the hotel is perfect.  It is very close to bus and metro stops and is within walking distances to famed institutions of art, culture and history.   I might take bus and metro to research sites in and outside Paris during the day but I was able to walk around in the lively areas of cultural interest, often in the evening or at night.  In the room on my return stay at the hotel,  noises of the people amusing themselves at night could be heard occasionally from the street below but the merry-making noises did not bother me as I thought they were part of the authentic city life and they died down when I went to bed any way.  The stuff members were friendly and professional.  The breakfast offered with the room booking was decent in selection and quality, including a variety of fruit, baked products, and coffee, tea, freshly squeezed orange juice.   I think the hotel is a good fit to budget-conscious visitors to Paris who enjoy walking around to see what the city has to offer in the life of mind and senses.

Great price for such a great location!    Simple bedroom but clean.  10 minute walk to the Louvre. 5 minute walk to the closest Metro. Grocery store across the street. Restaurants, cafes, and bakeries next to and around the corner. Great location. Would stay there again.

Humble accommodations in a perfect location. The hotel is a few steps from great restaurants, bars, shops, and galleries. In addition, only a few minutes from the Louvre, Luxembourg Gardens, Seine River, Notre Dame, and other amazing attractions. The croissants at breakfast were perfection! The host was responsive, attentive, and flexible. Though my flight arrived very late, the check-in process was easy and I was able to get right to my room. The location and value for this hotel is unbeatable. Would recommend to anyone looking for cheaper, ideally located accommodations.

The bed is good sized but the rooms are tiny, but as a solo traveler it was perfect for me. Anymore than one person would probably feel squeezed though. Hidden Bargain.
After 4 weeks 8 different Airbnb stays in Paris, I booked my last 2 nights (through Airbnb) at Atypik Hotel. The Clichy-la-Garenne neighborhood, just a couple blocks outside Bd Périferique and Arr. 17th, bordered 2 upscale neighborhoods where I had previously stayed—Les Batignolles to the south and Levallois-Perrier to the west. The latter, BTY, is my favorite Paris neighborhood to date... upscale with fine shopping, cafes on every corner, characterized by gregarious locals living the Parisian life you’ve always imagined WITHOUT the hordes of tourists. Clichy seems a more mixed working class neighborhood, but don’t be deceived, the locals are respectful and the stay friendly. You can walk to Wagram or the mentioned neighborhoods in a pleasant half hour. Add 30 minutes and you can be staring up at Arc de Triomphe. Metro line 13 is just around the corner and buses run regularly. Atypik was my only Airbnb that had AC (in the worst heatwave on record). The in-room fancoil was silent and refrigerating. There are 2 supermarkets and a natural food store within 2 blocks. If the neighborhood looks a bit down turned compared to its neighbors, the Hotel seems brand new, completely remodeled top to bottom. Artistically done, too. What they call a « continental breakfast » is much more: scrambled eggs, bacon, whole wheat and white toast, baguettes, pastries, yogurts flavored and plain, muesli, fresh fruits and cheeses, all the coffees and teas, milk, and sugar or stevia for sweetening. Pay the 12€ and enjoy a good starter meal. You'll pay at least 18-24 EUR outside.  The beds have new foam mattresses = good nights sleep! You are generously allotted lots of towels. All that for $70 a night. I’ll be back. Connecting to CDG? 2 easy métros to Gare du Nord. Follow signage to RER B Aéroport. Cost less than 11€.

C est un dortoir donc le silence et le respect du sommeil depend des différents voyageurs. Reveveil av4h par arrive de 2 autres voyageurs. Et certains sentent  pas tres bon. 
Rien a dire sur l hôte  c est un hôtel de routard correct
Très bonne adresse pour un passage rapide à Paris, l'emplacement est idéal (à deux pas de la gare du Nord), les chambres sont très propres et l'espace commun est convival.
Auberge très sympathique. J’ai beaucoup apprécié ce séjour. Je recommande.

Il faut s'attendre à une très petite chambre. Je trouve que ça ne vaut pas les 39€ la nuit. L'emplacement en revanche est intéressant si on veut se rendre Gare du Nord, à proximité immédiate. Malheureusement, ce bon emplacement s'accompagne de son lot de nuisances sonores (bagarres) dans la rue.
Pratique ,bien situé par rapport à la Gare du Nord.
Bon séjour, ambiance internationale et guitares sur les murs ;)
La chambre est proche de la rue. La circulation est très pratique.La chambre ne est pas loin du Sacré Cœur. Great
Chambre petite et mixte certes mais un lieu commun qui est agréable et chaleureux. Endroit sécurisé, simple à trouver, un peu à l'écart de l'axe donc au calme. Petit prix donc bien pour dépanner
Je vous le conseille

Bien localisé, pas loin de la Gare du Nord, aussi les arrêts de bus qui passent à plusieurs endroits touristiques et que rejoindre aussi le centre de Paris. Donc, beaucoup de choix de locomotion facile, marchés, restaurants, centres commerciaux à cotés...  Lieu sécurisé et conviviale. Je recommande!

Très bon rapport qualité/ prix.
Certes un peu petit, mais cela répond aux critères d'une auberge de jeunesse.
Une bonne possibilité pour un petit séjour à Paris pour pas trop d'argent et près du Gare du Nord.

Cet hôtel n'a pas sa place parmi les offres airbnb. Airbnb est des logement avec service fournis haut de gamme chez les particuliers. Cet hostel est une auberge. Pas de lumière pour les lits pour la lecture ou autre chose, lits grinçantd et étroits, pas de prise pour charger son téléphone, chambre mixtes. Nuisance sonore des autres voyageurs des autres chambres, l'accueil digne d'un auberge de jeunesse,  voilà.
Une très joli endroit pas cher, l'idéal pour séjourner à Paris et bien profiter!!
Chambres mixtes exiguës, aucune intimité, salle de bain étroite pour 4 personnes, bien en dépannage !
Auberge bien localisée,. J'ai apprécié la flexibilité des heures d'arrivées et de départs.
très bon emplacement. personnel sympathique
J’ai passé un agréable séjour.
L’accueil très gentil, parfaitement propre
la chambre propre  c au top

Chambres un peu petites. Les coffres ne fonctionnent pas (ne ferment pas) ce qui est un peu génant.
Lits un peu étroits.
Malgré tout bon rapport qualité prix : c'est propre et fonctionnel et prix imbattable dans le Centre de Paris. Accueil agréable et toute la nuit ce qui est appréciable.
Endroit très chaleureux. Au top. Je recommande.
C’est une bonne place en général!!, la relation qualité prix est correcte,  aussi les réceptionnistes sont très gentils et sont toujours disponibles.

En pleine canicule, on est confrontés à un vrai dilemme : dormir dans la fournaise ou fenêtre ouverte, dans le boucan des bus, des klaxons et des scooters. Bref, faudrait trouver un système de ventilation interne, à défaut d'une clim !
Bien
A cause du COVID-19 mon pays à fais des restrictions pour les voyages et j’ai dû annuler mon week-end à Paris, mais sûrement je viendrai chez vous tous les fois que je tombe sur Paris

Très proche à la Gare du Nord. Accueil 24/24. La chambre assez propre, mais un peu petite pour 4 personnes. Il y a une cousine avec le frigo et la chambre pour laisser le bagage. Malheureusement on avait pas de coffre dans la chambre. Pour le reste c’était plutôt bien
Super accueil, cuisine avec tout le matériel disponible, propreté

J'ai vraiment apprécié l'atmosphère et l'endroit où la place est localisé. C'étais vraiment facile pour pouvoir visiter les monument. Le quartier est vraiment sympas. Je vais définitivement réserver la encore la prochaine fois. 😊
Propreté au rendez vous, accueil bienveillant, dommage que la chambre et la salle de bain soient petites.
Très propre, casiers qui barrent et serrures électroniques.

Emplacement excellent par rapport à la gare du nord et Sacré-Coeur. Par contre, la chambre à 4 personnes était très petite. A vérifier: s'il s'agit d'un dortoir mixte ou filles seulement. Pas très clair sur le site. Personnel très courtois.

I got what I paid for, which was a 20€ night near a train station and sacré cœur. However, the usual price according to the sign is 40€, which is way more than that bed was worth. There was no soap in the bathroom, and the other people in my room came in late, the beds were creaky, the roommates were noisy, etc. I would only pay 20€ for it and I'm glad I paid that discounted price.

Corresponds to the description, good service.
I think the place is very good to stay for a small period compared to other places in Paris.
All in all, location, services and rooms are great.
Nice and comfortable place, close to gare du Nord. Value for money.
Very friendly and good place for travelers , u recommend it
Great stay!
Nice. Simple and cheap.
Good place.
Very conveniently situated near Gare du Nord; the place is clean and very well kept,  and the personnel is helpful and friendly; I am completely satisfied
The support is awesome, the staff at the reception are very kind and they have a great Kitchen. I will come back and recommend the place to other travelers
Welcoming and practical hostel !
Great for the value.
Great place to stay in
Nice place to stay for a few nights. Not far from the Sacré Cœur and Gare du Nord, located in a dynamic area with lots of restaurants and cafés.
Amazing stay, i spent 4 days there, met a lot of amazing people from different places and played guitar in reception, staff members were very friendly and helpful and kind, thanks!
tres bien
Very good
Awesome stay and well located to explore Paris !
great location, all the facilities, very nice reception, open 24h but a very creaky bed makes hard to sleep

This was a last minute trip and they were really helpful and understanding
Muito bom. Nada pra reclamar.

Nice place for the value.
Perfect place. Clean. Amazing hospitality. Low price / good quality. Thank you very much.

パリにて5日間滞在しましたが、宿泊のみの利用ならかなり適していると思います。
レセプション前の共有スペースでは、色んな国の方とコミュニケーション取れるのもホステルの強みだと感じました。
Good location and price, small rooms with poor ventilation, not so cleen and unfortunately difficult to get hold of to get info before check in. But very friendly staff!
Great place, relatively small, but very close to the north train station and with fully equipped kitchen! I will definitely visit them again:)
Good basic hostel
Everything you need for a one-two nights stay in the city!
Super close to the station, great value for the location and overall clean place
Tudo perfeito! Ótima localização e anfitriões muito simpáticos!
Es lo que vez, me toco una habitacion de 2 camarotes buen colchon muy comodo , amplio baño agua caliente, todo ok.
Es handelt sich um ein klassisches Hostel mit einer freundlichen Rezeption die für alle Fragen offen sind.

step was very gentle and kind. they alway smile and have a open mind. the location is near gare du nord. it takes 4minute to walk there. the accomodation fare is really reasonable so I could save my butget. thank you for making me good memoies.
It is comfortable, the location is good and the staff is very nice and kind with you.
Very clean, well organised basic hostel in a great location. Would definitely recommend for a short stay or overnight stopoff

The room was different from the photos... first of all there was no terrace with the table. The restroom was not so clean. And make sure to prepare everything you need. There was not even a hand soap.
Einfaches, aber sauberes Hostel. Günstige Preise. 5 Minuten zur gare du Nord, 2 Supermärkte 2 Minuten entfernt, Küchenbenutzung. Ideal für einen Kurzaufenthalt und kleines Budget.
really good place.near the paris nord
Great room, quiet and clean, great hospitality.
It was really nice👌
It was a nice location in Paris worth for money

Es un hostal, no puedes esperar mucho y el precio es relativamente barato. A pesar de ser literas las camas se me hicieron muy cómodas. Esta ubicado al norte de la ciudad y a 4 minutos de la estación del norte de paris donde puedes tomsr diferentes metros a diferentes lugares, esta muy bien conectado con los lugares turísticos.

Lleven toalla! Jaja porque yo pregunté si me iba a dar una o llevaba la mía y me dijeron que en el hostal me daban, lo que no me dijeron es que las cobran 🙄.

Yo si viví un experiencia rara mi primera noche, se veía que las camas  ya estaba ocupadas, pero faltaba una persona. A media noche llego esta mujer haciendo mucho ruido, al final le robo el bolso a otra de las compañeras, esta salió corriendo a seguirla y logró recuperar el bolso pero no supe nunca si también recuperó su dinero.  Para esto la "ratera" todavía volvió a regresar al cusrto se tomó un baño y ya no la volvimos a ver.

Aquí para serles sincero el hostal no hizo nada, se lavo las manos y ni siquiera pudieron ayudar a la mujer que había sido robada, ella estaba muy enojada y al final se fue al día siguiente.

Los demás días que me quedé simplemente me llevaba todas mis cosas a todos lados y cuando estaba en el cuarto, dormia con mi bolso o lo metía al baño conmigo.

Esta situación no fue mucha culpa del hostal porque parecía ser una chava que solo entraba a los hostales a ver que robaba porque no llevaba equipaje.

Sin embargo el lugar tampoco quiso ayudar ni siquiera llamando a la policía.

Clean, Has many amenities : common kitchen, fridge, in the room bathroom.
Awesome hospitality, very nice people.

It was one night but the place is near the train station, metro and other transport services. Supermarket, good restaurants are also around. It was clean, tidy and receptionist also well behaved, polite. Although room was pretty small for 4 people and cost for one nigh was little bit high but it is adjustable in city like PARIS.

Хостел находится в пешей доступности от Монмартра, что несомненный плюс. В целом до основных достопримечательностей можно дойти меньше чем за час (проверено). Выбирайте его и не ошибётесь) Персонал безумно вежливый и дружелюбный.
Good place
It’s a good place!
location is great but you should focus on the decoration of the rooms.  there is only two plugs on the wall and it is far from the bed.

Gute und einfache sehr günstige Unterkunft, die Handtücher nicht vergessen einzupacken -  oder einfach vor Ort welche leihen

Um ótimo lugar para ficar pra quem quer passar 0ouco tempo em Paris. A localização é muito boa porque dá pra fazer algumas coisas a pé e se isso não for possível, há linhas de metrô muito próximas. Bem servido de bares, restaurantes e supermercados ao redor. No geral, foi uma boa estadia.

I had a great experience at this hostel! The reception was lovely and allowed my to drop off my luggage early. The location is very convenient and a great option if you are planning to explore Paris and just need a cheap place to sleep. Je recommanderais fortement Viviana!
It is near the Paris Nord and est so it's location is cool, but there is only 2 plug near the desk so, you can t use on the bed while charging.
Viviana is Kind thoughtfully and helpful and the place very good for hostel
The hostel has a nice position, the staff is kind and multilingual, all in all good value for the price!
Small, friendly and great located hostel between trainstations and Monmartre. The dorm I stayed was clean, silent and with bath and shower for 4 people. Recommended!
Very basic hostel but quite close to Gare du Nord station so works if you are traveling from there

Es un lugar muy agradable y las personas que trabajan ahí son muy atentas y amables, me encantó que resguardan tu equipaje antes del check in y después del check out para que disfrutes de la ciudad. Excelente lugar

A pesar de contar con una muy buena y céntrica ubicación y buenas instalaciones el ritmo de las habitaciones es bastante desconcertante. Mi sugerencia es que si toman esta opción sea en las habitaciones privadas y, en caso de ser las compartidas sean con personas con las que vaya a realizar el viaje.

everything was very good, the chill out area is very nice but the bed are squeaking and they have plastic cups for breakfast

Good place if you just need a bed for the night.

Thanks for being a nice  host

Удобное расположение, комфортная общая зона и тихие соседи. Очень приятное место!

So close from Train station. The accommodation perfect for backpackers. The employees (receptionist) always helping, they giving good service. I recommend !!!
Practical, humble, everything you need, close to public transit - what a hostel should be.

Although the room i was in was a lot smaller than expected from the photos, even to the point of difficulty getting four peoples worth of things in there, i still had a pleasant nights sleep here and the location is perfect

WORST stay ever. I was literally robbed in this Airbnb and nobody took responsibility on it. I had to go to the police and report the crime and had to stay somewhere else just to feel a little more safe. Definitely not what your looking for your vacations, and the host was not even willing to help or at least apologize for the situation. Do yourself a favor and avoid this place and neighborhood when you visit Paris.

La ubicación es perfecta si queres conocer Montmartre, a escasos metros de la Gare du Nord. El hostel no es muy grande pero si es limpio y ordenado. Los chicos de la recepción fueron muy gentiles y siempre me ayudaron y atendieron muy bien. Recomiendo el lugar.
A really nice play near the train station Gare du Nord. Helpful staff and nice, comfy indoor and clean rooms.
Ampliamente recomendable, cerca de la estación del tren, muy limpio y el personal super amables

Excelente lugar! Super cerca de gare du Nord, cada habitación tiene su baño para los que están en esa habitación, excelente!
The hostel is very clean and beautiful. But I think that was a little far to walk from the hostel to the Eiffel Tower. The average walking was 1 hr and half.

Close to Gare du Nord. Beds are okay. Unfortunately no sockets next to the bed. Nice, friendly and clean.

Todo muy bien. Me voy contento del
Hostel.
Great value spot. Clean and secure with easy check in

Let’s start with the good things first, the place is walking distance from gare du nord, affordable and the staff service was 5 stars. They are very helpful when you need something.

Move on to the negative sides, the room is highly disappointing. I stayed in 4 beds dorm for 3 nights, it was very small and packed, the hallway can get noisy at night, and the bed squeaks every time you move. Also, there was only 2 plugs in the room with 4 people. I was forced to go to the reception whose kindly enough let me charge there. Overall, okay-ish place when you’re on budget, but i won’t probably stay again.

PS: Towel is provided for airbnb user, but no body soap, let alone hand soap or whatsoever is provided. They let you borrow the hairdryer from the reception by keeping your id until you returned it, breakfast is extra €4.
convenient, reception was helpful and nice, place was clean
Very good value in Paris.
No frills hostel. Clean and exactly what you expect from a hostel. Cheap and location is decent. Would stay again.
Vicinissimo alla Gare du Nord! ✌️
Muy buen hostel

The receptionists were helpful. Location is excellent, close to gare du nord. Bathroom is clean and large. However, room is small and cramped that i even cannot walk easily because of the luggages and belongings are all around the floor. There is only a electric block near the desk which might not enough. No individual lamp for bed so i gotta turn on the light by phone everytime. There is no cool water. Every night i gotta borrow the hair dryer from reception and i wish they can provide for every room. The breakfast is just a small bread. I know I shouldn’t request too much since this hostel is quite inexpensive. Overall it’s a good hostel for quiet sleep since there is no bar. There are traffic noise outside the busy roads but it’s alright to me.
Para aqueles que desejam uma acomodação bem localizada, mas sem se preocupar muito com comodidade dos quartos, esse pode ser um bom local para se hospedar.

Location is really convenient for Gare du Nord, although it's not the nicest area in the city.  Great value.  The hostel is really clean, quiet, very organized and safe. Linen and towels provided. Handy kitchen with basic implements. Friendly staff. I stayed in a 4-bed dorm that was of a decent size, but the heating was too high and the room was too hot.
I had one night in a cosy and clean room. The guy at the reception was helpful and welcoming.
Good position
Good value, very close to Gare du Nord

Perfect location
Super hospitality
Nice place to stay for couple of days or a night over especially if you are coming with a group you know
The rooms may be a bit small to fit 4 adults in leaving no enough space to move.

The location is perfect. North and East main stations are in walking distance and the artists' neighbourhood is also nearby. The staff is very approchable, helpful and friendly. The room and bathroom were very clean. The rooms are tiny and packed with beds, which in itself is fine and, of course, also allows for the high affordability. However, in order to pack as many people as possible into one room bunk beds are used and I got unlucky with my sleeping mate below me. He moved constantly and the movement got transferred up to me and berieved me of my sleep for 7 hours straight. So in case you're vulnerable to that sort of disturbance, stay away from bunk beds. Maybe they have other rooms with regular beds, too. If that's the case I would consider to stay there again and be willing to pay more. If not, not. Thanks and check-out.
Great location, friendly and proffessional reception team. Good experience!
Bona opció per passar unes nits a París sense pagar massa. Molt bona ubicació.
clean and tidy, good service
Great place to shower/sleep for the night in Paris. I was able to leave my luggage until my train to the next city arrived! Bring a lock to lock small things in the room.

Very adorable hostel located right near Gare Du Nord station. The staff is very kind and helpful with any guest questions and on the lobby they have a great kitchens with a cozy atmosphere. The rooms I had were cozy with very comfortable beds and enough space for travelers. Each room has its own bathroom with no problems with hot water which is great! I definitely would suggest staying here if you’re traveling on a budget and want to meet new people from all around the world. I made some good friends while here!
북역 근처라 너무 늦게만 안다니시면 돼요. 시설도 좋고 깨끗하고 무엇보다 리셉션 분들이 너무 친절하십니다.

This Hostel it’s near cafes, bars, restaurants and metro line oh Near the Gare Du Nord so if you looking for something inexpensive this it’s great place to stay their stuff was very helpful at all time  I recommend this and I’ll be coming back here next time .

Bathrooms were very clean and nice. Check in was very easy and the location is excellent, right next to the train station and a short walk from Sacré-Cœur.

I also left an important bag in my room when I checked out and the receptionist was extremely helpful and was able to send the bag in a taxi to me at the airport. They saved me in a pinch and I must commend them for their very fast help.

A nice place, it does what it does well, for a decent price. I had a nice time. 

I had luck with my roommates, so we had a nice time together in the evenings. 

Bring your own lock is probably good advice, although they also have other lockers downstairs.
Rooms are much smaller than on the picture. For the price its good tho.
Отличное место, комфортно и уютно

Very friendly staff, always ready to help and answer the questions. While waiting for check-in we was offered a glass of red wine for degustation.
This place has a little kitchen with microwave, electric kettle, fridge, coffee machine, few tables to eat and to have conversations in lobby.
Room with 4 beds is not big. Honestly, not enough sockets for 4 people ( to recharge phones, powerbank)
Didn’t really feel comfortable with 2 boys in my room. I would suggest to ask for female, male or mix room. 
But, in general, was good!
ok

A nice place. Friendly and accommodating staff, about what you would expect from a hostel for the price. The en-suite bath was a nice surprise. Clean, fairly quiet. Not a fan of the neighborhood, but there’s not much to do about that. Would recommend for a short stay.
Perfect place to stay at Paris. Close by to the train station
Cool spot to meet people and get to know the city.
Good location. A few minutes walk to Gare du Nord. The room is cleaned every day.

Thanks for the hospitality 
The place is very close to the public transportation and the people are so nice , however the only thing that the room were very small for 4 peoples

Good place near the North train station of Paris, meaning - it is really easy to get to the airport(any of them) . 

Room is spacious enough for 4 people. It's only the second hostel I've visited so can't really compare, but I liked it very much. Recommend!
It's located in an interesting neighborhood. Plenty shops are around. And very close to public transport. Had a great stay! Thank you!

Great location just off the main station, so it was really easy to get around Paris. 

Affordable place, that was always clean and had friendly guests. 


Definitely recommend if you are visiting Paris as it’s a 5 minute walk to the main train station so commuting around Paris was easy.
My dorm was mixed gender, didn’t bother me, but should be clearly stated for others. Everything was lovely except the shock of how expensive it was to wash your clothes there. Would stay again.
Great location, always clean, the staff was always there to support :)
professional approach through out. Highly recommend.

Essa foi minha primeira experiência em um hostel e eu adorei! Os funcionários eram extremamente simpáticos e atenciosos, me orientaram em relação à região e foram sempre solícitos. A acomodação é pequena, mas perfeita para uma estadia low cost com o intuito de passar bem a noite. Cama confortável e lençóis cheirosos! Super recomendo!
perfectly located and well suited  for ev student staying a weekend in paris:)
Well located, gently staff, however the shower and toilet are really small and it can make you feel suffocating.
Great location, cozy place, excellent hospitality
Great location to stay if you're catching a train! Complex was safe and easy to find.

Ein super cooles Hostel mit der vielsprachigen Angestellten - absolute Empfehlung! Um Probleme wird sich sofort gekümmert und es wird vor allem lösungsorientiert gearbeitet :) preis-Leistungs-technisch ein absolut großartiges Hostel in Paris mit gut ausgestatteter Küche und vielen interessanten Bars und Essensgelegenheiten drum herum!

Brilliant location for gare du nord, and then from there the rest of the city. Rooms are less luminous and spacious than they appear in pictures, but that seems to be very  common now with airbnb listings. The communication was fantastic, and very friendly staff on arrival.
Nice place. Clean, easy to find.
Great place! :D

a very nice place to stay
Location convenient to Gare du Nord train and bus station.  Walkable location.  Great for a quick overnight and budget lodging.
