Hey guys,
Just wanted to share a couple of points, confirming the other’s positive comments. 
Viviana’s place is very well-located, only 5-minute walk to a main transportation hub, and relatively close to some tourist attractions of Paris. 
Like other guys said it’s sufficiently clean. The only downside is the size of the rooms which is small for 4 people.

5mins from Gare du Nord. The neighborhood wasn't that unsafe as people made it out on the internet. Only two power outlets for 4 people for each room was kinda inconvenient. Adequate wifi speed even on 2nd floor
All good , just remember a small room with 4 people is not super quiet but fun !  Showers could use a curtain for water splash.  Really good place .

The staff are very friendly, helpful, caring and kind, they made me feel safe after a very long day of travel, the location is just 5 minutes away from Gare du Nord, in an area filled with pubs and restaurants. There is a self service lobby area, you make your coffee, prepare your food and do tue dishes, lots of other services are available too. The toilet has a massive window (wide) looking onto the building quarters with no curtains so basically the whole neighborhood was watching me go around that toilet lol. I would stay there again :)
The room is well ventilated with windows, which is basically enough for rest. Men and women live together. Packs can be kept  for 24 hours after checkout. there have a kitchen and a refrigerator.

doesn’t look like the pictures, a lot smaller space. common area is nice, bedrooms are noisy at night. location is great though! metro is easily accessible. overall it works for a couple nights, especially at the price

There is a little bit dangerous area I think.haha
It was very good to stay at this place and it was easy to muve around the city of paris.

Комнаты не большие. Но все чисто. Расположение прекрасное. Можно дойти пешком до всех основных достопримечательностей. Прекрасно для небольшого количества ночей. Соотношение цена-качество-расположение на максимум!!

Nice hostel, for a good price and in a good location. Very close to a lot of cafés and just a couple minutes walking from the train station, which was extremely convenient traveling to and from the airport. Receptionists were very friendly, and luggage storage was very convenient and secure.

I don’t expected too much for the hostel. It was a great stay if you are solo traveler . It’s also so close to train station.  
Remember to bring your own lock. 
All the stuffs are really nice and helpful.

Hostel bem localizado, limpeza excelente, atendimento maravilhoso além da cozinha estar disponível sempre para uso. O café da manhã é um pouco caro e o chuveiro não tão bom, porém outras qualidades compensam, eu voltaria a me hospedar pelo custo benefício.

El lugar esta muy bien ubicado y el personal es muy  amable. 
Permiten que guardes tu maleta antes y después de check in para que aproveches tu tiempo en la ciudad.
Clean and comfortable hostel with a nice common area.
Well-located hostel close to one of the main train lines. It is also close to some of the popular sights, bars, restaurants and cafes.
Amazing location. Friendly staff.
Very helpful and nice staff, great if just passing through the city, good location with flexible hours
Room was small but I expected that from reading all the reviews. Location and people at front were amazing, I’ll come back again.
Perfect location, the hostel could have been better. Unfortunately it was impossible to take a shower at the bathroom, as the shower was really dirty.
Pretty good spot, if you're not planning on spending too much time at the hostel. Just come here to rest
Smooth check in, friendly staff :)
Relatively clean hostel, well situated in the city. Close to an award winning bakery and the African/Asian immigrant communities. Opt for a single gender room if possible.
Great location!!
Good location on a quiet street close to Gare du Nord
Great experience!
Excelente ubicación. Muy buena atención. Excelente idea tener un baño independiente a los cuartos con todo y regadera  para usarlo a cualquier hora y no molestar a los otros huéspedes.

It was a sweet and very quick stay during my transition time in Paris. If you are looking for a backpacker experience type accomodation with friendly staff this is the place. Located very central (gare du nord)
Great hostel with 24/7 service! I loved how it was right next to Gare de Nord train station. The rooms are small but worth it for the price in my opinion.
Todo perfecto! La verdad que te ayudan bastante en cuestión del check-in, volvería a llegar sin problemas.

The place sucks. In the pictures you can see it's small but you really have no idea of what the place is really like. If you people are at the room at the same time it's so complicated to even go to the bathroom or get out of your bed. The beds are squeaky so I wasnt able to sleep during my whole stay because the person would move and make so much noise. It was frustrating.
Nice. Cheap. Good ubication. The bunk beds were kind of noisy though.
Really enjoyed my stay here. Quentin at the front desk was very helpful. Even made some friends. Close to transport, Monoprix and lots of shops.
Great location. Really, really small rooms and bathroom.
Good place. I cant say it's the liveliest place for a solo travel, but ok if you just want to rest your head for a night.
nice place to stay if you wanna grab a train at 6am in the morning!

El Hostel está muy bien, el servicio es bueno y son muy accesibles a cualquier cosa, no hay jabón en los lavamanos y hay que tener un poco de cuidado en la noche por esa zona, está muy cerca de dos estaciones de metro
Good location close to gare de nord.. room didn't look like the photos..
Excellent host.
Excelente ubicacion de la estacion del tren norte, algo retirada de la torre, pero en metro llegas rapido, o en scooter
Best staff very kind :) and good location.
Lo recomiendo muy practico y conoces personas de otros paises
Great view
Alles top!
Great service- reception staff are great!
Great place to stay for good price.
A bit better than expected. I had a positive experience overall
Badezimmer war nicht sehr sauber und selbst für ein Hostel eig etwas zu eng. Personal ist freundlich und hilfsbereit

Staff: stellar!
Location: stellar!
Room: just okay.
Good please to live
Nice place
Warm hospitality

I have never stayed in a Hostel before. I hope they are ALL as nice as this! It blew my expectations away. So grateful to the staff for the hospitality. Additionally, the "common areas" were such a fun place to chill, rest, eat (a nice cheap breakfast!), charge, and chat! Really great place. Recomend for sure!

I had a nice stay. It's very close to the main station Gare du Nord which has an easy access to all the main train routes which was very convenient. Every worker was very nice and i have to mention a special thank you for the nice front man who helped me and my friend out when we needed someone :-) thanks again!

Great location close to Garde Noord station. 
Beds were a bit squeaky but otherwise not bad for a place to lay your head.
I would suggest shower curtains as the floor was soaking wet after showering.
Otherwise lovely little place, would definitely recommend to young energetic travelers!
El mejor lugar para una corta (o larga) visita, sin dudas volvería ahí!

This was definitely a great place to stay for my last-minute trip to Paris. The location is great, and as a young woman traveling alone I felt safe and could tell that the staff was conscious of making the guests feel safe and comfortable, and encouraging friendly interaction. Definitely recommend!!

This is a perfect choice for someone traveling through Europe on their own. I was hesitant to book a bed in a 4-bed dormitory but the other roommates were all friendly and welcoming, we all ate and drank together a few nights. The only downside - the room is very, very small...even for 1 person, let alone 4. That would be my only issue,  if I had to choose one. The staff was knowledgeable and very helpful, showing me on maps where to go and how to walk there or use the metro/bus. For the price, the location is superb and the area is nice - not sketchy or shady or dangerous. Very pleased with my stay!!! Merci tout le monde.
Nice place
This place was great and in a very convient location
La habitación es muy pequeña para 4  persona, sin aire ni ventilador, hacía mucho calor, en la foto se ve más grande, el baño sin aseo
Everything was good: the room was clean, the stuff was nice
Great hostel.  Friendly staff, useful location. The place felt safe and the rooms were clean and comfy. Good value, would recommend for anyone visiting Paris on a budget.
Nice location if you know how to use the metro.

Beds are fine although a little squeaky and the 4 dorm rooms are definitely cramped with plugs for everyone but in inconvenient places (ie you won’t be able to charge while you sleep if you want to keep your phone close to you). However everything was clean and the staff was super kind and helpful. It’s a hostel! You pretty much get what you’d expect!
really nice staff！ good position！And I have met some good friends！

Não trocam os lençóis diariamente e nem limpam o banheiro todos os dias. Tive a sorte de dividir o quarto com pessoas legais, mas não eram organizadas. Tem locker no quarto, mas você precisa levar seu cadeado. No geral, um bom hostel, áreas comuns com uma decoração bacana, mas nada muito sofisticado, o suficiente para viajantes que querem apenas um lugar pra dormir.
Un hostal bastante agradable, seguro aunque algo pequeño

4 person dormitory, not a typical Airbnb. Decent location but Paris is such a big city you’ll need to use the metro or bus either way, luckily the hostel is 3 minutes walk away from Gare du nord, one of the biggest train station/metro station/bus stations in Paris. 

Soap/shampoo was not provided. Laundry is 8€, so fair. Always people in the common areas downstairs. Generally a quiet spot at night.
Great, although not busy, common area: kitchen, chairs, beers, futbolito, 24/7 doorman. Nice location and the room had a nice view.
Place is good, reasonable price for Paris
Ambiente agradable, amigable se siente como en casa.
Good location near train. Staff are friendly and helpful.
Amazing place, good attitude and communication of the workers, excellent location

The hostel is at a very convenient location, especially if you arrive with Eurostar to Gare du Nord. Check-in is easy, the place is clean and has good amenities, friendly staff. Rooms are a bit tiny and the top floor rooms can be hot in the summer.

It was very clean. It was pretty hot, but with the window open it was too loud. However, for the location you can’t really complain about the noise too much. If you’re going to stay in this area you have to do so with the expectation that it’s going to be loud, it’s not the hotels fault. I think it’s a decent value for the price and location. The beds were fairly comfortable, but the bunkbeds are of a cheaper material which makes them move quite a lot when you get in and out of them. It would be better if they were bolted to the wall. The staff was very very nice, and very accommodating. It was very clean, and they let me keep my luggage on the day I was supposed to leave and didn’t charge me for it which was better than most places I have been!
挺干净哒
Friendly staff and clean rooms
Good location , clean , safety,  nice restaurants around , really comfortable and convinent
Excelente localização!!!

This is great, value for money - good location and accessible! Of course  your stay would depend on the other roommates - I got lucky with mine, we got along really well for the duration of our stay! :)

Bring your own towel if you don't want to pay two euros every day. Make sure you don't flood the bathroom, because it might happen to anyone. The common area is small such that you don't get to hang out much with others, which is the only benefit of staying at hostels if you ask me. I am usually not a hostel person, but I found out that at least 25% of people snore at night, so there is always this one person to disrupt your sleep if you are a light sleeper like me. Also people come in at whatever time and wake you up. There should a limit when one  can come back. Period. I completely hated this experience. On the positive side, a couple people that I shared the room with were nice, the staff is nice!
Excelente localização próximo a Gare du Nord! Acomodação e banheiro bem limpos. Staff muito atencioso. Preço ótimo! Recomendo
Excelente localização, próximo da estação Gare du Nord.

Good stay for a very good price. It’s located walking distance between metro station and Gare Du Nord making it easy to get to and from the airport by RER train. The receptionists are helpful and breakfast for 4 euros is provided

Great place, very friendly and helpful.

 Basic, central and cheap.

It's shared rooms, so it's a big roll of the dice.
The location is great, the receptionist are the best!
It was nice place, in the heart of town but the room was too small aside that everything was perfect
Super great location, close to metro! Cool space with great local tips from Viviana :)

Super cute hostel right next to Gare du Nord! It’s a bit tough to find as it’s out of the way from most of the hostels/hotels in the area, but it’s nice being sort of remote. The area is nice!
Overall, the room and bathroom was clean, so I had no issues there. (Warning, though! It’s like 2 euros if you want a towel)
The breakfast was nice and simple, but reasonably priced. There is also a refrigerator and kitchen! I loved being able to put in leftovers and have them later, and it made the place feel homey. You can make yourself coffee at any time, and lounge in the lobby. Overall, a great stay!
Great location and communication! Also, the view from our window was incredible. Coming back again for sure!
Clean, convenient and great location
Everything was as expected! Very close to Gare du Nord. Thanks
Good location. Good price. Good people.
Excellent place to stay for a weekend in Paris!
Good hostel and nice peoples.
It's a really nice hostel, really close to many touristic places and the staff is very friendly and helpful.
Location is good close the north station.
partly it's small rooms and very small halls but in general very good place, will visit next time 😊
Love the location, the hostel is very rather tidy & clean, receptionists r helpful & above average overall!

Good budget place to stay. The location is easy to find and couple of kilometers away from main sightseeings of Paris. The room was clean and quite. However, there was no soap and shampoo in the bathroom. That was what I had not expected. Except that everything was great!
Great localization

Excelente locación, cerca de sitios que tienes que conocer en paris. Me encanta lo fácil que se me hizo llegar desde la estación gare du north y lo increíble es que tienes bares y restaurantes muy cerca. Las camas son agradables y el baño lo único es que la ducha es un poco pequeña. Pero de resto está muy bien para quienes vamos por pocos días.
That was pretty good dormitory, where I have found lots of good communications. Thank you very much!
Exceptionally friendly staff. Hope to see them again!
Excelente lugar muy recomendable...
Súper recomendable
Es un hostel a 100 metros de Gare du Nord.  Personal las 24 horas. Un supermercado a 30 metros. Cocina 24 horas disponible. Locker para valores. Muy recomendable

I stayed at Viviana for 4 nights and it was my first time at Paris. 
++
location    (next to the North Gar which you can find direkt trains and metro lines easily to the all location int he city.)

clearness  

--
small rooms for 4 people (it is really small, i think it was for single of couple room before -I hope- because it was really hard to find fresh air in the room after half hour) 

humidity (it could be related to my asthma or the size of the room but i feel it was. however, because of the clearness of the room i do not feel disadvantage of it at the time when i stayed)  

small kitchen for all people (it could be hard if you cook your dinner or lunch like me but not a big deal) 

results:

with all the cons, i think as price-quality it was nice place for me.
The location was great, it is a large hostel service with 24-hour person in the front desk. You will be able to to drop off your luggage early and leave your luggage after checking out.

I would highly recommend that people traveling, especially for a short stay to lodge here.
excelente lugar
Small hostel room, okay for what it was. Very conveniently placed next to Gare Du Nord
Great hostel ! Good location . Will stay again .

Overall good place
So nice place and nice people were in the room and their manager was really kind and helped me a lot I hope to see her again !

great place to stay while visiting paris.
cheap price, good wifi and  bed
Buen hostel, cerca de Gare du Nord, staff muy simpático, solo los baños faltan de circulación de aire. Aunque el bario no es el mejor de París, el ambiente es bueno y me sentí en seguridad.

good for the price
The private bathroom per room was nice. It’s not an apartment but rather a standard hostel.

Viviana's place is in an excellent location with the Gare du Nore station only 5mins walk away. I came by Eurostar so this was amazing. 

The room was everything I needed, clean and with a pretty view as pictured in the listing! 

I loved my stay here and the staff were super helpful and friendly. Thankyou very much!
It's a wonderful house!

recomendado por la cercania con la central de trenes y metro....
Nice place, very friendly staff. Gets really hot inside during summer though.

Pretty standard hostel.  The room was pretty small for 4 people (there were only 2 wall outlets as well) and there was no AC but the description was accurate, check-in was easy, and there was a full kitchen.
Everything was fine. Great people, lovely atmosphere and the staff was always ready to help.
Good location but a bit sketchy area.

I truly had a great time here! The location is quite nice and safe.  Everything well within a walking distance of no more than 30 min although the metro is very close if you'd prefer that.  The beds are comfy and clean.  The staff is friendly.  would recommend staying.

Très jolie appartement, à proximité de la gare du Nord. L'appartement est totalement au calme la nuit. Alexis répond rapidement au message et donne des infos claires et détaillées pour une arrivée autonome. Je recommande

L’hôte est super réactif, m’as donné toutes les précisions en tant voulut. L’appartement était propre et conforme aux photos ☺️ je ne suis pas déçu d’avoir réservé avec vous

Alexis a été très réactif à mes messages , les informations étais clairs net et précise . Nous avons passé un super week end dans un appartement chaleureux et confortable. Je recommande a 100%
Bel appartement proche de la Gare du Nord et de toutes commodités, peu bruyant et facile d’accès.

Ruimte is op zich goed genoeg en ruim genoeg alleen kun je nergens je eigen spullen kwijt.
Schoonheid was voor ons twijfelachtig.
De ligging van het appartement aan een binnenplaats ( 3e etage) maakte wel dat het rustig was, ook 's nachts.
Ondanks het ziekenhuis/ ambulances met sirenes aan het eind vd straat.
Vindt je het niet erg om in het huis van een ander te bivakkeren met duidelijke sporen van die persoon dan is het ws een leuk onderkomen voor je/jullie
Really nice place better than the pictures !

Stylish, clean & cosy place. Calm building, even if it is close to the railway station (which is practical). Well i think all the other reviews said there is no elevator, so no news here, if you are not in a special situation, no problem to take some stairs. i missed some storage place for our belongings, as one shelf and couple of hangers, but for 1 weekend was not a big deal. 
Alexis was real easy and quick to communicate, even we had not the chance to meet he made sure we check in/out without any difficulty. Really a pleasure! 
Ps. Danger! There is netflix! :) so if you wanna discover Paris you need to be for your first time or have a strong will! We enjoyed it!
RAS

Alexis was a great host, met me at the appartment and explained everything. Was quick to answer any questions I had by message as well. The appartment is exactly as it appears in the photos, super clean, cozy and really well located. It was a pleasure to stay there. Would definitely book again.
What a beautiful and cozy apartment ! Less than 5min walk from Gare du Nord, many shops and restaurants around, and Alexis is really a very nice and friendly guy !
Cosy flat with everything you need for a short trip. I recommend it !
Very stylish and well-located flat with a very attentive host.

Sehr netter Gastgeber. 
Sehr schöne Restaurants und Kaffees in der Nähe.
Nice place in great location

Great location near the main train station easy access to get everywhere, and very convenient to get to the airport in the early morning/ late evening. 
Alexis is very thoughtful and helped me carry my bag to his apartment and showed me how everything works. He is very thoughtful and fast in responding.  
It would be nice to have a shower curtain in the shower  
Beautiful space and very quiet.
Alexis place is very cosy and comfortable and it’s really useful to be so close to Gare du Nord. It’s a really convenient place to stay to discover Paris. I’d highly recommend :)

Die Wohnung von Alexis hatte alles was man braucht. 
Sie war sehr ruhig gelegen, trotz nur wenigen Gehminuten vom Nordbahnhof entfernt. 
Check-In und Kommunikation haben super geklappt.
Wir würden die Wohnung immer wieder weiterempfehlen.
Great location ear the Gare du Nord and comfortable space for a couple's weekend

Appartamento molto carino e moderno, pulito, il palazzo è’ tranquillo, dotato di asciugamani e teli per il bagno, peccato solo per la mancanza di un asciugacapelli.  Fermata del metro comodissima.
Consigliato
Nice cute place!

Alexis' flat is right next to Gare du Nord which made it very convenient if arriving by rail.  The area is also served by multiple bus lines which was helpful during the train/metro strike as we were able to use alternate transportation easily.  Otherwise, it is served by both the metro and RER trains; also walkable to Montmartre.  The flat is cute and tidy, and all the amenities listed were included.  Alexis is an awesome host, he met with us and went over the details of the flat and was flexible with the check-in and check-out time.  He is extremely responsive with communication and we had no issue with our stay at all - will definitely come back for my next trip to Paris.
Very comfortable and perfectly content there. Could work on pillow game though

Alexis is friendly, polite, helpful and we enjoyed out stay very much. He was flexible with our check in/check out hours which we appreciated. The flat is a bit small, but cute, cosy, safe and very quiet despite being next to the railway station and a hospital. We had a good rest after wandering around the city for hours. The flat was clean; however, it could’ve used a good vacuum and a wipe as there was a bit of dust on some appliances. Anyway, we had a great stay and we can recommend it. Thank you, Alexis, for making our trip to Paris a lovely experience. We will come back again. All the best!

Alexis’s place is in a great location, it’s cute, clean and a perfect amount of space for 2 people. He’s also a great host! Super helpful and really quick to respond. It’s an A+ spot to stay while you explore the city!
Great location and Alexis is always there to help with super fast responses. 10arr is a great neighborhood to check local lifestyle.
Nice enough place, good value. Excellent communication with Alexis. Apart from a few small details, I would recommend.
Lovely appartment next to Gare du Nord, ideal for a scape in Paris.

Clean and simple and conveniently located by Gare du Nord (a few blocks). Alexis was easy to communicate with and quick to respond. There is no elevator here, I think it was on the 3rd or 4th floor, so keep that in mind if you have a lot of luggage. It was about a 15 min walk to Rue de Chateau d 'Eau which has a lot of trendy shops and restaurants. Right by the flat is Le Bouquet du Nord, a cafe. The servers were all really friendly and one morning Hotel California was playing on their speakers and they were all singing it so in my terrible French I told them that "I like this cafe because your black coffee comes with a song and dance." Everyone laughed, my French pronunciation was not so good, but I think they appreciated my efforts.

Alexis’s place is amazing! Perfectly located right near everything you need. His place is stylish and feels like a home! He was there to help with check in and was always available if I had any questions. I would recommend Alexis’s place to anyone looking for a stay in Paris.

Excellent host, smooth check-in, nice and clean apartment. Highly recommended to travellers than need to be in the ​vicinity of the Gare du Nord and still have a good sleep as the apartment is very quiet.
Alexis’s apartment is a cozy, modern, very clean apartment in a great part of Paris. Food and shopping + site are very close by. He provided toiletries, coffee maker, and use of his washing machine.
Recommended. Clean, quiet, lightly, near centre by metro. We will repeat Alexis! Thank you
Alexis’s place is easy to find, great location near subway and train station Gare du Nord. Alexis sent clear instructions to enter. Very comfortable, clean, and quiet. Highly recommend!

Alexis’ place is in a wonderful location! It’s close to both Gare du Nord and Gare de l’Est stations. The apartment is very modern and stylish. My husband and I felt at home. Jonathan è un host molto attento e reattivo nel dare consigli e risposte per il vostro soggiorno vicino Parigi. Alloggio a 8 min a piedi dalla metro, e 5 min dalla rer. Molti negozi nelle vicinanze sia alimentari che ristoranti vari. Un ottima zona per visitare Parigi, Versailles ecc.  A causa di problemi con il passaporto ho dovuto disdire all’ultimo la prenotazione e quindi non ho potuto usufruire del suo appartamento, però la sua disponibilità è stata impeccabile anche per quanto riguarda il rimborso intero dell’alloggio. Spero vivamente più avanti  di poter usufruire di questo appartamento strategico per visitare Parigi. Consiglio vivamente di pernottare in questa zona appena fuori Parigi, con un host molto disponibile e cortese.
Great place, with everything you might need, in a nice and calm area of Paris.
The accomodation was really clear and nice. Also communication with Jonathan was pretty smooth and great. Would recomend this place :)

Very easy check in, good communication. Everything was as described in the listing and great value for budget. When we needed additional help, response was immediate and fixed our issue completely.  Would definitiely stay there again.

We couldn’t have asked for a better host. Since there were strikes in paris, we needed a lot of extra help, and we always received very quick, detailed responses. The apartment was just as pictured and the heat was wonderful since it was cold outside. It is a bit far from the center of Paris but as long as the usual transportation is working, you shouldn’t have a problem. The only thing is that behind/under the bed was a bit dirty but everything else in the apartment was fine. Thanks again for everything, you made our experience great!!!

J'ai longuement hésité à écrire ce commentaire, néanmoins un homme hôte vivant seul, facilement en situation de dominance donc, ne peut se permettre ce type d'attitude lorsqu'il héberge des femmes seules.

Très bonne nuit chez Stéphane dont les explications, la réactivité et l'adaptation m'ont permis de venir passer un concours sereinement et dans les meilleures conditions possibles. Le logement est propre et bien situé, les attentions dans la chambre sont très sympas. Allez-y les yeux fermés.

Stéphane est super sympa et gentil.
Sa sympathie m'a permis de décompresser juste avant de passer mes examens qui se sont déroulés dans le Hall 1 du parc expo de Villepinte. De chez lui au hall 1 du Parc expo, il faut compter 21 mins. Bien préciser sur (Hidden by Airbnb) maps, "HALL 1" du parc expo car le parc expo est immensément grand. (Le hall 1 est me semble-t-il là où se déroulent le plus fréquemment les examens ).
Accueil authentique, fraternel, généreux. Stéphane est une belle Personne : ouverte, unifiée et positive.
Mon court séjour s’est extrêmement bien passé, Stéphane est bienveillant et chaleureux, on se sent comme chez soi, je recommande.

Probablement le meilleur accueil reçu dans un Airbnb ! Stephane est très gentil et accueillant, on se sent tout de suite à l’aise. L’endroit est calme, propre, confortable, parfait pour se reposer. Idéal pour rejoindre facilement l’aéroport en transports ou en Uber / taxi. Merci encore pour l’accueil et le délicieux repas ! :-)

Très bonne expérience chez Stéphane, qui m'a attendu jusqu'à ce que j'arrive. Soucis du détails avec le thé et les petits biscuits dans chambre. Le lit est confortable et la chambre est propre, tout comme la salle de bain. Je n'ai pas pu profité du reste de la maison, étant resté une nuit pour ensuite aller à Villepinte passer des examens. D'ailleurs, on est vraiment à côtés (à peu près 6 minutes en voiture, 15 minute à pied jusqu'à la gare de Villepinte et ensuite 3 minutes en train jusqu'au Parc des Expos) 
Proximité quasi immédiate avec un très grand parc vert (celui entre le quartier et le  parc des expo) donc pour ce qui veulent profiter de la nature et faire un tour de vélo. C'est l'idéal. Stéphane est super sympa et arrangeant (j'ai pu passer reprendre quelques affaires le soir alors que j'avais fait le check-out le matin). Je recommande !
Très bon accueil, je recommande

Je n'avais encore jamais été aussi bien accueillie dans un Airbnb ! On se sent comme à la maison car l'expérience se rapproche de celle d'un couchsurfing, pour la relation de qualité qui s'instaure avec Stéphane. En effet, il est aux p'tits soins, très attentionné, généreux, serviable et il consacre vraiment du temps à ses "invités". Merci beaucoup pour ce beau moment partagé et cette très bonne expérience Airbnb !
très bon accueil, j'ai apprécié l'emplacement géographique , le calme , possibilité du stationnement
Accueil au top, Stéphane est un hôte exemplaire, très TRÈS arrangeant ! Merci beaucoup

Super acceuil

Bonjour
Mon séjour chez Stéphane était beaucoup mieux que ce à quoi je m'attendais. Stéphane est une personne très serviable, toujours disponible et très sympathique. La chambre était propre à mon arrivé et la douche/toilette, toujours nickel et sentait toujours très bon. Je garderai un très bon souvenir de mon passage chez Stéphane et n'hésiterai pas à réserver à nouveau chez lui lors de mon passage à Paris.
Un truc à ne pas rater: les tomates de son jardin ! Tellement bon !!
Merci Stéphane pour votre aide et votre gentillesse. A très bientôt
Sakina
Bon séjour. L’hôte a était au soin. Merci
Petite chambre mais propriétaire chaleureux ! Rapport prix-qualité !
C’est en proche de l’aéroport. Mais il faut avoir une voiture ou utiliser un taxi. Stéphane est un hôte sympa, les chambres sont propres. J’y resterais encore.

Stéphane est un hôte remarquable!
C’est un excellent cuisinier, donc je conseille à tous la formule d’essayer la formule pour manger sur place. J’avais mon vol le lendemain, il m’a déposé tôt le matin à l’aéroport Charles de Gaule qui est à une quinzaine de minutes.
Il va bien au delà du nécessaire pour satisfaire ses invités. Je recommande fortement!
Très bon accueil. Ubication à côté de la gare de train. Maison très propre et endroit très calme. Merci beaucoup!!!
Messieurs est très gentil qui fait la cuisine très bon et bon marche,comme le cuisine de “Michelin ” il a donné musique et  les  bougies  les fleurs .
Très bien situé et très pratique pour les voyageurs en transit. Stéphane est très prévenant et fera tout pour vous être agréable.

Le hébergement de Stęphane est au top!
Son acceuil est super!
Tout a été impecable!
Bon rapport qualité prix
Très bien si en couple. Cependant, si vous êtes une jeune femme seule, l'hôte peut s'avérer embarrassant par son discours déplacé.
Amical et serviable
Stéphane est une personne très gentil et serviable, je vous recommande absolument !
La chambre est assez grande et le lit très confortable. J'ai été très à l'aise chez Stéphane. Il est très sympa et accueillant. Je recommend vivement son logement.
Stéphane est une personne charmante, très sympa qui aime le contact avec les gens et ouvert aux discussions

Chez Stéphane tout était impeccable et conforme à la description. Il était très réactif et a pris soin de tout. Sa maison est bien située, pas loin de la gare accessible à pied. Je recommande vivement.

Un bon coin calme et très accessible. Stéphane est un hôte accueillant et réactif.
Je le recommande vivement à tous ceux qui cherchent un pied à terre avant d'aller prendre un vol à CDG !
Trés calme, aucun bruit la nuit. Trés lumineux. Stéphane est trés accueillant et communicative. En plus,  on peut garer la voiture.
TB
Stéphane is a communicable host. Very nice place to stay before you leave for the aéroport.

The place is like 15 mins from Airport. The place had everything. The place was so clean. Stéphane is a lovely host. Even though he wasn’t there, he made check-in and everything so easy. I recommend this place if you have early morning flights.

Great hospitality 
Clean place 
Great/calm piano playing 
Transportation was so helpful and cheap
Awesome experience at Stephane’s place.
It was a good stay...Stephane is an amazing host, helped with everything I needed, very good communication; good value for the money. The backyard is beautiful :)  I recommend.
Great host
Ospitale e disponibile , Stephane è un ottimo host...
Highly recommended! Stéphane is very helpful and kind host. Even tho I stayed only for the night, the place is definitely very cozy and especially very near to CDG Airport.

The host was incredibly nice, helping and thoughtful. The location is comfortable, the room was cozy and clean . Though the place was hosting a few more people it wasn't noticeable and was very quiet. 
Thank you Stephane.
房东大叔实在是太好太好了!做饭还好吃!十分善良又热心❤️真的是我回国途中遇见的最温暖的人,完全推荐!!!可爱的房东大叔!
Everything was great. Perfect location close to airport and Parc d’Expositions. Stéphane's hospitality. Nice apartment. And so delicious dinners. Definitely recommend.

Stéphane is a very friendly host, and he offered to drive me to the exposition the next day. His place is close to the Villepinte exposition halls and a big parc, and in less than an hour by metro you can be in the centre of Paris. The room and shared bathroom were clean. In general, I had a short but pleasant stay.
I enjoyed my stay at Stéphane very much, it was cosy, nice and felt welcome!

친절하고 따듯하게 맞아주셨고 저녁으로 암메이다?라는 음식을 해주셨는데 정말정말 맛있었습니다! (9유로였고, 파리 물가 생각하면 매우 저렴한 편이라고 생각합니다) 파리 샤를드골 공항에 오신다면 첫박을 여기서 주무시는거 강력히 추천드려요 공항이랑 가까워요. 청결상태도 정말 좋았는데 계단 경사가 높아서 캐리어 혼자 들고 오르내리기는 조금 힘든정도에요! Stephane님이 체크인할 때 방끝까지 들어주셨어요.ㅎㅎ
A perfect place to stay before a CDG flight!
Location is close to the airport and a very helpful host.
Youre getting exactly what you pay for. I would say the money you pay for a home cooked meal is well worth it. The ride to the airport is also cheaper than most taxis and ubers
The apartment is a home away from home which provides comfort and relaxation atmosphere in a quiet and serene environment.

The place is close to CDG airport and a nice idea if you plan to catch an early morning flight. Stephane is a great host with prompt communication, offers a nice home-cooked dinner and even dropped me to the airport. The room is upstairs though and you will need to lift your bags up the stairs if you want to carry it with you, I chose to leave my bag downstairs so it wasn't an issue.
Great location close to the CDG Paris airport. Stéphane drove us to the airport at 5am this morning. Awesome host!! Super kind and thoughtful. Thank you so much Stéphane!
Great communication, very clear instructions on how to get there/inside as was not able to be there on arrival. Made everything nice and easy :)
Great small place to stay with lots of amenities.

Es un lugar bastante tranquilo y limpio. Stephan fue muy amable conmigo siempre y además muy hospitalario. Gran persona.
La habitación es ideal si quieres estar cerca del aeropuerto.

I had really pleasant stay at Stéphane’s place. He is such a cool guy, nice, helpful and welcoming. The room that I had looked just like on the pictures, and it was really cool interior. What I liked the most was that the house is in a quiet area,  the room was clean, bed and pillow were perfect for me. Furthermore, in the morning I could make myself a coffee directly in my bed, thanks to provided sachets and hot water kettle. The bathroom was also fine and clean. I would highly recommend this place, as it is great value for the price.

This is a great spot to be close to the airport for an early flight. There is an RER stop nearby, I didn't feel comfortable walking at night in an unfamiliar place so I took the 5 minute bus ride.  Bus stop is just outside of the neighborhood.  RER is maybe another 15 minutes away.  Stephane is SO nice -- he's very quick to respond and incredibly accommodating and polite.  Of all my air bnb hosts he has been the most responsive I've had.  Really appreciate.

Pretty much what it says. A small room in a suburb about 15 minutes (walking) away from a RER station. Stephan does his best to be accommodating. Oh yes, if you drink milk in your coffee, let him know beforehand; he doesn't have any normally. I didn't know that, so left without a morning coffee... which isn't the end of the world :)
Stephane Home is really comfortable quiet a nice place to stay recomend!
Good place for my one night stay in Paris to connect a flight out of CDG. About two stops from CDG via RER train.
Very good Hospitality. Close to CDG. Steph cooked a very good dinner and organized the transfer to CDG. Everything perfect

This lodge is perfectly located if you need to stay close to the CDG airport or the Parc d'Expositions. Reaching the place is easy by train or Uber and getting into the house is smooth. Stephane is always in close contact and, even if he could not be there during my stay, he send me full instructions so I could do it without any problem. I recommend this flat very much.
I like the house and the room.
Lugar cómodo y acogedor, un poco retirado pero el espacio de la casa es bueno
Great place to stay, competent host and easy and reliable check-in procedure.

Exactly as described: a little far from the nearest Metro station, but a nice walk through the park. The neighborhood is quiet and very close to CDF.  I would take up Stéphane's offer for meals, because he is correct: there are no restaurants within walking distance of the house.

very close to cdg airport but far away from city center. the room was really hot but there was an air condition. the quilt cover has left some blood on it thats disgusting. youll find a good bathroom with a great shower. sure could have been a bit cleaner but no prblm. at all .... there was also a kitchen and a living room area with a large tv. the garden is also ok. bit small. i never met stephane. he was not there. but some of his great friends were nearby. however they dont able to understand simple english. but they are super nice and allowed me to stay longer because my flight was at night. i really appreciate them. about the bad neighborhood. many broke people on the streets in this area. i was just looking for a supermarket and they asked me three times if i like to buy cocaine. this was a ten minute walk. so never go outside. my walk was around 1am not a safe area. i dont care about that cause i now it from my city. but i wouldnt recommend a night walk for girls or woman there are a lot of crazy people outside. also met another strange guy who shouted at me in a language i didnt know. for no reason. so if you need to buy whatever pls. dont do it at night. seine saint denis is a crap city and also the aulnay sous bois area isnt a very peaceful place to stay. i can only recommend this accommodation for people who are on transit.

Stéphane is a very nice host, quick to messages and sent very detailed guides (including transportation, very helpful for travelers like me who are new to the area). The place is a great place to stay, quiet and clean. Would recommend to others. Merci
Stephane’s place is very warm and homey. It is an easy walk to the RER station. The neighborhood is very peaceful. Stephane is a thoughtful host.

This was the perfect place to stay for an overnight layover! Stephane has great English and was very easy to communicate with both before and during my stay. He was very reliable and made me feel safe and comfortable in his home. The location is really convenient for getting to and from the airport. He also went the extra mile to help me with my bags, which I really appreciated. 

The room itself was just what I needed. Lots of plug-ins, cute view of the yard, and he even provided water and tea for me upon arrival. It was clean and very quiet, which was perfect for my overnight stay. 

I highly recommend! Stephane is an amazing host!
Stephane house is amazing, really enjoyed my stay. Great location no too far from the airport. The room was really clean and comfortable.

Good spot if you have a lay (Email hidden by Airbnb) fy room and nice bathroom.  If Stéphane is available to pick you up I'd recommend that over trying to get a cab or take a bus to his place.  He's cool and friendly guy.  He speaks English well though we spoke French when I was there.  I'd definitely stay again.  Also, there's a really nice park just near his place and I got some great Creole food from less than 1km away.

Stéphane was super nice and had a really relaxing space. The transfer to the airport was very worth it, too, if you need to go to CDG. The best part was definitely that he played the piano downstairs and I got to listen to some really beautiful classical music:)
Great little place. Cleanliness was a bit of an issue but only because the host was out of town unexpectedly. Great room for one, shared bathroom with shower, and lots of thoughtful little touches.

This was a good place to stay near the airport. I needed a quick layover rest and Stéphane's home was perfect. I do wish it was closer to the train station, but this was mainly due to the fact that there was a very intense heat wave while I was there and I could have not walked the distance. Overall a nice place to stay, and Stéphane was very communicative.
I didn't get to stay with Stephane as there was a miscommunication but he gave me a full refund and I recommend him because he clearly is a very good person.

Perfect stay near the airport for one (or two, there is a couch).  Loved the thoughtful touches in the room like a personal tea kettle, and Stephane was very good and quick with communication (and he speaks good English!).  He's a nice guy - recommended.

Stephane’s place Is very nice; the room is clean and cheerful; the bed is good, the shower very good. Very close to CDG, so that is very important. This is a must-stay if you have an early flight out of CDG and have to be at the airport even before the Metro and RER start running. Stephane offered to drive me to CDG for 15 euros,  an offer that I happily accepted.
Great location,  Stephane was friendly.  Request clean bedding!!

This was my first Airbnb experience and Stéphane went above and beyond to make it such a great one! Despite my flight being delayed four hours, he still took the time to pick me up AND get up early the next time to make sure I made my next flight. Such a genuine person and completely enjoyed every aspect of my stay!
Stephan is amazing. Super fast check in. Easy guy. Perfect location
Great location close to the airport, convenient to get to early morning flights.
La habitación es muy bonita, el baño aunque es compartido está limpio y ordenado. Stéphane es muy amable y siempre está dispuesto a responder las preguntas que se le hacen, la estadía fue muy grata.
Thanks for having me for my transiton from the airport to paris

Stéphane ist ein sehr freundlicher und zuvorkommender Mensch, er tut alles um einen tollen Aufenthalt zu garantieren. Er hat mich vom Bahnhof abgeholt und mich sehr herzlich empfangen. Das Zimmer war vollkommen in Ordnung und die Lage zum Flughafen perfekt, da man mit der Bahn nur 30min fährt + 15min Spaziergang zum Bahnhof. Ich würde wieder eine Nacht bei Stéphane buchen, da alles gestimmt hat.
The room is quite nice~

집이 너무 예쁘고 방이 정말 잘 되있어요~ 
그런데 곳곳에 숨겨진 먼지가 있긴해요 ㅋ 
그거빼곤 채광도 좋고 주인도 좋고 침대도 진짜 편했습니다! 

동네가 한적해서 파리에 온것 같지 않아요~^^ 
공원이 너무 좋고~ 다시 가고싶을 정도예요! 
가격대비 너무 괜찮은 방입니다! 

교통이 약간 불편하지만 공원을 가로지르는 도보라 그리 멀게 느껴지지 않습니다^^ 

파리 외곽을 즐기고 싶은 분은 추천! 
도심에서 약간 떨어져 여유를 즐기고싶으면 추천합니다!
Really reliable , thoughtful and genuine host!

Stephane went above and beyond, my flight was delayed, the RER train was no longer running, I had no euros to take bus, and here comes Stephane ready to pick me up. I definitely expected him to be mad and not talk to me, but he had a positive attitude, at least more than expected. His home was great, I recommend him, and I highly RECOMMEND you let him pick you up, don’t make the mistake I did.
Stephane was very accommodating and offered me his bed when he was not there. His house is in a quiet and quaint neighborhood 15min walk through a park to tram that takes you into Paris.

I had booked this place for my wife. Her review - " The place was very clean and comfortable. Even though Stephane was not available when I arrived, he left clear instructions for everything. I would highly recommend his place"

La casa es muy bonita, en un barrio muy bonito y tranquilo. Es muy cómoda para ir al aeropuerto. Está bien conectada con la ciudad (20-25 min de tren). Stephane es muy atento y generoso con su casa. La recomiendo.
I would definitely recommend Stephane's place. It was close to the airport and very comfortable. I appreciate the hospitality and communication with the host.
Stephane’s house was great; his piano playing was relaxing; the bed was super comfortable; he was extremely accommodating and nice! I loved my stay :)
Stéphane is very friendly and hospitable host. He picked me up and prepared very good soup. His house is cozy and comfortable. Highly recommended place to stay at.

Very quiet place to stay.
Pleasant host.
Muy buena persona muy amable y recomiendo ir ahí.
pas de commentaire
pas de commentaire
Un hôtel en plein centre de Paris, excellente literie. Une chambre calme et sans bruit une adresse formidable.
Équipe charmante
La photo de la chambre affichée n’est pas forcément celle que vous aurez. La mienne était toute petite.
Parfait, petit séjour à Paris très sympathique
Hôtel très bien placé, avec un excellent accueil et un personnel très agréable. Je recommande
Emplacement idéal, près de tout. Chambre conforme aux photos et bon petit déjeuner, je recommande fortement
Super, je conseils !
Super chambre, comme décrit dans l’annonce, super emplacement le marais est juste à coté et tres agréable a faire à pied !
Rien à redire, super prise de contact
Petite chambre sympa pour 1 ou 2 nuits.
La chambre chez Françoise est parfaite pour passer un court séjour à Paris - location parfaite - chambre très propre - Françoise est très sympa, très réactive et flexible. Je recommande.
Parfait pour passer juste une nuit, pas de douche mais un lavabo permettant de faire une petite toilette. Daphné est très arrangeante sur les horaires d arrivée.
Chambre sous les toits parfaitement au calme,  parfait pour un court séjour.
bien pour une nuit. pas de douche par contre

Le logement est propre dans l'ensemble et conforme à l'annonce. Il est adapté pour un séjour de très courte durée (1 ou 2 nuits maximum) et pour quelqu'un qui voyage léger. Bien noter qu'il est situé  au 5ème sans ascenseur, qu'il n'y a pas de salle de bain et que les toilettes (privées) sont sur le palier.
tres bonne adresse, avec un très bon rapport qualité prix

Belle petite chambre confortable et très cosy, comme décrit dans l'annonce. Proximité gare de Lyon et commerces. Idéale pour de petits séjours à moindres frais. Adresse à garder de côté que je recommande vivement. Hôte réactif et très sympa !
Très propre
Tres bon emplacement pour un passage à Paris rapide. Je reviendrais.
Parfaitement conforme à la description et très bien pour un court séjour parisien.
Chambre très  bien située pour petit séjour. Trés calme et propre.
Rapport qualité prix excellent
Petite chambre conforme à la description, très bien située, et accueil très agréable
La chambre de bonne est trés agréable ( sauf pour l'absence de douche). La propriétaire est trés disponible et réactive dans les échanges.

Bonjour 
C’est une petite chambre agréable sous les toits de Paris dans un bel immeuble.
Très propre. Exposée pleine Est, avec levé de soleil.
chambre simple
Chambre propre il ya même de quoi prendre un petit café ou un thé.

A mon arrivée j’ai été bien accueillie par une jeune femme.
Les explications étaient plutôt claires. Le logement était dans un état de propreté tout à fait correct.

En revanche, 
Je n’ai pas été vigilant sur le détail de l’annonce
J’ai donc compris après coup et découvert sur place que le logement ne possédait ni WC ni Douche ni eau chaude...C’est un peu rude pour le prix..
C’est au 6eme sans ascenseur
La chambre fait moins de 9m2

J’avais sélectionné une chambre privée en pensant naïvement avoir tout le confort d’un appartement et pouvoir en plus avoir des échanges avec les hôtes .... Déception à ce niveau..

Le logement est très bien situé, il était propre et la remise des clés a été très courtoise et adaptée sur la forme 

C’est juste pas ce que je recherche..
Chambre minuscule, toilettes pas accueillantes. Trop cher.

Petite chambre au calme comme précisé dans l’annonce les toilettes sont sur le palier mais c’est pas gênant pour un court séjour. L’accueil et les conseils ont été parfait et Daphnée est très réactive quand on la contacte. Que du bon pour passer une nuit sur Paris sans prise de tête.

La chambre de Daphnée est simple mais très bien située, à proximité d'une station de métro. L'immeuble est calme. La chambre est très propre et Daphnée est réactive dans les échanges pour convenir des heures d'arrivée et de départ.

acceuil impeccable 
Très bon rapport qualité prix
Petite chambre sympathique dans les anciennes chambres de bonne, pratique pour dépanner une nuit, bien noter, comme indiqué, qu'il n'y a pas de douche.

La chambre est parfaitement située (10 minutes de la gare de Lyon). Elle est propre et bien décorée. Daphnée est une hôte réactive et arrangeante. Parfait pour un court séjour dans la capitale, particulièrement pour un voyageur solo.
Petit logement conforme à la description ! Emplacement idéal, entre station quai de la râpée et Sully-Morland. Digicode, immeuble et environnement sécures.
Hôte très réactif, c’est bien agréable, tout est simple ! . La chambre est douillette et tout était ok!  C’est une bonne adresse a noter ! Merci
Daphnée est très sympa, réactive et à l’ecoute. On retrouve pleins de petites attentions dans la chambre qui en font un lieu super, à un très bon prix en plus.

Un véritable scandale ! Comment dévoyer le concept d'arib'n'b. 8 chambres de bonne au 6è étage sans ascenseur. Pas de wifi, pas d'eau chaude, les toilettes sur le palier ! Une conciergerie pour donner les clés jusqu'à 20h.

Tout est dit dans la description donc pas de mauvaises surprises possibles.
Daphnée est une hôte très réactive qui essaye au maximum d'arranger son visiteur.
Très bien situé à deux pas des gares de Lyon et d'Austerlitz et de certains monuments parisiens.
Hôte particulièrement sympathique et très accueillante ! Pour un bien situé presque en plein centre de Paris ce qui ne gâche rien ! Je recommande !
Calme, confortable, simple. Il y a un lavabo avec eau froide seulement, mais une bouilloire permet de faire de l’eau chaude pour faire sa toilette.

Daphnée etait la hoste parfaite!
Daphnée was very attentive and always quick to help!

La chambre est une petite chambre de bonne, sans douche avec WC à l'étage, au 6ème étage, ce qu'on attend, la situation est bonne mais le prix est élevé pour la chambre surtout avec l'énorme incertitude due au trop grand délai d'attente pour avoir une réponse aux questions.

Merci à Daphnée d'avoir accepté mon arrivée quelque peu tardive. 
J'ai été accueillie chaleureusement et j'avais tout le nécessaire à disposition.
La chambre est parfaite, tout était propre. 
Les toilettes sont sur le palier comme précisé dans l'annonce, cependant il y a un lavabo dans la chambre qui permet de se rafraichir. Il y avait même une bouilloire et quelques sachets de thé/café, ce à quoi je ne m'attendais pas. 
Très bien située au coeur de Paris, cette chambre avec vue sur les toits est idéale pour les petits budgets.
Je recommande vivement et reviendrai sans hésiter !
C'est une bonne expérience. Daphnée et son maman sont gentilles.

Chambre de bonne très petite avec lavabo (sans salle de bain), mais propre et calme. Pour sportifs car perché au 6 ème étage d’un immeuble sans ascenseur. Toilettes dans le couloir. Situé dans un quartier tranquille.

Smallish but comfortable room in a good location. Ideal for a solo traveller for a night. There's no bathroom, but the toilet in the hallway was fine and there's a sink in the room. There was also a little kettle and tea which was nice. Had no problems arriving, everything was quite easy.
Good room for a night or two if you're ok cleaning in a bidet. Location is great and Daphnée is very reactive and easy to get in touch with.
Parfait pour 1 personne pour 1 ou 2 nuits !
The room is well located and clean but lacks hot water and a shower...

I loved the stay. Daphne is comunucating very quickly and cleary.
Room is small cozy and clean. Also very quiet. Location is great near to many beautiful places in Paris.
Daphnée is very friendly and respond quickly.Nice experience :)
The location is perfect and  the security could be ensured. The room is clean and warm. And Daphnée is a very warm-hearted host. Everything made my short stay in Paris great!
不错
Great experience from the communication, check-in, location, room cleanliness to the check-out.
Great room!!

Françoise’s room is small but perfectly formed :) super comfy and sparkling clean ! Great location too - only 10 mins from both 1st and Gare De Lyon ! Communication was always very speedy and helpful. Thank you again :)
Daphnee’s place has a great location. The checkin is seamless and everything is as described: I had a great time in Paris at her place. Would definitely recommend.
Beautiful room and very (Website hidden by Airbnb) absolute steal for the location

This was a great stay! It is exactly as advertised and works really just as a place to sleep as there is no wifi, kitchen, etc. Daphnée was super responsive and everything was clean and tidy. There is a sink in the room, apart from the private bathroom, which is nice to not have to leave the room for water.
Very central and clean room. Check-in/out was uncomplicated and Daphnée was very responsive.

This is a no-frills venue.  It was completely adequate for a single traveler--not for a couple (think very small dormitory room).  There was a 6 floor stair to navigate and no shower facilities.  The building is charming and it met my needs and expectations.  It is in a very good location and reasonably priced.  So I would recommend it on that basis.
Nice stay at Daphnée's very well located room. Everything went smoothly and Daphnée was very kind and helpful. Thank you!

As mentioned in the other reviews, this space is Great for one or two days. I was there for all of 18 hours. Bed was cozy, and it was pretty much what I expected as I was just passing through Paris for one day. Great Value if you’re just looking to sleep, refresh, and store your luggage.
Thank you

Not good for the quests with luggage. 7th floor without elevator, and very high stairs. No shower! Noise from the neighbors. The rom is very small. You just can’t open the wardrobe because of sofa... And I was denied to keep the luggage until the evening... I had to go with my bags to Gare Lyon and leave it there... Woman, who will meet you doesn’t speak english... and it’s not very easy to open the doors.. the locks are old and do not open well.
La habitación es una antigua chambre de bonne, ideal si quieres pasear París y tener un sitio para dormir. Dado lo complicado de encontrar un alojamiento digno en la ciudad es una opción recomendable

This is a perfect location or a solo traveller. Keep in mind that its at the top of 5 flights of stairs (fyi heavy luggage people), so it counts as a workout. No shower, but the sink is perfect for a birdbath. Aside from those two details, its near a train and bus station, with a market around the corner.  Catching the train back to CDG is a breeze, and Daphnée’s communication is stellar. Upon arrival and during my stay she replies quick and is very helpful. Would stay here on my next solo trip in a heartbeat.

The room is exactly as described by the host and the guests that stayed before me. Daphnee kept the room well maintained and sparkling clean, provided amnesties like coffee station and fresh towels. It’s exactly what I needed for one night. The room is on the 6th floor which you’ll have to climb stairs for and it didn’t have an Ac or fan it got a bit hot at night but I managed. i could always get hold of Daphnee, if I needed anything or I had any questions, and she is nice. You get your private toilet with a key to lock, which doesn’t have a shower. Overall I’d recommend this room because it has a great location.
Good place for a night or two. On the 6th floor so if you dont like stairs I would avoid. Host has quick responses.
The room is fine, but it is very small. I expected it to be better than this. However, the location is very good.
Perfect for my short stay in Paris! Had everything I needed even without a shower. Thanks Daphnée!
Great place but no WIFI.
The appartment was really nice and clean, perfect for one night. The air was little bit bad and it was quite hot now in the summertime, but otherwise really good!

Women who did the check in was rude and yelled. They were unclear about check out procedure and time and then got upset when we did not check out on time. Place was clean and in a good location. Host does not speak English.

This place is in a really good spot of Paris, there are a lot of things to do close to it and it is easy to get to it. However, the service was not so good and she takes a lot of time to reply to the messages.
Great stay for a quick visit to Paris.
Great location, I would definitely book a room there again.

I stayed here one night and it was perfect for my needs as a solo traveler (it’s a twin size bed so two people would be a tight sleeping situation). I didn’t require a kitchen or shower for the night and didn’t need the space except for sleeping.  My visit was in the summer so if you’re traveling in hotter conditions be warned that this room will get uncomfortably hot during the day, even with the one window open.  It was bearable at night but still warm.  However, if you want a space to hang out in at all I’d say find another location, with how small the room is and how hot it can get you aren’t gonna wanna spend any time here until you need to sleep.  Besides that it is a very clean room with a wonderful location to access the city, Daphnée was very responsive and was able to work with a flexible check in time for me, which was wonderful.  All in all a good experience as long as you understand how it is being advertised (as a bare-bones Air Bnb stay).
Perfect for my overnight stay.  Clean and good communication with the host.

El lugar estaba muy limpio, es importante leer bien la descripción antes de ir. Es pequeño pero muy acogedor y tiene calefacción. Daphnée duraba mucho en responder o no respondía, al yo estar viajando sola me hubiera gustado tener más hospitalidad y recomendaciones.
Sweet room in a gorgeous building, great location.

Friendly host whose instructions were easy to follow. The room was very clean and nice to be able to make coffee and tea in the room. The flat situated in a nice area at safe and short walk from Gare de Lyon.
6th floor, lots of steps. Completely worth it for the location.

Todo según lo esperado: no hay ducha ni wifi, pero la habitación está impecable y tiene mucha luz, la cama es cómoda y puedes hacerte café y té en la habitación. Ubicación inmejorable. Perfecto para una estancia corta en París!
Lovey room, very clean, super location !
The location is great, and it is really clean. It's the best choice for one person who wants to visit Paris.
A good place with
Was unable to make it to the home as I missed my flight and Daphnee was unwilling to cancel the stay, but it was not her fault and she was clear about everything in the listing.
整體都不錯,只是洗澡有點小麻煩,其他就還行

This was an acceptable room, although not great value for money. The fact that this room is on the 6th floor of a liftless building was one disadvantageous aspect. Other drawbacks are: very noisy plumbing. When a toilet is flushed nearby the noise in the room is tremendous; it woke me with a start twice in the night. I was also woken a further two times by unexplained loud crashes coming from I don't know where. There were two bedside lamps, neither of which I could make work, despite investigating the socket and leads. There was no hook to hang my coat (there was a wardrobe but the door doesn't open properly as it is blocked by the bed). The room was quite hot, and this was only April, it could be difficult to sleep in summer here. On the plus side it was clean and there were no street noises. I didn't mind the fact that there is no shower; the basin in the room was adequate for one night's stay. I would have given this room more stars if it had been, say, 20 euros cheaper. My communications with Daphnée were good.
I had a great two night stay at the apartment. The price/quality ratio is standing out, especially if you don’t need a luxury flat. The good communication with the host was very good!

I had a nice stay here. The room was just as Daphnée described,a neat little room at a good location,although the lack of shower facilities may be a problem for some. It's a pity that Daphnée wasn't there during my stay,but her responces to my questions were timely and helpful.
Very good room and location for 1-2 days stay!
É preciso atentar ao fato de que a hospedagem não inclui banho. Dapphnee foi muito honesta e alertou previamente. Fora isso, o imóvel é bem localizado, limpo e silencioso. Ideal para poucos dias.

It was absolutely amazing! Thank you very much Daphnee. location, cleanliness, quick respond was perfect. The room was small but perfect for one or two people. You have everything you need, even tea coffee and hot water! I was lonely girl and was a little bit scared of the neighbourhood but it was absolutely fine and safe, just 5 min from the metro station. Thank you very much for my wonderful stay!
If you're looking for no frills, properly cleaned, well located accommodation this place fits the bill!
Convenient and clean place for single traveller
Great place to crash. Not ideal for a longer stay. It was a bit hard to get instructions for check in but once I got in it was nice.

The room is perfectly located for a short city trip in Paris. Daphnée is a great host - she explained everything in great detail and responded immediately to my messages. The check in / check out process was uncomplicated and the room itself very clean. All in all a very nice stay!
Good place to stay for a short time, the bed was great!
Super

Great room if you are simply passing through Paris as a solo traveler. Room is small but has everything you need, basin for a wash, toilet on the landing, bed to sleep in. Basic but fully functional. Daphnee was fast with her responses and her instructions clear and precise.

I never met Daphnée in person but she was always quick to respond and made sure I was able to connect with her mother, in order to get to the room. This room is as advertised. Truly is easy for quick stays but I would think other amenities are necessary for longer visits to Paris. Keep that in mind when deciding!

Room is as described. Clean place. Being on the 6th floor made for some difficult trips up and down with luggage. Ok if you just have 1 bag, but would not recommend if you’ve got any big luggage. Check in could have been a bit smoother; Owner wasn’t there to give keys and no real directions were given. Hopefully wifi is installed for future guests as this would have improved the experience.
Daphne was very helpful arriving in Paris. The apartment was clean and I had an overall nice stay there!
Response was always so fast!Suitable for short stay
Good place for short term stay.

Daphnee is a very nice and friendly, she answered all questions very fast. Room is very small but clean and perfect place for solo travelers. It has internal window so it’s silent at night. Location is also good - easy to find and not far from the metro stations.

Like the description, for a short stay here is really a perfect place to have. In centre but got peaceful neighborhood. The room is small and cozy, actually you get everything you need. Daphée replies always quick and clearly, don’t you have to worry about anything with it.

L’hote m’a reclamer 1500€ de caution en espece , qui ne rend pas au check out mais au bout de 7 jours , donc des que jappel pour recuperer ma caution on m’annonce qu’elle ne sera pas rendu car il y a eu du bruit et un parquet rayer lol . Il aurait pu dire un lit dechirer ou un frigo cassé tout est inventer et apres m’etre plaint a airbnb ils m’ont dit que je ne suis pas le seul a qui c’est arriver ... VOLEUR DE CAUTION FAITES ATTENTION
Magnifique
Super appartement ! Encore plus beau que ce que j’imaginais et la propriétaire est super
Top emplacement top appartement ! A conseiller !

Logement exeptionnel hôte très accueillant emplacement idéal , 
Je vous le conseil
Appartement magnifiquement impeccable, propreté, accueil, la total. Parfait pour passer un séjour sur Paris. En plus il est très bien situé.

Appartement exeptionelle, avec une vue à couper le souffle.
Décorée avec goûts, l'appartement possède une salle de bain magnifique avec hammam et équipements très modernes. Je recommande et reviendrai sûrement !

Un appartement superbe, effet Wahou garanti. Seul bémol, le niveau sonore (très peu tolérant) est contrôlé chaque minute et nous recevons des alertes par sms et menaces de ne pas récupérer la caution. Dans mon cas, nous n'avions pas mis de musique, seulement 10 personnes qui parlent et rigolent à 23h30 maxi.
l'appartement et le bel endroit très bon, mais ce que je dois me plaindre, c'est la propreté de l'appartement qui n'était pas très bon ..

Super séjour super vue super équipement high-tech 
Cave à vin ensoleillé et super accueil 
a recommander

Hôtes extrêmement désagréables, toutes les personnes qui gèrent la société de location sont hautains, pas du tout conciliants et n’hésitent pas a dire : « vous avez déjà de la chance que l’on vous loue cet appartement ». 

J’ai d’ailleurs reçu ce message de Fred le lendemain de mon séjour : «  If you leave a good comment and 5 stars, we offer you 50% discount on your next live stay with us :))))«   Dans ces conditions comment imaginer que les commentaires laissés plus haut soient complètement honnêtes? C’est la première fois que je vois ce genre de pratique et je trouve cela scandaleux! 

Quand à l’appartement, il est certe joli et bien placé, mais sent très très fort le tabac. Le lendemain j’étais imprégné de l’odeur. Le ménage n’était pas impeccable et le balcon était encombré de balais etc ... 

Tout le processus de location a été extrêmement stressant, rien ne peut être précisé à l’avance, quand on appelle on se fait rabrouer... j’ai trouvé cela extrême désagréable.

Un conseil au propriétaire, changez d’agence de location!
Amazing place to stay !
Amaziiiing !

Very nice apartment, the decoration is beautiful. In addition, the apartment is really very clean and convenient we are close to the Eiffel Tower and the Champs Elysees. I highly recommend this apartment and i'm thinking of coming back soon. Thank you
In one word: Amazing!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Excellent host and great representative to check us in, show us around, and help during our whole stay. 

Great apartment, elegantly renovated, but looks still under work/needs little improvement. 
Apartment location is absolutely amazing, and the living area (with an open kitchen) is especially impressive. 

It also offers towels and linens and daily cleaning service. 
One of the 2 toilets available includes a bidet sprayer (water hose/ shattaf). 
A grocery store is available across the street from the apartment.

Flat is great and located in the city centre. It's a luxury apartment with a spectacular view. of the Eiffel tower. It's nice and quite and has a lot of nice restaurant around it. Communication and service was also excellent!!! We hope to come back. Best, Sandra and team

Fred was an amazing host and has the greatest appartment in Paris. Location is superb, walking distance to everywhere you may want to visit, dine, shop and enjoy. The appartment was spectacular for our family of 5, comfortable, modern, fancy stuff! Hope to come back soon.

The place is spectacular... the cleaning lady was amazing... but the communication and the hosts devalued our stay. There is multiple people and you never meet the owner of the unit. They left us check out details in French and we ere confused as to what we were supposed to do. MULTIPLE people in the building have keys to the apartment because they would come in when we were gone... and so when we left we left the keys on the table and then were told they had to replace the lock by very aggressive text messages from the owner of the unit who we never met... but also this was 5 minuets after we left and we watched the cleaning lady go in with her key. Honestly we had a great stay oppose to the owner messaging us after and creating and issue that didn't seem like it had to be caused at all. We recommend the place, just make sure you are VERY clear with all of the hosts and make sure everything is convent for you.

The penthouse apartment overlooks the Eiffel Tower with a beautiful balcony. The kitchen is beautiful and a great hang out space started our morning coffee and breakfast there. The bedrooms had great AC in the summer. It felt like one was staying in a beautiful Parisian apartment. The location is perfect as it was in the center of it all, making it easy to walk to places.

Our family stayed at this beautiful apartment for four days in August.  It was very large, stylish and clean with all the amenities. You can sit on the couch, sip wine and see the Eiffel Tower!
It was our first trip to Paris and the central location was within walking distance to terrific restaurants, fashion stores and all the must-see sites. The host was friendly, easy to contact and very responsive.  Just an overall great stay!

BE WARNED, these people will ask you to send personal information and pictures that they have no right to ask for less than 12 hours before check in with the threat of cancelling - when we said no, to sharing the information and asked them if the reservation was still active or not, they stopped responding to our messages and to the Airbnb calls until finally cancelling 2 hours before check in and leaving us in a horrible situation as all of the other options were taken by then. Horrible experience...
Enjoyed our stay here;  would definitely stay there again.
Amazing place, great location, slap bang in the middle of Paris - a stone’s throw from the Eiffel Tower. Special trip with the family.
Wonderful place to stay with family
The location is superb! The house is very spacious and the design is very stylish!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Incredible stunning apartment with a gorgeous spacious common and dining area  with a modern architecturally designed kitchen.  We had a lovely week celebrating with friends and enjoyed evening meals with views of Eiffel Tower twinkling at night from the spacious terrace balcony.  As the kitchen has such modern fixtures be sure to get thorough instructions from the very helpful staff to cook your market sourced ingredients. We particularly enjoyed the Saturday morning market just down the avenue.  The help who are close at hand were wonderful at the daily cleaning and doing some of our laundry. 

A very magical apartment for an extended stay with friends.
Great place, location and communication.
Beautiful view/ Great space/ Perfect Location/ Luxury Amenities
Excelent location, restored antique apartment, just some bad oddors, overall good stay
We had a great time in this apartment ❤️! Great service, great amenities and best location ever! The only hiccup is the small elevator ! Best view ever!
This is a great place to stay.
Nice place to stay.

Très bon emplacement, quartier super
Appartement calme, très propre, et spacieux 
Maximilienne est très réactive aux messages

Logement agréable et pratique pour 3/4 jours... très bien situé, à deux pas du métro mais dans une rue moins passante. Bonne literie. Attention escaliers en colimaçon pour enfants en bas âge.
Chambres en sous sol sans fenêtres mais Vmc.
Maximilienne est très sympathique et répond a toutes vos questions rapidement.
Logement agreable dans quartier sympa et vivant . Spacieux et atypique.
Parfait

appartement propre et correspondant aux photos
bien situé, proche des commerces et facile d"accès. La remise des des clés en un jeu d'enfant.
Maximilienne est très réactive

Très bon séjour. Emplacement idéal, à 2 minutes d’une station de métro. L’appartement donne directement sur la rue mais cela ne pose pas de problèmes au niveau du bruit. 
Petit bémol pour l’électricité qui se coupait régulièrement.
Logement conforme aux attentes avec une proximité très agréables du métro cinéma alimentation

Maximilienne est adorable. Très réactive dans les échanges. Appartement très propre et conforme à la description. Très arrangeante. Literie au top et endroit très calme. Proche toutes commodités et métro/bus juste à côté ! Adresse à conservée !! Merci Maximilienne
Très bon séjour dans ce air bnb très propre et bien placé
Bel appartement bien situé et bien équipé. Je recommande

Apparemment très correct et très bien situé à Paris (Convention /Vaugirard). Les chambres sont situées dans un sous-sol, ce qui peut gêner ou sembler original selon les goûts de chacun. Les toilettes sont de facture récente donc très agréables. Propreté impeccable dans tout l’appartement et excellente literie.
Le logement propre, bon rapport qualité/prix.
Appartement très agréable idéalement situé pour visiter Paris. Je recommande si nous devons repartir à Paris nous avons trouvé notre logement.

Appartement très bien agencé et vraiment bien situé à 2 pas du métro. Très propre. Literie excellente.petit bémol pour nous : la petite chambre qui ne se ferme pas ( le lit bloque la porte) dommage quand on veut isoler un enfant du bruit du salon.très bon sejour néanmoins.
Tout est super. Recommandable.
Très arrangeante. Bien apprécié.
Appartement vraiment pratique et bien situé. Rapport qualité / prix c'est parfait.

Très bel appartement : il est propre, calme, spacieux et très bien placé. Les chambres sont en souplex et sans fenêtres mais le plafond est haut et donc il n'y a pas de sensation d'enfermement.  L’appartement est très bien placé, à proximité du métro et de lignes de bus qui passent aux pieds des sites touristiques. Nous gardons l'adresse pour un prochain séjour. Maryse
Excellente communication, appartement très propre.

Appartement relativement grand et confortable. Idéal pour passer quelques jours à Paris. 
Proche du métro.
Appartement très agréable et propre, je le recommande !

Très bon emplacement, excellente réactivité, appartement original et bien pensé. Très bons équipements. Ménage fait un peu vite sans doute en raison d'un problème d'électricité à gérer. D'ailleurs résolu. Une bonne expérience donc, je recommande !
Pas mal !!!
Parfait (sauf pas de papier toilette)
Superbe appartement bien situé pour profiter de Paris
L'appartement est top, très bien situé, les équipements sont complets. Le métro est à 2 min à pied. N'hésitez pas à réserver
Bien
Appartement très pratique, très propre, un bon rapport qualité prix. La communication avec Maximilienne a été facile. Je recommande !
Super bien situé, propre.  Bien agencé. Rien à dire à par super

Logement très agréable , fonctionnel , a deux pas du métro  convention proche du centre de paris ( tout Eiffel et Montparnasse a 15 minutes  à pied).  
Je reviendrai avec plaisir..

2 nuits agréables passés dans ce petit appartement.
Proche du métro et de petits supermarchés et multiples restaurants. 
Quelques petites améliorations à apporter pour rendre l'appartement plus agréables...
logement conforme à la description, les enfants ont adoré la chambre au sous sol, logement bien équipé, au calme et très bien situé
Le logement est situé dans un endroit calme. Couchage confortable, à condition de ne pas être claustrophobe: les chambres sont en sous-sol, sans fenêtre. Local commercial reconverti en hébergement.
Ne pas hésiter très bon logement.
Très bon emplacement, bon rapport qualité prix.
Un très bon logement rapport qualité-prix,correspond parfaitement à nos attentes,emplacement idéal très proche du métro.
Logement confortable
Rien à signaller
Appartement atypique (ancien local commercial) mais bon rapport qualité / prix dans le quartier
Appartement atypique, propre et bien placé, du rangement pour les affaires, c’est très agréable.
Appartement bien situé, facile d’accès. Émilienne est très réactive.

Super logement pour 5 personnes. Bien équipé (juste petit soucis de lave vaisselle) et propre dans l’ensemble. Maximilienne est très réactive dans ces réponses et disponible. Je recommande se logement pour une escale à paris.

nous avons apprécié cet appart, très propre, agréable, donnant sur une rue calme avec un excellent restau Thaï presque en face. Un bon emplacement. Les chambres sont en sous-sol mais pour quelques jours , ça ne pose pas de problème pour nous. La communication avec Maximilienne était très bien. Je recommande donc cet appart.
Appartement très calme en plein Paris dans un quartier sympa. Propre et les lits sont confortables. Je reviendrai sans problème.

Je recommande vivement l'appartement d'Emilienne. Idéalement situé entre Convention et Vaugirard, quartier très agréable, exceptionnellement calme et la climatisation dans la chambre... Par ces fortes chaleurs, c'est un vrai plus !

Logement idéalement situé à proximité de la ligne 12 de métro. De nombreux magasins et restaurants aux alentours. Appartement très original de part ses chambres en sous-sol, petite cour extérieure à l'arrière. Très propre, literie impeccable, on n'entent pas du tout les voisins. L'hôte est vraiment très disponible et réactive.
