Merci beaucoup Maximilienne, je garde votre adresse car je reviendrai très certainement et je vous ferai de la publicité car ce logement rassemble tous les critères qu'un provincial peut chercher en terme de location dans la capitale. e vous dis donc à un de ces jours !

Jolie appartement « atypique » dans quartier sympas et proche des commerces ( petite supérette, boulangerie, café gourmand) et du métro.
Maximilienne nous as donné les infos pour continuer notre séjour parisien. Bon échange et réactive...
Super séjour ! Merci Maximilienne
Très bien situé pour visiter Paris,  logement propre et une hôte très disponible.

Très bel appartement, très propre et super bien situé  je recommande vivement !
À noter juste l'absence de réelle separation entre plusieurs lits, mais sinon au top !
Quoique mentionnée dans le descriptif, la chambre en sous-sol reste une chambre en sous-sol .
Emplacement sympa à proximité des transports en Commun dans un environnement calme.  La literie est bien, il y a de la place dans l'appartement. Merci pour ce court séjour.
Appartement bien placé proche des transports et des commerces.

Logement très pratique et bien positionné pour passer un court séjour a Paris. Nous n'avons passé qu'une nuit mais tout était parfaitement adapté et conforme à nos attentes. Très bon rapport qualité prix, je recommande.
Logement très bien situé, calme, propre et bien équipé.
bien
très bon séjour, appartement très bien placé, et facile d'accès.
Logement agréable, propre et très bien équipé.  Rue calme , supérette à proximité, métro à 2 pas. Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir.

Jolie appartement très propre et très agréable. 
Les enfants on adoré mangé et dormir dans cette ancien magasin réaménagé. 
Maximilienne et très sympathique et réactive dans les communications. 
Petite supérette à 30 mètres. Quoi demander de plus?
Logement conforme aux attentes. C'est en effet une boutique réaménagée, mais c'est très bien. Quartier avec commerces et restaurants. Appartement à proximité du métro convention .
Super appartement bien bien aménagé et bien situé. Propre et lumineux. Maximilienne est très réactive et disponible!

Le logement n'est pas un appartement spacieux mais une petite boutique aménagée pour faire de la location.
L'entrée (ex-vitrine rendue opaque) se trouve sur le trottoir et les chambres dans la cave.

Il n'est pas possible de manger à 4 sur place, faute d'espace et de chaises suffisantes.
L'escalier en colimaçon menant à la cave est dangereux pour les très jeunes enfants ou les personnes âgées.

Malgré cela, le logement est sécurisé par un store et une porte vitrée intérieure. 
La cave bénéficie d'un déshumidificateur. 
Par ailleurs, le mobilier et les équipements sont propres, fonctionnels et récents.

L'entrée dans les lieux est autonome et l'emplacement de cette location est très appréciable au vu des commerces, du métro et des restaurants proches.
Très bon emplacement, appt agréable avec tout le confort.
Un lieu charmant, propre et très bien situé !
Tres bon accueil, très bien situé. Quatier calme. Je recommande se logement.

Se qu'il faut retenir de ce logement : 
Un petit point que ne précise pas l'annonce c'est qu'il s'agit d'un ancien commerce réaménagé en appartement, mais ce n'est pas vraiment un inconvénient car l'aménagement a été très bien conçu. Les chambres au sous-sol sont en cas de canicule très intéressantes, car il y fait frais.
Logement parfait pour une famille avec enfants, seul petit bémol, pas de réel espace repas, mais il y a plein de petit restaurant très abordable dans le quartier ainsi que de nombreux commerces.
La localisation dans le 15ème est très proche du centre et très intéressante pour bien visiter Paris, éviter la voiture le stationnement parisien est hors de prix, Métro et bus sont tout proches ...
En résumé un excellent rapport qualité prix pour ce logement.

Très bon séjour passé à Paris, appartement très bien placé, calme, lumineux, l'entrée se fait très facilement. Il a tous les équipements nécessaires!
Merci encore à Maximilienne!
Bien
Joli petit appartement dans le 15ème. Très bien placé. Très propre. On a envie d'y revenir.
ancienne boutique donc fermeture existante et baie vitrée que l'on a pas vu sur les photos. sinon propre et bien situé. nous recommandons.
Appartement fonctionnel très bien situé....une bonne adresse ....à recommander

Logement qui correspond aux critères annoncés.
Il faut juste préciser que c est une ancienne boutique donc il n y a pas d ouvertures ( fenêtres ) dans le salon ( cote rue) uniquement dans la cuisine .
Merci à Maximilienne pour son accueil. Le grand point fort du logement, c'est sa situation dans un quartier très agréable. L'appartement est sécurisé et bien isolé.

L'appartement est propre, correspond à l'annonce, proche des commodités et situé dans un rue plus calme.
Maximilienne est très réactive pour répondre aux demandes.
Un bon séjour d'une nuit.
Super séjour chez Maximilienne

logement agréable et bien équipé
emplacement dans le 15ème parfait
je recommande
Bonne adresse avec une hôtesse disponible et réactive
Très bon accueil de Maximilienne qui s'est rendue disponible, appartement super et très bien placé

Logement bien situé dans un quartier vivant 
Le logement est propre et spacieux 
Le RDC est lumineux 
Salle d eau propre et de bonne taille 
Les chambres au sous sol de bonnes taille ,dommage du manque d ouverture sur l extérieur 
(Pour les clostrophobes Pas conseillé)

Logement bien situé. Peut être utilisé par une famille car capacité de couchage importante. Seul petit bémol les chambres sont au sous-sol et atteignables par une escalier en colimaçon très raide. Sinon l'appart est très propre et très bien équipé.
L'espace chambre est au sous sol donc attention pour les personnes qui ont besoin d'air !
Appartement fonctionnel et bien situé. La proximité du météo est un vrai atout. Maxilienne s'est rendue disponible pour échanger et préparer notre arrivée.
Les restaurants et les boutiques à côté.
Maximilienne est très accueillante, son appartement est propre, très bien situé, et pratique.
Sans hésiter!
Vraiment confortable. Un space tellement accessible, propre, tranquille comme décrit sur le site. La propriétaire très accueillante. Recommandé 100%.
Hôte sympathique toujours présente pour répondre au moindre problème. Appartement conforme au attentes propre et fonctionnel ainsi que proche de toutes commodités.

Un appartement très bien situé dans le 15ième, proche du métro, des commerces, des restaurants. L'appartement est très propre et agréable. Nous y avons passé un bon séjour à 5!
Maximilienne est une personne gentille, à l'écoute, qui s 'est montrée disponible et elle a essayé de trouver des solutions face à un imprévu indépendant d'elle. Nous n'hésiterons pas à revenir dans ce logement. Je le recommande! Bonne continuation Maximilienne!
Excellente communication, un appart parfait, une hôte tres disponible. N'hesitez pas !

Maximilienne est disponible et explique très bien pour notre arrivé à l'appartement. Les photos correspond bien au lieux, propre. Proche du métro  (2min à pied) et de tout commerces. Je vous la recommande !
Très bon appartement, propre et très bien situé à 150m du métro convention et 15 minutes à pied du parc expo.

Logement idéalement situé pour rejoindre l hyper centre en métro ou à pieds. Maximilienne est charmante et attentionnée. Le logement fonctionnel et mieux destiné à un couple avec enfants qu a deux couples car l une des 2 chambres est composé d un lit double + simple, la 2nde chambre d un lit simple. 
Séjour parfait. Merci !
Logement propre et très tranquille, parfaitement conforme aux descriptions. Merci à Maxilienne pour son accueil et bonnes fêtes
L'appartement est grand, bien situé et proche des transports ! L'accès au logement est très facile grâce aux indications de Maximilienne ! Je recommande
Le logement est atypique et tres sympa. Nous y reviendrons sûrement.

Situation idéale pour voyage d'affaire et découverte de Paris avec présence de tous les commerces et du métro à proximité (moins de 5min). Maximilienne a été très réactive et l'entrée dans l'appartement a été très simple et sans contraintes. L'appartement est propre et bien entretenu. Je le recommande vivement.

Maximilienne est une super hote tres accueillante.
Je n'hésiterais pas une seconde pour un second sejour.
Au calme, l appartement de maximilienne est très fonctionnel et très bien équipe ! Proche de tout : Metro, commerces ; encore merci maximilienne pour votre accueil et votre gentillesse !

Le logement est agréable et bien situé dans quartier, proche du métro et de la porte de Versailles.
La propreté mérite plus d'attention. Le tapis du salon est plein de tâches.
Beaucoup d'humidité dans la chambre et dans la salle de bain
J ai pas  pu voir maximilliene mais ses instruction fut très claire pour accéder à son logement et l appartement est propre bien située j ai adorée

Quartier très agréable
Accueil très sympathique 
Logement correspondant aux descriptions
Tres belle appartement situé dans quartier calme a proximité de tout commerce, transports, etc..

Séjour rendu très agréable par la qualité du logement proposé,  bien agencé,  pratique  et fonctionnel. Le quartier offre aussi beaucoup de possibilité.  Merci encore à  Maximilienne ! Je recommande vivement ce logement et j'y reviendrai

l'appartement que nous avons occupé pendant 2 jours était vraiment à la hauteur de nos espérances.
Il est très bien situé proche du métro et de tous commerces. très fonctionnel nous nous y sommes sentis très bien.
Maximilienne est une personne très sympathique qui a su répondre favorablement à toutes nos demandes.
je ne peux que conseiller cet endroit naturellement.
merci beaucoup Maximilienne !!!
je suis sûre d'y revenir lors d'un prochain passage à Paris.
Super merci!!

Très bonne accueil. Mis à l'aise. Propriétaire disponible.
Logement conforme à la description, au rez-de-chaussé, entrée par l'arrière. Au sous sol, 2 lits simple, 1 lit double, à l'étage 1 canapé convertible pour deux personnes. 
La ventilation fonctionne fort bien au sous sol et à l'étage.
Salle de bain cosy, propre et moderne.
Quartier sympa et commodité très proche, mini market à bon prix à deux pas.
Bien pour voyage d'affaire.
Merci 
Jean&Sabine

appartement très bien situé , proche des commerces et d'une station de métro.
Le logement est fonctionnel.

Notre hôte était absente lors de notre arrivée, la remise des clés a été faite par son fils.
Par contre, si l'appartement est agréable et bien équipé, nous avons trouvé une salle de bains d'une saleté repoussante, poubelle pleine de tampax usagés, douche pleine de cheveux et pas nettoyée, avec 3 ou 4 flacons de gel douche  vides qui trainaient, une vasque avec du dentifrice etc..., nous avons dû faire le ménage nous_mêmes, je trouve que 30 euros, c'est facilement gagné, car pour changer,3 lits c'est cher.nous avons même jeter les bouteilles vides laissées par les occupants précédents, quant au linge , mis en boule dans les casiers , on ne sait pas si 'est du linge propre ou sale, du coup, on hésite à s"en servir.
L'appartement est bien et Maximilienne est très sympa !
Un bel appartement, grand et bien équipé, également bien situé dans Paris. Notre hôte s'est montrée disponible et arrangeante. Le séjour était parfait! Merci Maximilienne pour tout ça!

Très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Maximilienne. Très spacieux et confortable. Très fonctionnel car bien équipé. Très bon rapport qualité/prix pour un Airbnb à Paris.

Maximilienne est très accueillante et il est facile de discuter avec elle. 

Je recommande son appartement !

Très bon accueil! Appartement situé dans un super quartier et très proche des transports en commun, prix relativement abordable pour là superficie et la fonctionnalité du logement! Spacieux et avec un dressing au top! Au plaisir de revenir dans cet appartement... merci à maximilienne pour les renseignements et sa disponibilité! A vous de le découvrir!

Appartement très sympa et fonctionnel.
Maximilienne à été super sympa. Nous conseillons cet appart à tous le monde. Il y a un resto libanais délicieux juste en face. Nous retournerons chez Maximilienne avec grand plaisir

Les gros +: très bon accueil. Logement parfaitement conforme à la description, très bien équipé et fonctionnel situé dans un quartier calme, agréable et commerçant à deux pas de toutes commodités (métro, supermarchés...)
Les petits moins: ménage fait rapidement malgré les 30 euros de frais (poubelle pleine, draps suspects...) mais rien de bien catastrophique.
Je reste satisfaite de mon séjour.
Acceuil sympathique, accès facile aux clés. Je recommande.
Chouette appartement au 15eme.  Maximilienne a été réactivé à nous messages et demandes.

Lieu accueillant mais il faut s' attendre à être très enfermé au point de vue luminosité car uniquement fenêtres dans la cuisine qui se trouve au bout d' un couloir.
Porte entrée fenêtre vitrée mais occultée (Website hidden by Airbnb) lumière passe mais pas de vue du ciel et de la rue.Ce lieu d' entré est la pièce du salon .

Un bon appartement pour quelques jours à Paris. Très bien situé lappartement avec beaucoup d'espace pour notre famille, deux adultes et trois enfants. Une bonne cuisine, tv et wifi pour les filles ;-) ...parfait!

Appartement très bien tenu, très fidèle aux photos.
Hyper fonctionnel pour les escapades à Paris, tout est à disposition, taxi, bus, métro à 2 minutes à pied.
La literie est bien et les nuits ont été très calme malgré le rez-de-chaussée.
De plus nous vous conseillons le restaurant SIAM juste en face, un délice pour les papilles gustatives et un personnel hyper sympathique disponible.
Un voyage à refaire dès que possible.
Famille Cordey

Le logement est placée dans le 15ème arrondissement. Il se situe à 30 minutes à pied du champ de Mars et à 1h de l arc de Triomphe. Cependant il est proche de petit magasin de nourriture donc facile d'acheter des petites choses. Le métro est proche. Un parking payant se trouve à disposition. 25€ pour une nuit. 39€ pour deux journées complètes.. L'intérieur du logement est complet. Rien à redire la dessus. La qualité est bonne. Je recommande ce logement pour des personnes ne voulant pas payer trop cher.. Et prête à marcher !

Ce logement est très agréable pour un petit séjour à deux pas de la Porte de Versailles et de la ligne 12 du métro. Nous nous sommes sentis confortablement installés dans cet espace. Les draps et serviettes sont aussi nickels que la cuisine bien équipée. Merci à vous, Maximilienne !
Tout allais très bien, merci!

Chouette première visite à Paris dans ce logement proche de toutes commodités. Bon accueil et réponses très rapides à nos questionnements. Très pratique également si vous souhaitez vous rendre à Paris Expo Porte de Versailles!
Très bien
Just superb flat

The location of the room is really perfect!
For this price, I don’t think we can find somewhere better!
RAS
I recommend the place. The metro station (supermarket, pharmacy, taxi, etc.) is close to the apartment. It was perfect.

The flat was okay with two exceptions:
Maximilienne promised a dishwasher but there was no working dish washer.
The ice box in the fridge contained old food and a lot of ice so that the ice box could not be closed.
Maximilienne ignored my questions about compensation for the not delivered furnishing.
That was a bad communication style.

------------------------------------------------------

Die Wohnung war bis auf zwei Ausnahmen in Ordnung:
Maximilienne versprach einen Geschirrspüler, aber es gab keinen funktionierenden Geschirrspüler.
Die Eisbox im Kühlschrank enthielt altes Essen und viel Eis, so dass die Eisbox nicht geschlossen werden konnte.
Maximilienne ignorierte meine Fragen zur Entschädigung für die nicht gelieferte Leistung.
Das war ein schlechter Kommunikationsstil.
Clean place, took some time to find the right door. A bit surprised that there was no shampoo but overall everything was very good

Good stay overall. The flat is bright and clean, quite spacious for Paris. It is right on the street, in a space that seems to have originally been intended for a store or something like this. It is quiet however. Rooms are in a basement, which means they are dark but require a constant ventilation system as there are no windows. Good bathroom and modern kitchen. Very good location and fair price.
Somos brasileiros e gostamos de tudo no apartamento da Maximilienne. A localização é muito boa, perto de mercados, padarias e do metrô!

Piccolo appartamento situato vicino alla metro,riposto su due piani,comodo per due persone o più.
Ottimo e pulito
strategic location, good communication, clean :)

The apt was exactly as described. No misrepresentation, which was very much appreciated. The spiral staircase was a bit of a challenge with luggage but not sure you can do much about that. The check in instructions were thorough and clear. Good job and thank you!
Muy bueno el departamento. Limpio y cómodo.

El alojamiento es muy pequeño, fui en un grupo de 5 y estuvimos realmente incómodos por la falta de espacio. Por lo demás bastante bien, buena ubicación cerca de 2 estaciones de metro, en general bastante limpio y cuenta con lo necesario, no lo recomiendo para grupos mayores de 3 personas.

Tiene una excelente ubicación. Maximilienne estuvo en constante comunicación aunque no la conocimos personalmente. Recibimos en tiempo y forma las indicaciones para la entrada y salida del departamento. Recomendable.
Muy bien ubicado. Limpio aunque los espacios de las habitaciones un poco justos.

A localização foi muito importante para nós, estávamos somente 30 minutos a pé da Torre Eiffel, metrô muito próximo ao local (infelizmente não usamos devido a greve). 
Comércio local muito bom, comprávamos nosso café da manhã na esquina do apartamento.
Existe uma persiana automática na sala que separa a claridade e o barulho da rua , deixando o ambiente bem confortável para dormir.
En general recomendamos el piso para vuestra visita a París. Maximilianne es accesible todo el tiempo.

Local excelente para 4 pessoas!
Perto de tudo.
Tive problemas para locomoção devido a greve da França, e afetou todos os transportes.  UBER e BOLT ficaram muito caros e tive que locar um carro, outro encontrei outro problema, o de estacionamento. Muito dificil encontrar.

Localização é satisfatória, self check in facilita bastante, np entanto o acesso aos quartos é difícil para quem tem dificuldade de locomoção porque a escada é bem estreita. Também sentimos falta de algumas amenidades, como xampu, tábua de cortar, toalha pra enxugar louça na cozinha, leiteira... No geral, foi satisfatório.
No apto para lo que es la app
Great location! Thanks for hosting us :)
This place is amazing! Great location! Great amenities ! Highly recommend !
A short walk to underground station and grocery stores, very good patisseries nearby.  A good place to stop and sleep but not a lot of space to do anything else.
Great location.  Easy to get all of the tourist spots & plenty of food options nearby.
Great place to stay, with kids bit difficult due to the spiral stairs. Everything is available so close to the house.

We had a great stay at Maximilienne’s flat in Vaugirard, it is ideally located as a 2min walk to the Convention metro station on the 12 line, great for old Paris and getting up to montmartre easily. We didn’t meet Maximilienne but the check in process was flawless and very easy, and communication was fantastic. Would definitely stay there again, many thanks Maximilienne! :)
Excelente lugar

The place is as advertised. Check-in was easy. Very good location near the metro station. Big kitchen but a bit smaller bathroom. Price/quality ratio is very good. I would book this again if I would stay in Paris with a few people.
Great location.

L'appartamento è meraviglioso e molto comodo, in 10 minuti di metropolitana si arriva in centro e la fermata è proprio sotto casa. Pulito e accogliente. Unico consiglio è di portarvi la carta igienica perché manca
Tengan en cuenta que es un local a la calle adaptado como depto. Las camas estan en un subsuelo sin ventilacion hacia fuera.
Great location, One minute to grocery store, 3 minutes to metro station, restaurant around the apartment.

Good kitchen. A bit disappointed with basement rooms. Elderly cannot walk down the stairs. Bathroom basics like handwash and floor mat for the toilet were not present.
It is ok place to stay.
Esta ubicado en un muy buen punto... con acceso al metro a tan sólo 200m, es una zona comercial con varios supermercados a pocos pasos..
Great place to stay. Would stay there again!
Pese a alguna cosa mejorable del alojamiento en líneas generales muy buena relación calidad-precio con una ubicación muy buena.
Good location

The place was a bit smaller then in the pictures. If you have small kids there are tough spiral staircases going downstairs. The host did not have it cleaned on time so we came into a dirty apartment. The host did send someone out to clean but it was late and we did not expect them. The cleaning person came the next day but it was very inconvenient and we had to deal with a dirty apartment for our first night. 
The one positive is the location. Close to the metro station with only a 10 minute ride to all the attractions, and in a good neighborhood.
Amazing location close to the metro grocery store and restaurants. The home was clean and comfy.
Great place in a great area. A lot of good food and sight seeing within 20-30 minute walks. Laundry machine and WiFi were the biggest perks.
Great Neighborhood, excellent communication from host. Clean, close to metro station, close to grocery store, cafes etc.
Buen lugar ....

This place was perfect for our stay! It is very centrally located near everything you could need. We walked to the Eiffel Tower in 30 mins. Got breakfast at a bakery nearby. It was also an easy walk to the train station. The apartment is very safe and secure. The beds are in the basement which made it quiet and dark for sleeping. It was simple yet functional. We enjoyed our stay at Maximilienne's place.
The venue was nice and central and made public transport quite easy.

very clean apartment with modern decoration, everything very functional, great location near the subway station, excellent neighborhood, has market, pharmacy, several cafes and commerce in general near, I had a great stay.
Excelente ubicación y muy buena limpieza.

We were a family of 6 and had an amazing stay at this house. Check In was smooth and the place was perfect to accommodate all of us. Amenities like kitchen supplies, bathroom supplies, towels, etc were all available. We felt like we were staying at our own home. The location cannot be more perfect. The metro station and bus stops are walking distance. There is supermarket just across the road and quite a number of restaurants around. The area feels quite lively and safe. We travelled late at nights without any issues. Will definitely recommend this place and will surely stay again on next visit.
Great location near metro.  Real nice farmer’s market like set up at the corner- serving authentic cheeses and pastries- not sure if it’s there all year.

The place is relatively nice and very clean. However, there were a few surprises. 
(1) We didn't have any hot water. We informed her at the end of the one-night stay and learned that is a box that needs to be turned on, but we weren't made aware of that ahead of time.
(2) The bedroom is in the basement with no windows so there is no natural light, which is hard to tell from the pictures. 
(3) We couldn't get the washing machine working. This probably wouldn't be a problem for most guests but I was really relying on that because I'd been traveling for a while. Luckily there is a laundromat just a 3 min walk away.
Amazing Location ! If your not a stairs person definitely not for you though. The staircase to the beds is winding and very narrow. Super clean and a close walk to the underground.
The location was very convenient for our stay in Paris. It was a short walk to the metro and close to stores and sites.

This is a great location for the price due to good proximity to the Metro. Areas to be aware of which aren’t shown in the photos is that in order to access the main bedroom areas you have to go down an extremely narrow spiral staircase which is extremely cramped. In addition some of the appliances are not overly intuitive such as induction hob - fine but why supply mainly non induction pans. Otherwise good for a cheap weekend!
Die Studiowohnung war super eingerichtet,  war das nötigste da. Die Lage mit 30 min Fußmarsch zum Eigenturm ist voll ok.

El apartamento es muy céntrico para visitar lugares de interés y del transporte.

El lugar es muy lindo, no funcionaba el microondas y nos lo cambiaron muy rápido, además cuentan con todos los servicios, sin duda lo recomiendo.
Todo claro para llegar, las instrucciones fueron precisas, el departamento estuvo cómodo a pesar del espacio. Bueno para el precio

Perfectly located apartment (just off the 12 line) in a really neat neighborhood.  The apartment itself appears to be a converted storefront - it is small, but stylishly decorated and offered a perfect home base for our explorations of Paris.

Muy buena ubicacion, buen barrio, muy cerca de metro, comfortable para 4 personas, solo un tema, hay una escalera de caracol para las habitaciones un poco dificil para bajar maletas y demas, fuera de ahi todo bien.
Хорошее место, чисто. Хозяин очень приветливый

This is an excellent place to stay in Paris! There is a subway stop very close to the home making it very conveniently located. The apartment itself is clean, modern and well furnished with comfortable beds. Maximilienne is a very good host, helpful and accommodating! If I come back to Paris I will stay here again!
Good and comfortable place. close to the metro station.
Good 3 days stay!! Host replied back real quick ! Thanks

I cannot say our stay was perfect. for the first thing, this place is on the first floor and the door was translucent, which makes us feel scary everytime someone passes by. Another thing was we didn't get the hot shower. I don't think I wanna stay here again.
Leuke ruimte ! Wel een fijne buitenruimte

Maximilienne is a fantastic host and on the end of the phone whenever you need.  
The check-in system is really efficient and easy, as you can arrive whenever you want. 
The amenities are great and the position is perfect for discovering Paris. 
Furthermore, the value for money is second to none, I definitely recommend this apartment, and would be happy to stay there again.
Very nice apartment with an unbeatable hosts
Great place and awesome location! Really convenient for my mom so close to the metro! Was great!
excellent place great location
Un lugar que cumple con lo más necesario, es bueno.
Un apartamento cogedor y completo
Apartamento acogedor, con todo lo que se necesita, bien situado y comunicado
Great place.
Recomendable para pasar unos días y de fácil acceso para llegar a las principales atracciones

Viajamos en diciembre 2018, mi esposo mis dos hijos mayores, les puedo resumir del apartamento lo siguiente: 
1. El apartamento muy moderno y muy limpio. El baño , cocina y pisos muy limpios. 
2. La ubicación excelente, a dos minutos andando a la estación del metro de Convention.
3. Área  segura. 
4. El apartamento a borde de calle, no es necesario ascensor. Pero para la habitación hay que bajar una escalera de caracol . 
5. Las camas  que se informaban eran 1 cama matrimonial, 2 camas twin y un sofá cama en la sala. Lastimosamente las dos camas twin estaban dañadas y no se pudieron utilizar. Pero se solucionó utilizando el sofá cama. 
6. Siempre recibimos contestación de Maximilienne. 
7. El agua caliente tuvo un inconveniente, pero se resolvió rápidamente. 
8. La cocina muy completa. Y tiene lavadora de ropa y de platos.
9. A la salida de la calle hay una tienda llamada Auchan, bastante completa para comprar agua y desayunos. 
Lo puedo recomendar.

Maximilienne’s apartment is great! Much more space than I expected for Paris. There were three good sized beds and lots of living space. It was very clean and had everything we needed, including coffee and tea. And the method for retrieving the key was very secure, which is important to me.

Excelente ubicación, barrio residencial, tranquilo y de fácil acceso. Completamente dotado, muy cómodo y acogedor. Recomendado. En la planta baja camas para 4 personas, y un amplio mueble para organizar la ropa, a la entrada, sofá cama muy cómodo para dos personas, cocina y baño. El
Espacio es muy acogedor a pesar de que no tiene ventanas hacia el exterior.
I had a great time here. it is located the most perfect location. the apartment itself was clean and comfortable. I would totally recommend staying here for sure
Very good location and quick response.
Ubicación ideal para ir andando a la Torre Eifel y a un paso de la parada de metro y de varios supermercados
Great location- there are supermarkets, pharmacy, metro station, pâtisserie . All necessary. The Eiffel tower about 35 min on foot. Thank you, Maximilienne, for great stay!
Very good location close by the metro. Cozy and well equipped apartment.

Our family of 5 stayed comfortably in Maximilienne’s apartment which is located on a quiet street very close to all the amenities you could need, including a metro stop 2 blocks away. The hosts are very accessible via the app, and made it super easy to check in and out. Eiffel Tower and Luxembourg Gardens are 30-35 minutes by foot. The rest of Paris is easily accessed by metro.

Es un departamento cómodo bien ubicado, buen precio y la anfitriona estuvo siempre en contacto para atender cualquier duda, volvería a hospedarme buena experiencia ! Y sin subir escaleras a pie de calle !!
Easy to get to

This apartment is at the roadside, the door is frosted glass, make me feel not very safe at night. As the other reviews said, the beds are in the underground, the stair is not convenience for old people and children, but there are 3 beds, good for group of people who want to stay in Paris for a lower price.

A wonderful apartment in Paris.  Very close to the Metro and contains all of the necessary amenities.

The five of us that stayed all had enough space, and were impressed with the cleanliness.  Maximilliene provided excellent communication and access instructions which was most appreciated.

Maximilienne house was exactly as described. Checking process was easy and responses was quick. She also was very accommodating by allowing me to stay an hour pass check out. I do have to point out that it isn’t a 15 minute walk from Eiffel Tower it’s a 15 minute ride by vehicle. I also will suggest the Thi restaurant across the street the food was amazing.
Tidy flat, easy to get in to the city centre.
Todo como en el anuncio

Great location
Very clear instructions

Espaço excelente , boa localização e o apartamento atende às necessidades. 
Recomendamos alugar o apartamento .apesar de não conhecer a anfitriã elá foi bem atenciosa por email e não tivemos nenhum problema na chegada ou saída.

We had a fabulous stay in Maximilliene’s apartment. It suited us ( family of 5) very well. The neighbourhood is great - and the apartment is literally around the corner from the Convention metro station. Felt very safe and we never bought from the same boulangerie/patisserie twice as there were so many to choose from - we were spoilt for choice! Appreciated having the coffee maker to contribute to our breakfasts of croissants and pain au chocolat. We went to the Marché Convention on a Thursday morning where there was a fantastic array of fruit and vegetables stalls ( just two blocks away). Easy commute via the metro into central Paris. The apartment is very compact but has everything you need. Only recommendation would be some curtains in the living room as the light was bright in the morning for our son sleeping on the couch upstairs. Thanks again for a lovely stay!

Byt byl krásný, čistý a na hezkém klidném místě. S hostitelkou byla skvělá domluva. Dokonce jsme si při odjezdu zapomněli v bytu Iphone a ona se s námi ihned domluvila a telefon zaslala poštou. Byly jsme víc než mile překvapení. Děkujeme!
Maximilienne's flat is conveniently located, it has good amenities and she is very quick to assist you with anything you may need.

Great quiet location, big enough for 3 people. Apartment very basic, no luxurious like a bottle of water, shampoo or else available. However for just sleeping an real okay apartment. If you would like to cook yourselves this a bit of a challenge.

Maximilienne's place was great! Communication was always clear and fast. Instructions for checking in were easy and straightforward. Apartment is located in a great spot, right by a grocery store, plenty of food options, and a short walk to the metro/bus stop.
No es tan central, y se ve más de lo que es así que al final me pareció que fue costosa la estadía allí. Pero es sufi para pasar una o dos noches, está bien-
Excelente apartamento todo lo necesario para pasar visitar París.
Great location, communication was quick and efficient.  Great place to stay to explore Paris.  Thank you :)
a nice and quiet place for the price. Everything was clean and kitchen well equipped. Be careful with the staircase to the basement rooms if you bring kids. I can recommend this for shorter stays.
Good place, well located, supermarket very close and well connected. Clean and practical. Rooms downstairs a bit humid. Good price for a short stay.

I hate to leave less that 5 star reviews, but I have to this time! Great location and very easy to find which made up for a few things. It was really hot and there was only one pitiful fan for two floors. We were given 1/2 a roll of TP and when I asked her about it, she said to go get some more even though it was listed as an amenity! The frig was tiny and the freezer was frozen over. Be aware that the sleeping quarters are in the basement and the twisting narrow stairs were ok for my child, but not so much for my 80 year old MIL who gets up a lot in the night and had to navigate them in the dark to go upstairs to the bathroom. Sadly, we also found fleas. BUT - it was an ok experience and very close to lots of stores and the metro which was super-convenient. I would have felt better about it had we paid a little less!

We were four 18 year old girls who wanted somewhere cheap and easy for Paris. This place was perfect! 

It fit all of our needs and there’s a small supermarket at the end of the road. Only 3 minutes away from convention metro station. 

Communication between us and Maximilienne was quick and easy. 

A lovely place to stay! I’d recommend it!
Apartamento tal como lo muestran en la fotos ... muy bonito ! Lo único incomodo han sido las escaleras y el aire acondicionado !
Spot on description — such a great place to stay and so conveniently located with shops and restaurants close by. Thank you so much!!

Unit is in a good location, Metro station Convention right around the corner. Many eateries and supermarkets within walking distance. Quiet side street. Unit looks like a refurbished storefront. It is a really odd shape with a small living room and a small kitchen and an even smaller  bathroom. The bathroom smelled musty and we had to run the fan continuously to prevent smells. Black mold in the tiny shower.  The living room was very hot since the front shutter did not work and the small fan did not really do anything. The 2 bedrooms downstairs can only be reached by a munchkin sized spiral staircase. There was a dehumidifier running downstairs and it needed it. Everything felt very clammy.  Downstairs bedrooms felt like an old cellar without any windows. No working light or lamp in the back bedroom. Kitchen was too tiny to do any serious meals besides breakfast. While almost everything interesting is reachable within 30 minutes walking, we would probably not think about using this tiny home again.
Enjoyed our stay. Really great place and location.
Maximilien's place is wonderful!  Very close to the metro, markets, and cafes.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again!
20/10 amazing place and hospitality
The apartment was clean and the host was responsive.

Eu e minha família nos hospedamos no espaço Maximilienne, foi simplesmente incrível, acesso incrível de estação de metrô shopping, farmácia, lojas , restaurantes, tudo muito perto . Casa limpa e super organizada tudo estava funcionando muito bem , Fomos muito bem recebidos e indico esse local .
Wonderful host, great location and a magical time for the whole family in Paris.
This place was perfect for the time we stayed in Paris. 15 min from Eiffel tower by Metro. Metro was easily used with no problems.  I highly recommend staying here.
Jederzeit wieder!

Great location. We had many options of public transportation, great spots to go eat and great amount of space for 5 people. She showed the outmost hospitality coming out to fix an issue. Thank you so much!

Flexibilidad para la llegada mucha facilidad y el apartamento estaba genial por mucho que fuera un bajo .muy buena conexion de metro y perfecro para moverte por Paris.Alojamiento comodo para hacer turisteo
Beautiful

This is the perfect place for you to stay in Paris! Centrally located to all main attractions with no more than a 15 minute metro / bus travel to most of the popular destinations, even possible to walk places if you desire! 
I travelled with 2 other adults and the apartment is the perfect accomodating space. 
 
Our hosts Maximilienne and Henri were very accomodating and helped us sort out any queries from moment of booking. I highly recommend this apartment for any one looking to visit Paris in the future.
This was a good find in a great location - it is very small and has a tricky staircase so beware if travelling with toddlers or elderly! Maximilienne was fantastic at communicating.

Lovely apartment convenient to the Convention Metro Station. This apartment contains all that we needed. High speed internet, smart tv, stove top, microwave, fridge and washer. Our host was highly communicative answering questions we had regarding the operation of her up-to-date appliances, European style coffee maker etc. This area appears to be more of a residential area than for tourists. We prefer shopping at local supermarkets rather than eating out at high end restaurants. This apartment is close to supermarkets, Starbucks, Bakery , pizza shops and anything else you need as a traveler. I would definitely rebook at this place again.

Departamento super cómodo para 4 personas. Ubicación excelente, más que recomendable, caminamos hacia la torre y hacia varios lugares todos los días. El metro a una cuadra y cuenta con un super en la esquina y otro más económico a una cuadra aproximadamente. Maximiliene super amable nos explicó lo que no sabíamos utilizar y siempre atenta a nuestras consultas. Muchas gracias por la comodidad!!!

Goede lokatie, stil, goede communicatie en vlakbij metro en supermarkt. 
Geen luxe, maar wel netjes en volledig.

La posizione è perfetta. Zona tranquilla e silenziosa.  Vicinissima alla fermata Convention (12) e quindi facilmente raggiungibili tutte le attrazioni della città.  Proprietari disponibili e gentilissimi.

We found the apartment very easily, it was big enough for a few people, there was everything we needed. It was near the metro, a few minutes, also a store. We were satisfied with this place for three days we were there. Maximilienne had also quick respond when we needed it, so we are very grateful. We recommend it ;)
Great location, mear super market, restaurants and Metro Line.
Near Metro station in magical Latin area of Paris. The landlord is responsible and patient to answer our questions. I recommend it!

We had a wonderful experience - the location is great, Maximilienne is very friendly and ready to solve any issues that are there, and the apartment was good enough for two couples (for a longer stay some might face the issue of the lack of privacy - no doors separate the upstairs sofa with the downstairs bedroom). The best thing - the apartment is pet friendly. It was a pleasure!

Max’s place is a little different. (bedroom is the basement) but was perfect for my family of 4. It was in a very family friendly area. We saw families going to church on Sunday and parents bringing kids to school on the weekdays. 
Bakeries , restaurants, groceries, and specially the Metro are close by!!! I had 4 different baguettes from different stores. My 11 year old son loved them all and started to rank them by taste and texture!!
My daughter loved Paris and is now planning on returning!! 
Again thanks to Max for letting us use her place.

Anfitrión muy atento.
Ubicación muy buena cercana al metro de París.
Limpieza.
Todos los servicios.
Cozy, comfortable and very friendly. Near metro and supermarkets. Love it! Thanks a lot for hospitality!

Great communication- our train was 90 minutes late and Maximilienne made arrangements for us to easily check-in as our original plans had changed. Perfect for our family- and we were able to walk to Eiffel Tower. Also very close to metro stop allowing other tourist travel. My kids enjoyed the WiFi our first evening.
The house was perfectly situated to explore all of the landmarks of Paris and was very clean.
My sister and I and our three children stayed here as a stopover before going to Disneyland Paris. This was very convenient and perfect for our needs.
The place is A- okay!
Apartamento en muy buen estado y buenas conexiones de metro para llegar al centro de Paris!
Es un departamento cerca de todo y muy cómodo lo recomiendo mucho
地點比較方便,在地鐵站旁邊,回覆很快很合作,居住空間內沒有窗戶,只有廚房有,洗澡只有溫水提供,在天氣凍時很麻煩,有調味料,但不齊全,例如沒有油,所提供廚具大部分都不能用在本身的電爐上,對需要煮食的很不便
Thanks Maxim. She responseD really quickly to all queries. My son left his Disneyland cal and Maxim have offered to post it over to us in the UK!

Maximilienne's place was perfect as a home base for exploring the city! Quiet street and neighborhood, with lots of restaurants and cafes nearby, and easy access to the subway. Would stay again if back in Paris!

Fantastic place to stay!! Location is so close to central Paris, everyone around is friendly and the most amazin pastry shops very close too!! Would definately recommend to anyone especially family's as we felt very safe!

The apartment was a bit smaller than I expected and I didn’t realize that the only bedroom was down stairs. It made it difficult for my parents who are in their 60s to operate. The cleanliness and the location of the hotel were perfect, however.
Outstanding
El apartamento es como lo ves en el anuncio, la ubicación es muy buena y confortable, en el metro te puedes trasladar de manera cómoda y sencilla. Muy Recomendable
Great place to stay got a short trip to Paris. Cosy bedroom as it is at the basement level.
Good place to stay. In the central. Can cook as well. Nearby everything have.
ubicacion perfecta el metro a 3 minutos, cuando estuvimos no estaba la lavadora y con solo 6 toallas fue un poco justo.
Very clean home with everything we needed in order to have an amazing stay in Paris. Maximilienne is an awesome host. Extremely close to metro, supermarket, patisserie as well as local places to eat.

El lugar es tan cual como esta en la fotos muy organizado, todo muy limpio, la comunicacion con maximilinne fue genial cerca de la estacion convention y de ahi te movilizas muy facilmente para conocer la ciudad
Good location, nice appartment.

Absolutely amazing find! Price is a bargain for the space you get. The neighbourhood is so friendly with everything you need literally around the corner. Great restaurants /cafes. Metro is metres away, (although we used uber to get about). Great space for 4 girls, safe and secure. Room set up is quirky but so are most city apartments. Spiral stairs were fun when slightly drunk ha! Everything was clean and beds comfy. Host was friendly, great communication and nice to speak to. Would definitely stay here again when we return to Paris. Thank you for having us.
A good place for 4-5 people. Wifi was unstable, reset the modem but it didn't help much. The weather was quite cold in Paris in the fall season but heater didn't work.

집이 전체적으로 음침한 느낌이 있습니다.
첫날에 충격이었지만 적응된 후 잘 지냈습니다.
부모님 모시고는 비추

Had a great time in Paris. We really liked that the market was so close to the apartment. Maximilienne was very responsive which was appreciated. It would be tight if 6 people stayed here but definitely 4 or 5, if you want your own space. The stairs to the basement are narrow so large luggage will not fit easily down them. You can bring your things down, if you like but we didn't find that necessary. The apartment was uber clean and I liked the higher ceilings and courtyard in the back. The basement has no street window so it allows you to sleep really well but set your alarm or you will sleep all day lol. Ubers were between 10-15 USD to get to most of the major sites. The neighborhood was charming, quiet, close to public transportation, and felt safe. The market nearby closes on Sunday so stock up, if you are there through the weekend.
She is a very nice person, her hosting very central, clear and comfortable. All was very fine. Thanks
Muy buen lugar! Muy bien ubicado en relación al metro y a los sitios turísticos.
This house is very close to the metro stop and walking distance from the Eiffel Tower. We all slept great downstairs.
The Location is near the metro and many restaurants. The size of the apartment is good. The bedrooms do not have windows and are below ground but very comfortable. Bring towels!

Muy lindo el lugar cómodo y de fácil acceso a los lugares turísticos de París, cerca al lugar se encuentra de todo Mercados, restaurantes, etc. Un bonito lugar pasamos muy gratos momentos. Recomendaría a todos que quieran visitar París. Felicitaciones y gracias Maximilienne.

호스트와 연락이 잘 닿는 점이 좋습니다. 또한 집 근처에 맥도날드와 KFC, 여러 마트가 인접해 있어 편리했습니다. 집이 위치한 컨벤션역이 중심부와 가까워 대부분의 관광지를 30분 이내에 갈 수 있었습니다. 다만 집이 복층이라고 나와있는데 그 복층이 지하층과 1층입니다. 꿉꿉하거나 추운 걸 좋아하지 않는 분들은 이용하기 조금 힘들 것 같습니다. 그리고 인덕션이 넘나 똑똑하기 때문에 조금이라도 인덕션과 집기 사이에 공간이 있으면 불이 들어오지 않습니다. 전자레인지는 존재하지만 무용지물이었습니다. 흑흑 제일 슬픈 건 세면대가 넘~나 작아서 세수라도 하려면 화장실이 물바다가 됩니다. 유럽은 건식 화장실 문화인데 자꾸만 물이 차서 번거롭다는 점이 있습니다. 와이파이도 됐다 안됐다 해서 조금 불편했네요! 그래도 관광지간 인접성과 주변 편의시설은 넘 좋아용 덥지도 않구 희희! 좋은 선택 하세요 :)

The place is very comfortable. One fan is provided to help ventilation on the ground floor. A second fan may be useful for the basement bedrooms since there's no windows on that level.

Only issue is that the spiral stairs for descending to the basement bedrooms are quite tight when carrying large luggage up and down, the shower which I find rather tiny (not much room to move about without constantly knocking your arms against the walls), and insufficient toilet paper for a group of six (only one and a half rolls were provided, we were staying for 3 days 3 nights).

Otherwise, the accommodation is very comfortable and clean. Sofa bed is very comfortable for two and also a decent place for groups to hang out. Whole apartment is comfortable for six. 

Location wise, there are many restaurants and groceries within a few minutes walking distance, metro is just a few minutes around the corner making this a very suitable place to get around. Neighbourhood is also peaceful and quite.

Would definitely recommend this place.
La comunicacion con Maximilienne fue exelente, la ubicacion tambien pegada a la estacion de metro Convention
The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This great apartment is very close to the Convention metro stop. From the apartment to the Metro is probably a 3 or 4 minute walk. If you are taking the metro to the Eiffel Tower, for example, it takes a train switch and about 30 minutes total to get there. 

The apartment itself was clean, and even though we arrived late (6pm), Max gave us directions to get in the building and get the keys.  

We spent a lot of time searching Airbnb for our  family's needs. So my comments may not apply to everyone.  We had 2 adults and 3 teenage kids.  

There is a foldout couch on the main floor  - that folds out to a full size bed. 

There are 3 beds downstairs  ( a full and a twin next to each other - and another twin in the closet/storage area.)

To get downstairs, there is a metal spiral staircase - which works fine - but can be difficult carrying large luggage up and down.

In the main floor, there is 1 bathroom for the whole apartment and a nice kitchen area - with a mini-fridge. 

Our only minor issue was there was no washing machine.  There is a laundrymat around the corner (on Rue Fourcade - self-service - open at 7am until 9:30-ish)  I was told the washing machine had broken - which is no big deal - except I chose this Airbnb because I needed a washing machine in Paris.  If I had been told in advance - I would have made other arrangements for laundry rather than messing with a laundromat at 7am.  Again - it's no big deal - but if you know you need a washing machine at your apt - make sure you confirm that one is there before you book.  Or - just use the laundromat.

Other than that one glitch - it was a great stay and I thank Max for the apartment.  We had a great time.

A wonderful apartment in a great location. We took in almost all the major sites by walking from the apartment, but the metro station is 3 minutes walk away if you're so inclined. The place was clean, bright and very pleasant. Maximilienne was so helpful and friendly too!
Thanks for everything  lovely apartment  all was good

The apt is situated well - we walked tonthe Eiffel Tower (a little over 2 miles).  There were plenty of bistros, grocery stores and cafes close by and also close to the metro. We were met quickly by Henry who let us in and gave us key. The main complaint about the apt is that it is very small with NO ventilation and no where comfortabe for 4 people to sit and talk. There are NO windows in the apt,  I can't imagine staying there during the middle of summer.
Nice place,closed to many atractions and good service and good price.
This was probably my favorite AirBnb we stayed at in Paris! It is very close to the metro, super clean, and there were no problems at all.
very good

Short review- Apartment location in nice area, only a block and a half walk to it, from the Convention metro station. Laundry, supermarket, restaurants close by. Good location. Apartment clean and nice. 2 levels, bed rooms on bottom level. Beds were good and slept good. TV in living room and bedroom. TV use is via WiFi connection Freebox . Need to press Feebox button to get to TV channels. WiFi good but could be better. Stove top need to contact Max for help on using it. I just gave up after trying to get it to work. I did not contact her about it. But that was my decision. All in all the stay at this place was great and comfortable. Recommend it to all. Long-review- We arrived to Paris on train to Montparnasse train station. Got our metro passes for the week and followed the instructions to get to the apartment. Apartment metro stop only 4 to 5 stops away from Montparnasse train station on the 12 line. A block and a half walk to the apartment from the Convention metro station. Very secure apartment BLDG, key fob to get in to foyer and then to access apartments. Apartment located on main floor, thought 2 doors in the back. Access from courtyard. Kitchen first as you walk in. Small fridge, microwave, toaster, coffee maker. Then bathroom, typical European small bathroom, but good. Sink is small, very. Hall leads to main living area. Ikea sofa bed, which got no complaints from person sleeping on it. Bedding for it could be found in the storage for the twin bed in the bedroom. TV is via WiFi Freebox thing. 2 controls one for TV and one for box. Press the Freebox button to access the TV channels. WiFi a bit unstable, but decent. Electronic white remote to close shutter for living room window. Winding staircase to get to the bedrooms. One double and a twin in one room. And a twin with plenty of storage cabinet in the other room. TV in main bedroom as well. Every thing is close by. Supermarket at corner, others further down in each directions. Restaurants, bakery and other eateries located close by. Some local shops close by as well. A laundry is located half a block away, which was perfect for us. Its unattended and all user friendly. One machine takes $$ for all. Washing/Dryers and detergent/Fabric softener dispenser. All in all we had a great stay at this apartment. Enjoyed to location and used it to rest and sleep. As this is what hotels and rental vacation are usually used for. I would recommend this place to all. Friends traveling together, family and so on. Nice neighborhood with all you will need close by for your stay. Good communication from host. Host is nice and will answer all your questions in a timely manner. And help with any questions, and give suggestions if needed. Enjoy your stay here, as we did on our trip to...
It was a lovely apartment which felt very comfortable. The amenities were great and we loved how close it was to the metro. It made the holiday very easy and flexible.
nice location, about 2 km to Eiffel Tower and many shops, restaurants around. all facilities are good

Maximilienne, what can I say? Let's trade places!!! I felt so much at home in your apartment that I want to move there for a month or so ;) easily accessible by train, quiet, big , nicely decorated and very affordable. My family and I had a terrific time and hope to stay at your place again soon. To all my fellow airbnb'ers out there: if you need a big place for 4+ adults, this is a really convenient place.
This is a great place to stay, Super cool room. Really close to the subway. Supermarket close by. Miss Maximilienne and Mr Henry were really patient with my enquiries. Loved my stay at this place. :)

This place was pretty accurate to the pictures. It was extremely close to public transportation. The apartment itself was very comfy. Quite difficult to get the luggage up and down the stairs, but manageable. The internet went in and out... communication was great. We would definitely stay here again.

Exelente Departamento, lejos del centro pero con una estación de metro a la vuelta. Espacioso pero el baño un poco pequeño. 
Cocina completa, no vimos a Maximilienne pero hubo mensajes todo el tiempo. Recomiendo

El apartamento está cerca de transporte público, pero caminando puedes llegar en 20 minutos a la torre Eiffel. Es una buena zona, llena de restaurantes y tiendas.

El apartamento es lindo y cómodo.

Sólo tuvimos un inconveniente y es que esperabamos poder usar la lavadora y estaba descompuesta :( pero de resto estuvo muy bien.

Maximilianne y Henry responden pronto y están atentos a cualquier consulta. Muchas gracias!

The metro station was very close which was very convenient if going to the main sightseeings. The staircase is narrow so I would not recommend this for elderly people. Unfortunately the bathroom does not have a window which makes it very moist when four people shower there. Other than that this place is wonderful. Maximilienne and Henry were very nice and responded quickly. There is parking about 10-15 minutes walk away.

Wir waren für zwei Nächste in der kleinen süßen Wohnung von Maximilienne. Ihr Sohn hat auf unsere Ankunft gewartet uns nett begrüßt. Der Kontakt und die Infos im Vorfeld waren sehr nett und alles hat gut geklappt. Wir wollten auf unserer Reise (2 Erwachsene, 2 Kinder und Hund)  nach Südfrankreich für einen Tag Paris anschauen. Dafür ist die Wohnung toll gelegen. Bus und Metro, Einkaufen und Cafes und Restaurants sind in 2 Minuten zu erreichen. Mit der Metro ist man schnell an allen Highlights.

Die Wohnung ist gut ausgestattet. Für einen längere Aufenthalt in Paris wäre es aber nichts für uns gewesen. Die Wohnung liegt im Erdgeschoss und die beiden Schlafräume mit kleiner Wendeltreppe zu erreichen im Keller ohne Fenster. Zudem ist der Keller recht feucht. Wie wir fanden. Also vielleicht nicht für jeden etwas. Die Kinder fanden es ok. Wir haben zu zweit auf dem bequemen Sofa im Erdgeschoss geschlafen. Das war für uns ok und bequem.

Alles in allem war es für uns ein schöner Aufenthalt, wenn auch die Kellerschlafräume nicht unser Ding waren. Aber für einen Tag Paris ist es wirklich super gelegen.
地理位置不错,靠近地铁站,房子挺干净的,房东也很好,就是洗澡水不够热｡

Wir sind Studenten in Deutschland. Diese Wohnung ist sehr sauber und bequem,nur 5 Minuten nach Ubahn Station zu Fuß. Das Zimmer ist im Untergeschoss,mittelgroß aber einfach total gemütlich. Für uns ist die Decke zu dünn, und im UG ist sehr kalt. Das Preis ist günstig und immer gerne wieder kommen. 

central area,convenient traffic and clean room,besides Maximilliene is very nice. Everything went well. 

对中国人来说,这个房子的位置属于巴黎比较安全的区域,旁边就是地铁站,有超市有韩餐有邮局很方便｡不过房子在地下室,没有窗户(仅在厨房有一个窗户),肯定有点气味,夏天应该更不透气｡鉴于价格比较便宜,可以选择｡我们是3月底去的,晚上睡觉有点冷｡

Where do I start? First off, the location of the apartment is nice.  However, the apartment itself had many, many issues. There IS visible mold growing on one side of the side of the wall in the living room. The shower door in the bathroom also had extreme mold and mildew within the tiles and around the door. The shower door does not close/shut completely. The most appalling thing was that the linen provided for the sofa bed was not clean. The comforter had 3 spots of visible BLOOD on it. This is downright disgusting! There were pillows provided, but no covers. The pillows had dried up drool on it. I had to use my coat as a comforter for my three night stay. This was my first airBNB experience, and I wish it had been better. Cleanliness is a basic thing! It should've been cleaner as we paid a cleaning fee! I'm not sure where that money is going. Lastly, the host messaged me the night of our departure to ask when we were leaving. The checkout time is listed in the description, therefore, we planned to leave before then. She asked as she had other guests coming in earlier. Personally, I feel this is a disregard to us as we stayed for 3 days/nights. My suggestions for improving this place is: use the cleaning fee to actually clean the place, fix the shower door, and wash your linens!!!
Nice place. Will book again if i were to visit paris again
Everything looked like the photos. Perfect accommodation for 5 people. There are a lot of public transportation nearby as well as supermarkets.

O apartamento é bem localizado, bem mobiliado e estava bem limpo! A comunicação com os proprietários é rápida e fácil. Além disso, o check in e check out é prático. Entretanto, o apartamento tem um sério problema: como os quartos são subterrâneos e não têm janela, têm muita umidade e as paredes estavam com mofo. Eu sou alérgica e viajei com crianças...o cheiro era muito forte. O banheiro também não tem ventilação e cheira a mofo.

Perfect location, quiet but close to metro and supermarkets, enough room for comfortable stay for a few adult people. Maximilienne is perfecly organised and a very nice person. Apartment is clean and well equiped. We had a very nice stay there.
El lavarropas no funcionaba. Habia 5 toallas y 1 toalla de mano cuando éramos 6. La escalera es muy pequeña y no se pueden bajar valijas grandes. De todas maneras por el precio se perdona

Maximilienne foi muito gentil e querida. Mesmo com as dificuldades de comunicação, nos atendeu de forma excepcional e sempre disponível para qualquer dúvida. Se algum dia retornar à Paris, certamente me hospedarei lá novamente. 

Apartamento é muito próximo do metro e há vários restaurantes próximos. Sem contar que quando você caminha pelas ruas do bairro pode ter como paisagem de fundo a torre Eiffel. 

Muito bom.

We were able to check in without anxiety because the host was quick to reply to the message, so we could ask questions easily from the ease of contact. 
In addition, the house is close to the station with many cafes, and there is also supermarket, so no discomfort for meals. We stayed with 4 people, but we could use it extensively. 
Shower was lukewarm water pressure was weak, but it was very clean.
역과 가깝고 짐 맡기고 나갔다 오면 침실로 캐리어를 옮겨주셔서 깜짝 놀랐어요! 호스트도 너무 친절하고 좋아요!

This place is very good location where it takes about couple of minutes from metro station. And it's located in safe district rather than other areas. So people staying can discover the City of Paris smoothly without wasting time. You can buy commodities and anything you want at Supermarket near the room. However while I stayed, the laundry machine was unexpectedly broken and our host didn't know about it. I asked the host to do me some favor or alternative solutions but she did nothing for us. Anyway I could enjoy the Paris and spent good time as possible as I could.
It was great to stay  at Maximilienne's place ..  we had everything  we needed thank you :)

En general el alojamiento está correcto, para nosotros que estábamos de feria en Porte de Versailles la ubicación no podía ser mejor. Hay que aclarar que la vivienda es un bajo comercial acondicionado y que para acceder a las habitaciones hay que bajar al sótano por una escalera de caracol un poco incómoda

O espaço tem uma entrada reservada no térreo de um edificio residencial, local muito seguro, com boas acomodações, cozinha equipada (infelizmente na minha estadia a maquina de lavar estava quebrada), sistema de aquecimento excelente, wifi bom, só acho que os quartos no subsolo precisam de mais ventilação, mas no geral é um ótimo apartamento para viagens curtas.
Hi maximilienne thanks for hosting us in Paris. A good experience for us. Will recommend to friends and family. :)
Nice house, lots of space for family. Nearby amenities. If there are some instructions on usage of things like gas stove etc in apartment, it will be very helpful.
Awesome place in a great location. The apartment is beautiful and right near the metro.

We enjoyed this apartment very much.  It was very close to the Metro 12 line.  There were markets nearby.  The apartment was warm and cozy despite the cooler weather outside.  The apartment was in a quiet area.  The kitchen had high quality pans and an induction stovetop (the pots and pans need to be on the stove for it to work).  The sofa bed was comfortable.  We had children and they slept downstairs, they liked their own little section.  The downside was the bathroom was on the main level and there was a metal spiral staircase that led to the main level, but our kids managed and did fine.  The wi-fi was reliable and fast.  Only one roll of toilet paper provided, so we needed to buy additional toilet paper for our stay.  The downstairs had a small musty smell, but other than that, we enjoyed it here.  The host is very responsive to emails and very friendly.  I would recommend staying here.  About 35 minute walk to Eiffel Tower.  Transportation from CDG airport:  RER B into Paris and then take the metro from there to apartment.
Lugar maravilhoso, recepção maravilhosa, muito agradável, e calmo.

El anuncia esta correcto. Max fue muy atenciosa y todo ocurrió muy bien. Solo Recomendaría poner una cortina en la ventana del salón, eramos un grupo de 6 y los que durmieron en el salón se quejaron de la luz de calle que les daba en los ojos.

Thank you Maximilienne for everything, comunication was very easy and fast, apartament is clean, comfortable and perfect location.
thanks a lot again,

Nice stay for the money.  The location was two blocks to the Metro.  We enjoyed our stay.
The place is a bit quirky with the beds down a tight spiral staircase on the lower level.  The only bathroom is on the first floor.  It might be a bit cumbersome for older folks or those using the bathroom at night.  

Overall, I would recommend it, if you are looking for straightforward apartment in a nice neighborhood.
El apartamento es muy lindo y esta muy bien ubicado.

Fantastic welcome and stay.  Maximilienne was very friendly and helpful and answered all emails within a very short time.  Gave really good information on location of supermarkets etc so our visit went very smoothly.  
very well equipted kitchen so very easy to cook our own meals
Downstairs room has quite a damp musty smell but nothing actually felt damp
Good location, very near to the convenction metro station. The apartment was clean. However the neighbors were noisy.
The apartment was really close to the Metro, bakeries and cafes! A street market popped up one of the days with extra food and clothing stalls. This is a great place to stay!
Fue una experiencia muy buena, muy acogedora. Lo recomiendo de todas maneras.
Lovely apartment! Great location! Would recommend!

First of all we never saw the host, it was by pure luck our taxi arrived and her son was entering the building the same time else we would have been stuck had we not asked the Taxi driver to call Maximilienne. We did not have a phone to call or Wifi to message her so that was pure luck that the Taxi driver speak English...disappointed! I think she did message me and told me her son was going to be there at 5pm but I had no way of knowing besides without Wifi, he passed us in front of the door without asking if we were the guests..

The area is located very close to the Metro, several grocery stores, and restaurants (local and chain fast foods KFC and McDonalds)! The space itself is expected for typical Parisian apartments: a bit narrow but manageable. The kitchen is well equip with utensils and basic herbs and spices: salt, pepper, cooking oil. The fridge are the smaller sized ones. The stove is a conduction type appliance, so it takes a bit of getting use to and trial and error on which pans work. The washroom, as previously mentioned in other reviews, very limited toilet paper so we bought our own and left several for the next guests. Other than this, washroom was very clean. The living room with the pull-out couch is a bit cramped when the bed is set-up, especially if there's also luggage in the space. The other beds were located at the basement accessible through a narrow winding stairs. Although no windows, the space was constantly cooler. The bedding and linens were very clean and extremely comfortable: ie. great sleep! The place had great WiFi service and although we did not get to see the host, we were in constant communication with her. 

Downsides: no windows in the rooms and basement, but there's a fan provided on the main floor, and large window by the kitchen.

Maximilliene was out of town when we arrived but she had her son meet us upon arrival. She gave greAt directions to her apartment and answered all of our questions by email promptly. The flat was in great location with a grocery store and delicous lebanese restaurant across the street.  We all slept well in comfortable, clean beds.  I highly recommend for travelling to Paris.

So like most pictures they show what they want you to see. The apartment had 3 bedrooms in what you can describe as a basement and the weather being hot made it extremely hard to sleep. They need to invest into a dehumidifier to get rid of the humidity and smell. It's very small and cramped space. WiFi was great though and the person who checked me in was very nice.

Good location, near metro station.
Not very clean. There are only 2 chairs! For 5 people!
The rooms are in the lower level without windows.
Late checkout was allowed.
Muy bonito, limpio y bien equipado el departamento. Un poco temprano el check out, entendimos que tenían otros clientes. Gracias

We had s great family stay in this location! Pictures showed the apartment as it was lovely location easy to metro shops and restaurants Maxximilen was amazing met us on arrival and showed us everything and was contactable if required would reccomend this to others
We had a great stay in Maximilienne's apartment, which is well equipped and comfortable. The location is so nice, with restaurants, supermarkets, metro stations, etc., near.

The host was very nice, although we met her just briefly for a one night stay. The place was fairly clean, but a slight damp smell in the lower level where the beds were and dust under the beds triggered allergies so we slept upstairs on the pull out couch. An inconvenience is that we had no toilet paper or hand soap for the bathroom. There were a number of restaurants close by but many are not appetizing.

Maximilienne was great, provided easy instructions for access to the apartment. Apartment is in a great location, near to 2 metro stops & roughly 25 minutes walk from the Eiffel Tower. The apartment itself is modern, had everything we needed and was clean!

The apartment is clean and there is a good amount of space for 5 people. The location is Good although the major disappointment was the lack of toilet roll. We arrived late so no shops were open which as you can imagine is not ideal.

The location is really nice. There are several restaurants, bars and metro station near the house. Maximilienne is very kind and helpful owner. We were 4 people and all conditions were so sufficient. Exactly recomended!
Por la aplicación airbnb.

The neighbourhood was good with a very short walk to the subway, market/ restaurants. You really feel like a local here, being away from the touristy areas. Maximilienne was great and worked with our schedule very well. thank you for an amazing experience.
This was a great place to stay. The price was unbelievable. Max was so kind and generous. I would stay here again in a heartbeat. Thanks so much Max!
Maximillienne was really nice and replies so quickly. The apartment was great super close to the metro and there was restaurant at every corner. About 30mins walk to the Eiffel Tower which we did.
Host was very friendly! And the house has a really interesting layout that make the stay more enjoyable :)

My husband and I and our two friends stayed in this Airbnb from 18-20 May 2016. We arrived in Paris by car, and parked our car in the garage a couple blocks away for €20 per day, just as Maximilienne recommended. It was easy to find the apartment and even better - we didn't have to lug our bags up a lot of stairs because it is on the ground floor!

Maximilienne was there to greet is when we arrived. She showed us around and made sure to answer any questions.

The apartment is clean, tidy, and spacious for 4 adults. I can see how it would easily accommodate additional people and/or children. We had more than enough beds. The couch bed was easy to set up and surprisingly comfortable. The shower is a little small, which might be tricky if you are tall. We did not get a chance to use the kitchen. Although the apartment is on the ground floor, it is quiet and removed from city noise.

This apartment is the perfect location for using the metro to get into the heart of Paris. We walked to the metro stop and asked the gentleman at the information desk about tickets and navigation. It was very easy and affordable. There are also plenty of places to eat within walking distance.

Maximilienne was a gracious host. She answered all of our questions quickly and thoroughly. I would definitely stay here again!

Maximilienne's apartment was extremely comfortable, well decorated and cozy. 

I have nothing but positive things to say about my experience with Maximilienne.  She was a wonderful host. 

Next time I am in Paris, I will try to stay at her place again.
good

We stay here for a short trip to Paris. Maximilienne was a get host. She was at the apartment waiting for us when we arrive and showed us around the apartment. It was clean and its location was perfect. Many food choices and close to public transportation. We were four adults, two children and we had plenty of space. I would stay here again if I get the chance to go back to Paris.

Tudo perfeito. Localização ótima, próximo de tudo, metro, supermercados, farmácias, cafés, restaurantes... Na época que fomos estava bem frio, mas o apartamento possui aquecimento e não foi nenhum problema. Me senti em casa, sem contar que Maximilienne foi super amável.

Todo perfecto. Maximilienne se puso en contacto conmigo días antes para coordinar la hora de llegada. El departamento es muy cómodo y bonito, dormimos sin ningún problema, el barrio es seguro y tienes algunas panaderías cerca para poder tomar desayuno. Gracias Maximilienne por todo!

O apartamento da Maximilienne estava perfeito. Ela nos atendeu de forma simpática e educada. A localização e a redondeza são excelentes.  A segurança é (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza indico para quem procura um apartamento em paris.
Leonardo Maia

Wir haben insgesamt zu viert einige Tage bei Maximilienne verbracht. Schon zu Beginn war Maximilienne super freundlich und hilfsbereit und hat auf unsere unzähligen Fragen sofort geantwortet - auch noch während unserem Aufenthalt. 
Die Unterkunft war klasse: Die Küche war mit allem ausgestattet was das Herz begehrt - und noch mehr; das Bad war klein aber fein; jeder hatte einen eigenen Schlafplatz. Wir waren für einen Städtetrip in Paris. Deshalb war die Unterkunft für uns auch der Größe nach in Ordnung. Falls man sich länger darin aufhalten will, könnte es eng werden. Ansonsten befand sich alles in unmittelbarer Nähe: Supermarkt, mehrere Bäcker, Metro-Station, Cafés und Private Parking (wir waren mit dem eigenen Auto in Paris). Alles in Allem hatten wir eine tolle Zeit bei Maximilienne!

I stayed at maximilien's apartment with a friend and 3 boys and we had a great time.she was very friendly and helpful, giving us directions to the metro and taxi. The area is easily accessible by bus and metro and taxi rank was just one minute walk.overall it was a pleasant stay. Everything we needed was at the house.
Very nice apartment!!! Buena ubicación y muy confortable. MAximiliane es muy buena anfitriona
El apto está bien situado u tiene lo necesario

The apartment is quite confortable, it has all the necessary equipment. Surroundings are very cool (plenty of restaurants, supermarkets, subway station). The only setback is that there was a nuisance sound in the basement where the bedroom is. 
The owner received us on time and gave us all the needed information. I would definitely recommend her!
Really nice appartment. Simple but everything you need for short vidit of Paris

Maximillienne was very helpful and responsive. We had regular communication by sms on how to reach the apartment, we checked in on time and everything was as described plus very clean and smelled nice. The apartment is just like in photos. She was also helpful with other requests we had during our stay. Metro is 3 mins away from the apartment and easy to reach all sites in Paris with about 10min ride.

Maximilienne was an amazing host! Although she couldn't be there personally, she made sure her sister and son assisted our group with everything! The apartment has a lovely kitchen, which is irregular for Paris! Enjoyed our stay and definitely recommend her.

great (Website hidden by Airbnb) very kind owner.easy to take a contact with her on messege.
same picture.
There has 
1 single room
1 single bed & 1 double bed room and,1 riving room with sofa bed
we stay 4 people,comfortable
near supermarket

This was my first AirBnB travel experience, and it was very pleasant. My family and I decided to take a last-minute journey to Paris for Christmas, and Maximilienne was very accommodating. The location was perfect! It was a 3 minute walk to the metro station, and it was a very well-connected line. There are also many restaurants, shops, and bakeries within a couple blocks of the flat. The flat, towels, bedding, and kitchen utensils were all very clean. We were also able to bring our dog, which  is a must for our family during the holidays. It is a compact living area, but we didn't need anything more.
