Très bon accueil, hôtes très compréhensifs ! (Petit bémol néanmoins pour le frigo qui n’était pas fonctionnel)

Excellent emplacement, personnel au petit soins, chambre très propre, dans hôtel authentique.
Une adresse  à retenir !!
J’ai adoré mon séjour, tout était propre et aussi accueil chaleureux
Très bon rapport qualité prix. Chambre donnant rue de Seine très bruyante le soir mais emplacement impeccable!

Réservation de dernière minute à un prix abordable après grand stress...Un hôtel dans son jus dans un des plus beaux quartiers de Paris. Propre et avec un petit déjeuner très généreux et très bon. Merci
Tout était parfait sauf l’odeur de fumée très incommodante (ch 46)... hôtel vétuste, ce qui fait son charme, mais très propre - emplacement idéal - superbe petit déjeuner - excellent prix
Super sympa ! Merci!
Adresse à recommander
Chambre délabrée!

Très bon Emplacement.
Très bon rapport qualité prix

Tellement réactif ! L’appartement était spacieux, le lit hyper confort, la salle de bain grande et lumineuse, et le must, la terrasse ! Merci
Le petit déjeuner était très bon, de bons produits
Hôtel super sympa et très bien placé !
Très bon rapport qualité prix
L'hotel est certes idéalement situé mais dans un état plus que limite.
Très agréable lieu de séjour, en plein cœur de Saint Germain des Prés.
Bien placé et pratique
Une bonne nuit en toute simplicité. Une équipe très agréable
Endroit très bien placé et accueillant. Je recommande
Merci pour ce magnifique accueil à Saint Germain des Prés, La Louisiane est un lieu magique !

Reside in Louisiana is to be really in the heart of the Saint-Germain des Prés district, just a few seconds from its cafes, bistros restaurants, shops and galleries most enjoyable. And a few minutes from the Louvre, the Luxembourg Gardens, the Paris River Seine, Flore cafes, Deux Magots, Procope, and so many other wonderful places to discover.
The hotel has an architecture that is unlike any other, its corridors, its interior courtyard, its rooms all different will make you love the quirky places in an increasingly standardized universe where all accommodations are similar.
The team, in place for a long time and reliable, is very kind to the guests, looking for solutions to all the problems encountered by the traveler. And the receptionists, present 24 hours a day, really know the neighborhood, giving valuable advice for visits and outings.
Wifi works perfectly and at full speed. The breakfast is hearty, the bread and all the pastries come out of the oven of a real baker.
What else to say? Oh yes, at night, the ghosts of the many artists who have lived here come to make you dream!
//
Résider à La Louisiane, c'est d'abord être vraiment au coeur du quartier Saint-Germain des Prés, à juste quelques secondes de ses cafés, bistrots restaurants, boutiques et galeries les plus agréables. Et à quelques minutes du Louvre, du Jardin du Luxembourg, du fleuve de Paris La Seine, des cafés du Flore, des Deux Magots, du Procope, et de tant d'autres endroits merveilleux à découvrir.
L'hôtel a une architecture qui ne ressemble à nulle autre, ses couloirs, sa cour intérieure, ses chambres toutes différentes vous feront aimer les lieux décalés dans un univers de plus en plus normé où tous les logements sont pareils.
L'équipe, en place depuis longtemps et fiable, est très gentille avec les guests, cherchant des solutions à tous les problèmes rencontrés par le voyageur. Et les réceptionnistes, présents 24h/24,connaissant vraiment le quartier, donnant de précieux conseils pour les visites et les sorties.
Le Wifi marche parfaitement et à toute vitesse. Le petit-déjeuner est copieux, le pain et toutes les viennoiseries sortent du four d'un vrai boulanger.
Que dire d'autre ? Ah oui, la nuit, les fantômes des nombreux artistes qui ont vécu ici viennent vous faire rêver !
Bon séjour, emplacement idéal, très bon rapport qualité-prix
Belle chambre, excellent rapport qualité prix
Merci beaucoup encore pour votre gentillesse pendant mon séjour en France.

Rien à redire sur mon séjour à l'hôtel Louisiane ! Le personnel était sympathique et l'hôtel  idéalement situé, en plein cœur de St-Germain, à deux pas de plusieurs stations de métro, RER et bus. Ma chambre était très propre, avec lit double, salle de bain privée, petit bureau et placard-penderie (et même un mini frigo). Étant en déplacement professionnel, cela convenait parfaitement à mes besoins. Le petit-déjeuner était très bien aussi, de type buffet donc copieux, avec différentes options sucrée et salée. Une bonne adresse que je recommande et à laquelle je reviendrai sûrement lors de futurs déplacements !
Super endroit, très bon accueil et prix imbattable
Nice place to stay !!

This legendary hotel with a prestigious cultural and artistic clientele throughout many decades will welcome you - in its vintage atmosphere and decor - with a very contemporary, trendy, upbeat spirit. Enjoy this rare authentic place.
I stay here at the end of summer each year for long stays. Great location, clean, nice staff. Bit rustic but make up for the daily room cleaning with towels. Will come back!
Choose this hotel and not another one ...u can trust me...
Good
Fantastic stay in the 6th of Paris
Cosy, small, simple charming hotel, excellent location. Unfortunately because of Covid luggage storing only for extra costs (early check-in/late out), no breakfast service.
Super !!!
Great location and nice room, though it was not the same as the photo.

Все очень понравилось. Мне понравилось расположение, наличие всего необходимого в номере, в том числе большой сейф для компьютера. Было тепло, чисто, вкусный завтрак. Для меня было очень удобно, что я выписалась из отеля в 15 часов. Очень рекомендую!
This is the perfect location in Paris! Walking distance to Louvre and Notre Dame and located in a very Nice area. Breakfast was good and staff Nice! Recommended.

Hotel La Louisiane is such a lovely little gem in an amazing area of Paris! They are hospitable and kind, and the front desk even helped me out with subway directions while the strike was delaying certain lines. They are understanding, kind, and the included breakfast is such a wonderful touch! Merci beaucoup and I will be staying here again if I return to Paris!

I can’t say enough about this adorable hotel. It’s obviously undergoing some work, which will only make it better. In the meantime, the location was PERFECT and it included cute touches like tea, coffee, and cookies in the room. Tasty breakfast, very comfortable sitting and tv area downstairs. Would stay there again and recommend to friends. A steal for the price!

Great Location.
Friendly Staff.

5 stars across the board! 

I will be back!  I was a little worried about booking this, but I shouldn’t have been.  I think they want to make sure no one has the wrong idea.  This was perfect for me.  It is exactly what they say, a clean simple hotel room in a *fantastic* location with an awesome breakfast.  What they don’t say in the listing is how incredibly nice they all are. 

Hugs until next time!
Clean, great location, good breakfast. A+

This hotel is, in a word, sublime. The location is outstanding - super close to three different metro stations, opposite a supermarket, near several famous Paris sights, and slap bang in the middle of loads of places to eat and drink. The check-in staff were great (upgrading me for free!) and the free breakfast was just what I needed each morning. There was no problem with noise from the street below. Next time I'm in Paris I will definitely want to stay here.

ルーブル美術館などの有名な観光地まで、地下鉄を使えばすぐの立地がとても良いお家です。
目の前には23時まで開いているスーパーもやっており、とても快適できた。
Great location! Lots of history!
Less than expected.
Great location, great place, really recomend and would like to come back! thank you so much!
This is my seconde stay in 6 months. Perfectly located and free breakfast! I’ll surely stay again.

Top location, such a beautiful area in Paris. 
I saw some reviews complaining about the noise but, it’s the best location in a big city. I couldn’t complain. 

Everything was perfect and Jecek was such a lovely person, super helpful and amazing all the time. 

Will definitely stay again whenever I go to Paris.
Excelente localização, quarto grande e limpo, um pouco antigo, mas com café da manhã impecável

Great little hotel in the heart of Paris,  only a short walk from the Seine, the Louvre, and the Île de la Cité, as well as a major metro station. Not a lot of frills, but an excellent location for getting into Paris bright and early.
Great location with lots to do nearby, clean and good value for money.

The best thing about Xavier's place is the location... Everything is close by, walking distance.
The value price is really good, it's not luxurious but it works if you really want to hang out around.
8월초에 3박했습니다. 방에 들어가보니 확실히 오래된 티가 확 났고 그래서 좀 청결하지못하다는 느낌이 있었는데 하루 지나보니 위치가 정말 너무 좋아서 오래된건 전혀 문제되지않을만큼이였습니다. 한국에서 깨끗한곳을 매우 선호하는 분이라면 맘에 들지않을수도 있습니다. 저는 위치와 친절때문에 다음에도 이곳에 숙박할겁니다.
This hotel has it all and for an affordable price. It’s pretty bare bones but comfortable. Staff were very friendly and helpful.

Great location! As mentioned in the description it’s not intended for high quality, but for location and value. Had everything I needed being a budget traveler. Also the breakfast was good. Would stay again.

This place has become my home away from home. In addition to its location what makes this place special is its friendly staff and the excellent service. Rooms are basic but very clean and well appointed.  A super location in the heart of the Left Bank. Can’t wait for my next stay in August. Highly recommend.
Great location
This is in a very good spot to start exploring Paris

Outstanding hospitality.  I had some travel issues and they were very kind to work with me to make my stay exceptional.  Thank you very much!  I would recommend this place to anyone, and would definitely stay here again!
The place is advertised and a little quaint. No frills hotel with a perfect location if you want to explore Paris.

Me surpreendeu em tudo. Fui com baixas expectativas e foi tudo bem acima do esperado. Excelente localização, bom quarto modernizado e novo, ótimo café da manhã. Recomendo. Melhor custo benefício de Paris ao meu ver.
Great location, spacious room and bath with plenty of great restaurants and cafes in the same area.  Really well suited for a short stay.
Phenomenal location! Wonderful place if you are looking for a safe location and a comfy bed!
Amazing location, clean rooms, and friendly staff
Great location

This place made my stay in Paris perfect! The location is great. There are a ton of restaurants, cafes, boutiques, and a supermarket (for those enjoying a longer stay) in just a two block radius! It is also conveniently located 2-3 blocks away from a metro stop. The staff here was incredibly friendly and sweet! Will be back!
I really want to recommend this place!!! Perfect location, clean room, friendly employees who were ready to quickly provide any help. This place helped me to enjoy my vacation :)

El alojamiento superó mis expectativas, había leído comentarios no tan buenos acerca de las instalaciones pero debo decir que la habitación estaba impecable, las zonas comunes estaban bien, quizás un poco gastada la alfombra de los pasillos pero nada grave, el tamaño de la habitación perfecto, tenía vista interior y entraba buena iluminación, se puede escuchar un poco de ruido de lo que pasa arriba o en los pasillos, pero creo que los huéspedes debemos ser respetuosos y no hay problema con eso. En cuanto a la ubicación, perfecta, muchas facilidades de transporte, comidas y comercio cerca, y los chicos de la recepción muy amables, aunque no todos hablaban español nos pudimos comunicar y me ayudaron con mis dudas. Sin duda el precio es bajo en comparación con otros alojamientos del sector, vale la pena y me volvería a alojar allí, lo recomiendo.
Great Location and amazing staff

첫 1박 하자마자 너무 좋아서 2박 연장 했습니다. 숙소 때문에 파리에서 더 머물렀을 만큼 만족스러운 곳이었어요. 노후화 됐다는 평을 보았는데.. 오래된 건물이지만 제게는 정말 멋진 곳이었습니다. 사람에 따라 평이 갈릴 수 있을 것 같아요) 정말 청결했고 친절한 스텝들, 훌륭한 조식, 완벽한 위치 등등 모든 것이 완벽했습니다. 다음에 파리에 간다면 반드시 이 곳에서 숙박할거예요 :-)
Great location, delicious breakfast and warm service
Good location, very clean sheets, towels bathroom, the hotel is a bit tired , but is, I think an ongoing project.
Simple and good
Place was great. Convenient location.
great hotel... close to Notre Dame other attractions.

Xavier's hotel, while small, is in the perfect location by the Latin quarter. Upon my arrival, I asked for a room with a big window so that I could see the Parisian streets. The woman at the desk warned me that it might be a bit noisy, but I told her I didn't mind... it turns out by "noise" she meant live jazz played in the streets on the weekends! I left my window wide open so I could hear it, but when the window was shut it was barely audible. Don't expect an American experience here... no big continental breakfast, but lovely croissants and coffee instead! While not luxurious and high-end, this hotel had authentic Parisian charm for a great price.

This  budget hotel is well situated on the Left Bank within walking distance of many tourist attractions,  and central to many cafes and bars.  However the rooms are quite cheap and shabby, with worn, torn carpet and very old furniture. The room looks nothing like the picture on Air BnB. There is no sound proofing between rooms, you can hear EVERYTHING from your neighbour.  Having said that, the cleaning is a high standard, and the staff, especially the breakfast lady, were pleasant and helpful.
I had a great time in St. Germain, was warmly greeted and got nice advice to get around the city. Wonderful get together at night in the hotel lobby - thank you!
This hotel is in a wonderful location! The room is very clean and comfortable. I have no complaints!
It was very nice stay because there is nearly city from the hotel . But there’s not a dryer.

La Louisiane is a hotel rather than a regular Airbnb place but it was clean and comfortable with quite good sized room, recently renovated bathroom that was super clean and friendly, helpful staff on reception. Great value and great location. Would definitely stay here again.
Very good!

A very simple older place in the heart of Paris!  The breakfast is quite good.  It is quite noisy but you're in St. Germain which is NEVER quiet. Very close to Metro, the nightlife, grocery store across the street.  If needing a kettle for tea €20 deposit.  Also very warm on the upper floors though rooms have fans, no AC.  The hotel does have a small single lift but it's very slow.  Large Americans, stay away! LOVE the bathtub/shower combo; brilliant after a day of running around Paris!  I wrote to ask for a room with bathtub and were happy to accommodate!  They reply super quick!  With this level of service, despite the noise, I'd stay again!
Great location for the price!

Thanks Xavier for taking me at short notice yes its an older property with a good bathroom and it was good value and great location in St germain. There are many cafes and the common spaces are nice. And the staff are helpful. Altho there were some issues on the day the nice staff overcame then and its a really great location to experience paris and I like a lot of character in a place and this property had that proper French character. Its right on metro and great food and wine at door!
Great stay
Great location, easy access.
Easy check in, got to the room and it was quite nice and even had a bath tub which I really was grateful for. Amazing location.
Very nice staff and very comfy bed. Theres a good amount of restaurants just outside and the metro is very close!

Great little budget hotel in a brilliant location. Reception guys were super helpful with travel and transport, food and drink etc. 
This is a busy district night and day so if you’re happy in the mix of it all, this is really handy. 5min walk to Odeon Metro, 15mins travel on one easy line to Gare du Nord. 
Some rooms above a busy street so if you’re a light sleeper ask for a higher floor. Likewise if you’re a non-smoker, let the hotel know. 
Great guys, really helpful before and during visit.

약간 오래되엇습니다
혼자나 남자끼리는 괜찬은데 여자분이라면 별로일수잇습니다 조식을 주는건
 정말좋앗습니다
Dated and small accommodations, but generally clean and in a great neighborhood.  Good for a place to sleep.
Great location , literally five minutes from the tower , food , and shopping. Will definitely stay again. Staff was super nice!
The hotel is very nice. Excellent location close to St. Michel Notre Dame and the room is very large in the case of Paris haha. Reception is really nice and helpful.

As you can see from the description, this a family hotel and not a private apartment. But the location is incredible, the place was tidy and clean, breakfast good and check in/out easy. Would only note that there can be quite a bit of noise (trash collectors in the night and construction noise from early morning on a Saturday) especially if you leave the window open. 
Personally I will definitely come back.

With Paris as my flight destination from California and back, I stayed in this reasonably priced hotel twice on my multi-city trip to Europe in August.  The two different rooms I stayed in varied in size, but each time the room was clean and comfortable.  (It might be warm in the room during the middle of an August day, but  I was usually in only for the night and there was a small fan quietly giving forth a gentle breeze.)  For my purposes and style of traveling, the location of the hotel is perfect.  It is very close to bus and metro stops and is within walking distances to famed institutions of art, culture and history.   I might take bus and metro to research sites in and outside Paris during the day but I was able to walk around in the lively areas of cultural interest, often in the evening or at night.  In the room on my return stay at the hotel,  noises of the people amusing themselves at night could be heard occasionally from the street below but the merry-making noises did not bother me as I thought they were part of the authentic city life and they died down when I went to bed any way.  The stuff members were friendly and professional.  The breakfast offered with the room booking was decent in selection and quality, including a variety of fruit, baked products, and coffee, tea, freshly squeezed orange juice.   I think the hotel is a good fit to budget-conscious visitors to Paris who enjoy walking around to see what the city has to offer in the life of mind and senses.

Great price for such a great location!    Simple bedroom but clean.  10 minute walk to the Louvre. 5 minute walk to the closest Metro. Grocery store across the street. Restaurants, cafes, and bakeries next to and around the corner. Great location. Would stay there again.

Humble accommodations in a perfect location. The hotel is a few steps from great restaurants, bars, shops, and galleries. In addition, only a few minutes from the Louvre, Luxembourg Gardens, Seine River, Notre Dame, and other amazing attractions. The croissants at breakfast were perfection! The host was responsive, attentive, and flexible. Though my flight arrived very late, the check-in process was easy and I was able to get right to my room. The location and value for this hotel is unbeatable. Would recommend to anyone looking for cheaper, ideally located accommodations.

They have a deal with the local parking garage, a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Parking is difficult in Paris and this is no exception. Multiple prices were quoted, each time higher than the one before. In the end, I had to pay more than initially stated. A minor quibble, but future travellers should be aware that this will likely happen to them as well.

When we first checked out the apartment we weren’t sure how to feel about it, we called it the green apartment. It wasn’t until we got there that we fell in love. The place is very well lit and contains anything one might need for a short touristic stay in Paris. The location is what really had us impressed and happy. It’s in a very safe and sophisticated region in the center of the city, close to all the tourist attractions. We even saw Bella Hadid coming out of a hotel on the same street, not that that is important to the review, but just something I thought I might add. 
At some point during the stay, my roommate dropped coffee on the bed sheets. We would’ve preferred for them to get changed while we were there but they weren’t, and yet again we didn’t really ask for a change but it would have been appreciated. Natalia was very nice about it and very responsive when we contacted her. We don’t really understand how much it costs to press a duvet cover and sheets and so we were a bit confused when we were asked to leave 50€ to fix the damage, but all issues got sorted out in the end.
I would definitely recommend this place.

Nous avons passé une très mauvaise nuit dans cet hôtel. La chambre n’était pas DU TOUT insonorisée, si bien qu’on a entendu nos voisins de chambre TOUTE LA NUIT sans discontinuer (télé, musique, disputes, claquages de portes). Même quand nos voisins parlaient (très rarement) à un niveau sonore normal on les entendait parfaitement. Le tapage a duré jusqu’à 5h du matin bien que nous leur aillons demandé de faire moins de bruit, et la réception est restée injoignable. Nous avons même senti jusque dans notre chambre des odeurs de cigarette et de chicha en pleine nuit. L’hôtel semble surtout fréquenté par un public très jeune et s’apparente plus à une auberge de jeunesse. Bref, je ne recommande pas et ne réserverai plus d’hôtel sur Airbnb car c’est la première fois que j’ai une telle déconvenue sur le site alors que mes séjours chez des hôtes se passent toujours très bien.

Emmanuel was very nice and we got along very well. We enjoyed a nice discussion about music together. Furthermore, his loft is very spacious given its location in the capital. I recommend Emmanuel and his place.
That was a lovely reception and great place, feeling of the loft
The room was perfect for my needs and right next to the studio I was recording in the next day. Thanks Emmanuel!
Habitación cómoda, amplia y con baño privado lo cual destacó, Emmanuel fue muy amable con mi llegada temprano , gracias
Clean and economical

Emmanuel’s place is great, the location is great, you can walk to interesting places and you have 2 subway stations near, the space is well equipped and is great to stay in Paris. Emmanuel is very kind and interesting, he makes sure you have everything you need and gives you very useful advice in where to eat and what to do. I’ll love to come back someday

Emmanuel is een aardige gastheer, die steeds klaar staat. Erg flexibel. Verder vond ik het heel prettig dat hij een eigen parkeerplaats heeft. Metro is dicht in de buurt. De buurt is veilig. Vanaf zijn huis kon ik makkelijk Parijs bestrijken. Ik had een racefiets mee en mijn favoriete route was naar Gare de Lyon. Iets door fietsen naar de Seine. Langs de Seine omhoog naar de Eiffeltoren. Vanaf de Eiffeltoren naar de Sacre Ceour en zo weer terug naar zijn huis. Geweldig!

Great and stylish place. You have full privacy on the first floor where the bedroom is. There is also a huge common area which is great for just hanging around. Would definitely stay here again if I'm in Paris.
Emmanuel is a nice, supportive and respectful person. The place is very clean, tidy and well designed. Highly recommend.
The place was very clean, easy to find and Emmanuel was great in tips to get around the city showing the map of city where to go see stuff
Excelente, una persona muy culta, conprensiva y buena onda! Muy linda casa y muy grande.

We had a great time staying at Emmanuel’s place! He was really helpful with tips and super nice and open with is accommodation! We had really interesting talks and we were welcome to feel free in his apartment which made me feel at home immediately.
Accueil parfait, confort et charme pour cette petite retraite dans la foret. Merci encore pour cette agréable expérience !

J'ai eu l'occasion de séjourner dans ce bel appartement lors d'un séjour d'une nuit avec mon compagnon à l'occasion de notre anniversaire de rencontre. Cet appartement atypique dans les arbres et son hôte accueillante et très réactive ont été à la hauteur de nos espérances. 
Je vous conseille vivement de séjourner dans ce logement où vous pourrez vous dépayser et décompresser à deux pas de Paris.
Calme et chaleureux aux portes de Paris, un bon moment de détente et la découverte d un coin sympathique
Un petit joyau au milieu de la verdure, Véronique est adorable, lit super confort, endroit paisible et bucolique... petite escapade prêt de Paris mais...loin !
Logement dépaysant dans un cadre verdoyant
N’hésitez pas, un petit endroit sympa pour se couper du monde en pleine région parisienne.
Endroit paradisiaque, très dépaysant et reposant, au calme. L’accueil est très chaleureux, on se sens chez soi, séjour très agréable.. je recommande vivement.
Superbe Airbnb :)

Séjour très agréable et dépaysant à deux pas de paris, au calme, dans un endroit propre et charmant! A retenter en été! La vue depuis le salon à travers les baies vitrées est très agréable au moment du coucher de soleil, et Véronique apporte gentiment le petit déjeuner le matin à l’heure voulue. Je recommande!
Très bel endroit avec un café idyllique, je recommande

Véronique est une hôte très accueillante et serviable.
Le cadre est vraiment dépaysant, entouré d'arbres, très au calme, idéal pour faire une coupure avec le rythme parisien.
Un beau salon lumineux, une jolie salle de bain, un lit confortable.
Un vrai bon petit déjeuné vous attendra au petit matin à l'heure souhaité.
Super sejour!
Très beau logement et très confortable
Lieu tranquille et agréable pour déconnecter ! Véronique a été très accueillante.

Le séjour a été parfais, un calme et un emplacement idéal pour une soirée en amoureux.
Je recommande fortement
Petit déjeuner ponctuel et haut de gamme.

Un accueil chaleureux, Véronique est très sympathique. L'endroit est calme et convivial, propice à la détente. Un petit coin de paradis entouré de verdure. Le petit déjeuner est délicieux et met en forme pour la journée. L'endroit est très propre et joliment décoré. Nous y reviendrons avec grand plaisir.

Un accueil chaleureux, Véronique est très avenante et disponible. Le lieu est charmant, paisible. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans ce petit havre de verdure. Le petit déjeuner était très bon. Merci à Véronique.
Adresse à conseiller.
cadre agréable et paisible

Appartement accueillant et spacieux, situé dans un endroit calme, caché par les bambous. 
Véronique est très disponible et réactive (merci encore). 
Je recommande

L'appartement est très accueillant, et assez spacieux, caché dans les bambous et au calme. On a beaucoup apprécié la deco et la literie (matelas et linge de lit). On aurait aimé rester plus longtemps .. une terrasse couverte est le petit plus très appréciable. Merci à Véronique pour son accueil.

Un accueil, une hospitalité et une gentillesse hors pair de la part de Veronique.
Nous avons passé un week end parfais dans un cadre idyllique. Je recommande bien sûr.
Un très beau séjour au milieu de la nature dans le calme a seulement quelques kilomètres de la banlieue parisienne.
Chambre d'hôte parfaite pour les gens qui aiment la nature la vue de la pièce attenante à la chambre est magnifique et la.salle de.bain superbe ....
Très charmant endroit, literie au top et déco très réussie pour ce petit studio à 1 pas de la ville. Merci!

Appartement très agréable. Une cabane au milieu des bois! Sous le soleil ou la pluie, le lieu est hors du tumulte. Un lieu rare où il fait bon se poser. VERONIQUE est très réactivité, et sympathique. 
Bières est proche de Paris (15mn porte de saint cloud) et le village charmant. Pour les amoureux de la nature...vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés...

Un lieu hors du temps et tellement apaisant après l’intensité du trafic parisien. Veronique est très agréable et gère la maison d’une main de maître! Des petits resto à proximité, de quoi se garer, se balader et se reposer...Nous y retournerions avec plaisir!
Merci à Véronique pour son accueil chaleureux dans un coin de verdure discret et charmant.
Le logement de Véronique est un véritable havre de paix, niché dans la colline, calme, bucolique, impeccable, et fonctionnel. Et merci à Véronique pour son hospitalité et sa grande flexibilité.
Encore merci pour l'accueil, c'était vraiment très agréable de passer cette nuit à votre domicile très cosy!

Logement très agréable dans un cadre atypique et très nature. Du miel issu dire cément des abeilles des propriétaires ! Prendre juste en compte qu'il n'y a pas de cuisine et que les photos montrent plusieurs logements donc certaines ne correspondront pas au logement que vous aurez. Merci pour votre accueil et le petit déjeuner !
Week end court mais dans un endroit idyllique Véronique à été présente au bon moment petit déjeuné au top une destination parfaite pour des retrouvaille romantique
Appartement très agréable, au calme avec jardin privé. Petit déjeuner très bon et Véronique est très accueillante. Je recommande !

Merci Véronique pour votre accueille. 

Votre havre de paix est douillet et conforme aux photos. Nous étions très heureux de séjourner chez vous. 

Une adresse que nous recommandons.

L'appartement est spacieux et très charmant. La situation est idéale : un environnement boisé et calme aux portes de Paris. 
Véronique & Martin ont répondu agréablement et rapidement à toutes nos attentes.
Tres joli endroit au milieu de la végétation, c’était un plaisir de rester chez Veronique et son mari.
C’était magnifique
Elle est fiable
Endroit très calme en pleine nature à quelques pas de Paris. C’est très surprenant. Je recommande vivement.
Un espace paradisiaque et vraiment propice pour se reposer. J'ai vraiment passé une très bon séjour
Une maison charmante et au calme, entourée de bambous, un accueil parfait et agréable, et un petit déjeuner de reines le lendemain matin... Je recommande Véronique et sa maison !

Comfortable and stylish accommodation in beautiful calm and leafy surroundings. We are a small family and Véronique kindly set out an extra bed for our son. Breakfast was lovely too. Overall we’d highly recommend the accommodation and Véronique as host.

What you see is what you get : an awesome little apartment in the woods, in a perfect bucolic place, far from the frenzy of the city. The apartment is beautiful, the bed is amazingly comfortable, breakfast is good, the bathroom is beautiful with a large shower. We loved our stay there and might come back for another weekend away, in the woods !

Véronique is a delicious person. She gave us a warm welcome, explained everything really well and made us feel welcome and very private at the same time. I strongly recommend !

This place is very cool, around the room there are many interesting forests that you can discover and hike. The room is not that spacious but enough for two. Clean and nice. Veronique is very friendly and always willing to give a hand.

The accommodation was stylish, comfortable and warm. Véronique is a charming host who delivered breakfast very promptly and helpfully guided us into the small parking space as our car is quite long. It's a steep downhill walk to local amenities and an easy train ride into Paris despite the strike causing reduced service during our stay.

The house is situated within greenery and is very quiet and relaxing to stay in. Veronique is responsive on messages too and she is friendly, easy-going and we appreciate her bringing us breakfast every morning. However, there may be slight challenges to find the location. I think (Hidden by Airbnb) shows the street as a one-way from west to east. But technically, we have to enter the street from east side.

Veronique’s bnb was simply amazing. We wanted our last day in Paris to be slightly away from the city near nature and the space was a beautiful escape surrounded by bamboo trees. There were many thoughtful touches and it was perfect for our family of four. In just 15 minutes you can walk over to the little town of Bièvres for dinner and yummy baked goods. The space brings in lots of light as there are lots of windows but also stays very cool. We had a lovely time— thanks Veronique for the simple + yummy breakfast as well!
A really lovely, tranquil space, within easy reach of Paris and Versailles. Great for a short trip.

The directions that were given were accurate & easy to follow, which was extremely helpful. There was constant communication & even when we took the wrong train, he called to help us out! The place is beautiful & the view is amazing. It’s a short walk to the train station to get into the city too so it was perfect. Breakfast was great too, highly recommend!
This location is very private and close to Versailles ( about 6 miles) and neighboring areas. Breakfast is good and the apartment is very clean. Highly recommend to other travelers!
Todo como esperábamos
Lovely place. Beautiful setting in lovely tranquil area. Very comfortable bed and beautiful bathroom. Fantastic friendly hosts.

It is a beautiful little house in the woods, very tranquil and relaxing. The bathroom is particularly nice with modern amenities and very clean. The garden is beautiful even though we didn't get to use it very much. Just a few minutes drive to a small town with a few selection of nice places to eat. Be aware that there are a few stairs to climb if you are carrying luggage. Overall it was a very nice stay.
Very nice host and nice room with big bathroom. I recommend not to walk from Vauboyen station because it quite far and too steep for walking.

Véronique is a wonderful host and cook. Her house is only 20 minutes from downtown Paris but in a whole different scenery. It is an amazing spot to relax after a busy Paris city trip. We loved her place.

Merci beaucoup Véronique!

Very clean and peaceful. The hosts were very friendly. Beautiful little walkable town within walking distance. They provided a small bed for our daughter which helped us recover from our 18-hour journey.
Fantastic place, kind host. Thank you!

Donc soyez respecteux avec le lieu et la personne qui nettoie derrière et qui fait un excellent travail. J'ai hâte d'y retourner, trop de bons souvenirs :)

Nous avons passée une très belle nuit et un superbe moment dans cet appartement très propre et calme où tout est fait pour qu on se sente bien. Déco super sympa, jaccuzi à parfaite température et jeux de lumières sont au top et créent une ambiance parfaite pour une nuit en amoureux.

Nous y avons passé un superbe séjour pour la St-Valentin. Ce petit appartement est bien sympathique et très bien situé (proche du métro, centre ville et supermarché).  Son design et jeux de lumières réglables sont très appréciables pour créer une ambiance romantique ou autre... Le jacuzzi est extra et rien à redire sur sa propreté, de même que pour l'ensemble de l'appartement. L'hôte est très réactif et tout est pensé pour récupérer les clés dans les temps. 
La femme de ménage est adorable et pleine de petites attentions si vous avez le bonheur de la croiser. 
Je recommande.

J'avais loué cet appartement juste pour un transit a Paris, j’étais arrivé a Orly le 23 Octobre a 06h55. J'ai eu accès au logement a 16h le 23/10 et je suis reparti le 24/10 a 08h pour prendre mon vol a Charles de Gaulle.
 Claire ne m'a pas rencontré en personne a mon arrivée. Ceci n'est pas gênant, je suis habitué au système de boîtier a clés. Pour avoir accès  a l'appartement , elle m'a donné par message sur AirbnB les codes sans autres précisions sur l'emplacement du boîtier a clés.  Je croyais que c’était le petit coffre prés du digicode de l’entrée du bâtiment mais non. C'est après un échange de mail (je n'avais pas non plus le numéro de téléphone de l’hôte a mon arrivée), elle me dit que le boîtier était au fond a droite(???),  c'est a gauche. Une demi heure après mon arrivée a l'adresse j'ai pu enfin avoir accès donc a 16h. Jusque la rien de bien grave,  me suis-je dit, sans savoir que ce n’était que le début de mes galères avec cette hôte. (Voir les commentaires qui suivent).
Le lendemain lors de mon départ,  après avoir tout fermé et descendu mes bagages, je remarque que le boîtier a clé n’était plus en place. Aucune instruction pour laisser les clés. Je devais me rendre a l’aéroport, mon taxi m'attendait. J’étais obligé de laisser les clés sous un pot de fleurs devant l'immeuble. J'ai informé l’hôte a mon arrivée a l’aéroport une fois que j'avais finis d'enregistrer mes bagages.
Elle a les clés 47 minutes après mon message, et 02h36 minutes après, elle m’envoie un message  comme quoi je devais lui rembourser de l'argent pour des tringles que j'aurai endommagées. Tout était nickel dans l'appartement avant mon départ, comme j'ai l'habitude de le faire dans tous les logements Airbnb que j'ai eu a louer. Pendant  mon séjour qui a duré en tout 18h de temps, j'ai tiré qu'une fois les rideaux le soir quand j'avais allumé parce que de la rue on pouvait voir a l’intérieur. 
Je n'ai rien endommagé dans cet appartement. Après des échanges a ce sujet, elle me dit que les tringles étaient cassées et que les rideaux étaient par terre. Comment des tringles solides en métal se retrouvent cassées avec des rideaux a terre? Elle veut demander réparations.
Petite bulle de détente au milieu de toute cette activité  :)

L'appartement est très fidèle à l'annonce. L'appartement est très joli, pratique et bien équipé. La communication avec Claire est excellente et rapide. Elle m'a d'ailleurs envoyé une liste de lieux intéressants à proximité qui m'a été bien utile. Le quartier est assez animé. J'étais au début un peu sceptique puisque c'est un quartier historiquement un peu difficile, mais les choses semblent avoir bien évolué. Je recommande fortement cet appartement et y retourné certainement. Merci Claire.
Appartement équipé proche des moyens de transport et conforme au photos affichees merci

The neighborhood is a little sketchy at night, but it’s nice during the day and it’s proximity to Gare du Nord makes it a really convenient place to stay.

Très bon accueil. Merci à Latu, son mari et leur enfants. Ils étaient très sympas et amicaux. Ils ne parlaient pas français mais grâce aux nouvelles technologies, il n'y avait aucun problème de communication . L'appart' et la chambre étaient propres, très bonne localisation: le super-marché, le métro, l'université, le parc à disposition à pied. Par contre, dans la chambre il n'y avait ni fenêtre ni ventilation, donc, c'était impossible de s'endormir avec la porte fermée. La chambre est placée à côté de l'entrée, c'est pour ça que vous entendez bien le bruit des gens qui passent. Et quelques invités, faute de respect aux autres, faisaient plein de bruit: ecouter de la musique jusqu'à 2:50h du matin, se rigoler, oublier d'étendre la lumière au couloir, faire l'amour à 6h du matin, se rigoler et prendre la douche, comme s'il n'existait pas les autres. J'ai dormi 2h pendant 2 dernières nuits, à cause de ça. Donc, je recommande, si votre budget est limité et votre séjour est court, 1-2 nuits max, sinon vous risquez devenir les véritables zombies.
Inadmissible de faire dormir des gens dans un si petit endroit en plus sans fenêtres ni rien

Latu ne parle aucune autre langue que le Chinois mais nous avons pu communiquer quelque peu. Je trouve qu'il n'est pas convenable de proposer à la location une pièce aussi petite (la pièce fait exactement la taille du petit lit 1 place, je ne suis pas très grande mais j'ai tout de même du dormir un peu en biais pour avoir de la place pour mes pieds). Aussi les autres locataires étaient trop bruyants durant la nuit, ils claquaient par moments les portes au lieu de les fermer, ils parlaient assez fort et gardaient leur porte de chambre ouverte ce qui faisait résonner encore plus le bruit dans le couloir. L'oreiller avair une odeur résiduelle de tabac et n'avait pas de taie dessus, la couette était sans housse, il n'y a aucune fenêtre dans la pièce, pas de lampe de chevet, juste une lumière au plafond (la pièce servait peut-être de placard de rangement auparavant). Je n'ai pas dormi de la nuit à cause du bruit et j'ai fini pas quitter le logement assez contrariée vers 5h40 du matin pour aller attendre la fin de la nuit dans la voiture. Je suis arrivée fatiguée pour commencer ma journée de travail.
juste pr depanner , le reste passez votre chemin sinon famille cool mais trop de bruit le matin
Séjour agréable ! Je travaillais juste à côté donc l'opportunité était parfaite !

I learned a few more things about travel with my stay in Paris. One is that photos are usually more accurate than a written description (except in Bucharest) and that I need to include transit research in my plans (especially for Paris). I had amazingly good luck finding my Airbnb late at night using transit but the metro still baffles me. I'm still searching for a good app. The host is very friendly, very outspoken, and no doubt makes many sacrifices in her personal life to make your stay more pleasant. I hope she decides to live a very long, healthy life :).

The host was very kind and friendly. Despite my lack of French she did know some English and we got along fine. She answered all my questions and even took my for a ride to a riverside park. It was a great stay. I hope to return soon. The area is a suburb of Paris with the options of taking two different trains or the tram into the city.

je ne souhaite pas mettre une mauvaise note car un disfonctionnement peut arriver, mais ce fut beaucoup de stresse à l'arrivée car j'ai dû attendre dans le couloir 3/4 d'heure. Le coffre ne s'ouvrait pas pour récupérer la clé, et après maintes appels auprès du propriétaire, un voisin est enfin venu (il aurait pu venir avant je pense) et je me suis vraiment inquiété (pour ne rien arranger heure de couvre feu). Le coffre était apparemment réellement bloqué et j'ai beaucoup insisté pour pouvoir l'expliquer. Appartement assez petit mais avec quelques commerces autour. Un peu de bruit mais surtout dommage l'absence de tv. Merci tout de même.

Nice and clean appartment, it is as beautiful as the pictures. On the pictures it seems bigger but its still big enough! The communication is great, we had a great stay!
Very beautiful apartment! Location was great, supermarket and restaurants nearby. The communication with Marie was really nice! Loved this place and would book it agan next time I visit Paris!

We were 4 people visiting Paris and were really happy to have booked this very affordable and tastefully furnished apartment. It has a great location, walking distance to Montmartre and Sacré Coeur. We had hired bikes and most sights that interested us were only 5-6 km away. The bike tracks are very good in Paris and the apartment has a great location for this.
All we needed was there. Marie was very helpful and responding all the time very quickly.
Thank you Marie for everything! We definitely would book this apartment again.
The apartment was really nicely furnished. It is very close to the metro station and you can basically reach everything in no time. All in all it was a great stay at Maries place!

Even though we were not able to meet with Marie personally, she made herself available to us and checked on us during our stay just to make sure we had everything we needed.
The apartment is cosy but the four of us did not feel like we were on top of each other, the bathroom was big enough and the shower was lovely.  The apartment was clean with enough amenities for our short stay.  Although the location is central it was extremely quite at night.  So many eating places nearby and 2-3 minutes walk to the Metro made it a great location to get around Paris.  I highly recommend this apartment for all the above reasons.
Thank you Marie

The place was simply amazing, the location was perfect for us, and as a neat freak I appreciated how clean the apartment was! Marie has been very helpful throughout, and even arranged for us to leave our luggages in a safe place after check out. The overall experience made our stay really enjoyable!
Hassle free check in/check out. Stylish place that was sparkling clean. Had everything needed for the stay.
Small but spacious, amazing location and beautiful apartment

位置不错,交通方便,房东很nice,沟通顺畅｡
房间很干净,三大一小住感觉稍小了一点｡
电热水器,人多的时候洗澡的话要省着点用｡
总体感觉很好
Brilliant apartment located right next door to the metro, making daily commutes quick and easy. Marie is a lovely host, who was able to cater to our every need. It was a really enjoyable stay!
Great place to stay at! And very cute neighborhood
Marie was a great host and the location was great to explore Paris from.

Marie’s apartment was wonderful and so was Marie.
She is very quick and thorough with her communication and tells you all you need to know to make check in easy. 
The apartment is in an ideal location with some great eating places, supermarkets, pharmacies and laundromats all a stones throw away.
We had a train strike while we were there and were still able to get around by foot.
The apartment is clean, tidy and fitted with everything you need for a short stay. It is definitely ‘cosy’ but our family of 4 got by just fine.
Thanks Marie!

Marie’s place is the perfect base for exploring Paris. Very comfortable, clean, quiet and secure. It has everything you need inside and Marie was always contactable with any questions or help needed.
I would happily stay here again if I was returning Paris.

Overall a nice place but the space could be slightly tight for 5 pax. For my family of 1 adults & 3 children, it was still manageable. The hot shower turned cold for the 5th person. The host looked into it promptly and the following day, the shower was fine for all 5 of us.

We had a great stay here. It is a lovely, well decorated spot with thoughtful touches and while small the space is set up well. We had 2 adults and 2 teens in 3 beds which worked great. We found the location excellent - close to the Sacre Coeur and easy to get to top spots. A great bakery just up the road. We were able to check in early too which was much appreciated and could easily walk from Gare du Nord. Quick responses from the host Marie. Would happily recommend!

The space is very small for 4 adults, other than that the accommodation is fine for 2-3 adults. The bathroom was nice and the cleanliness is good. Location is good for the train stations and close to centre of Paris. Thanks for the stay.

Estivemos nesse apartamento com 2 adultos e 3 crianças, gostaria de agradecer a Marie, mas dizer que o apartamento é muito, muito pequeno. Não esperava que seria tão pequeno assim. a foto da uma dimensão maior!  
O kitnet não comporta 5 pessoas.  É pra no máximo 3 pessoas. 
Fomos com 4 malas e já isso tomava conta de toda sala. Sentimos também muita falta de alguns eletrodoméstico e utensílios doméstico para atender as necessidades das crianças. Fora esse contratempo, o lugar é muito bem localizado, bastante limpo e bonito!
Great little apartment in a great location!
Outstanding and very modern amenities offered with a very good location.
Super clean. Very centrally located. Plenty of food around. About a 10–11 minute walk from Gare du Nord. Great communication from Marie. Feels very safe and secure.
Marie’s apartment is a great place to stay. Though it’s small, it has everything you need for brief stay in Paris and has a homey feel. I Would 100% stay here again.

Marie’s place was great. It was great for two nights with my husband and two kids. It would be tight for longer than a few days with 4 people. However for 2 people it would be perfect. It was really clean and communication was fantastic. We’d stay again.
The apartment is very stylish and placed at a great location near a metro station and Gare du Nord. Check in and check out were easy. 10/10.

The apartment was extremely beautiful and Marie allowed us to drop off our things before checking in which was so helpful. The place was a little smaller than expected but was perfect for our short stay. It’s about a 30 minute walk to the louvre and 20 minute walk to moulin rouge/good bar scene. About a 45 minute drive to the palace of Versailles. Would definitely stay there again!
Small, but big enough for 2 or 3 people. Very clean and stylish.

Marie’s place is in a great location. Closest metro is just 3 minutes away, which could easily take you anywhere in the city center.
The place is stylish and clean, just as in the pictures. It fit four of us comfortably.
Marie is also a great host, very helpful and responds quickly.
Highly recommended.
The place were just as described in the photos. It is well kept and really well cleaned. It was perfect for our family, two adults and three children.

Lovely, clean, quiet and stylish apartment. Approximately 5-10 minute walk from Gare Du Nord and less than 2 minutes from Poissonnéire metro. We stayed with our two teenage daughters and although small there was ample space for us for a weekend stay. The apartment is the perfect base from which to explore Paris. It felt safe and secure. We were within a short walk of shops and amenities. Marie is a responsive and thoughtful host who assisted with any enquiries that we had. There is also a great restaurant on the same street called L'Elan 9 which served amazing authentic cuisine.  We will definitely stay here again if we return to Paris. Thank you.
駅から近くとても良い立地です｡清潔感もあり､5人での滞在でも問題ない広さで素晴らしい家でした｡Marieの対応もとても早く､ﾊﾟﾘでの滞在におすすめです!!

Marie's place was conveniently located in town right next to a metro station as well as plenty of places to eat. It was very clean and stylish and had everything we needed. Marie was great in communicating with me and helping me with any concerns I had. I would definitely stay here again!

PERFECT location to visit Paris from. Super comfortable beds. All the kitchen amenities. Marie was super easy to communicate with and made our stay a breeze. We would LOVE to stay here again next time we are in Paris! No need to look farther.
I highly recommend this location! Prime location, lovely place, and Marie is a fabulous host.

Marie is a welcoming host who responds quickly when trying to communicate.  This apartment is close to the metro and just minutes from major attractions. We felt safe and appreciated the fresh baguettes and croissants just 1/2 block away! Clean and quiet, this apt fit our of 3 adults and 2 teens nicely. The blow-dryer and American to European adapters she provided were a good extra to the ones we had brought.

The spot was perfectly cleen and comfortable with best location. However, it was so tight to stay for 3 people.
Marie was nice host and we would like to thank to her.
Stylish and good location

Marie’s place is perfect for a solo stay or if you are with one other person. It’s right by Gare du Nord, which makes travelling to and from other countries a breeze. Paris is full of shops so you don’t have to walk far to find somewhere to eat. Great place!

Cozy & beautiful apartment for my family of 3. It is located right next to a Metro station that made it easier to travel in Paris. Marie was incredible! She maintained great communication with us to make sure we had everything we needed. I would definitely stay here again! Thanks again :)

Marie’s Place is soooo
clean and central located !
She communicates very well, so it was NO stress! 
She responded all my questions so quickly!
I really appreciate her and at the same time relieved!

Thank you, Marie for letting us stay at your lovely apartment!

Big Mahalo!
Maki
Mooi , net , modern appartement. Echt een aanrader

This place is so clean and I love the shower. The amenities and the wallpaper design were very nice. Poissinoire Train station is like 3 min walk and you can go anywhere to Paris. There's a convenient store nearby so we were able to buy water and snacks and other hygiene stuff.  There'a a lot of coffee shops and pharmacies nearby as well. What I like the most is that Marie was very helpful. She quickly responded to all my questions and requests. We love the cleanliness of this place. However, we didn't expect that this place was tiny. It's like a studio room. 1 bedroom, a small living room and in the middle is the bathroom. I recommend this place more for 2-3 person. The place is nice but we just had barely enough space for our luggages. But like our overall experience was good though. Thank you Marie :)

The apartment is very stylish, and cozy but small ( as described). I traveled with 2 kids  and they still had room to play without bothering everyone else. WiFi was very helpful. the local subway was just down street and the  National/ international train station is just 10 min away.  The attractions are easy to get to via subway. Small grocery store within 200feet, larger grocery store about half mile. We had everything we needed to Make our own meals. If I return to France - I’ll definitely use this host again.

Un estudio súper bonito, impecable, limpio, la comunicación con marie siempre fue rápida y clara.

La llegada fue muy fácil ya que previamente nos habían mandado indicaciones.

Tuvimos un problema con el calentador y Marie enseguida mandó a alguien a arreglarlo, no tuvimos más problema con eso, y la estancia fue muy agradable.

Definitivamente recomendaría el departamento para una pareja, nosotros éramos 4 y nos quedó un poco chico, nada que no se pudiera resolver. 
Para una pareja esta ideal y súper lindo.

Gracias por todo claro que regresaría al mismo lugar la siguiente vez que vaya con mi esposo a Paris.
We enjoyed our stay in Marie’s place. Great communication.
Un pequeño apartamento pero muy acogedor y muy completo. Nos ha encantado.
What a wonderful little flat! Our family of 5 used it as our home base for our first time in Paris. Great exploring, close to the metro, lots of great touches to make you feel at home!

Good location ( restaurant, laundry, bank,Gare de nore train station...). Comfortable place but a little stuffy . Room is downstairs & has a little window. It would be great if it has a/c. I have to turn fan all night even though temperatures outside 70 F plus. Ceiling has too much lighting

Diese Unterkunft ist definitiv weiterzuempfehlen für 2-3 Personen. Super Lage. Marie ist sehr sympathisch und hilfsbereit. Für 5 Personen (mit Gepäck) ist es zu klein und unpraktisch. Auf den Fotos erschien uns diese Unterkunft deutlich grösser.

Nice and sweet location super close by the Gare du nord train station. Also plenty of eateries and supermarkets near by. Although we had a slight inconvenience where we were led into the wrong apartment and had to track all the way back 30 mins away from the Airbnb to swap with another group of travelers it was a pleasant stay at Marie’s apartment.

Apartamento moderno e pequeno. Fomos no verão, e em dias que houve uma onda de calor. Apesar de ser pouco ventilado, o apartamento é fresco. Os ventiladores que foram disponibilizados garantiram uma circulação adequada do ar.

Marie was a very attentive host and responded to our questions quickly.  The apartment was modern and  comfortable for our family of 4 and we appreciated the Metro at the end of the block after busy days exploring the city! The location was very convenient and close to shops, grocery stores, and restaurants.

The apartment was very nice, clean,  and well decorated.  It was close to the metro and Sacre Coeur.  

The apartment was cute and updated.  Fit 4 female guests but was slightly tight.  There were fans in the apartment but it was hot without air conditioning.  The temperature was around 35 Celsius (mid 90's) during our stay.  The sofa futon was very comfortable and made a great second bed.  

The neighborhood was safe and at no point did we feel otherwise.  We'd definitely stay here again in the cooler months.  Stay here and have a great time in Paris.
Boendet hade allt man kunde tänkas behöva.
Excellent location, super responsive host, stylishly decorated flat, exactly as appears online. My family of four felt at home and enjoyed our short stay in Paris. Check in was extremely easy.
Marie was a great host and our family loved her very cute apartment! It was perfectly suited for our visit and close to Gare du Nord. Exactly as advertised!
The flat is exactly as pictured.  Clean and full of thoughtful amenities.  Marie's instructions for getting to and into the flat were perfect.  Nice and quiet location, very close to the metro.

Great place. Sleeps 5, but was really tight for our family of five. No AC in the apartment made our stay extremely warm (we were there during the Paris heat wave). Great location in a really neat neighborhood. Very close to metro. Metro is very easy to use in Paris.

Conveniently located near the metro, restaurants, grocery stores. Stylishly decorated and all the amenities provided. Appreciated the fans during Paris' recent heat wave. Ground floor unit - no stairs! Wi-Fi worked very well. Would highly recommend.
Great stay

Excelente departamento!! 

Muy agradable
Great space for a small group! Really good location as well!!

Ma quanto è carino questo apartamento!!!
E' tutto coordinato e di buon gusto. Comodissimo alla metropolitana, silenzioso nelle ore notturne. A noi e ai nostri bambini è piaciuto molto.
Lo consiglio.
房间虽然不大,但五脏俱全,两个沙发床也很方便｡
Great location! Marie was a super nice host!
Great location right next to a metro, really clean and stylish place.
Consigliato al 100%
Very modern, newly remodeled in great location.  Many cafes and bakeries nearby, metro was just down the street. Small space but beautifully designed.  First floor!

Really nice stay for me and my three friends in the heart of Paris.
Easy to walk to all the facilities.
Marie answers questions and guided US in all kind of ways.
SUPER FANTASTIC WEEKEND IN PARIS
Loved Marie’s apartment! Convenient to Monmatre , Sacre Coeur, and the Paris Opera. Decorated beautifully! Loved having a kitchen. Location was perfect with lots of restaurants and shops close by.
Great location, close to metro.  Stylish and clean accommodations!

This apartment is lovely, updated, cozy and has a great location.  It was nice to have the amenities of the coffee maker.  The space was very clean and the decor was beautiful.  Marie was easy to contact and very helpful.  Would definitely recommend.

Marie's apartment was gorgeous! Very stylish and cosy in a semi private courtyard. The decor is beautiful and feels really special. It was a little smaller than we thought but was absolutely fine for the 3 of us. The apartment is in a great location close to lots of lovely restaurants and bakeries. It's right by Poissonnière Station and a 10 minute walk from Gare Du Nord so we found it extremely easy to get about. Marie was a great host, with quick communication and advice on the local area, where to eat, maps etc in the apartment. We'll definitely stay again next time we are in Paris
A really good place to spend in Paris! Host is really nice and response any question very fast! 100%Recommend
Very good central location, super clean flat and a very friendly and helpful host.
Great host and great place. 10/10 recommend

Host was helpful and easy to reach when needed. While the flat looks good and is stylish, I personally wouldn’t host more than 4 adults at a time. 

The flat looked a lot bigger in pictures, so I was surprised how 5 of us were going to stay at the flat once I arrived. We managed to make it work but it was definitely too tight for comfort.

Die Wohnung liegt wirklich sehr zentral und ist liebevoll und sehr chic eingerichtet. Die Metrostation ist in 2 bis 3 Min. zu erreichen. Zu Fuß bis zum Gare du Nord waren wir ca. 8 min. unterwegs. Marie ist eine sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin und die Unterkunft ist sehr zu empfehlen. Sowohl die Ausstattung als auch die Lage ist toll.

This place is areal jewel in the heart of Paris. We already want to come back! You will be enjoying coming to stylish and cozy flat after a day out sightseeing and walking. The place has everything a traveler needs. We especially enjoyed a gourmet kitchen!  The flat is close to a bus stop and subway station, if you prefer public transportation. Marie is a wonderful host and communication was excellent.  Enjoy your stay!

Marie’s Apartment is perfect for a couple, I stayed with
5 ladies which was fine but a little crammed! 3/4 people would cool but no more than that! Marie was a great host, she communicated with me in a timely manner and checked in on me when i arrived! Marie left everything a visitor would need! I love this apartment Marie did a great job at decorating this stylish treasure and very clean! The location was a 6-8min walk to Gare du Nord. There were restaurants and bars close by! Supermarkets and pharmacies were up the road too. The metro station is at the end of the road and there is also a bus stop right outside the property. I would happier stay at this apartment again. 

Marie was wonderful and made my trip easier!
Amazing & stylish flat! Good location close to metro. Marie is a great host, quickly reachable when we had some questions.

Bring your own shampoo and toothpaste:) Marie is extremely responsive and is quick to accommodate any of your needs. The flat is extremely clean and is exactly like the photo. The space is very cozy and would be perfect for a company of two.

Super clean and beautiful house! Located in ceter of Paris so it’s very convenient for walking or taking train to shops, restaurants. I definitely book this house again when I’m in Paris  thank you Marie for having us ❤️
El apartamento está muy bien comunicado con la ciudad. Es muy acogedor y agradable. Marie es muy amable y siempre dispuesta a ayudar. Sin duda repetiremos si volvemos.

Marie's apartment is the perfect size! It is very close to the metro and bus stops, which makes getting around the city much easier. The space is perfect for groups of 5; it is well-kept and clean. Marie was very communicative and patient with us as well. I would definitely stay here again!
Tutto preciso e perfetto , massima organizzazione

We stayed at this very stylish apartment for 2 nights. Marie greeted us when we arrived and was incredibly lovely. The apartment is cosy but worked for the 5 of us. The location is fabulous - very close to the Gare du Nord - and we had everything we needed for our stay in Paris. Thank you Marie for your hospitality!
Very good location
Séjour extra avec appartement très beau, décoration  soignée , et dans un quartier très vivant , je recommande vivement
Un très beau logement, bien équipé et bien situé. Un bémol pour la luminosité naturelle de l’appartement.
Très bon séjour dans cet appartement
Appartement très bien situé au cœur de paris, tout confort et très bien aménagé. Hôtes réactifs. Tout était parfait.
Appartement très moderne, fonctionnel et très propre, dans une cour au calme, très bien située. Literie exemplaire.

Très jolie appartement, bien décoré.
Idéalement situé. Lits confortables.
Pièce principale semble un peu moins grande que sur les photos mais elle est très bien agencée.

Merci pour votre hospitalité. Grâce à vous, nous avons passé un excellent week-end. Je reviendrai sans hésiter! Je recommande cette adresse. L’appartement est confortable, on ne peut plus propre et très agréable. La cafetière nespresso à disposition fut pour le moi le détail qui fait plaisir.
I tried several apartments in Paris and this was the best.
Très déçue ! Appartement sale et clic clac cassé comme mon dos du coup ! Il n’y a que la vue qui vaut le détour !

Très bon week-end passé dans cet appartement avec une vue juste MAGNIFIQUE !
L’appartement est fonctionnel, très propre et Philippe est très réactif par message.
Je n’hésiterais pas à louer l’appartement de Philippe pour un prochain week-end à Paris.
Il y a l l'humidité ,le lit est ne pas confortable et la chambre n'est pas équipée bien
Appartement très propre, très bien placé avec une vue imprenable ! Super !

Nous avons passé un bon séjour dans ce logement fonctionnel. 
Gros coup de cœur pour la vue sur la Tour Eiffel qui est juste exceptionnelle. 
Nous reviendrons !

Philippe est un hôte de mauvaise foi.  
Le seul côté positif est l'emplacement du logement et sa vue (indirecte) sur la tour Eiffel. 

Concernant tout le reste, il n'y a que des points très négatifs. Je suis étonné de voir que Philippe a autant de bonnes notes: les commentaires se doivent d'être purement factices dans l'ensemble. Rien ne correspondait avec ce qu'avaient indiqué les voyageurs précédents, rien. 

Niveau propreté on est au niveau zéro: le logement avait été très peu nettoyé avant mon arrivée (juste la serviette de la salle-de-bain et les draps changés ,de manière bâclée). L'état du frigo était immonde, la banquette âgée, usée et incrustée de saletés, servant de nid à des petits insectes adorant l'insalubrité. La table basse pleine de miettes et tâches, comme les placards de cuisine, avec un peu de graisse en bonus. La poussière jonchait sur le sol. Tout cela avec des photos à l'appui, en preuve.

Je suis directement rentré en contact avec Philippe pour l'état de l'appartement mais celui-ci n'a pas été conciliant, plutôt de mauvaise foi et réfutant complètement mon avis. Je n'ai JAMAIS payé 50 euros de ménage pour un logement si petit (10m2 environ) et surtout, aussi sale en définitive ! 

Le mobilier et l'appartement sont dans un état catastrophique: rien n'est entretenu, ni remplacé le but n'est probablement que faire du profit avec une ancienne chambre de bonne. 

Rien n'est pensé pour le confort du client. Le lit clic-clac est clairement hors d'état de fonction: il y a un trou béant en son centre (sous le drap) ce qui vous casse le dos complètement lors de la nuit, sans compter le fait qu'il ne tient pas horizontal (reste en arc de cercle) et que cela grince constamment. J'avais lu quelques commentaires sur ce clic-clac, remontant deux ans en arrière: en fait rien n'a jamais été modifié !

Enfin, niveau équipements on est à zéro une fois encore, ne comptez pas sur le stricte nécessaire du style torchon/liquide vaisselle/micro-onde absents pour la cuisine, par exemple. 

Aussi, les voisins sont très bruyants (insonorisation inexistante): une personne a transformé sa chambre en boite de nuit pendant une demie heure à 4h du matin. 

Je n'hésite pas à signaler Philippe.

Je n'ai jamais eu à faire un tel commentaire auparavant, c'est la première fois que je loge dans une chambre en si piteux état.
Belle vue, lit de très mauvaise qualité...
Appartement cozy parfaitement placé pour un week-end en couple.

Très belle vue sur la Tour Eiffel. Appartement très propre avec un bon rapport qualité prix.
merci pour le ventilateur, petite attention très appréciée !
Magnifique emplacement,    avec vue sur la tour eifel et l hôte trés réactif aux messages :)
Appartement propre et cosy avec une vue EXCEPTIONNELLE!!! Super séjour!! Rien à dire .
Belle vue
Quartier calme et belle vue sur la Tour Eiffel
Travaux, saleter et j'en passe. ..
J'ai passé un magnifique moment avec une vue magnifique
Vue exceptionnel sur la tour Eiffel
C’est bien !!
Assez déçu, je m’attendais à mieux. Vue magnifique mais « clic-clac » cassé, odeur d’urine dans la salle de bain.

Le point fort de cet appartement est son emplacement et surtout la vue qu’il offre de la Tour Eiffel. C’est assez impressionnant, surtout en pleine nuit où le monument s’illumine. 
Au delà, l’hôte a été très disponible pour répondre aux diverses interrogations, et ses indications d’arrivée et de départ ont été très claires. 
Je recommande vivement
Très bonne accueil. Merci !
Vue exceptionnelle
Vue exceptionnelle ! Une bonne expérience !
La vue sur la tour Eiffel est très belle. Cependant, le canapé-lit est très inconfortable et grince dès qu'on bouge le petit doigt. Il n'y a pas de rideaux, ni volets.
Vue magnifique et à proximité de tout. Parfait pour un week-end en amoureux!
Séjour très agréable, la vue est superbe, le quartier tranquille

Phillipe est un hote très serviable et patient. L'appartement est simple et tres bien situé. Nous avons passé une merveilleuse soirée sous le ciel époustouflant du 14 juillet au pied de la tour Eiffel.
Super séjour, je recommande vraiment vue imprenable sur la tour Eiffel. De nuit à 1h du matin c'est juste exceptionnel. Le studio est cocooning et très calme on entend rien du studio.

C'était une excellente soirée chez le studio de Philippe. La tour Eiffel est juste à côté du bâtiment. Je recommande vivement pour les voyageurs qui cherche un cozy studio pour explorer le centre du capitale.
Une vue magnifique, rien à dire!

"Amazing view really !!!!"
Tous est dans le titre ,vue exceptionnelle,confort essentiel,je recommande vivement.
Tres bien accueuilli par cesar ,le sejour etait parfait .
Endroit stratégique  calme
La vue est magnifique, et l'App est très bien situé ! c'est super pour un séjour à Paris.
Si vous voulez passer la nuit avec la tour effiel, c'est bon choix. Mais un peu inconfortable pour le repos.

Bien que tout les commentaires soit positifs, moi et ma conjointe avons vécu une petite histoire d'horreur.  

L'appartement et l'endroit sont exactes, malheureusement l'état des lieu est déplorable.  Poussière, fourmi, pas de rideau, divan lit inconfortable (s'affaisse du milieu) abat jour avec trace de brûlures et lors de la dernière nuit, le toit se mets a coulé dans le lit.  La vue est effectivement très belle mais il faut sortir la tête complètement à l'extérieur.  Impossible de voir la tour de l'intérieur de l'appartement.  Peut-être n'avons nous pas été chanceux, mais l'entretien est négliger.

Je ne recommande pas cette hôte.

Chambre bien située par rapport à la magnifique Tour Eiffel et bon accueil. 
Petits commerces et Bus à proximité.
Ótimo lugar nao iram se arrepender.

The apartment doesn't have curtains. In the morning the sun rises quite early in summer.
And there are quite a lot of ants found on the floor, on the bed and in the shower.

Other than this,
Great location, nice view
If you are looking for a studio with a stunning Eiffel tower view, this studio is for you! Many bistros and restaurants near by! I highly recommend it
It’s my second time staying at this apartment and I highly recommend to all travelers looking for an amazing view of Eiffel Tower!!!!
I highly recommend this apartment if you are looking for the best view of the Eiffel Tower!!!
Petit studio correct
Very new and clean flat. The Eiffel tower is just next door, perfect location!
That was the best choice to see Paris for the first time from that apartment! Amazing view! Totally worth it!
Phillipe's place is lovely and cozy, he is also very responsive and professional. The view of the Eiffel Tower is a priviledge. Would recommend 100%

Muitooooo perto da Torre ... otima localizacao, o lugar e pequeno, mas muito confortavel.
Perfeito para um casal
So o elevador que e bem pequeno, e tem uma escada para subir, o que dificulta se vc tem mala grande
Mas pela vista e pela localizacao vale sim
Muito bem localizado

If you love the Eiffel Tower, the view from this apartment is one of the best in Paris! Traditional French apartment, extremely narrow stairs, elevator barely fits one person, and the apartment is all the way at the top so if your coming with luggage, it’s quite hard to get it up there... Phillipe was a great host and helpful, but unfortunately there was a problem.. the couch and pullout bed was way too uncomfortable, it looks old and just makes to much noise... might as well sleep on the floor... if your going for the view, it’s worth it!
Single room, plus shower. Sofa bed is very uncomfortable lumpy pillows. Great tv and wifi, nice shower, great location. Worlds smallest elevator / lift
Good
Excelente habitación a pasos de la torre, es pequeña maximo 2 personas, con un sofa cama, frigobar, baño con todo lo indispensable y pequeña cocina.

I never write negative comments or reviews, but that one will be. 
Great location, easy to find and enter.
Shower was clean, there is some kitchen equipment. 

- Everything is dusty(Furniture on top was never cleaned)

-Sofa has dirty spots, so that i was afraid to place myself and my 1 year old baby. Just disgusting.

- Some nails are looking out, it is very unsafe for the guests, especially with small children.

-Carpet is falling apart 

- Sofa- Bed has nothing to do with comfortable. It is like you are laying in a hole and every movement, even the minim ones, cause some nightmare creaks.  After 20 minutes of laying on it you have pain in all your body parts. 

- A lot of Ants on the floor and in the Kitchen. 

-Instead of apologise from the owner, i was told that i was lying and that my evidence-pictures were made somewhere else.
Left the apartment after 2 hours. Do not recommend.
This is amazing value for your money the view is amazing! You can watch the Eiffel Tower every night. The view is what makes the room.

Amazing location. Beautiful view of Eiffel Tower. Small flat but fully functioning bathroom, with decent sized shower, big mirror, hairdryer, iron, etc. The flat is 7 flights up,  but there is a tiny lift, which we had no problems with. Philippe was super helpful and responded quickly. Highly recommended.
Great view of tour eiffel

The appartment has a beautiful view. Something you will remember for a long time.

The locations is really good with everything you need on short distance.

Besides the amazing view and the clean bathroom, the bed was very uncomfortable and almost not suitable for laying on your front (because of the shape). I wouldn't recommend it for a couple if you are here fore multiple nights.
Puede ser un lindo lugar, pero necesita amor y limpieza y aguaaaaaaa

Location !!!! Best ever.  You can’t be any closer to the tower.  Building is very old and unique which adds a touch of time travel experience. The elevator is old and fits only two skinny people or on big suitcase .  We loved it.  It was a great experience to live and use original tools.  The view from the room of the Eiffel Tower is breathtaking and amazing which compensates for tiny elevator and older couch.  The value can’t be beat because of the view.  Would go back Evropa time I am in Paris.

Our stay at Philippe's place was okay. The view was amazing (can't see the Eiffel Tower unless you stick your head out of the window), and the location was very convenient. The downsides were: the elevator was barely big enough to fit 1 person and 1 piece of medium luggage; the apartment has obviously dwindled in quality since the pictures were taken for the listing (the couch didn't seem very clean, and there weren't any extra perks or small touches like pictures); one window didn't have curtains/blinds, and the other window didn't having working blinds; there wasn't any hand soap in the bathroom for us to use; the bed was extremely uncomfortable (hard, lumpy sections, hard to get out of) and very loud with any type of movement. Overall, I think the main takeaway is that it is overpriced for the quality of the stay we experienced, but we were grateful for the beautiful views and solid location!

Español (English below)
El apartamento es tal y como se muestra en las fotos el sofá-cama es suficiente para 2 personas no es muy cómodo pero la vista a la torre lo compensa todo. El elevador solo llega hasta el nivel 6 y hay que subir 1 piso por escaleras tenerlo en cuenta por si llevan maletas grandes, todo esto está bien explicado en la descripción. La mejor manera de disfrutar París frente a la torre. 

English 
The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures, the sofa-bed is comfortable enough for 2 people the view to the tower compensates for the rough bed. The elevator only goes to the 6th floor as described in the post you'll need to go up 1 floor in the stairs be aware is you carry big or heavy luggage. Everything is exactly as explain in the post the best way to enjoy Paris is right in front of the tower.

Insanely good location! Great stay for a night or two. Keep in mind, the elevator only has space for one person with very light luggage. It also only takes you to the fifth floor, you will have to go up a flight of very narrow stairs as well. As for the place itself, very cozy and straight forward.

Flat was as pictured. 
The view of the Eiffel Tower is amazing.

Location is great, yes, but beware - First, the room is on the top floor of the building, and the elevator is so small that it's not even worth using. Not even room for one person and luggage. The only other option is 8+ flights of narrow, century-old stairs to get to the top and it's grueling with luggage. Second, the couch "bed" is not usable - too uncomfortable to use and we had to put the mattress on the floor. Third, Philippe is a bit of a jerk. Every time I communicated on the phone with him he was rude and condescending. The icing on the cake was when he sent his maids into our room to clean an hour before the scheduled check out time. I came back to the room to find two strangers who had gone through my personal belongings and wouldn't leave when I asked them to. Needless to say I was pretty upset. When speaking to Philippe on the phone, he had a "too bad just deal with it" attitude about the situation. So in short, you'll be right at the base of the Eiffel Tower, but is it worth it?

Our stay in this apartment was great!! Amazing views of the Eiffel Tower and in a good location to restaurants, shopping, metro, etc. The elevator in the building is very small so if you have lots of luggage you may have to send it up separately then meet it at the top of the stairs like we did.. but other than that amazing stay!!!
Recommended as the view is stunning. Good host
Excellent communication and a great view of Eiffel tower

The view of The Tower Eiffel & surrounding city landscape are amazing!
!We stayed 9 nights & made it our home in Paris. We got to know locals in the near by stores & restaurants. We had so much fun there, a great location. You just walk out of the building & your walking distance to so much. Thank you Phillipe for being our Host:)
Very very nice !!!!

Great view and great location. Host replies quickly and the room is pretty much what is advertised. The down sides are, the bed is quite noisy and uncomfortable, also the elevator is really really small. But overall is OK and I recommend it.

The place was clean, and in a fantastic location. It was easy to get in and Philippe was very quick to respond.

I would have preferred to know there was not a full kitchen (no microwave) and appropriate appliances for everyday life, or appropriate cleaning supplies to clean up after yourself. The only soap provided was body soap, so after a long day and checking into the air bnb, we had to find a late night store to purchase hand soap, shampoo and dish soap to be able to clean appropriately. 

Though the space was small (we knew this coming in and it’s not a complaint), the area has a well thought out organization with a nice closet with provided hangers to be able to keep your clothes hung if desired. A plus for us, given that we had a dress and coat to put up.
Great view but basic place, the bed isn’t very comfortable and the place isn’t much bigger than the bed but it’s a great view and location. Overall enjoyed and would do again.
Good host nice place

La ubicación es EXCELENTE pues está a unos pasos de la torre Eiffel y una grandiosa vista.  LO MALO es que las instalaciones son viejas, no hay cama sino sofá cama con COLCHON INCOMODO y todo muy deteriorado, además el elevador o ascensor es muy pequeño, solo cabe una persona y muy apretada. SOLO LO RECOMENDARIA POR LA UBICACIÓN, POR LO DEMAS NO!!!
