The view is amazing but be warned of the tiny elevator! For anyone who doesn’t like lifts or small spaces it is a nightmare - it worked fine but it only fits 1 person and the suitcases had to go up separately and it was very scary to be inside (all the safety is in French). Then if you don’t use it there’s 8 levels of spiral staircases. The check in instructions were quite unclear and the host was quite rude when we rang on the phone after trying for about half an hour to get in (all the gates look the same and the key code only works on 1 of the doors which already looked like there were people inside). The view is absolutely incredible but do be warned you have to stick your head out the window to see anything. Apartment was pretty basic, the bed was a bit uncomfortable and it lacked any basic supplies like coffee or tea but very clean and does the job for a few days - view makes up for it all mostly.

The location is unbelievable! We got our own private view of the Eiffel from the room window!The Eiffel is literally just steps away! Philippe quickly responded to any communication.The elevator was a bit too tiny to fit two people. We had to send our luggage up 6 floors then climb another floor with it which was a little tedious but we took it as part of our adventure in Paris. Otherwise great stay!

A true Parisian apartment! It is exactly as pictured and was clean and ready for us. My husband and I had a long layover in Paris so we wanted a place with a good location. This place delivered! There are lots of cafes within walking distance. You can't beat the view of the Eiffel Tower.

The location and view is absolutely perfect! The only thing that could’ve gone better was that check-in was at 2 PM and the cleaner was still working when we showed up at 2:30 PM, which wasn’t an issue for us, but should be noted. Several reviews stated they thought the bed was not comfortable, but my boyfriend and I were very comfortable. The elevator is a typical Parisian style elevator- do not expect to fit more than yourself and a carry on bag. You could send your bags up via elevator and walk up the steps to meet your bags there (we did this). Know that you are paying for the view. Once you are ok with that- definitely stay here!

The view looks like a movie backdrop, that’s how close to the tower you are. I rate it 10 out of 5

As I expected, the apartment is tiny, but the view makes it worthwhile...

Amazing location ! 
The apartment was right there at Eiffel Tower. I was not able to bring up luggage although has a tiny elevator and one flight of stairs at the last floor but for me was not worth the trouble for only one night .
This apartment has the most incredible view of the Eiffel Tower. It is also in a fantastic location.

The place was described just as you read in the listing. I read the reviews about the pull out couch and because I was suffering from a hangover/jet lag and still went out comfort did not matter to me when the time came to shut my eyes. The view from the apartment is breathtaking. Completely beats any other place you can find near by. There were a few noise issues with the neighbors (throughout the evening and then some sort of remodeling I’m assuming in a different apartment) but you can’t control that so if you’re a light sleeper beware.

Departamento con excelente vista!
Solo hay que tener en consideración que el elevador es muy pequeño, cabe una persona con su equipaje. El departamento cumple su función, si solo esperas tener un lugar donde dormir y asearte, con una excelente ubicación y vista a la torre Eiffel!
Vista maravilhosa!

VIEW. That is what you are paying here.
It is simply breathtaking.
Staying in a place like this is something you have to live once in a lifetime. 
Is it perfect? NO. 
Couch is dirty, bathroom is clean and has more space than other places in Paris.
Sofa Bed is OK to get some sleep, but do not expect a 5star hotel bed.
Elevator is soo tiny, but it was not an issue for us, it was actually kind of fun.
Had terrible issues with wifi, but airbnb was amazing with this issue. 

STAY HERE!

Philippe was very prompt and polite with his communication. He gave clear instructions on how to enter the apartment. The elevator was not one for more than two small people, it is a luggage life that for those of us who are claustrophobic, does not work. The view and location are excellent, but for an Airbnb, it could have been much better maintained. The electrical system was hanging from the television at eye level to the ground where my husband had to repair an electrical outlet to have it operational. The WiFi did not work. The sofa bed was old, dirty and dingy looking from the outside. When advertised it had a cover on it which made it look much cleaner than in person. The bed itself has a deep low spot in the middle. It needs to be replaced with a trundle bed.

Host was quick to respond to all communication. Check in instructions we clear and easy to follow. The elevator is not for the faint of heart - but welcomed at the end of a day walking with no metro available.  The view - you feel as though you could almost touch the Eiffel Tower. On a clear day/night and a lean out the window to the right, you can see Sacre Coure as well. 

The first night was difficult to get the TV/Internet working - good thing hubby is handy, wires are everywhere and one of the electrical sockets seemed broken.  The info sheet in the room has an incorrect password (looking at recent reviews - looks like this could have been updated by now - or at least in an updated message to renters). 

Let talk about the “bed”. It’s got to go.  The mattress itself is okay.  The first night my hubby was the lucky one that got the broken side.  It squeaked every time one of us moved. Every time. The second night we took the mattress off the frame and slept fine. The coffee pot was broken, but we still made coffee with cups and a watchful eye. The bathroom was clean and the shower had good pressure and plenty of hot water. 

With a new bed I would stay here again.

The apartment is in the most amazing location! One of our highlights was being able to watch the Eiffel Tower light show every night when we got back! The local amenities are good, there’s a little supermarket on the corner and many cafes, restaurants, shops, and bakeries  within walking distance. The metro is also very close by and very easy to navigate, although we found a lot of things where accessible by walking. The lift up to the sixth floor is very cosy to say the least, we managed one person and a suitcase or 2 people with a small handbag (but prepare to get to know that person well as you’re essentially touching noses hah!) around 10-15 steps up to the 7th floor! The check in process was very easy and communication was very good and quick! The only thing I will say is the pull out bed is uncomfortable but we put the mattress on the floor and it was so so so much better! Do not let the bed put you off though as the location is spectacular and well worth it! The apartment has everything you will need in an amazing neighbourhood with stunning views! Thank you for an amazing stay, we had a wonderful experience!

Philippe did a great job communicating with us and did so very quickly. The view as stated is amazing! It worked well for what my fiancé and I needed (we stayed for one night with a book-bag for each of us-only used this place for sleeping and proximity to tourist destinations). I wouldn’t recommend staying here longer than 3 nights due to size of the apartment and the challenges of getting to the 7th floor.
Good
It was good

It what we expected.  The bed needs replaced ASAP. It is old, broken and uncomfortable Yes walking out to the Eiffel Tower is great but the place was just really tired and looked like a guys dorm that was furnished at the not so cool thrift stores.  Several things weren’t working including the internet, but after some back and forth he did come by and fix that.  In general it was a dingy place. My biggest complaint is that the house keeper should up prior to our check out time to clean the place while we ran out to grab a coffee. All our valuables were there including passports.  Besides who cleans before people leave and we had confirmed minutes before our departure time.  I wasn’t very shy about our issues with the host so he is aware.

Although small, we enjoyed every space of the location. Philippe was quick to respond and easy to communicate with.
We did not realize till our last day that in order to turn on the lights in the hall way, you have to press the light switch by the stairs.
The WiFi code on the sheet is old, so make sure to use the one on the internet box. 
Even though it was raining, we had the windows open and no rain got inside. 
We too had some discomfort with the bed, but felt a lot better once we put it on the ground.
The view was absolutely amazing! Worth every penny!
Excellent location
Amazing location! Can not get closer to the Eiffel Tower
Location very good but elevator toooooo small

You cannot beat the location! The Eiffel Tower is so close and there are plenty of cafes around the area to eat at. The location was really easy to locate and the check in instructions were accurate. The fold out bed was a little uncomfortable, but we ended up putting the mattress on the floor and it was much better. We really enjoyed the stay and would love to come back.
View was Amazing!
We truly enjoyed our stay.  The view is unbeatable and we had everything we needed. Would recommend again and again!!
Perfect location and such a cute and cozy place to stay! Will definitely save staying here again!
Wow amazing view of the Eiffel Tower. It’s  right outside of your window.

I Informed the host about my aim which was spending my last night with my Fiancé before i go back home alone since she is studying here. Hence, I was very clear that i do care about all small and big details of this booking for the day. However, my day went way the opposite of my expectations and plans. No thanks or gratitudes are felt nor shall be extended. 

Please Revamp and update the following: 

- Internet was not functional which means its like a house with no water no electricity ( we are in 2019 and life’s depending on it ) 

- Pictures of Place as per current status. 
- Elevator instructions since i got out of it backwards and trapped to fall down the stairs. ( space from opened door to stairs down-way not exceeding 10-14 CM/Inches) 

- lights instructions guidance since the above painful incident happened in a dark atmosphere and i was imposed to use phone flash light to figure out lightening my way to the place, thank god it did not got broken because of the trapping and falling down.

- Check out Process is only concerned about cleaning only which was Below expectations. 

TV’s Satellite was extremely lagging 

- Electricity and Heaters maintenance are required since heater in bathroom is dropping water and stand lamp was not functional in the common area. 

- Reliability of communication and hosting since we all are human beings and expecting to be treated safely, in good manners, and get what we booked, and paid for while considering our well being, Safety, and health.

Let’s be honest - you’re here for the views! The room is a single room in a chambres de bonne - an old maids quarters, therefore it is a very small space in the roof and you have to walk up a flight of very  narrow stairs after the tiny lift - but that is all part of the Paris experience! The pull out bed is incredibly uncomfortable and mechanically groans more than a dying Optimus Prime with every single small movement, but pro tip - put the mattress straight on the rug on the floor and you will have a million times better sleep! 
Very easy access with a lock pad front door and it is crazy close to the tower making for spectacular views if you open the window and super convenient for multiple tower viewings and seeing the light show every hour at night!!

The views from this unit cannot possibly be overstated.  Amazing location with unbeatable access and views.  Familiarize yourself with the lift and lights prior to arrival.  The sleeper could use a real upgrade, but for a night in Paris and place to crash, really can't recommend Philippe's unit enough.  He was great to communicate with and the unit was exactly as described!
Posizione perfetta. Spazi limitati ma per il loro utilizzo ( dormire e lavarsi), perfetto.

Your on the 7th floor and the lift goes to the 6th which is not a problem. Except it's so SMALL it only fit two carry on bags. If you can't handle small places you'll have to climb 7 flights of small stairs.
It was a great overnight experience suitable for 2 cousins back packing through Europe. We donʻt need much and the view of the tower is awesome.

Yes, the reviews about the small elevator are very accurate. It is very small and it was difficult getting large suitcases in and out of the apartment. The place is small, but exactly as pictured mostly. The futon has been replaced by a sofa bed, which was comfortable for the 2 of us. The best part about this place is the view.  Wow! The view of the tower right outside the window is amazing. It’s so close and beautiful. The struggles with the elevator are worth it for the view you get here. I would stay here again if ever coming back just for the view alone.

Although the location is good, that doesn’t make up for the fact Phillipe did not disclose we’d have to carry our luggage up to flights of stairs.  The elevator only goes to the 6 th floor.  The pull out bed has no support so you have to take the mattress out and sleep on the floor.  It’s cold at night but you can’t turn up the heat.  We both got terrible colds.  The shower is tiny and the kitchen has no microwave.  No place to hand wet bath towels so have to use them damp from the day before.  Cannot recommend this place!
Excellent communication and insane view of the Eiffel Tower

My girlfriend and I stayed one night in Phillipe's place during a long layover. He was very communicative and made it easy to check in.

The view is absolutely gorgeous! As others have stated, you do have to lean out the window or climb out onto the roof (which probably isn't safe, but that didn't stop us.) to see the Eiffel Tower, but it's still worth the view. 

The place is small, but was fine for our one night. It has your basic amenities and was clean, but it's certainly not luxurious. We we didn't spend too much time in the apartment so it was fine for us, but just be aware that you're paying for the view.

You can’t beat the view and location, the neighborhood is so cute and loved the view of the Eiffel Tower! Just know that it is small and the bed is a pull out couch. Not ideal for a long stay but great for the one night we stayed there!!!
The best place to be around Eiffel Tour, just a couple of meters away from the main tower it is incredible !
Amazing Location! The view is breathtaking. Close to many food and shopping places. Eiffel Tower is pretty much out side your door. Highly Recommend. Walking Distance to other attractions
Million dollar views of the Eiffel Tower in a comfortable and clean space.
The view from this apartment is spectacular. If you are looking for a special place to stay in Paris, this is the place to go to!
Great view of the tower especially at night! Philipe is quick to respond and very helpful.

The location of this place is unbeatable!!! Walking distance to the Eiffel Tower and many cafes and restaurants along the way.
The only warning I would put out there is the elevator to get upstairs is VERY small, one person at a time, which was fine for us, but if you're a bigger person you would have to climb 6 flights of stairs.
Great views. Easy communication and a stellar location for a quick stay in Paris. Would come back here in the future!

The location was amazing!! We were able to walk 2 minutes every evening and enjoy seeing the tower light up. And very central, next to some cute places to eat. However, the hide a bed was not pictured, and very uncomfortable to sleep on.

The apartment is in a good location, close to the Eiffel Tower, the view from the window is ok, you actually need to get out to have a super close look to the Eiffel Tower.
Unfortunately the sofa-bed was broken and we couldn’t rest well. And the last day while packing up we found a bug in the sofa.
The apartment is in the 6th floor, but the small elevator only goes all the way up to the 5th floor.
The host was responsive, and kind. But he only said sorry when we mentioned the broken sofa instead of looking for a way to fix it. I had to request money back. 
Hopefully the host will get a new sofa and future guests will have a great experience.

Phillipe is a great communicator. The studio has almost everything you need. Except soap. You can't see the Eiffel Tower from the left window and for the right sided window, unless you open the window and bend over to look to your left, you can't see the tower. The view is amazing, but it's very uncomfortable to stay in that position for longer that a few seconds. The couch was miserable and above all, very uncomfortable! (it's not the same couch as in the pics). This building also has the smallest elevator in the world. It's probably 3 by 1 feet, but it takes you where you need to be.

Exactly as described! Nothing fancy but very clean, spectacular view, easy check in, and an overall great experience. It was 90 degrees the first day of our trip and the fan with the windows open stayed very comfortable. And as per Phillipe’s recommendation, we took Le Bus Direct from the airport and it was so easy to take get to and from CDG and a less than ten min walk to the apartment from the bus stop.

El departamento en sí mismo es lo suficiente para pasar pocos días en París, sin embargo la limpieza deja mucho que desear, el edredón que utiliza parece que nunca lo lava, puesto que está con manchas de secreciones, incluso sanguinolentas, a lo que el anfitrión responde que él sabe cuáles son las reglas y que como hay un cubre edredón eso es suficiente. Por otro lado no cumplió tampoco con tener el departamento listo a la hora de check in, de hecho la señora de limpieza llegó inmediatamente después que nosotras (que llegamos 45 minutos después de la hora de check in) y realizó una "limpieza" de 20 minutos así que en 20 minutos poco pudo hacer por el departamento, todos los muebles estaban empolvados, no aspiró la alfombra, que de por sí hace rato ameritaba una lavada y había platos sucios en los reposteros. El sofá cama está bastante sucio y deteriorado, los cojines huelen mal, el soporte está completamente vencido y la espuma gastada. Otra incomodidad es el ascensor  estrecho y sobre todo porque hay que subir del sexto al séptimo piso a través de una escalera estrecha. La vista es espectacular si sacas medio cuerpo por la ventana, eso es lo mejor del departamento.
Wow. The view is worth the stay. This tiny apartment has so much charm. When you look out the window you feel like you can touch the Eiffel Tower.

Philippe’s home is the place you dream about when visiting Paris. The location absolutely cannot be beat! The view from the window is incredible day or night... who doesn’t want to watch the Eiffel Tower lights from the comfort of your own unobstructed home view?! Philippe himself is warm and kind. He was responsive about the smallest details making my trip even more comfortable! The bathroom is also larger than most I’ve experienced in Europe and while the bed is on the smaller side (sofa bed), you’re not in the city of Paris to spend all day in bed! Highly recommend staying in Philippe’s home for an incredible, unforgettable experience.
Perfect location!

What can I say, you want an amazing place close to Eiffel Tower? Well you can’t get much closer than this! Philippe was an excellent host and was very on top of and quick with communication.  We had no problem at all getting in and throughly enjoyed our stay there. There currently is a pull out sofa bed in the room to sleep on that is in bad shape and not good to sleep on. We put the mattress on the floor and that worked out great. Other than that our stay was an absolute DREAM COME TRUE and we couldn’t have had a better host! 9.9/10!
This is the second time we have stayed here for a night in Paris. It is the perfect place to rest your feet for the night in the most amazing location in the city. I would recommend staying here.

Pros:
-Bragging rights with a view of the Eiffel Tower.
-Close to Rue Cler street for convenient access to bakeries and shops
-Really neat old building with a courtyard and steep narrow steps, as well as the smallest elevator you’ll ever see!

Cons:
-Fold out bed which is not very comfortable
-Somewhat far from Metro stations. 

The room had not been cleaned when we arrived due to an issue with whoever Philippe uses to clean the place. Philippe responded very quickly and sent someone else to clean it while we were out. We enjoyed looking out at the Eiffel Tower each night, so it was worth staying there for that alone. But I hope he replaces the bed soon. There’s a broken spar in the middle of the folding frame which allows the bed to sag. We ended up taking the advice of another reviewer and placing the mattress on the floor to sleep.

Great location. Wonderful host, very easy to communicate with. The apartment is spacious enough, clean and modern. The sofa bed fits two, but is not comfortable. The elevator, while modern, is so tiny. If you are claustrophobic you will need to take the winding staircase which is 7 floors up. The view from the window of the Eiffel Tower is spectacular. All in all, for the price and location, this was an amazing find!

Beware! This place doesn’t have a view! It doesn’t event have a bed to sleep on (the sofa is broken, we had the worst night here during our stay in Europe - couldn’t sleep). 
You can potentially see the tower if you are willing to risk your life walking on a gutter - the view provided by the host is not what you will see from the windows. 
There’s no air conditioning, just a fan. 
There isn’t even a bulb under the door - complete darkness! Shady place.
Philippe’s place is in a great location with a fantastic view of the Eiffel Tower. We had a pleasant, brief stay.
I loved Philippe’s place right next to the Eiffel Tower. The fold out bed is pretty comfy for a fold out bed and the view was much better than the pictures
Great location. Very clean and Philippe was good at communication. The apartment is not so big but big enough for a couple max. Again, great location.
A great little apartment with an amazing view of the Eiffel Tower. Great location, we walked to most places that we wanted to see. I even liked the very cosy lift! Recommended.
Excelente vista.

The internet did not work and obviously has not for a while according to previous reviews. Phillipe totally ignored our request to fix the issue. The toilet was dirty when we arrived.  There were two hair dryers, but neither were 220 voltage, which we had a good laugh about. Otherwise, the location is amazing. The bed is not as bad as other reviews say.

There is no air conditioning as originally advertised when we booked. The WiFi didn’t work while we were there and Philippe hung up on us while trying to troubleshoot and we never heard from him again until he asked when we were leaving. Completely unacceptable. It is close to the Eiffel Tower so if that’s all you care about, it could be fine for you.

Philippe’s place is exactly what you bargain for. A perfect sweet and cozy room with an absolutely incredible view of the Eiffel Tower. It’s clean, feels bigger than it looks, and is perfect for a sweet and short trip.
Location is amazing place could be more clean

The view is PHENOMENAL! My husband and I watched the Eiffel Tower show many times each night right from the window! While the space may be small, the view is so large it makes it all worth it! We are still talking about how our stay here! Philippe is a great host and even let us drop our bags of early! He was quick with communication and eager to help!
Absolutely Beautiful view of Eiffel Tower and great location.  Great cafe's and gift shops across the apartment  Easy Access to bus stops and taxis .
We had a wonderful few days in Paris. Philippe’s place has an amazing view of the Eiffel Tower and we loved watching the light show at night!

Phillippe’s Airbnb is my French life goals. It is in the dreamiest, safest most pretty looking neighbourhood. As a female I felt very safe walking around this neighbourhood by myself at all times. I would truly say it’s the best of the best in Paris in terms of feeling safe. It’s too good to be true when you look out the window straight at the whole eiffle tower , which is literally like 100 metres away. The minute you are down on the street BAM you are at the eiffle tower. It is an incredible, surreal feel. I can’t wait to go back

The MOST spectacular view of the Eiffel Tower you could ever hope to have, but it is quite a tiny space. At night, the tower lights twinkle for about 5 minutes on the hour. The bed is a fold out couch. The elevator is tiny, but do-able if you’re not claustrophobic. Beware of tourist trap restaurants The waiters at the Bistrot de la Tour across the street were very kind to us. You must get the Pan au chocolate! For better restaurants make your way to the Rue de Cler and try La Petit Cler. Get there around 8pm before all the locals who eat closer to 9pm.  The double decker (Big Bus) bus is a great way to get your bearings around town & see everything ftom up higher. There’s a stop right in front of the Eiffel Tower facing the river. Get to Monmarte if you can! If you don’t have time for the Louvre & prefer something smaller, get the combined pass for the Muse de Orsay & L’Orangerie. You won’t regret it!
Philippe was quick to answer my questions and was very helpful. His place was clean and had an amazing view of Eiffel Tower. Highly recommended.
Perfect for first timer in Paris!

The thing about this little apartment is... it is in a great location and the view is simply amazing. My daughters had never been to Paris and we could not get enough of the Eiffel Tower. 
The place is small. The elevator is small. The stair case is steep and .... you guessed it. Small. 
We did have some struggle with the bed the first night. 
( you must use the red strap to pull the bed out from the top) it is not a pull out bed like here in America.  Philippe was so kind to come help us at almost midnight. Thank you Philippe!! 
Paris was hot the two days we were there. The fan in the room helped. We did open the windows but a few bugs came in so we closed the window. Lol 
The bed had issues. We ended up pulling the mattress off and putting it on the floor. 
We had to close the pull out to do this. ( the place is small) 
Now the shower was actually really good. Good water pressure. Lots of room in the shower. 
I stayed two nights with my two daughters. 
I think one to two grown adults for a few nights is perfect. 
Just know you will not have much room. 
I think a luggage rack might help?? Not sure where you could put it? Lol. 
We loved our time in this beautiful city. We stayed so busy all day into the night. 
For our stay... this was perfect!!

The good, beautiful view, beautiful apartment, fantastic location. 

The bad. The bed is horrible, and completely broken in one spot. We ended up pulling the mattress off the bed entirely and sleeping on the floor. When you travel, the only thing you're really using a room for is storing your things, showering, and sleeping. So I feel this is unacceptable. A cheap bed from Ikea could easily remedy this problem, if the owner wanted to.
The best view. We loved staying here. Will stay again

Philippe’s place was perfect. The view was incredible and breathtaking. The space was small but worked perfectly for myself and my boyfriend. The bed is a pull out mattress but it worked well for a few days. There are lots of steps if you don’t want to take the elevator but not bad. Highly recommend.

Philippe was Very accommodating with check in time. View from the flat is simply spectacular. Bed was very uncomfortable though. 
Overall great experience.

We loved our stay! Right in the heart of Paris, it really is right next to the Eiffel Tower. Philippe made check in really easy! I will warn that there are narrow stairs and the elevator is small, which wasn’t a problem at all for us but I know that it might be for some. The space was clean and within walking distance to great shopping and places to eat!
The View Is amazing, you can see the Eiffel tower from the window and there are many restaurants outside, it is an incredible apartment if you come with your love one.
Beautiful place to stay!
Small but good for solo or couple. Excellent location and extremely easy to get to from the airport!

The apartment is very small (as expected) but from the pictures I didn’t think the bed was a pull out mattress. Was very uncomfortable. Fridge had left over food (jam, ice cream). No hand soap in bathroom or for cleaning dishes. Stairs are very narrow and elevator is (reallllllly compact 180kg max) or death might occur! That was scary. 

Otherwise, location was very nice, really close to Eiffel Tower, don’t know if I could book for that area again. Everything is closed early - except crazy expensive tourist traps. So if you come in late and you’re starving, you’ll have to settle for a really expensive dinner or nothing at all. 

Yeah unfortunately the Eiffel Tower being really close was the only great thing about it.

The view is amazing and worth the price of admission. Just a small pad, but exactly what I needed traveling solo, but would be fine for a couple as well. He was helpful with responses as well. Go for it!
Great view

The location was perfect! It was so close to the Eiffel Tower. The apartment is perfect for one or two nights, it was small but we knew that before booking, and it had a couch bed that wasn't very comfortable. Check in was easy and the apartment was easy to find. We would recommend this apartment for a couple or one person staying in Paris for one or two nights and who wants to be next to the Eiffel Tower.
Everything was fine, amazing view to the Eiffel Tower. Remember to look there at 1am vor 5 minutes. You won't forget...

Fue una buena experiencia!! No puedo decir excelente porque es un poco incómodo el sofá cama y ruidoso, el elevador muy muy muy pequeño y hay escaleras que todo junto complica el subir con 3-4 maletas, fuera de eso la verdad es perfecto!! La ubicación excelente!! Siempre agua caliente y con buena presión, limpio, tuvimos un problema con las sábanas pero se aclaró de inmediato y me ayudó a tener una mejor experiencia!! La comunicación es buena... muy buena opción para paris!!

Amazing view of the Eiffel Tower, actually took my breath away. Bed was comfy and space was clean. Great shower. Getting up to the apartment was a little confusing but Phillipe’s instructions made it super easy. Beware of tiny tiny elevator

Check kitchen tools before buying any groceries. Other then that, the stay was absolutely wonderful and a phenomenal location to the Eiffel tower. Poke your head out the window to view the tower and all of it's glory.

Tiny and cozy place, the view of the Eiffel Tower is great but really not practical since you half of your body needs to be outside the window. The location seems ideal at first but during the night could become somewhat dangerous. One final detail is going up and down, the lift is very tiny and still you need to carry the bags manually for 1 complete floor.
Perfect view and location! Everything was as described and expected! My tip to travelers would be to put the pullout bed mattress on the floor, its more comfy that way :)
Very clean and beautiful. Super convenient location!

We stayed for one night and loved it! Great view of the tower and great location. Place is very small but perfect for a solo traveler or couple. Also, there are a few stairs to climb once you take the elevator. I would definitely recommend to friends!
Excelente Ubicación y la vista a la Torre es ESPECTACULAR
Phillipe was easy to contact and the place is as described. Optimal for anyone interested in the eiffel tower and the area. Place was tidy and cozy for 2. The view is worth it!
We very loved this place.

Do not book this room unless you like ants, a filthy sofa which is also a sofa bed and only a full size which is uneven and kills your back. Make sure you don’t mind walking up 2 flights of stairs. Make sure if you don’t have hot water that you check the fuse box and flip a switch. If you want to put on make up and have good lighting forget about it because the lights above the mirror don’t turn on. The standing lamp near the couch also didn’t work even after we plugged it in.
The view is amazing and location is perfect !
Localização fantástica, imperdível!
Location was absolutely amazing! Cozy little place that is Perfect for a one or two night stay for 1 or 2 people.

What a gem!  The apartment is in a quaint older building so close to the Eiffel Tower you’d think you could touch it.  The  photos are accurate - if you lean out the window, your view of the tower is absolutely amazing. The apartment was clean, tidy, and charming. 
Because it’s in an older building, it’s small and the staircase is narrow, and you’ll need to walk up the last flight of  stairs. If you’re looking for a small super convenient apartment with an incredible view, then look into Philippe’s place.
It’s a great place that we’ll recommend to our friends.

Fantastic loft right next to The EIFFEL Tower. You can watch the light show from out the window every hour. Building is a bit older but the location can not be beat. You have to climb up stairs so big luggage is hard to handle here. Thank you Philippe for the great stay.

I love Philippe apartment. Is cozy and the Eiffel tower view is amazing. you may follow my insta account to see how amazing Philippe apartment.

insta: summerrain_lkf 

all the check in and check out information was clear and smooth. cant deny, Philippe response rate is very quick and accurate.

for 1st experience, I love the little llift in this apartment. I fell down when I opem the lift door, as I am careless and never notice the staircase right in front of the lift door. but I love it. is fun to explore Parisan local house. good experience.

Philippe also guide us on how to go airport from his place. the info is useful.

defintitely worth to stay again when I visit to Paris next time.

thanks Philippe for everything.
Perfect location. If you read description and know what to expect then there will be no surprises. Perfect for 1 person. 2 people will work also.

Check in was super easy and flexible. We had a very pleasant stay in Paris, the location of the apartment is exceptional and the view of the Eiffel Tower is even better. The apartment was very clean and had everything you could need for a short stay in Paris.
Best location for Eiffel view that you can find at this price. Highly recommended.
一次十分不可思议的居住体验,就在埃菲尔铁塔脚下｡
房子地段很好,出门就是埃菲尔铁塔,但是电梯很小,一次只能容纳一人,如果像我们这样拿大件行李需要分批然行李先上去,餐具没有很齐全,床是需要把沙发变形的床,我们那天晚上风有点大,窗被吹得很响｡都是一些小问题,关键房东人很好,房间还算整洁,地段是可以说非常好的,所以总体还算可以

Philippe’s place was amazing and clean. To be able to view the Eiffel Tower from our window was a highlight and worth the price. I agree with other reviewers  recommendation on it being ideal for 1-2 ppl and for a few nights. It was perfect for our needs and I would gladly stay again!
Philippe was so helpful with everything and he make sure everything in his apartment was perfect for us . The area was perfect and the area was amazing .

Want to walk outside your door to the Eiffel tower?? This is the place! Philippe has a great flat steps from the tower, you can even see it from your window. A full kitchen and storage space, clean bathroom and a secure building. The elevator is a little small but it's still a treasure as most building don't have one. We highly recommend this flat when you're in Paris!

Amazing views. You can’t beat this
Worth the stay so close to the Eiffel Tower. Great host and really quick responder.
Great view of the Eiffel tower! Location is great and close to cafes for food. The apartment is a good size and does have hot water and a small kitchen. Everything was as advertised.

First time in Paris, and was looking for something close to the Eiffel Tower. This was a perfect location, however the price reflects the location. The house is small as a box, the pull out couch is hard and very uncomfortable, that I ended up making a bed on the floor. This would be a good choice for anyone willing to spend more on location and doesn’t care about space or being comfortable

Bela vista da Torre Eiffel, embora a foto parece ter uma varanda que não existe
Desconfortável subir de escadas com mala
We had a great time here, the place is RIGHT NEAR the Eiffel Tower, fun experience, we loved it! Great experience with Philippe- we would choose it again easily!
Amazing view, not so amazing bed
AMAZING location! Very central to many sites. Right next to Eiffel Tower and very quick walk to the Seine

Perfect location, amazing view, and nice space! Just a warning for other users: the bed is very creaky, any little move makes a noise. Other than that, I couldn’t have asked for a better stay! Philippe responded promptly and was a great host! Would recommend.

The view is everything about this place. You put your head out the window and you get the most perfect view of the Eiffel Tower which makes this place a true joy to stay. The bed is a fold out sofa which could be problematic if you're staying longer than a few nights and while the room is small, its good enough for a short stay in Paris. The location is wonderful, literally right next to the tower and near many metro stations to get you all around Paris. Philippe's communication was great and he responded quickly to any queries. Would highly recommend this place simply for the view and location. It will be hard to find a better view and location for the price.
Absolutely a perfect location for a romantic night in Paris!
Amazing views!!!! The pictures don’t do it justice. Everything was perfect and check in was easy.

Apartment location was great. Philippe was a great host, place was clean and up to standard. Only thing wrong was, it was a pull out couch not a bed. Was so uncomfortable and hard to sleep. Pillows were terrible as well. We spent 2 nights and our backs hurt.

Location, location, location. The view of the Eiffel Tower is spectacular. The room was clean, and provided what was needed for a quick one night stay. The bathroom is surprisingly large for such a small space. I would recommend this space for the traveller who need 1-2 nights in Paris, with an incredible location, but doesn't plan to spend too much time in the room, as it is very small. Who comes to Paris to sit in their room anyways?

Must admit that this studio has the amazing view of Eiffel Tower. But, the elevator is ridiculous as the other guests have mentioned. It is an old building, so keep in mind that if you have a heavy luggage like me, it's really difficult to carry it up to the 7th floor. You only have an access to the elevator up to the 6th floor then have to walk up to the 7th floor. My friend had to jump on the top of the luggage in order to fit in the elevator. The elevator is SMALL. It's beyond your imagination. The bathroom is clean and spacious than I thought. But, I have seen hairs and some dirts on the blanket/mattress/pillow. My friend had to put the towel on the mattress because she was really cautious about the cleanliness. Also, Philippe did not tell me that there will be someone in the morning who will drop off some towels for the next guests before my check out. It was a surprising visit and I was scared when someone knocked on the door in the morning.
We loved our stay at the Eiffel Tower flat. Amazing views of Paris and centrally located. We would definitely stay again. Everything was clean and accommodating.

La ubicación del departamento es inmejorable puedes estar viendo la torre a un lado tuyo, el departamento tiene lo necesario para una o dos personas no más, cuentas con lo indispensable pensando que siempre estarás paseando en Paris. Si no tienes buena condición física o tienes fobia a elevadores reducidos debes tenerlo en cuenta pero por lo demás es genial
great location v small however Philippe  was v accommodating and let us drop our bags earlier
La comunicación siempre rápida y buena. La vista increíble,  servicios y limpieza excelentes. Sólo la cama es algo incómoda y ruidosa. Todo lo demás está muy bien.
So close to the Eiffel Tower! I could not imagine being any closer

This place was great! You honestly can’t beat the price. I was solo traveling and was only going to be in Paris for one night. This is literally STEPS away from the exit of the Eiffel Tower. The view is absolutely amazing. The studio is small but was just right for one or two people. The lift was very, very small and the staircase is very narrow but that’s to be expected in Paris. I would definitely stay here again.

We had a poor time at Philippe’s place. 

First, while the location and views were great, he did not provide adequate instructions for check-in until I prompted him the day before. The instructions he provided were murky; his listing does not tell guests that they will have to either climb 7 flights of a spiral staircase or take an egregiously slow and small elevator (fits maybe 1 person). This was horrible, as we were tired and had heavy luggage.

Secondly, the room was small and uncomfortable. Philippe did not provide basics, such as coffee or tea, and the bed and pillows were so uncomfortable. I had assumed the bed was an actual bed when looking at the listing, but no, it is an uncomfortable and creaky pull-out couch.

Lastly, Philippe was flaky on his promises. Previously, he stated that we would be able to keep our luggage in the room/apartment building post check-out. I further enquired about this a week before our stay, and he said we could, but provided no details. The night before we were to check-out and store our bags in the room or apartment building, Philippe redacted his statement and told us to use a bag-storing company. He then proceeded to tell us that we should have known by checking when his next guests where coming (which, as other guests and not the host, we cannot do!). Needless to say, I was extremely annoyed.
The  best location you can get in Paris for the value!!! The view from the window was absolutely breathtaking! Would highly recommend to anyone.
excelente ubicacion
Muy buen ubicado a una cuadra De la Torre Eiffel. Al asomarte por la ventana la tienes justo al lado. El apartamento es algo pequeño pero si lo que  buscas es estar cerca De la Torre es perfecto.
Amazing location! Eiffel Tower is right nearby and we were able to walk easily to many other sites like Notre Dame, Arc du Triumph, etc.
Preisverhältnis viel zu teuer, nur wegen der aussicht. Sonst zimmer ist im mässigen Zustand.
Amazing! would do it again!
thanks we enjoyed the great view. wish we could stay longer. a view to die for!

Open your window and look out to your left. It’s truly a wonderful location.  I wouldn’t plan on spending much time in the apartment and the intention of that is clear with the quaint setup. The fun is outside.
great location!

the location is perfect! I was really awwed. But the only thing is the elevator only fits 1 person and we go back and forth to get our luggages one by one. and you have to walk the stairs one floor up. It would be better if bed is changed. Its so squeaky. Every time we move its squeaking. Overall its a very beautiful view. Especially at night.

Great Location for the price. Phillipe was very attentive and would respond in a timely manner. The view is spectacular and you are close to every mode of transportation in this great city.  There was an incident with one of the residents on the first floor due to a misunderstanding,  however this is out of the control of the host.  The neighbor was not too fond of people waiting around in the small front yard inside the gate. Let's just say she was not very respectful so we did our best to avoid any conflict. Phillipe handled this very well and again nothing against him or his place. This is more of a precaution to avoid any future conflicts with the residents, host, and travelers.  Once again great place and I would book for a 2d time!

We had an amazing stay. The place was exactly how we imagined with the view we wanted. The only difficulty was the stairs and elevator but as along as you are fit they are not a problem. Philippe was a great host and very helpful in adjusting my booking and provided accurate directions that made finding his place easy.
Loved the space! Our eurotrain got in early and he let us leave our bags to site see. Great location! Great view! Great value.

Un lugar muy lindo, bastante tranquilo, pero sobre todo, lo máximo, una vista espectacular!! 
Totalmente recomendable!
Super schnelle Antworten tolle Lage netter Kontakt :) keine Probleme beim Check in alles super gewesen :) gerne wieder (:

Philippe's flat is definitely a must stay at location when visiting Paris. Hands down one of the best views of the Eiffel Tower, especially at NIGHT! The flat was very clean and had all the basic amenities. We will be staying here again :-)

The place is exactly as the photos. You could not be more close to the Eiffel tower than this, you can see it half block from the window. Amazing view. Incredible. The place is clean and hd everything needed for a couple on a trip.
if you are on the top flat, it’l take you strenght, 150steps to climb, once you put the key in, push on it before you start turning it!!?

This apartment had a lot of positives and a lot of negatives: 

The view is really truly incredible once you poke your head out far and look left from the window and so really only one person can enjoy the view at a time, while standing up. The light show is just the most magical thing you will see hourly , especially the last one at 1am. The apartment is the most dreamiest building with a hysterically small lift but we just appreciated having a lift since those are so scarce in Paris. You do need to take one flight (about 20 steps) from the 6th floor to the 7th. Check in was very easy as long as you follow instructions. Uber is easy to catch as the street is a limited road with little traffic. The location of the unit is impeccable! Just literally seconds to the base of the tower with tons of cafes and boulangeries in the area.

However, our stay in the unit could have been easily a 5/5 if the host just took a little more attention to easy fixes. The biggest thing for me is cleanliness and quality of bed. Albeit I know it is a sofa bed, a  lot of airbnb's we've stayed in had pull out couches or futons, all very comfortable or reasonably so. But, this one sinks down and has no support in the springs> I felt like I was in a college dorm. It really isn't too too bad if you stay here for just one night, but if you want to stay longer, it can be problematic. The rug in the space is very dirty and there was hair everywhere. Sheets were stained and towels well used. Thankfully there was tons of toilet paper but the toilet has this odd flush to it where toilet paper gets stuck on the sides because such little water runs down.  For how often this place gets bookings, it's a pity the host doesn't just spend some of that income to invest in a proper bed that's not so worn out and dirty. 

 I have stayed at a lot of Airbnb's and I rarely complain, but I was very disappointed with the lack of care in the bed and cleaning quality. Most importantly, disappointed with the ability to enjoy the view from the room. Mind as well just go downstairs and enjoy it in person, which is why this place gets 5/5 for the location!
The lift is really small, only able to fit 2 slim persons or 1 person + hand carry luggage, and you need to climb from 6 to 7th story... location not bad,10-15 mins walk to nearest metro station

Location, Location, Location! This flat is a few steps away from the Eiffel Tower and you can even see the tower by poking your head out of the window. My wife and I mainly needed a place with great location where we can leave our luggage, sleep and shower and Philippe’s flat was perfect. Public transportation and restaurants are also very close. Yes, the bed is a sofa bed but if you are out exploring Paris all day it does the trick. The elevator is tiny so if you pack a lot be prepared to take a few trips up the elevator. Thanks Philippe we hope to visit Paris again and stay at your place.
The view was outstanding

Very small space, but perfect for a place to drop your things and see Paris.  The apartment is on the 7th floor; lift only goes to the 6th, so if you’re mobility-impaired, this is not the place for you (I only say that because my husband had a stroke and he would not have been able to navigate the narrow, curved stairs between the 6th and 7th floors). The apartment was the perfect temperature in the cool October weather; it probably gets pretty toasty during the summer.  Area is surprisingly quiet at night; the fold-out sofa bed is suitable since you’ll probably be exhausted if you’ve been walking around Paris all day.  Be sure to look for the SINGLE wooden door—with the door handle in the middle—for entrance to the ground floor of the building.  The larger, double doors go elsewhere.
Definitely make sure you stay up for the last light show of the night on the tower! Close to tons of cute cafes too!
flat hasta el piso 7 del edificio de departamentos a media cuadra de la torre eiffel (y con una vista inmejorable) espacio justo para dos personas. todo ok. buena opción si vas en plan romantico...

You can’t go wrong with the location, the view of the Eiffel Tower was spectacular. Local restaurants and shops right next door, and easy access to public transportation. There is an elevator but it’s small so prepare for individual trips, but it sure beats taking the winding stairs 7 floors. My only downside was the pull out bed, I’m a big guy (6ft6 270) and it was a bit small for a person my size, let alone to share, we made due, but that’s my only complaint.
Centrally located and a very clean, open space. We would definitely recommend staying here on your visit to Reims.
Departamento típico de París, pequeño pero confortable, la ubicación es inmejorable, Phillipe es un anfitrión de primera, lo recomiendo sin reservas.

A view you will never forget!!!! I loved this view from the pictures, but when I saw it in person it was even better than I imagined! Keep in mind the elevator is small/there are some stairs if you are not physically able to. The place was very clean, bed was comfortable, right next to the tower, and BEAUTIFUL views of such a BEAUTIFUL city!!!! Thank you again Philippe!
Very clean nice space! Philippe was very prompt in replies! He let us check in early and the best part is that the Eiffel Tower is 3 minutes away walking!

Philippe was a very understanding host and communicating with him was quick. He was kind enough to work with us on checking in and we appreciated that. Futon was not bad for 1 night and the room is perfect for 2. Lots and lots of stairs but elevator available. The view is stunning and completely worth it. Great great Parisian neighborhood that you would expect from your Parisian living fantasies. Lots of bistros, restaurants and marts near by. There is a wonderful Asian restaurant very near by with a beautiful Eiffel tower view and great food, Chez Ming, you must try. We are so glad we stayed it was the perfect last night in Paris. I recommend it.

The view at Philippe’s is incredible and this is why we chose to stay here for our first visit to Paris. It did not disappoint. The proximity to the Eiffel tour is amazing. The place itself is small but we did not intend to spend much time at the flat. We just wanted a clean place to sleep with the great view. The bed is a pullout couch. This is a compromise we had to make for the location. It was pretty well worn unfortunately, but with our jet lag we slept fine. We never met Philippe but he was readily available via phone and email as needed. Overall we really enjoyed our stay here and would recommend to low maintenance people who want to enjoy this view before they go to sleep and when they wake up in Paris.
A little apartment in a great location
Wow, location was sensational. The view from the apartment was amazing!

Philippe's place has an amazing view of the Eiffel tower and that was the main reason we booked it. The sofa bed isn't the most comfortable but we already knew that from previous reviews. If it's the view you are after (like us) and are in Paris for a short visit then Philippe's place is the perfect place.

Philippe was a wonderful host, he was very prompt in responding to my questions. 
This is a great place in a great location with a breathtaking view.... it was even better than the pictures. 
I would definitely stay here again.
The best possible view of the Eiffel Tower you could ever wish for! Cosy space and very central to all big “ must see” places !

The location was perfect and the view of the Eiffel Tower if you stick your head out and look left is better (and cheaper) than any view staying at a hotel would give u. We were steps away from the base of the Eiffel Tower and were able to walk to Trocadéro for great views of the tower. Also plenty of restaurants and markets near by. Easy to find for uber pick up and we used the hop on hop off bus service to get around, we didn’t use to metro or anything but I think it’s also close by. Location was perfect for us like I said. As far as the flat, we stayed two nights and it was enough for me. It was smaller than I expected. The bed is a not very comfortable pull out couch but my main complaint is that the sheets did not smell nor feel very clean. It had an old musty smell. Didn’t smell like fresh laundry or clean.. Once the bed was pulled out the room was very small but it was fine cus we just slept there. The shower is small but the water temperature and pressure was great.  This is just my honest review of the place, but as far as communication with Philippe he was very nice, responsive and made the check in very easy. We still enjoyed our stay especially because the location made eating and getting around much easier for us.
Great Airbnb!  Great location.  The bed is a pullout couch, we were not expecting.  Comfortable, but not ideal.  Phillippe was very quick with messaging, which was great.
A+++ location next to the Eiffel Tower, it is visible from the room. Philippe also provides quick replies and makes check-in & check-out very easy. Would recommend to all traveling to Paris
View was amazing. Great host. Finding the place was easy getting in wasn’t too hard. Small elevator.  Didn’t spend too much time in the room but I was happy with it.
The view was amazing

Philippe was incredibly quick to respond when we were in a bind for a place to stay. His place with the view of the Eiffel Tower is absolutely amazing. The space is small, but could not be more perfect for a couple traveling and staying for a short period of time. We were so grateful to have he opportunity to have a fantastic view of the tower. Would recommend this place to anyone who wants a romantic evening next to the iconic Eiffel Tower.
Amazing ,  view worth booking. First time in Paris was a memorable one.
The place couldn’t be in a better location, and the host was very nice and flexible!
Ideal place for a short stay. You cannot beat the view of the Eiffel tower from this apartment.

Everything was just about what we expected. Clean and a great location. And the views! Just WOW! Literally a few steps from the Eiffel Tower!! We walked from here to Arc de Triomphe and Champs Elysees. Near a lot of restaurants and about a 10 minute walk to/from the Le Bus Direct bus stop.
We loved staying at Philippe’s place in Paris! Probably as close as you can get to the Eiffel Tower. Very convenient to many locations!

This place was well worth the money. The view of the tower was incredible and the apartment was in a nice area with cafes and markets just around the corner. Philippe was an amazing host and even went above and beyond to help my girlfriend get her medication sent from the states when she wasn’t feeling well.

The view was amazing. Perfect location to the Eiffel Tower. The place was small and the bed is a pull out. It had its own bathroom which was nice, with a big shower and toilet. 

Would definitely recommend for the view alone.
Excellent location description was accurate. The view was amazing would definitely stay here again.
The place exceeded our dreams and was absolutely magical! The view of the Eiffel Tower was spectacular and we can’t wait to come back to visit!!!

This place was FABULOUS!!  The view is absolutely breathtaking!  There are no words to describe it.  This was my first time to Paris, and I brought my 5 year old son.  The location was easy to access food and lots of awesome things within walking distance!  You will see reviews about the elevator being small, that is not an understandtatement.  It is very tiny.  It didn’t pose a problem for us though.  I would HIGHLY recommend this place to anyone traveling and wanting to see Paris!!!
Great value. Very close to the Eiffel Tower. Very small and the bed is an old pull out couch. Overall the location is amazing and it's a great place if you are just sleeping there.

The view is excellent. Prior descriptions are accurate. However,  given the chance I wouldn't stay at this property again. We notified Philippe about an ant issue and his blase response was this was due to the heat. I refer you to a review from a prior guest Paige, May 2018 and her issue with ants and Philippe's nasty response to her. Also, there are no chairs. You either have to sit on the sofa or the floor.  In addition, the lamp shades have burn marks and there is paint that is peeling on the ceiling in several spots.
Phillipe is wonderful to work with! I have stayed at his place twice now and will be coming back. The location and view is outstanding and he is very easy going and flexible!
Amazing view!

The view was gorgeous once you stuck your head out of the window and turned to the left. The place is tiny but clean. No a/c but apparently this is common in France. It just happened to be sooooo hot when I was there. The key was very hard to get to work and there had to be a special way you pushed t in and turned it to the left to get it to open. This would have been helpful to know because at first I thought it was the wrong key. Overall, very happy with my stay. The location was absolutely incredible and the building felt pretty safe as there was an entry code to get in. The elevator is the tiniest one I have ever seen which was a little claustrophobic to say the least but worth the view!!
Philippe was great, very willing to accommodate check in and check out times. The location is unbelievable too. Amazing view of the Eiffel Tower from the window. Highly recommend.

Beautiful view of the Eiffel from outside the window. A lot of construction going on around the Eiffel at the moment. But easy to get around & plenty of dining options in & around the area. Would definitely recommend.

Much Smaller than it looks in the photos, to get to the apartment there’s an elevator for 1 person(without bags), the blankets where dirty and had blood... terrible experience!!! Can’t believe he’s a super host, just be careful

The pictures don't lie: it is a tiny space. But the thing with this apartment is the view. IT'S ALL ABOUT THE VIEW! Ok, you can't see the Tower seated on the couch, but IT'S NOT as some people said - you don't need to do a huge maneuver to see it, you just have to look outside the window. And it's totally worth it. During the day or by night it's fantastic, and to be able to enjoy the night light show from the window was a big plus.
About the lift: thank God there's one, but, yes, it's REALLY small - the tiniest I ever seen - but enough to send our luggages up/down and to use it to arrive and leave the apartment. Low point: it's only to the 6th floor and you have to carry your things to the 7th.
We basically used the apartment only to sleep and take a shower for one night; the self check in was really easy and was overall a good experience. Recommended!

This apartment is small, 2 people only but perfect for those who want a central base. My daughter & I booked Phillipe’s apartment for a girls trip & had an amazing time. 
We are both slightly claustrophobic & only used the tiny life to shuttle our belongings through the floors, we panted up the 233 stairs to the apartment at the end of every day looking at it as a further workout after eating well each day. 
The view is amazing - we have some beautiful photos & memories that will stay with us forever.
Great spot! Wonderful view!

Wow wow . Eiffel Tower is right there so big and wonderful . It was an amazing night . Everything is as said . Lounge is the bed . No other seats only one room . Elevator small but I fit with my bags however 20 more stairs up to apartment . Tricky if you can’t carry your luggage . But the view is the best in town need to be standing at the window to watch it but that’s what I did from 11 pm to 1 am when the lights go out . Recommend if you love the Eiffel Tower

We had an amazing stay at Philippe’s place. The location could not have been better! Watching the Eiffel Tower light up at night from the comfort of the apartment was really incredible. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a great Parisian experience. The food in the area was also great. Hope to be back soon!

Outstanding view..
The studio is just like in the picture, comfortable bed, clean and with an amazing view of the Eiffel Tower, Philippe was very attentive with us.
Near all the sightseeing. Excellent for a couple. I totally recommend this place. Thank you Philippe
Loved staying at Philippe's place! The view was absolutely AMAZING! It was in a great location and the apartment was the perfect size for my boyfriend and I. We loved it.

We enjoyed our stay. This is a small Airbnb, but that's pretty obvious from the pictures. It was fine for the two of us. The pull out couch wasn't the most comfortable, but we were so tired from walking around all day so we didn't mind that much. Philippe was responsive, and the location of the Airbnb was great.

The place is great for anyone who wants to experience Paris by looking out their window and seeing a full, clear, and up close view of the Eiffel Tower.  
Phillipe was a wonderful host.  
Highly recommended.

Good: location, communication, check-in, and view were fantastic

Not so good: view requires leaning out window, the pillows had prior guests hair on them, the rug was pretty dirty, the bed is a sofa bed not a true bed and it was very uncomfortable even for my 95lb girlfriend (43kg)
Phillipe was great. Helped carry baggage up and was prompt with responses every time. What you see is what you get with the ad.
Perfect location at the base of the Eiffel Tower. Great place to stay for a single person or couple.
The location of this apartment cannot be beat. The Eiffel Tower is directly outside of your window and I watched it sparkle each night we were there. It warmed my heart!

My husband and I wanted to like this place and thought it was going to be a really great place to stay with a view of the Eiffel Tower from our apartment. Sadly the host misrepresented the view. The view in the pictures is only achievable if leaning out of the small window in the apartment, you cannot comfortably enjoy a view of the Eiffel tower from inside the apartment. The carpet/ rug in the main space was very dirty as well. Worst of all there was an ant issue in the unit, ants came into the apartment through cracks in the tile in the kitchen and bathroom. This ended up being such a bad issue for us that we could not stay in this apartment. We tried to resolve this issue with Philippe but he claimed we were lying and there was no way ants were in the apartment, even though we provided pictures. Only good news is that Airbnb is a great platform and we found a much better place to stay within an hour of deciding we couldn't stay at Philippe's place. If you are looking for an Airbnb with a usable view of the Eiffel Tower look somewhere else, we hope the host decides to take the ant problem in his property seriously and actually do something about it.

This was a great place with an outstanding view.  The pull out bed was comfortable and the place was very clean.  We had struggles getting there from the airport with all the railroad strikes and station closures.  The hosts were able to work around our ever confusing time frame of arrival.
Amazing location to Eiffel Tower and many walkable neighborhood shops and restaurants. This place is all about location.
The view is no joke. Beautiful view of the Eiffel Tower and a lovely little neighborhood.

What a find! I needed to book a last-minute stay in Paris during a work stopover; as I used to live in the city I haven't booked a hotel in years, but this time around, I wasn't able to stay with friends, so I had to find something suitable without being too expensive. How lucky I was to find this! The location is pretty much unbeatable as a central hub for exploring Paris, and the closest Metro station is also the RER B line that takes you directly to Charles de Gaulle airport or to Gare du Nord - so very handy for travellers. It's in a very safe area, too, by the Sorbonne so if you're new to the city or a little worried, you'll feel very comfortable. The rooms are stylish and modern with thoughtful touches like a great little workspace and some books; the cafe and bookshop downstairs is really wonderful and has so obviously been put together carefully and with love, and there are a number of special pop-ups that happen at the hotel, like an open music studio during my stay, which I unfortunately didn't have time to explore. Every little bit of the hotel has been thought about - the lift has its own little constellation of lights and the stairs are used as a small exhibition space for artists. To find a room in a place like this for such a low price really does feel like such a victory, and I hope to visit again in two weeks' time when I'm back in the city. It'll be my go-to now whenever I need somewhere to stay.
The place is nice, well located. Nothing to complain.
Great location, spotless room. Convenient and ideal for a stay in Paris.

My first actual Airbnb experience and what a pleasure it was! The staff was so nice and welcoming, helped me with my bags (and I had a broken suitcase!) and also allowed me to keep them there after my check out for a while. I would absolutely recommend this place, location is perfect and the room is nice and tidy, with a very nice bathroom. A+ !!!!
