La chambre est parfaite, tout était propre. 
Les toilettes sont sur le palier comme précisé dans l'annonce, cependant il y a un lavabo dans la chambre qui permet de se rafraichir. Il y avait même une bouilloire et quelques sachets de thé/café, ce à quoi je ne m'attendais pas. 
Très bien située au coeur de Paris, cette chambre avec vue sur les toits est idéale pour les petits budgets.
Je recommande vivement et reviendrai sans hésiter !
C'est une bonne expérience. Daphnée et son maman sont gentilles.

Chambre de bonne très petite avec lavabo (sans salle de bain), mais propre et calme. Pour sportifs car perché au 6 ème étage d’un immeuble sans ascenseur. Toilettes dans le couloir. Situé dans un quartier tranquille.

Smallish but comfortable room in a good location. Ideal for a solo traveller for a night. There's no bathroom, but the toilet in the hallway was fine and there's a sink in the room. There was also a little kettle and tea which was nice. Had no problems arriving, everything was quite easy.
Good room for a night or two if you're ok cleaning in a bidet. Location is great and Daphnée is very reactive and easy to get in touch with.
Parfait pour 1 personne pour 1 ou 2 nuits !
The room is well located and clean but lacks hot water and a shower...

I loved the stay. Daphne is comunucating very quickly and cleary.
Room is small cozy and clean. Also very quiet. Location is great near to many beautiful places in Paris.
Daphnée is very friendly and respond quickly.Nice experience :)
The location is perfect and  the security could be ensured. The room is clean and warm. And Daphnée is a very warm-hearted host. Everything made my short stay in Paris great!
不错
Great experience from the communication, check-in, location, room cleanliness to the check-out.
Great room!!

Françoise’s room is small but perfectly formed :) super comfy and sparkling clean ! Great location too - only 10 mins from both 1st and Gare De Lyon ! Communication was always very speedy and helpful. Thank you again :)
Daphnee’s place has a great location. The checkin is seamless and everything is as described: I had a great time in Paris at her place. Would definitely recommend.
Beautiful room and very (Website hidden by Airbnb) absolute steal for the location

This was a great stay! It is exactly as advertised and works really just as a place to sleep as there is no wifi, kitchen, etc. Daphnée was super responsive and everything was clean and tidy. There is a sink in the room, apart from the private bathroom, which is nice to not have to leave the room for water.
Very central and clean room. Check-in/out was uncomplicated and Daphnée was very responsive.

This is a no-frills venue.  It was completely adequate for a single traveler--not for a couple (think very small dormitory room).  There was a 6 floor stair to navigate and no shower facilities.  The building is charming and it met my needs and expectations.  It is in a very good location and reasonably priced.  So I would recommend it on that basis.
Nice stay at Daphnée's very well located room. Everything went smoothly and Daphnée was very kind and helpful. Thank you!

As mentioned in the other reviews, this space is Great for one or two days. I was there for all of 18 hours. Bed was cozy, and it was pretty much what I expected as I was just passing through Paris for one day. Great Value if you’re just looking to sleep, refresh, and store your luggage.
Thank you

Not good for the quests with luggage. 7th floor without elevator, and very high stairs. No shower! Noise from the neighbors. The rom is very small. You just can’t open the wardrobe because of sofa... And I was denied to keep the luggage until the evening... I had to go with my bags to Gare Lyon and leave it there... Woman, who will meet you doesn’t speak english... and it’s not very easy to open the doors.. the locks are old and do not open well.
La habitación es una antigua chambre de bonne, ideal si quieres pasear París y tener un sitio para dormir. Dado lo complicado de encontrar un alojamiento digno en la ciudad es una opción recomendable

This is a perfect location or a solo traveller. Keep in mind that its at the top of 5 flights of stairs (fyi heavy luggage people), so it counts as a workout. No shower, but the sink is perfect for a birdbath. Aside from those two details, its near a train and bus station, with a market around the corner.  Catching the train back to CDG is a breeze, and Daphnée’s communication is stellar. Upon arrival and during my stay she replies quick and is very helpful. Would stay here on my next solo trip in a heartbeat.

The room is exactly as described by the host and the guests that stayed before me. Daphnee kept the room well maintained and sparkling clean, provided amnesties like coffee station and fresh towels. It’s exactly what I needed for one night. The room is on the 6th floor which you’ll have to climb stairs for and it didn’t have an Ac or fan it got a bit hot at night but I managed. i could always get hold of Daphnee, if I needed anything or I had any questions, and she is nice. You get your private toilet with a key to lock, which doesn’t have a shower. Overall I’d recommend this room because it has a great location.
Good place for a night or two. On the 6th floor so if you dont like stairs I would avoid. Host has quick responses.
The room is fine, but it is very small. I expected it to be better than this. However, the location is very good.
Perfect for my short stay in Paris! Had everything I needed even without a shower. Thanks Daphnée!
Great place but no WIFI.
The appartment was really nice and clean, perfect for one night. The air was little bit bad and it was quite hot now in the summertime, but otherwise really good!

Women who did the check in was rude and yelled. They were unclear about check out procedure and time and then got upset when we did not check out on time. Place was clean and in a good location. Host does not speak English.

This place is in a really good spot of Paris, there are a lot of things to do close to it and it is easy to get to it. However, the service was not so good and she takes a lot of time to reply to the messages.
Great stay for a quick visit to Paris.
Great location, I would definitely book a room there again.

I stayed here one night and it was perfect for my needs as a solo traveler (it’s a twin size bed so two people would be a tight sleeping situation). I didn’t require a kitchen or shower for the night and didn’t need the space except for sleeping.  My visit was in the summer so if you’re traveling in hotter conditions be warned that this room will get uncomfortably hot during the day, even with the one window open.  It was bearable at night but still warm.  However, if you want a space to hang out in at all I’d say find another location, with how small the room is and how hot it can get you aren’t gonna wanna spend any time here until you need to sleep.  Besides that it is a very clean room with a wonderful location to access the city, Daphnée was very responsive and was able to work with a flexible check in time for me, which was wonderful.  All in all a good experience as long as you understand how it is being advertised (as a bare-bones Air Bnb stay).
Perfect for my overnight stay.  Clean and good communication with the host.

El lugar estaba muy limpio, es importante leer bien la descripción antes de ir. Es pequeño pero muy acogedor y tiene calefacción. Daphnée duraba mucho en responder o no respondía, al yo estar viajando sola me hubiera gustado tener más hospitalidad y recomendaciones.
Sweet room in a gorgeous building, great location.

Friendly host whose instructions were easy to follow. The room was very clean and nice to be able to make coffee and tea in the room. The flat situated in a nice area at safe and short walk from Gare de Lyon.
6th floor, lots of steps. Completely worth it for the location.

Todo según lo esperado: no hay ducha ni wifi, pero la habitación está impecable y tiene mucha luz, la cama es cómoda y puedes hacerte café y té en la habitación. Ubicación inmejorable. Perfecto para una estancia corta en París!
Lovey room, very clean, super location !
The location is great, and it is really clean. It's the best choice for one person who wants to visit Paris.
A good place with
Was unable to make it to the home as I missed my flight and Daphnee was unwilling to cancel the stay, but it was not her fault and she was clear about everything in the listing.
整體都不錯,只是洗澡有點小麻煩,其他就還行

This was an acceptable room, although not great value for money. The fact that this room is on the 6th floor of a liftless building was one disadvantageous aspect. Other drawbacks are: very noisy plumbing. When a toilet is flushed nearby the noise in the room is tremendous; it woke me with a start twice in the night. I was also woken a further two times by unexplained loud crashes coming from I don't know where. There were two bedside lamps, neither of which I could make work, despite investigating the socket and leads. There was no hook to hang my coat (there was a wardrobe but the door doesn't open properly as it is blocked by the bed). The room was quite hot, and this was only April, it could be difficult to sleep in summer here. On the plus side it was clean and there were no street noises. I didn't mind the fact that there is no shower; the basin in the room was adequate for one night's stay. I would have given this room more stars if it had been, say, 20 euros cheaper. My communications with Daphnée were good.
I had a great two night stay at the apartment. The price/quality ratio is standing out, especially if you don’t need a luxury flat. The good communication with the host was very good!

I had a nice stay here. The room was just as Daphnée described,a neat little room at a good location,although the lack of shower facilities may be a problem for some. It's a pity that Daphnée wasn't there during my stay,but her responces to my questions were timely and helpful.
Very good room and location for 1-2 days stay!
É preciso atentar ao fato de que a hospedagem não inclui banho. Dapphnee foi muito honesta e alertou previamente. Fora isso, o imóvel é bem localizado, limpo e silencioso. Ideal para poucos dias.

It was absolutely amazing! Thank you very much Daphnee. location, cleanliness, quick respond was perfect. The room was small but perfect for one or two people. You have everything you need, even tea coffee and hot water! I was lonely girl and was a little bit scared of the neighbourhood but it was absolutely fine and safe, just 5 min from the metro station. Thank you very much for my wonderful stay!
If you're looking for no frills, properly cleaned, well located accommodation this place fits the bill!
Convenient and clean place for single traveller
Great place to crash. Not ideal for a longer stay. It was a bit hard to get instructions for check in but once I got in it was nice.

The room is perfectly located for a short city trip in Paris. Daphnée is a great host - she explained everything in great detail and responded immediately to my messages. The check in / check out process was uncomplicated and the room itself very clean. All in all a very nice stay!
Good place to stay for a short time, the bed was great!
Super

Great room if you are simply passing through Paris as a solo traveler. Room is small but has everything you need, basin for a wash, toilet on the landing, bed to sleep in. Basic but fully functional. Daphnee was fast with her responses and her instructions clear and precise.

I never met Daphnée in person but she was always quick to respond and made sure I was able to connect with her mother, in order to get to the room. This room is as advertised. Truly is easy for quick stays but I would think other amenities are necessary for longer visits to Paris. Keep that in mind when deciding!

Room is as described. Clean place. Being on the 6th floor made for some difficult trips up and down with luggage. Ok if you just have 1 bag, but would not recommend if you’ve got any big luggage. Check in could have been a bit smoother; Owner wasn’t there to give keys and no real directions were given. Hopefully wifi is installed for future guests as this would have improved the experience.
Daphne was very helpful arriving in Paris. The apartment was clean and I had an overall nice stay there!
Response was always so fast!Suitable for short stay
Good place for short term stay.

Daphnee is a very nice and friendly, she answered all questions very fast. Room is very small but clean and perfect place for solo travelers. It has internal window so it’s silent at night. Location is also good - easy to find and not far from the metro stations.

Like the description, for a short stay here is really a perfect place to have. In centre but got peaceful neighborhood. The room is small and cozy, actually you get everything you need. Daphée replies always quick and clearly, don’t you have to worry about anything with it.
pas de commentaire

Trop petit, même pour une personne seule, pan incline qui limite la seul pièce à à peine 5 m au sol, accès au lit une place, soit un matelas posé a même le sol, par une échelle carrément dangereuse. Il faut être jeune et en pleine forme... le must, pas de lumière ni de lampe sur la mezzanine et l’interrupteur principal en bas. Donc vous montez dans le noir ou vous dormez avec la lumière...
Très bel hôtel
Bon séjour !
Je recommande !

Nous avions réservés une chambre privé pour une certaine date mais l’hôtel avait fermé avant, cependant Emma nous a prévenu et nous a suggéré un hôtel tout aussi bien en nous demandons s’il nous convenait pour ensuite faire le transfert de réservation vers l’autre hôtel. Nous n’avions aucun frais à rajouter en plus et l’hôtel dans lequel nous avions été transférés était très bien.
Séjour très agréable notamment en plein confinement.

Je n’ai pas séjourné dans cet hôtel, je vais donc parlé de l’aspect moral des personnes qui travaillent dans cet hôtel , après plusieurs échanges avec l’hôtel pour effectué une modification des dates  dû à la crise sanitaire actuelle , ceux-ci n’ont pas voulus être compréhensif et ne voulaient pas modifier les dates de mon séjour car apparement les prix n’étaient pas similaires (ils perdaient une trentaine d’euros dans les 215€ que j’ai payé pour mon séjour) , je vous recommande donc d’être sure et certains des dates de votre séjour car ils ne les modifieront pas.
Personnel très agréable, chambre très propre et hôtel bien situé.

Chambre très propre. Accueil chaleureux et personnel serviable. La localisation est juste exceptionnelle : l’hôtel se trouve en plein cœur de Paris à proximité de tout (monuments, métro, magasins, ...)
Super séjour ! Un vrai plaisir, une chambre très propre et ultra confortable avec un personnel très agréable ! Je recommande fortement
Super nuit pour un week-end, emplacement idéal et accueil agréable et rapide, bonne réactivité par message.
Un peu petit mais parfait!
Excellentes prestations
Hôtel très bien situé près de la Tour Eiffel et un accueil au top à l’arrivée. Les personnels sont très aimables. Je vous recommande cette hôtel
Super logement, propre. Il se situe près du centre, les personnes sont gentilles, arrangeantes et  disponibles. On y a passé un très bon week-end je recommande à 100%

Hôte à l’écoute et joignable même très tard le soir. L’atelier est vraiment très sympa avec une jolie décoration, tous les équipements dont on pourrai avoir besoin sont dispo. Tout est fait pour se sentir bien. Je recommande à 100%!!!

Petit appartement chaleureux, l’hôte était très réactif et accueillant ! A refaire sans hésitation.
Merci Farah
Merci à vous Farah , pour ce magnifique séjour . Tout était impeccable. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir.
Le séjours s'est très bien déroulé. Tout à été fluide. Le logement est accueillant et chaleureux.
Apt fonctionnel Farah est Très arrangeante!
C’est juste Waou.... la maison de Farah très propre joliment décorée ! J’espère  que je l’aurais pour mes vacances d’été 2021
Parfait ! Vous pouvez y allez les yeux fermés
Une hôte de qualité pour un logement de qualité, à recommander sans problème et c'est certain si nous revenons dans ce quartier nous reprendrons ce logement !
Super séjour
Très bien
Un véritable havre de paix dans le Paris qui bouge ! Des plus, Farah est d’une grande écoute, disponibilité et adaptabilité ! Je reviendrai :)

Un GRAND MERCI à Farah pour l’hospitalité! L’atelier est tout simplement magnifique, très propre, ça sent bon dès qu’on y met les pieds et en plus c’est bien situé car très proche des transports en commun et commerces. Top ! 
P. S.: J’ai adoré la décoration et l’agencement !

Second séjour chez Farah et nous sommes toujours conquise . Je recommande son logement. D’une propreté irréprochable ainsi qu’un mobilier design. 
Vous ne regretterez pas votre choix, foncez !

Nous sommes enchantés de notre séjour chez Farah. Délicates attentions à l’arrivée et très prévenante aussi bien à l’entrée qu’à la sortie du logement. Proximité du métro, logement cocoon d’une propreté irréprochable. Je vous recommande +++
Tres bel appart
Farah est au top

Je recommande le logement de Farah, il est magnifique. En entrant je ne m’attendais pas à cette structure et sincèrement j’ai été agréablement surprise. Tout est propre, le décor est juste sublime. Appartement très charmant avec un sous-sol très bien aéré. 
Farah est une hôte aimable, accueillante et on le ressent en séjournant chez elle. 
Lors de mon prochain retour parisien je séjournerai chez elle à coup sûr. 

Allez-y 20/20
Très bel appartement bien placé et bien équipé. Nous avons très bien été accueilli et tout s'est très bien passé. Merci Farah :)
Appartement très agréable. Hôte très gentille
superbe appartement très bien agencé et décoré !

Farah est une hôte digne de ce nom.  Soucieuse de notre bien-être et attentive à notre confort pour que l'on se sente comme chez nous.
Merci à elle . Nous la recommandons vivement.
Très agréable
Super séjour dans un super appartement au rdc très bien localisé en Paris. Il y a même Netflix. Farah est également très aimable et a l’écoute. Je vous recommande vivement ce bnb.
L’appartement est parfait et Farah très sympathique !
Un logement très beau et agréable à vivre, j’ai passez un très bon séjours, a recommander :)

Bel appartement en rdc (ancien fond de commerce), agréable et bien aménagé.
Arrivée autonome et simple.

La chambre en s/sol est fraîche ce qui est agréable en ce moment avec la canicule, mais une hauteur d’ humidité cependant.
Super appartement, j’y reviendrais!!

Appartement bien situé pour visiter paris et bien exposé car nous n’avons pas souffert de la chaleur dedans (merci pour le ventilateur en prime). Nous avons rencontré le mari de la propriétaire qui était très sympathique. Nous sommes tous les 4 enchantés de notre séjour.
Séjour agréable, beaucoup de commerce à proximité ce qui est pratique . Farah est une hôte très réactive et adorable.

c’est un très beau appart avec l’hôte super accueillante et à votre disposition tout le long de votre séjour . L’appart était magnifique. Le seul petit défaut et vraiment que le quartier la nuit est sensible.. donc soyez prudent

Tout était parfait, Farah est une hôte disponible et accueillante, le logement est très fonctionnel, propre, bien situé, près du métro. Je recommande sans hésiter et je n’hésiterai pas à revenir ! Merci encore
Personne réactive compressive hôte des qualités logement irréprochable !!
Rien à dire accueillante, gentil très disponible et aux Peyton soins. Tout était parfait
Romantisme, beauté, style et confort.
Conforme à l’annonce. Farah était disponible et très sympathique.

Farah a su être présente et réceptive tout au long de mon séjour .
L’appartement est agréable à y séjourner .

Atelier d'artiste agréable pour passer un bon séjour.  Farah,  l'hôtesse des lieux est attentionnée et facilite en tout point votre arrivée. Bien situé pour visiter Montmartre et ses alentours.
L'appartement est très bon mais la quartier n'est pas le meilleur pour marcher la nuit pour les femmes

Logement très agréable, bien décoré et bien équipé

Très bon logement.

Super sejour dans ce bel appartement à Paris. A recommander. Merci Farah pour ces petites attentions

Appartement impeccable, parfaitement équipé, parfaitement situé à proximité de la ligne 4. 
Farah est une hôte disponible, prévenante, à recommander sans réserve !
Petit appartement parfaitement équipé et très agréable à vivre. Les instructions de Farah ont été claires et précises. Le séjour s’est parfaitement déroulée ! La literie est très confortable
Très bon séjour dans très bel appartement. À la fois bien desservi, Bien agencé, intimiste et cosy. Hautement recommandé :)
Aucun points négatifs retenus
Un accueil bienveillant et chaleureux, Farah est disponible et à votre écoute l'appartement idéalement situé est très cosi, propre et très calme. Nous y retournerons sans aucun doute.
C était vraiment un super séjour, pleines d attentions, lieu extra, je recommande vivement ! :)

Nous avons passé un magnifique week-end parisien, l’appartement est proche de tout, théâtre, cours de cuisine, restaurant, shopping, nous en avons bien profité et reviendrons!
Merci encore Farah!

L’appa de Farah est superbe!
Entièrement rénové avec des matériaux de qualité. Décoration soignée. 
Farah est très agréable, réactive et pleine de petites intentions.
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.
Merci pour tout!

Super appart, très cosy et très agréable ! Farah nous a super bien accueillis avec des petites attentions qui font plaisir ! L’appartement est situé idéalement à quelques pas de 3 stations de métro ! Des équipements dans l’appart qui font franchement rêver ! On s’y repose mais surtout on s’y sent super bien !!!

Nous avons passé un super séjour dans ce joli appartement, tout y est. Farah et son mari sont vraiment arrangeants et sympathiques!
On recommande vivement!

Très bons échanges avec Farah, qui est disponible, réactive et qui est très à l’écoute de ses hôtes. 
De belles petites attentions et un charme des lieux qui vous donne envie d’y revenir. 
Je recommande fortement!

Petit appartement absolument charmant très fonctionnel bien décoré dans une rue très calme et proche du métro qui va au centre. 
Farah a été super à l’arrivée comme au départ. Je recommande vivement.

Je recommande cet appartement très beau et très moderne. Celui ci est idéal pour passer quelques jours sur Paris.
Vous ne manquerez de rien, et vous serez sûr de passer un agréable séjour.

Coquet petit studio, tout neuf et chaleureux. Nos hôtes nous ont rendu de petit service bien apprécié  OK petit studio, tout neuf et chaleureux. Nos hôtes nous ont rendu de petits services bien appréciés Et un accueil chaleureux
Parfait
Toujours aussi agréable ! Si vous êtes de passage à Paris que vous cherchez un endroit unique ! Je vous conseille fortement le studio de Farah.
C'est la deuxième fois que je m'y rend ! J'adore le style de ce studio : agréable, propre, proche de plusieurs commerce... Je compte bien revenir à mon prochain passage à Paris ! Merci à Farah
Un très bel accueil et un magnifique logement super bien situé où tout est à disposition. Merci encore pour ce séjour.
Super appartement, Farah est accueillante et disponible, une très bonne hôte !

L’appart est génial pour 3 personnes, très propre et super équipé. Petite attention à l’arrivée vraiment apprécié. Farah a été super accessible avec réponse rapide.
Seul petit point la chambre du bas est un peu humide mais hyper propre ☀️
Un lieu unique, agréable...
Atelier d’artiste très agréable et bien équipé. Accueil adorable et petites attentions bien appréciées !
Excellent
Clean and stylish place. Thanks for Farah in understanding my issues and making me feel comfortable. Highly recommended place.

Lovely duplex, cozy, practical and well decorated. I don’t think there’s AC but the temperature was perfect even though it was super hot out! Farah was a great host, thoughtful and responsive. I also greatly appreciated being able to extend my stay!
Excellent
非常好的住宿体验,房间布置精致,洁净而温馨｡交通方便,距离地铁站很近｡生活便捷,周边有超市､面包店｡房东非常热情､周到｡非常推荐｡
The perfect place! Farah is nice!

Farah place is definitely a good value deal. 

It is quite nice and the living room as a great feeling. Farah also cares about little details to make you feel welcome.

However, I’m not a huge fan of the underground bedroom. 

When it comes to location, it’s a district where gentrification is still in progress. It is close to the metro which makes it quite convenient!

The accommodation is tremendously beautiful !! You can tell by the first step in the room you want to live in it. Definitely feel like home. Farah is very helpful and reachable even late night, a great host who pay attention to details and some helpful thoughts ! I recommend it 1000% !

We had a great time in the beautiful appartment that Farah offers. The ambience of the place is lovely, and it offers everything we needed for a relaxing two day stay in Paris. We really liked the artsy 'gallery-vibe', that's what also attracted us in the first place.

Farah is very friendly and professional in contact. She made the check in/out quick and easy, which we also appreciated.  

I would definitely recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a place to stay in Paris.
The apartment offers a pleasant stay, the check-in is easy and the host is super responsive. A few details could be improved upon here and there but nothing major.
My stay was great. The room is on the ground floor so you don't have to worry about climbing stairs when you get in after a long day. The place was decorated very well.
Muito bom. O banheiro é muito pequeno
Good Airbnb for a short trip in Paris, had some issues with the cleanliness of the apartment but Farah was great in ensuring all issues were resolved. Perfect for a couple!
Lovely place that had everything we needed! 100% would recommend to everyone

The place itself is fine. The check in process was quiet complicated. Please, if you do decide to book this place. Take EXTRA care of yourself around this neighborhood. It is NOT safe. I was walking around and got robbed, which had my passport and documents in it. When I spoke to the police officer, they said that this specific neighborhood is not safe. Please Uber everywhere and be extra careful when you are walking.
Farah is a Super Host to start with . The apartment had a special ambience to it and was quiet unique.
Small but lovely
It's a nice house and Farah is so nice. The house is on the street and the bedroom is the basement. It was an interesting experience to live here.
The place is very nice for a couple. Farah is very supportive. I asked a recommendation for a place to eat and get around, she always answered and her attitude spell "I want to help you"
A perfect location

This was a great place for my first trip to Paris and I wish that I had been able to spend even more time here! I loved the thoughtful details in the apartment such as power converters for guest from different countries.
Spacious spot for Paris. Well kitted out. Sleeper couch is a huge benefit! Farah is great with communication and was readily available if needed.

Farah is a great host! Me and my partner stayed at her place for New Years, and we had the most amazing time. She has included everything we could’ve needed including a hair dryer, washing machine, cooker, microwave etc. The decor is stylish and chic and so homely! Check in was easy and not too far from the airport. I would definitely recommend this place and visit again!
Our family (3 persons) enjoyed our stay in the apartment. Nearby we could find all the services necessary. The apartment was nicely furnished. We warmly recommend!

We had a wonderful trip in Paris thanks to Farah. The apartment was cozy and stylish with everything we needed for our stay. It was nice to hang out late in the morning or come home early and spend the evening in the apartment instead of going out. We were a short walk from Montmartre, which ended up being our favorite part of Paris. The metro was unfortunately not running due to a strike, but it was easy to walk or get an Uber to different parts of the city. We would highly recommend staying here!
Great place in a great location

Farah was a fabulous host- very helpful, accommodating, and friendly. The two of us were comfortable and well cared for. 

The location is a perfect getaway from the city. It's on a quiet residential street just one block away from a main street that has plenty of shopping and restaurants. It is also only about 20 minute walk to Sacre Coeur and all the Montemarte restaurants and charm.  Plus, there's a great bakery about 50 ft from the front door.

If you are thinking of staying in Montemarte, we'd highly recommend Farah's place. Perdect for a couple or 2-3 friends.
Great place! So clean and beautiful
This place is good. Well designed.
The check in was flexible and easy, the apartment was clean, tidy and very welcoming! We had a great stay and I have no negative feedback.

Farah and her husband are very welcoming and obliging people.  They responded very quickly when we had a problem & sorted it out promptly.  Comfortable apartment which was well located near the metro & a Boulangerie.  There was also the nice touch of a bottle of wine to welcome us.  Thank you Farah

Farah was a perfect host. She was extremely attentive and easy to get in touch with. The apartment is beautiful and had everything we needed. The complementary wine was a lovely touch! Would definitely recommend.
Heerlijk vertoeven in het appartement en met de metro ben je zo bij alle bezienswaardigheden!

Farah’s apartment was great. Everything my wife and I needed and extremely close to a metro station, where we managed to see all of the big sights in Paris. We loved our stay, and would come back again. Farah was also very diligent and checked in multiple times during our trip. Can’t recommend her flat enough!

Farah’s place is the perfect set-up if you want to live like the Parisians! It’s stylish and has everything you need. Close to transportation and easy to access. Farah and her husband were amazing hosts and we felt very welcomed by them!

Dejligt roligt område, men alligevel tæt ved livlige små gader med unikke caféer og forretninger. 
Boligen virkede lidt fugtig. Badeværelset er trangt og trænger til et teknisk eftersyn.
Farah was the perfect host from start to finish. The space was clean, cared for and comfortable. We loved being so close to Sacre Coeur. Our first trip to Paris was tres bien!

Lovely little place, great hist, really helpful and nice to communicate with.
We had a lovely card and bottle of wine to welcome us. Location was very handy for all amenities, but not in the most picturesque part of Monnartre. All in all a very successful stay!

The apartment is not located near popular sites and transportation to and from is too time consuming and expensive. The location did not feel safe and getting in and out of the apartment was difficult (due to the lock). Paint chipping, broken toilet and shower.
The place was nice and walking distance from the train station. It had some damage from previous guests but was in good shape and well stocked with amenities.

Great location, really cute flat. Host is attentive and responds very quickly to any questions. Easy to take the metro to anywhere in Paris or outside of Paris. The front window was stuck open, being able to close it would have helped a lot with noise at night but we were never cold. Host did tell us after we checked in that the previous guests broke the shower and toilet, we received specific instructions on how to use them so they continued to work for us while we were there and this was nice and helpful to know, but in order for this airbnb to keep its "plus" status the bathroom could use some basic TLC.
Overall we were happy and the host was amazing and communicated everything with us and was always honest. Great bakery just a few steps away too!
Farah was a wonderful host. The place was very nice and modern. We loved it's location!

Our stay here was great. The location was close to the Metro and we felt very safe here despite being on ground floor. The living area was clean and comfortable, and it was a great place to come back to after a long day of being tourists! Thanks Farah :)

Super Appartement 
Liegt in einer ruhige Straße 
Nahe Mommatre und Metro

The hosts are truly lovely and accommodating and go out of their way to make sure you are okay and taken care of.

I enjoyed the location and being outside of the tourist areas and it was easy to get around via bus and train. 

The layout of the apartment is quaint and has lovely deco.

If you want to feel more like a local, I'd recommend the stay. 

There is noise from the bar next door on some nights,  so if you're a light sleeper- this is not for you.

The place itself was very cute and stylish! Farah was kind and easy to reach. I loved the self check in and check out. The area felt a little sketchy at night, but we loved walking around during the night and it was a short distance to many points of interest. We felt very at home during our stay! Thank you Farah!

What a perfect place to enjoy some days in Paris! The apartment is fully equipped with everything you need to feel comfy and safe. We could feel the love Farah has put into all the beautiful details in her apartment to create a warm and cozy environment. Farah has been very attentive and kind and it’s been an absolutely pleasure enjoying our weekend at her place. Thank you, Farah!
We had a great time staying at Farah's place. It was beautiful and located in an interesting area.
We hadden een aangenaam verblijf in Parijs. Rustige buurt . Goed gelegen (dicht bij de metro). Ideaal voor met z'n tweetjes.
Great apartment in the artistic part of Paris. Fabulous markets on the main boulevard most days where you can buy anything from fresh vegetables to clothes
Farah was a great host. Very responsive.  The place was a bit hot and musty, but if you have a high tolerance it’s a good value if you want to stay near the Montmartre area.

Amazing. Farah and her trendy apartment was the PERFECT Parisian home for me during my stay. She was incredibly hospitable and welcoming, even a welcome bottle of wine. The apartment is very modern but cozy as well. Loved it and would absolutely recommend!!
We had a lovely stay at Farah's place. We appreciated the extra touches like cakes, cider, bread, coffee left for us. The space is stylish and modern.
Is gooddddd

What a gem! This was our second time to Paris, so this time we wanted to stay away from the congested tourist spots. Montmartre is a fun neighborhood which gives you the feel of being a local. From beginning to end, Farah was hospitable and prompt. Their apartment is so cute, clean and modern!  The only downside, not much counter space or storage space. We comfortably slept three -my husband, me and our adult son- but we had all our belongings spread  all over  the living room and kitchen counter. But that is typical of Paris apartments, they are cozy. So just keep that in mind when packing. A big luggage is not necessary, especially since there is a W/D.
Sehr hübsche Wohnung , aber Schlafzimmer im Keller ohne Fenster, nur Klimaanlage. Türe  im Erdgeschoss nicht zum Offen stehen lassen, da es auf die Straße hinaus geht.

The home was just as stylish as photographed and described. There were thoughtful touches such as converters in the outlets and a folder Farah made describing different amenities and listing restaurant recommendations. When we needed help figuring out how to use the washer/dryer, Farah responded right away even though she was in the hospital about to deliver her baby. I did need help carrying the luggage down on the narrow, winding staircase to the bedroom, but thankfully, my travel mates were able to help. For my first Airbnb experience, I was very pleased.

Everything is great. it is near the train station and it is easy to go everywhere. 
Farah's home is so cosy. its just feels like home to me. With Netflix available on TV and wifi. 
The house is complete with first aid kit and household needs.
Perfect appartment for a wonderful weekend in Paris. Farah is a great host, answerig on every question within seconds and preparing your stay in a way you feel really welcome.
Very nice place, very clean and close to the Metro.

Great place! Easy to get around in Paris from this location. It was warm outside but the main bedroom is below ground keeping it nice and cool. The plug adapters were a great benefit for out of town travelers. Wish we would have more time in the neighborhood as a short walk around on the last night showed us many cute restaurants and cafes. Only info we would share for people considering is that the stairs to get to the bedroom are slightly narrow, we managed. All in all we would definitely recommend the place!

All in all a decent stay. Has everything you need for a quick trip in Paris. Conveniently close to Simplon train station. The only thing I could not tell from the description and photos was that the bedroom is actually underground sort of like a basement. I had assumed it was more like a loft. But regardless the host was responsive and the unit was very nice. Very comfortable bed too!
Farah is an excellent hostess, really caring and helpful, had lots of good tips for restaurants. The place is perfect for a weekend getaway. We’d love to come back next time we’ll visit Paris!

Farah’s home is clean, stylish, and very comfortable for a few guests! There are good amenities (like a TV, soundbar, etc) that are easy to use. The apartment is close to the metro (4 line) and you can easily get groceries, etc nearby.

The place is lovely and Farah and her husband are absolutely outstanding! Such a cute and warm couple, I was so glad to meet them. I think it was a fluke, but the heater wasn’t working so it took a while to warm up (thankfully there were multiple heaters). Farah answered me in the middle of the night, thank goodness, and was always courteous and helpful. The paint under the bathroom sink is peeling extensively (which only is obvious because everything else is so beautiful), but otherwise, this space is so stylish and well-thought-out! Very beautiful.  Such great touches like wine, candies and tea await upon your arrival. There is a guidebook and world accommodating plug charger to meet everyone’s needs. The rug and the pull out couch, however did need to be vacuumed as it contained hair and debris - it must have been an oversight, because otherwise the space was immaculate. I slept on it as a couch rather than a bed and also so I wouldn’t be so low to the floor.  The location is amazing, the space is Darling and the hosts are outstanding - highly recommended.

This is a very compact apartment. The appliances were fabulous. The bed was very comfortable. The spiral staircase down to the bedroom is tight and may be challenging for older people. The bathroom and shower was also very tight with little space. The shower was not easy to operate. Everything was spotlessly clean . Netflix was a plus
Beautiful and stylish apartment. Farah was the perfect host, great communication and super helpful. Fab location, gorgeous interior and lovely touches - totally recommend staying here!

A stylish, bohemian pied-à-terre in a quickly gentrifying neighborhood of Paris that is very convenient to public transport, restaurants and nightlife. We had a very comfortable stay that allowed us to see and live day to day Parisian life while still being able to check off all of the usual tourist destinations with ease. Farrah is a lovely host with great local suggestions and quick response to any questions you may have during your stay.

Great place in Paris with all the amenities you need! Super comfy bed and stylish apartment. Farah was a great host and made our stay seamless with simple instructions and solid communication - thank you!
Farah's place was cozy and very well decorated. It made me feel like a home away from home. Place was also located within five minutes to a metro station. Overall, highly recommended location.
Modern diamond in the rough...perfect home away from home...with all the amenities...will definitely return again...had a wonderful time.
Farah is a super friendly host, always offer her help whenever we needed. Stylish apartment, very well equipped, just few minutes walk from metro station and all other necessities

Highly recommended. Great and easy to access location, especially from 'Gare du nord'. Cosy apartment has everything you need. Farah and her husband were very helpful and friendly. Grocery stores, bakery and pharmacy all within a minute walk, Sacre coeur only a 15 min uphill walk.
Clean, secure and conveniently located near the beautiful Montmarte area! Highly recommend.
Leuk klein appartementje op paar minuten loopafstand van een metrostation. Appartement is netjes. Makkelijke communicatie met de gastvrouw.

Great location - easy to get around the whole of Paris, with the nearest metro around 4mins away. Apartment was clean, modern and the host was great at communicating and making sure we were happy and having a good time
Good place. Far from all the tourist destinations but so peaceful.
Great host and beautiful space

Farah's place was such a warm haven during our cold stay in Paris. I loved the modern yet cozy decor, and especially appreciated how there weren't a bunch of stairs we needed to climb (as per most European apartments) to get there! Farah was also the most communicative host, responding to my questions almost instantaneously. The location was also super convenient, with a supermarket and bakery just around the corner. I would highly, highly recommend staying at her place if you're considering Paris!
A wonderful place to stay. Everything was great and Farrah was an excellent host.
Lovely place!

To stay at Farah's apartment is nothing less than GREAT!! The interior is lovely and so is everything else. All the little details make her apartment extra special and all the luxury you can wish for is provided. Cosy lights, Nespresso, Netflix, candles, soft towels, a marvelous bed, a clean and beautiful kitchen and bathroom, that typical 'Paris vibe' ... you can have it all at Farah's place.
The subway is just a quarter of a mile away, so traveling from the apartment to, let's say The Louvre, takes you like maybe 20 minutes. And the Sacre Coeur is only a 10 minute walk away.
Farah is very reliable and willing to help you out anytime. Ask her a question via Email and she'll respond within a few minutes.
So if you're planning a few days in Paris, you should book this apartment for sure. You won't regret it. The only thing is ... I might be in it again, because we're definitely going back there someday.
A perfectly placed apartment to explore Paris. Close to the metro with local amenities and a really helpful host. Walking distance to Sacré Cœur- and an unexpected but welcome wine on arrival.
Great stay in a location which is easily accessible by bus or metro. Would recommend to a friend!
Farah is a super host- very responsive and communicative. She is very thoughtful in her personal touches including chocolate and wine for guests.

A great place to stay during your visit to Paris. Farah was a wondering host! She responds very quickly and helps you with anything you could need. Her place was easy to find, and her instructions were very accurate. The home was clean with nice thoughtful touches. (Netflix, wine and water bottles etc) though the home is not in the heart of Paris, the location is still great because you are near grocery shops and restaurants. You’re a short Uber ride from the main attractions of Paris.

Lovely, clean apartment around 15 minute (uphill) walk to Sacre Coeur. Very easy check in. Good local amenities too. The stairs to the bedroom are very narrow & steep so not ideal if you have mobility problems but otherwise perfect for couples looking to explore Paris.
Stylish apartment, location left a little to be desired as Metro 4 wasn’t in operation for the duration of our trip. Comfortable apartment and great host overall

Farah's place was an amazing place to stay while in Paris. Location is good, close to the metro. The place itself was warm and cozy for those cold nights. My wife and I felt instantly at home here. Farrah is also an amazing and very communicative host, which makes the stay even more pleasurable.
Great place to stay in Paris! Very well decorated and everything we needed was available. Would definitely recommend this place to other airbnbers!
I would highly recommend this place - had a such a great stay.  It’s really cosy and well equipped with everything you need as well as being close to the metro and shops.
Lovely place. Great people. No complaints. I wish I could have stayed longer. In other words - good clean family fun.
The bakery around the corner was awesome!!!!
Fantastic place to stay, right close to public transport and supermarkets. Great to be welcomed by some chocolate and wine. Thank you so much

My stay at Farah's place was wonderful. She wasn't there for check-in but the instructions provided were clear enough to follow. I did get to meet her when I was leaving and she seems to be a lovely human being... The place itself is gorgeous and had everything I needed for a great stay. The neighborhood is also a big plus. The Metro station, plenty of restaurants and boulangeries are nearby. Sacre Coeur is also walking distance from the flat. I will definitely look for staying at Farah's flat again next time I come to Paris.

Really clean and stylish place to stay. 25 mins away from centre of town, one metro line. Farah has kitted the house out very well to make our stay in Paris very enjoyable - she even gives access to Netflix and a bottle of wine!
Geweldige ruimte met een fantastische host!
Very cool and nice place. Highly recommend.

This apartment is perfect in every way! I could not fault it! Great area! Farah is so easy to get hold of if you have any questions and reply’s very quick. The bed is very comfortable. Overall I could not fault this apartment and will be visiting in the near future :)

These place is great value, you get super clean stylish modern place. 2 minute walk to the 4 line metro to get you anywhere in Paris you want to  go. This place is absolutely beautiful, clean, stylish and cozy. Will definitely come back to stay at this one. The host is also amazing, she communicated with us through the whole entire process to make us feel safe a secure and gave us tips about what’s around amazing and the best service.

Me and my friend stayed at Farrah’s place for 3 nights for my 40th birthday! It was absolutely beautiful, spotlessly clean and well appointed with everything we needed. 
Check in was great and it was awesome having the photos and instructions to guide us through the process. I can’t fault the apartment. Very stylish and comfortable although I would say the spiral staircase down to the bedroom might be a little tricky for older guests or those with any injuries. 
The location wasn’t bad. More of a locals area which we really liked as there were not too many tourists in that area. It was a bit of a walk to get to the main sites but if you are not in a rush it’s fine. 
All in all we had a very enjoyable stay and would recommend Farrahs place to anyone visiting Paris :)

Key/front door is dangerous- difficult to exit the facility. If a guest couldn’t find the key and needed to evacuate the building during emergency, they wouldn’t be able to. You should get a lock that is more user friendly and less decorative. Severe safety issue. Also, no traditional pillows was less than expected. All we had was decor pillows on the bed. No covers/pillow cases .

My boyfriend and I had such a lovely time staying at Farah’s. Clean and tidy with lovely furniture. Downstairs bedroom was amazing! A short walk to the tube station with shops nearby. We would definitely stay here again if we came back to Paris!

Farahs apartment exceeded so many of our expectations. Check in was a pleasure as we were given the opportunity to drop our bags to the apartment earlier due to our travel times. The proximity to the metro station makes visiting the sites a breeze but also, the modern, cosy feel of the apartment is evident as soon as you set foot in the door and is something you'll be excited to return home to. The apartment was just as much a part of our experience as the culture. There is no doubt in my mind that when I return to Paris I will stay at this airbnb again.

The place is beautiful, fully refurbished, very convenient. Washing machine on the spot, which is great for travellers like us! Farah was awesome, very accomodating and extremely nice. Thank you for the little bottle of vino, much appreciated!

Wunderschöne kleine Wohnung, sehr schick eingerichtet. Haben uns sofort wie zuhause gefühlt!
Farah war auch super nett!
Die nächste U-bahn ist auch gleich um die Ecke.

Sehr zu empfehlen
It was a great apartment with a modern touch, and Farah was very friendly and kind. We really enjoyed our stay!

Farah’s home exceeded my expectations! She’s a wonderful host, very accommodating and kind. The house was very well equipped With Netflix, LED mirror, coffee machine and more! Would recommend to anyone visiting Paris.

Everything was perfect!  The flat is really nice. Well equipped and a cosy flair. Lots of details that make the stay even more enjoyable. Good location- only 3 minutes to the train station, 15 Minutes Walk to sacre coeur,  boulangerie and supermarket just around the corner. We had a wonderful time! Thanks Farah
Great stylish space with a lot of personal touches. Easy to get to, located less than a five minute walk from the 4 line!

It is very modern apartment with tasteful furniture and appliance , everything you needs it has , very close to metro , and vibrant neibourhood . The best value for money and the owner really put their love to the service
great apartment and location! loved the decor and special touches throughout. really enjoyed our stay here!
Nuestra estancia en casa de Farah fue genial, un sitio súper acogedor y cómodo. El metro estaba a un paso. Volveríamos sin ninguna duda. Gracias Farah.
Would highly recommend, only 2 mins from the Metro, local supermarket, vey modern, stylish, clean and had lovely touches. Including the cray SMEG kettle, which we found hilarious :).

Farah's is an ideal place to stay for us who carried heavy luggages. It is close to the metro station Simplon and you can easily find it by the side of a quite street. It is well decorated with not only good taste but also all amenities needed. We were quite late for check-out whereas she was approachable and considerate. By all means highly recommended!
Farah was lovely the apartment was very very clean, comfortable warm and cosy. Would defo come back when next in Paris.

Amazing place to stay! It was very easy to get around paris from the apartment. It was a lovely and stylish flat thats good for a couple! We always got quick responses from Farah which was extremely helpful!

Stylish, well-stocked with nice touches such as an espresso machine, modern decor, squeaky clean and very close to the 4 metro line. Farah was extremely responsive and attentive, and kindly accommodated us when we had to move our checkout a bit earlier. No complaints at all, would stay here again!
Very beautiful place to stay in Paris. So nice people. Also welcome gifts. Everythnig was perfect. Thank you for beaufitul stay in Paris

the apartment is definitely worth the price. with this price,this is the best u can find. to be noticed, the bedroom is in the basement so the air is not so fresh. But the bed is super comfortable. Anyway it's really worth the money. Highly recommend
Great place ! Nice people.
Apartamento precioso limpio e impecable. La amabilidad de los propietarios tambien. Todo muy facil

pas de commentaire
Deuxième séjour chez Sophie en moins de deux mois et je continuerai sans doute à y revenir.
Très agréable séjour chez Sophie

Très belle rencontre avec Sophie. Avenante et bienveillante. Un joli moment passé dans ce belle appart parisien  très agréable. 
L'esprit Airbnb que nous recherchons est la! Nous regrettons de ne pas avoir  échangé plus! Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés!

We had a great time! Although we did not see Sophie, communication was easy and quick. We arrived late in the evening but she arranged everything for us . The apartment was really clean and is located in a nice area. Sophie was very sweet and provided nice recommendations. We would recommend to stay here! :)
We loved Shopie! She is the best host ever! The room is amazing!

Everything was perfect. The apartment is lovely, very clean, very comfortable. Sophie is an excellent host and will take care of anything you need. The location is very cool, in a diverse neighborhood a short walk from Sacre Coeur. Great food, great people watching, I had an amazing time.

Incroyable. J’étais au cinéma mais cette fois si dans le film hihi  merci Xavier et toute la clique

Accueil ,emplacement plein cœur de st germain petit déjeuner top j’ai eu une place de parking devant l’hôtel top aussi chambre et salle de bains spacieuses
Ménage fait mais seul bémol vraiment les moquettes sont à changer et si possible les murs aussi sinon je recommande rapport qualité prix top

L'hôtel la Louisiane est un lieu où l'on se sent bien. L'accueil y est chaleureux de la part de tous, le petit déjeuner copieux, joliment présenté par Anne Sophie. Hôtel calme idéalement placé où on aime séjourner et revenir... Merci à tous et à bientôt.
Idéalement placé,  super accueil,  propre et fonctionnel ! Je recommande!
Excellent rapport qualité-prix pour cet hotel charmant très bien situé !
Une adresse à conserver précieusement ! Une belle surprise.
Un hôtel familial comme on les aimes
Tout c'est très bien passé, quartier très agréable et très vivant.

Une adresse mythique où il fait bon vivre. C est l’âme de saint germain  qui fait vibrer cet maison. La disponibilité et le service méritent d’être soulignés car il vous apportent le sourire dès le début de la journée. Cet hôtel est surprenant.

Magnifique séjour à La Louisiane en famille avec ma petite fille et mon petit garçon, qui ont pu visiter les plus beaux sites de Paris avec moi malgré leurs petits petons, car l'hôtel est très central. Les réceptionnistes ont été adorables, ainsi que l'équipe du petit-déjeuner qui a accepté de nous servir alors que leur service était terminé. Avec d'autres membres de ma famille, nous avons pu organiser un grand dîner tous ensemble dans la Cafeteria, encore merci pour nous l'avoir mise à disposition ainsi que la cuisine. Nous reviendrons tous les ans.

Tres bon rapport qualite prix pour le quartier. 
Nous sommes venus a une equipe de 6 personnes de La Rosiere Espace San Bernardo et nous avons fait le meme constat.
Séjour agréable en plein coeur de St Germain
Parfait séjour
Très sympa
A réserver vivement

Bien que je n'y sois resté qu'une nuit, j'ai passé un excellent séjour à la Louisiane. J'ai été fort agréablement surpris par la qualité du service proposé par rapport au prix que j'avais payé. En effet, l'hôtel est très bien situé, l'accueil était idéal et la chambre aussi pour un prix plus que raisonnable!
Quartier génial !!! enjoy
Hôtel très bien placé dans quartier très sympa. Chambres spacieuses et confortables. Parfait

Emplacement magique en plein centre du 6eme. Superficie des chambres très agréable et confortable pour le centre de Paris. 
Travaux en cours et rafraîchissement des chambres nécessaires. 
Très bon rapport qualité prix
Une excellente adresse a Paris, parfait en situation et en prix.

Emplacement magnifique bien que bruyant du côté de la rue, mais c’est Paris, on fait avec. 
Le petit déjeuner est varié et à dépassé mes attentes.
Hôtel superbement bien placé manque juste quelques places de parking les chambres sont un peu petite mais agréable et propre petit déjeuner correct
Super séjour!

Hotel familial à la parisienne très bien placé
Excellent accueil
pas publiciste ....
Always the best place in Paris to stay. As central as great is the team. The Rooms are so comfy.
Always a pleasure to stay at La Louisiane and to enjoy Saint Germain des Prés!
Best hotel ever.  Best service. Best location. Xavier is a best host .

Great hotel for a cheap price in the center of Paris, incredible neighborhood! The hotel has an unbeatable location. However, the room and bathroom weren't clean. There was dust everywhere, hair, huge stains on the bed covers...if it had been clean, I would recommend it 100%
接待很好,就是底下都是餐馆,凌晨依旧有点吵
Great hotel. Amazing location. 5 minutes from St Germain Abbey. 10 min from Louvre. Cheese market right outside every day. Feels like really being in Paris!
Ótimo custo benefício, localização ótima, com muito comércio em volta e perto do metrô. O hotel é um pouco velho, mas tudo estava limpo e organizado.

Great location....near metro station, restaurants, supermarket 
Received quick responses with correct information which helped to reach there from Airport.

Xavier’s place is exactly as described. My room was clean, simple, secure, and a good sleep. The rooms are not fancy or full of frills, they are just what you need at a good value. The staff was very helpful. The location was excellent! Wonderful cafes and a genuine cheese monger right out the door. The metro and taxi stand were within five minutes walking. Fantastic restaurants of any style you would like are an easy walk. I highly recommend this location if you want to be immersed into a vibrant and wonderful area of the city.
Good location and price, And this hotel has bathtub!!

Had a great stay at Hotel La Louisiane! It is an awesome location with a couple metro stops in close proximity, great restaurants just downstairs with street musicians playing sometimes. The room wasn’t anything extraordinary, but it did not leave anything out necessary for a great stay. Staff was great and helped out when needed. No smoke and mirrors, you get exactly what is advertised, would definitely recommend and would stay again. Hope I get the chance to!
Great place. Excellent hospitality and super location.

Great location, clean, breakfast was fantastic. We had requested parking and it was reserved for us right at the front door at not cost. We were allowed to check around 11:00am. The front desk staff treated us really well, I will stay there again!
早上入住大概等了半个小时,还不错｡前台的女士和小哥哥都非常好,能在力所能及范围内给你解决很多东西,还帮你打印东西｡总体来说,性价比还可以,离卢浮宫走路15分钟,巴黎圣母院走路10分钟,走路10秒正对面就是家乐福超市,楼下的餐厅都是很棒的,还有小酒吧｡朋友要多住两天也直接都不用换房,让直接在双人房,免得搬行李｡我定的比较晚,价格稍微贵一点点,可以早点订,总体来说不错啦｡
Excelente, realmente recomendable! Volvería sin duda!
立地がよく､ｽﾀｯﾌが親切で困ったことがあっても助けてくれます｡常にｽﾀｯﾌがいるので安心です｡
Hands down one of the best more active locations to stay at in Paris, the free breakfast was the best and check in was so easy! STAY HERE
Great little hotel in the heart of Paris. Clean, comfortable and easy to get to. Highly recommended.
Excellent value in an unbeatable location.  I am very lucky to have stayed here and I have recommended it to others.

I will definitely book this place again on my next trip to Paris. Not only were they able to squeeze me in last-minute (due to another reservation that fell through), but they were also able to find a spot for me to stay a few extra nights (even though Airbnb showed them as booked). The accommodations were welcoming - including free WiFi, free use of the laundry facilities and a complimentary breakfast. My second-floor room had an amazing balcony that was a perfect place to lounge in the mornings/evenings with the warm summer weather. Also, this B&B is very centrally located in the St. Germain district of Paris. It is right in the middle of the action and definitely where you want to be. The front desk staff was always very helpful, and all of them spoke at least some English, which was nice for someone who did not speak French.

What a lovely and quaint little hotel in the heart of the 11th arrond. of Paris. We only stayed one night as we were headed to the countryside the following day but our short stay was very pleasant. We arrived late in the evening and the front desk employee was kind and welcoming. The room itself is like any standard hotel room (no frills) but a comfy bed, a huge bathroom, plenty of closet space and wonderful window view of the Parisian streets below. They even offer free breakfast in the mornings. We would definitely stay here again if traveling to Paris.
Excelente ubicación , tienes dos estaciones del metro muy cerca y está muy buen ubicado para poder ir caminando a donde quieras

The room felt just a little bit run-down (carpet seemed a bit old and maybe a little dirty like you get in hotels sometimes). My room had a a balcony facing the street which was unexpected. Hotel staff changed my towels and sheets after my first night and cleaned the room. The location is great. Overall, price is excellent for the location. I don’t think it can be beat. Hopefully this is obvious, but this is definitely a standard hotel experience more than an Airbnb or hostel. The listing made this clear. I do want to thank the staff for letting me store my bags behind the desk after check out. I also really liked the free breakfast. It was a good quality and diversity of food. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for an affordable hotel in central Paris very close to the Louvre and the Norte Dam.
Great location and bed.
Very good area, nice hotel and host. Just make sure to communicate about check-in time and when will the room be ready.
Good location, hotel itself is a bit dated.
(Please see my other review)

I had a great stay at hotel la louisiane. The staff were always so helpful and nice, my room was clean and comfortable and the location simply could not be better from which to start exploring Paris. I hope to come back again and again
This place is steeped with history and is in the middle of it all. You can hear the city go to sleep and come to life in the morning. You could stay hear and never leave the general area!!
极好的位置,方便游客去各地｡房间味道有点大,应该是地毯发出来的,维护一般,早餐的供应不丰富｡不过总体来说性价比算高的｡对于最求性价比基本不在房间的游客足够了

Perfect location to visit Paris. We were a group of 6 people.
Basic rooms and basic breakfast, but everything is in there.
Very responsive and they accepted a modification of the reservation one day in advance.
Very much recommended! We would come back.

This hotel was able to accomadate for my large group of 22 guest! We would of loved to all be on the same floor but besides this we were very happy with the check in/ check out process and the complementary breakfast! The area is perfect as it is around MANY restaurants. The hotel is about 15 minutes from the Eiffel Tower! Only complaint is the hotel is a bit old looking on the outside but the bathrooms are definitely updated and very stylish! Def would recommend to any traveler ! They have 24 hour check in which is also a plus !

The hotel was quaint and homey feeling. We had all of the amenities we needed, and loved the location; close enough to walk to any of the touristy attractions, and the staff were friendly and very helpful.

Awesome as always 
This is my 5th stay at La Lousiane.
Love this hotel vibes (and spirits!?), the guests, the staff.. so genuine 
Will miss this place so much.  
Can not wait to be back.
Not to mention the location... 
thank you dear Igor !

Amazing time at La louisiane. It’s a beautiful genuine family owned hotel. It felt like home. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I was looking for a place to stay in the 6th arrondissement (one of the best place to enjoy the Parisian life)  
I was gonna stay for a week but everything went so well that I decided to extend my stay for ... 2 more weeks  !
I can’t wait to be back 
Special thanks to the best front desk agents Igor and Flavien ! And their amazing boss who is himself very interesting and genuine ! Felt good to be be taken care of by real people ! Thank you La Louisiane :)

Xaviers place was exactly what I needed. It has all the basics for a comfortable night's stay... And it is perfectly situated.. A five minutes walk from the Seine.. 10min to Musee d'Orsey..and 10min to Jardin Du Luxembourg. And so many lovely patisseries and wine shops and eating places right there.
Everyone I dealt with were very helpful and friendly. 
I would definitely recommend staying there and I will definitely be staying there the next time I am in Paris. (Its also so easy and quick to get to Gare d'Orde)

Thanks!! This was a great deal! The room was surprisingly way bigger than i expected considering how  reasonable the price was. The bathroom with a very nice tub was also quite a surprise . It looked like it was newly renovated. And the decent breakfast was another great bonus. The location’s also PERFECT. Will stay here again for sure.
Perfectly situated hotel, very comfortable for the price. Very friendly staff, I really enjoyed my stay.
Great location, but a filthy hotel
excellent
Fantastic location!
Perfect location.  Clean room.  Thank you!

I had such a wonderful time in Paris because of Xavier's place. In the heart of St. Germain it was such an easy trip for a solo senior traveler.  All of the sites, like Notre Dame and the Lourve,  were close enough to walk. Delight in the sounds of life as diners feast and singers serenade you at restaurants on the street below then close the soundproof windows for a good nights sleep. I will be back to experience the hospitality of Hugo, Xavier and the wonderful, helpful staff. It was comfortable and affordable, I couldn't be more pleased. Merci beaucoup!
Lovely staff, however until they get rid f the rat infestation, would not recommend it.
nice little space fairly close to the subway. I had a booking snafu at another location and they were very accommodating despite the fact.
classical hotel retouched for the mordern times. Better for when you want a bit of privacy over the hostel option. Amazing staff and the complementary breakgast is a nice touch.

1. Great location, walking to all the attractions along the Seine River.
2. Very friendly staffs, they are helpful and wiling to help.
3. I have no complaint, except not suggesting a travel  to Paris in August when it is too hot, way-way too hot, intolerable.
Spacious Rooms in a great location.
Great location!

As far as location goes, this is it but the noise from the bars goes until 1 and the trucks rumble in for a noisy start for the next day at about 5... make sure you are a heavy sleeper.

Minimal amenities, 1 small bar fridge, no laundry and no TV made the stay a little more difficult than it would otherwise have been.

As a basic central place though, good for a few nights.

This hotel was in a GREAT location. Very walkable neighborhood, everything you need is within a block distance - cafe’s, grocery, bakery, metro etc. 
The only thing that I was a bit thrown off by was the amount of noise happening outside at 5 am, the grocery across the street begins to unload their products and it was a rude awakening on both mornings I stayed here. Wish i would have had some ear plugs. Otherwise, this location was great. A bang for your buck due to central location.

Muy buena ubicación, al frente se encuentra un supermercado que tiene de todo.
Las instalaciones son buenas
Ottima pisizione che compensa un hotel di media qualita

It’s a very good option if you want something pretty good located near to supermarket, pharmacy, restaurants, bars and main attractions.

Is not a luxury hotel and the breakfast is pretty simple, however has a comfortable bed and breakfast. In summer gets pretty hot and the rooms have not AC, and not all of them have Fans... so it is important you to have In mind if you are going in summer.

This hotel was fantastic! It’s in a great location and was easy to find from the metro station. The rooms were clean  and tidy and well maintained. The building had fantastic character and fits in well with the area. The breakfast provided was perfect for what we needed. We booked for 12 people and was accommodated well! I would happily stay here again and would recommend it to everyone! Thanks!!

It's a good little hotel in a great location. I'm not sure why they use airbnb for booking; the experience upon arrival is that of a proper hotel. No frills but nothing at all unsatisfactory. I would recommend.
Xavier, place was a the description and they were very helpful

I had a great time in Paris. The location of the hotel, and the friendliness and helpfulness of staff made this place just right for me. I wasn't looking for posh (which I can't afford) but did want comfort. I slept well, the room had lots of light, and was convenient to everything I was looking for.

Great location, wonderful people! I did not explore Paris but I noticed that it's close to everywhere/downtown/center but also great location for eating out and bakeries! I booked Xavier's place twice!!
Perfect location, great value for money, helpful staff. We stayed with a group of friends and couldn't have wished for a better place to stay.

El hotel tiene una ubicación insuperable. Hay restaurantes muy variados al rededor y llegas caminando a Notre Dame, Louvre, Campos Eliseos, Jardines de Luxemburgo y otras atracciones de París.

El personal es muy atento, el cuarto es amplio.

The location is fantastic and the hotel was perfect for our needs, I love the slightly shabby feel and would rather pay a more modest price than have every mod con at my disposal. The noise from the Street was just what you expect in the center of Paris and the local, shops, restaurants and market were wonderful esp the cheese and fruit stalls outside the door. 
Many thanks to all
Excelente ubicación, excelentes anfitriones, buen precio, super recomendable
再次入住这家酒店,意外发现这里还提供免费的早餐｡不知道上次是前台忘记告诉我还是我自己的原因,连续住了五天都没有吃到早餐｡虽然是简单的牛角包,果泥和橙汁,但我以为已经是非常丰富的了,侍者十分热情,感受很好｡剩下的就不赘述了,上次的评价已经写的很详细了｡

非常让人满意的房源,不过这是一家旅店而并不是房东的私人住所｡Hotel的位置非常好,不管是交通还是日常生活都非常便捷,楼下就有一家家乐福,可以买到任何生活用品,街角的面包店承包了我每日的早餐,附近餐馆甜品店冰激凌都非常棒｡在这个地段还有如此价格的住宿可以说别无他求了｡店员也非常棒,英语十分流利,交流完全没有问题,不会像有些法国人那样说你听不懂的英语,每天回家他们都会和你打招呼,十分热心｡行程下一站去往尼斯的机票订单之前没有打印,还是这里的店员帮我完成的,她还热心地告诉我应该怎么去奥利机场(虽然rer b停运了我最后选择了别的线路)｡总之是非常棒的住宿体验!我回国还要从巴黎飞,打算还是住在这里,两段住宿加起来正好七天还享受了折扣,简直不要更棒!
Great location. Helpful personnel. Fast Internet.
Great location, coffee shops, bakeries, bus and metro all over town, very close to Notre Dame cathedral, outside front door a great street market .  Vive la

Even if it is not a classical airbnb, this is a great space in the hearth of the "good old Paris" that may save your life in case you have to book last minute and you want to be sure someone will be there for you! The kindness of the people working at reception is noticeable.
PS: I have noticed that if you book after 8pm price will be reduced :)
The area is all right.  A little congested on the street, and no quiet mornings.

This small place is nice and in a wonderful location, busy with Many nice restaurants and comunication to the city. 
Good service and gracious mini breakfast.
번화가 한가운데 위치해있어서 즐기기에는 좋은 위치였습니다만, 그런만큼 주변 소음이 많아서 시끄럽네요. 자동차 주차공간이 있다고 하였으나 주차공간은 없었네요. 차를 가지고 숙박을 하시는 분은 비추입니다. 젊음의 거리에서 늦게까지 즐기고 싶으신 분에게는 적합한 곳입니다.
This is a storied and amazingly convenient and charming hotel. Great location, nice staff, and a great deal. Also has super fast wifi, which you don't usually find in this generation of hotel.
Nothing can bid its location. Great service with 24hour availability. Highly recommend for groups.

I adore this place. It's classic old Paris. A bit worn around the edges in some places but it's clean a bit noisy outside and it's in the thick of everything in the West Bank. I'll stay here often when I'm traveling through Paris.
Felt like a real Parisien. Would love to return to my attic room.
a surprising note in a vibrant neighborhood

The location couldn't be better. The wifi service is as good as you will get even in the most expensive hotels. Easy & seamless. The hotel is a cute little low key place like an old Aussie pub (I didn't find anywhere that looked like the pic on airbnb) I really enjoyed my stay! Thnx Xavier et team
Wonderful location - couldn't be better. Wifi that works as well and easily as anywhere I have ever stayed

Excellent location, closeness to Seine and lots of famous attractions. A nice place, in a nice district. Just be careful when you book a twin beds room, check if they mean 2 separate beds or one double bed.  In our case twin beds meant one double bed, which was inconvenient for two people not in a close relationship. We decided not to change the room as we were tired, probably they would change it if we asked, but we didn't. But just make sure what you book before the arrival. In general, the hotel left a good impression.
Clean. Great neighborhood. Super friendly staff. Helped me get oriented and figure out the public transportation. Nice breakfast. Would stay here again!
C’était parfait !
C’est vraiment top. Rien à dire.
Très bien
Appartement très propre et grands lits confortables, personnel accueillant et souriant. De plus des quartiers proches sont très sympathiques. Je recommande l'adresse :D
La villa Daubenton est idealmente située et au calme. Pratique pour un pied à terre sur Paris.
Très bon accueil, bien situé

Endroit très propre, vous disposez d'un parking sûr et pas trop cher. Vous avez un concierge par conséquent par d'heure d'arrivée obligatoire et l'endroit est bien placé.

Cordialement
Literie propre et confortable , appartement superbe idéalement situé pour notre séjour jardin du Luxembourg à deux pas , petite terrasse jardin pour le café du matin top
Apparemment agréable et bien situé dans un quartier vivant mais calme. Cependant il ne faut pas se fier au photos de l’annonce.

Appartement dans un établissement type appart-hôtel. Notre appartement était fraîchement rénové, décoré avec goût et très fonctionnel. Accès sur une terrasse qui peut être très agréable quand il fait beau. Avantage d'avoir une réception ouverte 24h/24 et possibilité de commander un petit déjeuner servi en chambre. Je recommande !
Appartement tres propre, moderne, bien équipé. Je recommande vivement !
