Christophe’s place was superb and perfect in every way! The staff was very helpful and lovely and Christophe made sure our stay was pleasant. A good choice !
不错  适合5.6个人住都可以,就是有点小贵｡不过房间好得超过你的想象

Nice place, nice location, etremely friendly staff. One star off because it
smelled of cigarette smoke in the apartment.

Excellent apartment and location for our family of 6.  Very good team.  Note that apartment had 2 bath showers but just 1 toilet.

The washer downstairs...right one took 2 hours and there was only 1 dryer.  Faster to just go to the launder-mat one block away.

Great location. There is a concierge to help with check in which is  nice. The unit was dark and needs more lighting and the bathrooms need updating. We had an issue with the a/c but the host did correct it during our stay. Initial slow response but then became more responsive. Safe location near lots of restaurants and attractions in Latin Quarter.
Chambre agréable. Merci à vous. Emplacement assez agréable.
Chambre confortable et calme à proximité du centre ville et de la gare RER donnant un accès aisé à la gare de Lyon, et très bonne organisation / communication, obrigado Patrick !
Logement parfaitement conforme, très propre et bien situé. Accueil aimable et très réactif.
De très gentils brésiliens . Très discret . je recommande pour un court séjour. bon rapport qualité prix .
Très bon séjour, logement proche du RER D à 1 arrêt de Paris.
Fortement conseillé
Communication simple et très bon rapport prestation prix
Très bon accueil
Petite chambre cosy, idéal pour une nuit de passage à 5 minutes de la gare pour aller à Paris centre.
Chambre propre, tout à disposition et proche par rapport aux moyens de transport.

J'ai été très bien accueilli et le logement est tres propre.
Dans la chambre il y a réfrigérateur et table.
Seule la douche ne correspondait pas a mes attentes (débit faible pour avoir de l'eau suffisamment chaude a mon goût) .
Les hotes sont tres discrets.

Hôte très agréable et discret. Flexible et sympa avec ses locataires. 
Je recommande vivement !!

Les hôtes sont vraiment très discret, ce qui est vraiment très agréable. Le logement est dans un endroit calme et bien placé.
En revanche, la cuisine et la salle de bain manque de propreté à mon goût... Et pour prendre une douche, c'est très compliqué car l'eau ne coule quasiment pas quand on met l'eau chaude...
Je recommande, parfait !
Accueil simple et rapide! J'ai pu aller faire du sport et revenir manger après vers 20h30! Proporeté au rdv et arrangement ok! Juste un bémol le vis à vis avec un garage de réparation!
Bien accueilli, un petit bemo est qu'on est en colloque sinon super
N'hésitez pas c'est la bonne adresse !
Chambre et appartement très propre et calme, proche de la gare. Patrick est très réactif par message, un grand MERCI pour l'accueil.
En raison de la grève nationale je n ai pas pu y aller mais l echange téléphonique était très bien.
Hôtes très gentils, chambre et parties communes impeccables, je recommande à 100%.
Parfait pour une week-end à Paris. Très bon emplacement. La chambre est super propre et bien équipée.

Je suis passé encore sur un séjour très court . Patrick est super réactif . Il m’a accueilli à mon arrivée et m’ a présenté la chambre . Elle est vraiment très propre . Et pour le prix ce n’est vraiment pas mal dans ce secteur . Juste en face de la gare . C’est agréable.
Des gens très gentils et agréables

On ne se sent pas forcément à l'aise d'aller directement chez les gens quand ils y sont aussi. Et bien chez Patrick Nuria, c'est vite oublié ! Vous profitez d'une chambre propre, d'un endroit calme à 5 minutes de la gare de Lyon en RER et en plus, vous avez un petit frigo dans la chambre. N'hésitez pas !
Merci Patrick pour votre accueil chaleureux
L'appartement est bien situé à 5min du Rer, proche de Paris. La chambre était très propre,  et les hôtes très accueillants. Je recommande.
Logement au top qualité prix !
très bien, rien à redire.
Très bien
Chambre correspondant a la photo et à la localisation. C était  parfait mais il vaut mieux rappeler Patrick la veille de votre arrivée .
3 ème semaine chez Patrick et son épouse, je recommande toujours chaleureusement mes hôtes ;-)
2ème séjour chez Patrick et je suis toujours ravie! Je recommande!

Je recommande vivement le logement de Patrick et son épouse, situé à deux pas de la station RER et des arrêts de bus.
Le logement est très propre, très agréable et calme. Vous disposerez d’un petit frigo dans la chambre si vous souhaitez faire des courses.
Les hôtes sont charmants... bref vous passerez un excellent voyage !

Logement d'une propreté impeccable, proche du RER et du bus. À 2 km à peine du métro 8. Patrick et sa famille sont très accueillants et discrets, mais néanmoins présents à la moindre question. Je suis plus que satisfaite du séjour et je n'hésiterai pas à revenir !

Le chargeur de mon téléphone a été pris dans ma chambre par le propriétaire et retrouvé dans son salon (utilisé) puisque le cordon et la prise était séparé.
Pas de télé dans la chambre 
Simple couvre lit comme couverture
....... Déçu !
Merci pour bonne accueil

Très facile d accès par le RER (6 mn de la gare de Lyon .
chambre très propre et confortable. pour un cours  séjour je vous le conseil.

Chambre très agréable, propreté impeccable, salle de bain top.
Proximité immédiate du Rer, 1,6 km du métro.
Je garde cette adresse précieusement pour un prochain séjour.

Chambre dans appartement calme et très bien situé. Moins de 10 minutes à pieds de la gare RER. Accueil sympathique. Présence d'un mini frigo dans la chambre ce qui est un "plus " appréciable. Appartement très propre. Très bon rapport qualité/prix

Un accueil très sympathique, la famille de Patrick est très respectueuse et discrète 
Chambre calme et confortable, je recommande vivement !
Chambre à côté du Rer. proche des commerces.

Je devais passer un entretien très important dans une grande école de Paris, j'avais besoin de tranquillité et de calme j'ai agréablement été servit, l'emplacement est nickel pas de bruit quartier vraiment calme, Patrick nous laisse autonome ce qui est très bien si on recherche du calme, pour les horaires d'arrivés et départ il est flexible. venant de Nice j'ai apprécié ce séjour parisien chez Patrick Merci encore.
tout s'est très bien passé. Appartement calme, agréable et bien entretenu
La chambre proposée par Patrick est idéale ! Un très bon endroit. Je recommande.
Je vous conseille cet hôte. Tout était très bien !

Très bien reçu dans un petit appartement très propre.
À renouveler
Un bon séjour chez Patrick très tranquille

Merci beaucoup pour l'accueil, séjour très agréable. Patrick est discret et vous laisse autonome. Les colocataires sont super sympas aussi, tout est propre et le logement est idéalement situé et calme. Je recommande !
super ! merci
Chambre très agréable avec un bon lit dans un appartement 1930 bien situé à proximité du RER. L'accueil est discret et prévenant et Patrick est très arrangeant.
Logement très propre , et très bien situé

Propre et très bien placé. Le quartier est calme et les hotes très sympathique!

Very clean and well located. The area is quiet and the host are really nice. I spent a really nice stay there! 
Obrigado Patrick!
Juste parfait, conforme a la description. Propreté impec, discretion. Merci Patrick.
Je conseil
Agréable séjour. Conforme à mes attentes. Je vous le recommande vivement.
Très bon séjour chez Patrick dans un logement très facile d'accès et tout proche de Paris en transports ! n'hésitez pas
Très accueillant ! Adresse très pratique

Patrick vous accueillera avec beaucoup de gentillesse et d'attention (biscuits et thé/infusion dans la chambre).  La chambre et le reste de l'appartement est au top. La localisation est également idéale pour se rendre à Paris (RER à moins de cinq minutes à pied) et le lieu est proche des commerces au centre de Maisons-Alfort. Je recommande sans réserve ce logement. Merci encore Patrick !
hôte disponible et gentil maison agréable et confortable quelques petites attentions, patrick a été arrangeant ce que j'ai bcp apprécié. La gare est proche ce qui a facilité mon séjour.

Chambre très propre . Gite accueillant et disponible . 
Je recommande ce logement

facile a trouver et assez proche du rer sans avoir les bruit du rer
juste à coté d'un garage donc eventuellement bruit de ce coté
j'ai passé une bonne nuit et n’hésiterai pas a revenir si l'occasion se présente
merci pour les petites touches d'attention comme les thé gâteaux coton tige etc.

J'ai passé 3 jours impeccable. Hospitalité, discrétion et disponibilité. L'emplacement de l'appartement près du RER D est parfait. Appart propre, pareil la chambre et la toilette. En quelques minutes, on est au centre de Paris. Maisons-Alfort est également calme et agréable. Conseillé!
Merci à la famille qui a été très gentille... Maison bien situé très proche du RER D.

FR: L'appartement de Leonardo e Nuria (Patrick était en voyage) est très bien localisé, très proche de la gare Maisons Alford (RER D), en plus, il faut seulement une gare pour arrive à Paris (Gare de Lyon). La chambre est comme dans les photos et les descriptions. Les hôtes ont été très gentils et accueillants. J'aimerais séjourner autres fois chez eux.  // PT: O apartamento de Leonardo e Nuria (Patrick estava viajando) é muito bem localizado,  muito próximo da estação de trem Maisons Alford (linha RER D), ficando a apenas uma estação de Paris (Gare de Lyon). O quarto é como nas fotos e nas descrições. Os anfitriões foram muito gentis e acolhedores. Voltaria com certeza.
Bon emplacement, très proche de Paris. Chambre et salle de bain très propres. Merci pour ce séjour !
Une chambre et salle de bains propre, et un hôte sympa
Impeccable
Is far from the city center, but is ok
The place is totally lovely, the host is super nice person and helped me with anything. It’s not near from center of the Paris but you can take line D and go to Gare de Lyon in 20min.

A lovely, clean flat in a quite area, well connected by public trasport. The room had all its essentials and host was great. No lounge but I didn't really need it. A lovely discovery south east of Paris

I really enjoyed my time there. Patrick and his family are great people. They don't speak English really but do understand and speak Spanish. So if you know portuguese, Spanish or French you can communicate. I used Spanish and it was fine. The room is safe, clean and comfortable. The bed is heavenly. It's located less than a 6min walk to a metro station. It's worth it for the hospitality and location as well a price. Would definitely stay again.

The place is everything that's on the description, is not in Paris (as it's mentioned) but it's really easy to get to Paris centre and it's main attractions with the RER system (even though I visited Paris during the strikes) the room is perfect for a short or long stay. I felt very comfortable and had everythingI needed. I totally reccomend it.
It’s really clean place and great hospitality and personally I love it  thank you
Very nice host. Very clean house. Stylish. Super accommodating.  Would Recommend!

The room is clean and spacious. 
Super quick response from the host.
The hosts are friendly and have smiles all the time:)
Patricks place is clean and in a quiet area,very close to the train D line to get into Gare du Nord. He is a welcoming host.

Great location! Only a four minute walk from the train station, and quick to take the train into the city as well! It is the place you need when you will be busy all day and need to go and sleep at night. Patrick was a good host.

This place is clean, exactly how it looks in the pictures. The only downside to this Airbnb is that it is not as close to downtown Paris as I thought; however it is close to an RER station that could bring you directly to Paris in a couple of minutes. The host was very kind, but doesn't speak English. Would recommend for anyone looking for a quiet place to stay near Paris

They are super friendly. Even though they could not speak english, they always try to communicate with you in a nice way.

Great place to stay. 5 minutes walk to the station. Friendly environment. Clean house.

Thanks Patric and your family as well!

Espectacular todo! El lugar es como se ve en las fotos, me sentí muy cómodo, a Patrick no lo vi porque estuve siempre fuera pero respondió todas mis preguntas, volvería a hospedarme en su apartamento sin duda alguna

As previously described, this place is about a 5 minute walk from the train station, which gets you to Gare De Lyon in 5 minutes. From there, you need to spend more time on the train (I found it was about 20-30 minutes to get to the places I wanted to see), so definitely factor in travel time. Patrick and Nuria are truly lovely, down-to-earth hosts. Both are very warm. They speak French and Portuguese exclusively, so be prepared not to be able to converse in English. They were quite flexible with the reservation, which was handy. Note that the place is lived in, so does look a little different to the photos but that is to be expected. The room itself has a double bed, mini fridge, small desk, chair and a few drawers. If distance from the city isn't an issue, then go ahead and book.
He is very kind and It’s very easy to check in. Highly recommend.
Patrick is a sympathetic host, his apartment is nice and clean. With the next RER station being located within walking distance it is just a short journey for the city centre.

Though the check-in was not smooth for me as I had to wait outside like 30 mins, overall stay was okay. I liked the convinience of the location. Gare de Lyon is just 1 stop and takes only 5 mins.
Just one note is that I do not recommend so much for people who can not speak French or Spanish.
The space is clean and well maintained. The metro is about a 2 minute walk from the apartment and a 30 minutes train ride from some of the main historic sites.

Excellent value for your stay. Patrick's apartment is clean, homely, and has all the amenities you'll need. Be prepared to spend a decent amount on time on the train if you plan on visiting central Paris (the city is about 35 min away).
Place was a described and very handy to city. Would recommend

I love Patrick's neighborhood.  It's quiet and I felt.very safe walking alone at night.

Patrick is very friendly and helpful.   I would definitely reserve a spot on my next Paris visit.
La casa de la familia de Patrick es tranquila, limpia y cómoda. Patrick es muy atento y hospitalario.
A acomodação é exatamente como mostrada nas fotos. O anfitrião é muito atencioso e respondeu minhas dúvidas sempre muito rápido. A localização é próxima a estação de RER e isso ajuda muito.

The room is cosy and clean with everything you could need. It is in a great location, close to the station and only about 5 minutes from central Paris via the train. The area itself is very nice with plenty of supermarkets and bakeries. Would recommend.
Room was clean and also the bathroom and comfort room. Near subway, all in all its good! Thanks Pat
Great place close to the city. Patrick’s is friendly host and the accommodations are excellent.

I very much enjoyed my stay at Patrick‘s house! (: Everything was exactly as described and the communication was flawless. 

The location is very nice and charming -  it‘s in a quiet area but the train to Paris is very close by and you‘re at the Gare de Lyon in a heartbeat.

I had a wonderful time and would always come back. Can definitely recommend!
Very good location - 5min from the RER train which connects you to the whole of Paris

Very important note for Americans / foreigners: (Hidden by Airbnb) & Apple Maps will bring up "22" instead of "2Bis". So be sure to walk down the street to 2Bis, if you end up taking a taxi or Uber to Patrick's place! 
Patrick was a great host. I believe he shares his place with two other people, as they were in the living room when I arrived. The room is lovely, with a nice firm bed. The area is quaint with a few cute restaurants close-by. 
The Maisons-Alfort train station is a 5min walk that will take you to the main train stations in Paris: Paris de Lyon and Paris du Nord. 
Merci, Patrick!

The host was great, the communication  was seemless, the apartment was fantastic, the staff at the hotel really nice and helpful, location is one of the best in Paris,
the lobby  and elevators are old and not clean, I really hope they renovate the them soon, but as soon as you pass the lobby and elevators, you are in a wonderful Apt in the heart of Paris, tastefully renovated, bright, spacious, and with an amazing view. Great value. I will stay there again. I have lived in Paris and now traveling to Paris often for work, I know Paris well and to me this apt was one of the best I have ever stayed in the heart of Paris.

The suite was great with a spacious and renovated bathroom. There was a cute little terrace that you could hang out and through some of the windows you could see sacre cour in the distance. 
it was nice that it was part of the hotel so amenities were taken care of and it was much more renovated than the rest of the hotel. Great location on a shopping street and convenient area to plaza vendome, walking distance of many shops, restaurants, etc.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Véronique. La chambre est parfaite, l'appartement est grand et tout est très propre. Niveau chauffage, l'appart est très bien chauffé. Véronique nous a préparé le petit dèj le lendemain matin, bref une bonne adresse. En prime, la jolie vue sur le cours st émilion (joliment illuminé pour Noël). La localisation est idéale pour venir voir un spectacle à Bercy. Même pas besoin de reprendre le métro en sortant. Le quartier est calme et tranquille, aucun bruit pendant la nuit. A recommander !
Merci à Véronique pour son accueil très chaleureux. Mon séjour fut bref mais agréable. Chambre et quartier très sympa. Je réserverai à nouveau sans hésiter.

Toujours très bien accueilli chez Veronique. Chambre calme et propre et quartier sympa avec un grand complexe de cinéma. Je reviendra avec plaisir.

J'ai passé un excellent séjour chez Véronique qui est une hote très accueillante et très sympathique. 
La chambre est comme décrit dans l'annonce. Calme et confortable, à l'extrémité de l'appartement. 
Il est situé juste en face de Bercy village, très sympa avec shops, Resto et un grand complexe cinéma. A deux pas du parc très bien pour un petit jogging! 
Je recommande la chambre de Veronique.

Veronique est charmante et tres sympa.  En semaine, elle travail avec des enfants ailleurs donc il faut bien agreer avec elle l'heure qu'on arrive parce qu'elle ne peut pas etre a la maison au hasard.
   L'appartement est moderne, bien chauffe et silencieux.  Troisieme etage avec ascenseur. La chambre est jolie, propre et net.  Le lit confortable.  Le petit-dejeuner peut donner la possibilite de parler francais ou anglais avec Veronique.  
   L'apartement se situe a cote du marche de Bercy (plein de restaurants et magasins), 3 minutes a pied du metro Cour St Emilion et @ 10 minutes a pied du AccorHotels Arena de Bercy (l'ancien Palais Omnisports de Bercy).  
Staying here was perfect for this trip to Paris for me.

Excellent location, place is easy to access and in a safe neighbourhood. Host was very kind and accessible at all times.

The apartment  is kept very clean & tidy & the breakfast is a pleasant surprise. Veronique  was very friendly and helpful  with tips and information.

The room was great and exactly like in the photos! I didn't realize that we would be staying in the same place as her and her son but it was nice to meet people even though we were only in her place very briefly. Th location is very central for transit (metro, bus, train).  Lovely stay!

Veronica was a very welcoming host, room was nice and clean and location convenient for exploring Paris and travelling. It is close to metro and train stations and also easily reached by public transport from Paris Orly (shuttle bus + RER + 1 metro stop).

To be honest I did not feel welcome.  The host seemed very introverted and basically not friendly.  The apartment was very glum - no lighting in the eating area.  No light in the corridor to the toilet.
Breakfast consisted of the least and cheapest food possible.  Packaged croissants, white bread, margarine! The last two days coffee was not even offered.  Really felt the place was overpriced and was hoping for real French food and hospitality.  No key was offered to the room until I asked for one.
Going to the shower or the toilet I wore the bath towel around my waist and was told by the host that "this was France" and that I should wear more clothes!  Could not believe this remark!  Thought I was in Saudi Arabia, not France!

Veronique is a very warm and friendly human being and a very good hostess.I enjoyed staying in her apt and the good continental breakfast.The apt was clean and close to a metro station and restaurants...I highly recommend her place and hope to come back in the future.Thanks,Joseph
We only stayed one night, but Veronique was quite welcoming.  The location is close to the metro and the Gare de Lyon and in a lively and interesting area of town.  Too bad we couldn't stay longer.
Mrs. Veronique is a lovely lady. It was a nice staying for me. The apartment is cozy. The location is also good for exploring the city.
pas de commentaire

Gros soucis post location avec Justin 

L'ami pour qui j'ai loué le airbnb est parti avec  un peu de retard, qu'il a régularisé en versant 20 euros à la dame qui s'occupait du ménage ce jour là.

Je me suis questionné par rapport à la légalité de la chose sur airbnb sachant que ce n'était même pas écrit dans l'annonce mais par correction il les a payé 

Par la suite j'ai reçu de nombreux sms me disant qu'en gros nous mentions, que les 20 euros n'avaient pas été versés et qu'il fallait que je fasse un virement de 40 euros via airbnb pour dédommager l'hôte.

Je me questionne toujours sur la légalité des faits et je vais poser la question à airbnb 
Je ne louerai plus chez cet hôte et là dessus je pense que c'est réciproque.

En cas de litige, le plus simple est de contacter airbnb directement plus que d'essayer de soutirer de l'argent par SMS.

Emplacement idéal pour ce petit appartement où l'espace est parfaitement optimisé. Nous n'avons eu aucun contact direct avec l'hôte, uniquement avec son fils, visiblement agacé de devoir nous communiquer les infos essentielles pour l'accès (avions oublié d'imprimer la page du site). Quelques couacs : le code de la porte communiqué par sms était erroné, puis il a fallu resortir pour acheter du papier toilette (manquant), pas de savon pour se laver les mains...
L'appartement est extrêmement bruyant (on entend trop clairement le voisinage faire sa vaisselle à 2h du matin, et l'appartement est situé au rez de chaussée, la baie vitrée fait face au local à poubelles qui sont bougées très tôt le matin...). L'appartement est très bien chauffé, néanmoins nous avons eu froid la nuit : le lit est situé sous un puit de lumière occulté d'un plaid mais non isolé... Enfin, des fils électriques laissés apparents le long du miroir de salle bains au-dessus du lavabo ne sont guère rassurants. Autre regret : pas de table ni de chaise, donc pas pratique pour prendre un repas ou juste un petit déjeuner sur place.
3ème séjour
L'appartement de Catherine était conforme à la description et la situation est parfaite pour visiter Paris et pour accéder aux gares et aéroports. Nous avons vraiment apprécié.

L'appartement est très bien situé à proximité à la fois de très beaux monuments mais aussi des 2 principaux grands magasins parisiens. Nous sommes arrivés assez tard et le ménage n'avait pas été fait. C'est assez désagréable après un long voyage. Après avoir prévenu Justin, il est arrivé très vite et s'est occupé de réparer la bévue. L'appartement est très confortable mais un nettoyage poussé ne serait pas un mal. Un autre petit désagrément lorsque nous nous sommes aperçus d'une fuite au lavabo. Donc pas possible de s'en servir. Malgré ces petits tracas, peu importants, nous avons passé un séjour bien agréable. A noter comme nous l'avait dit Justin, il est facile de trouver une place de parking pour la voiture le soir dans la rue.

Bref, excellent rapport qualité / prix ! Merci beaucoup !

Justin est très facile a contacter par email, je n'ai croisé que la personne qui nettoie l'appartement et il a été très gentil. Et pour moi le point le plus positif, est l'emplacement, pas loin de la Gare St Lazare et du boulevard Haussmann, idéale pour faire du shopping ou aller manger quelque part. Je recommande vraiment ce logement.

Super emplacement et équipement. Dommage pour l humidité.
Bien situé
Appartement très bien placé à proximité d'une ligne de métro  principale.  Justin & Catherine ont été très ouvert à nos demandes.

Attention la belle présentation ne correspond pas à la réalité : pas de tapis rouge, pas de canapé, remplacé par un lit à tiroirs trop haut pour s’assoír et les petits fauteuils rétro sont très inconfortables.
Le petit jardin est en fait le prolongement de la cours d’entrée, face au local poubelles !!!
Mauvais état général et propreté douteuse.
Il y a des SOURIS la nuit....
A éviter !
Bel appartement super bien situé, calme, bien décoré, beaux équipements, excellent rapport qualité-prix. Merci!
Magnifique appartement deco a tomber et emplacement ideal pour visiter Paris.

Super!

Catherine et Justin ont été très réactifs et dispo alors que nous les avons sollicité en dernière minute.

L’appartement est tres fonctionnel et les lits sont très confortables. 

Système récupération des clefs très pratique. 

A recommender.
Appartement très moyennement propre. Extrêmement humide. Très bruyant par temps de pluie en raison du velux au dessus du lit qui devient un tambour par temps de pluie.

Parfaitement guidé par Catherine et Quentin, j'ai facilement trouvé l'appartement. Fonctionnel et très bien agencé, il est situé a une centaine de mètres du metro Madeleine.  Très bon séjour et bon rapport qualité prix. Je recommande.

Très bon emplacement, propre et calme. Idéal pour 2 personnes. 
Proche des commerces.
Appartement judicieusement situé, dans une rue calme entre Madeleine et les Grands Magasins.
Très bon emplacement, calme, idéal pour une-deux personnes, prix raisonnable
bon sejour a Paris dans cet appartement extremement bien situé.
Appartement agréable et fonctionnel très bien placé et calme avec très bonne connexion wifi.

Emplacement excellent, l’agacement intérieur très bien fait, confortable, fort odeur d’humidité, douche bouchée, propreté à faire des efforts, finissions n’est pas terrible « câbles sans prise qui fait un danger de l'electricité, etc.". je recommande ce logement une fois les problèmes sont résolus.

Logement bien décoré, bien equipé  et tres bien placé pour une escapade à Paris, proximité des grands magasins et bien desservi par les transports en commun ce qui permet de rejoindre facilement les autres quartiers parisiens .

Excellente localisation. Bel appartement bien meublé. 

Pas nettoyé à mon arrivée, l'hôte s'est excusé et à offert de rembourser la première nuit.

A mon arrivée, l'appartement était dans un état pitoyable (voir ci-dessous). Après avoir contacté les hôtes, ils m'ont assuré que cela était la première fois que cela arrivait, alors que j'ai par la suite trouvé 5 personnes ayant auparavant eu la même expérience que moi. Mes relances aux propriétaires de cet appartement sont restées sans réponse. J'ai donc du quitter l'appartement et trouver un logement en urgence. Séjour dans cet appartement à éviter et attitude inadmissible.

- Chambre : les draps et les serviettes de bain étaient sales et sur le lit, la table de nuit était presque renversée. J'ai même trouvé un énorme insecte à côté du lit.
- Salle de bain : traces de dentifrice et des taches noires (aucune idée de ce que cela était) dans l'évier. Des trainées de dentifrice sur tout l'extérieur du lavabo jusqu'au sol. Le tapis de bain est également sale et la douche est bouchée et pleine de cheveux. Les gels de bains probablement des anciens locataires sont toujours dans la douche. 
- Propreté : l'appartement était extrêmement sale - de la poussière partout, j'éternuai à répétition. 
- Cuisine : les poubelles n'étaient pas vidées, la poubelle cassée, le torchon sale. 
- Salon, tâches sur les fauteuils. 
- Sécurité : Deux ampoules pendent du plafond.
- Communication avec l'hôte : j'ai envoyé un email le matin de mon arrivée afin de rappeler ma venue et savoir si quelqu'un me recevrais mais personne ne m'a répondu. Au vu de l'état de l'appartement j'ai fais plusieurs relances afin de savoir quand le ménage pourrait être fait. Je n'ai jamais eu de retour.

Tout s'est bien passé. L'appart correspond à la description et aux photos. Tout était propre, l'appartement très bien situé dans une rue calme mais aussi à deux pas du métro. La petite terrasse est aussi un vrai plus. Seul bémol, je n'ai pas réussi à m'endormir dans la chambre car il y a une sorte de fenêtre dans le plafond qui laisse entrer de la lumière même la nuit donc j'ai dormi dans le salon, mais c'était très confortable aussi. Attention aussi à bien lire le règlement intérieur qui indique comment accéder à l'appartement! Globalement, une très bonne expérience, je recommande!
Tres charmant studio très bien situé

l'appartement de Justin est très confortable ainsi que tres facile d'atteindre!!
solution optimale pour un seul voyageur et très agréable pour un couple
antonio
Everything was what i expected and more ! Very well located and a great space.
Nice
Ras

Good place, great location. 
A small misunderstanding about towels and sheets but Justin has been really reactive!
Super
Top
房子位置很好，屋子很亮堂，有两个门禁非常安全，房东人很好

Excellent emplacement, dans un cadre très calme, l’appartement est conforme aux photos. Le système de clés original et la propreté irréprochable. Justin&Catherine répondent très rapidement aux messages. Je recommande ! 
超级棒的地理位置，离老佛爷、春天百货、歌剧院都很近，位于一栋巴黎老建筑的底层，非常安静，干净整洁，大床加上沙发床睡四个人完全没有问题。推荐！
The location was fantastic and the apartment, although small had all amenities and was very practical and suited our needs for the 24 hours we were in Paris. Thank you.
Excellent

Great location to explore Paris. Very prompt response to inquiries. A bit small for a family of three (parents and a 9 year old). Probably works better for a couple or a single. Well equipped apartment (even with a printer, although we didn’t use it) but no dish washer. It would be hard to cook a meal in the tiny kitchen, but you are surrounded by great restaurants so why bother!
Excellent location. Wonderful host.

The apartment had not been cleaned after the visit of the previous traveler.
Bed not redone, dirty sheets, dirty towels on the ground, bathroom and shower not cleaned ... in brief, not the shade of a domestic activity! Of course, I looked for a hotel for the night…
Immediately (it was 11pm and I was very tired), I called the owner, Airbnb called the owner, I sent messages and I received finally a message (partially incomprehensible) only 3 days later...
Dulcis in fundo : I’ve been losing money which nobody apparently will pay off to me!
I am really disgusted!

L’appartement n'avait pas été nettoyé après le passage du précédent voyageur.
Lit pas refait, draps sales, serviettes sales et par terre, salle de bain et douche pas nettoyés... bref, pas l'ombre d’une activité de ménage! Bien évidement je suis allé à la recherche d’un Hotel…
Après avoir trouvé une telle situation dans l'appartement (c’était 23h et j’étais très très fatiguée), j'ai appelé le propriétaire sans succès, Airbnb a appelé le propriétaire sans succès, j'ai envoyé des messages  au propriétaire et j'ai reçu enfin un message (en partie incompréhensible) seulement 3 jours après...
Dulcis in fundo : j’ai perdu de l’argent que personne apparemment me remboursera !
Je suis vraiment dégoutée !
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice flat, centrally located. Great value for money. very easy check in at any time.
Great flat, really well located! The bed is amazingly comfortable. I was there for a business meeting and that night was perfect!
Nice host

I had an amazing time staying at the apartment. Although I have had a problem with the key on arrival, it was quickly resolved by Justin. The location is excellent. There are markets, restaurants and stores right close by walking distance. The public transport is also very close. The apartment is quite, well decorated and with good facilities. I loved it!
It is a good house and very comfortable. We love it so much.

Cosy apartment, very well situated. I will certainly come back again. 
Thanks for all.

The experience was flawless. The location is quiet yet central. Apartment is small but cozy, with a true Parisian feel. There's even a sort of private entrance to the flat —  directly through glass doors that give directly to the private secluded courtyard. Price is very sensible, given the location almost next to Madeleine square. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a true Parisian vacation alone or with a couple.

A fairly good experience for us (being newcomers to Airbnb).
Logistics were very easy - appartment is in good condition with all the required equipment.  Very good location in Paris 8eme.

Only caveats :
> TV not working in teh living room (easy fix I'm sure)
>  no phone signal in the appartment (might be specific to SFR)
>  Noisy roof window above the bed when it rains..

But overall a good experience - thank you.

My friend and I stayed in Justin's flat for a long week end and it was perfect! Justin gave us all the information we needed prior to our arrival. The check in/ check out could not have been any easier. The flat is really well located, closed to the metro station, supermarket, shops, bakeries, restaurants, touristic monuments, l'Olympia concert hall (10 minutes walk). The flat was very quiet (even with the rain), cozy, well equipped and clean. The bed is also super comfy! 
Justin is a very nice host, that communicates well and is easily reachable (mobile phone or email). I definitely recommend his flat  and would stay there again.
Many thanks again Justin!
Tidy and very quiet apartment. Excellent location. Justin was kind, helpful and very easy to communicate with.

Very lovely and helpful hosts. 
The studio is full of light, well decorated and in a super quiet street even though it is in the center (very chic center) of Paris.

The flat is very well located and close to the main shopping district of Paris. It is in the courtyard of a lovely building. It is very well equipped and decorated!
The thing I dislike is the lack of privacy since the only window/entrance gives on the courtyard and you can't really leave the curtains open while in the flat.... The flat was not really clean when I arrived and had to change the bedsheets myself. Apart from these 2 details it would suit perfectly a young couple.
We loved the flat and its location, it's everything you need to have a perfect stay. And Justin is an excellent host.
Wonderful place would recommend to all that wish to stay in pairs
Good location, nice for 1  night with 4, just need a bit of refreshing.
Great location, very quick replies and welcome. Amazing shower and comfortable bed

Great location, lovely hosts and the flat is small but very very nice. 
Just note that there is no divider between the bathroom and the bedroom, but the toilet is separate.

We loved staying at Justin and  Catherine’s place. It’s a small, cute little studio in a perfect spot in Paris, so easy to get anywhere from here. Justin was incredibly accommodating and let Us drop or bags off early  so we could explore. It was very clean, comfortable, everything you need for a quick stay or a place to sleep while touring Paris!

The apartment was quaint and shower was great!!
Nearby restaurants were nice too
地點不錯，但是床單上有兩處明顯的白色污漬，房子牆面有發霉，衛生方面要改進。而且整晚會聽到水喉聲
Amazing location, close to shops and all kinds of restaurant. Bed was a bit small for two people, bad moldy smell and noise coming from a glass window on top of the bed.

This is a great property in the heart of Paris with loads of sites within walking distance, excellent shopping nearby, and good transport links.  I think it’s an ideal place for a couple on a mini break, but it also worked well for me and my friend and we also had my small son with us.  The sofa bed is probably the nicest I’ve experienced and very easy to use which is rare for Airbnb listings so that was a huge unexpected positive.  Also the hosts were super responsive and helpful.
Fantastic location, a cosy and comfortable flat with all amenities.

The bedroom is a little bit smaller than I expected, but truly a lovely apartment. Enjoyed our time. Lots to see and within walking distance. We were there during the transit strike and used one of the hop-on/hop-off tour buses to get around town. They all have stops within walking distance of the apartment. Lots of items in the kitchen to support meal preparation when at home.
Thanks
Un departamento fabuloso.  Muy seguro y con excelente ubicación
Great place very close to shops cafe and metro. Very convenient

The place is conveniently located close to a metro, which makes it very easy to get to/from the airport. Also very close to plenty of shopping, restaurants, etc. In terms of space, it was all we really needed. If you’re traveling with A LOT of luggage, it might be a tight squeeze if you tend to live out of your suitcase instead of unpacking and putting in drawers/closets. Hosts were very responsive and helpful!
This flat is a little gem. Just what you need, stylish, great location, good comms with the owners. Highly recommend and would certainly come back again.
A modern apartment at the very heart of Paris. Perfect location with various places to eat and relax.
Justin, this apartment has a great location. Thank you so much for your quick  response to our concerns. We really enjoyed it stay in Paris
Very nice appartement, silent, clean and near everything you need around. I like the self-checking too

Great location, in the city center, close to the main attractions. Well-equipped apartments have everything you need for a comfortable stay. Well-thought-out key collection and helpful recommendations from Justin on restaurants.

Muy buena ubicación, casa bonita, pero poco funcional si quieres usarla para algo más que dormir (comer, etc). El codebox con las llaves no funciona correctamente y cuesta acceder a las llaves. Ante esa dificultad, el dueño se muestra poco comprensivo y respetuoso.

We stayed in this property for our weekend trip to Paris.

Our first impressions were that the apartment looked a little on the small side, which we kind of expected.. We only used this for a base and spent most of our time out. So didn’t affect us too much. 

Justin the host was very responsive to our needs and helped us gain access to the property when we first arrived. 
For location, we could pretty much walk to all the top attractions in the central Paris area. We walked up to Montmartre, to the champs elysee, the Seine, all were in close proximity to the apartment. 

We found the apartment to be clean, and comfortable, with a good sofa bed and comfy double bed.. the shower was great and the kitchen was well equipped. 
Only criticism would be,  it would’ve been good to have a towel rail to hang damp towels on properly. 

We thought considering the size of space, it’s quite well laid out.. 

Overall we would definitely recommend this apartment.. good quiet location and it’s a good base.
Nice design but note that the appartement is in a courtyard and surrounded by tall buildings.... but great location
I really enjoyed staying here. Nice space that is very comfy. In a quiet area with good food options near by. I highly recommend it.
Good location. Cute little apt.  And a nice terrace.  Very good

FANTASTIC location. We walked all the main attractions of Paris. We were a couple and found this apartment to be very spacious. You could fit four people if you were close as there is no separate shower. The shower is great, the location is great. The kitchen has everything you need. All instructions were very clear. Would definitely recommend. So handy to everything, we didn't use the subway at all!
The apartment is in a great location to reach everything in Paris. It was a perfect space for us and our 12 year old grandson to spend a week. We highly recommend staying here.
The apartment is clean, easy to find, access, manage. The location is terrific. The price is excellent. The owners were easily accessible. It was a wonderful stay
Great location, about 30 min walk to most of the major city attractions. A little on the small side, but easily can accommodate up to four people. Definitely recommend!

The apartment is as described. It was clean and the kitchen was stocked with the necessities. Great shower! We used the bed and the sofa bed and both were very comfortable. The ground floor location is great when you have heavy bags. Response from the hosts was slow, however. we contacted them to advise them of a broken fan. They promised to bring us a replacement fan but they never did and they never contacted us.
I loved the place ! So clean and near everything I loved. You can't go wrong staying there. They have everything you need. An unexpected place for an American  !

The apartment and area it was in was wonderful and safe! We had an issue checking in but the host has probably updated the correct info by now. 
Would definitely recommend to anyone and would probably stay there next we come again to Paris. Right by the center of the city with great access to restaurants and shopping.

For our first trip to France we couldn’t have asked for my without stay. Very clean and cozy. It was perfect for my wife and two young children. Walking distance to everything!! I would definitely rent again.
Our stay was amazing!! The place was super clean, spacious, very well located and safe. Would definitely stay here again when I go back. Thank you!!

Great location and very helpful that Justin let us drop our bags off before the check-in
time. 

Very clean apartment. Great for two people.

Pros
- Communicative hosts through Airbnb chat
- Great location (especially if you want to shop - walking distance to everywhere) with multiple metro lines
- Easy to get to and from CDG airport
- Large, clean space with a nice living room area to relax or work
- In-unit washer & dryer
- On the first floor so you don't need to carry your luggage 
- Fast wifi

Cons
- Do not expect early check-in or late check-out here. 
  - In all my experiences staying at AirBnb's, hosts have been very accommodating with early check-in, allowing me to leave my bags at the airbnb or other location, or providing tips for where I can leave my bags. This was not the case here. However, there is a hotel nearby and close enough to the nearest bagbnb.
- No shampoo. Bring your own.
- Given wrong keycode upon check-in. Took a second to figure out the lockbox. Not a big deal though with good communication from the hosts!

Great hosts and amazing place in general, but probably won't go the extra mile for you in comparison to some listings that are managed more like a professional business.
Very nice appartement, modern, great location, very clean, the bed is very good. I really recommend it.
Perfect location for a Parisian getaway! The apartment is très chic!

Enjoyed staying at this very stylish home. It is in a great quiet location close to everything but yet off the Main Street.

It’s small. No door between bedroom and bathroom (shower and sink) or between bedroom and living area. The toilet is in its own room (but is very small - smaller than a shower. If you are over 6 ft you might not be able to sit on toilet and close the door at the same time).

The chairs are stylish but not practical to sit on. But there is a large pull out couch that works well.

The unit is on the ground floor and does have noise from other units or the building elevator....the building is quiet at night so may not be an issue but it does not support sleeping in in the morning.

There continues to be an electrical issue as mentioned by prior guests. Unless you turn off certain lights or unplug certain appliances the circuit breaker will turn off everything after about 30 mins. The power was off when we arrived and had to find the circuit breaker to turn it back on.

But these are all the issues. Relatively minor. 

The good news was this was a very clean and stylish place to stay in Paris in a wonderful safe location. Easy to find and get to. Justin was very quick to communicate with finding the fuse box. Great for a couple.
Great apartment in a central location. We enjoyed our night here.
A perfect base for a very quick overnight stay (but would be lovely wonderful for longer too!). Very clean, easy check in and an ideal apartment in Paris!
Recomendado 100%, muy buena ubicación y  limpieza excelente

The location of the property is absoulutely superb, the hosts were really kind.
4 people can stay here with ease.
I would absolutely recommend staying here.
Ich würde sagen Justin hat mir das Leben gerettet, nachdem eine last-minute Buchung storniert. Sie hat eine schöne Wohnung. Alles war Super, ich empfehlen.

Nice and clean apartment very well located. Our experience in Paris was amazing!!! The place is very secure, small but perfect for a small family, couples or solo travelers.  
Thank you for your support.   
I would recommend this place for anyone looking for a simple
Experience in Paris
Recommended
Good style, location and clean apartment.

Everything was great. 
Excellent location. Very clean and convenient for a family of 4vstaying for a few days or 1 week. 
The only drawback was that electricity shuts down every now and then. I called Justin and he apologized very politely and promised to have an electrician fix it. I trust he will. 
Also it will be great if the bedroom can be separated by curtain from the living room to add some privacy.
Extremely small apartment. Much smaller than the photo showed. The shower is inpractible as there is no shelf. The clothes dryer didn’t work. Great location.
Lo recomiendo 100%.
You won’t be disappointed. It’s a lovely place to stay and is in walking distance of all the main attractions. A delightful part of Paris.

What can we say but perfection, location, value, amenities and Paris
Thanks for having us guys
Cheers
Trev

Great place in awesome location. Very quiet! We were 2 adults and 2 children (8 and 10) and it was tight. I would recommend this place for a couple or a couple with 1 or 2 smaller children. Great communication with host. Apartment was clean.
Nice and practical studio well located in the heart of Paris. Perfect for a couple getaway.
Justin & Catherine were great host. Place is located on the heart of the city. Thanks for having us!

Justin e Catherine cancelaram a reserva 2 horas antes do meu check in, dizendo que a reforma do apartamento não havia ficado pronta, sendo que o apartamento foi alugado e pago 2 meses antes. agora eu pergunto: Quem aluga um apartamento que está em reforma e vai verificar a reforma no dia que o hóspede vai entrar, apenas 2 horas antes? Eles foram irresponsáveis com minha família, não os recomendo
I am sure this would be a very lovely place the location would be wonderful however last-minute communication is important although I don’t know whatArrangements could be made at such a last minute
Great location! Host were helpful letting us drop off luggage prior to check-in.
Thanks Justin!
Good location and place
Really well located flat and great value.

great central location. space for up to 4 but 2-3 will be more comfortable. very secure. kitchen rather small. many hotels in the area nightlife and restaurants nearby are a bit boring. if you’re in your 20s, check out the pigalle area for nightlife.
Do not stay at this place! The owners are rude, sarcastic- I have the messages. Plus there is mold in the apartment and they try to cover it up - but you can clearly see it!
Central location and access superb.

Das Apartment ist in einer tollen Gegend in Paris. Leider sind in dem Apparat an mehreren Stellen großflächig Schimmelflecken und es riecht modrig und feucht. Auch der allgemeine Zustand ist bei genauem hinsehen sehr abgewohnt. Für zwei kurze Übernachtung gerade so akzeptabel, aber buchen würde ich dort nie wieder.
地段不错，设施齐全，下次还会预定

Loved our stay in this charming and bustling area in Paris. Convenient location on ground floor, perfect for two people! Hosts were super helpful and lovely. Would recommend to friends and will come back soon! ❤️❤️❤️

한쿡인둘 보새욤. 췌크인 하눈뒈 건무울 비뮐붠호를 줴대로 안 알료조서 못둘어감. 마췸 1충쥡이 촹문열궈 췅소하귈래 사줭 설뭥하궈 여러달라궈 헤서 둘어감. 다헹히 현과완문 옆에 잇던 키 바악스에 비뮐붠호 뫌고 그 뭐라그뤄지 터취하면 열뤼는 건무울키도 잇어서 짐 놔두우고 나가알수는 잇어슴. 그 터취키도 어떠케 쓰눈지 몰랏눈데 뫄췸 권물에서 낙아던 여자분이 어떠케 쓰눈지 알려죳음. 비뮐붠호 틀뤼다고 뭬세지 보넷는대 돱장이 하아루 지놔서 옴. 놔중에 와아서 뷔밀붠호 재설줭 해놨눈지 놔중애는 비뮐붠호 됏음. 그뤼고 뜨궈운물 마니 쓰먼 안냐옴. 어룬 4며엉애개 맞눈닥오 햇눈데 침데가 두게 다 자가서 4며엉은 힘둘듯. 일츠응 집임. 침데 아페 샤아워어 부스 잇눈데 투명임. 우뤼는 비뮐붠호 또 안댈까바 항솽 키를 가쥐고 놔가서 췅소 안해좃는데 키 놔두고 낙아도 췅소를 재대로 헤주는쥐는 모르갯음. 위치 좋음. 주변에 식당 많음.

Although the location of the apartment is good, there was rats in the apartment which is completely unacceptable. We heard noises in the apartment during the night and found rat poops around the bed and in the bathroom in the morning.
So we had a horrible night and left the apartment immediately after finding out rats were in.
Overall cleanliness was also not good, it hadn’t been done recently.

Great location and very convenient apartment on the first floor. The place needs better upkeep: there were several leaks, some mold on the living room walls, and the stove doesn't work. It would be nice to have a real table and some real chairs too.
Beautiful place located on the center of Paris!!
I’ve been to Paris a couple of times and this Airbnb is incredible. The location and size are great for the price. It was also very thoughtful of the host to make the couch into a bed.
非常近老佛爷百货

Thank you Justin and Catherine for share your place with us, excellent communication with you, and excellent location of your apartment, close of all the principal attractions.!! Very nice!
Thank you so much
Marcela
Great space, conveniently located and exactly what we were looking for. Check-in was a breeze.
The apartment is in a great location close to restaurants, shops and the metro and within walking distance of major sights.
Great place, location in Paris and Justin & Catherine were very friendly and responsive. Also fantastic value for money for the area! Keep it up!
Ótima localização, limpeza e conforto. Recomendo e voltaria .
Nice cozy apartment that is located in a great neighborhood. Very easy to walk to attractions or jump on the Metro one block away.
A great flat in a great location - very central!
Fijn en makkelijk !

Cute, cozy place in a safe and convenient location! I agree with other reviewers about the slightly odd smell, but could’ve been a result of all the rain. All in all we enjoyed our one night stay. And the decor is super trendy!
This place is in the perfect location! It is spacious, adorable and comfortable. We had a wonderful stay and were able to walk pretty much everywhere with such great restaurants all around.
I appreciated the clean, comfortable  stay.  I also was very greatful that two beds were made upon my request.  The apt was quiet snd peaceful as well.  Thank you.
The flat is in a great location for tourists.  It is very small but it was fine for my husband and I and brother since we mainly needed a place to sleep at night.

Justin and Catherine's apartment was great. It's tucked away in a private courtyard, so it feels secluded, but it's still only minutes away from lots of cafes.

Compared to other Parisian studio apartments I've stayed in, it's more isolated from street noise and slightly larger.
Enjoyed the stay at Justin and Catherine’s place. The place was very trendy and in a good location. Directions for checkin and getting to the location were very straightforward. Would stay again!

This place is great. I seem to have dealt with a somewhat mouldy smell in almost all Parisian apartments and noticed it here too which was a bit off putting but the rest is awesome. Deceptively large space folded around a small footprint... feels like a towel!! Lots of surface area for one footprint. Very responsive host who helped me immediately when I couldn’t get the WiFi working and needed to get on a call... and the space is on the ground floor with a garden which really feels amazing. The area is awesome and a very posh area so it already feels spacious and garden like - and this is an extension of the area - quintessential you might say. 

Enjoyed every moment. Thank you. ✨
位置非常好 离春天和老佛爷都很近 房间里什么都有 刚开始炉子坏了房东还特意送的新的电磁炉过来 不过最后wifi坏了很烦 房间里一点信号的没有

El hospedaje es limpio y agradable.

La ubicación es excelente pues te encuentras en el centro de Paris y puedes  accesar a los lugares de forma muy rápida pues la estación del metro está muy cerca, así mismo es muy seguro. 

Sin duda regresaría.
Great place to stay.  Close to everything we needed.  Would stay there again. Great communication and the self check in was nice.

Very stylish apartment conveniently located next to great sites of Paris.  comfortable for family with young kids.  The neighbourhood is cute with lots of bars and cafes and shopping at door step. Highly recommend!
Great location !. Easy check in. Responsive host to all messages. Open layout might not be very comfortable for everyone as there is no door to the bedroom and the shower area.

Great space near the Opera area. Perfect for a couple, Two friends or a family with small children.

A quiet neighborhood within a few of blocks of St Madeleine and Gare St Lazare. Great restaurants and cafes within a very short block. Also within shorter walks to other metro stations. We found it spacious, comfortable and stylish—and it was very easy to get to and from no matter where we wanted to go.

Also, a couple of small stores within less than a block for your needs, such as bottled water, coffee, milk, fruit, etc. As well as a good bakery for daily bread.

The hosts are responsive and quick to address any needs.  I recommend for your stay in Paris!

Justin & Catherine’s place was in a great location. It is located 10-15 minutes to most attractions. The restaurants around their place wasn’t the greatest but there’s a solid grocery store walking distance. There are several train stations nearby which was also super convenient. The only negative to the place was that the AC unit and the fan didn’t work. Other than that, the place was great and I would stay again!
Amazing space in a good location. Clean and well designed space with room for at least two.

Justin and Catherine's place was perfect for our stay in Paris! The apartment was the perfect size/location we were looking for. It's conveniently situated on the ground floor so easy to manage with our luggage. Additionally, Justin was very helpful in getting us early check-in. He let us leave our luggage at the apartment first while the apartment was still being cleaned so we could start our day (thank you!!). Would definitely stay at this place again the next time we are in paris!

We stayed at this place which was in a convenient location but lacked fresh air/felt humid in the bedroom (as there were no windows inside and there was no door enclosing the bathroom area) so we slept on the sofa bed in the lounge
This flat is very clean and stylish with nice design elements. The kitchen is stocked with nice touches including tea press and coffee maker.

Great location and comfy beds. 
Some amenities were missing and there was a mess up with housekeeping turning over the unit from the past guests.
This flat is a great find in a wonderfully central area of Paris.
Really nice. Quite, clean and all round a lovely apartment in fabulous location

Location is great as you have plenty of restaurants and shops in that area. Apartment is ok for 2 but too tight for 4. Ventilation is poor (no windows and you cannot leave the doors/shutters open as the apartment is on the ground floor and they face the the common bin area). Not recommended in Summer. Amenities lacking , only got 2 towels for 4 guests .
This was the perfect, central location to explore Paris from. I would certainly stay again!

This flat was very deceptive in terms of space and hygiene. Although very well located in Paris and in a safe area (we are French and lived in Paris for almost 20 years, so we know the city very well), it was smaller than depicted, very cheaply furnished and decorated, and really dirty. There is no (pull-out) couch in the main living area, but a full king-sized bed. Obviously, this reduces the living space considerably. However, the layout is quite manageable for three people (couple with child). 

The main drawbacks are very aloof hosts (no welcome message and no thank you after our stay - it’s pure old-fashioned business), and an extremely dirty place. Examples of this: the top of the baseboards were covered in dirt and dust; the taps, basins (kitchen and bathroom), soap dispensers, toilet, etc. were dirty; the purple dish with 2 candles on the main room lower table was completely dusty; the tapestry of the white lounging chair and the two cushions hadn’t been vacuumed; the cutlery, plates, glasses, etc. were dirty (we were advised via AirBnb not to use the dishwasher); the rubbish bins’ openings and lids were absolutely disgusting; the quilt on main bed (front room) had a fresh brown stain; the pillows and entire bedding in the bedroom in the bathroom smelt horribly musty; there were moths on the ceiling of the shower; we saw one cockroach; etc. etc. Basically, we couldn’t use the kitchen and had to bleach the toilet and shower before using them - health hazards altogether. 

There is no fan in the bathroom which is in the bedroom (they basically make one room), so the bedroom is very musty and so is the rest of the flat. Besides, there is only one window for the entire flat (French windows, though), so it’s not convenient for airing purposes. 

Other than that, there were a few items of clothing in the bedroom closet (they didn’t bother putting them away), and a printer under the side table in the main room, so when seating on the chair next to it, we had to weave our legs around it (again, why not put it away?). There are two holes in the main room ceiling (so easy to fix though), a disjointed cabinet door by the entrance door (needs fixing out of respect for guests), and the most unbelievable opening in the bedroom ceiling (1.5m x 1m) that’s covered by what looks like a blind and flaps every now and then (perfect to scare a little child who is trying to sleep underneath it...). 

I would not recommend this flat if you expect hygiene and a respectful experience.
Vale la pena buena ubicacion
Fantastic location and perfect place to stay. Clever use of space.
Stylish apartment in a great location! Self check-in process is great. Justin & Catherine are super quick to respond to any inquiry. Recommended!
Great location.  Owners were wonderful to work with.

This apartment is definitely cozy, but for the price it is an excellent home base for a trip to Paris. My two friends and I stayed here for a three day visit to Paris, and this location allowed us to walk to many sights around Paris. It's close to shopping and sights, but the street it is on is quiet. The hosts provided a very comfortable decor and included towels, toilet paper and other AirBnB's can sometimes lack. We felt right at home! It looks out into the courtyard of the building, and has french doors that allow you to walk out and enjoy the space. It is on the first floor, so it is very easy to access even with big bags. Great choice!

The apartment is well located, close to restaurants, shops and stores.  The apartment was clean and modern but very small (it looks much bigger on the pictures!).  For a short stay it was fine though.

Fantastic location!
Very cute apartment, excellent shower, petit kitchen but very functional.
So beautiful!!  The place was adorably decorated and the location is perfect.

Catherine & Justin were very accommodating, helpful, and quick to reply! The space felt super safe and the location was great with eateries and a small grocery shop close by! If I ever find myself in Paris again, I will definitely try to return here!
Great hosts! Great home centrally located in Paris. Would stay here again!

Fabulous location. Near sights, shopping, great restaurants, cafes. Loved bakery on corner. Very clean. Cozy apt. as described. We stayed two different times in one week. Owner very responsive and speaks English, which was helpful for us.

The apartment is located ideally in a perfect area with nice restaurants and shopping. The owners are not widely available and took time to answer my messages. We had issues with the dryer being full and having to put away all the previous tenants sheets and towels etc.  and wondering if the wet towels hanging were clean or not. The closets are full with the owners belongs so hard to hang your own clothes. The apartment is ideal for a couple and maybe one child. The shower is an open shower (that did not drain) so not ideal for two couples who would like to have privacy as the floor plan is also an open plan. Overall we looked beyond these issues and appreciated the location.
La ubicación es perfecta ,tanto por la comunicación como por el distrito, muy animado y lleno de zonas de ocio, tanto para la gastronomia como para la diversión.
Very central, convenient and easy  check in
Quite and nice place. The only thing is it's hard to find parking.
This is a great flat in the perfect location. It was absolutely spotless, decorated nicely, and check-in was easy. I would recommend it to friends and stay here again!! A great find.
Excelente ubicacion y estilo del departamento. Nos sentimos muy comodos en todo momento. la ubicación es inmejorable

Great apartment! I love modern furnishings in old buildings so this place was perfect for my tastes. Bed was comfy, the shower was excellent, and I appreciated the two TVs. WiFi worked great. It was on the ground floor, so it was logistically ideal for a quick exit on our way to the airport. It was also quiet as it is in the inner courtyard.  

I didn't get to meet Catherine or Justin, but their responses to my inquiries were very quick. They made it easy to check in and provided excellent tips for both entry and exit, as well as, fun places to check out in the neighborhood, which is vibrant and fun. We had a blast sampling a couple of bistros in the area. I recommend this place highly. Thanks so much for that! I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to my family and friends. 

Thanks again, Catherine and Justin.

The location was exceptional for shopping. Right next to the Champs Elysee. This is perfect pad for 2 but compact for 4. It is an intimate space which is open plan. We had some issues but communication was good and Justin replied promptly to try to resolve our issues.

Great location in a safe area. The neighbourhood is a shopping district.  Apartment building is easy to access by metro or Uber as it is on a one way side street. Communication with hosts was always prompt. Space is a bit small making it better suited for two adults and perhaps one child, but not large enough for four adults. Several restaurants and patisseries nearby, all quite good! The market around the corner is expensive so walk to the Monoprix near Printemps instead. Bring your own toiletries and laundry detergent if you intend to do some washing. Of note, this main floor flat has an interior courtyard window but no other exterior windows. No issues with noise at night. Good value for he location but the pictures look much newer than the unit itself.

The communication was great, with easy access to the buildings codes and use.  The owners were very friendly and helpful.  The location was great.  Very nice shower.  Almost NO road noise.  On the down side, the plumbing for the toilets above goes through the wall just a few feet from the bed.  The internal trash shoot for the floors above is very near the bedroom as well.  (sounds like a large tin can bouncing down 3 flights of stairs at all hours). Both of these woke us up multiple times at night, even with ear plugs.  The apartment was clean, but the maid service didn't leave any extra toilet paper (which became a problem at an our last night/morning..lol)  The bed had no top sheet, and there was laundry from the last guest was still being dried when we arrived at 3pm.  (this took hours to finally turn off, steaming up the place and was noisy while trying to get a nap in)   Not the owners fault...

Very cozy and comfortable flat in a very convenient and accessible location.  The neighborhood is lovely, and the flat is just a short walk from the Madeleine metro, and a few more steps to the Opera metro.  Charming cafes, shops, and the big galleries are all verly close, and I especially appreciated that it was on the ground floor.  The queen bed is marvelously comfy, and the living room is great for recuperating after a long day of sightseeing.
Great apartment in a great location. Close to metro, shops, and restaurants.

Perfect location. The apartment has the potential to be nice, especially with the modern fixtures, but it was not very clean. It looked like the bathroom sink had not been wiped down or disinfected, the rug needed to be vacuumed, and there were gnats and silverfish bugs in the apartment.
Great place to stay! Enjoyed every moment spent at the apartment.
Well located cosy place, amongst all the great shopping and monuments to visit.  The shower is fantastic, we got this place for my daughter and niece and the neighborhood was very safe and vibrant.
The location is good and convenient. The host is nice and and helpful. The room is stylish and suitable for couples. They are willing to reimburse when the cleaning service is not as expected.

We really liked the location of this apartment, and it is larger than many others you will see listed. The listing needs to be updated - there is one queen (or double?) bed, plus a twin-size day bed in the living room area.  Justin is very nice and helpful, and the Madeleine metro station is about 3 blocks away. We had a wonderful time walking to everything in Paris, then taking the metro back home at night.
Location is great! Close to the subway, shops and the mall! Great for two but a bit small for four.
Great neighborhood, stylish apartment equiped with everything you need ( the  dryer was very useful and is a very rare in Paris). Highly recommended !

Catherine and Justin’s place was very stylish and cute, the location was incredible, super easy to get to from the metro station. I stayed during a winter snowstorm and it was cozy as can be and nice to see the snow ithrough the patio windows. I look forward to staying during nice weather when I can use the patio.
Excellent central location. The apartment is very convenient, clean and easy to access. Justin is very responsive on text messages. We enjoyed our stay there very much and will definitely go back.
Great, nice, on the permet place in Paris....

Catherine and Justine messaged me once right after reserving the apartment and never after that. I even tried calling while I was roaming because I couldn't wait for an answer and still was not able to reach them. I happened to come to the apartment at 11am to see if I can leave the bag so I can take a look around and saw the prior guest still sleeping and still not checked out. Worst part is when I checked in, I was provided with the exact same blankets the prior tenant was using! Gross! Don't get me wrong. The location was superb and price was good too.

Thank you for a great place to stay on our first visit to Paris.  Easy walk to just about everywhere or to catch the Batobus to get around.  And the patisserie around the corner on Rue de l'Arcade was great to pick up really good food to eat on the run.  Your home was a comfortable and nice place to relax in after a day of seeing the history that Paris had on display.  Thank you.
Cosy beautiful place on a nice location
The host canceled this reservation 167 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Overall the location of the partner is great, but the cleanliness was not good. The apartment is not kids friendly. And the nigh Ota complained about noise from TV  even at 10 in the morning when you have the patio door open to garden. But the fact it is in the heart of Paris it is a Great location. Even with parking is not bad at all.
首先房子在一楼……真的是一股霉味…楼上还有个疯婆子……动不动大喊大叫…吓得人不敢睡好吗…房子就是味道真的大……窗户也没有。一个拉链门拉开全拉开，又怕疯婆子下楼…不过去购物的地方都很近…
Great location next to sights! Catherine and Justin were communicative and helpful also.
Great location! Catherine was quick to respond to my messages.

Great location! No doubt about that! It's the first time I used a airbnb so did not know what to expect. I was a bit surprised that there was left over food in the fridge I presume from the guests who stayed there before me. I also felt that the shower was used a few minutes before I arrived. There was used soap on the floor and the bathroom floor and door were all wet. No big deal! But unexpected.!!! Most of the day we were out and enjoying Paris! It was however very hot in the apartment and even with a  ventilator it was still very hot. Overall had a great time!! But the above mentioned was unexpected!

Great little place in an amazing location! Being our first time in Paris we were impressed with how close the altar tent is to everything while still having a secluded feel. Justin was great to talk to and ensured we had everything we needed.

El piso esta muy bien. Muy limpio.
La ubicacion genial. Lo recomiendo como piso para ir unos dias a Paris y estar cerca de todo. 
Puedes ir andando al louvre, barrio latino etc...
Even more incredible than the pictures look! Central to all the sites and close to the metro. The neighborhood is great too, lots of restaurants and cafes. Looking forward to going back!

Good location. Just 3 minites from Printemps shopping mall. Very near to Metro. It is very convenient too. There is many restaurant around this place. The room got one queen size bed and one sofa bed. The owner forgot to provide us shampoo. The kitchen has a lil bad adour. Otherwise all good. The owner give quick respond.

The apartment is lovely for a couple as the shower is the 'open' type and have no doors. The location is perfect if you are into shopping as it is within close proximity of all of the biggest malls in Paris. The only issue was lack of shower and shampoo but i guess this is not expected.

The apt was a bit small and cramped for four people but we were able to make it work. Justin was very easy to communicate with and get a hold of if needed. I think it’s a great value given its location and proximity to the metro but it’s hard to give it a really good rating with the crazy neighbor lady. 
The woman upstairs directly above the apt is INSANE. She kept yelling “shut up” really loud from her window starting at Noon. We made extra effort to ensure we were not loud but she still kept yelling at us. Her yelling was far louder than any noise we could ever make then she came downstairs and nearly beat the door down on two separate occasions for no reason. Like I said, we made extra effort to ensure we did not disturb anyone.  She hit the door so hard that it made the walls in the apt shake then when we did not open it she went back up to her apt and got some kind of object that she stuck out the window and hit our window below her over and over again. While she was doing that a gentleman yelled at her in French from the other side of the apt building and she immediately stopped. I don’t know what he said but I can assure you her behavior was INSANE! 
Located in a great area! Madeline is a perfect spot to be close to the metro, shopping, and some great cafes. Just beware of the crazy neighbor lady upstairs! When we left the final morning we were scared to drag our suitcases just in case we woke the beast!

For the price vs where you are in Paris, you cannot go past Catherine and Justin's apartment.

Quiet at night but oh so close to everything, it's worth the stay for singles or couples!

Communication was a breeze and finding the place was not hard!

Understandably the high tempo of guests this place would receive makes a few things have wear and tear but overall it was very comfortable and very secure.

I would not go past this listing if it's available for your time in Paris!

The apartment was in a wonderful area, close to all the sights and easy to commute to all areas. Lovely bistros and shops around. The apartment was easy to find and clear instructions. When the electricity tripped we called Catherine,she was very helpful. However, a few things let the stay down: the flat was not very clean, in particular the shower,much dust and the linen on the sleeper couch,  and leftover foods in fridge. Also, there are no windows in the flat,and to sleep with the patio door open doesn't feel safe given it opens to a common area. A small dining room table/chairs would be super too! I use Airbnb in Paris frequently and have based these comments on my previous experiences at other apartments.
地段好，离老佛爷和春天百货很近，附近有许多餐厅。就是沙发床的床单和被子太脏，还好自己带着小毯子，凑合了两晚。

Nice apartment, but with some humidity problems and a old lady living upstairs that is fed up with tourist so she will go down and knock your door and complaint and insult you in french even if you don´t make noise or you have just arrived (we have 2 babies so we are in bed by 9, but she came late in the night the first day to complaint about the previus guests and about us making noise all day when we had just arrived less than half an hour before). That woman is crazy. The host Justin was ok, but no helpful to help us find a ride to the airport (he would fix us one for 110 euros when there is a large and well known taxi company that takes you for a fixed price of 54 euros. So we felt a little desapointed that he did not mention that. Thanksfully we received help from a waiter at a restaurant nearby who call us a G7 taxi company large Van that cost us half.

There was a problem with the electricity. It was shit off when we arrived in the evening. The neighbor helped us fix it. After that, there was an electric shock every time we used the water. The host was unreachable by message prior to our arrival and did not meet us at the apartment when we arrived.
Wonderful location, accurate description, perfect for a couple.  Strong internet connection (which may be important for some)!

Great location and house
Would recommend
The best thing about this incredible apartment was the location! Gorgeous apartment full of details.
A very comfortable and very practical flat near la Madeleine and Opera. Justin is very easy to reach. I'd go back  very happily.
Location is excellent!  But please donot forget to make a call to the owner before arrival, otherwise previous guest might be still in the room!

Excellent location 
Suggested for couple only
We didn't meet him in person but Justin seems to be helping host
Can help you in every issues
Kitchen is too small
Recommended

We enjoyed our stay at Catherine and Justin's place. The location is right in the heart of Paris and easy walking distance to everything you want to see. There were a few issues with renovations during our visit, but they were quickly resolved with minimal interruption

The apartment itself is small but has everything you need. The kitchen is not equipped for lots of cooking, but I doubt you will be eating at home in Paris very frequently. The one improvement I would recommend is the towels - they are quite dry and scratchy.
Perfect location and space. Very very convenient. There are a lots bus station just 3 mins far, we can take bus safely back in 11 pm. Even to Gare de Lyon by taxi only needs 13 EU. Highly recommend.
Very good

I had a very bad experience staying here for several nights  .. I had to shift to the next door hotel called Queen Mary ..  I have requested for refunds for 2 nights .. But, waiting for a response  

Here's a list of issues I experienced 

- Extremely small toilet and kitchen
- Very noisy place ; specially at night. This is due to the house being close to the stairs, elevator, and the main door .. You can't sleep at night if you are on the couch
- The couch-bed was broken. Reported immediately, but no service was made available to fix things 
- The dish washer was leaking causing very bad smell in the kitchen.  I had to manually drain some dirty water using a towel to stop the overflow.  This had the potential to cause health hazard for my family  
- There was power outage on one evening. Instead of trying everything as suggested by Catherine, it did not work.   I decided to leave at this point
- The owners do not have anyone (caretaker or something) who can come and fix things as the renters report.  One of the answered I got was, "we have ordered a new dish washer and it will be coming soon"  .. Can't believe they rented the property knowing that things are broken in the house. 
- It appears that Catherine and Justin do not communicate with each other. If you say something to Catherine, Justin does not know about it and would charge you for not speaking within him.  The power outage related issue was a good example about how this communication led me to leave the property. Justin though he could fix the issue, but Catherine never told him about this issue when I reported to her
Cozy and comfortable! Very close to cafes and metro stations.

The apartment is nice and well located, metro is really close and the street is quiet and with all the shops one could need. 
However, I've been dissatisfied with the cleaning, not in line with the price requested and level promised: dust on floors, dirty dishes and broken and smelly dishwasher.
For a couple of answers via email I had to solicit twice.
Great place to stay. Amazing location. Felt very safe there.
Great spot ideally located with everything you need in a one bedroom.
Nie wieder! Doppelt belegt. Unverschämt , dreckig , Bettwäsche vom Vorgänger, Scharrendes Ungeziefer in der Wand. Nicht gereinigt , kein Schlüssel vor Ort
Catherine & Justin's place is in a fantastic location.  It's perfect for a romantic getaway and is a great value.  You won't be disappointed if you book this flat!

Easy check-in. Fantastic neighborhood. Very quiet street and apartment. Comfortable bed. Lots of shopping, restaurants, etc in the neighborhood.  Easy walk to the Roissybus (transport to/from the airport). Loved the apartment, and would stay again anytime.
This apartment in Paris is very close to lots of food outlets and easy walking distance to the main sights. It is very cosy with an especially nice shower.

Excellent location... close enough to all of the "tourist" sites, but just far enough to make it feel like a real "neighborhood."  The Opera district is beautiful and very close to transportation: Gare St. Lazare, airport busses, and many other metro stops.

Building is easy to access, apartment is very clean, and neighborhood has may charming restaurants and cafés.

Overall, a lovely experience!
Alojamiento cómodo y perfecto para dos personas. Excelente ubicación!
Все хорошо

The location of the place was really good and was couple of mins away from the metro and the host was really nice to talk to and was quite responsive.
