The flat had very nice linens and towels, a lot of storage space for clothes - both hanging and folded - and a very handy washer and dryer (though basic instructions in English would have been a huge help). 
The space is cozy (as expected) so it would be cramped for more than a couple or a couple with one child. But if you're visiting Paris solo or with your significant other, I can't imagine that there is a better combination of comfort, convenience, safety and design available in the city.
The apartment was in an excellent location very central, good restaurants and shops close bye. It had everything you need, very clean and cosy. The Internet connection was great.
Nice apartment with very comfortable bed and all you need for a successful weekend in Paris! Justin is a good and communicative host. Will recommend anyone going to Paris to stay at this place.

Excellent location, small but very well designed and executed apartment close to the Opera Garnier area on the Right Bank of Paris.  Apartment well equipped with all necessities.  Close access to a variety of restaurants, bakery, and grocery store.  Very safe and secure, with private courtyard.  We enjoyed our all too short stay there and would certainly consider a return visit our next time in Paris.

We loved our stay in Paris and Justin's apartment made it easy. The best part of it is the location - so convenient to everything in the city. In fact, during our week-long stay we never once took the metro - we could walk everywhere! It's also convenient to the main shuttle to the airport. 
The space itself is also comfortable. We had one issue with the shower leaking, but there were plenty of towels for a temporary solution and Justin was extremely responsive when he let him know, saying he would look into it immediately. 
The pictures are accurate. The place is modern with decent kitchen so we had several breakfasts and dinner meals at the apartment. I found the bed comfortable, though I would add it was less so for my fiance, who is quite tall and his feet at time hung off the end. All in all, I'd recommend this to a friend and would stay here again.
Great location....very comfy bed and good communication with the host. We really enjoyed our stay in Justin's home only wished It had been a little longer.

Excelente departamento, muy bien ubicado, en un barrio muy seguro y con muchos atractivos turísticos cerca.
El departamento es muy cómodo.
The flat is located in a fantastic area and is beautifully set out with very stylish fixtures and fittings and a fantastic shower! Would highly recommend this place for anyone visiting Paris
Excellent location in heart of the city, very close to metro stop.  Good condition of the property.  Little oasis which is easy to like.
Did stay in here for a week. The apartment ideally located, everything was as was spoken. Can happily recommend the apartment. And I would be happy to rent  this apartment for my next visit to Paris.

Great apartment in good location, walking distance or close metro line to everything good in Paris. We arrived at night so took a while to find our way in (lock on front door appears to be jammed but window door is fine) and from then on it was easy. Very well equipped apartment - much preferred this to a hotel and place has been kept in good condition. Perfect for a weekend jaunt from London or a longer stay if you have the time. Thanks Justin

Absolutely wonderful apartment in one of the best locations in Paris.  Everything was perfect and extremely good value for the modest price. Justin was superb and I would highly recomment the apartment to anyone looking for something in central Paris. Thank you!!

The flat was absolutely stunning and in a brilliant location - Directions given by the host were spot on and the flat was an easy find. Initially we looked into staying somewhere closer to the Eiffel Tower but the location turned out to be much better, offering quick and easy access to most places. In terms of the flat, it was very clean and tidy on arrival and just as it looked in the photos. A particular mention must go to the outstanding bed, which is probably one of the comfiest I have ever slept in.

The only downsides were the lock on the main door, which ended up stuck locked as soon as we arrived, so we had to use the patio door to get in and out every day (although that was a very minor inconvenience indeed). I also couldn't work out the oven/grill/dishwasher combo and, at one point, ended up starting the dishwasher instead of grilling some croissants, but that's probably more my fault than the applicances.

All in all a great visit, though, and a fantastic place to stay though - Thanks!
The reservation was canceled 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment has been a very cosy stay for us. It looks exactly like the photos posted and the location is extremely convenient for shopping, food and a central springboard to visit other locations. The apartment is in a safe and quiet street albeit the busy surroundings. We would definitely stay in Justin's apartment again when we are in Paris  again!
Very pretty cozy  apartment in the center of Paris, walking distance to everything, quite and safe.    Just loved it, thank you , Justin :)

Sólo estuvimos una noche en el apartamento pero todo estuvo perfecto, el único inconveniente fué a la hora de cerrar la puerta, que funciona diferente a las puertas normales, y tuvimos que llamar al anfitrión porqué no hubo manera de lograrlo.
Por todo lo demás perfecto, repetiremos sin duda, muchas gracias!

We had a great time staying at Justin's flat. Great communication with him up until the stay and throughout the stay.

The location seemed ideal (nice, quiet street with the Metro just a short walk away), although we didn't do much in this particular neighborhood.

The only issue we had was with the door. The lock was very difficult at times to open. We always had to play with it for a minute or two before we could get it to unlock.
It was very easy to plan the trip with Justin. His flat is amazing, very fonctionnal. You feel at home immediatly. From now I won't stay anwhere else when I travel to Paris! Merci Justin!

Location,location. very central to everything. We had a comfortable stay in the middle of winter and the apartment had all we required apart from a comfortable lounge to sit on after exploring beautiful Paris. The  couch needs replacing and the keys are tricky to use but overall we enjoyed our stay. Thanks
Second time around was just as lovely as the first!  Justin has turned into quite the host!  I have a feeling this adorable flat is becoming quite popular!  Well done, Justin!

Fantastic flat with everything you need in the best location in Paris, very quiet and safe. Step out, cross the road and you have Lafiette Gourmet for all your food supplies. Can't fault this flat, its roomy with space to spread out and relax, lighting makes for a very stylish and modern feel. I usually stay in 5 star hotels but this is how I will do Paris in the future. Well done. Hope the next person enjoys the wine I left behind, it was very expensive and the truffle in the fridge is there to enjoy too.
The location is perfect and appartement is nice, however the appartment was not very clean. A lot of dust. The coach need to be changed.
The apartment was great and in a great location but is only suitable for a couple, the sofa is old and has no matress or cushon to sleep in it. our third party ended up sleeping in the floor.

We stayed at this flat for barely 24 hours but in that time I can tell you a few things: the location is amazing - great food all around and a marche just down the street. This is a true ground floor flat (no hauling 4 suitcases us five flights on stairs). The flat is clean and organized. There is no door between the bedroom and the living area (good to know if you want some privacy). The pull out couch was pretty haggard looking and not very comfortable to sleep on (fine for our 4 year old but no way for adults), Wifi worked perfectly. Directions to enter the apartment were easy to understand. Bathroom is beautiful. No toilet paper in bathroom (probably would have been restocked but we got there early). Justin was super easy to communicate with (fast and prompt with his emails) and very flexible in accomodating us. The kitchen was stocked with basic spices and dishes/pots/pans. OK that's it! Thanks Justin...hoping to see you again in July 2013.

Justin is a great host!
the apartament is like you see in the pictures, clean and comfortable.
Central area, recommended.
Everything was perfect, clean and comfortable apartment. Enough space  for couple . All staff you need for perfect vacations for 6 days. Very close to metro, Opera, and other central points.

We didn't have a chance to meet Justin in person but he was available and helpful when we ran into issues. The apartment is located in a cool, noisy part of town but tucked away in quiet residential area which made it a perfect location given its close proximity to trains and Roissybus (airport shuttle). There were, however, a few issues. My husband and I had a hard time keying into the apartment. It took us a good 40mins of trying the key and calling Justin to make sure we had the right keys, to finally get the fussy lock to give. This struggle ensued every time we left the apartment. The apartment is small but functional - a couple of things I wished for were: a window and a working shower drain. The apartment has no windows, it has french doors with a metal door that needs to pulled down for privacy in the evenings (like stores often have) leaving no windows - we had to leave one of the doors open and partially pull down the metal door for fresh air at night. The next morning my husband showered and the water leaked out into the living area. We mopped the place dry and I skipped my shower before leaving - it wasn't an ideal end to our 1 night stay in the apartment.

This is a lovely flat in a wonderful location.  So nice to pop round the corner for tasty pain au chocolat and pain au raisin for breakfast.  Also the bistro/restaurant on the corner is great for late night food.

The apartment itself is in good order - the sofa is a little old and could do with replacing, otherwise great as a base in Paris.  Also the cleaner Antoine was very helpful.

Very well located flat (next to Opera and the shopping malls / les grands magasins), spacious, modern design and clean.
Justin was the perfect host. Easy to communicate with, flexible and very quick to response. 
I recommend this flat and host; I will definitely come back again.
Thanks for everything Justin!

Justin and Mathilde were very helpful with our queries. Nice and personable people, they really are.

The apartment was cosy, and bigger than the photos suggest. The bed was comfortable and the amenities were plenty. The adjoining streets are full of theatres, groceries and eateries. All of them offered great service and products.

It was centrally located within walking distance to several public transport stations. We walked to Sacre Cour, Notre Dame and the Eiffel Tower and it only took us 40 minutes each time.  

Awesome place to spend with your loved one.

Iryana and Muhammad

Justin and Mathilde were awesome hosts!  Although Justin was away during our trip, Mathilde was very helpful with assisting us to get a cab to the airport.  Indeed, hostest of the mostest and the quickest!  Communicating with Justin was also a breeze all throughout.  The apartment was lovely, exactly what you see in the pictures.  And it's really clean and everything in there works perfectly.  While it's artsy, they are all functional too :)  You have everything you need in the apartment. We have absolutely no complaints of the location.  It is extremely accessible to everything you need.  And a stone's throw from Printemps and Galeries Lafayette!  I would definitely recommend anyone who's traveling to Paris to stay here.  What a great experience!
Great flat in the heart of Paris! The apartment was beautifully decorated and access was well explained by Justin in his directions. I recommend the flat to anyone travelling to Paris.

Great apartment and perfect location. Justin was helpful and everything  went smoothly.
We strongly recommend this apartment!
pas de commentaire

Un appartement etonnant, lumineux et  chaleureux, tres original dans sa conception. Pour tous les amoureux des objets qui ont une memoire ! (high-tech lovers s'abstenir). Dominique loue l'etage entier sous les toits, ce qui fait un grand espace de vie, avec un lit double, un petit bureau , une salle de bain, bibliotheque, etc.
Accueil tres sympathique.
Hôte très sympathique et accueillant. Chambre propre et agréable avec un vrai univers de culture.
Très bon rapport qualité-prix, très pratique pour l'accès a la maison des examens
Hébergement au calme, très bien situé près de la maison des examens et du centre commercial La vache noire

Très bon séjour chez Dominique : l'appartement est très sympa, juste à côté du RER et de la maison des examens, la chambre est grande, propre et très bien équipée (gros plus pour la bouilloire et le balcon!). Dominique est un hôte disponible et prévenant.
Dominique sait accueillir pour que le séjour se passe à merveille !
Logement conforme à la description dans l'annonce. Dominique et accueillant et avenant. Je recommande sans hésiter!

Personnellement je n’ai pas beaucoup aimé, je ne me suis pas sentie à l’aise du tout. L’appartement est vieux et les meubles aussi, il y avait de la poussière et on a l’impression que quelqu’un vit déjà là-bas.
Logement très éclairé dans une rue charmante.
Un hôte très à l'écoute et accueillant dans un logement tout à fait charmant et atypique. Je recommande !

En déplacement pour un concours à la maison des examens, le logement est à 10 min à pied c’est super pratique! Dominique est très accueillant, très sympas et avenant je vous recommande vivement !
Dominique est présent pour ses clients.  Décoration très plaisante. Je recommande.
Super accueil, quartier calme et reposant, la petite terrasse est un plus. Super host.

Ange est une personne absolument merveilleuse, d'une très grande gentillesse et hospitalité et un super accueil. Elle est même venue me chercher à la sortie du RER. Ce fut un plaisir de discuter avec elle. L'appartement est parfaitement propre, très agréable. Je retournerai là-bas avec un très grand plaisir.
Excellent accueil, Ange est d'une hospitalité unique. L'appartement est très pratique, calme et à proximité des transports. Très agréable séjour.

Ange est d'une grande gentillesse et a fait en sorte que tout se passe le plus simplement possible, et ce, dès la prise de contact. 

La location est parfaite pour les concerts ayant lieu à l'Aréna ou tout autre événement à la Defense.
Un apartement d'Ange se trouve dans tres bonne localisation. Merci Ange pour tes indications detailees et pour ton hospitalite!

Regarding the price, the room is really suitable for a short stay as a bedroom.

Ange is a very kind lady. My flight was badly late, I arrived at almost midnight, but there wasn't a problem. The flate is very close to Defense.

Ange is a great host. Even though I stayed for only one night I was made to feel very welcome and completely at ease. Always prompt communication and very helpful tips. After a long day in Paris I had a sparkling clean house, and a cosy room with a nice atmosphere waiting for me. Thank you!

Angie has a lovely home and she is such a kind and caring host who was so helpful to us for the duration of our stay. We felt completely at ease from the moment we arrived and the place was sparkling clean. 

We had an amazing weekend in Paris and enjoyed every minute of it. The accommodation is excellently located and is only a few minutes walk from La Defence metro stop which has regular service running to the city centre. 

 I would highly recommend  this place to anyone. You won't regret it

All the best Angie. Thanks for hosting us
Ange is fantastic, friendly person respecting your needs. Location is great (very easy and quickly to reach city center), room is very nice, bad is so comfortable. Absolutely recommend it!!!

Nice host, beautiful city, cozy apartment with comfy bed. The place is very easy to reach from Paris city centre, but be careful - take only RER red line A (it is only 5 min away from home). Overall a lovely stay.
Cumplimiento, calidad del servicio, excelente limpieza

A dona do apartamento é super atenciosa, o local é muito limpo, a localização é ótima porque fica perto do metro, restaurantes, mercado. 
Recomendo e voltaria sem duvidas a me hospedar com a Ange ☺️
It is located very next to metro station. Worth staying.
Ange was a great host and her apartment is very close to the train station.
Super cool and nice person I ever met in Paris

Ange is a lovely, friendly and helpful person. I felt I was sharing her home rather than renting a room and really enjoyed my stay. The room was very comfortable and there was everything you could need. It is a five minute walk to the station and just a few stops to the centre of Paris. i will definitely stay again.

This was my favorite Airbnb l've stayed at. It was so clean. There were such thoughtful things there for us. For example; she left a bottle of wine for us. There was a closet full of things we may need. There were also towel robes that were awesome. They also let me check in early which I really appreciated. I would stay here again in a heart beat.

Appartement idéalement situé dans Paris, à proximité des restaurants et petits commerces, métro et RER à quelques mètres ce qui rend notre séjour bien plus facile. Hôtes très réactifs et d’une grande gentillesse. Seul petit bémol : l’odeur d’humidité dans l’appartement.
Je recommande :)

Logement très sympa et agréable dans un quartier également bien agréable

Je le suggère aux visiteurs de cette belle ville de Paris.
Appartement agréable et calme. Le coin chambre et douche est magnifique. Je vous le conseille !

Le logement est bien situé à 2 pas de la gare St Lazare et des Grands magasins . Il est est très convivial, et bien équipé . J'y reviendrais .
Il manque un wifi fonctionnel.

Appartement très agréable, tous y est présent pour y passer un séjour agréable à 2 , belle salle de douche ouverte sur la chambre, qui donne sur le salon. 
Belle rénovation, appart bien décoré,  moderne au RDC sécurisé par 2 portes avec digicode, donnant sur cours (qui doit être bien agréable en été!). Calme car en retrait de la rue.
Idéalement situé à 5 mn à pieds du métro Madeleine et tous commerces ouverts tard le soir à proximité.
Catherine est très accueillante, bonne communication par tel  très réactive et chaleureuse.  
Je reviendrai!
Simplement parfait! Réception, lieux , équipement et amenagement.
Logement ok
Très bel emplacement mais accueil et literie à revoir
Très bien et propre. Le lit est très confortable!

Joli appartement bien décoré et bien situé avec un accès sur la cour intérieure très sympa. Accès très simple grâce à un guide d'entrée très clair. Pas de contact avec les propriétaires qui ne semblent pas joignables. 
Seul bémol l'appartement n'était pas propre à l'arrivée, le linge de maison n'avait pas été changé ni rangé, la salle de bain n'était pas nettoyée
Le plus de ce studio : son emplacement à côté des théâtres et des grands magasins, juste à côté d'un métro

Excellente communication avec Catherine et Justine qui se sont montrés très disponible. Le logement est idéalement situé, à 10 minutes du boulevard Haussmann, dans un quartier vivant avec de nombreux restaurants, cafés... Logement fonctionnel. A recommander sans soucis
Appartement très agréable, très calme, lit confortable, très joli salle de bain spacieuse, localisation parfaite près du métro et quartier super pour se balader. Je recommande.

Gros soucis post location avec Justin 

L'ami pour qui j'ai loué le airbnb est parti avec  un peu de retard, qu'il a régularisé en versant 20 euros à la dame qui s'occupait du ménage ce jour là.

Je me suis questionné par rapport à la légalité de la chose sur airbnb sachant que ce n'était même pas écrit dans l'annonce mais par correction il les a payé 

Par la suite j'ai reçu de nombreux sms me disant qu'en gros nous mentions, que les 20 euros n'avaient pas été versés et qu'il fallait que je fasse un virement de 40 euros via airbnb pour dédommager l'hôte.

Je me questionne toujours sur la légalité des faits et je vais poser la question à airbnb 
Je ne louerai plus chez cet hôte et là dessus je pense que c'est réciproque.

En cas de litige, le plus simple est de contacter airbnb directement plus que d'essayer de soutirer de l'argent par SMS.

À bon entendeur

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. Le studio est très bien situé dans un des meilleurs quartier de Paris. 
L'appartement est moderne et bien équipé. 
Les nuisances matinales, les portes qui claquent etc ... ne permettent pas de faire une grass matinée.
Calme, et pratique pour des rendez vous dans le quartier.
Parfait, je recommande ! ;-)
Foncez l appartement est de bon goût très bien placé et confortable...A recommander !
Logement très sympa, bien situé, propre, équipe et parfait pour deux personnes !

Prévoyez d'arriver le matin de façon à palier aux mauvaises surprises quant au ménage non fait et un logement non préparé à votre arrivée sur les éléments essentiels comme les draps du lit et le linge de toilette. Justin nous a répondu immédiatement au téléphone et prêt à nous rembourser la chambre d'hôtel, n'empêche que nous avons dû nous débrouiller pour trouver un hôtel à 23 h. Le choix des prestataires est à revoir puisque l'état général de l'appartement laissait à désirer. Dommage les idées déco sont sympas.
Le quartier est central et très vivant mais aussi agréablement calme en soirée,  excellente boulangerie à proximité (fermée malheureusement le dimanche).
Studio très pratique et confortable. Je recommande.

L'appartement est extrêmement bien situé en plein cœur de Paris mais au calme dans une petite cours intérieure! Déco design très fonctionnel bien équipé parfait si le ménage était fait convenablement car celui ci laisse un peu à désiré à mon goût ! Je recommande tout de même..
Je je recommande les yeux fermés
Bel emplacement, agréable et fonctionnel !

Logement très propre et très bien équipé . Se situe à 5 minutes des grands magasins, des grands Boulevards et proche de St Lazare . Catherine et Justin très disponibles . J'y ai passé un séjour agréable . Merci pour votre accueil .
Un bon petit séjour sur Paris, il y a vraiment tout dans le quartier, l'appartement et vraiment bien situé et très bien équipé !
un accueil très chaleureux vous fera passer un agréable séjour chez Ella
belle personne, aime recevoir!
Un havre de douceur pour se reposer d une journée parisienne

Ella est très accueillante de bons conseils sa chambre est parfaitement propre literie confortable et petit coin café thé à votre disposition. Les sanitaires également très propres et ella fourni tout le necessaire en produits d'hygiène. Je ne suis resté chez elle que pour dormir une nuit et j'y retourne sans problème si besoin.

Ella est une personne hyper accueillante qui met à l’aise tout de suite.
Elle est toujours disponible pour ses hôtes.
Je Recommande
Ella est attentionnée et mets vraiment le voyageur dans de parfaites conditions !! N'hésitez pas !!
Ella prend soin de ses invités et demeure à l'écoute
Ella est très accueillante... nous y retournerons assurément
Excellent accueil, Ella est disponible et attentionnée
Je conseil vivement l'appartement de Ella.
Chambre charmante dans un appartement parfaitement situé ! Je recommande
Très bonne nuit passée chez Ella qui est très accueillante et gentille.
Accueil très agréable
Super accueil, Ella est hyper sympa. La chambre est très confortable et tout est très propre.
Très bon accueil ! Logement propre et bien situé, à moins de 15mn à pied du Zénith !
Très bon séjour. Ella s’est montré très disponible. Bon accueil et bonne communication.

Je ne suis peut être pas resté très longtemps mais mon temps passé chez Ella fût parfait, ponctuelle, chaleureuse, ouverte et attentionnée, je recommande vivement le séjour ici.
Merci encore.
Chambre agréable, Ella est attentive à ce que tout se passe bien. Je recommande.
Nous avons reçu un très bon accueil, la chambre est un petit cocon. Ella est une belle personne qui a su nous orienter vers ses bonnes adresses. Nous recommandons vivement ce airbnb.

Ella est une personne dynamique et qui fait tout pour faciliter l'arrivée des voyageurs. Nous avons réservé une nuit pour assister à un concert. L'appartement est idéalement situé car à 15 minutes à pied du Zénith. Si d'autres occasions se présentent, nous retournerons chez elle.
Très bon accueil, et l'appartement est proche du métro et situé dans un quartier calme finalement.
Tout confort, idéal pour passer une ou plusieurs nuits, Ella est très agréable. Je recommande ce logement.
Très bon accueil, Ella est disponible et de bon conseil. Je recommande sans hésitation.

Appartement conforme aux photos et descriptions et d'une propreté irréprochable.
Le contact avec Ella est très facile et est toujours disponible en cas de besoin.
Ella est bien plus qu'une simple hote!!!

Belle chambre spacieuse, hôte agréable . Je recommande
Hôte très gentille et attentionnée.
Hôte communicante et attentive à l’autre avec laquelle il est intéressant d'échanger

Excellent séjour chez Ella que j'ai été ravie de rencontrer. Chambre et salle-de-bain charmante et très propre avec de petits attentions que vous découvrirez en arrivant 😉 Je recommande sans hésiter que ce soit pour un séjour professionnel comme moi ou pour des vacances.
Ella m'a offert un accueil très chaleureux. La chambre et la salle de bain sont spacieuses et confortables. Je reviendrai
Ella a été une hôte très agréable. Dommage que ce n'ait été que pour une nuit et que j'ai dû partir tôt sans pouvoir dire au revoir. Je recommande
Tout à fait conforme à ce que j’attendais.

Un séjour bien agréable avec un super accueil et De bonnes attentions....
Merci Ella
Je conseille, excellent rapport qualité prix, bien situé. Très bon accueil et de très bon conseille sur les adresses autours ^^
Logement facile à trouver et agréable. Ella nous a très bien accueillies et nous a donné de bon conseils.
Appartement propre confortable et bien localisé. Ella est très gentille et arrangeante. Je recommande vivement.

Arrivée très facile, Ella est venue me chercher sur le lieu de parking pour me conduire à l'appartement et me donner les infos nécessaires pour le séjour. Ella est très sympa et a passé du temps à me conseiller pour mes visites/sorties. La chambre est conforme aux photos et description, propre, confortable et résidence calme. Les plus, de l'eau, un ventilateur et un nécessaire thé/café dans la chambre. Merci !
Accueil agréable, Ella est très efficace pour indiquer les directions. Appartement propre, rien à redire.
Super séjour ! Ella est très accueillante et sympathique, aux petits oignons pour ses hôtes !  L'appart est silencieux et le lit est hyperconfortable BestMatelasEver
Recommande.
Ella est très accueillante et sympathique. Un bon moment passe à l’occasion d’un voyage professionnel
Ella est une personne à l'écoute, qui n'hésite pas à donner des indications ou à bavarder avec ses hôtes. Le séjour s'est vraiment bien passé pour nous
Appartement super avec un confort et un accueil sympathique! Merci Ella!
Tout s‘est très bien passé chez Ella. L‘appartement est très propre, bien situé et rien n‘a manqué pendant le séjour. Je reviendrai:) A recommander!

Ella est une hôte très accueillante, prête à nous conseiller pour profiter du quartier. Le logement est propre, agréable et bien décoré. Nous avons particulièrement apprécié les petites attentions et la communication facile avec Ella.
Accueil agréable, lit confortable, l'ensemble propre.

Très accueillante. Lieu simple à trouver assez proche du métro, très propre, très confortable.
Séjour très agréable chez Ella, appartement bien situé, propre et conforme aux photos.

Très bon accueil avec tous les renseignements utiles pour aller et venir

Réactivité optimum lors de la réservation et indications qui m'ont beaucoup aidé à mon arrivée. Acceuil parfait. Ella a tout bonnement le sens de l'hospitalité ! Ella est très accueillante et son appartement est très propre et confortable. Très bon séjour.
Appartement propre, hotesse très aimable et réactive
Je recommande Ella pour son accueil très chaleureux et son amabilité. De très bonnes suggestions en terme de lieux à découvrir à Paris

Bonne expérience chez Ella. Merci bien.
Une personne d'une extrême gentillesse et d'une douceur incontestable !
Lieu accueillant, chaleureux et propre. Hôte attentif et sympathique.
Ella est une hôte d exception, restant à la disposition de ses hôtes. L appartement est très beau, très propre et très bien placé. Je recommande à tous !!!

Vous pouvez réserver chez Ella . la description correspond en tout point a ce que vous trouverez en arrivant et vous allez avoir une personne qui sait répondre a vos questions afin de rendre votre séjour comme si vous étiez chez vous.
chambre très confortable, Ella est très attentionnée ! Je recommande !
Très bon séjour chez Ella ; tout est conforme au descriptif. Literie d'excellente qualité. Je recommande.

Excellent choix.
Chambre très jolie et literie haut de gamme. L'appartement est grand pour PARIS.
Il faut entre 15 ET 20 mn pour aller au centre de PARIS, pour ceux qui veulent s'y rendre.
J'ai visité le quartier d' Ella, le 19 ème arrondissement, et c'est un gros coup de coeur !!
Super séjour ! Je recommande le logement d’Ella et son super accueil !
J’ai été très bien accueillie par Ella. Son appart est chouette et le quartier très agréable. À recommander !

Une belle chambre, près du métro et bus vers le centre. 
Ella fait de son mieux pour vous offrir un séjour agréable.
Impeccable.
Accueil très sympathique, propreté et bons conseils. Petite attention comme une bouteille d’eau en cette période de canicule.
Un logement de charme, idéalement situé au 19ème, chez une hôtesse très sympathique.

Aucun problème, très bon accueil et communication, une liberté de mouvement totale et un logement idéalement situé et entretenu. Petit + pour la carafe d’eau et le kit de thé disposés dans la chambre. Une adresse à conseiller et une hôte très agréable.
Ella est accueillante et son espace cosy, elle n'hésite pas à faire de son chez elle, l'endroit idéal pour ces hôtes.

Très agréable nuit chez Ella. Son appartement est à proximité du métro, dans une rue plutôt calme ; la propreté est exemplaire et l'accueil très chaleureux. Une mention spéciale pour la literie (très confortable) et la déco faite avec beaucoup de goût. 
Une hôte en or !
A lovely, clean room in the 19eme arr.! Near a metro stop and very easy transport to and from the center of Paris and CDG airport!

Amazing stay.
The room is lovely and clean .
The bed is really excellent .
The area is quiet and perfectly connected with metro who is very close from the place.
For the price , its Amazing value.
Thank you so much ELLA.

Only stayed for one night but Ella was super helpful and very kind. She also has the cutest dog! Room was clean and bed was comfortable and I loved the location. She recommended a beautiful park that was only a 8 min walk away. Great experience!

I literally don’t have the words to say how much I loved staying here. The apartment is in a lovely part of Paris, it’s easy to get to, close to the metro (7 minute walk), and it’s cute and clean. There’s an adorable cat and a little teacup chihuahua here who absolutely adore cuddles and made me feel so loved. Ella is a great host, too, and gave me good tips about Paris and made me feel welcome in the city and in her home. Highly recommend ✨

Ella is lovely and the pets (I gather they're not always there?) are very relaxed and friendly.
I loved waking up with the cats. The location was perfect for me too; lots of pleasant green spaces in the surroundings, good tube connection, and a neighborhood vibe. I didn't stay inside much, but the room was very comfy, including the reading chair, which I appreciated. Ella also agreed and organized this very last minute, which I considered exceptionally accomodating. We were still coordinating as I boarded my plane.
Since the apt. is on the first floor, just the clicking traffic light outside the window bothered me the second night, but I'm a light sleeper and I soon slept fine.
If I need to be in Paris again, I'll definitely try and stay with Ella again.

Thank you xx

Very confortable place well located in Paris. Ella is an amazing host, very kind, that will provide everything you need and will be always available for you and for your doubts about Paris, she has amazing tips!

A delightful few days at Ella’s place. I really felt welcome and at at home. Super easy and lovely location and very clean and comfortable. Great local tips and communication throughout, always a pleasure to meet likeminded creative people and their lovely furry friends. I wish was there longer... but I’ll just have to come back! Merci

Ella's place was clean, artistic and close proximity to the main central attraction of Paris. She herself is wonderful, welcoming and she gave a lot of local advice. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone interested!
Soft bed and nice room. Elle was very kind.

Cosy lil stylish room in the XIX quarter of Paris. Calm, clean and comfortable with a lovely host :)
Perfect to stay alone or in a couple!

Ella’s place was perfect. Incredibly clean and very thoughtful decorations. It also has a great location. Ella is very nice and accommodating and helps you figure out the city. I felt like I was at home in her very cozy apartment. She is also very gracious and generous. The bed is also one of the comfiest I’ve ever slept on. Definitely worth booking!

My partner and I really enjoyed our stay with Ella and her gorgeous little dog Nobel. Ella was very friendly and helpful with telling us how to get around and offering suggestions on where to go with our short time in Paris. The location was very handy to the metro, which got us everywhere we wanted to go. We couldn't have long luxurious showers because of being on a limited hot water tank, but that was a very small price to pay for the hospitality we received.
Great place to stay in paris!
Ella has been a kind and attentive host. I would highly recommend any traveler looking for a lovely stay in Paris to choose her place.
Ella was a great host and spoke helpful English. The room was charming and comfortable, and the location has so much to offer.

Ella en todo momento fue muy amable con nosotros, nos apoyo en todo momento e incluso nos dió recomendaciones de que lugares visitar ya que era nuestra primer vez en Francia y siempre estuvo atenta a nuestras dudas.
Gracias por todo Ella. Tienes tu casa en México ♥️
位置方便，到地铁站步行10分钟，Ella很耐心，建议第一次到巴黎的我如何安排行程
A nice room in a good quarter of Paris! Great places to visit in the closest neighborhood, by the canals and in the parks. Easy access to metro! Clean and comfy! Good communication!

This is a wonderful room! The bed is the most comfortable that we slept in during our stay in France, and Ella is a wonderful, thoughtful hostess. She speaks excellent English and has great recommendations for the area, including the fastest/easiest Metro routes. We only spent one night, and since it was our last night in France we weren't in the room more than to sleep  and then pack for our flight so I can't speak to the other amenities offered, though with Ella's great sense of style and thoughtful touches, I'm sure it's all great. Ella was very accommodating and responsive to our arrival. Wish we could have stayed longer!! Highly recommend!!

Ella and her mum are kind and welcoming hosts in Paris. Be sure to know what you book: the appartment is in an outer zone of Paris (but with a beautiful park nearby) and it‘s French standards with an arty detailed stile. Alltogether very fair.

Ella was a great host - she communicated so well with us before and during our stay. We only spent 1 night in Paris, so she let us know which places were a “must see”, and the best route to get there. We loved that check out was not until 12, so we were able to leave our bags and get some more sight seeing done in the morning.

I stayed in Ella’s apartment twice and had a wonderful stay both times. It was close to two incredible parks that I loved being walking distance from and she was so kind/helpful both times I came. The room is cozy, cute, and safe.

Ella’s place was really convenient to CDG airport. We were at the end of a 3 week trip and were exhausted and really just needed a place to sleep. The room was very clean and cozy and quiet... exactly what we needed. Ella met us when we arrived with her sweet little dog and made us feel right at home. We wish we had more time to visit the nearby Gardens, but had to catch an early flight the next morning. Thank you Ella for everything!!!
Very nice host and clean room. One evening she left a candle because we came back late. We felt very welcome at her apartment. :)

I booked the room 2 hrs before arrival and communication went perfect. Ella was very helpful and kind. I got nice tips about what to see in the neighborhood (for example the beautiful park nearby) wished I could stay longer!
Ella’s place was a comforting space to come home to after long days in Paris, I felt very at home there :). She was very helpful, kind, accommodating, and gave me great suggestions!
Ella is an excellent host. She has a beautiful apartment in a great location. Highly recommended!

Really nice stay ! Ella gave us many tipps where to go - there is a free open-air cinema in the park close by and many good places to eat - we liked the style of the flat with so many lovely details to discover - definitly to recommend !
Nico place to stay. Close to metro
Habitación muy linda y limpia en una zona muy linda de Paris. Ella es muy amable y da buenos la consejos locales. La comunicación es muy buena
A little bit farther out from the city, but a safe and quaint area! A great price too.
Ella was a fantastic host- very easy to get along with and very helpful. Spoke great English. A clean and comfortable home. Highly recommend!
Ella's place is lovely and clean! Easy location in a nice part of Paris. Ella was very friendly and offered good local tips. Also has a great little dog!
Nice and cosy place, had a lovely time there. House is clean and neatly decorated with all lovely stuff.
Ella is a great host. She's very reactive and made us feel comfortable. The room was more than clean, the location is close to the metro station. Everything went well, highly recommended !
Ella’s place is amazing. It’s stylish, clean, comfortable. On top of that she is a lovely guest and made us feel welcome. I highly recommend staying!
Ella is so kind and nice host! She takes care of me and keep checking that everything is okay :)
Nice comfortable room! Easy access to the metro.
Ella’s space was sooo stylish, cozy and comfortable. If you can, I highly recommend booking with her! Ella was also so welcoming and gave my brother and I a ton of suggestions around Paris.

Ella's apartment is cozy and nicely appointed.  She made me feel comfortable from the start, and was willing to help me whenever I had questions.  Her English is much better than my French!  After a few days in Paris at Ella's apartment, I was also a metro pro!   The neighborhood provides easy access to the city, without being in the middle.   There are restaurants, bakeries and groceries nearby.   I would certainly stay here again.
Great room and very nice touches like water and tea. The little dog is super cute as well!
Ella was a fantastic host. The room was exactly as described, everything was clean, and she was very helpful in giving us many local tips for our trip

When I arrived, the host was unhappy to have me and even told me that she didn’t understand how I booked because she supposibly blocked the date. Then, she sais that it was inconvenient for her to have me.. like come on you put your flat on airbnb. So I left the airpot and arrived 45 min ago. She told me she needed an hour to clean , which is ok because my booking was last minute. So she asked me if I wanted to go to the bathroom, so I asked to take a shower and she seemed mad that I asked, so I just refreshed, put make up, changed and leave. She made me feel so unwelcome like I never felt before. Also, as I couldn’t go in the room, in opened my suitcase in the leaving room to grab some clothes. She told me: uoh come on thats my private space you could have staid in the corridor. Well no I can’t it’s way too small and narrow. Anyways, host is not nice but place ok and 2 min from metro. 35$ from airport
I liked everything very much. Nice and clean room. Special thanks to the owner for information about interesting places in Paris. Recommend! Everything is very good.
Ella was an excellent host. Very friendly and helpful during our stay. The space was clean, stylish, and private. Also very close to the metro!

Ella’s place is exactly as the pictures posted and even better! She is a very welcoming and accommodating host who keeps the place sparkling clean! The room is spacious enough and her dog is adorable. Very stylish place in an convenient area. Thanks Ella for the stay and thanks for showing me to the most beautiful park for my trip! :) 
Highly recommended!

There was much noise outside - drunk people with fights and screams. I could only sleep at 3 am. Only one towel is given per host. If you are a girl with medium to long hair, bring your own hairdryer as there is no hairdryer or an extra towel to dry your hair. The room is very cramped - there is no space for your luggage in the room (apart from tiny bags and suitcases)  and no hangers for clothes. Be prepared to not have any space to eat or drink - the table in the bedroom is useless for eating and drinking with no adequate chair. There is also no ceiling light in the room - just bed-side lamps. You have to decide whether to charge phones/batteries or prefer some light in the room (window curtains cannot be drawn as it directly faces the main street and is at street level). The shower is very difficult to use for tall people as the host has very clear instructions on how to use it - crouch on the bathtub and shower.
I would raccomend Ella's place by all mean!

Wir haben uns bei Ella sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist in einem hippen, lebendigen Viertel und Ella hat uns wunderbare Orte empfohlen. Das Bett ist superbequem und morgens scheint die Sonne ins Zimmer. Im Zimmer, im Bad und im kleinen Flur sind überall hübsche kleine Details. Wir kommen gerne wieder. 
Nous nous sommes sentis très à l'aise chez Ella. L'appartement est dans un quartier très vivant. On a apprécié les endroits qu'Ella nous a conseillés. Le lit est très comfortable. La chambre, la salle de bain et le mini-couloir étaient décorés de petits détails adorables. On reviendra avec plaisir.

Ella has a nice and beautiful house.
Will definitely recommend.

Nos gusto mucho la ubicación del lugar, aunque es retirada del centro es muy facil trasladarse a diferentes puntos de la ciudad, la habitación es más pequeña de lo que parece en fotos, está bien si solo es para pasar la noche, la ducha no está anclada a la pared es de mano, así que puede no resultar cómodo ducharse, ella. Is dio indicaciones valiosas para nuestro viaje.
Ella’s place is comfortable for our short stay in Paris. She is also willing to share information to get around the neighbourhood.
Beautifully decorated and clean room. Everything as described. Recommend it.
Ella is a very nice person,  accommodating me everything I needed, the house is very desirable
Nice and clean place. You have your privacy. Ella is very nice and communicative and helpful person. So is Nobel :)
Ella's place was perfect for our stay. The bed was really comfortable, she was really accommodating with our flight arrival, and extremely helpful in providing local tips too. Highly recommend!
Ella is very kind and gives very quick responses to everything. The room is very good value for Paris. All amenities are near in very lively neighbourhood.
Séjour au top
J’ai loué l’appartement pour fêter mes 25 ans : le loft est parfait pour recevoir. Le lieu est atypique et décoré avec goût. Nous avons passé une excellente soirée !
Un lieu formidable : avec du caractère, une déco que nous avons adoré. Le contact avec les propriétaires c’est très bien passé : réactif, précis et très agréable !

Marion a été très sympathique et arrangeante. 
Son loft est de très bon goût, spacieux, cosy et atypique. Il y avait tout le nécessaire. Un miroir plus grand aurai été apprécié mais pas indispensable non plus. 
Nous avons passé une très bonne soirée et l'appartement convenait parfaitement pour recevoir du monde. Je recommande ce lieu et cette hôtesse.  
Merci encore !

Propriété atypique d'une grande qualité, à la déco exceptionnelle. On est très vite impressionné par la quantité et la qualité des œuvres exposés dans le logement. Cet appartement idéalement situé est en lui-même une œuvre d'art. Nos convives ont été bluffés par la beauté des lieux (lors d'une soirée d'entreprise), la qualité des prestations et l'espace disponible. Propriétaires très réactifs, accueillants et sympathiques. Je vous les recommande vivement.
Arrivée autonome très pratique ! Soirée qui s'est très bien passé, attention au bruit pour les voisins du dessous.

Hôte très sympathique et compréhensible, il y avait tout à disposition, très spacieux.
Difficile de trouver de la place pour se garer mais ça fait du bien de marcher !

Ma fille a fêté ses 18 ans il y a quelques jours dans ce logement. Elle a été plus que ravie de son anniversaire. L’appartement est plus grand qu’il n’en a l’air sur les photos, et la décoration est magnifique.
Marion est une hôte en or, elle s’est montrée disponible à n’importe quel moment, et a fortement contribué à la réussite de cette fête.
Nous recommandons vivement cet airbnb, que ce soit pour des événements ou un séjour atypique à Paris. Merci !!

Hôtel très bon rapport/qualité prix dans un quartier vivant de la capitale

Un rapport qualité prix sans égal ! La chambre était vraiment spacieuse et un  lit bébé avait été mis dans la chambre pour notre puce, emplacement calme malgré la proximité des cafés/restaurants. Adresse que 'ois retiendrons pour de futurs séjour
Je le recommande car lieu calme et le personnel très réactif à vos demandes. Le plus de cet endroit.
Emplacement idéal de cet hôtel doté d'un charme fou. En outre, le propriétaire démontre  sa singularité en organisant des événements culturels ( expos..) au sein de l'établissement.  Je recommande.

Très bon emplacement 
Accueil sympathique 
Chambres propres et petit-déjeuner nikel....
Ascenseur et petit hall d'entré avec du cachet 
A recommander ...

Hôtel super bien situé ! Bars restaurants à proximité, ainsi que plein de commerces aux alentours. 

Nous voulions deux lits simples, nous avons deux lits doubles mais la réceptionniste a proposé de nous changer de chambre le lendemain. accueil chaleureux. Nous ne regrettons pas notre choix et espérons revenir.

Oute la location exceptionnelle, je vous engage si vous croisez Xavier à lui demander de vous faire visiter l'hôtel et lui laisser la possibilité de vous raconter l'histoire de l'hôtel et de ces hôtes prestigieux. 
Vivre un moment dans cet hôtel, c'est vivre un moment d'une grande humanité au coeur de Saint-Germain des Près.

Comment envisager un séjour à Paris, même bref, sans passer une nuit à l'hôtel La Louisiane ? Personnellement je ne saurais pas faire !
Depuis que j'ai découvert cet hôtel à la fin des années 90 il fait partie de mes incontournables, de passage à Paris en juin j'ai profité encore une fois de l'hospitalité de ce lieu unique de la capitale.
Situé en plein coeur de Paris, à St Germain des Prés, cet endroit mythique qui a vu défiler tant de monde ces 200 dernières années reste comme une île où poser ses valises que ce soit pour une nuit, une semaine ou un mois...
Dans une chambre récemment rénovée, donnant sur la rue de Buci je me suis installé pour la nuit, ayant ouvert la fenêtre la soirée fut bercée par cette ambiance unique qui rend ce quartier si célèbre, le lit était très confortable et j'ai dormi comme si j'étais chez moi. Ha et ne cherchez pas de télé, cet objet a été banni de l'endroit il y déjà des années, ici la vie on la vit et ce n'est pas ce qui manque dans le quartier, on ne la regarde pas sur un petit écran !
La cafétéria où le petit déjeuner est servi était restée telle que dans mon souvenir, le petit déjeuner quant à lui était copieux : charcuterie artisanale, fromages frais, viennoiseries fraîches, le tout accompagné de café et jus de fruits.
Le personnel vous accueille chaleureusement et Xavier trouve toujours 5 min pour discuter avec vous et se remémorer votre dernier passage.
C'est le coeur lourd que j'ai du quitter cet endroit que j'affectionne tant, me promettant de revenir plus souvent à Paris et la prochaine fois de rester plus longtemps.
Je ne peux que recommander ce lieu si atypique et, si vous ne le connaissez pas, vous inciter à y passer au moins une nuit, vous comprendrez sans doute pourquoi ce lieu chargé d'histoires a vu passer Sartre et Simone de Beauvoir, les plus grands joueurs de Jazz ou encore les auteurs de la Nouvelle Vague, ou pourquoi Tarantino s'y est installé pour écrire Pulp Fiction...

En plein cœur de Saint-Germain, hôtel un peu vétuste mais cela explique son prix, et ce n’est pas gènant . Petit-déjeuner inclus, correct .
Une adresse que je retiens pour une prochaine visite.
Accueil simple et chaleureux.
Endroit et accueil super sympa, hôtel plein de charme avec son petit côté désuet, emplacement idéal en plein cœur du quartier bouillonnant de Saint Germain.
Hôtel parfait, dans le meilleur quartier de paris !

C'est vraiment LE SPOT de Saint Germain, vous verrez le code WIFI fait référence à un habitué de la maison P..P F.....N, c'est pas super dur ! Les croissants du p'tit dej c'est une boucherie ....

It's really THE SPOT of Saint Germain des Prés, you will see the code WIFI refers to a regular house P..P F ..... N, it's not super hard! The croissants of the breakfast ? TOP

Proximité des commerces, artisans, restauration varié,  d’une belle Église. La Louisiane est bien située à proximité de la Gare Montparnasse.

Amazing historic hotel in the best location in the world! I love it. The coolest!

Xavier was very friendly and helpful. the hotel is in my opinion in the best place of Paris. The location is just perfect. There are beautiful cafes and restaurant around. The Louvre is 10 minutes away by foot. I did most of my visits to museums and interesting places by foot because the hotel is so central. The place were the hotel is located has nice boutiques and art stores around - perfect for shopping or just walking around. Thank you Xavier.

This is exactly what you need if you’re traveling alone or with another person. It’s simple and to the point. It’s a bed and a shower, all you need to catch a few hours of Zzz’s before heading back into Paris. Highly recommend if you just need a place to crash for the night. GREAT location.

We would definitely stay here again although the rooms got quite hot and there didnt appear to be aircon so a summer visit might be a touch challenging!

Una experiencia increíble. El hotel es mucho mejor de lo que se describe, muy buena atención, habitaciones muy amplias, muy limpio y excelente ubicación.

Booked this place on a last minute Rush for only one night and ended up staying 2. Very simple, and perfect for short stays. I didn't stay in the hotel myself, but booked it for my mother-in-law and her friend.

Therefore I can only say what I personally experienced with this booking:
The rooms were changed three months after the booking and it was expected that I would accept it (one room with two beds instead of two separate rooms, which was the reason I booked this hotel in the first place). Communication with three different persons on this topic didn't make the matter easier - on the contrary, they didn't seem to communicate properly among each other, so I had to clarify several times. In the end we agreed on a solution, but it could have gone more smoothly.

Communication in general (and again with different persons at the reception) seemed to cause misunderstandings which my mother-in-law experienced also, especially on the last day. Maybe it would be easier, if you are able to speak French...

Over all the stay in the hotel was ok and the location is close to the city centre.
Very good place to stay just avoid the breakfast

Es un hotel antiguo pero muy bien cuidado. Con toques históricos, de hecho hicieron una película sobre su historia. Esta ubicado en una zona muy conectada, cerca del metro,de tiendas para el consumo y en medio de un centro gastronómico muy activo, a la noche se siente un poco el ruido de la calle, de restaurantes que ofrecen música,pero al menos para temperatura de 25 grados con la ventanas apenas abiertas se puede descansar sin problemas. Service here is great! Quick responses, staff at reception are nice, house keeping is nice, staff serving breakfast are nice. Although amenities are basic, they are sufficient and clean enough. You are really paying for a great location here. Near 2 metros, multiple busses, walking distance to everything, laundromat 2 seconds down the road, bettee food which is less touristic 5 minutes away, 10 minutes to the Seine, 10 15 to Notre Dame, across a supermarket. I was pestering them a lot prior to booking with so many questions and demands and they werresuper quick and helpful with responses. Place has an elevator which is great in Paris. Thanks for having me and my baby, it was a nice stay in Paris

The rooms are limited and very basic - however, you will not find a better hotel than this in terms of location and price. Everything is walking distance away from here, including great places to eat and a small supermarket. The staff are amazing and polite, and there is a good parking spot (email them to reserve it prior to booking - it didn’t say this when I booked it, but it’s their policy so make sure to do this and avoid disappointment). 

There is even a (limited) breakfast available, which is great considering the price. All in all, despite the limited rooms, this hotel is perfect if you’re an explorer like myself, who is only looking for a clean and tidy place to sleep at night.

An alright place to stay for a couple of days,  especially if you’re not counting on staying in the room a lot. The hotel  has an old charm to it.

The location of the hotel is perfect. I had a great time there during New Year’s Eve. The owner and staff is great and more than guest friendly.

El hotel está  en una zona fantástica. Son muy amables. Te ayudan, te recomiendan y nos ayudaron con el taxi. Las camas cómodas. Es viejo y da sensación de descuido. El desayuno es sencillo pero correcto.

Great hotel! Very clean & organized, I loved the location, metro was near by with many awesome places to eat & see right near the hotel! Should definitely check out Ippudo Saint-Germain if you like Ramen

Staying at Hotel La Louisiane is like stepping back in time 75 years, but pleasingly so.  The beds are very comfortable and the bathrooms are clean and functional.  The location is superb. A fruit/vegetable market is right outside the door, as well as bakeries, restaurants, street cafes, and gelato places. The vitality and ambience of Paris were ours for the taking.  We walked to Notre Dame, Musee d'Orsay, and the Louvre. The reasonable price of the rooms compensated for the lack of updated cosmetic improvements and a strong wifi connection was much appreciated.

Perfect for my needs. Traveling with my early-20s age son I wanted a place where I could afford separate rooms while still being in an interesting part of Paris. Room size and amenities were a secondary consideration-- although I must say the free continental  breakfast was very good. Our rooms faced an inner space that lacked a view but were very quiet at night-- even before the active street night-life died down. La Louisiane may be a little rough around the edges in places, but our rooms were comfortable and clean, and the staff was very friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay there again. La Louisiane exceeded my expectations.
perfect location!

And we appreciated breakfast in the mornings.  Would stay there again.

Nevertheless I had a good stay.

The location is great on the Rue Saint Denis, a great location if you are new to Paris and want to explore the city. - A close walk to everything you may want to see. The communication with Gao was superb, he was attentive, left clear instruction as check in was concerned. Finally, he checked in to see how we were doing, (via message, mid-way through our trip ), which I thought was thoughtful. Me and my friend had a great stay in Paris. The airbnb was ideal! Only one issue we both had and a minor one, was the shower... The water took a long time to drain which meant you could only shower for a few minutes before it would flood over the side. Sécurité : 
- J’avais précisé avant ma réservation que je tenais beaucoup à la sécurité de la porte mais malheureusement il y’avait un couac avec la serrure de la porte. Imen ne m’a prévenu de ceci que quelques heures avant mon arrivée. Cependant, il ya 2 codes d’accès avant d’entrer dans le bâtiment ce qui a été un peu plus rassurant.

- La prise à côté du lit ne fonctionnait pas toujours, mais les autres fonctionnaient. Je ne sais pas si l’électricité est aux normes car le bâtiment est ancien, cependant il s’agit bien de prises Terres.

Propreté: propre 

Environnement: calme et à proximité de tout ce qu’il faut.

Équipements: le chauffage ne fonctionnait pas , cependant Imen ma proposé de m’acheter un chauffage électrique

Absolutely great apartment, sparkling clean and very stylish decorated. We stayed only 1 night with our 3 kids but had a great time! There is a nice square by the church with little fountains and a playgarden behind the Marie.

Highly recommended!

Das gut ausgestattete und hübsch eingerichtete Appartement hat meine Erwartungen übertroffen! Die Vermieter waren sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich, und haben uns einige Lebensmittel wie Brötchen, Saft und Milch bei Anreise zur Verfügung gestellt. 
Im Erdgeschoss lebten Hunde und Katzen, die jedoch nicht nach oben in das Appartement kamen. 
Insgesamt kann ich die Unterkunft sehr weiterempfehlen! Wir haben uns sehr wohl und gut aufgehoben gefühlt!
Wij hebben ons zeer welkom gevoeld bij Kathy. Het is een ruime bovenverdieping van alle gemakken voorzien. Je kan heerlijk in de tuin beneden zitten. Absolute aanrader!

Très bel hôtel, à un tarif défiant toute concurrence. Malgré l'absence de réponse de "l'hôte" à mon message - et pour cause, puisque c'est un hôtel - personnel sur place très agréable. Donc, pas vraiment un Airbnb, mais pour 60 euros la nuit, expérience exceptionnelle.

J'avais réservé cet hôtel la veille de notre arrivée avec comme premier critère : la mise à disposition d'un lit pour bébé. Sur les points négatifs : le matelas du lit bébé n'était pas vraiment adapté (cela ressemblait à une couette épaisse) et il n'y avait pas de baignoire pour bébé (demandée à l'accueil) alors que c'était indiqué dans les équipements sur le site AirBnB. Je passe sur l'aspect petit, pour lequel nous étions effectivement prévenus à l'avance.
Pour les points positifs : matelas pour adulte très bon. Chambre très propre, refaite à neuf récemment (moins de quelques années) avec un très bon confort. Personnel très accueillant. J'y retournerai probablement car il reste très bien placé et d'un bon rapport qualité/prix.
Correspond à l'offre proposée sur air bnb : je recommande !

Добротный небольшой отель. Прекрасно расположен. Рядом метро, большой ТЦ с возможностью вполне приличного шопинга, множество кафе и ресторанов. Основные музеи (Лувр, Орсе, Оранжери и др.) находятся на удалении 2-3 км, но мы с женой с легкостью их преодолевали пешком, одновременно гуляя и созерцая чудесные маленькие улочки и бесподобную архитектуру Парижа. Казалось, за 6 дней можно увидеть все, но мы заблуждались! Наматывая ежедневно по 20000 шагов мы не успели посетить все запланируемые места! Поэтому с удовольствием вернемся еще раз, т.к. влюбились в Париж с первого взгляда!
Excellent service before and during the stay!
Excellent location! Check in was very easy, and the staff was very kind and helpful. The room was super clean, and the bed very comfortable! A great place to stay!
Great little hotel. Very close to the metro and not that far from the Seine. Didn’t purchase breakfast so can’t speak to that.
Loved this place. The hospitality was amazing, everything was good. We will be back!

The hotel was ok, friendly staff and located close to the metro as well as walkable distance (25/30 mins) to the city center. We didn’t spend any additional time here as there was no space to relax, besides sitting on the bed. So if you plan on being out all day seeing Paris then it’s fine considering prices in the city. The room was much smaller than those in the photos and was cold when we arrived (although we turned on the AC and that seemed to sort out the problem).
Great place, easy to find and ideal if you’re just going for a few days. Lovely staff too!
Nice and clean hotel. Well situated and friendly staff.
O local é limpo e muito organizado!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. The staff were friendly and the room was sparkling clean. The location also makes it easy to get to anywhere in Paris easily. Highly recommended. I plan on staying here again soon.

It was really nice hotel; fancy, clean and bed was comfy and the location was so nice. There were many restaurants and convenience stores near by. And the bus stop and metro station were also near. I really recommend here to stay!
Nice hotel with small charming rooms, satisfying breakfast offer and excellent hospitality. The cost effectiveness is amazing for Paris.
Very nice place and location! Easy to get there via metro. It is a hotel room, so it is sparkling clean with sufficient amenities! Worthy of value!
The bathroom was a little bit tiny, but very good for the money!

This is a great place to stay if you plan to see the Air and Space Museum at Le Bourget. You can actually see the outdoor rocket display from the property. Getting to the museum is a easy stroll. It is also a short bus ride to the Le Bourget train station, where you can get on the RER B to the Charles de Gaulle International Airport or to Saint-Michel and Notre-Dame. Patrick is also fluent in English and French, and was always prompt to reply by text message or phone call to my questions.

Patrick's response time was amazing.  Despite me booking just a couple hours before my arrival, lack of reception on my phone to send him messages, and his phone dying, Patrick was still able to respond and accommodate me.  The home was clean and so was the room.  The room was very spacious.  A bit cold at night during the winter, but there is a good heater in the room and it works well.  Patrick and his grounds keeper offered access to the kitchen and tea (but I had no time to partake.) On Sunday there was live music and singing at his home for a Sunday service.  He was kind enough to extend an invitation to me.  It is close to the airport, so it's super convenient.  I'd definitely stay there again.

It was my first booking in Airbnb and I found it much better than I exptected. The host was very kind and ready to help anytime. House conditions very well, clean and simple. I will come again in the future.

It’s a good stay if you wanna live remote from the center. Besides a bed and a table, don’t expect much more. The room gets very cold in winter. If you intend to stay most of your time outside your room, then it’s fine
Great place, hospitality and kindness! Just what my girlfriend and I were looking for.

I had a great stay at Patrick's place.  The house is beautiful and is in a great neighborhood with access to the local bus station that takes you to Paris.  Very friendly host.  I would recommend staying here wholeheartedly.

There is no praise I can give can give high enough to match the experience I had here. Being to a host to a first time airBNB user puts a host in a challenging position, but Patrick nailed it with effortless grace and an excellent setup. The house is spacious, well appointed and peopled with a few regulars who were also as helpful and generous as he was. I arrived on short notice and late, but you'd never know it. My room was spacious, secure, well appointed, and the bathroom was wow! All together, I would say my experience rated an Oscar! Thank you, dear man, for a job done to perfection!
Confortable, clean and quiet place. Well situated. Serious, nice and decent people

Patrick is a friendly host, helpful and even willing to came out to lead us in to the exact location. Informative about surrounding facilities. If the house can be much cleaner it would be better.

Excellent hote!  Very friendly even on late arrival on night! I suggest this location for your fast or long sejour in the area, well served by local bus and easy to get a bus or train to CDG Airport and Paris centre.

Patrick was a very friendly and helpful. Beautiful house. All issues was very quickly solved. Very valuable place for this price. If buy Paris Visit transport card you can very easy reach Paris and location absolutely not a problem. Close to Le Bourget Airport where located Aviation museum.

Location first! 14 easy minutes to C D G airport! Really pretty house and nice rooms in a great and quiet neighborhood. Safe on street parking. Welcome tea. Kind and friendly hosts who were easy to reach  and let us check in when we needed. Wonderful stay. Thank you Patrick and Charles.

Logement dans un des plus beaux quartiers de Paris. Samy est très réactif aux messages. C’était un bon séjour.
Accueil très sympathique et appartement tout à fait conforme à l'annonce, très bon séjour !

Un accueil parfait de la part de Samy, joignable facilement et très réactif, et multipliant les petites attentions dans l’appartement (bouteilles d’eau, thé, café...). 
Propreté correcte de l’appartement ; des éléments de la cuisine pourraient être à nettoyer ou à remplacer et le rideau de douche à changer. Ajouter une bouilloire ou une cafetière apporterait un petit + pratique à l’appartement. Literie et chambre au top! Wifi performant. 
L’appartement est situé à deux pas de la sortie de métro de Barbes-Rochechouart et est vraiment calme. Nombreux commerces à proximité. Étant sur place dans le cadre du travail, je n’ai pas pu profiter des restaurants, bars et activités touristiques à proximité, notamment du Sacré cœur tout juste à deux pas! 
En bref, un appartement super pour une semaine à Paris avec un rapport qualité prix plus que convenable!

Super appartement, hôte très sympathique et accueillante.  Je recommande.
Merci Samy.

L’appartement de Samy est propre et bien situé.

Je le conseille à tous les voyageurs.
Samy est très réactif pour les d'accueils et l'annonce correspond bien à l'appartement. La propreté à revoir, les draps n'étaient pas propre.

Logement assez grand et  confortable: petite cuisine bien équipée, salle de bain adjacente, grand salon et grande chambre avec armoires et rangements dans un immeuble typique parisien.

Samy répond très rapidement aux demandes de précisions et fournis les informations détaillées et claires pour avoir un accès facile au logement.

Le quartier est environné des commodités de base et l'appartement est localisé à environ 10-15 minutes de marche de la gare du Nord.  Métro, restaurants et bars sont tout près également.

Je n'hésite pas à recommander ce logement pour une personne seule ou un couple.

Tout était bien Samy, nous sommes parties, la clé est sur la table, les fenêtres sont fermées, compliments, nous avons bien dormi, bien séjour, merci pour tout! Location est très bien placée, quelques pas de Monmartre. Gerhard
L’appartement correct et bien situé. Réception gentil et Samy était à disposition pour répondre aux questions.
Samy was very helpful during my stay and waited for me on the checkin day while my plane was late. The apartment was clean, situated in the Montmartre area.

As with other reviews, Samy responds really quickly and clearly. His flat is as per the photos, clean and in a great location. 5 to 10 minutes walk to watch sunrise from the steps of the Sacre Couer over Paris? Yes please! I've used a lot of AirBnBs. This has to be one of the best of them. 1 recommend: Hire the Velib bikes round the corner from the flat. €5/day and good bike lanes to get round the city.
Great location & enjoyed my stay!!
Excellent first-floor location close to Montmartre, a metro station and the Gare du Nord. Quiet at night.  Ideal for one or two people.
Easy communication.  Place is as described.

Samy has been such a good host. he is very attentive and helpful. my train got delayed and arrived quite late but he wait for us to ensure we can safely check in to his place.
his apartment location is very strategic, near to grocery stores, good cafes, the famous Sacre Coeur, the amazing street of Montmartre, Place du Tertre within short walk.
i really recommend his place if you are looking a place within Montmartre.

Samys place was really great. I’ve stayed in many Airbnb’s in Paris & this apartment was top of the list for me. It’s such a great big space considering that it’s Paris and is located in a great location! Also, having a functional tv that has cable is rare for an Airbnb apartment so this place gets extra credit! The apartment was a little chilly and there was construction going on in the morning, but the amenities & the apartment alone made up for it. I will happily stay here again

Great location and the host was available at all times i needed him. The place isn’t the cleanest but it is in a safe area and walking distance to Gare de Nord, the metro and a ton of restaurants. The bathroom didn’t have an attached shower head which was annoying but you can use it.

Samy’s apartment is very well located. Very close to both train and metro stations. It is spacious, and has everything you would need. He has a video on how to get in the apartment that is very helpful.
A very nice clean apartment close to Sacre Couer (Up a lot of steps at the end of the street) A lovely separate bedroom and sofa in the living room with fridge and microwave in the kitchen area.
Good location and close to metro stations.  Samy made check in easy and followed up to make sure I got in ok and if I had concerns.

Samy is very responsive with communication. He has a video to shown you how to get into the apartment. It’s very handy.  The location is great. All the bus stops and metro are close by. Montmartre just 5 mins walk with plenty nice restaurant around. The supermarket just across the road. The cleanliness of the place is a bit poor. A proper spring clean is urgently needed.  Overall it’s a very good area to stay.

Nice little apartment in a great location. It was very close to the train station, which was important to me. Good amenities, and awesome host who was very communicative throughout the process. Definitely recommend.

Excellent, safe location in Montmartre, close to metro, neighborhood restaurants, markets and shops. Easy check-in instructions. Whole apartment with kitchen and bathroom. WiFi not strong but passable. Overlooks busy street although quiet at night. No air-conditioning but host provided a fan.

Ik trof de woning erg smerig aan. Samy  vond dat er was schoon gemaakt maar overal lagen haren en stof en andere troep. Ik ben er 3 uur binnen geweest en besloot t pand te verlaten omdat t zo smerig was. ik verwacht mijn geld terug, maar de host werkt niet mee.
Sammy’s place is in a great neighbourhood, watch the street life from big open windows, supermarket across road, the Sacré-Cœur 100 metres, beautiful streets surround, lovely
The place is very well located, Sammy was really helpful and answer with courtesy the messages

Building felt safe and quiet-but on a noisy street. Large kitchen-but I had to provide my own coffee maker. Nice to have a separate real bedroom-somewhat rare in Paris especially at this price range. Bathroom could use some repairs & updating. Whole place could use a professional cleaning but not a dealbreaker. For the price it was spacious & worked for my stay.

We stayed for one night in Samy’s apartment and everything was lovely. 
Samy responded to our messages very quickly and was very nice in person. 
The apartment was quiet comfortable and spacious for 2 people. 
Thanks Samy!

Communication with Samy was very easy. Even thought I didnt meet him in person but, he was making sure everything was ok. His instructions with key etc. Great location, only few mins away from the Metro and a lots of shops around. Very comfortable bed. Once again Thank you for being such a great host.
Great location and great communication! I would absolutely stay again!

I stayed at this apartment for 9 days while studying french. I loved how spacious and comfortable the place was which also included a kitchen and a washing machine, just feet from Sacre Coeur. The location was great with neighborhood bakeries and cafes and easy access to metro. For the price, this value can't be beat. A few minor things could be improved, but none to complain about given the overall value of the apartment. I would definitely stay here again and hope to have the opportunity soon.

Le studio est idéal pour un séjour à petit prix à proximité du parc des expositions (2 stations de métro de la porte de Versailles) ou de la gare Montparnasse. La ligne 12 est à 2 minutes à pied de l'appartement. Le studio est simple, pratique, propre est bien équipé. Pas de nuisance sonore, beau bâtiment, quartier très commerçant (3 supermarchés), arrivée très facile et très bonne communication. Pour qui cherche un bon rapport qualité prix sur Paris, c'est une bonne option. Je  le conseillerais plutôt pour un seul voyageur.

The apartment is located in a nice area with shops, supermarkets, restaurants and small parks around. It's located on the 6th floor which keeps city noise out but the walls to the neighboors are quite thin and not sound proof - typical Parisian. It's a simple apartment which has all you need for a short stay, or longer if you invest a bit in kitchen gear. The elevator was not working so it was a bit of an effort to climb those 6 stories. And we would have liked to see a bit more investment from the hosts side in the incuded breakfast and other contents of the fridge. I still do recommend the apartment!
