Clean and stylish place. Thanks for Farah in understanding my issues and making me feel comfortable. Highly recommended place.

Lovely duplex, cozy, practical and well decorated. I don’t think there’s AC but the temperature was perfect even though it was super hot out! Farah was a great host, thoughtful and responsive. I also greatly appreciated being able to extend my stay!
Excellent
非常好的住宿体验,房间布置精致,洁净而温馨｡交通方便,距离地铁站很近｡生活便捷,周边有超市､面包店｡房东非常热情､周到｡非常推荐｡
The perfect place! Farah is nice!

Farah place is definitely a good value deal. 

It is quite nice and the living room as a great feeling. Farah also cares about little details to make you feel welcome.

However, I’m not a huge fan of the underground bedroom. 

When it comes to location, it’s a district where gentrification is still in progress. It is close to the metro which makes it quite convenient!

The accommodation is tremendously beautiful !! You can tell by the first step in the room you want to live in it. Definitely feel like home. Farah is very helpful and reachable even late night, a great host who pay attention to details and some helpful thoughts ! I recommend it 1000% !

We had a great time in the beautiful appartment that Farah offers. The ambience of the place is lovely, and it offers everything we needed for a relaxing two day stay in Paris. We really liked the artsy 'gallery-vibe', that's what also attracted us in the first place.

Farah is very friendly and professional in contact. She made the check in/out quick and easy, which we also appreciated.  

I would definitely recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a place to stay in Paris.
The apartment offers a pleasant stay, the check-in is easy and the host is super responsive. A few details could be improved upon here and there but nothing major.
My stay was great. The room is on the ground floor so you don't have to worry about climbing stairs when you get in after a long day. The place was decorated very well.
Muito bom. O banheiro é muito pequeno
Good Airbnb for a short trip in Paris, had some issues with the cleanliness of the apartment but Farah was great in ensuring all issues were resolved. Perfect for a couple!
Lovely place that had everything we needed! 100% would recommend to everyone

The place itself is fine. The check in process was quiet complicated. Please, if you do decide to book this place. Take EXTRA care of yourself around this neighborhood. It is NOT safe. I was walking around and got robbed, which had my passport and documents in it. When I spoke to the police officer, they said that this specific neighborhood is not safe. Please Uber everywhere and be extra careful when you are walking.
Farah is a Super Host to start with . The apartment had a special ambience to it and was quiet unique.
Small but lovely
It's a nice house and Farah is so nice. The house is on the street and the bedroom is the basement. It was an interesting experience to live here.
The place is very nice for a couple. Farah is very supportive. I asked a recommendation for a place to eat and get around, she always answered and her attitude spell "I want to help you"
A perfect location

This was a great place for my first trip to Paris and I wish that I had been able to spend even more time here! I loved the thoughtful details in the apartment such as power converters for guest from different countries.
Spacious spot for Paris. Well kitted out. Sleeper couch is a huge benefit! Farah is great with communication and was readily available if needed.

Farah is a great host! Me and my partner stayed at her place for New Years, and we had the most amazing time. She has included everything we could’ve needed including a hair dryer, washing machine, cooker, microwave etc. The decor is stylish and chic and so homely! Check in was easy and not too far from the airport. I would definitely recommend this place and visit again!
Our family (3 persons) enjoyed our stay in the apartment. Nearby we could find all the services necessary. The apartment was nicely furnished. We warmly recommend!

We had a wonderful trip in Paris thanks to Farah. The apartment was cozy and stylish with everything we needed for our stay. It was nice to hang out late in the morning or come home early and spend the evening in the apartment instead of going out. We were a short walk from Montmartre, which ended up being our favorite part of Paris. The metro was unfortunately not running due to a strike, but it was easy to walk or get an Uber to different parts of the city. We would highly recommend staying here!
Great place in a great location

Farah was a fabulous host- very helpful, accommodating, and friendly. The two of us were comfortable and well cared for. 

The location is a perfect getaway from the city. It's on a quiet residential street just one block away from a main street that has plenty of shopping and restaurants. It is also only about 20 minute walk to Sacre Coeur and all the Montemarte restaurants and charm.  Plus, there's a great bakery about 50 ft from the front door.

If you are thinking of staying in Montemarte, we'd highly recommend Farah's place. Perdect for a couple or 2-3 friends.
Great place! So clean and beautiful
This place is good. Well designed.
The check in was flexible and easy, the apartment was clean, tidy and very welcoming! We had a great stay and I have no negative feedback.

Farah and her husband are very welcoming and obliging people.  They responded very quickly when we had a problem & sorted it out promptly.  Comfortable apartment which was well located near the metro & a Boulangerie.  There was also the nice touch of a bottle of wine to welcome us.  Thank you Farah

Farah was a perfect host. She was extremely attentive and easy to get in touch with. The apartment is beautiful and had everything we needed. The complementary wine was a lovely touch! Would definitely recommend.
Heerlijk vertoeven in het appartement en met de metro ben je zo bij alle bezienswaardigheden!

Farah’s apartment was great. Everything my wife and I needed and extremely close to a metro station, where we managed to see all of the big sights in Paris. We loved our stay, and would come back again. Farah was also very diligent and checked in multiple times during our trip. Can’t recommend her flat enough!

Farah’s place is the perfect set-up if you want to live like the Parisians! It’s stylish and has everything you need. Close to transportation and easy to access. Farah and her husband were amazing hosts and we felt very welcomed by them!

Dejligt roligt område, men alligevel tæt ved livlige små gader med unikke caféer og forretninger. 
Boligen virkede lidt fugtig. Badeværelset er trangt og trænger til et teknisk eftersyn.
Farah was the perfect host from start to finish. The space was clean, cared for and comfortable. We loved being so close to Sacre Coeur. Our first trip to Paris was tres bien!

Lovely little place, great hist, really helpful and nice to communicate with.
We had a lovely card and bottle of wine to welcome us. Location was very handy for all amenities, but not in the most picturesque part of Monnartre. All in all a very successful stay!

The apartment is not located near popular sites and transportation to and from is too time consuming and expensive. The location did not feel safe and getting in and out of the apartment was difficult (due to the lock). Paint chipping, broken toilet and shower.
The place was nice and walking distance from the train station. It had some damage from previous guests but was in good shape and well stocked with amenities.

Great location, really cute flat. Host is attentive and responds very quickly to any questions. Easy to take the metro to anywhere in Paris or outside of Paris. The front window was stuck open, being able to close it would have helped a lot with noise at night but we were never cold. Host did tell us after we checked in that the previous guests broke the shower and toilet, we received specific instructions on how to use them so they continued to work for us while we were there and this was nice and helpful to know, but in order for this airbnb to keep its "plus" status the bathroom could use some basic TLC.
Overall we were happy and the host was amazing and communicated everything with us and was always honest. Great bakery just a few steps away too!
Farah was a wonderful host. The place was very nice and modern. We loved it's location!

Our stay here was great. The location was close to the Metro and we felt very safe here despite being on ground floor. The living area was clean and comfortable, and it was a great place to come back to after a long day of being tourists! Thanks Farah :)

Super Appartement 
Liegt in einer ruhige Straße 
Nahe Mommatre und Metro

The hosts are truly lovely and accommodating and go out of their way to make sure you are okay and taken care of.

I enjoyed the location and being outside of the tourist areas and it was easy to get around via bus and train. 

The layout of the apartment is quaint and has lovely deco.

If you want to feel more like a local, I'd recommend the stay. 

There is noise from the bar next door on some nights,  so if you're a light sleeper- this is not for you.

The place itself was very cute and stylish! Farah was kind and easy to reach. I loved the self check in and check out. The area felt a little sketchy at night, but we loved walking around during the night and it was a short distance to many points of interest. We felt very at home during our stay! Thank you Farah!

What a perfect place to enjoy some days in Paris! The apartment is fully equipped with everything you need to feel comfy and safe. We could feel the love Farah has put into all the beautiful details in her apartment to create a warm and cozy environment. Farah has been very attentive and kind and it’s been an absolutely pleasure enjoying our weekend at her place. Thank you, Farah!
We had a great time staying at Farah's place. It was beautiful and located in an interesting area.
We hadden een aangenaam verblijf in Parijs. Rustige buurt . Goed gelegen (dicht bij de metro). Ideaal voor met z'n tweetjes.
Great apartment in the artistic part of Paris. Fabulous markets on the main boulevard most days where you can buy anything from fresh vegetables to clothes
Farah was a great host. Very responsive.  The place was a bit hot and musty, but if you have a high tolerance it’s a good value if you want to stay near the Montmartre area.

Amazing. Farah and her trendy apartment was the PERFECT Parisian home for me during my stay. She was incredibly hospitable and welcoming, even a welcome bottle of wine. The apartment is very modern but cozy as well. Loved it and would absolutely recommend!!
We had a lovely stay at Farah's place. We appreciated the extra touches like cakes, cider, bread, coffee left for us. The space is stylish and modern.
Is gooddddd

What a gem! This was our second time to Paris, so this time we wanted to stay away from the congested tourist spots. Montmartre is a fun neighborhood which gives you the feel of being a local. From beginning to end, Farah was hospitable and prompt. Their apartment is so cute, clean and modern!  The only downside, not much counter space or storage space. We comfortably slept three -my husband, me and our adult son- but we had all our belongings spread  all over  the living room and kitchen counter. But that is typical of Paris apartments, they are cozy. So just keep that in mind when packing. A big luggage is not necessary, especially since there is a W/D.
Sehr hübsche Wohnung , aber Schlafzimmer im Keller ohne Fenster, nur Klimaanlage. Türe  im Erdgeschoss nicht zum Offen stehen lassen, da es auf die Straße hinaus geht.

The home was just as stylish as photographed and described. There were thoughtful touches such as converters in the outlets and a folder Farah made describing different amenities and listing restaurant recommendations. When we needed help figuring out how to use the washer/dryer, Farah responded right away even though she was in the hospital about to deliver her baby. I did need help carrying the luggage down on the narrow, winding staircase to the bedroom, but thankfully, my travel mates were able to help. For my first Airbnb experience, I was very pleased.

Everything is great. it is near the train station and it is easy to go everywhere. 
Farah's home is so cosy. its just feels like home to me. With Netflix available on TV and wifi. 
The house is complete with first aid kit and household needs.
Perfect appartment for a wonderful weekend in Paris. Farah is a great host, answerig on every question within seconds and preparing your stay in a way you feel really welcome.
Very nice place, very clean and close to the Metro.

Great place! Easy to get around in Paris from this location. It was warm outside but the main bedroom is below ground keeping it nice and cool. The plug adapters were a great benefit for out of town travelers. Wish we would have more time in the neighborhood as a short walk around on the last night showed us many cute restaurants and cafes. Only info we would share for people considering is that the stairs to get to the bedroom are slightly narrow, we managed. All in all we would definitely recommend the place!

All in all a decent stay. Has everything you need for a quick trip in Paris. Conveniently close to Simplon train station. The only thing I could not tell from the description and photos was that the bedroom is actually underground sort of like a basement. I had assumed it was more like a loft. But regardless the host was responsive and the unit was very nice. Very comfortable bed too!
Farah is an excellent hostess, really caring and helpful, had lots of good tips for restaurants. The place is perfect for a weekend getaway. We’d love to come back next time we’ll visit Paris!

Farah’s home is clean, stylish, and very comfortable for a few guests! There are good amenities (like a TV, soundbar, etc) that are easy to use. The apartment is close to the metro (4 line) and you can easily get groceries, etc nearby.

The place is lovely and Farah and her husband are absolutely outstanding! Such a cute and warm couple, I was so glad to meet them. I think it was a fluke, but the heater wasn’t working so it took a while to warm up (thankfully there were multiple heaters). Farah answered me in the middle of the night, thank goodness, and was always courteous and helpful. The paint under the bathroom sink is peeling extensively (which only is obvious because everything else is so beautiful), but otherwise, this space is so stylish and well-thought-out! Very beautiful.  Such great touches like wine, candies and tea await upon your arrival. There is a guidebook and world accommodating plug charger to meet everyone’s needs. The rug and the pull out couch, however did need to be vacuumed as it contained hair and debris - it must have been an oversight, because otherwise the space was immaculate. I slept on it as a couch rather than a bed and also so I wouldn’t be so low to the floor.  The location is amazing, the space is Darling and the hosts are outstanding - highly recommended.

This is a very compact apartment. The appliances were fabulous. The bed was very comfortable. The spiral staircase down to the bedroom is tight and may be challenging for older people. The bathroom and shower was also very tight with little space. The shower was not easy to operate. Everything was spotlessly clean . Netflix was a plus
Beautiful and stylish apartment. Farah was the perfect host, great communication and super helpful. Fab location, gorgeous interior and lovely touches - totally recommend staying here!

A stylish, bohemian pied-à-terre in a quickly gentrifying neighborhood of Paris that is very convenient to public transport, restaurants and nightlife. We had a very comfortable stay that allowed us to see and live day to day Parisian life while still being able to check off all of the usual tourist destinations with ease. Farrah is a lovely host with great local suggestions and quick response to any questions you may have during your stay.

Great place in Paris with all the amenities you need! Super comfy bed and stylish apartment. Farah was a great host and made our stay seamless with simple instructions and solid communication - thank you!
Farah's place was cozy and very well decorated. It made me feel like a home away from home. Place was also located within five minutes to a metro station. Overall, highly recommended location.
Modern diamond in the rough...perfect home away from home...with all the amenities...will definitely return again...had a wonderful time.
Farah is a super friendly host, always offer her help whenever we needed. Stylish apartment, very well equipped, just few minutes walk from metro station and all other necessities

Highly recommended. Great and easy to access location, especially from 'Gare du nord'. Cosy apartment has everything you need. Farah and her husband were very helpful and friendly. Grocery stores, bakery and pharmacy all within a minute walk, Sacre coeur only a 15 min uphill walk.
Clean, secure and conveniently located near the beautiful Montmarte area! Highly recommend.
Leuk klein appartementje op paar minuten loopafstand van een metrostation. Appartement is netjes. Makkelijke communicatie met de gastvrouw.

Great location - easy to get around the whole of Paris, with the nearest metro around 4mins away. Apartment was clean, modern and the host was great at communicating and making sure we were happy and having a good time
Good place. Far from all the tourist destinations but so peaceful.
Great host and beautiful space

Farah's place was such a warm haven during our cold stay in Paris. I loved the modern yet cozy decor, and especially appreciated how there weren't a bunch of stairs we needed to climb (as per most European apartments) to get there! Farah was also the most communicative host, responding to my questions almost instantaneously. The location was also super convenient, with a supermarket and bakery just around the corner. I would highly, highly recommend staying at her place if you're considering Paris!
A wonderful place to stay. Everything was great and Farrah was an excellent host.
Lovely place!

To stay at Farah's apartment is nothing less than GREAT!! The interior is lovely and so is everything else. All the little details make her apartment extra special and all the luxury you can wish for is provided. Cosy lights, Nespresso, Netflix, candles, soft towels, a marvelous bed, a clean and beautiful kitchen and bathroom, that typical 'Paris vibe' ... you can have it all at Farah's place.
The subway is just a quarter of a mile away, so traveling from the apartment to, let's say The Louvre, takes you like maybe 20 minutes. And the Sacre Coeur is only a 10 minute walk away.
Farah is very reliable and willing to help you out anytime. Ask her a question via Email and she'll respond within a few minutes.
So if you're planning a few days in Paris, you should book this apartment for sure. You won't regret it. The only thing is ... I might be in it again, because we're definitely going back there someday.
A perfectly placed apartment to explore Paris. Close to the metro with local amenities and a really helpful host. Walking distance to Sacré Cœur- and an unexpected but welcome wine on arrival.
Great stay in a location which is easily accessible by bus or metro. Would recommend to a friend!
Farah is a super host- very responsive and communicative. She is very thoughtful in her personal touches including chocolate and wine for guests.

A great place to stay during your visit to Paris. Farah was a wondering host! She responds very quickly and helps you with anything you could need. Her place was easy to find, and her instructions were very accurate. The home was clean with nice thoughtful touches. (Netflix, wine and water bottles etc) though the home is not in the heart of Paris, the location is still great because you are near grocery shops and restaurants. You’re a short Uber ride from the main attractions of Paris.

Lovely, clean apartment around 15 minute (uphill) walk to Sacre Coeur. Very easy check in. Good local amenities too. The stairs to the bedroom are very narrow & steep so not ideal if you have mobility problems but otherwise perfect for couples looking to explore Paris.
Stylish apartment, location left a little to be desired as Metro 4 wasn’t in operation for the duration of our trip. Comfortable apartment and great host overall

Farah's place was an amazing place to stay while in Paris. Location is good, close to the metro. The place itself was warm and cozy for those cold nights. My wife and I felt instantly at home here. Farrah is also an amazing and very communicative host, which makes the stay even more pleasurable.
Great place to stay in Paris! Very well decorated and everything we needed was available. Would definitely recommend this place to other airbnbers!
I would highly recommend this place - had a such a great stay.  It’s really cosy and well equipped with everything you need as well as being close to the metro and shops.
Lovely place. Great people. No complaints. I wish I could have stayed longer. In other words - good clean family fun.
The bakery around the corner was awesome!!!!
Fantastic place to stay, right close to public transport and supermarkets. Great to be welcomed by some chocolate and wine. Thank you so much

My stay at Farah's place was wonderful. She wasn't there for check-in but the instructions provided were clear enough to follow. I did get to meet her when I was leaving and she seems to be a lovely human being... The place itself is gorgeous and had everything I needed for a great stay. The neighborhood is also a big plus. The Metro station, plenty of restaurants and boulangeries are nearby. Sacre Coeur is also walking distance from the flat. I will definitely look for staying at Farah's flat again next time I come to Paris.

Really clean and stylish place to stay. 25 mins away from centre of town, one metro line. Farah has kitted the house out very well to make our stay in Paris very enjoyable - she even gives access to Netflix and a bottle of wine!
Geweldige ruimte met een fantastische host!
Very cool and nice place. Highly recommend.

This apartment is perfect in every way! I could not fault it! Great area! Farah is so easy to get hold of if you have any questions and reply’s very quick. The bed is very comfortable. Overall I could not fault this apartment and will be visiting in the near future :)

These place is great value, you get super clean stylish modern place. 2 minute walk to the 4 line metro to get you anywhere in Paris you want to  go. This place is absolutely beautiful, clean, stylish and cozy. Will definitely come back to stay at this one. The host is also amazing, she communicated with us through the whole entire process to make us feel safe a secure and gave us tips about what’s around amazing and the best service.

Me and my friend stayed at Farrah’s place for 3 nights for my 40th birthday! It was absolutely beautiful, spotlessly clean and well appointed with everything we needed. 
Check in was great and it was awesome having the photos and instructions to guide us through the process. I can’t fault the apartment. Very stylish and comfortable although I would say the spiral staircase down to the bedroom might be a little tricky for older guests or those with any injuries. 
The location wasn’t bad. More of a locals area which we really liked as there were not too many tourists in that area. It was a bit of a walk to get to the main sites but if you are not in a rush it’s fine. 
All in all we had a very enjoyable stay and would recommend Farrahs place to anyone visiting Paris :)

Key/front door is dangerous- difficult to exit the facility. If a guest couldn’t find the key and needed to evacuate the building during emergency, they wouldn’t be able to. You should get a lock that is more user friendly and less decorative. Severe safety issue. Also, no traditional pillows was less than expected. All we had was decor pillows on the bed. No covers/pillow cases .

My boyfriend and I had such a lovely time staying at Farah’s. Clean and tidy with lovely furniture. Downstairs bedroom was amazing! A short walk to the tube station with shops nearby. We would definitely stay here again if we came back to Paris!

Farahs apartment exceeded so many of our expectations. Check in was a pleasure as we were given the opportunity to drop our bags to the apartment earlier due to our travel times. The proximity to the metro station makes visiting the sites a breeze but also, the modern, cosy feel of the apartment is evident as soon as you set foot in the door and is something you'll be excited to return home to. The apartment was just as much a part of our experience as the culture. There is no doubt in my mind that when I return to Paris I will stay at this airbnb again.

The place is beautiful, fully refurbished, very convenient. Washing machine on the spot, which is great for travellers like us! Farah was awesome, very accomodating and extremely nice. Thank you for the little bottle of vino, much appreciated!

Wunderschöne kleine Wohnung, sehr schick eingerichtet. Haben uns sofort wie zuhause gefühlt!
Farah war auch super nett!
Die nächste U-bahn ist auch gleich um die Ecke.

Sehr zu empfehlen
It was a great apartment with a modern touch, and Farah was very friendly and kind. We really enjoyed our stay!

Farah’s home exceeded my expectations! She’s a wonderful host, very accommodating and kind. The house was very well equipped With Netflix, LED mirror, coffee machine and more! Would recommend to anyone visiting Paris.

Everything was perfect!  The flat is really nice. Well equipped and a cosy flair. Lots of details that make the stay even more enjoyable. Good location- only 3 minutes to the train station, 15 Minutes Walk to sacre coeur,  boulangerie and supermarket just around the corner. We had a wonderful time! Thanks Farah
Great stylish space with a lot of personal touches. Easy to get to, located less than a five minute walk from the 4 line!

It is very modern apartment with tasteful furniture and appliance , everything you needs it has , very close to metro , and vibrant neibourhood . The best value for money and the owner really put their love to the service
great apartment and location! loved the decor and special touches throughout. really enjoyed our stay here!
Nuestra estancia en casa de Farah fue genial, un sitio súper acogedor y cómodo. El metro estaba a un paso. Volveríamos sin ninguna duda. Gracias Farah.
Would highly recommend, only 2 mins from the Metro, local supermarket, vey modern, stylish, clean and had lovely touches. Including the cray SMEG kettle, which we found hilarious :).

Farah's is an ideal place to stay for us who carried heavy luggages. It is close to the metro station Simplon and you can easily find it by the side of a quite street. It is well decorated with not only good taste but also all amenities needed. We were quite late for check-out whereas she was approachable and considerate. By all means highly recommended!
Farah was lovely the apartment was very very clean, comfortable warm and cosy. Would defo come back when next in Paris.

Amazing place to stay! It was very easy to get around paris from the apartment. It was a lovely and stylish flat thats good for a couple! We always got quick responses from Farah which was extremely helpful!

Stylish, well-stocked with nice touches such as an espresso machine, modern decor, squeaky clean and very close to the 4 metro line. Farah was extremely responsive and attentive, and kindly accommodated us when we had to move our checkout a bit earlier. No complaints at all, would stay here again!
Very beautiful place to stay in Paris. So nice people. Also welcome gifts. Everythnig was perfect. Thank you for beaufitul stay in Paris

the apartment is definitely worth the price. with this price,this is the best u can find. to be noticed, the bedroom is in the basement so the air is not so fresh. But the bed is super comfortable. Anyway it's really worth the money. Highly recommend
Great place ! Nice people.
Apartamento precioso limpio e impecable. La amabilidad de los propietarios tambien. Todo muy facil
Très décontractée, pas de chichis !
J'ai passé un séjour très dépaysant et agréable comme chez "la grand-mère" avec les objets d'époque, le jardin et les chats... Ce que j'aime bien.
Très belle maison au cœur de sevre

Si vous souhaitez vous dépayser à deux pas de Paris, je vous conseille ce logement. 
Imaginez une grande maison, à plusieurs étages, en bois et tapis de velours, avec un immense jardin et des chats, et vous serez dans la maison d'Alexandra. 
J'ai passé un très bon séjour, très relaxant et dépaysant. Quelle calme et beauté dans cette maison. J'ai beaucoup apprécié les échanges avec les membres de la famille et les autres Airbnb.
Je recommande totalement ce lieu.
Merci pour tout :)

Roxanne

Lieu atypique et sympa à découvrir...
Bon accueil et logement bien situé.
A recommander...!!!
L'emplacement est parfait, pas très loin du centre et facile à atteindre. Confortable et chaleureuse chambre. L'hôtesse et sa famille sont très gentils.
Maison pas très propre et il aurait été bien d’avoir un peu de chauffage!
Je recommande vivement, très sympathique, aucun soucis particuliers.
A 2 min du centre très bien placer
Alexandra est très accueillante et serviable, je recommande son logement sans hésitation.
Un très bon accueil et une chambre reposante.
Correct pour le prix et l'emplacement

Accueil correct, avec des personnes gentilles et discrètes
Logement ancien
Odeur importante et désagréable laissée par des chats
Merci beaucoup ! J’ai passé très bonne séjours!
Espace bien confortable dans un environnement paisible. Je recommande
Voilà une maison avec beaucoup de charme. Accueil simple et chaleureux. Très bien.
Tres belle maison dans un quartier tres jolie et calme, tres bien conncté avec Paris. Hotes tres sympa.
La chambre se trouve dans une grande maison. C’est très calme.
Un peu vieillot mais pas mal. Ambiance spéciale
La maison est bien située et au calme. J’ai passé deux séjours d’une nuit tranquille. Merci Manuela
Trés bonne réactivité de l'hôte, logement ancien mais chambre rafraîchie et spacieuse.

La maison est dans un quartier agréable et proche des transports. La chambre est à peu près correcte (malgré une toile d’araignée et la tringle à rideau qui tombe) mais les personnes allergiques à la poussière, aux chats ( il y en a 3)...et au grand désordre doivent s’abstenir ! Le fait de ne pas avoir de clés est problématique car il n’est pas toujours facile de rentrer dans la maison

Bon rapport Q/P, bien situé, mais qu'il est difficile d'entrer en contact avec Alexandra avant d'arriver (même plusieurs semaines avant, comme c'était mon cas). Je reviendrai volontiers si je dois me rendre à Sèvres!
Séjour bref. Dommage pour moi car très agréable et bien placé pour rejoindre Paris Montparnasse. Doit être super si vous y passez plusieurs jours

L'accueil a été un peu confus mais j'ai très bien dormi dans le calme  
Rapport qualité/prix correct
Chambre spacieuse et très calme décoration atypique un vrai plaisir je reviendrai
Étonnante maison proche de Paris!

logement bien situé, arrangeant pour les horaires, 
merci
Bon rapport qualité prix. Hôte agreable. Super emplacement pour visiter Paris et le château de Versailles.
Parfait, se soucis de notre confort et cest très agréable
Madame Alexandra est gentille et flexible, et sa maison est mignonne.
Famille très conviviale et sympathique, j’aurai plaisir à revenir.
Lieu charmant avec du cachet, une histoire, très agréable, très recommandable
Parfait. Tout s’est très bien passé.
Bonne adresse à Sèvres ! Une chambre agréable dans une maison conviviale.
Parfait, lit très confortable, super calme...
hôte accueillante, quartier calme, je recommande

Superbe logement, situé dans un quartier calme. 

Pas mal d'autres résidents dans cette grande maison mais tous calmes et respectueux. 

J'espère repasser vous voir très vite !
Très bien. Juste le signal et débit WiFi qui était faible, mais une extension wifi est sur place. Manque de chance elle n'était pas opérationnelle a ce moment là. Sinon pas de problème particulier.

Une famille adorable, la maison est très propre, l'organisation est irréprochable.
Merci pour cet accueil chaleureux.
Chambre très spacieuse dans un cadre suranné avec parquet et tapis. Hôtesse très réactive. Appréciable, la bouilloire avec les sachets de thé.
Il est dommage que le logement ne soit pas suffisamment propre et que les deux jeunes garçons présents n'aient que faire de l'"invité"...
Un lieu bohème, Alexandra artiste peintre prend le temps de vous accueillir
bon séjour
le séjour en vaut le détour, des lieux comme celui là n'existent plus ...  les hôtes sont accueillants mais pas forcement très chaleureux..
chambre telle que décrite dans vieille maison charmante
Bon séjour, vielle déco mais chambre très pratique et bien pensé. gros + pour la salle de bain grande et hyper fonctionnel. merci pour ce court séjour
La maison d'Alexandra est chaleureuse et bien située. Alexandra est très acceuillante et réactive. Je recommande !

Ayant fait le 20km de paris avec un ami, Alexandra a eu la gentillesse de nous laisser prendre une douche même après l’heure de départ habituel. La chambre et les sanitaires étaient très propres. Séjour court mais agréable ! Je recommande

Hote pas présent, renvoi vers les enfants non au courant ou pas disponibles, crottes de chien sur les tapis de la chambre, odeur de renfermé , chaussures partout dans l'entrée mélées avec un emballage de serviette hygiénique

Séjour de 2 semaines très très bien passé chez Alexandra. Un grand merci à ses enfants - Marcelo, Phillippe et Roxanne - qui m'ont accueilli assez chaleureusement. La maison est atypique et stylée. La chambre était grande, et j'ai pu travailler tranquillement,  j'avais le sentiment d'être chez moi! Maison bien placée par rapport aux arrêts-bus, tram et transilien N. Hôtes très chaleureux et  réactifs :) je recommande

Accueil atypique, déroutant, mais très correct avec le recul.
La chambre est correcte, avec quelques doutes ou craintes sur l'intimité, mais rien d'autres que des craintes au final
Accueil chaleureux, maison atypique en centre ville
Séjour agréable. Hôtes sympathiques est serviables

Hôte très accueillante
Maison facile à trouver
Maison atypique qui peut avoir son charme pour certain. Moi ça,  n'a pas été mon cas. Et nuit bruyante
Très bien
Très bien
Une auberge espagnole sympa !
Emplacement idéal pour ce séjour à Sévres.

Un accueil authentique et chaleureux, très agréable. Alejandra est attentionnée et sait recevoir ses hôtes avec discrétion et attentions.  La chambre est vaste et confortable, avec vue sur le soleil levant. 
Une maison exceptionnelle et dans un lieu privilégié, entourée d'un jardin au grand calme et si près de Paris !
Une adresse inoubliable !
C'était notre première expérience en chambre chez l'habitant, nous avons bcp apprécier de passer une fin de soirée à discuter avec nos hôtes et leurs amis.

Accueil correct. Par contre pas de clé fournie ce qui rend dependant de la présence des propriétaires. Maison grande mal entretenue mais espace chambre correct et propre. Draps et serviettes fournies.  Wifi ne marche pas. Pas de consideration pour le locataire qui veut se reposer et se sentir chez lui. Des invités de la famille d'accueil sont restés tard dans la nuit et ont fait autant de bruit que si nous n'étions pas là. En bref pas du tout pro et pas adapté pour un loyer de quarante euros la nuit. Une farce
Prix correct par rapport qualité, la famille est gentil et tres disponible.
Conforme  la description

Grandeur et décadence d'une belle maison. 
Vous trouverez ici un gîte près de la gare, pensez à votre smartphone pour vous faire ouvrir la porte car vous n'aurez pas de clé.
Si vous arrivez lorsque la cuve contient du fuel vous aurez le chauffage central et l'eau chaude pour la douche.
Maison agréable. J'ai pu avoir tout le confort qu'il me fallait. Pierre était très attentionné et les enfants d'Alexandra très gentils. Maison bien placée.

Incroyable ou surprenante maison !
J'ai adoré !
Merci à Alexandra
Accueil agréable. C etait un plaisir d entendre l accent d Uruguay!
Maison bien placée, au calme, bonne coordination avec les propriétaires mais maison peu entretenue
Maison froide et mal tenue
Très bon accueil.
Très bien

Maison magnifique malheureusement peu entretenue.
Aucune autonomie possible car pas de clés pour rentrér et sortir 
Hôtes très sympas 
Mais il manque quelques règles pour accueillir correctement

Je ne me suis pas senti très attendu, mais Alexandra et son mari sont des personnes gentilles.
Grande chambre propre au look vieillau.
Commodités propres

Chambre conforme et confortable
Manque une clef pratique pour les allées et venues de chacun
Accueil sympathique d'Alexandra et Pierre, la chambre a du charme, elle est spacieuse et calme.
Alexandra et son mari ont été très agréable.
Nous avons été très bien reçu. Le logement correspond tout à fait à l'annonce et je recommande cette adresse :-) Merci encore à peut-être à une prochaine fois :-)

J'ai passé trois jours dans cette maison. C'est une très belle maison ancienne avec du charme. Alexandra était très disponible pour me renseigner sur tout pour rendre le séjour agréable. Seul petit bémol : un micro-onde un peu capricieux...

La famille est accueillante et sympathique, mais je pense que ce logement n'est pas très adapté à une location. En effet, nous avons eu l'impression de les déranger, de rentrer dans leur intimité familiale et de ne pas pouvoir profiter du calme dont nous avions besoin, alors que nous étions dans une situation particulière (passage d'oraux).
En revanche, la maison est particulièrement bien située, à 5 minutes du train et une dizaine de minutes du centre de Sèvres et de ses commerces. De plus, le jardin est agréable.
Accueil très sympa dans maison atypique. Quelques petits problème avec la salle d'eau qui ont été résolus par mes hôtes toutes affaires cessantes...

Séjour en toute tranquillité. Alexandra est agréable.
Le logement est proche de la gare de SEVRES Rive Gauche (quelques minutes à pieds), et proche du centre ville (10-15 min à pieds).

Très bon accueil, chambre au calme à deux pas de Paris.
Commerces, métro et train à proximité. 
Pour ceux qui aime les chats, vous serez ravis.

A melhor parte, sem dúvidas, é a hospitalidade da Alexandra e sua família. Todos super receptivos, tranquilos e sorridentes. A Alexandra me deu MUITAS dicas em relação aos locais turísticos e meios de transporte. Isto fez bastante diferença na minha viagem e agradeço a ela por toda atenção.
Pontos negativos: o wi-fi não funciona no quarto; a cozinha, as vezes, fica fechada (acho que quando ninguém da família está em casa); para quem quer passear também de noite, após as 22:00, o local é distante das atrações noturnas, não serve.

La meilleure partie, sans aucun doute, est l'hospitalité d'Alexandra et de sa famille. Tous super réceptifs, calmes et souriants. Alexandra m'a donné BEAUCOUP de conseils concernant les lieux touristiques et les moyens de transport. Cela a fait une grande différence lors de mon voyage et je la remercie de toute l'attention.
Points négatifs: le wi-fi ne fonctionne pas dans la chambre; la cuisine est parfois fermée (je pense quand personne dans la famille n'est à la maison); pour ceux qui veulent flâner le soir, après 22h00, l'endroit est loin des attractions nocturnes, il ne rentre pas.
Correct. Calme proche de la station SNCF. Bon rapport qualit
Beau cadre, bonne ambiance un logement qui peut devenir une perle rare sur le site sauf s’il ne l’est pas déjà

Situation géographique optimale pour une formation au CIEP, à peine 5min à pied. Cependant je n'ai pas eu la chambre que j'avais réservée(mais une plus petite) , il y a des chats (qui miaulent la nuit) alors que ce n'est pas spécifié dans l'annonce(dommage pour les allergiques comme moi!) la salle de bain n'était pas très propre (cheveux/poils dans la douche) le comble a été la douche à l'eau froide et pas de chauffage pendant 24h car plus de fuel, pas de chance! Alexandra plutôt réactive dans les réponses et on apprécie la bouilloire et les sachets de thé dans la chambre.

le séjour chez Alexandra était vraiment agréable, la maison se trouve dans un quartier calme, pas loin de CIEP , ce qui était important pour moi. en plus, il y a des magasins et des cafés pas loin. la chambre est assez grande et confortable. Alexandra était très accueillante , elle a proposé son aide pour trouver le chemin. Si je viens à Sèvres encore une fois, je voudrais bien me loger chez elle.
maison très calme

La maison d'Alexandra est calme et tranquille. Elle est très bien desservie par le tram (T2), la ligne sncf (Gare Montparnasse) et des bus.
Alexandra et sa famille sont naturellement gentilles et disponibles.
Elle fait la conversation, mais ne pose aucune question déplacée. Juste curieuse de connaître un peu son hôte.
La chambre est spacieuse et lumineuse.
La salle de bain comprend au choix une douche  spacieuse et une grande baignoire.
La maison et la chambre sont bien chauffées (il neigeait pendant mon séjour chez elle - Salon du Livre de Paris 2018).
A toutes celles et tous ceux qui aiment le calme et la tranquillité, je recommande vivement de séjourner chez Alexandra.
J'ai hâte d'y retourner, ce que j'essaierai de faire lors de mon prochain voyage à Paris.
M'Bitako
Personnes très compréhensives , j'avais un timing à respecter et une heure de retour très vague mais ils ont été la pour m'ouvrir la porte meme a 3 h du matin !
The places is more then ok. Its perfect for holidays. The distance to the Eiffel Tower is 8 km.

Alexandra's place is beautiful and in the heart of Sevrès. For a reasonable price, you have access to a beautifully decorated room and hot drinks. The only downside was that we weren't aware that there were cats in the building beforehand, so for anyone staying who is allergic to cats, I wouldn't recommend staying here. However, for everyone else, I would highly recommend this Airbnb!
Very Good !
Rapid communications, very helpful.

Wir hatten ein paar schöne Tage in Paris. Von der Unterkunft aus hatten wir trotz der Entfernung gute Anbindungen in die Innenstadt von Paris. Das Haus lag ruhig und schön gelegen mit einem tollen Garten. Das Haus an sich war alt und authentisch mit einem einzigartigen Flair. Hier wohnt eine ganze Familie samt Katzen und einem Hund und es werden mittendrin zwei Zimmer vermietet. Daher kommt man in einen laufenden Alltag von mehreren Personen, es ist daher hin und wieder etwas laut vor der Zimmertür. Das Haus ist voller Dinge, die rumstehen, es ist der Charme der Familie kann aber auch sehr unordentlich wirken. Im Zimmer selbst sind, wie im ganzen Haus viele alte Teppiche, die schon etwas den Geruch von alten Dingen und den dort lebenden Tieren angenommen haben. Da man die alten Fenster nicht öffnen kann, ist es schwer zu lüften, die Luft ist trocken und etwas stickig. Im Bad das selbe, hier ist es etwas feucht und muffig.
Das Haus ist also nichts für Allergiker oder penibel Menschen. Wer nicht so anspruchsvoll ist, für den ist das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis okay.
Great hospitality, beautiful quiet location.
Value for money was great. The house apart from the room was messy though.
We had a short, but pleasant stay, thank you!

The house is situated a bit far away from the centre of Paris, but for the people who are coming to Paris for work which you can reach with Tram T2 is fine. 
I have never had an experience with booking a room through airbnb and finding the appartment in such situation. They should take care much more about cleaning service, working wifi, towels without spots, fixing a door from the shower, waste sorting and giving to the host keys also for the room. 
I would not come back for sure.

Alexandra's place has everything you will need, but don't expect five star experience. It's a big house, which is a bit like a hostel. The price is very good though and connection to Paris is fantastic. House is located 5 minuts from the train station, with trains going to Paris every 15 minuts and take around 15 minutes as well.

Alexandra é uma pessoa agradável e a sua familia também. Ela deu conselhos para aproveitar a visita no Paris. A casa está localizada num bairro tranquilo e a estação do trêm fica perto. O quarto é grande e confortável. No entando, o tchão e a casa são de madeira, então faz muito barulho a noite dificultando dormir.  Além, a cozinha permanecía com louça suja na pia o tempo tudo.

Muy buena la atención y amabilidad por parte de Alexandra. La ubicación es un poco alejada del centro de la ciudad pero se llega sin problemas con el transporte público. Sin dudas volvería a quedarme en su casa.
Location was good and reachable from bus and train station. Over all stay was good.

If you like indifferent hosts and small aggressive noisy dogs this is the place for you. I want to blame my lack of French and the hosts lack of English for my review but there was more to it than that.

La habitación amplia y agradable , al igual que los baños y otros espacios de la casa, se encuentra en un lugar muy bonito , relativamente cerca de París , pero se depende mucho del transporte (TREN) y sus horarios de funcionamiento. Una noche con las ganas de ver la torre cuando oscureciera llegamos a la estación a las 12 :05 de la noche y nos tocó quedarnos en París porque el tren ya no funcionaba mas y el siguiente salía a las 5:30 a.m. 
Por lo demás es un buen lugar

Pros: • Quiet area - gets a little loud in the morning with traffic, but there’s a double set of windows that block all the sound when closed. • Charming area- lots of beautiful little streets to walk around. • Decent sized room with sitting chairs and beautiful window + view of the garden. • Beautiful (albeit a bit overgrown) private garden that you can lounge in the sun in. • Not very expensive. • There is a little grocery store for basic amenities about a 7 minute walk away. • I think there are some restaurants close by, but I never looked into it. Cons: • Location- it’s a little out of the way. 8min walk to the train station, then 20 min train ride downtown. Not too big of a problem- to get anywhere in Paris is about 20/30 min- but! If you’re out late at night, the trains stop running and you’ll have to get a €15-30 uber, which gets a little old. • Pretty strong language barrier with main contact- if you don’t speak French or Spanish, it’ll be a little tricky trying to communicate. She does have a husband and sons that speak a bit more English, but not much. • The house is old with all sorts of beautiful antiques and other eclectic knickknacks around which is fun to be immersed in- definitely has a lot of character, but it is a bit on the cluttered/dusty side of things. • they have cats and a dog- heads up if you’re allergic. They’re all sweet and non intrusive, but the little dog gets a bit yappy now and then in the morning & night. • also heads up, not really a con, just an FYI, the bathroom is shared. The toilet is in a separate room from the shower/sink area. No obvious hair dryer available, but I never asked. They provided a towel. • Biggest con is the main door to the house has an issue with the lock to where it can’t be unlocked from the outside, only the inside. So if you get home late, you have to text/call one of the sons to have them let you in. Not always very responsive- I had to wait outside about 15 min one time at 3am, having to yell a bit and knock loudly (I felt bad for having to wake someone up that late, but they assured me prior that I could stay out that late and it wouldn’t be a problem). Overall: I would say it’s a great little nook to stay in if location isn’t an issue and you don’t plan to stay out late. The room and area are quite charming, quiet and calm which is a nice break from the bustle of the city. It would just be nice if communication and ease of coming/going were improved a bit. Also, despite the language barrier, the host and her sons were all very friendly and eager to help where they...

Staying at Jordane's property was Staying at Jordane's place was an absolute pleasure. 
The appartment has everything we needed.
The location seemed good when we booked but when we actually got there we realized it was an amazing point for going anywhere in the city.
It is at very short distance to several metro stations but also at short walking distance to all the important places in the Marais and the Île de la Cité.

Jordane's apartment, which conveniently sits at the edge of the Marais, République, and Oberkampf, met all of my expectations: it was clean with a full-sized bed, kitchen, bathroom, and living area. It made for a good home-base from which to explore Paris. Somewhat surprising, though, was the apartment's rather strong dog odor, which required some adjustment. (It was sort of that pet-store smell, masked in cleaning products.) Nevertheless, Jordane was extremely responsive and made herself available to answer any questions at all times. I would thus recommend Jordane's apartment; but, were I to return to Paris, I would likely try another AirBnB location.

Appartement sympa et plutôt calme. À 10mn à pied du rer D, et environ 45 mn du centre. Sa famille est agréable et serviable.

J'ai eu un très bonne expérience !!!
C'est la famille très gentil, accueillante et serviable!! RER est juste à côté et vous êtes vite dans le centre. Très bon rapport qualité prix. N'hésitez pas à réserver chez Christian!! À recommander absolument !!!
Lieu propre, couple accueillant. Pleins touches d'attention.

Très bien pour moi quand je fais du déplacement , je ne manquerais pas d'y retourner quand je serais dans le coin

Excellent hôte. Christian s'est montré convivial, chaleureux et on a bien communiqué.
RAS !!! Merci pour cette chambre et ce bon accueil. A bientôt !!!

Accueil très sympathique, propre, confortable...

Fortement recommandé!!

J'ai été super bien accueilli, je recommande donc fortement :)
Bon accueil, emplacement facile d'accès, et la possibilité d'être mis en contact avec un des gendre de Christian étant chauffeur pour aller à l'aéroport est tout simplement parfaite!

la chambre est très bien

Personne attentive. Je recommande
Malgré l'heure d'arrivée tardive, Christian et sa femme m'ont bien accueilli. Disponibles et attentionnés ils ont fait tout leur possible pour que mon (court) séjour se déroule au mieux.
Parking dans la résidence, hôte très sympathique

Chambre très propre, hôtes à votre écoute et avec qui vous pouvez discuter. 
Place de parking dans l'enceinte de la résidence.

C'est ma première fois que je dors chez des inconnus, sincèrement j'ai senti que je suis chez moi, une famille très sympa et très accueillante. Je recommande vivement cette famille. Merci beaucoup pour votre accueil.

Super accueil, arrivé un peu tard, Christian et De charmante femme on été super gentil.

logement à 10 minutes à pieds de la gare, propre et calme

Logement impeccable et suffisant pour un voyageur solo. Accueil très sympathique et chaleureux. Je me suis sentie à l'aise rapidement. Christian et Stella sont adorables et très serviables.
Proche transport RER, proche de Paris.
Restauration et commodités à proximité.
Quartier calme pour un bon sommeil.
Très bon rapport qualité-prix.
Je recommande à 200%
c'était bien passé, je vous le recommande vivement

J'ai été hébergé chez Christian pendant 9 jours. L'appartement est très propre et la chambre est vraiment très calme et comfortable. Les hosts sont toujours là pour vous répondre à vos besoins. Ils sont très sympathiques.  J'ai beaucoup apprécié le petit déjeuner tous les matins qui est offer.
Je recommande fortement ce logement. 
Bien cordialement
Super accueil de la part de christian et de sa femme.Sourire,convivialité étaient au rdv.Je recommande
Un lieu très propre et une excellente réactivité des hôtes. Ils m'ont même donné des infos pour me déplacer dans la ville.
Super accueil. Pratique et confortable. Je vous le recommande

Mon séjour avec Christian était très bon. Chez lui est propre et est proche du train (RER D) donc c'est facile de voyager à Paris. Christian et sa femme sont personnes très agréable et accueillant.  L'endroit est exactement comme annoncé.

Bon accueil et réactivité de l'hôte. L'appartement est propre avec le confort nécessaire, chambre aménagée dune tv. Ambiance vivante et agréable avec les enfants. Christian ma aide a monter les étages avec ma valise, merci encore! L appartement est assez éxentre par rapport ae l'aéroport charles de Gaulle et en tous cas les moyens de transport sont plus compliqués que cela ne le laissait supposer. Du coup en prenant un Uber jai payé dans les 20 euros, sinon le taxi de l'hôte cest le double.

Une chambre très propre que je recommande.
Christian est une personne gentille et très cool.
Merci pour l’accueil. Logement super. Bon rapport qualité prix

Chambre confortable dans un immeuble calme.  Bien que Pierrefitte soit un peu éloignée du centre de Paris, la gare est facilement rejoignable à pied.  Les hôtes sont disponibles à toute question.  Parfait pour de courts séjours.

Super accueil, malgré mon arrivé très en tard. Christian et sa femme sont super gentils.
La chambre est bien rangée et propre. Appartement situé à proximité d'une gare (15 min à pied) où vous avez accès à tous les principaux sites parisiens.
Je recommande vivement.

La place de Christian était très bonne. C’était ce dont j'avais besoin: je suis arrivé facilement dans le train et j’ai été accueilli. Merci beaucoup Christian et sa famille.

Cristian's space is very good. It was what I needed. I got there easily by train and I've been welcomed. Thank you so much Christian and family

Accueil chaleureux, esprit familiale , un calme parfait , toute les commodités de transport juste à côté, je manquerais pas de séjourner prochainement 
Merci
Parfait
Agreable séjour chez christian
Christian et sa famille sont très accueillants et sympathiques, et l'appartement est très propre, ma seule nuit était très confortable. Encore merci pour votre acceuil!

Tout est génial dans la place de Christian. Il est proche de Paris; le transport public est pratique; C'est un endroit très propre et le prix est excellent. Bien sûr, je recommande la place de ce chrétien. Avant d'arriver, appelez l'hôte pour obtenir une direction détaillée. Cette famille était un hôte gentil / attentionné / amical: ils sont très gentils et attentionnés. J'ai même observé qu'ils s'inquiétaient d'une jeune fille qui (avait été perdue et) est revenue à leur domicile à 3 heures du matin; où elle avait une chambre pour trois nuits.
Une famille très chaleureuse et des très bonnes conditions. Je recommande vivement!
Si vous cherchez, en plus d'un logement propre et confortable, de véritables moments de partage avec les habitants du lieu, vous pouvez ,à mon sens, réserver sans attendre !
J'ai passé un très bon séjour chez Christian ! Il et sa femme étaient très gentils. L'appartement est proche de l'aéroport aussi. Je le recommande aux autres voyageurs.
Clean room, everything you need is beside you

I stayed at Christian's place for 3 days since my arrival in France. I had some issues at the airport and the time for check-in became a few hours later than I had told him, but he was so kind that he told me how to arrive at his place at night and which line I should take. He and his wife were also friendly to give me some advice in Paris. Moreover the room I stayed at was well organised and clean. I loved it. Thank you.
Personas muy amables, el cuarto estaba muy limpio.
Very comfortable space, extremely clean apartment, kind, serene, flexible and generous hosts, and adorable kitten!!!

In this cosy room, I felt most welcome. Because I love to cook, I was delighted to have access to their kitchen among other facilities. Christian and his wife responded quickly to my needs and my privacy was never infringed upon. I would recommend a stay here. (I spent some time in the apartment while I finalized accommodation arrangements in Paris.)
Local bom para estadia de quem quer passear durante o dia para quem gosta da noite não recomendo.
Great place for a good night sleep and you need to be closer to CDG for a flight. Super welcoming family. Plus, they've a cool cat that would wanna play with you if you're cool enough
Christian's place is about 10-12mins from the RER (their train). Good for a few night's stay. They let me check out a little later as well, which is well appreciated!
It's a clean, quiet and peaceful apartment. You will surely love it there and also recommend it to others.

The place is ok if you have time to spare and really just need a place to sleep. It is an hour from the airport, made longer by train delays and railway work. 
The host was gracious, but they were strict on the 11am checkout time.  I did not spend the night there,  and after spending almost 2 hrs on the train (I notified them of the delays) I came back around 11:40 to find both bathroom and toilet locked. Had to travel back to town with a full bladder. It is a good listing, just a little out  the way

I think I made a good choice it was pretty affordable  however it is not in the city of Paris, obviously; and most of the things Im doing while I’m here are in the city. I only stayed a few hours but for the time I was there I was allowed space and privacy which I appreciated. The space was neat and clean and I was able to at least take a shower and get a good nap before heading out again. The bus is within walking distance and the train is close by as well. I would recommend anyone with a smaller budget to stay here it was nice

What you see is what you get. Comunication with Christian was OK even if I do not speak French. He even warned me about traffic. Right after arrival I received keys along with instructions how to use it. Short introduction to the flat followed. I did not encounter any problem.
Just 3 stations away from Gare Du Nord.Highly recommended.
Nice and clean room.
Clean and great value for money.
Super easy stop from the airport, you definitely get your money's worth and the family is very kind!
Neat & tidy room near CDG airport with lovely, helpful couple. Would definitely recommend.
Thank you so much!
nice and clean place but difficult to find at night. it will also be a bit difficult to communicate if you can't speak French.

It took me 15 minutes to go to Christian’s home from the train. The neighborhood is very eclectic with people wearing many different ethnic types of clothing. When I got there, I texted Christian and he let me in. He showed me how to get out with pushing buttons to open the gate and front door. I communicated with Stella, his wife with my translation ap. She helped me with setting up my train trip to CDG airport in the morning. I got pizza for dinner at a nearby restaurant. The shower was nice and warm with plenty of water. The bed was comfortable the room and bathroom were clean.
I love this guy
Easy access around Paris, great coming from the airport. Nice hosts. Perfect for what I needed.

Great place, nice hosts
Costs about 10€ to make it to cdg.
el lugar lindo y las personas amables, volvería nuevamente
Great hosts and very welcoming. Really go out of their way even if you don’t speak English!
Very nice host and comfortable room
Mejorar comunicación.
Good place for single budget traveler

The room is very clean

They were nice and kind to me. 
It’s not very convenient area, and you should be careful at night. But the room was nice. 
Thank you
El lugar es fabuloso. Súper recomendado.
We were lost as this was our first time to the area. Christian actually watched the road for us to find us. So grateful!
Christian's place was comfortable and matched the listing perfectly! Communication was great and the hosts were friendly, welcoming and helpful :) thankyou!
Nice experience to stay at Christian's place, his family was a good host.
Christian and Stella were wonderful hosts. They welcomed us into their home like friends and even taught us the key to picking out a good bottle of wine. Merci!
I had issues with the train but Christian was very helpful and stayed up to check me in even though I arrived very late

My host was incredibly kind. The space was very clean, however, I could have received more check-in instructions. Some random children helped me into the apartment building, which required a fob key.  I was left not knowing which unit number to go to... the address provided was incomplete.    It's unit #3.
Great place to stay

Christian is great host. Flat is not far from the metro station with beautiful view on Eiffel Tower. Room has comfort  bed and everything you need inside. I definitely recommend  this place. Merci bouque!
Nice room with all services also a nice view to Paris

파리 시내에서 약 삼십 분 정도 걸린다. 호스트 분들과 번역기를 돌려서 대화했는데 친절하신 분들인 것 같았다.
시설도 깨끗하고 괜찮았다.
great place they are a very friendly nice location and safe
Good to stay for a night. May be noisy sometime. No table in the room and no table in the kitchen.
I’d recommend Christian for anyone travelling to Paris. The family was very supportive and polite. I’m sure I’ll go back again

Excelente lugar para llegar a descansar, limpio, sencillo y agradable. Ubicado en tercer piso, sin ascensor.
Con muy buena atención  a pesar de la barrera del idioma. Ellos mismos te apoyan consiguiendo un taxi para traslado al aeropuerto o en la ciudad. 
Volvería sin dudarlo.
Christian is a very good host, and very helpful. He was going to the metro station to help me get to his place. I recommend!
Чисто, удобное расположение возле транспорта

It’s a good price to you if you wanna save money. The accommodation provides basic facilities for living. The bed is comfortable. I recommend you can take 268 for 1 stop when you go out train station. Otherwise you need to walk 5 minuets with your luggage to arrive there.

Christian is a really calm person. The room is tidy and clean. Apartment located near a station (15 min on foot) where you have access to all main spots in Paris. I stayed just 2 nights and it was perfect to visit the city.
Great host. He's willing to make your stay a pleasant one. He lives in a gated community. Make sure you go in the open gate with a guard shack.
I stayed here before catching a flight out of CDG the next morning. Was perfect for what I needed!
its a walking distance to subway & tram. I arrived late night from the airport and Christian still accomodate me. thank you so much
i can recommend
파리 북쪽이 위험하다고 들었는데 실제로 가보니 안전하지 못하다는 느낌때문에 오가는 내내 불안했다. 공항과 가깝고 호스트는 너무 친절했지만 다시 이곳에서 머물지는 못할 것이다.

Christian understands what it means to host. They welcome you like long lost friends or family they haven’t seen in a while. Everything is clean and quiet. Although I didn’t speak any French they tried their best to communicate and help me throughout my stay. Amazing host even getting up early to take me to the train station!! ❤️ I would recommend anyone to stay there.
Christian さんはとても優しく良心的で､私の要望にたくさん答えてくれましくれました｡英語でのｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝは出来ず少しとまどいました戸惑いましたが翻訳ｱﾌﾟﾘをつかつを使って会話したり､とてもたのしとても楽しい時間を過ごせました｡交通面が少し不便でよる特に夜の駅周辺はこわい印象を受けました｡しかしそれ以上のおもてなしと部屋はとても綺麗だったのだったので満足です!
Awesome family!!! Super friendly!! Everything was perfect!! I would stay there again in a blink of an eye!!
Great place for a one night stay whole travelling!
Inmejorable calidad- precio. Un amor de familia, atentos con todo.

It was a really great home forever it even can’t feel like ur not at ur won house u just feel very comfortable and they always be very patient and heart to treat u .
這是一間超好的地方 你根本不能想像他們就像家人一樣對待你 妳會感覺非常的舒適 他們熱情的招待 甚至讓我忘記我身在異鄉 謝謝妳們的招待 謝謝 
Best regards

Christian is a good host, he makes you feel welcome to your home, his family is very nice. The house is 10min walk to public transportation, or he can ask you for a taxi to take you to the airport.
I reccomended!
He ans and his wife are great people
Very last minute reservation after I missed a flight, Christian was very kind to accommodate me. He and his wife were very helpful. The room was clean, comfy bed.

Christian and his wife were both great. Although we don’t speak the same language, we could communicate via translating apps and everything worked out. His place is very close to the station and therefore very close to Paris as well.
Christian is a truly amazing host. He really goes out of his way to make help you as his guest and is very thoughtful and helpful with everything!

This is definitely a great value for the location. Super close to the trains and bus, as well as local shops and places to eat. Christian was great at communicating and was very flexible about check in due to my late flight. Language barrier was no problem whatsoever
it's a nice place to stay.. although a bit far from main city.
To far from downtown Paris. Bath carpert so dirty and to messy. No doorlock at the room, that is make me unsecured.

Nice place to stay. Everything was clean. A 12 min walk to get to the train station and on the train it doesn't take too long to get to Paris from there. The area was nice and quiet. I have no complaints!
I had a wonderful nights rest at Christians place. Wonderful view of Paris and very relaxing after a long flight
Hospitable host, great place close to airport.
el alojamiento muy regular.

Christian y su esposa son excelentes anfitriones. El apartamento esta situado en las afueras de paris pero esta cerca de la estacion del rer y de los buses. El RER D nos lleva hasta Gare du Nord o Chatelet-les-halles en el centro de Paris muy rapido. Gare du nord esta a solo 3 paradas de Pierrefit. Hay muchos comercios cerca que venden productos mucho mas baratos que en Paris. Christian y su esposa son muy atentos, en mi caso me acompaño a comprar una linea para mi cell. en todo momento estuvo a mi dispocision. Fueron muy atentos y amables. Espero poder volver pronto.
Perfect for one night stay in Paris.  Kind en warm hearted people.

Christian and Stella were very accommodating although communication was a challenge (I don't speak French and they don't speak English or Spanish). Christian offered to drive me (30euros) to Paris and even made sure we drove by some of the famous sites and stopped for a minute to take my picture in front of the Eiffel Tower. They are very nice and clean and the room was accurately described. The only issue I had was when I wanted to use the sink to wash/brush teeth, there was laundry soaking in it. Very good value for money, near the CDG. Thank you, Stella and Christian.

The home was very well decorated and clean. The room was comfortable and cozy with a nice view outside of the window. The hosts were very helpful despite the language barrier and even gave recommendations of places to visit. The place was only a short distance from all of Paris’s best attractions. Overall, I had a great stay.

You will feel home at Christian's place , he and his wife will greet you show you the house and lead you to the room , it's was very clean and has a tv the bed is super comfortable the neighborhood is very quiet and there are many stores on your way in and out, this place is highly recommended
Amazing. Christian is very kind and thoughtful. The room is comfortable and even though is a bit far from central Paris , is still easy to go there by train (20-25 min). Overall a great host.
Все было прекрасно. Очень гостеприимный, добрый и общительный хозяин.
Nice place close to CDG airport.

Really friendly hosts, and all the facilities you need. The nearest station is a 10 minute walk away, and from there the train takes 15 minutes to Paris. Ideal location with every thing you need just a short walk away. Definitely recommend it!
Great place and great host! Would strongly recommend!

Christian and his family were wonderful and generous hosts. Even with the little French I knew, I was able to request things and have my questions answered. Great and prompt communication for when I was checking in!

Un lugar muy cómodo limpio y agradable, muy cerca de París y con estación de metro muy cerca, la hospitalidad de Christien y su esposa fueron muy amables, personas muy felices de recibir turistas, fue una experiencia única ayudaron a que le pueda proponer matrimonio a mi futura esposa. Recomedado

Me hospede aquí con dos amigos y estamos muy agradecidos con Christian y su esposa, fueron muy amables y amigables. Agradecemos todo su tiempo y su atención. El lugar estaba bonito y cómodo, recomiendo este lugar.

I stayed here with two friends and we are very grateful to Christian and his wife, they were very kind and friendly. We appreciate all your time and your politeness. The place was nice and comfortable, I recommend this place.
Excelente estancia, muy buena hospitalidad, la forma de llegar es fácil y muy buena hospitalidad. Recomendable
All was good!

Excelente hospitalidade.
Os anfitriões foram muito agradáveis, me deram muitas dicas de qual lugar visitar, o que fazer, r onde eu encontraria algo que precisasse. 
Além de terem me ajudado muito, pois Cristian me levou até uma feirinha que tem perto da casa, me explicou como funcionava (preços super baratos, super recomendo passarem por la - às terças, quintas e sábados). Além de me acompanhar até a estação de trem (que inclusive é bem perto da casa) e me ajudou a comprar os bilhetes para eu me locomover por Paris.
Eu amei a estadia na casa deles, e com certeza voltaria em outra oportunidade. Não tenho nada a reclamar. Só tenho a agradecer. Obrigado .
The host canceled this reservation 44 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice hosts, however in regards to the place you get what you pay for
Christian is very kind, he communicated with me on my arrival, he gave me information about the transport in Paris. Highly recommended
It was Good!
Everything was perfect.

Christian very kind and nice person! The room and the house were clean and very neat. Special thanks for the mini bar))
But if you a going to visit Christian's place after dark be sure that you have a map with his address and also be sure that you at least have basic knowlege in french language, because Christian don't speak english :)

Christian is a very good host. Even though my battery of phone was gone and my check in time was late, he took care of me well. His  room is cozy, clean and good smell. The bath room is shared with his family so we have to consider the available time to use it. He cannot speak English well, but we could communicate with (Hidden by Airbnb) translation, thus we didn't have problems. The only concerning point is the location. There is a direct railway to city center from the nearest station, but it took 45 min. It costed 20 pounds and took 30 or 20 min to take uber to the  Charles de Gaulle Airport. In the late night, I felt bit scared around his home because it is dark and there are several similar apartment buildings so I could not find exact his home although he guided me soon after arriving in front  of his apartment. Overall, it was good stay for me considering cost performance. I wanna recommend it to people using   Charles de Gaulle Airport before/after staying.
During my stay in Christian's house, he and his wife were very nice and took care that I was comfortable. Thank you!!!
К сожалению,опоздала на самолёт и не смогла приехать. Но хозяин был очень внимательный и отзывчивый в переписке. Уверена, у Кристиана приятно гостить
Everything was good. Would come again. Very friendly host.
The home of Christian was lovely. The room was simple with an ample big bed. What I liked most was the family atmosphere at his house. Thank you also for the coffee :)
Got there late and Christian stayed up to make sure I checked in. I appreciated the late check in and great communication!
I want Thank you Mr. Christian and your family and treated them as if I was a member of their family and they shared their food, they are really good

The place is exactly as is mentioned in the post. Christian is very helpful and sweet. Gave really good coffee in the morning. The family is really sweet. The bed is very comfortable and the room is pretty.
한국인들은가 지마세 용. 진심 :D
房子还是很不错的,就是地理位置比较偏,去市中心有点远

Very nice place in a quiet and pretty residential suburb. Very close to the metro, and the metro ride itself into the heart of Paris is very quick (20 minutes). Christian was super welcoming despite the language barrier and always offered refreshments (water, coffee, beer). His place was clean and although the room had no lock privacy as never an issue. There is also a washing machine if anything he's too dirty (but no dryer). Great stay!

Great area to stay ... transit RER within walking distance to get to anywhere in Paris. He is a great host, very accommodating and friendly. Very clean room and walking distance to restaurants, transit and stores
Christine and his wife were so nice and this was a fantastic place to stay! I really appreciated their hospitality!
It was good.
Had a great stay here. It was perfect for my one night stay. About 12 minute walk from the train station. Christian and his family were very friendly and helpful! Thank you!

The hosts were delightful and more than accommodating. They gave me recommendations and were available for questions at all times. They went out of their way to be helpful. There kindness made my first stay in Paris so lovely !
Quaint room with a kind and fun host. Short walk to RER line. Would recommend,
Una zona tranquila, el piso muy limpio y el precio inmejorable
Super

Un très agréable séjour parisien, grandement facilité par la courtoisie, la disponibilité et les bons conseils de notre hôte. 
Sans nul doute une adresse que je recommande!
Très belle appartement
Tout était parfait. Merci Alain-Dora
Tip top soirée en amoureux

Absolument parfait.
Appartement atypique décoré avec un goût certain bénéficiant. 
Nous y sommes allés en amoureux et n’avons qu’un seul regret, que cela n’ait duré qu’une seule nuit.
Expérience incroyable dans un quartier qui l’est tout autant.
Des moments volés dans un Paris qui se réveille doucement...Magique.

Merci Alain et Dora.
Tout c'est très bien passé, je recommande.
Juste parfait.

Super logement, accueil génial j'ai adoré et je recommande très fortement très bon rapport qualité prix on a même droit à des conseils de restos dans le quartier on peut joindre l'hôte à tout moment etc etc

Un endroit vraiment atypique et plein de charme, une propriétaire très accueillante .
Un séjour dont nous n'avons pu profiter autant que ce logement le permettait mais qui sera très vite, je l'espère, renouvelé.

Dora est très accueillante et saura vous donner des petits conseils pour profiter pleinement du quartier. L'appartement qui en plus d'être bien placé est un réel coup de cœur pour les yeux ! Je recommande :-)
Communication très facile avec Alain et Dora. Emplacement idéal, très bel endroit.

Parfaitement situé dans le quartier latin. Romantique à souhait derrière sa façade d’ancienne librairie. Et optimisé et propre, dans une déco esprit loft. Un pied-à-terre idéal pour un séjour parisien
Très agréable week-end dans le logement de Dora et Alain, nous avons apprécié l’accueil et la communication facile et rapide, avec un lieu atypique au charme fou !

Super WE dans le logement hyper central et original d'Alain ! Ideal pour les courts sejours entre amis ou en famille ! Impossible de rater son sejour Parisien dans l'appartement d'Alain, je recommande !
situation excellente - appartement bien agencé - hôtes accueillants et chaleureux - literie confortable - rue silencieuse - environnement superbe -

Quel surprise derrière cette devanture de librairie ("La Librairie des Editeurs Indépendants" ...tout un programme) ! 
Un magnifique petit nid au cœur de Paris,  je n'y suis resté qu'une seule nuit mais j'ai tout de même pu y apprécier tous les avantages (décoration, literie, wifi,  proches métro et RER B,  de bons petits restaurants, cinéma Art et essai et un bonne ambiance étudiante à proximité). le top !
Alain est super réactif et charmant ... Alors, si c'est libre, il ne faut pas hésiter ;-)
appartement cosy et très bien décoré. les hôtes sont vraiment très charmants. les nuisances sonores dues au simple vitrage des fenêtres sont le seul point négatif
J ai beaucoup  aimer l accueil et le faits que l hôte était à l écoute et disponible
Super Appartement.

Merci énormément à Alain et Dora pour leur hospitalité. Nous avons passé un cours séjour sur Paris et cet appartement était parfait pour l'occasion. L'accueil et les bons plans qu'ils nous ont fournis étaient supers. L'emplacement est génial avec tellement de choses à faire dans les alentours. Merci encore et nous recommandons vivement cet airbnb.

Logement très original, petit et charmant. L'appartement se situe au rez-de-chaussée d'un immeuble dans un quartier extrêmement bien situé. Proche du métro, du RER, du Panthéon. On peut découvrir le centre de Paris à pied. L'accueil est chaleureux et, ce qui devient rare avec Airbnb, c'est un accueil personnalisé. Alain et Dora sont réactifs et flexibles, à l'écoute et donnent de bonnes adresses ! Le seul problème de cet appartement c'est les nuisances sonores. La rue est bruyante et la voisine du dessus marche en talons jusqu'à 1h du matin et recommence à 7h00. Nous avons eu de toutes petites nuits...

Appartement conforme à l’annonce. Les hôtes sont très avenants et la communication est très efficace, autant avant, pendant et après le séjour (pour s’assurer de notre satisfaction et rapidement répondre à tous besoins). 

Par ailleurs, la localisation est vraiment excellente; proximité de restos, attractions touristiques (dont Notre-Dame-de-Paris et le Musée de Cluny tout juste à côté), commerces (boulangerie, pharmacie, épicerie), bars et transport en commun.

Grand-mère, mère et petite fille avons apprécié ce logement aussi original que sympathique situé en plein coeur du Quartier Latin, ce qui nous a permis de circuler uniquement à pied (Notre Dame, Saint-Louis, le Marais ... A recommander chaudement!

The apartment is cozy and has an amazing design. Everything was perfectly and in order. The location is good as you can go walking to “Hotel de Ville”, “Notre Damme” and more. The host were very kind and also left us delicious desserts in the table. We really recommend this play to stay. Perfect to have a really nice time in Paris.

We celebrated a short but special weekend for our daughter’s birthday.   This wonderful place was in the perfect location for us, but more importantly, our hosts were amazing!  They were so accommodating and thoughtful.  They communicated with us quickly and even helped us with contingencies when our train was delayed and we were arriving late.  They also provided us with great advice, suggestions, and even made a dinner reservation for us.  They went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and help us make the most of our short stay in Paris.

A lovely appartment in a perfect street in one of the best parts of Paris to stay. The appartment is situated amongst the university book shops of the Sorbonne and well designed with taste and character. After a day out in the city the air conditioning  provided a reprieve from the summer heat. We would stay here again if we returned .
We had a great time. We arrived very late, but the hosts were very helpful. They helped us looking for a parking space, which made everything easy. Thank you very much Alain and Dora
