Dora went out of her way to meet and welcome us despite the current challenges. The 4 of us had a lovely night in her charming apartment in the 5th. The location is truly extraordinary (and yet quiet) for seeing the heart of Paris. Thanks and we will come again!
Very peculiar and quirky flat . Used to be a bookshop - lovely location close to Notre Dame. Hosts are very helpful. Definitely recommend this place for a couple days stay in Paris.
An excellent base for your trip to Paris, with everything you need. The place has lovely character and decor and our host was easy to communicate with and very helpful.

This was the best Airbnb we have stayed at. Many things in Europe are small, but this apartment was perfect!  Roomy for the two of us to stay, large shower with GREAT water pressure.  Located in the best area for anyone traveling to Paris for their first time. Dora met us at the apartment and was so sweet!  She showed us around and gave many great suggestions. We had all we needed and felt right at home. I cannot emphasize enough how perfect the location, space, and hospitality was here. We chose this place based on others reviews and so glad we did. Our first Airbnb we stayed at in Paris was not in a great location and gave us a bad impression. Thankfully we also chose to stay here midway between our trip and were blown away and had an amazing time. Perfect for my husband and I, but would be just as good for 4 people.  If you are traveling to Paris for the first or seconds time I HIGHLY suggest staying here. You won’t find a place like this anywhere else!  

-Callie and Jon
Great place, highly recommended
A beautiful place in a very convenient and buzzing neighbourhood. Highly recommend.
Highly recommend this unique and beautiful stay!
Great hosts, great stay, great place, near to the center.

房東親自迎接顧客讓人倍感親切,房間佈置也是非常獨特讓人記憶深刻!
如果還有下次到訪巴黎,會在選擇一次!

Apartment is on street level and kitchen and washroom are in basement.  Has lots of character but very small and no place to relax.  Some of the amenities were worn out such as the tea towels and bath towels.  Noisy at night with single pane glass offering no buffer against street noise.  Location is great.  Apartment is clean.

Dora and Alain’s lovely and cosy apartment is in a wonderful location close to everything - restaurants, boulangeries, supermarkets, laundromats and transport with Boulevard Saint Michel, Boulevard Saint Germain, Notre Dame, Moyen Age Museum all within a few minutes’ walk. They are very attentive hosts and our stay went seamlessly. We cannot wait to stay here again!
Amazing location and an artful and beautiful space. Highly recommend!!
Great location, clean and efficiently curated space, and helpful host. We would stay here again with 2-4 people!

Easy and lovely to stay here! The decor are special and phenomenal; location is amazing convient for shopping, eat...and you can chose to ride a bike or take the metro to everywhere. When we arrived to Paris , Paris was on a strike. But everything was still wonderful here. Especially the host ‘s enthusiasm and patience make up everything. We really enjoy these days! Highly recommend!
Great space to stay and walking distance to tons of things to do

Everything about this space was 10 out of 10.  The hosts even tried to help me get a taxi to do the airport during the recent strikes when my cancelled last minute.  The space is a dream come true and couldn't be better situated. We will be back.
Perfect location. Great host and a wonderful magical place to stay! We loved it and will be back for sure.

This apartment is a very neat place.  We thoroughly enjoyed staying here while in Paris for a short trip.  We read several reviews and brought ear plugs with us just in case but the noise didn’t bother our family.  We would definitely stay here again!

Alain & Dora's place was the perfect spot for a short stay in Paris, and would have been lovely for a longer one, as well! They were communicative, helpful, and quick to offer assistance. The apartment was wonderful -- beautifully appointed, comfortable, and an amazing location. Highly recommend!

Alain and Dora’s place was the best Airbnb I’ve ever had. Alain greeted us so warmly and recommended a beautiful restaurant. The apartment was so authentic and cool and had everything we needed. Definitely, definitely recommend. Nous v’aimons, Alain et Dora!

A perfect location to explore Paris from! The hosts were so responsive and kind and their recommendations were superb. We were a bit unsure if we would use the loft space with the two chairs but my husband and I so enjoyed the space to read and share some wine while planning for our day or while prepping for the next one. Our family of four found the space perfect and unique. We really enjoyed the neighborhood and felt very safe. Highly recommend!

Alain, Thank you for allowing us to check in early, it was very helpful on our first day. Your recomendations for the best croissant was  spot on. It was DELICIOUS. The place was warm and cozy during our winter stay. The location is easy for first time Paris visitors, tons of restaurants near and easy to get to all transportation. Merci Merci
优秀!位置很棒,距离卢浮宫､巴黎圣母院都很近,房子氛围很温馨,布置得有品味,房东Alain和Dora非常热情,提供了各种咨询｡

This place is like a little work of art. So creative and unusual, but also so comfortable! It's hard to capture in in photos, but it's quite something. Just a short walk to Notre-Dame and the metro. Alain & Dora are incredibly warm and welcoming--beautiful people. Highly recommended.
the airbnb was comfortable, very clean, and was in a great location. our hosts were quick to respond, welcoming, and had great suggestions for spots to eat and things to do in the area.
A very original appartment. Very well connected .
Great apartment, great location. All very easy. Really comfortable.
A wonderful location and comfortable apartment.

Beautiful little apartment, wonderfully designed, very comfortable and in an amazing location. Perfect if you want to go for a walk by the Seine, see the sights and do some shopping. Alain and Dora are fabulous hosts, great communication and local tips from them. Would definitely stay again.
Amazing location on the same street as the Cluny Museum

This is a unique place in a fantastic location. The hosts were as good as I’ve ever had on Airbnb. Spotlessly clean and quirky apartment and I felt very welcome. The only point I would make other than this is that it’s very noisy. The street noise in particular. The property would benefit from double glazing.

Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet und überzeugt mit den Details. 
Ich habe noch nie ein so sauberes Airbnb angetroffen, wodurch wir uns alle sehr wohl gefühlt haben. Paris konnten wir durch die gute Lage der Wohnung bestens erkunden. 
Sehr empfehlenswert :)!
Warm host & sweet historic art filled apartment. Big enough for our family of 4 to fit happily.

Our stay at Alain and Dora’s place was great. There were 4 of us total and we got comfortably in the apartment. The location can not be beat. My boyfriend and I have been to Paris but it was the first time for our 2 friends. We could walk pretty much anywhere and if we were tired of walking there were 2 metro stops minutes from the apartment. It does get loud outside because of heavy foot traffic but at night it wasn’t an issue. Beds were comfortable and plenty of great touches. The shower was huge which was a nice change from other Airbnb showers we experienced during our trip. We would definitely stay here again!
We had a great time at this lovely space. The location is wonderful and the hosts make it very welcoming.

I can’t recommend Alain’s apartment more ! It is in a perfect location very close to all that you could need and the beautiful sites of Paris. The apartment was comfortable for the 3 of us and had everything we could need. It was very clean! We just loved our stay and Alain made us feel very welcome, was quick to respond to any questions and had some great local tips.
非常老的一套公寓,实际居住面积比图片看起来要小一些｡整体的家居布置比较老式,不是酒店式的床上用品｡地理位置距离旅游景区基本都在脚程范围以内,比较方便｡

The apartment is really cute,  very tidy and has a great location to discover the city.

Dora has been a lovely host, very responsive and friendly and made us feel at home quickly.

This eclectic stylish apartment offers great value for money.  Plenty of towels, good sized shower with good pressure, well equipped kitchen, comfy beds and clean.  The host is very nice. The layout utilises the space well, it is compact yet has areas to relax.
Very authentic French. Absolutely gorgeous

We loved our stay here! Great location and such a unique place! The hosts were wonderful - provided lots of helpful information and were very accommodating with check in. Highly recommend and would stay here again!

Alain and Dora’s place has the BEST location in the Latin Quarter/5th Arrondisement. You are close to a fabulous market, bakery, wine shop, cheese shop, and many great restaurants. Take Alain’s suggestions for food! There are plenty of kitchen wares to self-cater breakfasts and lunches and snacks. A good-sized bathroom and comfortable beds! The stairs to the kitchen and bathroom will be difficult for people with any challenges, and not for walkers or wheelchairs. If you are sensitive to noise, bring earplugs and eye mask, but it is very quiet at night as it is on a small side street. The neighbors are great, and there is a grill/gastropub/cafe around the corner for later night food. I would highly recommend this place for all adventurers who know how to travel and to pack light! The laundromat is around the corner and clean and easy to use! A storage locker is nearby if you have a later flight and want to put your luggage somewhere. Basically,
ask Alain, because all of his recommendations are spot on!
Alain is a wonderful host. The apartment is really special and the location is great to get around Paris. We had a unforgetable days in Paris and would come back any time.
Highly recommend this place. Very friendly hosts with special attitude. Beautiful and clean apartment in perfect area.
Alain - Dora's place is a great location. The apartment is well appointed, the beds are comfortable, the sitting area and artistic touch so Parisian. It felt like an authentic Parisian experience.
Fabulous quirky place for our short overnight to Paris - convenient for the sights and in a great location. Thank you !

The place is clean and comfortable, and It's well located.
The host is kind and nice, always response fast, and gives us a lot good restaurant near the apartment.
The apartment is so beautiful.
Highly recommend.
We loved our stay here!  It was perfect for kids in the perfect location for any short or long trip to Paris.  If we make it back to Paris any time soon, we would love to stay here again!  Thank you!
Wonderful location. Kind and thoughtful hosts.
Nice place, compact and well appointed
Great unique apartment with a lot of history these are the type of places you want to stay for a unique Parisian experience with the most charming hosts

Very interesting, unexpected, surprising, beautiful place. It used to be a shop, so it is quite unusual in terms of its shape and of course it reflects its original purpose (ground floor, plenty of stairs, large windows facing the street but no windows downstairs), but the creative transformation into an apartment has been certainly very successful: all spaces are well created and organized, the place is perfectly clean, cozy and welcoming, its location could not be more convenient, central and charming in the very heart of Paris. Alain and Dora have been absolutely perfect in their communication and in the check-in phase, they recommended a fantastic restaurant for our dinner, and have been always helpful throughout the process. 
Highly recommended!

The perfect location in central Paris, on the left bank in St Germain! Old world charm, meets industrial vibe! Easy walking to coffee, food & attractions. Adorable host, Comfortable beds, we slept like logs! Would stay here again in a heart beat! Thanks a bunch!
Sentralt men samtidig  rolig beliggenhet. Rent og fint. Kul leilighet. Kort vei til butikk. Vi valgte å leie sykler og kom oss lett rundt i hele Paris.

We loved staying at Alain and Dora’s apartment- it was well situated in the Quartier Latin for sightseeing & amazing food.  Everything was sparkling clean & Alain & Dora were in touch easily/quickly.  We highly recommend it!
Great location. Very responsive hosts. Will visit again.

This is a fantastic location...right outside the Musée de Cluny with a lovely park in the heart of the Latin Quarter. Easy access to the métro and the RER makes it very easy to access as a traveler. Alain and Dora are incredibly responsive and attentive to any issue/concern. They are extremely cordial hosts with a strong desire to make your stay an enjoyable one. Of all the AirBnBs that we’ve tried in the Paris area, this has been our best location with a personable touch.
Fantastic location - you will not be disappointed =)

Extremely well-appointed and comfortable.  Fantastic hot shower and fluffy towels.  Comfortable beds.  Adorable sitting area.  Alain is full of very helpful information and personally met us at check-in to make sure we had everything we needed.  The location absolutely cannot be beat for getting to all things Paris, and it's really fantastic to come home after long days of sightseeing and not need to climb any stairs!  Also nice that Velib bikes are literally outside the front door of the apartment.  Great stay and great hosts!
Great apartment, we had a terrific stay. It made our trip to Paris very special.
Excellent location, sparkling clean, responsive host, accurately represented in listing.

Lovely space. Very close to delicious places. Kids loved boats at Luxembourg Gardens. 
Excellent stay!
Megan
Super fun staying in an 18th century book shop.  Nicely remodeled.  Alain is a great host who offers the warmest welcome ever.

숙소위치가 좋습니다. 시테섬이 가까이 있어서 접근성도 좋고, 근처에 슈퍼마켓, 늦게까지 하는 술집도 있습니다.
1층에 침실이 있고, 지하 일층에 부엌과 화장실이 있습니다. 수압도 괜찮고, 따뜻한 물도 잘 나옵니다. 
호스트분이 매우 친절하십니다. 덕분에 즐거운 여행 했습니다.
Alain and Dora were great hosts - always available to help when we had questions. The flat is well located near shops, restaurants, and sites to see. We would love to visit again!
Beautiful place, amazing host.
It was such a great location. And also it was a unique apartment.

Alain & Dora’s place is fantastic. It is super clean and modern and their remodel is fantastic. The metal work in the unit is incredible. It’s so close to everything, maybe a 5 minute walk to Notre Dame and the Batobus. Alain gave us great local tips like where to find the place voted to have the best croissants in Paris which were amazing. Alain & Dora met us at the apartment when we arrived and were super sweet even though we arrived much later than we originally told them. They have great maps and guidebooks if you need them and even an extra umbrella which came in handy as our first night was a downpour. With how overpriced and undersized hotel rooms are in Paris, which we’ve found out the hard way on previous trips, Alain & Dora’s feels gigantic. It’s really a fantastic spot. Can’t speak highly enough about the apartment and especially how nice Alain & Dora are in person. Don’t bypass this place.

Great place, well located.  Alain was an excellent host.  The apartment was clean and quite unique.  Even though it was a bit on the smaller side, we all (myself, wife, and two kids) felt quite at home.

Wow... what a beautiful little home in the midst of all that is wonderful about the little pockets of Paris. 

This is an incredibly unique place to stay; beyond charming, as is Alain the host, who could not have been more helpful and accommodating when we arrived. 

I would stay here again and again. Great location close to the river and Norte Dame (she is still magnificent even with all the damage) with great metro links and lots of lovely places to eat close by and in the district.

Thank you Alain for being so wonderful. Would recommend your place to anyone. Merci beaucoup

This wonderful apartment was beautiful, sparkling clean and looks exactly as advertised.  Alain Dora is an excellent host, who gave us lots of local tips on food, transportation, and even how to store our luggage on the last day.  The apartment includes an oven, two burner stove, dishwasher and refridgerator.  The location is convenient to the Metro and very close (easy walking distance) to the island with Notre Dame and St. Louis Island and the old part of Paris.  Very scenic and convenient!!  We would love to stay there again if we visit Paris again.

The property is in a perfect location near metro stations, the street market and restaurants.  
I really love the 19 century property and how beautiful it was restored. It is very charming. 
The host were great and accommodate the checkin hour to our needs. It was great of him. 
I would really enjoy to stay more days there.
A lovely gentleman with a sweet apartment. We enjoy this night!
situation super
You could not ask for a better place to stay or a better host in Paris.  Alain  was the perfect host - such warmth and made us feel so welcome.  The location is exceptional

Alain and Dora are wonderful hosts and their apartment is truly beautiful. Uniquely styled it is located ideally to the Notre Dame and metro as well as local restaurants and bars. Alain and Dora were both very accommodating and helpful before and during the stay - very quick to respond to any and all queries. If you're visiting Paris you have to stay here!

Would give 10 stars if possible. Alain was incredible. He gave us the best recommendations for places to visit in the area and transport tips. Upon check-in, he told us a bit about the history of the property as he showed us around. The property itself is exquisite. It’s so special, I actually miss being there. It was wonderfully clean and Alain thoughtfully left amenities such as organic soap and jam for croissants. The location was excellent- in a lovely area full of book shops and surf shops and just a 5 minute walk from Notre-Dame. An amazing trip, thank you.

Our stay at Alain and Dora's apartment in the Paris Latin Quarter was absolutely delightful!  They went out of their way to accommodate us as our train arrived earlier than the normal check-in time.  Dora was there to meet us and show us around their quaint and beautiful apartment as well as to answer all of our questions including recommendations of where to eat and shop.  Alain was always very quick to respond to my emails and very helpful when I needed help with choosing a taxi company. Their apartment was perfectly located, had everything we needed and was very clean and comfortable.  We will stay here again!

Location, location, location. Loved the neighborhood. We were able to get to all of our planned activities easily - either by walking or taking the metro. Loved being able to fix informal meals in the breakfast area. Being on street level was a plus - easy access, no elevator. Also a minus - street noise at night can affect sleep.
Alain and Dora are wonderful hosts. The location is incredible and the place is so lovely. They were so kind and helpful. We would definitely stay again!

Alain-Dora's place is all Paris classy and chic, close to everything, stunning with character and history. Everything inside the place has a special touch you can see it and feel it. 
We are planning to go back.

This apartment is a gem in a superb part of Paris, made all the more special by Alain and Dora’s warm hospitality. Alain was there to meet us and show us around the apartment. It is compact but makes clever use of the space, and is well equipped. There is a little street noise, but nothing we found intrusive - it’s a large city after all! Occasional noise from the apartment above was brief. Alain is a wonderful host, who was easy to contact and replied promptly each time. He checked to make sure we didn’t need anything a couple of times during our stay. His recommendations were excellent and show his great knowledge of the area - you could not find a better host! Many restaurants nearby, including two directly opposite - the Moroccan was delicious. An excellent base for exploring Paris with ready access to the Metro and the RER to Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports.

Great, stylish place to stay! Very smart and interestingly designed. Really close to the fantastic Latin Quarter and the Notre Damn. Fantastic hosts who were super informative and friendly. It is close to a busy road but then not much isn’t when you’re in Paris! There are also no windows that open but that wasn’t a problem for us! Would definitely recommend and will be coming back. Thanks so much to the wonderful hosts.

Great location to explore the Latin Quarter as long as you are staying out all night! Extremely well decorated and squeaky clean, be mindful that the bedrooms are on the ground floor of a tri-level apartment. The second bedroom is right on the street so you have people walking by you all night. You hear foot traffic all through the night, horns honking on the adjacent street in the evenings and there are no black out shades to keep out the street lights. Steep stairs on this vertical apartment, so be careful. There is a beautiful walk in shower with new appliances. The host greets you to walk you through the apartment.

Klein maar zeer fijn en voorzien van alle gemakken. De ontvangst door Alain was heel prettig. We hebben dankbaar gebruik gemaakt van de verschillende tips die hij ons gaf.
Een fijne buurt met op loopafstand heel veel gezelligheid. Vooral het spelletjescafé  heeft ons hart gestolen!

Alain and Dora were amazing. Communication was exceptional and they even helped us with suggestions when our daughter was unwell. The apartment was very comfortable and in an unbeatable location. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Paris.

Welcomed at the door by Alain and Dora we were introduced to a cosy and classy apartment in the heart of the Latin quarter. Everything was close - bars, restaurants, supermarkets and the metro and sightseeing was a breeze. Thoroughly recommend
Wonderful hosts and the most beautiful little apartment. Very well situated for the best bits of Paris.  A little noisy from the road so may not be ideal for light sleepers.
Amazing property, wonderful location and superb host!

Fantastic location - just a short walk to the metro.
Fabulous hosts - great suggestions on local fare, very prompt responses to any questions.
Great place to stay. Had everything we needed - and such a charming place!
Lovely stylish place in a great location! Alain was great with communication, very friendly and accommodating! Would definitely stay again!
So beautiful and well located.  Alain and Dora are a delight!
Great location!

Coming to Paris and searching a place close to both memorable sights and young and local people - this is the place to stay: next to Sorbonne, close to Jardin de Luxembourg, to Rive Gauche, Notre Dame, Sainte Chapel, Quai d'Orsay...
Very fine to find that Alain-Dora live in close connection to the Ballet de l'Opéra (their daughter). 
The apartment itself is a very original conversion from a bookshop into a Venetian-Style living space.
We shall recommend it to all our friends and family...
Our best wishes to you and your daughter ...
Hedda and Ulf

Alain was there waiting for us at the apartment when we arrived. He is extremely nice and helpful. He gave us plenty of suggestions for the best restaurants in Paris in a variety of price ranges, and he responded quickly to questions during our stay.

The place itself is small but comfortable. The interior is stylish. Everything was clean. I'm 6'6" so I had to do some ducking to get up and down the stairs, but all in all it was a comfortable stay, even with four adults.

The apartment is in a perfect location. Notre Dame is a short 8 minute walk away. The apartment is also right next to the Cluny Museum, which I wish we would have taken the time to visit. There are also plenty of markets and eateries in the area, including some of the best croissants in Paris.

All in all, Alain and his apartment were the perfect welcome to Paris and an excellent way to start our trip.
Great place and location! Thanks for the stay!

Incredible location and what a lovely man Alain is. A fountain of information and now I have to plan another trip to do all the great things he shared. 
Doable space for four girlfriends if more to the efficient side. Perfect for us!  
Can’t wait to stay again.

This place is amazing! The character and history made this a perfect place for us to stay and felt very Parisian. The added touches Alian provides is so thoughtful. He even went above to help us find transportation from the airport and his food recommendations were spot on. If we ever go back we hope his place is available. The location is perfect and the little cheese shop down the road was a highlight for us. Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful space and knowledge with us.

This apartment is just absolutely lovely! Quirky, stylish and in a great location. Plenty of room for 3 people. Was only 2 stops on the RER B line from Gare du Nord. Lots of restaurants etc nearby. Alain and Dora were so helpful beforehand and always very quick replying to messages. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay again!

Alain and Dora were welcoming and were very helpful when it came to finding things to do in the city. The place very well located near Norte Dame and the canals and very interesting decor. If you are sensitive to cold, I recommend speaking to them about adjusting the heat. Wonderful overall!

The location of this apartment can’t be beaten - it’s walking distance to so many attractions such as Notre Dame and also a stones throw away from lots of restaurants and bars. Alain was also quite accommodating for my sister’s last minute stay too and was there to greet my parents and my 5month son when we all arrived. It’s all very cosy and stylish inside! Quick responses too.
Great location, lovely apartment, very quick responses. Thank you Alain & Dora!
great location, friendly owners, beautiful apartment in the centre of Paris

A really amazing place. Brilliant use of space so that although a small flat the three of us never felt cramped. Hosts are delightful and gave us amazing tips on where to go and which restaurants to eat at. the flat had everything you could want for a weekend stay, in a lovely area of Paris. would absolutely stay there again and in fact we are looking forward to it!
位置很好!步行几分钟到圣母院,房间很有历史感､设计感､温馨干净,住起来很舒适,适合一家人出行,性价比很高,推荐!
The apartment is very well located, clean and hip. Alain and Dora are great hosts.

Alain and Dora’s place is wonderfully stylish, we adored the interior design and felt completely immersed in the Parisian culture here! The location is fantastic, close to two metro stops and right in the middle of the Latin quarter, walking distance to lots of great sights, restaurants etc. 
The front bedroom can be a little noisy at night if you’re a light sleeper as the window is street level. 
Alain gave us a very warm welcome and was fantastic at keeping in touch throughout our stay.
Would definitely love to come back if we’re in Paris again.

ﾋﾞｼﾞﾈｽのための滞在でしたが､駅へのｱｸｾｽが良く､monoprixが近いので日用品の買い物も苦労しません｡ﾉｰﾄﾙﾀﾞﾑ大聖堂へ歩いて数分の距離です｡
何よりﾎｽﾄのAlainさんDoraさんの気配りが素晴らしく､心も体もほっこりする時間が過ごせました｡

This is a great apartment with its quirky brick and stone interior. Beautifully clean and cosy with  great facilities and very comfortable. Its a perfect  location in the 7th arrondissement with a great choice of reasonably priced bistros, cafes and  food shopping. Alain  was there to provide us with a friendly and warm welcome and provided us with very helpful local recommendations. 
Alain- Dora were perfect hosts and we highly recommend their apartment. We will definitely visit again

What an amazing experience! Alain-Dora’s place is in the perfect location for the metro, restaurants, sights and shopping! Alain was quick to respond and provided an extensive list of recommendations for our stay!
The house was well-designed and had extremely good location. Alain was very friendly and gave us useful information about where to visit. We really enjoyed staying at this accommodation.

Beautiful space and very kind hosts. WiFi issue was significant because we had to go to a nearby cafe in order to message the hosts, and then had to wait hours for a response. Hopefully it gets sorted!
Un bellissimo appartamento in una storica libreria. Ottima posizione.

Clean, nice interior, friendly and helpful host. Appreciate that it feels more like a hotel than someones home. Redecorated nice apartment in an charming old shop. All positive experience in beautiful Paris!

Alain proactively communicated with us prior to arrival in Paris. He met us at the flat, showed us all the amenities, and even after a long day took extra effort to suggest a perfectly appropriate dinner location. 
The flat is not large, but a great use of space on two floors.  The newly renovated bathroom downstairs was better than expected, and accompanying kitchen was nicely appointed. 
We were only in Paris for a short two days, and the convenience of the location made it well worth the cost. 
Two blocks from Notre Dame puts you directly in the heart of a fantastic walking area. 
Highly recommended - thank you Alain for your hospitality. Merci!

Ganz ganz tolle Einrichtung von einem Venezianischen Dekorateur, alle Materialien sind hochwertig! Man schlaft gut, und alles war blitzsauber.
Man ist zu Fuss gleich beim Panthéon und bei Notre Dame. Alain gab uns viele hilfreiche Tipps!
Das nächste Mal wenn ich nach Paris auf Geschäftsreise bin würde och jeder Zeit gerne wieder bei Alain und Dora schlafen.

What can i say, this home is special! It is impeccably decorated and cared for. the use of space is very good as well. 

My wife and i had the back room, which stayed completely dark if you desire that for sleep! The front room had split twin beds and was great for my son! 

Heating worked very well as did the water. 

the kitchen has the basics needed to cook, though we did not use it. 

There is anything you need withing 5-10 minutes walking. Notre Dame is so close as well!

I would recommend ear plugs to those not used to city living, but i did not need them. 

The hosts are the most sweet and caring folks. They were certain to communicate very well and were waiting to check us in and answer our questions. 

I would stay here upon my next trip to Paris with joy!

Alain’s place is great for exploring Paris. Excellent location, very unique and comfortable apartment. My two teenagers and I stayed there for 3 nights in November. Alain met us and made sure we were settled and had nice recommendations for food and sights to get us started. Would definitely stay there again.
Great location and nice sized space for 3 adults. Very clean and the hosts were very accommodating getting us in early. Would definitely stay there again when in Paris!
Good located and clean. But smaller than expected and one bedroom was very close to the street, noisy.

If you want a wonderful Paris experience in a quaint, beautiful flat, Alain-Dora's apartment is the right choice. It felt more like a personalized hotel, with luxurious linens and bedding, inside a very clean and unique space. The flat itself is beautiful designed with stone from the 18th century juxtaposed to modern mirrors and steel, creating a very cool and thoughtful atmosphere. Amenities were just right. From the beginning, Alain and Dora were so communicative and kind, from check in to check out. Alain even provided a list of his recommended shops and spots to explore during our stay. 

The location is very convenient to trains and sites, making much of central Paris walkable. There are busy streets close, but Alain and Dora's flat was off the beaten path a bit, which made you feel more like a local rather than a tourist. I highly recommend this spot and you won't be disappointed.
We had a really Nice stay in Paris and this apartment has a very good location. Furthermore is it very cozy. Dora & Alain was a perfect host. They get our warmest recommendations.
Great Left Bank location, interesting apartment decor and layout, but comfortable enough. Very helpful hosts.

Alain and Dora were great communicators and were very helpful in suggesting local experiences that were off the tourist radar. 

Their place is very conveniently located with easy access to the subway and easy walking distance to Notre Dame.

Maybe most importantly the beads are very comfortable 

I highly recommend and would stay here again.
The space is absolutely stunning and in a beautiful neighborhood. Alain couldn't have been a better host. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

House-owners are very nice, and it's a very lovely house with great location. We are very happy and comfortable here. We hope to stay here again when we come to Paris next time. I highly recommend you to live here when you want to have a wouderful trip.

This is the fifth time i’ve rented from Alain and Dora. They never disappoint!  Cluny-La Sorbonne is in a spectacular, historic location.  The décor is charming, and the touches are incredibly thoughtful. Alain and Dora are perfect hosts and very responsive.  I can’t wait to return.

Alains attention to details was great. Though the apt. is a tight fit, it is in an amazing neighborhood and Alain is SUPER responsive. It is right in the heart of everything a visiter can want. He worked around our arrival schedule and was always there to help us navigate Paris. His suggestions for restaurants and everything French  show his love for Paris and his wanting to share it with his patrons. We know that we will always have a home in Paris!

Alain & Dora’s home is the perfect spot for visiting Paris. Located on a quiet street, but close to amenities, it is quite easy to walk to the Louvre and Notre Dame, and is very close to the Latin Quarter.

The apartment itself is beautiful; located in a former bookshop, it has been sensitively converted into a modern and comfortable home.

Alain & Dora are perfect hosts, keeping in contact both before and during our visit, and providing us with useful restaurant and local info.

Our experience both of the apartment and of Alain and Dora’s hospitality exemplified our visit to Paris; we found the city and its residents to be clean, welcoming, helpful and modern. It has made us want to visit properly and soak up all Paris has to offer.

Alain and Dora - thank you!
We had a great stay, Alan and Dora went out of their way to be helpful, the flat was quirky, charming and practical and the position is very good. Would happily stay again
Beautiful Appartement- great Host!

A lovely apartment with an excellent central location. It has been very thoughtfully renovated (the bathroom in particular is really lovely) and super handy to Luxembourg Gardens, Ile de la Cite, the Louvre etc. A great place to stay!
Super Lage sehr nette Gastgeber tolle Betten sehr gute Ausstattung ideal für ein Wochenende in Paris

Alain and Dora’s home exceeded my expectations - not only was the location perfection, but the home was cozy, the ac was freezing (in the best way possible!!) and esthetically pleasing to boot! Alain and Dora’s were extremely accommodating in letting us check in earlier and out later if we wanted as well as providing us with a list of local suggestion which did not disappoint -best croissants of my life!

너무 좋았어요.
우리를 기다려서 모든 위치와 사용법을 설명해주었고,
친절함에 감동받았어요.
위치도 정말 좋았고,
디자이너 플랫이라 그런지
특별한 파리를 더욱 특별하게 느껴지도록 했어요.
房子位置很好,距离巴黎圣母院,蓬皮杜艺术中心都在步行范围内｡房子如图中所见,设计感和艺术气息很强,随处可见房屋设计者的独特风格｡房屋设施较为齐全,炉灶和烤箱使用起来都很简单｡房东非常热情,等待我们从机场来安排我们入住,详细介绍房屋内的各种设施还有住处附近好吃的各色餐厅咖啡厅等等,让我们的巴黎之旅更加方便和舒心｡推荐推荐,第五区内安全又美丽的房子｡
Don't miss this little gem when in Paris - beautifully located and appointed.  And air conditioning is so unusual and wonderful

Perfecte locatie. 
Superlieve en attente gastheer en gastvrouw 
Zeer net appartement. 
Aanrader wie naar Parijs gaat.

This is a perfect quaint, stylish, and quiet place in the Sorbonne, and the a/c is a big plus in the warm summer months. Close to everything - cafes, restaurants, la Seine, etcetera. Alain was extremely attentive and by far the best host we’ve had so far. Merci beaucoup Alain!

Charming and memorable Paris bolthole. Design is superb.  Alain is a wondeful host and I had a magnificent time in Paris staying at this lovel apartment. The vibes are strong at Alain and Dore's place.

We stayed 4 days at the beautiful appartment of Alain and Dora. They made us feel very welcome. The informatie we received from them before and after arriving was very useful (where to park the car, how to get to the appartment, things to do, places to eat and to shop etc.).
The place is perfect for 3 to 4 people. It is very clean and has everything one needs. The location is super.
If we come to Paris another time, we will certainly stay here again.
Immaculate, perfectly located flat. Small but that's part of the charm and has everything you could need.

Alain-Dora's place is a unique apartment in one of the best places we stayed in Paris over the years. The apartment is small but cozy, and you won't regret the experience of staying there. The hosts are super-friendly and they'll help you with anything you need even after checking in. Recommended!

Great location, clean, good amenities, styled very well, friendly and helpful host. Lovely little place. 

Might not be suitable for those with mobility issues or very small children due to stairs.
Great apartment, small but charming, clean, perfect location. Will stay again next trip to Paris!

Amazing apartment, located in the perfect section of Paris. It is a beautiful apartment,clean, and convienant best of all. The host are two outstanding people, very kind very helpful. I couldn’t of asked for a better first time Parisian experience.

Alain was really lovely and helpful. The apartment is little, but very cool, quirky and creative. They have made really good use of the space. We really appreciated not having to drag our suitcases up lots of stairs as the apartment is on the ground floor and basement. The location is amazing-couldn’t be any better if you want to see Notre Dame and the museums along the river. We had a great stay.

Alain is a lovely host that will give you a lot of tips for exploring Paris. The place is at a good location that you can easily get to other places. The small and lovely apartment that you have everything you need. We love the place so much!
The location is near restaurants, groceries, and other stores, and only a short walk from the metro.  The apartment was small (for 4 people), but clean, and communication with the hosts worked well.

Fabulous wee apartment in the heart of the Latin quarter. Beds are really comfy, bathroom and kitchen fabulous. Super Clean. Such a great location, easy to get to supermarket and walk to Notre Dame, and Louvre etc. The hosts, gave great tips and were super nice. The kitchen and Bathroom are in the basement, so no natural light, gorgeously quirky flat.

Truly an amazing experience.  Hosts were beyond kind and helpful.  Being Paris over Bastille Day and France’s World Cup win was a once in a lifetime experience.  Alain has wonderful tips on restaurants, places to watch the fireworks and areas to experience Paris “off the beaten path”.  The apartment was just perfect for our family of four.  The location was amazing for restaurants, boulangerie for top rated croissants, access to metro, short walk to Notre Dame and the Seine.  Thank you Alain-Dora we will most definitely recommend your space to others!
Very Parisian apartment, well outfitted, in an excellent location. Fantastic host made everything easy.
Amazing location. They were so accommodating and even gave us a great lunch spot recommendation.  Would stay here again when I come back to Paris

This is a delightful, quirky space ideal for 4 people for a couple of nights in Paris.  The location is wonderful, deep within the Latin Quarter and only a few minutes from Notre Dam with tons of restaurant options.  A hidden gem!

Alain and Dora are wonderful hosts. So accommodating and helpful. Location is excellent. Only 2 minutes to Cluny la Sorbonne metro line and wonderful restaurants.  Another 3 minutes will get you to the shop that won best croissant  in Paris 2018.   
Like any great location there is noise at night. We read previous reviews and brought earplugs.  Beds are comfortable and kitchen well equipped. 
Would definitely book with Alain and Dora again should we return.

Alain was wonderful. He gave us great tips and made sure the place felt like home and it turned out the place was truly a home away from home while my friend Nicole and I explored Paris. Great Air Conditioning as well!
Nothing to add.

Alain is  kind and friendly host. The apartment  is stylishly renovated and has very comfortable beds.  My husband, daughters (21 & 17)  and I appreciated being able to stay in a 2 bedroom place. It is very conveniently located close to Metro stops, grocery stores, restaurants and many sites. There is some city street noise but not too bad.  If you are out late in the evening site-seeing or having dinner and drinks,  the upstairs neighbors may wake you early (you can hear them walking back and forth in the apartment above), but that is city living.   We really appreciated Alain checking on us throughout our stay in Paris. Merci Alain!

Short walk to metro station and grocery store. Near Notre Dame Cathedral, Pantheon and Latin Quarter. In the middle of many good restaurants. Enough space for up to four people. Clean and cozy. Best of all, Alain communicates quickly and provides all local information you need. He even thoughtfully brought a converter plug and eventually let us keep it. Next time in Paris I’ll book Alain’s apartment again.

Alain and Doris are really nice and host us so well with this special apartment. The apartment include all the necessary things we need. The location is great and we love our stay there. The only little thing is we really need to beware of our “active” baby to stay away the stairs as it’s quite steep.
Great location!

Very nice little place in Paris. Alain and Dora were very kind and helpful. They did their best to make sure that we were comfortable and happy. They were always available to answer any questions that I had. I have no complaints, only good stuff.

The perfect stay!! Traveling with my family is very stressful as they are very picky and Alain and Dora could not have been more generous and accommodating. The space is so unique and beautiful, in the perfect spot. Not buzzing with tourists which is great, yet the perfect distance to great restaurants and all of the must sees. The best hospitality I have ever encountered with air bnb Alain walked us around he neighborhood took us to a great lunch spot and even bought a new air conditioning for us. Answered immediately and did everything to make us comfortable, treated us like family! Will ABSOLUTELY be back and recommend Alain and Dora to everyone. :)

Alain & Dora were both so gracious and accommodating. Since the day I booked two months before the trip, they stayed in touch to help make my visit to Paris as wonderful as possible. They went above & beyond to find recommendations and provide extensive information about restaurants, tours & even some great values!! I hope to stay there again!!!

This apartment was quaint, perfect location to Notre Dame, Midieval History Museum, the Seine, we were right in the middle of the Latin Quarter, walking distance to all the sites and so many restaurants.  Beds very comfortable, happy there was air conditioning, very secure, hosts were so helpful, friendly and prompt.

This apartment is exactly what you want when you think about staying somewhere in Paris. The location is fantastic, you can easily walk to Notre Dame, museums, and the metro is right down the street so you can grab a train to Versailles or Giverny easily. The actual apartment is wonderful, the rooms are airy and spacious and the beds are extremely comfortable. The shower is amazing and the kitchenette makes quick meals easy. 

Alain was a wonderful host - helpful and welcoming, everything you want from a host. He gave great advice about restaurants and transportation, and always responded quickly if you have questions. All in all, this apartment and Alain himself, made our trip to Paris perfect.
Beautiful place, great host and even better location. More than recommended!
A little Book Shop turned into a cool

Alain and Dora are exceptionally welcoming and attentive and even set up a TV so we could watch Prince   Harry’s wedding! Alain provided great restaurant tips and responded instantly to emails. Le petit nid est chouette. The accommodation is compact but thoughtfully equipped and beautifully  presented. The location is  superb and we hope to return to this charming accommodation.

Alain and Dora were wonderful hosts and we loved staying at this apartment. They both were there to greet us, explain everything and give us useful information about the area. The apartment was perfect for our family; separate room for the kids, beautifully decorated, good hot shower, well equipped kitchen. It is walking distance to Notre Dame and many other sights along the Seine. As it's such a central area there was a bit of noise at night from foot and vehicle traffic, also from upstairs neighbours wearing heels early in the morning on week days! But it wasn't a problem and we all slept well. This apartment also has easy access to the metro for visiting the rest of Paris and for onward travel. Nearby shops and supermarket made it easy to feed the family using the well equipped kitchen. I highly recommend staying here for a visit to Paris.

I stayed in this apartment with my mom. I picked this home because of the proximity to Notre-Dame. Host are friendly and responsive. The apartment is small and charming,  however,  I was discourage to find out how noisy it was and that we have to go to the basement to use the bathroom.  The street is very very noisy and the first floor apartment feels too close to the street to hear busy restaurant conversations across the street. Traffic did not seemed to quiet much thru the night. There are no walls but curtains making it hard to feel private. We could hear the upstairs neighbor early morning and nigh time. I disliked going down the narrow steps to the bathroom and kitchen. Small children/older guess may have a difficult time going down the steps, specially at nights.  Paris is charming and we visit often and hope to visit again.
Un bel endroit, très bien situé .
Hôtel bien situé dans un quartier vivant et dynamique.
Excellent rapport qualité prix, qui plus est idéalement situé !

Un confort simple et réel, une déco joliment désuète, le calme des chambres, un très bon lit,
la propreté des lieux.. en ce qui me concerne, c'est tout ce que je souhaitais, sans parler de l'emplacement ds Paris !
De passage très rapidement à Paris pour une nuit, je vous recommande cet hôtel avec un très bon rapport qualite prix. J'ai dormi très confortablement dans un lit douillet !

Emplacement et accueil irréprochables.
Mais la Louisiane mériterait un coup de frais.
Idéalement situé pour visiter Paris. Bon rapport qualité/prix, même si les chambres mériteraient un bon rafraîchissement.
Idéal pour avoir un pied à terre pour visiter Paris
Très bon établissement, très bien situé

L’hôtel est un bâtiment très vieux avec des couloirs longs et étroits qui ne sont pas rassurants.  Le parquet craque à tous les étages et il n’y pas d’insonorisation... Mais le lit est très confortable, pour le prix c’est tout à fait raisonnable. En dehors de cela l’emplacement est parfait à proximité d’une petite rue avec de nombreux bars et restaurants très appréciables.
Accueil, emplacement, propreté et rapport qualité prix excellent. A recommander
Bonne situation géographique
Chambre propre et correcte. Emplacement idéal. Calme.
Accueil chaleureux, chambre confortable, bien chauffée, il faisait froid à Paris.  Buffet très agréable.
Comme d'habitude, à La Louisiane, on n'est jamais déçu. C'est plus qu'un hôtel, on s'y sent comme chez soi dans un emplacement de rêve en plein coeur de la capitale.
Lieu très bien situé et hôtel atypique avec une belle chambre et vue parfaite

Tout était parfait!
Excellent accueil, propreté, un lit douillet et un emplacement exceptionnel.
et, cerise sur le gâteau, un petit déjeuner bien garni (sucré et salé)
Très bon rapport qualité prix.

Hôtel en plein cœur du 6eme, avec beaucoup de cachet.
Décalage quand même entre la beauté du hall et celui des chambres.
Magnifique petit déjeuner.

La chambre est très calme, très confortable et pourtant elle se situe au cœur de Paris, dans un quartier très vivant et très dynamique. Elle est très bien située, à 10 mn à pied seulement de Notre Dame et 30 mn environ de tous les autres sites (Le Louvre...). Le métro est à 3 mn à pied seulement.... Le personnel de l'hôtel est très accueillant... je recommande vivement !
Logement bien situé

Un excellent séjour en l' hôtel de la Louisiane et une expérience à renouveler.
Un hôtel chaleureux, familial, aux tarifs vraiment très abordables, situé dans le triangle d'or germanopratin, entre Saint-Michel, Odéon, la Seine, non loin du Louvre ou de Notre-Dame.
Toutes mes attentes, et plus encore, ont été comblé lors de ce séjour enrichissant. Une ambiance vraiment parisienne, des rues animées du soir au matin près de l'hôtel, dans le Paris historique, près de galeries ou de cafés mythiques : le vieux   " Procope" de Voltaire et des auteurs de l' Encyclopédie  ; la brasserie " Flore ", de Sartre à Beigbeder, entre autres. Un hôtel étrangement calme, avec une literie d'exception, propice au repos voire à la méditation et à la création. Beaucoup d'artistes - écrivains, cinéastes - ont séjourné à la Louisiane et y séjournent encore, inspirés par cet ancien monastère transformé en hôtel depuis plusieurs générations. Un personnel extrêmement bienveillant, plein d'humour, à la disposition des hôtes en toutes circonstances.  A recommander.

Charmant hôtel "vintage" dans ce quartier exceptionnel,  à deux pas de la Seine avec un choix multiples de brasseries., de monuments à visiter ainsi que le batobus accessibles à pieds   L 'hôtel La Louisiane ne peut laisser indifférent quand on connait les noms de ceux qui ont laissés leurs empreintes dans ce lieu. On lui pardonne ses imperfections car on y passe que la nuit en tant que touristes . Personnel tres serviables et agreables.
Séjour valorisé par la localisation de la chambre !
Hôtel très bien situé avec tout à proximité
Bien situé

Fin de séjour à Saint Germain des près, 
Merci Xavier c'était très cool et à bientôt
Chambre parfaite et très bien placée .

accueil très sympathique 
hôtel bien placé 
À bientôt

L’hôtel la Louisiane accueille des voyageurs de tous pays mais aussi des bordelais, de plus en plus. Du coup, il y règne toujours une ambiance conviviale et accueillante. Souvent le soir, des clients partagent une bonne bouteille de Bordeaux, en refaisant le monde, racontant leurs voyages ou simplement leur journée à Saint-Germain des Prés. AU fond, La Louisiane est un moteur efficace contre le poids subis des routines sclérosantes, et demeure ainsi depuis deux siècles un levier magique  pour la création et l‘activité intellectuelle.
Parfait
Très bien.
Très bonne situation, personnel disponbile et efficace.
Allez chez XAVIER les yeux fermés !!
Parfait pour une nuit business à Paris, propre, calme, et agréable.
Très bonne adresse. Je recommande !
Idéalement situé au coeur de St Germain des prés,  avec une laverie au sein de L hôtel extrêmement pratique.  Hôte très réactif

Je suis heureux de connaître une telle adresse à Paris, et en plus dans l'un des plus  poétiques et mythiques quartiers de la capitale. Je n'y ai passé qu'une seule nuit et c'est bien dommage et trop court . Mais si je reviens à Saint Germain des prés, ce sera à l'hôtel de la Louisiane et nulle part ailleurs
Un vrai plaisir de séjourner dans ce charmant hôtel, idéalement situé
Un hôtel historique, dans le plus beau quartier de St Germain. Merveilleux endroit à un prix remarquable pour le quartier!
Accueil impeccable, quartier super sympa et chambre confortable.

Accueil sympa
Hébergement un peu vieillot
Un rapport qualité prix imbattable ! Grande chambre et belle salle de bain au coeur de Saint Germain. What else ?
Chambre sympa et hôtel bien situé!
L'accueil est particulièrement appréciable. Serviable, souriant, accueillant. L'emplacement en plein coeur de Paris en fait un lieu idéal pour le touriste.
Il s'agit d'un hotel, c'est correct mais pas extra.
Hôtel idéalement situé, propre et accueillant. Aux antipodes des froides chaînes hôtelières. Pour qui comme moi se dispense aisément de la télévision et préfère les lieux avec un

Super Bonne situation géographique 
Excellent rapport qualité prix

Très facile d'accès , hotes très sympa ! 
Petit déjeuner offert par la maison 
Situé dans un quartier très sympa , qui bouge pas mal la nuit 
Chambre très propre et très bien équipée

Séjours extra, environnement cosi, on se sent comme à la maison, petit hôtel indépendant des chaînes, c'est l'un des derniers !! Je recommande de tout cœur. 
Idéalement bien placé !!
Très bien situé, bon rapport qualité-prix!

Séjour bref mais agréable dans cet établissement idéalement situé pour qui souhaite profiter de ce quartier magique de Saint-Germain des Prés. Il offre un charme désuet, loin des établissements formatés. Si vous escomptez un confort clinquant passez votre chemin, si vous recherchez le charme d'un immeuble historique assorti d'un accueil "pro", je vous recommande La Louisiane.

La Louisiane, c'était une belle découverte pour moi. Très bel endroit, simple, accueillant et inspirant, avec une ambiance incomparable. On a l'impression que rien n'y manque. Le personnel est agréable. J'y retournerais avec plaisir!

En plein cœur de St Germain ! Proche des transports en commun, c'est le spot idéal pour  découvrir le quartier ! Super rapport qualité prix pour Paris. Grande chambre au calme. L'équipe est à l'écoute et attentive à nos demandes. Et puis il y a une sacré magie avec l'histoire de cet hôtel. La vue sur les toits est juste top!
Notre séjour s est parfaitement déroulé.
Bonne literie, chambre au calme, au cœur de Saint-Germain-des-prés, personnel accueillant, excellent rapport qualité-prix, que dire de plus !

Une de mes plus belle nuit loin de chez moi. Les plus belles rencontres se produise dans des lieux innatendu et la Louisiane est de ceux ci. Demandez au réceptionniste de faire parler les murs pour vous, tant de choses incroyable s'y sont passer,ce qui est fou c'est qu'aujourd'hui encore​ l'hôtel accueil des personnes incroyables. Je me suis sentis trés privilégiée d'en croiser quelques unes et d'échanger coupes de vin et idées blottis dans les vieux fauteuils en cuir du hall. Je peux dire que je suis tomber amoureuse de ce cocon au milieux de la folie parisienne.
One of the most comforting night I spend far away from home. I indeed felt in love in Paris, in love with this pecculiar place. I'll be back soon to dream again in those walls.
La Louisiane ! C'est la que ça se passe ! Et aussi c'est là où tant de choses se sont passées. Entrez dans l'histoire venez à La Louisiane.. simplement.

Logement spacieux bien situé.
Lit très confortable
Très bien situé, l'accueil y est chaleureux. Je recommande sans hésiter !
L'endroit est aussi magique que le quartier ! Un séjour ponctué de rencontres, de sourires, de rires à l'image du propriétaire des lieux. Je recommande chaleureusement
Leur annonce est du baratin, cherchez ailleurs.

Réservation pour une amie Colombienne qui a du se rendre seule dans cet hôtel alors qu'elle ne parlait Français. Elle a été parfaitement accueilli par l'équipe qui la accompagnée tout au long de son voyage. Je recommande cet hôtel propre et chaleureux.

L’hotel est situé en plein coeur de Paris, à 10minutes de marche du Louvre. Le personnel était super également. J’ai eut chaud parce que c’était la canicule mais un ventilateur était présent dans la chambre.
Un quartier très sympa. Super séjour !
Bon rapport qualité prix à saint Germain des Prés pour un hotel.

Hôtel très bien situé dans un petit quartier sympathique.
Très bon point de départ pour toutes visites à Paris.
Personnel accueillant 
Propreté des lieux
L'hôtel est très bien situé, la chambre spacieuse avec des moulures au plafond, et l'accueil très cordial.
Accueil parfait, disponibilité, réactivité, super rapport qualité-prix et emplacement idéal à Paris ! Je recommande vivement !
Flexibilité concernant l'accueil, chambre conviviale, bon rapport qualité prix et idéalement situé. Adresse à retenir !

Il s'agit d'une chambre d'hôtel. La chambre était très propre et le lit confortable. 
L'hotel est situé dans un quartier vivant. 

Un petit déjeuner (un croissant, un pain au chocolat, un café, un jus d'orange) était offert. 

Je recommande !
At the heart of Saint Germain, affordable no frills hotel.
It was fine, just fine. It’s old and the elevators don’t work properly. Corridors are too narrow for passing with luggage.

This hotel in the heart of the Latin Quarter is ideally located to explore Paris, especially bars and restaurants, which are literally on your doorstep. The breakfast was copious with a great selection of breads croissants and pastries. 

When It comes to value for money, the hotel exceeded expectations.

I’d definitely stay there again!
All went very well, as it always does at La Louisiane.
Easy Check-in and well located
Smily Welcome, Easy Access & Ideal. Thank You
Great location! You can walk basically everywhere. The hotel is functional and really ok for the price.

good service, very central, so 5 min. to the River, 10 min. to the Louvre by feet.
Many bars and shops are just on this street. The Metro is close to maybe 5 Minutes.
Fantastic location, beautiful historic hotel. Great price and a friendly welcome too. Thank you Xavier!
The position is wonderful, everyone is kind and helpfull, the structure is not new but we were 3 in two connected rooms with two bathrooms! we spent a very good time there!

The people at the hotel are very hospitable and friendly.  The hotel was under construction and the noises there were days that it was unbearable.  I understand that the situation is unusual since in these times hotels are closed and they take the opportunity to remodel them.  I will have to return in a normal season to be able to evaluate it correctly.  I appreciate the good predisposition of the staff and I thank you for such a particular time in the world

We had a room on the 5th Floor. And we had a view in the street. It is in the lively part of Paris, but we did not suffer any noise. The room is clean and the beds are fine. The breakfast in the morning is okay. There is a buffet with lots of choice. We came by car and there is a free parking space in front of the hotel which we could use. Perfect for us, as parking is very expensive in Paris. I really like the location. Near restaurants and bars. We walked to the Eiffel tower. It was fine by us, because we like to stroll around. 
I can recommand this place!

Such a well located hotel!  You’re surrounded by fun shopping and buzzy cafes.  And so comfortable.  I stayed in a triple room (21) with my mom and aunt and we thoroughly enjoyed it.  There are two twin beds in the first room and a double bed in the other with a crib.  We were able to spread our luggage around and get comfortable.  There are closets in each room.  The bathroom is lovely-there’s two actually!  Well...1.5.  The one off the main room has a tub and toilet-hairdryer and window that opens to the street below.  Hello!!!  It’s a feature, not a bug!  Lovely white tile everywhere and clean.  The other half bath is a shower and sink off the second bedroom.  

We loved the big windows that let in the cool air and sounds from the street below.  However-it was a Thursday and rather noisy, so if you have a problem with that, I imagine you’ll have a problem.  I loved it tho-felt like you were in the center of things in a very sexy way.  Like, I didn’t have a problem going to bed early cause I was at the party all night, ya dig?  We were on the third floor so it was a bit muffled.  Also-big ups for a working elevator, though they do have a beautiful staircase.  It’s not glamorous in a fancy way but in the bohemian fabulous way.  

Breakfast was included and simple but well done.  Seems like they serve till rather late, which was nice. 

With the value and location-I’m seriously considering staying here again
地理位置非常好,只是週末晚上附近party 聲音有點大而已｡
Wonderful convenient location. Great staff. Simple but clean and comfortable room. All that you need when you visit Paris.
I solo traveling in Paris for the first time. The location is perfect!! The staff were super friendly and very helpful. I will definitely stay with them again if I return to Paris.
We had a great stay at this hotel. Location is perfect, the parking in front of the door. The room was clean and we could even choose for the room we prefered (quite, what kind of bed). Thanks!
The place was clean and very easy to locate. Communication was very easy and the hotel staff were kind with assistance when my passport was stolen.

The place is as described. The beds were comfortable, linen was clean, bathrooms were clean.
Great location as we could cover most tourists sites by foot.
Staff was hospitable and made check-in and check-out effortless. 
Even agreed to give us a late checkout for free.
Excellent place, fantastic location. Proper Paris!
Excellent location and great hospitality! They were quick to respond and get me checked in when I needed a last minute place to stay for a night. Would definitely recommend their service to others.

Very good quaity/ price hotel. 
Excellent location. I will return surely!

This little gem of a hotel was my last minute choice after problems with the AirBnb I had previously booked. It was clean, comfortable, great location, charming hotel. 
 Amazing breakfast! Such nice hospitality. I will stay here again! Wish I had booked this place to begin with! Thanks!!
Great historic hotel in a big city. Hotel is well situated for exploring Paris. Staff is welcoming, friendly and helpful. Would not consider staying anywhere else. Highest recommendation
Excelente alojamiento. Bien ubicado, limpio, precio competitivo y muy gentil el personal de recepción.

Yo regresaria a este Bello hotel, comodo, limpio y excelente ubicaciòn.
Desayuno extraordinario
Nice place , really close to everything, clean , big and comfy bed , nice bathtub. Only down side , the free parking is only 1 parking spot for the entire hotel

Good location for a hotel with friendly staff but a bit difficult to find. 

The bedding is clean but for the room, it doesn't look too clean. The walls look really old and haven't been fixed in a while. A lot of stains in the room and you have to walk around the room with some scandals as it looks really dirty.
Prisvärt, enkelt och trevligt hotell i väldigt trevliga kvarter. Nära till allt; trevliga restauranger, sevärdheter och Metro/buss/tåg.

Peerless location, great local opinions on where to go, Carrefour (grocery store) is literally across the street so you can pick up a bottle of wine cheap.  Very clean rooms and nice bathroom, spacious tub.  If you're looking for elegant furnishings and an arty vibe, just go eat at all the amazing restaurants and cafes around the corner from La Louisiane.  It's better than paying more for a fancy hotel room you will hardly spend any time in.

The best thing about this place is the location - easy walking distance to the Seine, Ile de la Cite with La Chapelle and Notre Dame, and metro stations very close by that can get you anywhere with ease. The room itself is farly plain but clean and comfortable. A good boulangerie is right across the street, and multiple little restaurants and stores abound. Friendly staff with good suggestions, easy communication. We plan to be back the next time we’re in Paris
Great location.
Nice location
Great space... super breakfast, great location, and a bathtub ss well as shower!!

The location is amazing. The room had that Parisian feel with the big beautiful windows that opened up all the way. I felt like I was always a part of the party. The room is very basic but that’s all you need to appreciate all of its beauty. The only thing that caught me off by surprise was the temperate in the room... t’was a little warm, but that’s all Mother Nature, all of Paris was hotter than I expected. Thank you for a great experience.
Location top!!!

This Airbnb is in a hotel in the center of Paris. With the windows open, my friend and I could hear the hustle and bustle of the city. (We liked it, but don't stay here if you need silence to sleep.) The concierge was friendly and welcoming. The breakfast was delicious. The location was great (but you might want to figure out parking beforehand). All in all, a wonderful stay!

This was excellent lodging for the price point. The staff was friendly and helpful. The area was perfect...close to the Seine with an abundance of great cafes and a market across the street. The two adults and two teens in our group slept very comfortably. The breakfast was delicious. The hallways need to be repainted and recarpeted, but the room itself was fine. I highly recommend staying here!

It is centrally located, the staff was very welcoming and accommodating.  Being centrally located, the ambient noise from the street can be a bit loud, but if you like a party atmosphere with plenty of options for eating and entertainment then this is the place for you.

Great location!  Close to metro station and major sights!  Felt like a safe neighborhood!  The breakfast was very good!  Bar across the street was noisy but if you had a room in the back would probably be fine.

This sight is center of the city.
The room is the very clean and comfortable.
It was really good!

Best value in Paris . AMAZING location , great staff , spotlessly clean , just excellent value for money  . Also great breakfast .....not just coffee and baguette and jam but heaps of food and great selection . Recommend this place highly. I will return .
The location was very close to all the main touristic sites in Paris. The breakfast was amazing as well. It isn't anything fancy but I would stay here again. Great value for location.
I recommend, very nice people, good place,.

The staff was very open, communicative, helpful and friendly. The location is very good. At some point, new carpeting, wallpaper or paint, and air conditioning would make this stay really amazing. In the winter, spring or fall—when the temperature isn’t hot & you can close the windows, is probably a better time to visit the hotel; because there are cafes and a grocery store that have constant noise, however a single earplug will help out enormously. And if your are looking for casual dining nearby, the cafes are right there. The free breakfast was a lot better than I anticipated.
Fantastic location, very close to the Notre Dame. The rooms were equipped with all the essentials!
We got very fine rooms and with this hotel you are in one of Paris best locations. Lots of good restaurants, cafes etc. A great place for young people/couples!

I’m really glad I decided to stay here. The location is great and even though it is in the heart of the action, I found the room to be relatively quiet. The room and bathroom felt quite spacious and the bed and pillows were comfy. The option for an early check it is amazing and made a huge difference after 24 hours of travel and an early landing. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.

The place is good if you are not planning to spend any time in the room. It’s located perfectly, as a solo female traveler I felt safe and could access everything. 
At night the room was so hot I could not sleep and there was just one tiny fan. 
The guys were very sweet at the front desk and helpful!
Super location, some rooms may be better than others
This is a nice boutique hotel in the heart of St Germaine.  Great location and value.
Amazing location!! We really enjoyed our stay here - friendly staff and great neighbourhood. Would definitely stay here again.

Excellent location, outstanding service and quick responses.
Very clean, definetely I am comming back when visiting Paris!

This hotel is amazingly situated in Paris with everything you could want a short walk away. The rooms are pretty much efficiency rooms, but larger than some I’ve stayed in. Breakfast is good, and check-in couldn’t be simpler. Would definitely stay here again!

Perfect location! Older facilities, looked a bit different from the photos, but great view from the window and such an amazing location for the price. Would stay again. 

Note: They charge an additional fee if there’s 2 people in one room.
I had to cancel this booking a minute after booking as it was created in error. Thank you.

A pleasant surprise -- this is no ordinary hotel.  Hotel La Louisiane is an authentic piece of history in the 6th arrondissement where Sartre, Simone De Beauvoir, Albert Cossery and Miles Davis stayed.  The location in my opinion is the best in Paris.  If you liked how Paris was in your student days, this is your place.  My room had natural light, a comfortable desk and fresh air -- the perfect place to write or do homework. You can channel your inner writer and spend the savings on the excellent cafes and brasseries in the neighborhood. Thank you to Xavier Blanchot (the owner) for preserving the hotel. We will come again.
早餐的种类比较少 但是牛角包很好吃｡房间干净整洁｡
Great location, lots of restaurants nearby, close to many attractions such as Louvre, Orsay, etc. A great place for holidays! Highly recommended!
Lots of character, amazing location. Staff and amenities excellent.
We loved this place! The Hotel is great in a dreamlike Paris-Area. The room was simply equipped but very clean! Thank you for this stay!! :)
No frills. Very nice view from my room. A lot of restaurants outside. Safe neighborhood. Good breakfast.
Kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum. Konum olarak mükemmel

房子位置挺好,周围小饭馆很多,但也有点吵,好在关上窗户也就听不到了｡
房间不大,但设备齐备,早餐的牛角包好吃!

If you want to sleep in a bed covered in other people's pubic hair, this is the place for you. I discovered (unfortunately on the day of my departure when I pulled the sheets off the bed to do some stretches) that the bedsheets were covered in hairs of various colours.. short hairs.. curly hairs.. not matching the colour shape or quantity of my hair.. Most of the hairs were on the side of the bed I had not used, in fact the hairs were on all corners of the bed. Of course I felt deeply upset at having slept in an unhygienic bed. Did not respond to my first two complaints. When I escalated the issue, instead of apologising and offering a refund, he accused me of blackmail! What a charmer!

Everyone was helpful and made the stay smooth and comforting. 
Good people

My three-night stay went very smooth. I loved the convenient located and charming neighborhood and extended check-in and check-out times. The complimentary breakfast, 24-hour reception, and daily bedroom cleaning services added to a great experience. The staff members were  attentive e responsive with communication. I recommend it!
Perfect location, an hotel with a rich history of famous visitors in de district of St Germain.
Best location!

Extremely convenient and very vibrant area to stay in. Close to Metro and major tourist attractions. Safe area although can be a little noisy if you like retiring early at night or having a late morning lie in. The rooms & bathrooms are small but adequate. Carpets and furniture could do with some updating but the building is quant and charming. Staff are extremely helpful. It feels more like staying in a hotel but with a more personal touch. It’s not really self catering so expect to budget for eating out, but there’s no shortage of cafe’s close by that are open from early to late.

La nostra estada a l'hotel la Lousiane ha estat fantàstica.
Hotel molt net, acollidor i tranquil. Personal molt simpàtic i servicial i sobretot una magnífica situació en un barri ple de botigues, galeries d'art ... i a prop de tot a peu.
房源离卢浮宫很近,离巴黎圣母院不远,非常棒的地理位置,房间安静清洁,附近餐馆很多,离地铁站5分钟步行距离,非常方便｡总之性价比很高!
Super clean room and a perfect location for a single traveler. Definitely worth it! Totally recommended.
Great location and the bathroom was great!! It is a fab place to stay!

this hotel is located in a very centrak area close to restaurants and lots of art galleries. Lots to see within walking distance, including Notre Dame and Louvre. The rooms are simple and clean. they also have a free breakfast consisting mostly of croissants, yogurt, juice, and coffee. we were very pleased with our stay.
U like the location and everything was as expected
Our stay at Xavier’s hotel was great. It is a small but comfortable hotel in a great location in Paris. It couldn’t have been any better. 100% recommended
fantastic hotel in the heart of Paris. Easy walk to everything youd like to see
Great times, will definitely be back. No glitter glam or anything extra special but for the price and location conveniences key

Xavier’s place was great. The early check in was a life saver since our flight arrived in the early morning. We were given an option of bed type, and all the standard amenities. Room was clean,but no bells and whistles. Which was fine because we were out exploring the amazing neighborhood. We were within steps of the best cafes, shops, and nightlife. Thank you Xavier, we will return!
Great hotel. The staff was above and beyond accommodating and breakfast was great. I very much enjoyed my stay.
This place was a steal. Perfect location. Staff was kind and helpful, and it exceeded my expectations.
Simple, but fine.

The Louisiane is a nice boutique hotel very close to a great area of the bars and restaurants of St Germain and St Michele. The styling is very warm and welcoming, the rooms are very big, spacious, and clean. The bathroom was big and nice and the beds are very comfortable. It's close to a lot of restaurants, so you can get out of the hotel and be straight in the middle of the nightlife, and in case you want to stay in, there is a big supermarket just across the street, which is very convenient. But, being close to these streets also comes with a price - although the windows closing make it a bit better, the noise is still too loud. At night it's the bars and in the  morning the trucks unpacking. I would say that the price worths it, but I would have liked to know that in advance... If the noise doesn't bother you, then don't hesitate!

The private room was excellent; basically a full-service hotel-style room. Had its own French balcony and washroom with shower. Central to St. Germain cafes and restaurants. Can be a bit noisy outside at night if the weather is nice.
We had a wonderful stay.  The property was lovely and in a fantastic location.  Comfortable beds, and clean rooms.  We would definitely stay again.
Excelente hospedaje y ubicación
very friendly  people, helpful, the hotel is in a great location, highly recommend.

excellent location, the zone is very nice at all hours. very close to most tourist zones, by foot or by public transport. the staff was always helpful and gave good recommendations. the shower had no curtains so the bathroom got wet when taking a shower, but there were always towels available. you can tell that the hotel is old, but it is still very well kept. would definitely come back

Es un lugar muy céntrico, pero falta que pongan aire acondicionado para cuando sea temporada de verano ya que solo cuenta con ventiladores.
El desayuno que ofrecen es tipo americano pero suficiente para que empieces el día.

非常好的一个酒店,性价比超高｡是一个很有历史的家庭旅馆而非一个可以做饭的bnb｡几个管理者都非常的友善,给我钥匙让我们从早餐餐厅里拿了需要的酒杯刀叉盘子自己用｡他们没有停车场,在我提前询问要停车位之后,把门口的地方留出让我停车,没有要钱｡晚上街道很吵但是窗户隔音非常好｡
A perfect stay. Very kind and helpful hosts. Great location, 10-15mins walk to Cathedral Norte Dame de Paris and Musée du Louvre. Good restaurants just on the same street. A big carrefour is only 10 meters away. Everyone is very friendly.
Nice little hotel with a very friendly staff and good amenities. Everything as advertised, and it was in a great location.
Great location! Old rooms and old carpet. No air conditioner. Close to restaurants and night life. Location is the best part about this hotel. But rooms are not clean and it is quite old.
Perfect location for access to the food and the metro. Walking distance to some Paris highlights.

Lower your expectations and you’ll be fine here. There is no AC but the host said I could use a fan...though the only place to plug it in was ONE outlet which would mean I’d have to set the fan on the bed). The bathroom shower doors go halfway across shower so expect to be cleaning up water off the floor after you shower. The towels are so hard and rough it is like drying off with a potato sack. The location is perfect, but the restaurants across the street never close so prepare to not sleep at all. There is no TV in the room and the WiFi is shoddy. The refrigerator didn’t work (shocking) but let off enough heat to the shelf above that you could keep a towel warm. Breakfast was alright, felt more like prison food then actual breakfast (muffins, baguettes, old fruit, coffee). I bet fifty years ago this place was really nice.

This is in a fantastic neighborhood. Very lively, lots of great cafes and other places to eat. Great shopping. Easy walking distance to Notre Dame. 

The hotel's vibe is more comfy, quirky and worn rather than modern and sleek. We rented 3 doubles and one triple room. They were all different layouts. We were able to check into 3 of the rooms early, which was very welcome. Continental breakfast was included and they had excellent croissants and ripe fruit.  

When we return to Paris we will likely stay there again.
Ok
nice place with a very friendly service
A great location close to shops and restaurants.

The hotel room was booked for 5 grown men. They had placed 4 beds close together so space was tight, but the beds were very comfortable. No AC, but opening the windows at night was ok as the street below was quiet. 
Slow elevator, no problems there. Forgot to try the breakfast. 
Staff was extremely helpful and kind. 
No complaints. I recommend the place.
This is a historic hotel very close to the Louvre. We loved the location. The breakfast pastries were the best we had while in Paris.

I had an excellent time here. Transportation was no more than a 5-10min walk. The local bars and restaurants are excellent! Also check in went smoothly. Bathtub was a bit higher than I expected, but still nice & clean when I arrived.

Our stay here surpassed our expectations! Here's a detailed review:

Communication: Great. My interaction with the host was minimal, but they responded within the hour for the one message I had sent them just a few days prior to our check-in date. Check-in was done at the lobby of the hotel and was quick and easy.

Cleanliness: Great. This place is kept as clean as any other good hotel I've experienced in my travels in the United States. We had no issues of cleanliness. 

The place: Great. This room was spacious. There was two spaces, bedroom and bathroom. It was actually larger than what we had anticipated by the pictures. 

Amenities: Great. Make sure to step out onto the balcony, it was the best amenity! All the basics were good quality: towels, soap, bed, and sheets.
