The check-in at the lobby was also a nice touch, because it made us feel even more secure. We were so busy that we didn't use the Wi-Fi, but it was provided. 

Location: So great! This area of town is gorgeous during the day and night. There are so many great food options all hours of the day. There is also a clean, young, and vibrant atmosphere. My girlfriend and I were surprised to meet so many fellow Americans in the area, but all the people were so kind. It also feels very safe at night. When we first got there, a jazz band was playing on the street, it was so charming and sweet!

I'd strongly recommend this place for anyone considering staying at an AirBnb in Paris!
Muy buena ubicación, cómodo y buena relación precio calidad.
Very clean, spacious room in a great location!  The hosts were professional and helpful.  I would definitely recommend this place.
Clean. Good.
Super Lage! Die Unterkunft ist einfach gehalten, reicht aber wenn man den ganzen Tag in der Stadt unterwegs ist. Check-In und Kommunikation war gut und unkompliziert.

El lugar posee una excelente ubicación, el personal es muy amable y siempre buscan ayudarte, la limpieza es buena, los bocadillos de la mañana son deliciosos y en general me volvería a hospedar ahí y lo recomiendo.
Great location in the heart of St Germaine. Good basic accommodations. Thin walls so bring earplugs if you are a light sleeper. Helpful desk attendants.

The location is perfect!!!!! Not much time was spent in the rooms, other than to sleep as we were exploring Paris. You are in the middle of lots of shops, bars, restaurants (must try Paul's), therefore a night, you will hear people in the street. Still nothing too crazy. They are remodeling the place, which is nice.
Fantastic place to stay in a perfect location for a short time in Paris.
great value in the heart of paris
Vale a pena

I had a great stay at this hotel. The room was clean and had a balcony. Morning breakfast was a nice touch. I had trouble connecting to the Wi-Fi, but I'm sure they would have helped me if I had asked; I opted to stay disconnected and was able to use computers in the hotel lobby to send emails home. Everyone I interacted with on the staff spoke English, and they were all very friendly. It was in an excellent location in terms of restaraunts and things to do. Would definitely recommend staying here!
很方便,还有地方停车,以后去巴黎就选这里了
Top location and friendly staff.
tutto ok!
Location is great! Everything was in walking distance. There was an enjoyable night life. Plenty of shops and cafes and things to do. We enjoyed the breakfast. Very unique. Definitely want to return!
Localização perfeita em plena “rive-gauche « !!!

The location of the hotel is perfect for walking around Saint-Germain. It is very basic in terms of amenities & the room set up, no personal touches, but very private. The check-in/out times were perfect for an early arrival, no need to set up a specific key pick-up or drop-off, which was very convenient.
Just as advertised, very convenient!
Great location. Clean and safe.

Having returned from a weekend away with 14 friends and family, we have all raved about the fantastic location of Xavier’s hotel. Rooms are clean and a decent size. Staff were extremely, friendly, helpful and accommodating and responded to all my queries prior to and during our stay.
We will definitely be returning to stay there again!!

地理位置绝佳,在一条单行路里面,如果开车不是很好找,毕竟巴黎的路不好开,酒店给我留了停车位,这一点非常的棒!在巴黎的时候我选择把车停在酒店停车位,走路取参观景点,因为停车位实在是难找｡
房间的隔音效果不是很好,我没有带法国转换插头,前台借了我一个usb接口,帮了大忙｡房间很小,只有最最基本的设施和空间,但是胜在地理位置够好｡前台很热情~

Das Hotel ist wunderbar gelegen in mitten von Kaffees in St Germain. Die  Zimmer sind einfach aber dennoch äußerst nett und ruhig. Vielen Dank dass der private Parkplatz vor der Tür freigehalten wurde. Kommen gerne wieder!

What a wonderful location to stay in Paris!

So many restaurants and shops in walking distance and right in the heart of St Germain.

Thank you to Xavier and the team for having us

I was allocated a small room in this hotel - not like the one pictured in Airbnb. However, I chose not to comment at the time as I was only staying 2 nights. The hotel is in a very good and lively location, close to Metros and RER and with lots of bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets. Despite the liveliness of the locality, I did not find that my room was noisy during the night - though it was on the 6th floor. There was a slow but functional lift. Wifi was available, though not really steady. There was no television.  My room had a good bed and a bathroom with good quality towels. The whole could do with some refreshing of paint and carpeting. The room was clean.
Great location and lots of shops and cafes all around. I will definitely be back.
Amazing location and area, cool place, and nice people. 1 drawback that check in is only allowed at 2 pm
Very centrally located close to public transit and all the cute little bars in saint germain des pres

After an extra long day of travel & figuring things out with trains & such, it was so nice to find the Hotel Louisiane check in seamless, & Xavier responded quickly each time I communicated with him. The breakfast in the am was amazing! Aside from the best croissants and coffee I've ever had, there was even plain yogurt available, which was right down my alley. 

The hotel was within walking distance to a lot. Also, Cafe Le Buci serves great food all night in case you wake from jet lag and are looking for a late night meal. It's just around the block.

Thank you to Xavier & staff! Everything was great!
Great value for the price. Right in the heart of the downtown. Easy to walk everywhere you want!! Can't beat that...
Wonderful Hotel in the heart of the city. Very clean rooms and insane comfy beds.

I had a wonderful time at La Lousiane, the room is very spacious , clean with a comfy bed. The bathroom is great too, with a very good shower. The location is perfect, inthe heart of Saint Germain des Pres. Highly recommend.

Pros: 
- Great location. All the main landmarks and attractions were within walking distance. Also, the train station is located next to the hotel. We took a cab into the city which was a mistake since it cost close to 100 euros. You're also in the heart of Saint Germain so lots of great restaurants and bars within walking distance. Marais and Latin quarters were also very walkable.
- Value. We were traveling with an odd number (5) which made hotels prohibitively expensive. We booked last minute and were able to reserve 3 rooms at a very affordable price for the heart of Paris.
- Views: One of our rooms had an amazing view straight down one of the classic Parisian streets. This was a very pleasant surprise.
- Clean bathrooms: Crystal clean with no signs of mold and mildew. A lot of older hotels and AirBnbs have bathrooms riddled with mold and mildew. The bathroom was cleaner than most mid-high tier hotels I have stayed at.

Cons:
- Rooms are small with dingy carpets and no air conditioning. I believe they are undergoing renovations and the weather was cool enough where AC was a non-issue. We were provided a fan which was more than enough. Also, we were always out and about in the city and only really cared for comfortable beds which we were more than happy about.

Amazing stay and everything was like in the pictures. Only the couch/sofa could be more comfortable. Otherwise its a great location.

the hot water doesn’t work over half the time, the host will say it’s working fine when it’s not and when she comes to ‘have a look’ it’s coincidentally working again when you’re not in the apartment. Very nice Airbnb, terrible service as the shower will ruin plans for the whole day!

An amazing place to stay that’s close to the metro. Really modern flat in such an old school building. Restaurants and such are all around but not a noisy area. Will definitely stay here again when back in Paris!
We had a wonderfull weekend and Alissas appartment was a great place to retreat after a long day of exploring Paris. It was easy to travel around the city since the metro is right around the corner.

A cute little flat in a great location- easy to get around as not too far from train station. 

Cleanliness could have been better to highlight flats full potential.

ideal for a mini break.

This place was really beautiful and in a very nice suburban area. 5 min walk from the metro station. Only thing that really sucked was that the place wasn’t ready when I arrived and I had to leave and come back to get ready for the day. The apartment is also on the 4th floor with no elevator. Basically a sectioned off studio. Very classy and nice tho!
Really nice place and well located!

Een leuk appartement maar er valt veel te verbeteren op het gebied van hygiëne. De handdoeken stonken en er zaten zwarte haren in. Verder was het erg stoffig en kan het badkamermatje beter worden weggegooid. De afzuiging in de badkamer maakt geluid en is valt niet uit te zetten. Verder ruikt het gehele complex erg naar sigarettenrook. Het is een leuk uitziend appartement maar er is veel ruimte voor verbetering!

The flat is stylish, comfortable and quite spacious. The check- in was so easy. The location was great; so near the metro, bars and a couple of restaurants. The flat doesn’t have an elevator, but the walk upstairs gave us a chance to burn off some of that wine and food! Alissa was very responsive. Would stay again.
Unico punto sfavorevole ( ma non c’entra nulla con l’appartamento che era bellissimo e Alissa che è stata gentilissima ) è stata la mancanza di ascensore. Appartamento al quarto piano.
It was good
Very homey with a lot of attention to detail. Would highly recommend this spot.
We stayed over the weekend. A simple & stylish place to crash at while in Paris. Would recommend.
Spacieux, beau, central, gestion des arrivées et des départs très bien organisée.
Acceuil parfait, tout s’est très bien passé
Très bon séjour, les hôtes sont réactifs et l’appartement est superbe.

Airbnb parfait. Juste en face du métro. Très bien situé. De bonnes explications pour le checkin. Ressemblance parfaite aux photos. Canapé lit très confortable. Bien équipé. Très propre. Seul bémol, le bruit a l’extérieur et entre les autres appartements, ce n’est pas très bien isolé même si ça ne nous a pas trop posé de problème vu que nous ne passions pas nos journées dans l’appartement. Je reprendrais ce airbnb sans hésiter !

beau logement, un t2 en réalité, je m'attendais a beaucoup plus grand.
quartier très bruyant, dur la nuit sans boule quies.
sinon logement très propre et la conciergerie qui s'en occupe très efficace
Parfait ! L'hôte a prit la peine de nous donner beaucoup d'informations pour accéder au logement, ce qui est franchement un plus !

Très joli et bien placé en face d’un métro. Impeccablement propre. Bons matelas et literie. Entrée facile et excellente communication. Petit bémol et ce n’est pas de la faute de l’hôte mais sachez que l’emplacement entre deux grands boulevards fait que c’est très bruyant dehors, munissez-vous de bouchons pour les oreilles si vous êtes sensible au bruit 
.

Très bel appartement bien équipé.
Instructions très précises fournies pour mon arrivée.
Rien à redire !

Un appartement très agréable et propre, très bien situé.
Facile d'accès

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Célia , elle a été très disponible et très réactivité à nos demandes.
l'appartement est très bien positionné , très bon rapport qualité/prix.
c’est un magnifique logement, très bien situé qui est confortable même pour 6 personnes! je le recommande vivement et m’en souviendrai pour mes prochains voyages à Paris

Appartement très agréable, propre et très bien situé (au pied du métro).
Celia est très réactive et très précise dans ses indications, ce qui est très appréciable.
super appart !
Logement spacieux, agréable et idéalement situé à proximité de nombreux théâtres, escape games ...
Génial, cosy et sympa! Un appartement tellement bien localisé et super luxe!

Tres bel appartement cosy et bien décoré 
un we a paris parfait grâce a cet appartement avec tout le confort
Très bel appartement et idéalement placé
Bon emplacement et excellente réactivité de Célia

Très bon emplacement, appartement avec cachet en bon état et propre. Certes un peu bruyant à cause du carrefour mais tout à fait tolérable et c’est le prix à payer pour être aussi central. Très bonne communication et disponibilité des hôtes. Nous recommandons.
Tout était super sauf les perturbations avec le Wifi
Logement super bien situé et propre.
Bon location! Tout est bien!
Pour un weekend avec famille de 4, très agréable, très pratique d'accès avec un superbe emplacement pour vivre Paris. Merci
Très bel immeuble qui est idéalement situé. L'appartement est agréable à vivre, spacieux et lumineux. Les matériaux sont de bonnes qualité.

Great stay at Celia’s appartement.
Clean, modern and convenient.

-素晴らしいｱﾊﾟﾙﾄﾏﾝです!最高滞在ができました｡またぜひ利用させていただきたいです｡
- 立地が最高です｡ﾒﾄﾛの駅を出て目の前がｱﾊﾟﾙﾄﾏﾝで､とても便利です｡
- とてもお洒落な建物で､ｲﾝﾃﾘｱもとてもお洒落でした!
本当にありがとうございます!
Nice appartement , clean and functionnal :)
a very charming, well sited and maintened ! I def recommend
I liked everything, I advise)

Tuvimos una estancia muy agradable, sin duda lo recomiendo ampliamente. 
Muy buena ubicación y piso muy cómodo. 
La próxima vez que visite Paris no dudaría en volver a reservarlo
A great place, and stylish. Fast communication from Celia. We loved it and would book again!

We were very pleased with our Air Bnb in Central Paris. It was a convenient location to almost all major attractions and the Metro was right outside the door. The hosts were very cordial and tried everything possible to make our stay a very pleasant one. Check in and check out were very convenient and the hosts even accommodated our early check in. Their responses were quick and their tips were useful. It was a great stay in Paris and we would definitely stay there again in the future.
Precioso

It was a wonderful experience in Paris, great location, landlady is nice, quiet clean flat with wonderful kitchen. The only one thing is the geyser is slow to boil but it not a big deal. It is a really nice choice to live in when u visit Paris.
房子位置不错楼下就是地铁站超市很方便,中国超市老佛爷也不算太远,走过去也行｡然后进楼下面两道锁,坐电梯上楼也有两道锁,还是比较安全的!

整体体验良好｡地理位置优越,紧邻地铁站｡家具､炊具齐全｡居住舒适便捷,和房主沟通交流顺畅,在允许的情况下接受了稍稍提前入住且提供了退房后存放行李处｡
缺点:卧室内wifi信号太弱｡热水器的热水一次性只够两到三人使用,多的要等加热｡热水壶有点脏｡厨房柜内提供的过期茶叶､食物没有清理掉｡
Beautiful flat in Marais area. Clean, tidy and modern facilities;  with local amenities and transport links nearby. Definitely a great option when visiting the City of light.

Beautifully decorated apartment although the outside of the building was under renovation. Nice location if the trains were working (went during the strike unfortunately) as the stop is right outside the door.

Clean, easy check in and quick response from the host. Felt it was a little far from the center of the attractions. Metro is right outside of the apartment but we were visiting during the strike. WiFi was unpredictable during our stay.  Overall, we enjoyed our stay.

The flat is conveniently located right next to a major subway junction between several lines. This made getting around Paris extremely easy with the Paris Visite tickets (the passes are worth it if you plan to use public transport throughout the day). The elevator is extremely small and slow, but we didn't mind walking the stairs anyways. From the pictures we envisioned a slightly larger flat (consists of 1 bedroom, and one common/kitchen area) but we had no problems sleeping our family of 7 in the 3 double beds and infant cot. It made a great base for our family to explore the city.
Family trip with kids over 10. Great location! Right next to M4, M8, and M9 lines. Market is around the corner and additional shopping for your needs. We were very comfortable.

We had an excellent time in the apartment. The location is situated very central. Shops , bakery, restaurants and bars within a few meters. Metro right in front of the door.  Helpful tips of the owner made our stay perfect! Thank you!

Great apartment. Clean and comfortably furnished. Very well situated: metro station in front of the house, sights to be reached on foot, many restaurants and shopping facilities in the immediate vicinity.
Very good communication with the host.

Had a wonderful weekend away in Paris for my friends Birthday. There were 4 of us and the apartment was perfect. Clear instructions on how to get into the apartment and great communication from the host. We loved the style of the apartment and the architecture of the building, just a shame about the scaffolding but it didn’t effect the enjoyment of our stay! Very central location and just a short walk or metro ride to popular attractions. Would definitely stay here again if coming with a group of people to Paris!

Thank you! We enjoyed our stay at your place. Everything was super clean. The bed sheets, pillowcase, shower towels. Beds and pillows are very comfortable, even the sofa beds! Kitchen has everything you need.  Also the floors were clean, bathroom. I had my three children and it was so nice to feel comfortable in a clean space. 
During our stay there was construction outside the building, unfortunately block our outside view from the windows. But this was not an issue since we love the inside space. 
On our last night I had an issue with washer I didn’t know how to stop the washing cycle the wording is in french. But Celia answered my message right away and she even came to the apartment late at night to fix the problem! I appreciated that a lot. 
Location is perfect you have the metro in front of the apartment, there is also stores/ restaurant across the street. 
Overall it was a pleasant stay.
Thanks again,
-Margarita

The flat was a great size, especially for Paris. The location was so conveniently located in front of a subway entrance and there were so many restaurants nearby. The beds were a good size. And the two most important things to me: quick response to questions which was greatly appreciated AND giving us a place to leave luggage after checkout which saved us such a headache. So grateful for that!

Great comfortable and stylish space, very comfortable and literally right outside the door is the metro.

Very accommodating; host greeted us at the door and even allowed me to keep my luggage for a dew hours after check-out.

Such a beautiful apartment! My Mother, sister and I had a wonderful time staying here and loved the location and the rooms. Celia’s checkin instructions were very easy to understand and there was prompt communication and responses which I appreciated. I would definitely stay here  again! Thank you so much!
Great location and nice apartment.  Host was great and was especially helpful with local tips!

I picked this place after seeing all the previous reviews of this place, thought it would be a great stay for me and my family but it was worse than I expected.

First the location, If you want to commute to different areas of Paris, this would be an ideal location as metro is right in front of the main door of the building otherwise, its not a great location as we felt unsafe to go out at night time, The building is old and we didn't see many people in there, The light in the hallway of the building and near the lift were turned off and we had to find the switch to turn it on and it automatically turns off after some time, this was an issue for us as during night time, it was kind of dark.

I had to use different codes to go through different doors to finally reach the apartment. There is a lift but it is extremely slow, old, and small, I had to walk up and down most of the time. The code to blue door didn't work twice during my stay

There were some renovation going on so we couldn't open the windows to see the street view. Host told us to open the window when we are home but opening the window did nothing as the workers wrapped the building for renovation so there was no way to see anything outside and not much airflow, we felt claustrophobic and it was too hot inside even with the fans provided.

Amnesties provided were OK but not of hotel standard, linens provided were a bit of dirty. The host was nice enough to provide some tips about nearby restaurants and supermarket but didn't give any check-out instructions in advance, I had to ask to get the instructions.
Celia is extremely responsive and friendly host.  We enjoyed every aspect of our stay.
I was staying 3 nights in this house. The host is friendly and quick response. The location was good just a step to subway station. Many black peoples in this area.
We had such a lovely stay at this stylish, clean, and accessable apartment. We wouldn't change a thing. Thank you!
公寓很漂亮 设备齐全 只是在房间里会连不上wifi 房东很亲切

Check-in is easy, the space is immaculate,  communication was quick and easy, the metro is literally right outside the door, and there is an amazing pastry shop around the corner. It will be even better when the construction is finished. We were never bothered by noise, just the fact the scaffolding obscures the view.

We loved our stay at this Airbnb. We got there quite late at night and the beds and pull-out couches were made up and ready to go. The flat was stylish and immaculate. Paris was in the midst of a heat wave and there is no air-conditioning, but Celia had provided fans. We got very clear check-in instructions that made checking in a breeze, and Celia was very timely in all of her responses to our questions. We appreciated the washer and were able to easily clean our clothes while there which was nice during our two-week Europe trip.
A fine venue

Celia’s place was lovely, extremely clean, perfectly located for easy cruising around the city, comfortable and in a fun neighborhood. We had a wonderful time and would happily stay there again next time we are in Paris.
The apartment was gorgeous, very comfortable with modern amenities. The wifi was sketchy in the bedroom and the street noise/construction was pretty loud but Celia was super responsive and helpful.
We enjoyed our visit. A couple of things could do with some attention. Overall, a good stay.

Very cool Parisian apartment with cool ceilings and lots of windows. Spacious living room and nice simple bedroom. Steps to the Metro made getting around a breeze. Bathroom and shower were quite nice.  My wife loved it -

Perfect home base for exploring Paris! We traveled as a family of five (my wife and I, plus children ages 15, 13 and 11), and the apartment accommodated us very comfortably. We ate out most meals, but it was nice to have a small kitchen for when we didn't. The washer/dryer came in handy for doing some laundry before we moved on from Paris. The best part, though, is location. The flat is located in a great neighborhood (we felt very safe), and a Metro stop serving three lines is just out the front door of the building. Very convenient to get to anywhere in the city from this location. We never saw the hosts, but they were very responsive and helpful throughout our stay (and before we arrived). Highly recommend.
Beautiful flat, in a really great area and right by the station. There was also a proper hairdryer and towels provided. Highly recommend staying here.

Very nice apartment right on a metro station. Celia is a great host, always replying right away to our requests before and during our stay. They accommodate early check in and late check out if the space is available and if not, there is a safe place to leave your luggage! Great plus! We were traveling with 4 children and the space worked out perfectly. I would highly recommend it.

Communication - so fast responses to my questions! Location is great and check in is so easy and fast. Apartment has everything you need.  A great stay and value of money. Don’t hesitate to book this apartment!

Celia’s place is wonderful. Very close to the metro with multiple overlapping metro lines makes it easy to get around the city. Lots of restaurants within a 10 min walk. Most attractions in the city center are also walkable. The place was easy to find and check in was a breeze. The flat was spotless. Celia was very responsive. Would definitely stay here again.

Elegant apartment located in a good neighborhood and very close to tube station. 

The host is always available and collaborative.

Overall, good value for money.

We really enjoyed our time at Celia’s. Having the Metro stop literally right out front was incredibly helpful, and we used it quite a bit - with only one regret - taking it during rush hour one a.m. (it was like a can of sardines and my daughter became nauseas and we had to get off early) was not smart. On occasion, while either entering and departing the building, there were a few ‘interesting individuals’ nearby, but we never felt threatened. All in all, a very nice stay.

Apartment was exactly as described, beautifully clean and nicely furnished. Also had nice touches like coffee machine and spare bedding and pillows etc 

Great friendly communication meant very quick replies to my questions, easy check in and some local tips too.

Central location which is pretty lovely and situated next to a metro stop. Good choices of local cafes/bars, restaurants and late night food  (we were visiting for a concert and getting fast food after the concert at midnight was fine in the local area).

Would stay again.

Great little flat. Everything inside looked and felt new and clean. The description of the property is spot on! If you like this area of Paris, you'll love this apartment. Check-in and check-out was very easy and convenient. Host is wonderful!

Great apartment! Very beautiful and very Parisian! Just so you know, the area it is in is fine during the day, but a little bit sketchy at night— lots of groups of people on the street that are probably fine, but a little unsettling! Communication is great too! Close to a nice Metro and many Boulangeries for breakfast!

We spent 3 days at Celia’s place and couldn’t have been more pleased with our choice. The apartment provided ample space for the three of us, as well a perfect location to discover Paris. Celia provided excellent directions for a self-check in, and followed up quickly with any questions that we had. 

While the apartment is located on a busy street, we never had an issue of noise at night. The apartment is well located to supermarkets and restaurants. If you’re looking for a place to stay in Paris this is an excellent choice.

I found this flat to be quiet cozy and a great central location. We had a nice size group of internationals and everyone with their individual standards were content and I would definitely stay here again.
A great apartment - very safe and secure. A bit smaller than expected (from the pictures) but it suited 3 adults and a baby just fine - the location was great!

Celia’s place sleeps 4 friends very comfortably. The bathroom is pretty spacious and the shower works really well. The bedroom bed was pretty firm for our liking but still fine. Very clean. Great location. Less than a 15 minute walk to nice bar areas. Walked or took a quick train ride to most places around the city. I would recommend and would stay again.

깔끔하고 아기자기 예쁘고 널찍하고 넘 좋았어요! 역 바로 앞이라서 교통도 편리했어요~
5월이지만 쌀쌀해져서 경량패딩까지 입었는데 숙소 라지에이터가 따뜻해서 어머니가 마음에 들어하셨어요ㅎㅎ 호스트 답변도 빠르고 친절했어요!

This apartment is in a fantastic location with a metro stop right outside the front door (but it is not noisy at all) and there were restaurants and stores all around that were easy to walk to.  It's about a 20 minute walk from the heart of the Marais.  The apartment was very clean and the beds were very comfortable.  The shower was a nice size and the apartment was very comfortable for three adult women staying there.  It's a very secure building with many locked doors, so we also felt very safe.  We were given very detailed information prior to our stay with pictures, on how to access the doors into the building and apartment and there is a lift, which is an added bonus.  I highly recommend this apartment for families with children (there's one main bedroom and two comfortable pull-out couches in the living area), three adults traveling together or a couple.  The hosts were very helpful and quick to respond with helpful information.

The location is good , it was easy with a metro station gate just close by . It was close to railways station through metro as well . 

We found the space a bit less . We had 2 kids and needed the 2 sofa bet to be used which left very little space in the living area. 

Host was very responsive and helped out whenever we raised any issue
Ceila was a great host to our family. She was very responsive and had a great apartment in the heart of North Marais.

Our family of 6 had a great stay at Celia’s place. It’s super conveniently located and self check in was smooth and easy - although we arrived early. The flat is stylish and clean and it’s easy to fall in love with it. Celia also provided useful tips for restaurants. A great place to stay!

Appartamento molto bello, in centro e con tutti i servizi a portata di mano. Risposte rapide e consigli ! 
Lo consiglio !

We loved this place!
The layout is great. It was just the right size. There’s a nice big table to hang out around and everything was very clean. The bathroom was clean and nicely appointed (it had great tile work) and the beds were comfortable.
It felt very safe and secure.
Check in was flawless. Celia sent perfect instructions (including pictures, which was so helpful when our taxi got a bit lost). There are codes and a lock box to get in. So convenient. 
It’s in the northern area of the Marais district with a metro stop right outside the building.  There are good neighborhood restaurants and lots of boutiques and bars all around. It feels very much like a neighborhood and not at all touristy. A true taste of Paris.

We loved staying in this beautiful Parisian apartment with shutter windows and beautiful tasteful decor
It was located right next to the station which is very convenient 
The only fault is that it is located on a busy road so can get quite noisy but otherwise loved the place

This apartment is exactly as advertised! Beautiful, stylish, and clean! It is in the heart of the city with so many things right outside your doorstep. So many cafes to choose from! The host was very responsive and so helpful! We will stay here next time we come to Paris!

Celia’s place was much better than expected. It was exactly as pictured with even more room. Clean and updated, quiet while sleeping, large shower with plenty of space to move in bathroom for four girls sharing. The apartment has multiple outlets which was helpful. It is in a wonderful location with the metro right outside the door which made it easy when traveling with luggage. Celia was always prompt with communication and check in and check out couldn’t have been easier. Thank you for a wonderful place to stay!!
Stylish french apartment
非常好 进门要按四次密码 感觉很安心 特别安全 房东超热情

This place is one of the few that actually looked just like the advertised photos. We really enjoyed our stay here. The hosts were super communicative and helpful. We had everything we needed with a baby in tow and found transportation easy from the apartment. I have stayed at many Airbnb’s and this one is top notch on all counts.
Top host!

Clean, airy and bright apartment in a great central location. 
Bedding is very comfortable and warm-a nice treat when away from home.
The wifi doesn’t work in the bedroom but the signal is okay in the living room space.
Great location!
Celia’s place is very well kept and very comfortable to stay at. Location is key and communication was great.

We have just returned from three nights at Celia’s Apartment. Check in was effortless due to helpful screenshots to gain access. 

The apartment was lovely and clean, a cot and high chair provided for us as requested. The shower was lovely and the bed very comfy. We actually ended up sleeping on the sofa bed so to not wake the baby and that too was also comfortable. Would benefit from a lamp in the living space, it was all or nothing with the lighting! 

It is a 10/15min walk into Le Marais, a good location with a little supermarket opposite and the metro and main road for the buses. 

Great host, reponds almost immediately if you need her! The place was Perfect for what we needed, thanks for a lovely stay. would stay again and recommend.

Wow! Couldn’t recommend this place enough! 
Amazing and stylish apartment in a fab location! Lots of bus stops and the metro near by! We walked most places. 
Comfortable living areas, bathroom and bedrooms. 
The only suggestions I could make are..... (no biggies)
1) prehaps having an actual oven (there is only a hob and microwave)
2) When accommodating for 5-6 people you need to make sure the WiFi can tolerate up to 5-6 people. WiFi was a bit temperamental. 
3) Same with the water, we had to contact Celia with regarding no hot water. The hot water had run out and we had only used the shower on 2 occasions. She replied very quickly and it was soon resolved after we had boosted it. 

Would 100% return! Thank you!
Beautiful place!
Amazing apartment! Really good location and awesome interior.
Celia's apartment was lovely, cozy, and well situated to where we wanted to eat and shop in Paris. Communication and check-in was great!

The apartment was stylish, comfortable and warm, and we felt safe and secure in the apartment. The bathroom was lovely and beds comfortable with lovely linen and plenty of pillows. Views were great and the double glazed windows kept out the heat and the noise.

Amazingly location for a very cultural good in Paris. Very close to underground. Gorgeously decorated space with Parisian flair. Celia was prompt in her response. Would love to return to this apartment again someday ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Si necesitas moverte por la zona esta bien , pero si vas de turismo hay lugares mejores , mas limpios y agradables en barrios con una atmosfera mas fresca

We had a lovely (Email hidden by Airbnb) munincation prior to arrival and then during our stay was excellent. The photo's show the apartment accurately and it is a clean and well presented apartment.
The access with the elevator was great with lugguage up to 4th floor.
The Metro directly outside the front entrance was very convenient, and it was our main mode of transport in Paris.
The wifi was weak in the bedroom from our experience, and just something to be aware of, although in the living area it was okay. This is not something that would stop me staying here but to be aware of.
We would happily recommend staying here!
The apartment is in a nice location walking distance to the main attractions but not to close so there’s a ton of people around all the time.

Celia's apartment is gorgeous-- clean and well-designed, it looks even more beautiful and Parisian than pictures.  The apartment is clean, organized, and perfectly decorated.  The beds were comfortable and our family of two adults and three children were comfortable in the space.  We were a little disoriented by the entry, but once we figured out the doors and lights in the hallway, we felt right at home.  I noted concerns about safety in one of the other reviews, so want to point out that our family of five (with three small children) felt perfectly safe in the neighborhood, which is lively and eclectic.  It certainly feels more real and urban than other parts of Paris, which I found to be a plus.  Metro access is awesome, and I recommend visitors check out the Terroirs d' Avenir a couple of blocks away for an amazing market street experience.  Celia is a very responsive host and was quick to answer any questions we had about check-in or logistics.
非常nice的房东 很好的入住体验 就是枕头太软像靠垫 其他都不错

We enjoyed our stay! The apartment is right near a station for the underground, which made getting around very easy. We loved the location and there were many places to eat and grocery stores nearby. We also loved the details on the walls of the apartment. It was our first trip to Paris and it felt very Parisian. We did not have any difficulty with noise from the street as it was late fall and we kept the windows closed. We loved seeing city life from the windows.

We had an absolutely amazing time staying at Celia's place. It's a very  beautiful apartment in a beautiful building in a great and very centrally located neighborhood of Paris.  The pictures are all accurate and everything was exactly as described in the listing. Celia was an extremely considerate host, was very easy to get a hold of and has accommodated every request we had. Check-in and check-out was as easy as it gets. We will definitely stay here again next time we visit the city.

You can’t get a better location than this! Easy to walk or take the Metro to most places. There were detailed instructions on how to get into the flat which was necessary because of the amount of doors involved. In general it was a good experience and I would stay here again

Celia's place was beautiful and as photographed in the Airbnb entry. It was a wonderful place to stay with super easy access to the train and short walks to the Maria's, museums, and Opera Garnier. Celia was super easy to deal with.
Very cute, clean apartment.  A little noisy due to the location on a very busy street.
Had a good stay at Celia's place! Would recommend
We traveled to Paris a party of 6, 2 parents+4 kids. Our stay at the apartment was very nice, clean, spacious, excellent location, responsive host. Great experience.
Nice appartement in lively neighbourhood. Just near le Marais and centrally located
Excellent response times for all of our questions. Good location. Easy to use metro. Clean and safe portacot and highchair were provided on request without any issues.
Lovely apartment in a central location & Beautiful Parisian building with safe and secure entry. We very much enjoyed our stay here and it was be perfect base for exploring the city.
Everything was perfect! we had a lovely stay!
Great location. It was a little loud as it was a busy intersection but the Metro was right there and a stop for the Hop on Hop off was just down the street.
great location, great place, easy access to restaurants and attractions.

This place felt very Parisian and there were lot's of shops, restaurants and most importantly the Metro stop right out front.  Celia and her daughter were very responsive and helped us with directions to reach attractions and suggestions for dining. Her place was very clean and bright and we felt safe in her home.
Great location and slept 4 people comfortably. Space was clean.
Great location and cute flat
Great location; clear communication and instructions

Celia is a wonderful host who has great communication with guests.  The apartment is beautiful and very comfortable. It is in a perfect location with train station at your doorstep. We loved opening the windows and listening to Paris life outside. We loved our stay in this apartment and wish we had stayed much longer.  Would highly recommend. Enjoy Paris!
Thanks for a wonderful stay! A beautiful apartment and a fantastic host. Can’t wait to stay again!
We.enjoyed our stay!
Super nice and beautiful apartment. Only thing is that there is noise from the street. Otherwise it is super nice

The flat is in a very central location right next to the Metro station with very easy access to all the main attractions. The host was very helpful and quick to answer any communications. Lovely spacious and clean flat. Would definitely recommend staying here for a group or family. Thank you

Celia's place is located very conveniently as there is a subway exit literally in front of her apartment door. This subway station also has 3 different subway lines that go to many of the tourist spots in Paris so location-wise I cannot stress how easy it is to travel during your stay. Celia was very responsive before, during, and after our stay that we felt that we could always reach her when needed. The apartment itself was gorgeous. There was one bedroom with a king sized bed and one living room area with 2 pull-out queen sized beds. This apartment can easily house 6 people. There was a fully furnished kitchen with a coffee machine and pot for making tea, plates, cups, utensils and wine opener. I would recommend Celia's place to anyone visiting Paris even in groups (we were 4-6 people) for the value and the prime location.
Thank you we had a pleasent stay!

This Airbnb couldn’t have been more perfect! It was absolutely beautiful and the location was perfect. The metro being right out front made getting around the city especially easy. The hosts were responsive and very kind. We would definitely stay here again in the future. Thank you for such a great experience!!
Un lugar cómodo, seguro y lleno de luz. Recomendable
Well located apartment and very clean

We are a family of four with two teenage boys and thought this was a great flat.  It was convenient to the metro, a few museums, grocery, cafes, etc.  We could walk to the Seine to Notre Dame and San Chapel, although you can take the metro too. The place was clean and well equipped.  Our host was responsive.
Fantastic apartment in a great location. Loads of space for two adults and two teenagers and France were even thoughtful enough to win the World Cup while we were there which made a great atmosphere!

We traveled to Paris with our 3 teenagers, so 5 adults and our stay here was perfect!  I’m a designer so I have to admit the interior and architecture werenwhat sold me, but I’m so happy with my choice!  There’s literally a metro stop right in front of the building which made it very convenient. The flat is gorgeous With a great use of space. 
It is on a very busy street,  but the windows are double paned and we didn’t have trouble sleeping.  There are many charming restaurants across the street and to the right which stay open late. Bank next door, market a few doors down. What else could we have needed!?  Thanks so much for a great stay!

This is wonderful apartment with beautiful views and excellent location if you want to be right by the Metro in a vibrant neighborhood. We found the space to be just right for us—would definitely come back!

A amazing and stylish apartment central to everything you want to see in Paris! Great correspondence and anything you require , is seen to straight away. Felt like a home and the lift is great bonus especially when you have a pram!

Celia’s place was wonderful with close proximity to many different areas of interest. Walk to Seine was 1 mile with many places of interest along the way. Apartment was immaculate and very stylish. We had 4 people and we were very comfortable. Building was very secure. The street is very busy so for those wanting quiet and seclusion, it would be best to look elsewhere. For those that enjoy the energy of Paris; cafes, shops, restaurants, parks are all just outside your front door. For some really great shopping a couple of blocks away- try Rue de Bretagne! We can’t wait to come back.
If hot weather beware that night life and traffic is very close and noisy when windows open. Stunning apartment. Comfortable to sleep six.

Beautiful Parisian apartment that is steps away from the metro. It is very clean and stylish and the hosts were so responsive and always made sure I was doing okay. They even allowed me a late check out! Great for larger parties of 6 because there are three beds. I could totally see this place as a bachelorette party pad.

A perfect example as to why i prefer an AirBNB to a hotel. Check in, security, accommodations. It is all top of the line. A little on the pricy side for its proximity to landmarks and areas of interest but still VERY highly recommend. I would stay here again without a doubt!

This visit, we were two couples, and all four of us loved the apartment. Beautifully decorated, lots of light, clean and cozy—yes even the pull-out couch! Great location with a grocery store and great restaurants just below, and within comfortable walking distance to the very center of everything! Self-check-in was a breeze and the building is lovely.

The noise of the Parisian traffic definitely reaches the fourth floor, but we use earplugs (us) and a white-noise app (the other couple) to sleep, so we managed just fine.

The house is beautiful but it's quite small for 4 people, there is only one tiny bathroom. 

We love the location because it's so convenience but we couldn't sleep for all the nights we stay here because the apartment is located in a main street and it's super super noisy most of the nights and days. It's even worst on the weekend because there are so many restaurant and bar around the are and people partying. 

The place isn't too safe because there were many homeless people out side the main door. Sometime  a homeless lady tried to get in after us during the time we leave the house. It's so obvious if we let her in, she was gonna do something bad. 

Overall, the price and value isn't match. Too expensive for the experience.

This is a beautiful apartment with all the needed amenities.  There were 4 adults staying and it was plenty of room.  The apartment can get a little warm as there is no AC BUT we were given fans and there was always a nice breeze when the windows were open.  The only slightly negative was it was a bit noisy with the windows open.  Lots of sirens.  But hey...what do you expect in the city? :)  We loved our stay and would definitely recommend this apartment.
Very much enjoyed our first ever Airbnb

The appartment is very nicely furnished, clean and well located. Bathroom and kitchen seem brandnew. It was a bit small for six people but we managed. A metrostation is right in front of the building, which made it easy to get around and there are some nice cafés, restaurants, a supermarket and some fast food chains close by.
Everything was amazing!! Great location also!!!

Enjoyed our stay at Celia’s. The place was spacious enough for three adults (thanks to the two pullout couches). It is walking distance to many great restaurants and right by the metro. One thing to note is that it is very loud at night due to street noise, so you will want to bring air plugs if you are a light sleeper.
It was a delight staying at Celia´s place! Very clean and tidy, communication was always fast and helpful. Highly recommend her flat to stay in Paris.

Location, size, and worth!  This place had it all.  This wonderful, cozy yet spacious apartment was such a delightful place to stay for my family of three.  It could comfortably fit more, and it was in a fantastic location.  The metro stop was right at your front door.  The Louvre, Notre Dame, and much more were just a few minutes walk away.  Nearby are a lot of restaurants and a local supermarket/convenience store for all your needs.

The apartment was very clean, and the tenants we met in the building were very helpful when we asked for any advice or assistance.  Celia & Michaël were were very quick and effective with their responses, and they were more than helpful to accommodate us with our check-in and check-out times.  We are very grateful for that!

While our stay was short, the apartment had all the amenities needed for a more lengthy stay.  We were more than pleased with our trip here in Paris, and much of it had to do with coming to this apartment in the evening to relax and soak in the city.  We will surely stay here again if we get a chance in the future.  Thank you!

Schöne, saubere, gut ausgestattete Unterkunft, 
wir warten mit 3 Teenagern da.
Gut gelegen für Ausflüge, Metro direkt vor der Haustür.
Einziger kleiner Nachteil: sehr befahrene Strasse, auch nachts.
Aber mit geschlossenen Fenstern kein Problem.
Gerne wieder.
Beautiful apartment for a family city break. Very accommodating host, allowed us to store our bags for the day and all questions were answered straight away.
Super schöne Wohnung, sehr hell, was man garnicht auf den Fotos genau sieht ist die Möglichkeit eine super schöne typische Pariser Aussicht aus dem Fenster zu bekommen :)
El departamento es hermoso y con varias líneas de subtes en la puerta lo que hace que uno pueda movilizarse fácilmente para todos lados.  La atención de Celia, Lena y Michael es excelente.

This apartment is truly amazing! It’s SO beautiful and typical Paris apartment. I loved it! I also loved the location. It’s very good and the supermarket is right downstairs even as several restaurants. Celia recommended me some good restaurants wich were so wonderful! Thank you for that Celia. It’s just so nice to walk outside in the morning and have a breakfast just in the street/downstairs. The apartment was really clean and if I had a question Celia replied so quick. Not only me but also my friends are definitely coming back to this apartment the next time we are in Paris. Thanks Celia for everything.
pas de commentaire
Très bon quartier et logement. Tout s’est bien passé !

2eme semaine que je passe dans le logement de Tom. L’appartement est fonctionnel et bien situé. Tom est hyper réactif et arrangeant. Rien à redire. 
Je recommande ++

Tom  est très réactif et il a pris soin de vérifier que j 'étais bien installée. Le studio correspondait à mes attentes et le canapé lit est très confortable.  Le logement est fonctionnel.   Le studio est idéalement situé puisque proche de la gare d'Austerlitz et la gare de Lyon.
Petit studio très propre fonctionnel, design sympa, très bon rapport qualité prix,

Très bon séjour, Tom est disponible et réactif.
Nespresso et Netflix à disposition, une super attention.

Ce super appartement rénové avec goût est parfait pour un petit weekend dans la capitale. Il est très bien équipé : un canapé lit très confortable, Nespresso, Netflix. Il est idéalement situé, et au calme dans une petite courette intérieur. Tom est très sympathique et réactif, il répond dans la minute. J'y reviens en novembre et je recommande fortement.

Je suis resté un mois pour le travail, j'ai passé un bon séjour dans cet airbnb, il est petit mais très bien agencé, le lit est très confortable. À seulement 5 minutes du métro. 
Tom est très réactif quand vous avez besoin de quelques choses. 

Je recommande
Un petit studio d'une propreté impeccable, bien agencé, à la décoration sobre et élégante. Merci à Tom qui est un hôte prévenant et réactif !

Tom est un hôte très disponible par téléphone et soucieux que le séjour se passe bien. L’appartement est bien situé et fonctionnel. Les odeurs et les bruits du restaurant qui jouxte l’appartement ont été un peu gênants compte tenu des fortes chaleurs mais je recommande néanmoins ce logement pour son rapport qualité/prix.
Très bien, propre, bien placé, hôte très réactif et accueillant.
Très bon week end, le studio est propre, conforme aux photos, quartier tranquille, je recommande

Le logement proposé par Tom est OK. Petite surface mais bien équipée/optimisée. Quartier sympa avec de bons restaurants asiatiques. Quelques déboires à mon arrivée pour récupérer les clés, car la consigne de La Poste en face de l'immeuble était fermée, mais Tom a été très réactif et s'est déplacé pour m'amener un double. Deux petits bémols : 1. Lorsque le canapé convertible est déplié, il est difficile d'ouvrir la porte d'entrée, ce qui n'est pas très rassurant en cas de problème. 2. La cour intérieur est encombrée des poubelles de l'immeuble, assez près de la porte d'entrée du studio, ce qui est moyen en terme de cadre...

Un super airbnb, proches de toutes commodités et du métro !
A l'intérieur d'une petite cours intérieur qui nous protèges des bruits de la rue.
Je conseil fortement a tout voyageur en recherche d'un toit ! :)

Parfait l’appartement est en très bon état neuf et moderne confort assuré avec tout le nécessaire écran plasmas Netflix toute les chaînes bien situer à proximité de différentes stations de métro et commerce Monoprix carrefour la poste juste en face une banque aussi très bien sécurisé avec de portes de sécurité et bien isoler autonome
Te responde al momento de preguntarle cualquier cosa, el estudio esta muy limpio (tal y como se ve en las imágenes) y  la recepción es adecuada. Zona bien comunicada con metro y autobuses

Appartement très propre, soigné, fonctionnel et bien équipé, en bonus, les petites attentions des propriétaires.

Très belle endroit calme et apaisant, hôtel très compréhensible et attentionnée, je vous recommande  .

Le logement de Marine est très agréable, parfaitement propre et il y a beaucoup de petites attentions pour les visiteurs . Nous avons pu dormir paisiblement. Si besoin, nous y retournerons les yeux fermés.

Séjour très agréable, appartement d’une propreté impeccable avec tous les équipements nécessaires.

Superbe séjour dans ce magnifique petit cocon ! Marine est très réactive lorsque nous avons une question. L’arrivée comme le départ se sont fait en autonomie. J'ai passé un séjour très court mais j'ai été surpris par l'organisation et la souplesse de Marine, la propreté irréprochable du logement. Celui ci est bien équipé, très agréable.

Ce n’est pas un hasard si cela fais deux fois que je retrouves dans la liste des commentaires ! Le petit cocon de Marine est si charmant qu’il est difficile de s’en défaire ! Merci encore une fois Marine !

Arrivée en autonomie très explicite rien a dire , logement très propres tel que sur les photos. Marine très réactives aux questions. Parfait.

Très très très contente de ce court séjour chez Marine et Guillaume. Petit logement, teeeeellement mignon, très cocon, on s’y sent vrmt bien, presque chez soit.

Super logement, très agréable, calme et conforme à la description. Hôte très attentionnée. Merci à vous Marine de faire les choses aussi bien. Nous avons adoré notre séjour dans ce logement très mignon!

Superbe séjour, une touche d’attention à l’arrivée, un emplacement idéale et une discrétion des hôtes idéals. Appartement très propre et calme à recommander sans soucis proche de tous commerces.

Logement parfait et bien équipé, mais surtout très propre, j'ai passé un séjour très agréable. Un grand merci à marine et Guillaume qui ont été très sympathiques,disponible mais en même temps discret.

Merci Marine pour sa réactivité, son accueil et sa confiance. 

L’appartement est refait à neuf, très propre et bien situé. Rue calme et entrée indépendante de la maison avec une spacieuse chambre.

Super agréable, endroit intime spacieux, propre avec des hôtes super cool. Communication rapide et pratique.
logement très propre, bien placé et surtout au calme
Appartement impeccable, très bien décoré et un très bon accueil. Idéal pour se détendre et déconnecter. Un grand merci à Marie pour son souci des détails.
Très joli appartement, et très bon accueil de la part de Marine.
Excellent !

We booked Marines place last minute to catch a flight and she was an amazing host, responded quickly and made sure to stay in touch with us the entire time. The bed is comfortable and the suite is very charming. Would recommend!
I enjoyed my stay at Marine’s place. The apartment was cosy and clean as advertised and Marine was a great host!

Adorable little musical themed boutique hotel with exceptional hosts at check-in. It's located in the heart of many musical instrument shops so very fitting theme! Convenient location with a mostly flat 15-min stroll to Galeries Lafayette at Haussmann. There are also a variety of good local restaurants for those who prefer to stay close.
The room was so romantic! We were very lucky to have a balcony which added to the atmosphere. A perfect weekend away!

I had a wonderful stay at this super chic boutique hotel and I was pleasantly surprised to find out that I was their first AirBnB guest! I loved all the cool patterns in every corner of the common areas and my room was super clean and very well-laid out. The staff were extremely helpful and just so delightful! The hotel is picture perfect in every way and great value for money. The breakfast was amazing and well worth the money! I was on a work trip but my stay at Idol made it feel less so because I immediately felt relaxed when I walked in the door. I really look forward to visiting Paris again and staying at this lovely place.

Alexandre est un super hôte, il très réactif et l’appartement est très bien placer.
Je recommande fortement.

Alexandre est un hôte très sympathique et réactif
Très bel appartement, bien agencé et très proche des commodités, merci beaucoup!
J'ai passé une excellente semaine chez Alexandre. Appartement très agréable et  confortable. Très bonne literie. Je recommande ++.
Très propre, très fonctionnel.

Après nous avoir accueillis très chaleureusement, Alexandra nous a aussi aidé pour le stationnement à proximité immédiate du logement. Concernant l'appartement, il est tout à fait conforme à l'annonce et nous sommes très contents de notre séjour. Je vous le recommande vivement.
Logement fidèle au descriptif! Hôte très accueillant et proposant même des circuits de visite ! A recommander !
Belle appartement dans un  quartier calmes mais avec toutes les commodités. Un hôte très à l'écoute je recommande +++
N est pas pu y aller pour cause du covid 19 mais hôte très sympathique qui n a pas refuser le remboursement intégral.

Nous avons passé un agréable week-end à  proximité immédiate de Paris.
Appartement agréable et fonctionnel.

Conforme à la description, hôte accueillant, appartement au top !

Logement très bien situé, propre, bien équipé, Alexandre est un hôte exceptionnel qui vous accueille comme des amis, ses précieux et nombreux renseignements et conseils facilitent le déroulement du séjour. Grand merci.
Logement propre, chambres et cuisine de bonne taille. Très bonne literie, et surtout appartement non bruyant

Le logement est très lumineux, très bien équipé et tout à fait adapté pour 8 personnes. A proximité des lignes de bus et métro pour faciliter les déplacements vers Paris.

L'appartement est très bien équipé, les chambres sont spacieuses.
Appartement très propre et pratique pour des collègues en visite sur salon pro à Paris > les 3 vraies chambres permettent de conserver une indispensable intimité.

Excellent appartement, très sympa, très beau, super déco......

Appartement au top , arrêt de bus à proximité ! Une bouteille de vin nous attendais dans le frigo, une attention qui nous a bien fait plaisir.
