Appartement accueillant et confortable, nous avons passé un excellent séjour.
L’accueil a été parfait. L'équipement a répondu à nos attentes.

Le logement est spacieux, avec l'équipement nécessaire et surtout faut bien le signaler un ensemble de verre, de couverts et assiettes qui sont complètement harmonieux.
Une petite touche d'attention également disponible dans le logement.
Également ce qui nous a frappé c'est que Alexandre a cherché avec nous des emplacements de stationnement pour nos véhicules et remorque.
En tout cas personnellement je recommande l'hospitalité d'Alexandre ainsi que ce logement très bien situé
Un havre de paix. Conforme a nos attentes
Appartement très agréable, fonctionnelle, très joliment décoré, avec petite vue sur la Tour Eiffel. Alexandre est très sympathique et de bons conseils, je recommande ce logement.
Nous étions 7 amis et nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Alexandre. Il a été très disponible et nous a donné des adresses dans le quartier et dans Paris. Je recommande ce logement !
hôte attentif et a l écoute , fait tout pour vous rendre agréable votre séjour.
Excellente expérience ! Alexandre est très sympathique et a pris le temps de me présenter son logement lors de l’accueil. C’était très propre et bien placé (a moins de 10 minutes du métro). Parfait !
Appartement spacieux, parfaitement aménagé et décoré, un hôte sympathique et très réactif, tous les éléments étaient réunis pour passer un bon séjour, merci à vous
Alexandre est un hôte très attentionné et très réactif à nos demandes de renseignements. L’appartement est bien équipé et agréable.
Appartement spacieux, propre et très bien équipé. Un logeur très avenant et qui devance les besoins de ses clients. A recommander +++
Super logement, super hôte !
Pièces spacieuses, literie confortable et équipements optimaux, le logement d'Alexandre à parfaitement répondu à mes attentes.
À recommander !

Alexandre est sympathique et présent lors de l'arrivée afin que tout se passe au mieux.
Le logement est spacieux et avec équipement et confort nécessaire tant pour séjour cours que long. Dommage pour le réveil très tôt dû aux travaux du voisinage, mais indépendant de sa volonté. Logement à recommander pour séjours aux portes de Paris.

L’accueil chez Alexandre a été sans faute. L’appartement est vaste, bien aéré avec des fenêtres sur 3 côtés et beaucoup de lumière. L’insonorisation est très efficace. Nous n’avons jamais entendu les voisins. Tout le nécessaire (cuisine et salle de bain) est fourni. L’appartement était étincelant à notre arrivée. Paris est facilement accessible par 2 stations de métro, chacune à 10 minutes de marche. Un séjour parfait à Paris!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Alexandre. Son accueil et sa flexibilité étaient très agréable! 
Nous recommandons sans hésiter!!
je vous recommande!
Super

Excellent host and amazing apartment. Alexandre is very thoughtful and helpful with his guests. Will come back if I have a numerous family to bring to Paris.

Do recommend 110%!
Great place to stay near Paris, definitely recommend!

Tolles großzügiges Appartement, was perfekt ausgestattet ist. Wir waren sehr zufrieden und würden diese Wohnung jederzeit wieder wählen. Komplette Abwicklung war sehr angenehm und unkompliziert. Alexandre ist ein sehr angenehmer Gastgeber. Gerne kommen wir wieder.
This place is amazing right next to the bus and 10 minute walk to the metro. Alexandre was great and very thoughtful tips to get around Paris. Thank you Alexandre!!
ﾎｽﾄからの連絡がすぐに返ってきて困った事があってもすぐに解決出来たのでよかったです
非常不错的地方,这个区域也比较安全｡房东很热情,考虑的很周到,满意!

This place was great! We arrived later than expected but were still able to meet with Alexandre to get the keys. He showed us around the apartment and gave us some tips to deal with the current travel disruptions going on in Paris. The disruptions did not give us too many issues, we just had to walk about 10-12 minutes to a train station to head into town. If there weren't any disruptions, there is a bus stop very close to the apartment which would have been convenient. Despite us walking to the train station most days, it never took us more than 30 minutes to get to our destination. The location was also close to a couple grocery stores, which we took full advantage of. 


We were thankful for 2 toilets and 3 rooms since we had 5 guests, and everyone was able to get their own comfortable bed with a nice blanket.

I suppose the only downside is that there are only stairs to get up to the apartment on the third or fourth floor. So, be aware that there aren't any options for those who cannot physically use the stairs. We did not have any problems however. 

I would definitely recommend this place. It was affordable, great location, great host, great wifi, and we could even watch Netflix!

Alexandre was an amazing host with an amazing Airbnb! He waited for our arrival but due to our train being late- we did not get to meet. He left me very thorough instruction on how to get in and was very responsive to my questions. The Airbnb was very clean and spacious. Alexandre also gave me tips on transportation as well as places to go. Highly recommend!

Alexandre ha sido encantador con nosotros. Ha estado disponible en todo momento, nos recibió con una cálida acogida y nos ayudó desde el primer momento a que nuestra estancia fuera inolvidable. El apartamento está muy bien equipado, la zona es tranquila y hemos disfrutado de unos días increíbles.
Excelente apartamento, excelente anfitrião. O apartamento é muito bom para família com até 8 pessoas.
Alexandre has a really nice place, nice location, very clean and had everything we needed! Also he helped us a lot with local tips and suggestions! Really fast responses and very flexible!

A lovely apartment that is spacious and clean which was very much value for money. Although it was a bit out of the centre of Paris, public transport was accessible enough and Malakoff was a nice and cheaper area. Alexandre was very attentive, provided lots of information and responded to all of our concerns quickly. Would highly recommend.

Alexandre was great host. Ticks every box. The apartment was located in a convenient place for our trip and had all the amenities we needed. He even gave us a bottle of Prosecco as a welcome gift. Highly recommended. Thanks Alexandre!
Heel fijn!

Alexandre is an excellent host. He is attentive and gives the most detailed welcome and suggestions for things to do in Paris and the area near his apartment. The apartment is clean and Alexandre had so many nice little touches to truly make us feel welcomed.

Excellent stay at Malakoff.. was a perfect location for seeing all of the sights of central Paris with my family. Lovely clean apartment with all of the amenities needed. A short but sweet stay! Would return!

We really enjoyed our stay!  Alexandre did a wonderful job communicating from the beginning.  He was quick to answer any questions and gave GREAT suggestions of things to do in the area.  He met us at the place, explained everything and always answered questions.  It is a little bit from the city but the bus is just around the corner and the metro is down the street.  Thank you for a great stay Alexandre!

This apartment was very comfortable. Exactly as describe, it has 3 full bedrooms and 2 1/2 bathrooms. The apartment itself it’s not super big but the main areas such as rooms and kitchen are spacious. This apartment has a full kitchen which it was awesome for us that cooked breakfast and dinner the whole stay. The apartment was very clean. Location is safe and close to the train stations to transfer to central Paris. Alexandre was an excellent host, he provided us with so much information that helped me planned the trip and gave us a tour of the apartment and explained how everything worked. Thank you! Definitely recommend it.

Wir haben das Appartment ausgewählt gehabt, da eine Reise mit 5 Personen nach Paris anstand. Das Appartment ist geräumig, neben dem Wohnzimmer sind drei Schlafzimmer (1x Doppelbett, 1x 2 Betten, 1x 3 Betten), Bad , Toilette und Küche vorhanden. Wer möchte, kann Wäsche waschen und trocknen. Ebenso gibt es einen Geschirrspüler. Massig Küchenutensilien und auch bereits diverse Kleinigkeiten für das Kochen, sowie Wasser waren von Ihm gestellt.
Alles ist sauber und intakt. Die Übergabe und auch der Check-out waren unkompliziert, Alexandre hat uns persönlich begrüsst und alles ausführlich erklärt. Zur Metro läuft man circa 15 Minuten, in der Umgebung gibt es alles, was man braucht, inkl. zwei Bäckern und Kneipen.
Der Clou war die Garage, so konnten wir zu fünft mit einem Auto anreisen.
Wenn wir wieder mit einer kleinen Truppe kommen, werden wir gerne hier wieder vorbei kommen.

The flat is great, super clean, spacious and has everything that you need - tea, coffee, mineral water, jams, washing machine, etc etc. We were travelling as a group of 5 and there was enough space for everybody. While the city is not located in the centre, there is a direct metro to get to the centre. We are not surprised that Alexandre is a superhost on airbnb. Before our journey, he sent us his tips and recommendations. Highly recommended!

This is an absolutely wonderful, spacious apartment.  Super clean place, very safe neighborhood, close to bus and metro, great connections to both Paris center and Versailles. One thing I was really grateful for were comfortable beds and just overall nice place to stay. I wish we could've stayed longer. This was probably the best airbnb I've ever stayed in.

eine perfekt ausgestattete Wohnung ( Waschmaschine, Geschirrspüler; Kaffeemaschine..) sehr sauber, sehr gute Betten,sehr aufmerksamer Vermieter- Wasserflaschen wurden besorgt, Kaffee, Tee, Marmeladen, Zucker gab es zur freien Verfügung,ebenso bekamen wir eine gute Flasche Sekt zur Begrüßung! alles wurde gut erklärt
Excelente hospedaje mejor de lo que esperamos, el apartamento es nuevo y con muchos espacios, quedamos mucho más que satisfechos. La atención de Alexandre fue increíble. 100% recomendable
Extremly helpful, sympathic host, ani well-equipped cozy location in quiet, pleasant area of Paris. I totally recommend this place to spend Time in France as a larger group of people.

El piso estaba súper limpio y en muy buenas condiciones, El Barrio es muy tranquilo, alquilamos coche y aparcamos sin problema y todos los lugares de interés están a 15 mint en coche y a 15 min del aeropuerto de orly , el anfitrión encantador y muy detallista, recomendable al 100%
Excelente apartamento, muy tranquilo el lugar, Alexandre es un excelente anfitrión, les recomiendo!!!

Du bor lidt væk fra storbyens vrimmel, i hyggelige omgivelser...
Alexandre er en nærværende vært, altid klar til at hjælpe.
Der stod vand og vin til os da vi kom, det havde vi ikke forventet, og vi nød at have en stille og fredelig base, under vores ophold i Paris.
Vi vil gerne bo her igen, en anden gang.
Un espai acollidor, net i tot correcte, en una zona molt tranquila, nosaltres hi varem estar molt bé.
Alojamiento muy recomendable, fácil acceso a Paris centro. Apartamento muy confortable, con plaza de garaje. Muy buena opción para visitar Paris. Gracias a Chantal y Alexandre.

Alexander’s place is very nice and very well located. It is very specious, clean and comfortable. The location is very convenient as it is quick and easy to commute to central Paris.  Alexander is an amazing host. Communication was great at all times! I totally recommend this place.
Very nice apartment. Extremely clean. Very helpful, answered questions quickly.
Alexandre is a great host, he will go the extra mile to assist you during your stay. The apartment was clean and comfortable.

We had a great family holiday with 2 teenagers. The flat is in a quiet part of Paris, with good access to the centre on the Metro. The highlight of the trip was cycling around Paris using the Vélib cycle scheme. There are bikes 2 minutes from the flat. Sign up online and use a code to unlock the bikes.
Very friendly host, with lots of helpful information, would definitely recommend!
This was a great stay. Wish we could have stayed longer. Excellent response time. Helpful. Flexible. Fabulous space.  Thank you!
Thanks to the host we had a nice stay. The place is beautiful, very nice, clean, comfortable and the little walk to the Metro was not bad at all and there is a supermarket mot far from the place ♥️
Hi I recommend this apartment to any people especially for families with small children it’s very safe area and apartment is very nice and clean. Easy to access the public transport
The place was great! Good location, very clean. Thank you!
Alexandre y Chantal son muy amables. El lugar super cómodo e impecable. Muy recomendable.

The appartment of Alexandre was great. It is located on so safe place, next to two metro stations, there are a lot of restaurants and shops near there, the host was so kind, helpful and very clean appartment. The WiFi is very fast, its perfect for work and we enjoyed the playstation. We will come back again!
Nice and big place, superb host and outstanding accommodation

Eine Top Wohnung, sehr sauber und groß, ein sehr hilfsbereiter und netter Vermieter, alles was man braucht ist in der Nähe, ein angenehmes Viertel. Im ganzen sehr zu empfehlen und wir würden jederzeit wieder buchen!
El apartamento es impecable, estuvimos alojados durante 4 días con mi familia, alexandre fue siempre atento con nosotros desde la llegada, fácil acceso al metro. Recomendadisimo al 100%
Очень гостеприимный приём, уютная чистая квартира со всем необходимым, удобное расположение от центра. Рекомендуем к проживанию.

We had a wonderful stay at Alexandre’s. Place was spotless and well equipped. Even had a Play Station 4 for the teenagers after long days touring the city. Spacious for a family of four with room to spare in a quiet neighborhood and easy access to subways. Alexandre was a great host who provided a tremendous amount of information and showed us around the apartment and immediate neighborhood.

My two colleagues and I spent six days in Alexander's apartment. We are very satisfied with everything. Alexander was very helpful and friendly from the moment we reserved his place. He provided us with many useful tips, not just about the accommodation we rented, but also about the shops, restaurants, transportation, etc.
Alexander’s apartment is located in a very quiet and beautiful neighborhood. It is easily reached by the metro in combination with a bus or a 10-minute walk. The apartment is very spacious and equipped with all that is needed during the stay. 
I would definitely recommend Alexander’s apartment to anyone who is planning his trip to Paris.

Ha sido una semana estupenda,el apartamento es recomendable 100 por cien, éramos ocho personas y estábamos cómodos .Esta superbien distribuido.Limpiza perfecta,comodidad,no le falta ningún detalle.Nos dejo comida necesaria suficiente para empezar al igual que jabones,papel ,detergentes..
La ubicación es genial ya que la parada del metro está muy cerquita y el bus al lado.La zona es tranquila .
Alexandre muy amable ya que nos ayudó en todo lo que necesitamos y te prepara hasta el itinerario de lo que hacer y (Website hidden by Airbnb) diez.
Thank you so much for the amazing hospitality. My family and I were impressed with how helpful you were.  Great experience.

Friendliest and most helpful host I have met by far. Place was very functional and additional touches like having milk, water and everything we need on standby was really great. Place was very clean (the helper/cleaner) wiped down even the handles knobs and walls! Will definitely stay here again if I’m back! Thanks alexandre for the prompt responses and great patient suggestions

Alexandre was a fantastic host !!!! Casa is perfect for spending a few days in Paris with friends! Perfectly clean, very comfortable with everything you could need. So close to Subway, all amenities around .... Communication with Alexander was easy, friendly and very fast. I can highly recommend this house !!!!!! Our stay in Paris was simply FANTASTIC! Thanks for everything .... !!!!
Great host! Super helpful and accommodating. Plenty of space in the apartment for a group of people. Quiet little area with train and restaurants in walking distance. We enjoyed our stay!

Alexandre es un anfitrión inmejorable. Ha sido muy atento con nosotros en todo momento y nos ha dado unas muy buenas recomendaciones de supermercados y restaurantes. También nos ha facilitado mucha información sobre el transporte público, lo cual nos ha ayudado enormemente en nuestro viaje en París. Esta bastante bien ubicado, no esta céntrico, pero está en un barrio tranquilo y bien comunicado con el centro de París. Consideramos que tal vez el precio es un poco elevado en cuanto a las características del alojamiento, ya que es un bloque de pisos bastante antiguo. No tiene ascensor, y está ubicado en un tercer piso, una cuestión a valorar para algunos viajeros con problemas de movilidad. Cabe resaltar por encima de todo, el trato de Alexandre, quien ha estado disponible para resolver cualquier duda en todo momento además de haber sido muy atento el día de nuestra llegada. 
Sin duda para repetir!

What a kind host! Chantal and Alexander were gracious enough to leave a bottle of Champagne chilled in the fridge for us water and coffee and light food available, such a godsend after a rough trip from the US to Paris. The space was simple and clean and exactly as described and pictured. The only thing that was unpleasant was bringing up the luggage on the stairs but it was worth the trouble. I recommend taking a taxi or uber from the airport instead of the train because there were way too many stairs to deal with when rolling big luggage around.

Alexandre was the perfect host, from waiting outside to greet us as we came to the very end and messaging to check if we were okay throughout our trip. The apartment was very clean and spacious, and had the all amenities we could have needed as we found central Paris very expensive for food there was a (halal) amazing takeaway just a few steps from the door which was a much cheaper option for us in the evening after long days out! Alexandre even walked us to the local mini supermarket which was super nice of him. I would deffo recommend this apartment for a family friendly and quiet stay in Paris!
Everything was more than perfect! Alexandre is a super nice person and very helpful. Thank you again for everything

A spacious apartment in a nice area on the outskirts of Paris. Clean, with all basic amenities available. Alexandre was very responsive and gave good tips on travel in and out of Paris. The metro is about a 10 minute walk from the apartment, with plenty of regular trains into the centre of Paris. Would highly recommend.
Perfect location, good host, very helpful and quick to reply

Alexandre is a wonderful host so far with my Airbnb experience.We had a pleasant stay at Alexandre ‘s place. He is very helpful. He gave us a clear and perfect information to reach the landmarks from his place. Also he showed us some local backery to have our breakfast. I would like to stay again definitely when we visit Paris in future.

I cannot say enough good things about this host.  He responds immediately. He offered detailed instructions on how to get to local and major attractions as well as metro stations and grocery markets.  He helped guide us from the airport. His apartment fit my family of 7 perfectly.  It was clean and spacious and had everything we needed.  Plenty of closet space, outlets, cookware, etc.  the building is quiet so I had to remind my family to speak softly and walk quietly when we came home late from the soccer game or Normandy but no one complained so I think we were fine.   An experience with an Air BnB can either make or break a vacation and Alexandre helped make our vacation perfect!  So perfect, in fact, I will specifically look him up again if/when we come back to Paris.

Such a beautiful place. Classy minimalist design. & provides everything you need. Alexandre was such a gracious & helpful host, communicating with him was very easy. We loved everything about the apartment. It was very well kept, cozy & clean. Chantal was also very kind & helpful.
Muy Buena atencion, el apartamento comodo, bonito, lo recomiendo

This apartment was perfect for me and 5 friends on vacation in Paris. The apartment was clean and had everything you will need! Would definitely stay here again. Alexandre was extremely helpful and went above and beyond to make sure we had all that we needed.

Perfect location between two different metro lines to access city settled within a beautiful and safe neighborhood.  Very clean apartment and Alexandre was brilliant in meeting our needs and requests!  Highly recommended!
Great place, near to metro and near to the city.
We really love Alexandre's place, he was very helpful when we arrived and made us feel at home. The apartment had everything we needed for our stay and we had a great time.

Alexandre ha sido un gran anfitrión. Nos ha dado muchísima  información totalmente útil para organizar nuestra estancia en Paris. El apartamento esta muy bien, situado cerca de 2 estaciones de metro que te acercan rápidamente a Paris.
Se trata de una zona muy tranquila. Totalmente recomendable. Sin duda volveríamos al apartamento. Gracias por todo Alexandre.
pas de commentaire
Superbe appartement bien agencé
Appart sympa, bien rénové avec goût, dommage impossible de dormir sur le clic clac, il manque un matelas dessus.
Très beau logement

Joli studio, très bien aménagé et à une dizaine de minutes à pied du rer A de Vincennes. Convient largement à deux voyageurs.

Le logement est très facile d'accès et Alissa a été très réactive. 

Seul bémol: la propreté du logement peut être améliorée surtout compte tenu de la situation sanitaire actuelle.
Conforme au photo. Parfait studio. Proche de tout ( commerce, resto, transport...) forte odeur d’égout mais sinon parfait dans l’ensemble
Très bon séjour. Appartement conforme aux photos, très belle décoration. Super emplacement tout prêt de Paris. Je recommande !

Un conseil, je ne vous recommande pas vraiment ce logement malgré l'esthétisme de celui-ci.
Mais comme vous le savez le COVID a fait son apparition et chaque hôte se doit de maintenir l'espace avec une certaine propreté (renforcé suite aux évènement que nous vivons).
Tapis de bain sale, un cheveux sur le mur de la salle de bain, tiroirs poussiéreux, cheveux trainent dans les coins, serviettes ne semble pas avoir étaient lavé avant notre arrivée et PAS DE CHAUFFAGE (photos à l'appuie).

Le quartier n'est pas fréquentable... sale, poubelles trainent dans les rues.
Mais l'appartement reste très beau et calme mais le rapport qualité prix reste à désirer.
Petit appartement coquet. Parfait pour moi qui suis en déplacement professionnel
Logement impeccable très cosy très propres tres fonctionnel je recommande on s y sent chez soit
Un appartement design et fonctionnel agréable à vivre

Appartement propre, préparé, équipements très pratique et au dessus du standing (drap en soie, couvert aspect luxe...)
Séjour pour formation sur Paris : parfait !
Parfait, merci pour ce sejour
Très satisfaire de mon séjour, endroit propre et Deesign. Des réponses très rapide et un service très sympa. Merci
Appartement très propre et très chaleureux.
Appartement parfait ! Alissa est très réactive. Je recommande sans hésiter
Rien à signaler , séjour impeccable
Séjour très agréable, l’appartement est magnifique et très bien situé !

Tout est conforme avec un accès facile 
Plutôt propre et confortable 
Il faudrait mettre plus en évidence que le logement est au 4ème sans ascenseur 
Il manque juste des draps et des taies d’oreiller qui seraient les bien venue ...
Pour le reste tout est bien

Appartement très bien agencé et propre . Hôte réactive lors des échanges . 
Très bien situer proche du périph.
Bon séjour, appartement conforme au photos et bonne réactivité de Alissa.

Ne pas s'attendre à un studio grand assez petit, absolument pas propre avec des cafards qui se baladent et des mouches odeurs de merde présente et d'égouts au niveau des fenêtres. L'hôte ne réponds pas au message elle vous laisse devant laporte de l'immeuble à poiroter que quelqu'un du bâtiments sorte. Désagréable. Ne recommande pas du tout.
Très cosy, lit confortable, très propre. Merci !
Appartement confortable et propre

Points positifs :
Localisation 
Arrivée autonome
Déco
Capsules Nespresso de bienvenue
Savon et shampooing 

Points négatifs :
Lit d’appoint inutilisable car inconfortable +++
Prévoyez un séjour à 2 dans le même lit
Serviettes tissus sans essui tout pas hygiénique en période de covid entre autre
Un très belle appartement
déco et propreté impeccables ; seul bémol le canapé qui n'est pas confortable donc logement idéal pour deux personnes

Bon Airbnb pour un court séjour. 
Même en ayant rencontré quelques soucis. 
Hôte peu réactives, attendu 45 min dehors sans avoir le code d’entrée.
Belle appartement mais mal isolé
Très bel appartement

Appartement très bien décoré, et très propre. Conforme aux photos.
Je recommande ce logement !

Appartement très propre, conforme aux photos. RAS
Je vous le recommande. Réactive et à l’écoute.
Un réel plaisir de passer un wk dans studio au top

Le logement était convenable avec une belle décoration d’intérieur. Hôte qui répond rapidement. C’est dommage il n’y avait pas de papier sopalin pour s’essuyer les mains et les couteaux de table ne sont pas très pratiques pour manger de la viande par exemple.. Logement très bien pour un week-end
Tres belle experience ! Studio chaleureux :)

Super studio
Propreté top
Hôte très reactive
Arrivée très simple puisque très bien expliquée
Je recommande ce petit studio.
J’ai passé un super séjour, très bel appartement
Super séjour chez Alissa. Conforme à la description
Très bon séjour chez Alissa, rien à redire !
Excellent séjour, je recommande
Le logement est très sympathique et bien équipé. Je conseille le logement.
Très bien !
Appart sympa, très belle deco mais communication un peu compliquée avec l’hôte
Super endroit, beau et moderne. On s'y sent tout de suite à l'aise, l'hôte est très réactif. Accès à l'appartement très facile grâce aux indications de l'hôte. Je recommandes !
Appartement au top hyper bien situé

Communication Rapide et trouvant les solutions nécessaire afin de satisfaire mes demandes.
Commerce à proximité ainsi que le métro!
L’appartement est impeccable. Tout confort.

Jolie studio bien décoré tout équipé. Proche métro saint mandé. Problème connexion internet. 
Et 4ème étages sans ascenseur !
Très bel appartement et très propre

Logement à la hauteur espérée. 
Je recommande. 
Léonard

Studio très propre, moderne , proche de toutes commodités. 
Communication avec l Hôte impeccable et très arrangeant.
Magnifique petit studio , extrement propre et tout équipé , je recommande a 100%
Logement très bien décoré et propre. Lit confortable, tout le nécessaire à disposition. Proche d’une station de métro.
Top, mis à part que la télé ne fonctionne pas du à un problème de fibre..
Appartement cosy, située aux portes de Paris avec des commerces de proximité. Très bien!

Super studio à proximité de Paris centre en métro et proche de Vincennes, quartier très agréable. L’appartement est propre, le lit est très confortable et Alissa est très réactive. Je recommande vivement ce studio à une personne seule ou un couple.

Un logement parfait. La propriétaire est toujours là pour répondre aux questions! Tout a été en ordre, appartement très propre, décoration très agréable, et metro juste à côté! J’ai adoré mon séjour chez Alissa. Je le recommande vivement!
Logement propre, fonctionnel et décoré avec soin. Bien situé avec un parc très agréable et des commerces à proximité. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, merci Alissa!
Un tres beau studio a 5 mn du metro mais  il ya un seul truc négatif le clic clac n’est pas du tout confortable
Logement très agréable et propre. Déco et équipements soignés.
Very nice and cosy apartment - very well located and easy check-in ! Many thanks for the great stay at your place :)
Neat
O espaço era ótimo somente os vizinhos que faziam muito barulho no apartamento da frente.

This apartment is just great! It looks exactly like in the pictures and is super clean! No spiders (In case you hate them as much as I do ;)!!! The bed is super comfy and even tho the walls are pretty thin it was not noisy at all. I slept like a baby. The metro is close and a supermarket is right around the corner. I felt right at home from the minute I opened the door! :D
Great place to stay

Beautiful apartment ! I would definitely recommend if you are traveling light as there is no elevator and it is on the 4th floor. Host were super nice and the apartment was in a nice quite neighborhood with lots of things walking distance.
Would totally recommend! Very clean and Alissa is super kind and thoughtful. A great appartement:)
Jaj
Sehr schöne Einrichtung!

Location is ok. 
Sofa bed is very uncomfortable.

The house was super clean everything was available inside the premises from coffe machine to washing machine over all everything was good just the building was old and it was hard to climb the stairs again and again on the 4 floor
Amazing stay and everything was like in the pictures. Only the couch/sofa could be more comfortable. Otherwise its a great location.

the hot water doesn’t work over half the time, the host will say it’s working fine when it’s not and when she comes to ‘have a look’ it’s coincidentally working again when you’re not in the apartment. Very nice Airbnb, terrible service as the shower will ruin plans for the whole day!

An amazing place to stay that’s close to the metro. Really modern flat in such an old school building. Restaurants and such are all around but not a noisy area. Will definitely stay here again when back in Paris!
We had a wonderfull weekend and Alissas appartment was a great place to retreat after a long day of exploring Paris. It was easy to travel around the city since the metro is right around the corner.

A cute little flat in a great location- easy to get around as not too far from train station. 

Cleanliness could have been better to highlight flats full potential.

ideal for a mini break.

This place was really beautiful and in a very nice suburban area. 5 min walk from the metro station. Only thing that really sucked was that the place wasn’t ready when I arrived and I had to leave and come back to get ready for the day. The apartment is also on the 4th floor with no elevator. Basically a sectioned off studio. Very classy and nice tho!
Really nice place and well located!

Een leuk appartement maar er valt veel te verbeteren op het gebied van hygiëne. De handdoeken stonken en er zaten zwarte haren in. Verder was het erg stoffig en kan het badkamermatje beter worden weggegooid. De afzuiging in de badkamer maakt geluid en is valt niet uit te zetten. Verder ruikt het gehele complex erg naar sigarettenrook. Het is een leuk uitziend appartement maar er is veel ruimte voor verbetering!

The flat is stylish, comfortable and quite spacious. The check- in was so easy. The location was great; so near the metro, bars and a couple of restaurants. The flat doesn’t have an elevator, but the walk upstairs gave us a chance to burn off some of that wine and food! Alissa was very responsive. Would stay again.
Unico punto sfavorevole ( ma non c’entra nulla con l’appartamento che era bellissimo e Alissa che è stata gentilissima ) è stata la mancanza di ascensore. Appartamento al quarto piano.
It was good
Very homey with a lot of attention to detail. Would highly recommend this spot.
We stayed over the weekend. A simple & stylish place to crash at while in Paris. Would recommend.
The flat is pretty cool and well located - very close to the next train and just 10 minutes from the center ; )

Lovely little space, just as described and very clean apartment . Loved the shops nearby you can get just about everything and plenty restaurants. Great transport links on the metro which is about 5 minutes walk. Be prepared to take the stairs up to the 4th floor but to be honest by the second day we were used to them and making sure we had all we needed to save us from going back out!! The only issue I had was the internet connection is not that great considering you need it to use the TV. Host was very helpful and communicated well throughout!!!
Great house!
Great stay, space exactly as described, super-cute, well designed and sparkling clean. Fast responses and good value for money. Thanks New!
pas de commentaire
Très bien .
Idéalement situé pour une de paris, en plein milieu d'un quartier qui bouge : super sympa

Hôtel très bien placé en plein St Germain des Prés. Très bon rapport qualité prix.
Nous étions 4 et nous a réservé une suite avec 2 chambres communicantes.

Mais je n’ai pas ressenti les choses décrites par les précédents voyageurs dans leurs nombreux commentaires. Et l’hôtel ressemblait à un grand navire abandonné par ses passagers.
Il faudra donc que j’y retourne quand nous aurons tous repris une vie normale....

Ici ou ailleurs...peu importe ? Non !
Paris tout de même, St Germain qui plus est ! Le rêve a rêvé de liberté, de ciel bleu, d'étoiles et de confidences... Les murs de la Louisiane se sont inventées bouteille à la mer...Le rêve a rêvé de bleu nuit pour accueillir les nuances de chaque vert  au rai de lumière ambrée du petit matin ...L'espace d'une chambre que l'on pense hermétique devient  ici et ailleurs, champ des possibles...
Hôtel très bien situé dans le cœur du quartier St Germain. Accueil très sympa et hôtel très fonctionnel. Je recommande :)
Grande chambre bien située et au calme.
Hôtel pas cher du temps et idéalement placé. De plus il est très calme. Pour le centre de Paris c'est idéal. Je n'hésiterai pas à revenir au besoin.
Un séjour très agréable avec une équipe toujours à notre service, un emplacement rare et exceptionnel et  des chambres impeccables! Merci à Xavier et son équipe!

J’ai découvert l’hôtel la Louisiane dans le très vivant Quartier Latin, tout près de la place de l’Odéon et de la statue de Danton, en plein cœur de Saint-Germain des Prés. Cet hôtel presque bicentenaire poursuit avec foi sa mission : proposer aux voyageurs des séjours peu onéreux dans un cadre tout à la fois authentique et pratique.
 
Depuis les années 40, où s’y installèrent Jean-Paul Sartre, Simone de Beauvoir, Juliette Greco et tant d’autres personnalités de l’après-guerre, cet ancien dortoir de l’Abbaye Saint-Germain des Prés (fondée il y a 1.005 ans !) tient cette promesse avec constance, malgré les pressions de l’époque et la dictature du modernisme. Cela grâce d’abord à son propriétaire actuel, revenu tel l’enfant prodigue après avoir fait fortune comme pionnier de l’Internet, qui est le gardien des lieux pour la 4ème génération. Puisse-t-il être le passeur pour que ses enfants eux aussi conservent fidèlement La Louisiane pour ses habitants, voyageurs venant chaque année de plus de 120 différents pays.
 
Malgré une entrée modeste, cet immeuble labyrinthique abrite 82 chambres et autant de salles de bain : que d’eau, que d’eau chaude ! Il est difficile de s’en rendre compte au premier abord : la discrétion du bâtiment, où les murs Louis XIII voisinent une façade Art Déco, ne permet guère à l’esprit de projeter une image de ce qui l’attend. Silencieux et pudiques, ces murs de pierre construits au XIVème siècle, mais en reprenant des fondations qui datent de l’empire romain et de la Lutèce antique, rendent songeur tout en laissant une forme de doute s’installer. Pire, en montant, le dédale des chambres aux portes discrètes et anonymes (sauf celles recouvertes de dessins) balisent des couloirs mystérieux, dont Quentin Tarentino dit qu’ils sont un décor de thriller ! L’on s’y déplace pour trouver son nid le temps d’une saison, celle d’un voyage… sans autre objectif que d’être là, présent à cet instant.
 
Si l’entrée est petite, le suspens se dissipe vite. Dès que vous passerez la porte du 60 rue de Seine, vous y serez accueilli par une équipe de réceptionnistes constituée de vrais parisiens, connaisseurs des bons plans et des bonnes adresses tout autour. L’arrivée est rapide, l’attribution de votre chambre également, grâce à un Check In rodé. Vous avez à peine le temps de profiter du sofa du lounge au rez-de-chaussée, que clé en main, un ascenseur vous conduit à votre étage, où vous poserez vos valises avant de profiter du calme et de vous reposer… afin d’être frais pour replonger dans la foule des rues animées des alentours. Les célèbres terrasses pleines de belles personnes et de beaux esprits vous attendent, le Louvre, Notre-Dame de Paris, le Musée d’Orsay, le Jardin du Luxembourg sont justes à côté, et sur le trajet pour s’y rendre, autant de galeries d’art bordent les rues.
 
Vous vous installez dans une chambre simple et propre, souvent étonnamment  lumineuses grâce à des fenêtres aussi larges que hautes dans les premiers étages. Les chambres sont belles car elles sont pures, pures car elles sont simples, simples car elles se laissent facilement habiter par n’importe quel passager- voyageur, désireux d’y vivre un moment à lui, hors des routines de son logement habituel. Certes, les moines bénédictins de l’Abbaye Saint-Germain des Prés n’y vivent plus, mais la simplicité des cellules d’antan reste présente. Grâce à une décoration minimaliste, l’objet star est le lit, et la literie est, mais alors, très très confortable, et rassurante à la manière des objets que l’on a toujours connus et qui se laissent oublier. En se reposant sur ce lit, le moment dure et prend son temps…
 
Dès l’aube, à 7 heures du matin, jusqu’à 10h ou 11h le weekend, le petit-déjeuner vous attend à la Cafeteria, placée au centre du navire. Viennoiseries françaises du jour tout juste sorties du four du boulanger voisin, boissons chaudes – avec un excellent café livré par un torréfacteur à l’ancienne, fruits, laitages, céréales, fromages et charcuteries de petits producteurs composent l’essentiel du buffet dont on profitera généreusement au chant du coq ! Et l’on s’en régale dans une cafeteria boisée, laissée dans son jus depuis la nuit des temps : cela lui donne un tel cachet que vous vous y sentirez bien, à votre aise, libre d’avoir même les yeux fatigués ou l’esprit somnolant.
 
Ce « petit charme » des lieux exercera sur vous, au fil de vos séjours successifs, un magnétisme de plus en plus fort. Il découle du riche passé de l’hôtel La Louisiane, lieu de passage important à Odéon, chemin de traverses pour les vagabonds en quête d’émotions, les artistes en recherche d’inspiration, les voyageurs désireux de renouer avec un Paris oublié, quasi muet, populaire à souhait, à jamais rebelle et vibrant pour toujours.
 
Un dépaysement en plein cœur de Paris ? Oui, c’est même un livre qui s’ouvre. La paix, la méditation font leur entrée ou la passion s’anime, ou bien les trois, chacun à sa guise. Le film de Michel La Veaux, «  La Louisiane », raconte pendant une heure ce rapport que comble cet hôtel entre le besoin d’isolement, l’inspiration créatrice et la rencontre avec l’Autre qui passe et dort ici.
 
Si la vie d’un voyageur peut l’entrainer d’un point A à un point B, la Louisiane en décide autrement, prenant dans ses filets les nomades, les sages, les rêveurs, les poètes, les artistes, pour leur offrir le séjour de l’amitié.

Excellent location close to Restaurants and a nice lounge.
Lovely hotel in a great location. Will be back!
My sons and I really enjoyed our stay. Brilliant location, friendly staff, room nice & comfortable. Even less noisy than I expected!
Very cute motel in a nice area!
Stayed twice in the same week, see my other review!

Clean, spacious, close to supermarket, restaurants, and a 8min walk to the Louvre. Breakfast was nice (crepes, coffee, boiled eggs, toast etc.).  Only con is that the walls are thin...you can hear everything (if that is a concern). Beautiful large windows overlooking the street. We really enjoyed our stay and the service was great.
Great Location - next to many food options, grocery store and just enjoy the city to walk around. Breakfast is amazing! Friendly and polite staff and comfortable stay at a reasonable cost.

Xavier's place has excellent location and perfect quality/price ratio. I love quartier Latin! The breakfast is much better than expected. The hours of check in and check out are also more friendly than usual. In the room you have every thing for a short stay. I am for the second time guest of Xavier and I will be back.
Very clean and great location. Just what you need for a stay
The place is awesome location. I will definitely stay in La Lousiane again
Habitación reducida, lo demás bien
The best ever - charming- fun- artful- great location and great people/ wish I could just live there forever

If you’re looking for a place in the midst of an area with a true Parisian feel without breaking the bank, I believe this is a great choice. This place is not about the bells and whistles per se, but you can expect a clean room, a fantastic location and a wonderful staff that is super accommodating. I was especially thankful for how flexible the check in/check out times are as well as their willingness to allow us to leave our bags past check out to squeeze in an afternoon of sightseeing before making our way back home. The rooms themselves are a little older, but the beds are comfy, and we had what we needed. Being near many cafes, you walk out your door and have the pick of where you want to eat! We would definitely like to stay there again if we come back to Paris.

Paris isn’t cheap, so be mindful of getting what you pay for, and this “boutique” hotel will be just fine. Good checkin, decent breakfast, interesting people. A step up from a hostel, but good for a couple nights in a central location.

Quaint and very much central place in Paris, from which you can easily reach cafes, historical landmarks or just for a stroll by the Seine! (you just need to walk down the same street of the hotel). If I ever (hopefully!) come back to Paris, I would definitely stay here again.
Absolute gem of a hotel - such a great location, and the staff were wonderful. Will be returning when I can!
Lively location that’s great for getting feeling like your in the heart of some action.

Great location, our room faced the street and was noisy until about 2:00 am when the restaurants closed. All-in-all it was good for the one night we spent there. advertised as basic accommodations and that is what it was. If not for the street noise, this would have been a perfect place to stay.  WIFI was great.

Great atmospheric place. A little noisy if you like your windows open at night (no AC in a slightly stuffy room) but hey! this is Paris at 5.00am when they clean the streets of rubbish and lost tourists. And our room did not have a TV !! What a cute touch of nostalgia.

An older hotel but clean with a friendly staff. The location is excellent making it easy to walk to sites and the metro. Lots of art galleries in the neighborhood and many choices of cafes and restaurants. We would stay again.
Great location, easy to walk to Notre Dame and Musee d’Orsay.

Absolutely loved loved staying in La Lousianne!!! We came as a group of 8. They were accommodating and great fun. The location is brilliant (in St Germain) and there is really good late check out. Highly recommend!

This is a basic hotel just as they advertised with a great and gracious staff. It was a 15 min walk from everything you’d want to do in a great neighborhood with amenities within feet of the hotel door. I recommend getting the breakfast deal, it’s well done- that was the best decision on my part. Will definitely return!

The room was aged,  simple and unpretentious, just like in the description, but very clean and cozy. Located perfectly, friendly staff and a nice breakfast for an unbeatable price! Strongly recommended!
The place to stay in Paris. Best situated. Friendly people at the reception (24x7).  Clean. (Website hidden by Airbnb) said - the place to stay.

Hotel limpo, confortável,  perto de tudo, o quarto era um pouco quente, tinha um certo barulho dos bares e restaurantes próximos,  mas não me incomodou, a localização era excelente e o café da manhã era bem gostoso.
The place was super convenient and had tons of space.   It also came with few breakfast which was cool.   The only complaint I had was one of the rooms really smelled weird.

Simple, quaint place to stay if you enjoy being close to Paris’s attractions. Staff is friendly, breakfast is great. I goto bed late so I don’t mind the business of the streets. I enjoyed that there was a bathtub. I would stay here again.
Loved the location and friendly staff. In terms of the room, you pretty much get what you pay for.
It was amazing place to stay!
Terrific location and helpful folks!!

The staff here are excellent - helpful and informative.   The breakfast far surpassed my expectations as well!  We had a great time in the center of Paris where the energy is high and the options are plentiful and one can walk to many major sights.
Hotel la Lousiane is perfectly what we expected! Amazing location, very clean and a lovely view from our room. Very simple living spaces and kind hotel staff.
Thanks for a great place!! It was the exact perfect location to be in. The only thing was no ac in July, but with the fan and windows open it wasn’t awful

This hotel is in an great location and provided a basic room with a clean, comfortable bed and bathroom. We spent limited time there, but loved the location and would stay again. There is no air condition, but with the window open at night and the provided fan, it was comfortable to sleep in.
Great location. Reasonable price. The room is clean but small and a bit dated. Still good choice for short stay.
Super location and great connectivity. The hotel is as described and comfortable. Very warm and friendly staff. We really enjoyed our stay... Many Thanks
Great hosts, great location, great value.
Great location. The staff is kind and helpful. The rooms are simples but comfortable and charming. I hope I can come back some time soon.
推荐入住,楼下有很多餐厅

Very nice place with wonderful hosts
Well connected 
Highly recommend
Great location!!
2nd time I have stayed over the last couple of (Website hidden by Airbnb) may not be the ritz but is still great value for money and the location is hard to beat
The hotel is a little dated and sober but the friendly staff and excellent location make up for a lot.

We had a very pleasant stay and the location was phenomenal!! It was a 10 min walk from Notre Dame, so close the banks of Seine, Louvre, Musee d’Orsay and right in the middle of a bustling and exciting St. Germain neighborhood. Also not that far of a walk from le marais.  Also two metro stations that can take you anywhere are right nearby. If I’m in Paris again I’ll stay there again! All the concierges did a wonderful job and were so helpful!! After they kindly offered to store my luggage so I could do some last min sightseeing , they saw me carrying pastries and offered to keep them fresh in the fridge. So thoughtful! My regards to all...
Great location, friendly staff, very comfortable bed.

It was very good stay with great flexibility in check in and check out. It was big help allowing early check in and late check out. The location is very good too..
Thank you 
Harish B

Xavier's hotel is in the best location in Paris! And the hotel room is clean and the staff are really friendly. I like that they let the customers check out very late which is a big YES YES! I highly recommend this hotel
Old hotel on a great location.
My first AirBNB experience and it was better than expected. The place is in a wonderful location. Service/reception was amazing, and breakfast was great. Would definitely stay here again.

Great place to stay for a few nights in Paris, especially if you’re passing through. The location is amazing. If you’re looking to do touristy things it’s super central and walking distance to a lot. It’s also a great central location even if you’re not doing touristy things. It’s a very busy area, so if you’re a really light sleeper it might not be the best place for you. No complaints about my my room.  I definitely think they have the best check-in/check-out times in the area.

The location to me was one of the best parts for me. From easy connectivity to the metro, the night life just around the corner, there was so much this place offered to make my stay in Paris one to remember. Will definitely be back (soon)!
It is a place valid for the money that I pay!

Great value. Close to a number of great restaurants, and right across the street from a grocery store. However, the heater was running too hot in our room and we could not turn it down. Can get noisy in the street.

Will most defiantly stay at your hotel again. Great location and friendly staff. Very comfortable beds and clean no fuss hotel room. It was is the center of everything that you need in Paris. Great deal for what you get .
Muy buena ubicación, instalaciones sencillas con servicio, limpieza y atencion muy correcta.
Friendly and accommodating staff, in a great location with plenty of restaurants and a market to boot.

Great location with lots of shops and restaurants around. Also famous attractions are within about 20-minute- walking distance. 

Everything was ok for a short trip given that the hotel is an old building in Paris. Do not have high expectation.

Just as described! Perfect location, cafes , restaurants and metro right there so can’t beat it. Room a little dark so use the reception or common area for working. Spaces are good. 
Quaint and old as described. 
Nice staff! Clean.

I fly standby so making reservations is hard for me. I had no problem getting in here right away and it was nice having the early checkin with coming in at 7am. Thanks for making my first trip to Paris pleasurable!

Location, location, location.  This hotel is basic, but we were very happy with it based on our needs.   We wanted to be in the heart of the city and this is it!!  Shops, cafes, restaurants, Notre Dame, the Louvre all so close.  We appreciated the comfy beds, and clean bathroom.  We wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.
Xavier's place was a perfect find in our favorite part of Paris, there's a fresh food market just next door, tons of cafes, art galleries, a laundromat nearby ... and everyone was very kind.

물이 콸콸 잘 나와서 좋았음

Hotel La Louisiane is perfect for its central location with some lovely streets, small but very good typically french breakfast and a very helpful front desk. The hallways and rooms definitely have something old-school, but the beds were comfy and everything was superclean. Merci beaucoup!
Great location, close to restaurants and supermarket, they are just next to the hotel. Also, it’s close to several metro stations and bus stops. I would recommend this place to my friends.
Excelente ubicación, habitación cómoda. Servicio eficaz, práctico. Buena atención.

The location was perfect and an easy walk to the Louvre, Eiffel Tower and Notre Dame. The hotel itself is old, but has great character. The staff were all friendly and pleasant, the room was clean and the bathroom has some updates. The halls are very narrow and if your room is on the street side it can be noisy. The breakfast in the morning was a nice assortment of croissants, bread and muffins. There was also plain yogurt and compote, tea, coffee and orange juice. Overall it was a great place to stay in the heart of Paris for a reasonable price.
Ideally located, clean and comfortable, it’s for sure great value for money. Highly recommended!
Nice place to stay. Quite convenient to good food , attractions

This hotel is basic and old but in an amazing location. For the price, you can’t beat being right in the center of Paris, within walking distance of almost everything. The rooms are nothing special but they are clean and comfortable. The views out the windows are of
lively Paris streets which is great during the day and the windows do a good job of keeping sound out at night. My room was not air conditioned, but they provided a fan without me having to ask. I was there in August but the weather was mostly in the 70s so the fan was plenty. Reception was helpful and friendly and both check in and out were smooth. The complementary breakfast was standard French fare (bread, coffee and croissants) and very nice to have. 

I gave 4 stars for a few reasons. The building inside is a bit shabby. The carpet needs to be replaced and when I visited there were buckets on the stairs to catch drips from a leaky ceiling, however the buckets were gone by the time I left. Additionally, the WiFi is pretty weak. I was unable to FaceTime my husband but it worked well for everything else, although I regularly had to re-enter the password. Lastly, the metal lights by the bed get scalding hot. I bumped one accidentally as I was reaching to turn it off and the burn blistered immediately. I let the front desk know about this so it may be fixed soon but be careful. 

Overall, this is a great place for someone looking for something affordable and simple, right in the heart of the left bank.
Nice hotel, as advertised! The rooms were simple, but it is in a fantastic location, the breakfast is great, and the staff is friendly!
Located in the heart of Paris and in the happening street of Saint Germain, the rooms have a cozy setting, the hosts are hospitable and friendly. Recommended.

EL hotel se encuentra muy bien ubicado, desde allí se puede caminar casi a todas los sitios de interés en París (Louvre, jardines de Luxemburgo, Jardín Botánico y a 40 minutos la Torre Eiffel). No es un sitio tranquilo, hay demasiados restaurantes alrededor que tienen clientes hasta la madrugada en las aceras, algunas noches oímos peleas.  Hay muchos recursos disponibles alrededor (mercado, pan, entre otros)
El hotel se debe preocupar más por la limpieza de las habitaciones.

i stayed only one night and needed a taxi to the airport at 5 am. The hotel arranged the taxi with no problem. The place is well situated, very central, the room was big and very clean, so was the bathroom. The king size bed was comfortable. Efficient and friendly communication. Nice bars on the street, not for anyone seeking peace and quietness but perfect location for someone who likes to experience the very lively surroundings with esay, reasonable price. I recommend. Thank you!

The place is located in an ideal location in Paris surrounded by public transportation, restaurants, nightlife, and supermarket. The check-in was seamless and was given a guide-map to get around the city. The bed was comfy. Thanks for hosting!
Very good location!

This little hotel lies in the very heart of Paris, it offers everything one needs, even a little balcony to look down into one of the nice streets of the old town, and the people at the reception were extremely nice and friendly. The only thing that can be troublesome is that during the nice and warm nights, people sit in the street cafes until very late, which can be very noisy. The windows of hotel Lousiana are very good, so you don't hear much when you close them. On the whole, I really enjoyed my stay.

La habitación de Xavier es un hotel que te atienden las 24 hs. La ubicación es excelente muy cerca del barrio latino y de diferentes puntos de atracción como ser museos y parques. Enfrente hay un súper y está rodeado de bares y lugares para comer.

The position was great, right in the pulsing heart of Paris St. Germaine. I was worried about the noise, but didn't have any problem with it thanks to the good soundproof windows. Clean and stylish, very "parisienne", was missing of air conditioning but we were lucky the evenings were cool.
Great price based on position and quality.

This hotel is in a great location and is very clean. I was traveling  with my sister, husband, and four children ages six and under, so I was very grateful to find a place that could accommodate the seven of us. However, we visited Paris in July, and the rooms were not ventilated very well and did not have fans included that were up to the task. Also, the breakfast was disappointing, as it was missing some key items (cheese, fruit) to be called a typical French breakfast. The coffee was good. I don't think I would stay there if it were just me and my husband because I think I could find a place at a similar cost with a better breakfast. However, with me and my big family and so few choices, I would return if they would have me, but not in the heat of summer.
amazing location. worth staying.
Nicely central

Great accommodation in a vibrant part of town. This hotel has a storied history. It is close to subways,  and many restaurants. Best of all, the number of beds per room accommodated families very well. The staff was very courteous and accommodating. The breakfast was a simple continental and delicious start to every day.

You couldn’t ask for a better location in Paris!! The rooms are simple and definitely not luxurious, but they’re a perfect amount of space and feel very comfortable. The staff was wonderful and so welcoming. The check in and check out ours are marvelously convenient and generous. It’s in walking distance of all the great monuments of Paris, or at least of metro stops that will take you anywhere. I couldn’t give a higher recommendation! Awesome!
Great value, central location, large rooms for the area.  Staff made sure we got breakfast the morning before our coach picked us up.
Great location, clean room, and helpful staff. I had a wonderful stay. Thank you!!
I had a lovely stay here. Merci!
Great hotel! Amazing hosts and the neighborhood is fantastic. Will come back again !!
So happy with this hotel. Helpful, accommodating staff. Super comfortable beds. Clean comfortable rooms. Excellent location. Highly recommend this hotel.

This hotel is basic but clean and well located. However be warned you may not get the rooms you requested.  I booked rooms for a party of 12 and requested 4 double rooms and 2 twin rooms.  Xavier the host acknowledged this but on arrival we were given 2 double rooms and 2 four bed rooms which given we were a party of couples and friends was not acceptable. No apology or reduction in price was given for this.
Great value for money. An ideal location. Good-sized room with private bathroom. Adequate continental breakfast. A nice find in the heart of Paris.
Great helpful staff
A friendly hotel in central location with good value for money - what else do you want when visiting Paris. Next time will stay there again.
Excelente en cuanto ubicación, tiendas, metro y líneas de autobús. Incluso cerca del sena, notredame, jardines de Luxemburgo y luvre. Cuartos sencillos pero creo que justo lo que uno necesita.

This place is located in the middle of everything. A supermarket directly in-front, tons of shops and restaurants on the same street and in the surrounding areas. Close to Metro and the river. Absolutely perfect location, central to major attractions. The room is clean, small breakfast included and the staff is friendly enough. WiFi no issues. Would stay again. You cannot go wrong with this place. Merci
Really central place - basic but it has everything you need.
Local charmoso e muito agradável, localização top. Pertinho de tudo!!!
Perfekt planering i Paris. Trevlig personal. Bra städning. Enkel standard i rum utan tv. Enkel, men god frukost.

buon equilibrio tra prezzo e servizi, peccato che manchi la televisione nelle camere.

The Hotel Lousinane was a great way to stay inexpensively in very central paris. The hotel felt clean even if some areas of the hotel/rooms feel a bit aged. The bathrooms were very clean. The breakfast was simple but tasty - even decent coffee! I'll return to this hotel (even asked as I checked-out whether they had rooms available in April) but I will bring earplugs since the area, though well located, can be a bit noisy.
Awesome spot. Very clean

Highly recommend this hotel. Fantastic location.  Rooms small but adequate, very clean.  Check in was available when we arrived at 10am, which is always great. But would definitely recommend to anyone who wants a great value hotel in fantastic location

J'avais réservé cet hôtel la veille de notre arrivée avec comme premier critère : la mise à disposition d'un lit pour bébé. Sur les points négatifs : le matelas du lit bébé n'était pas vraiment adapté (cela ressemblait à une couette épaisse) et il n'y avait pas de baignoire pour bébé (demandée à l'accueil) alors que c'était indiqué dans les équipements sur le site AirBnB. Je passe sur l'aspect petit, pour lequel nous étions effectivement prévenus à l'avance.
Pour les points positifs : matelas pour adulte très bon. Chambre très propre, refaite à neuf récemment (moins de quelques années) avec un très bon confort. Personnel très accueillant. J'y retournerai probablement car il reste très bien placé et d'un bon rapport qualité/prix.

Philippe is a great host. He was very quick with responses and the apartment had everything you could need. It was a perfect location for us to visit a whole range of sites in Paris, which we had to do on foot because of a transport strike. I would highly recommend Philippe and his apartment.
The location of the apartment is perfect, many of good restaurants and bars, near to metro. Cute apartment, we felt very comfortable. We had a very great time there.

Philippe's place is in an awesome spot, central to tons of local food! The place feels very safe as there is security on site. It feels more lived in than most places we've stayed, which is good if you're looking for more of a home than a hotel feel. Overall, had a really awesome time staying here!

Me and my partner came to Paris Fashion Week and stayed for 9days, whilst the photos looked great and listed “luxury” my stay was disappointing and far from luxury. The apartment main entrance to the building is off the street and smells because the lift lobby is shared with the communal bins. You then take lift to the 2nd floor then have to walk (approx 50metres) to another building  where you take a 2nd lift to 5th floor. If you have a lot luggage ensure you have someone to help and check what day it is PARIS as the day I arrived was the mayors ‘no car day’ which meant half PARIS roads were closed, the host complained I was late but would’ve been helpful if I was made aware of this and could’ve avoided delays completely. When I arrived with my suitcases to the 2nd floor where security sit I explained I cannot take all my bags In one go to the main apartment building and asked if I could leave one and come back on 2nd trip, they refused so this wasn’t the best start!  Once I got into the apartment the smell of Cigarette smoke was very obvious, I had to go and buy air freshener. I highlighted this to the host manager right away who said he do not smell anything..Cleaning was at a good level and all bed linen was a good standard. As the smoke smells eventually stopped after 3 days, we started to notice all the sellotape used around the flat. On light switches and holding shower pole together. The ceiling in the bathroom has cracks where there looks like there was a flood from apartment above, cracks in bedroom mirror and bathroom tiles. to top off this stay, you’re overlooking a construction site with early morning noise and we had a power problems, the worse on the last night whilst we packed our suitcases and couldn’t see anything, we contacted the managing host straight away, he asked for photo of the electrical board and this was sent straight away and then we had no response until I chased the next day. Very disappointing, not recommended.

Philippe's apartment is in a fantastic, central location for navigating the city within a short walk of a major metro stop.  The apartment itself is well stocked and we had access to everything we needed to have a great trip.  There's a grocery store within a block or two of the house where you can buy deli items, groceries, house supplies, clothes, et cetera (akin to a US Target store).  The apartment has wonderful light (and light blocking curtains for a good night sleep) and comfortable, yet spacious living space.

just in front of Montparnasse station.
good access to anywhere in Paris!
Excellent location near Metro, Train Station, and Buses to the airport.  Enjoyed the spacious apartment that was clean.  When a problem did occurred, the apt manager had it fixed immediately.

Based on our recent experience, we would definitely NOT rent this apartment again NOR would we work with this host again.

This apartment was FAR FROM a Luxury Apartment (as it was described in the listing). Based on our in-person experience, the listing photos seem enhanced ... the condition, look, and cleanliness of the apt was definitely not the same as pictured (Good Photographer though I guess). So, photos appear to be only halfway accurate AND areas not shown in the listing were bigger problems. The Cleaning Lady was working on the apartment from before we arrived to 45 minutes after. Even so, there were issues throughout the apt but especially the bathroom (moldy shower curtain ... cleaning attempted but blackish stains remained, peeling paint, used bar soap, stained towel, etc) and kitchen/fridge (undefrosted/grossly over-frozen ice box, old food remnants and stains in a very old fridge, floor had been cleaned but still looked dirty). Sink and countertops were clean enough but we were uncomfortable and tried to use the kitchen as little as possible. The A/C unit was completely ineffective (maybe this was the reason for 2 additional dirty fans but unless directly in front of them, they were also ineffective). Also, I still don’t know if there was actually WiFi in the apt as we were given no access info.  Beds were okay, again nothing luxurious or even mid range but comfortable enough to sleep (if not for the heat in the apt due to the ineffective A/C).

Philippe, the host, planned to meet us at the apartment for our afternoon check-in. He decided not to meet with us about 2 hours before check-in, stating it was a National Holiday. The National Holiday was not new information. This could have been okay if the Cleaning Lady had not been cleaning the apt for the first 45 minutes, the condition of the apt had not been such a disappointment (even after the Cleaning Lady was done) as explained above, the apt had been closer to expectations based on the listing, if the A/C was not ineffective, if we would have had access to the “Included WiFi”, and if we would not have lost complete contact with the host. For the record, since we never received any WiFi Info, I can’t say for sure if there was WiFi or not.

Philippe did provide detailed instructions on how to gain access to the apartment (We would not have made it to the apt without that ... There was a gated entry door, 2 seperate elevators, a walkway, some stairs, a code, and 2 keys). Unfortunately, Philippe communicated well UNTIL we accessed the apt, expressed concerns about it, sent him photos of our concerns, and requested resolutions. Then no response ... ever ... just radio silence.
L’hôtel est très bien placé, l’accueil chaleureux et le calme et la propreté de la chambre ont contribué à ce que l’on passe un très bon séjour.
merci beaucoup
Une chambre stylé avec une très jolie vue. Près de Notre- Dame, bonne location. Je recommende!
Idéalement situé, propre, accueil sympathique

Emplacement idéal pour le tourisme, les restos et les transports. La chambre classique est vraiment bien équipée et elle est spacieuse. Très bon accueil des réceptionnistes. Petit déjeuner avec des produits frais. J'y retourne la semaine prochaine !
Chambre propre qui correspond  a la description, très bien située et accueil très agréable et réactif.

La chambre est spacieuse, silencieuse, très propre et très lumineuse. L’hôtel est agréable, le personnel très sympathique et la réception est ouverte 24/24.

En bref 3 jours supers remplis de belles suprises ! 

Merci Marine :)
Très bon emplacement de l’hôtel et chambre très propre la seule remarque serait qu’il n’y a pas de salle de bain et que la douche se trouve dans la chambre. Super séjour dans cet hôtel
Excellent endroit, très propre, bien situé, plutôt silencieux : en un mot, bien agréable

A fantastic location, super close to Notre-Dame and lots of pubs and restaurants. Super fast access to  the Metro. Room was perfect size for two, toilet was in a separate space about the size of a closet. Shower was amazing as it was a rain style mounted in the center of the stall. Hotel staff speak English rather well which we were extremely happy with! They offer breakfast of juice, coffees, yogurt, and pastry basket for €10/person. Windows come with blackout curtains and may look old style, but they really do keep street noise down well. (We stayed during the final football match between Paris and Bayern so the pubs were pandemonium but we still slept like babies!)

Unser Zimmer war sehr charmant und sauber. Es gab ausreichend Platz für uns zwei, ein Kühlschrank und im Fernsehen einige englische sowie deutsche Fernsehsender. Das Hotel liegt sehr zentral und es gibt viele schöne Cafés und Bars direkt um die Ecke. Die Bedienung sprach sehr gut englisch und war sehr gastfreundlich. Gerne wieder !

Tolle Pariser Unterkunft mit nahegelegenen Cafés und Restaurants. Abendprogramm direkt im Viertel möglich. Zum Frühstück kann ich wärmstens die Crêperie de Cluny empfehlen. Köstliches pariser Frühstück gleich ums Eck.

Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ist ok.

This is an absolute amazing place to stay for people who just like us want to explore Paris in a few days. It is super central, so you can go to every corner of Paris and always get back easily at any time. The room was super comfortable (we got an upgrade which was super nice, but I am sure the room in the picture is perfectly fine too!!), the bed is one of the best we ever slept in and the staff is super kind and always willing to help. 100% recommendable!!
Nice hotel in the city centre, would stay there again :)
Great location, fantastic room. Hope to stay here again for future visits to Paris! Highly recommended.

We stayed in Paris for 4 nights and there couldn’t have been a better place to stay for the amazing value for money! Located just around the corner from the Notre Damn cathedral and the Seine river, you can get pretty much anywhere super fast! We had a lovely city view from our balcony and the staff were incredibly friendly and helped us with anything we needed. Thank you for this amazing accommodation, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

For our first time in Paris, our stay was perfect! Our room had such a cool element of modern loft meets old world. The staff were lovely and hospitality. I highly recommend this boutique hotel. We will definitely be back!

Positiv ist natürlich, dass sich das Hotel mitten im Zentrum von Paris befindet und es viele Restaurants/Cafés/Supermärkte in der Nähe gibt. Allerdings muss man beachten, dass es aufgrund von Corona kein Frühstück und keinen Wasserkocher gibt und das Zimmer während des Aufenthaltes nicht gereinigt wird. Der Boden war leider nicht wirklich sauber. Unser Zimmer sah nicht wie auf den Fotos aus, weil wir kein separates Badezimmer hatten. Die Toilette war zwar getrennt, das Waschbecken befindet sich allerdings im Zimmer und die Dusche auch (einfach durch den Duschvohang getrennt).  Außerdem sind die Wände und auch die Decke sehr dünn, man hört so gut wie alles und dadurch dass man sich mitten im Zentrum befindet, ist es auch nachts auf den Straßen laut. Die Info ist vielleicht wichtig für Personen, die Schlafprobleme/-schwierigkeiten haben. Insgesamt ist es aber eine gute Variante, wenn man für ein paar Tage nach Paris fährt/fliegt, weil man wahrscheinlich für diesen Preis im Zentrum nicht besseres finden wird und die Unannehmlichkeiten eher durch Corona entstanden sind.
Muy buen lugar , excelente ubicación
Sehr gute Lage, schöne Zimmer! Alles top :-)
Amazing stay.
Great place! I definitely would recommend this stay!

Great place for a short stay in Paris! Very good location and clean rooms.

It‘s a sweet little hotel in a nice area in Paris. We enjoyed being so close to the next metro station (2 minutes to Saint Michel). The people working in the hotel were very polite and helpful. Overall, we were very happy with our choice.
Lovely stay, great location & fantastic staff
